The Lenox's ground floor is occupied by the '''Nina Freudenheim Gallery''' and an elegant restaurant, the '''Lenox Grill''', and it also boasts lovely views of downtown Buffalo and the waterfront from its upper floors. A limited number of executive suites with kitchens are available.

name: Peninsula Paris
overview: Opening in 2014, the meticulously hotel, known before the Second World War as the Hotel Majestic, has 200 rooms including 24 suites in this 19th century classic Haussman building.

name: House Hammond
overview: 4 Star Guest house. Each custom built individual unit, with feature en-suite bathroom, is equipped with luxury bedding and stylish décor.

name: Hilltop Campground
overview: Open April - October, with picnic tables and grill rings, vault toilets, and drinking water. No hookups, trailers up to 40'. No reservations, first come, first served.

name: Baltosios Bures
overview: Cheap, yet cosy motel alongside with '''Kaunas yacht club''' at the shore of Kaunas Reservoir in Pazaislis. Motel offers 35 double rooms with TV, Wi-Fi and showers.

name: Hotel Kulturinnov
overview: 30 beds in 15 rooms

name: Renaissance Paris Le Parc Trocadero
overview: A quiet small hotel with a courtyard north of metro Victor Hugo. Wired internet at rooms.

name: Cyclamen Chalets
overview: Open: seasonal (Apr-Sep). Iideal for 5 - 10 persons per house.Tthree bedrooms for 4-2-2 persons;a living room with two beds; kitchenette with fridge, kitchen tools can be rented; bathroom, shower; toilette; the building is heated by electrical means provided in the heating season on demand.

name: Maple Meadows Inn
overview: Wi-fi, fridge, microwave, breakfast room service, deck/patio.

name: Gateway Hotel
overview: One of the more reputed hotels in Ames. Heated indoor pool, fitness center, whirlpool and sauna, free parking, free wireless internet, room service, on-site restaurant, meeting/conference space.

name: Lang House on Main Street Bed and Breakfast
overview: Historic bed and breakfast offering beautifully restored rooms and breakfast.

name: Hotel Løven
overview: clean, secure with commune kitchen area. Breakfast not included. Also, you might be disappointed with the suggested breakfast cafe, so you're probably better off going to one of the many buffets around the center.

name: Nyali International Beach Hotel & Spa
overview: Vacation village with 173 rooms with a small safe, rooms are equipped with coffee or tea maker, satellite tv, safe, mini-bar, "Internet connectivity" and hairdryer. 5 restaurants and 4 bars. Several pools, tennis.

name: Hotel Orchard Plaza
overview: Built in 2003 it's one of the newer top end hotels in town. Rooms are equipped with complimentary Internet, and it's comfortable and clean with super friendly staff. The restaurant on the 11th floor is also good and has broad city views.

name: Friar's Lodge
overview: New & modern on a hill with 18 rooms, single €80, double €90-130, triple €150-160, quadruple €190, wi-fi, private parking.

name: Quality Inn & Suites Albany Airport
overview: Features Q Corner Cafe breakfast w/hot items, seasonal outdoor pool, 24 hour fitness center, and three onsite restaurants including the very popular Filet 7 West (providing room service).  Complimentary glass of wine or beer each M-Sa evening.  Business center, wireless internet access in all areas, voice mail, large work desks and access to copy and fax Services. Banquet and meeting facilities are available. All spacious guest rooms feature irons, ironing boards, coffee makers, hair dryers, microwaves and refrigerators.

name: Sheikh Ali Resort
overview: Dahab's first all-suite hotel, built with love by Dahab's original tourism family. Featuring 22 pool-side suites with balcony or terrace just a few minutes walk from the beach promenade.

name: Punkaharjun lomakeskus
overview: A resort offering accommodation in cottages and apartment-style rooms.

name: Villa Merihelmi
overview: 1930s house in local style, Dalsbruk.

name: Hotel Skandia
overview: Cheapish family run hotel in the city centre, the rooms were a bit kitschy for one traveler, but their 1150 Kr weekend specials is good value, otherwise.

name: City Partner Suite Hotel
overview: 4-star hotel. Great value.

name: Campement Essamaye
overview: The unique style of Campement Essamaye’s traditional impluvium house mimics buildings in the owner’s native Casamance region. The campement has ten comfortable rooms around a central courtyard (communal toilet/shower block) and plenty of space for tent-camping. Closer to Mar Fafako than Mar Lodj, you’re more likely to run into locals than other tourists (if anyone at all), giving a very authentic feel to your visit. Excursions can be organized (hiking, kayaking, fishing) and the adventurous might even find themselves persuaded to book an extended tour down to the Casamance with the owner, Xavier Diatta.

name: Rannva's Bed & Breakfast
overview: The owner of this bed and breakfast also has a gallery of fur and sealskin garments located on Angel Street.

name: Ramada Plaza Albany
overview: Pet-friendly. Offers full service restaurant, cocktail lounge, continental breakfast, meeting and banquet facilities. Provides extended stay amenities and services. Walking distance to restaurants and attractions.

name: Radama Hotel
overview: A charming hotel in the heart of Antananarivo.

name: Hilton Milwaukee City Center
overview: An Art Deco tour-de-force built in 1927, a grand hotel of legendary proportions. It has ballrooms with vaulted ceilings, city views, and period fabrics. Fully restored, with modern amenities. With 730 rooms in the heart of Milwaukee's Westown, the Hilton is adjacent to the Midwest Express Convention Center.

name: Ilulissat Youth Hostel
overview: Small hostel in town, guests must provide their own towels and bed linens. Sleeping bags are ok. There are 43 twin rooms available.

name: Annex Katsutaro Ryokan
overview: Smallish Japanese-style tatami rooms with ''en suite'' bathrooms and A/C in a modern (2001) 3-story building (elevator available) on a quiet residential street. English spoken. WiFi; free use of computer in the lobby; coin washer/drier (ask for detergent at front desk).

name: Dronningholm
address: Shortly after you pass the castle ruins there i a small parking lot on the right, the grounds are 200 meters on the south side of the small lake
overview: A campground for up to 10 people near the Dronningholm castle ruins near Arresø lake

name: ibis Birmingham Bordesley
overview: The slightly out-of-town ibis is more of an option for motorists, situated at a large roundabout of the A45 circling the city. It is one of the older ibis hotels in the UK.

name: Malibu Motel
overview: One of Malibu's less expensive options.

name: The Seri Suites
overview: Surrounded by rice paddies with a relaxing, quiet environment. Less than 10 min by free shuttle bus from the main shopping, eating and beach areas of Seminyak. One, two and three bedroom suites available.

name: Express by Holiday Inn London Southwark
overview: Situated on the River Thames, clean and charming hotel.

name: Apartments Israel LTD
overview: Furnished apartments for short term rent in Jerusalem.

name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
overview: This is a high-rise international hotel on Portopia Island mainly of interest to business travelers or those attending events at the International Convention Center nextdoor. Includes spa and pool at additional cost. Free wifi in guest rooms. Very nice view from the 30th floor during the breakfast buffet or the bar in the evening. Shuttle service to Sannomiya, Shin-Kobe Stations and Kobe and Kansai airports.

name: Four Seasons Hotel
overview: Very high-end hotel. Beautiful art collection, and extensive sports club with fitness facilities and spa.

name: Four Seasons Hotel
overview: Luxury accommodation.

name: Design Hotel Eden
overview: If you're bored of identi-kit hotel rooms then ''Design Hotel Eden'' will be a breath of fresh air. All the rooms are comfortably furnished in a variety of modern styles. You'll appreciate a philosophy that doesn't put a desk in your room so you can relax properly; and with the centre of Maastricht less than 5 minutes walk away that's easy to do.

name: Vigan Hotel
overview: Basic hotel in an old colonial house with old-style wooden floors and furniture. The rooms are very basic but acceptable. At 500 php for double, this is one of the few budget option. No food, breakfast or whatever.

name: Anraku Onsen
overview: Hotel and onsen.

name: Hotel Morandi alla crocetta
overview: Housed in a Dominican 16th-century convent, this hotel has a comfortable  atmosphere. It offers rooms with TV, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, etc. On-site garage parking is available.

name: Haparanda Vandrarhem
overview: Situated by Tornio River in Haparanda centre. 23 rooms. Book ahead of time, as the reception desk is not always open during the advertised hours (16:00-19:00).

name: Astoria City Hostel
overview: . Offering dormitories, private rooms and apartments.

name: Flagstaff Rental Cabin
overview: 3-Br Cabin with two king size fully adjustable beds with massage upstairs and two queen beds downstairs. Ralph Lauren bedding throughout. 55" 3D TV and fireplace in the great room.

name: ITH Zoo Hostel
overview: A unique and friendly hostel with tons of character. Free food daily as well as free guided adventure activities all around San Diego.

name: Pension Hugi
overview: A few minutes away from downtown,  located in a quiet environment. Capacity: 19 people. One-two-three bedded en-suite tv, air-conditioned rooms. Private car parking, free Wi-Fi

name: Novotel Luxembourg Kirchberg
overview: The Novotel in Kirchberg is a low-rise one in an office park, surrounded by office buildings, as well as the Sofitel Europe and Suite Novotel. The hotel itself is quite new and pretty standard for a Novotel, yet there is not much in the way of family entertainment that Novotel prides itself for, not even a pool.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Saigon
address: 253 Nguyen Van Troi St, Phu Nhuan District
overview: Luxury hotel in Phu Nhuan, 10 min away from the exhibition centre and international airport and 20 min from HCMC centre. 251 rooms and suites. All rooms are equipped with individually controlled air-con, TV, minibar, strongbox, hairdryer. Broadband Internet in all rooms.

name: Gren Alia Cikini
overview: 8 floors. Rooms, except suites, have connecting doors. The restaurant opens 24 hours. Less than 50 meters to Ismail Marzuki Park.

name: Highfield House
overview: Beautiful family home, only 3km from Dublin Airport. On bus route 102 from airport & 41c & Swords Express. Three star tourist board rating. Ground floor accommodation available. Free Wifi, tea/coffee.

name: easyHotel Earl's Court
overview: Guests can only book an easyHotel on the website and rooms are priced on the basis of the earlier you book, the less you pay.

name: 4-H Park
overview: Picnic tables, horse trails and corral, playground, restroom, RV dump station, showers.

name: Mandarin Oriental
overview: Ranked highly amongst the finest hotels in the world, it is known particularly for its superlative service. Prices are consequently on the steep side; even the cheapest online rates are rarely below 8,000 baht a night. Sumptuously decorated in old-school Colonial style. The hotel is on the east side of the river with Oriental Pier, its own Express Boat stop.

name: Philippos Hotel
overview: Hotel Philippos is a two-star city hotel right in the city center of Volos, close to the main commercial road of Ermou and just a block away from the Port road. It has well equipped, air conditioned rooms ideal for travellers. Free Wifi.

name: Globen Villa
overview: In this quiet neighbourhood of traditional working-class houses a welcoming lady rents 3 units for bed and breakfast. Two of the units are separate buildings, which are well equipped. The breakfast consists of several fresh things like bread, fruits and drinks. The cabins are cosy and great value. The metro is a 5 minute walk and from there 10 minutes to the main attractions. Short, the location is fine. The units have their own kitchenettes, so you can cook yourself. The supermarket is a 10 minute walk. Discounts apply if you stay longer. 1200 SEK for a weekend from Friday evening to Sunday. 3500 SEK for a week and less if you stay longer.

name: America's Best Value Inn
overview: Indoor pool, continental breakfast, wi-fi, laundry facilities, pets accepted.

name: Danubius Hotel Aréna
overview: **** 379 air-conditioned rooms. Also there: Danubius Premier Fitness: fitness room and aerobic studio. Swimming pool, Finnish and infra-saunas, solarium, massage and beauty salon.- New Italian-style restaurant and coffee shop. - Ten conference and function rooms with seating capacities of between 15-330 guests. - Close to Budapest’s largest sports and events centre and the international fair centre (HUNGEXPO).

name: Toyoko Inn Takamatsu Hyogomachi
overview: This is a branch of the national business hotel chain.  The rooms are clean and comfortable, though not large.  Japanese-style breakfast is included in the price.  There is wired internet in each room and computers for use in the lobby.  Reservations can be made online in English, though the clerk is not likely to speak much.

name: Cap Marignane
overview: With views across the expanse of the Saloum River, Cap Marignane is the perfect place to launch your exploration of the delta (on fishing tours or kayaking, perhaps) as well as a refreshing sanctuary to return to afterwards. A number of lovely rooms, some accessible by low wooden bridges over a crowd of submerged crab holes, are a calm respite from the sun and surf. Enjoy a drink beachside before heading to the restaurant, a colorfully painted and airy spot where you’ll taste delicious local cuisine.

name: Sonajhuri Prakriti Bhraman Kendra
overview: West Bengal Forest Development Corporation Limited, 6A Raja Suboh Mullick Square, 7th Floor, Kolkata-700013. Phone: +91 33 22370060 / 22258549. Spot booking permitted subject to availability of rooms

name: Park Regis Concierge Apartments
overview: Ideally located amidst the relaxed village atmosphere of Cremorne - a short drive to the attractions of Sydney's city centre. The hotel's city fringe location gives leisure visitors numerous sightseeing and entertainment options on the North Shore.  The hotel features fully self contained studio and one bedroom apartments some with harbour views. The apartments feature modern decor, climate controlled air-conditioning, TVs, direct dial phones with internet access and full kitchen and laundry facilities. The hotel is situated near numerous dining options with a restaurant and bar next door.

name: Chilax House
overview: Special package for Chitwan National Park, 15 minute walk from Sauraha bus park. Provide free wi-fi and has 4 common rooms and 5 toilet attached Rooms (hot water supplied. Encompasses a organic vegetable and fruit garden, a self cooking facility restaurant cum kitchen. Provides all jungle activities including nature walks, elephant jungle safari, Jeep jungle safari, tharu cultural dance programmes, village tours, jungle excursions, Canoe Ride, and other wildlife related and cultural activities.

name: Alternative Hostel of Old Montreal
overview: Housed in a 19th century warehouse, this hostel boasts fair trade coffee, wi-fi, an organic continental breakfast, and a range of activities and classes. Kitchen and laundry facilities provided. Often full, reservations recommended.

name: Sharanagati Yogahaus
overview: Offers homestays/yoga vacations which include yoga classes, Vipassana meditation, morning tea and Kerala-style lunch in the room price.  Also offers individual yoga classes for people staying somewhere else.  Beautiful quiet garden with hammocks. Only 4 rooms available (keeps traffic down).

name: Inn at the Park
overview: Formerly known as Park Manor Suites, this hotel is located on the western edge of Balboa Park. Rooms feature nice beds, duvets, kitchenettes and free Wi-Fi. Two on-site restaurants, Inn at the Park and Top of the Park and live entertainment.

name: The Village Inn
overview: A quirky pioneer-styled hotel, with an attached restaurant. Internet for $5/day

name: Candlewood Suites Nogales
overview: Designed primarily for business travelers. Free breakfast and wi-fi, gym and laundry facilities.

name: Garden House Istanbul
overview: This facility very close to the Blue Mosque, but in a quite neighboorhood both serves as a mid-range hotel, and exclusive suites branded as 'Rose Garden Suites'. The Hotel has nicely furnished, if somewhat small rooms. The main draw is the courtyard which has been turned into a nice garden and the rooftop terrace. The on-site restaurant offers a 20% discount for guests.

name: Circus Hotel
overview: Rosenthalerstr. 1 - About ten steps from the Rosenthaler Platz U-bahn. Nicer version of the hostel. Breakfast included, free wifi; free laptops, DVDs, and iPods available to borrow. Reserve early and ask for interior room if street noise bothers you at night. Exceptionally friendly service.

name: Volos Palace
overview: Very nice new hotel with breakfast buffet, bar and restaurant. Modern, comfortable rooms, half of which have a sea view. Helpful staff, most of whom speak English.

name: Hostal Rayén
overview: Very basic rooms.

name: Best Western Plus Fort Lauderdale Airport South Inn & Suites Hotel
overview: Adjacent Fort Lauderdale International Airport and Port Everglades Cruise Ship Terminal, Suites available. Amenities include: high speed internet, cable, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, outdoor pool, complimentary breakfast, workout facilities, meeting space, airport shuttle

name: Hotel Knight Inn Shillong
overview: Also includes Kenmore Restaurant, which serves mouth-watering food from Chinese, Indian and other cuisines.

name: Hotel St-Paul
overview: This self-described "design hotel" features uber-modern rooms on the edge of the historical district. See Eat and Drink for bars and restaurants in the same building.

name: Miyajima Tsutsumigaura Camp-jo
overview: A nice campsite at the Tsutsumigaura Beach, about 4 km from the port. Cabins and outdoor grills are available as well. There are clean toilets, but no shower: you have to use the bath-house a little way up at the bungalows, for an extra ¥300, and it closes around 8PM. The local deer walk freely around the campgrounds, so don't leave food unattended in the tent while you're away!

name: Summit Hotel
address: to the right of the main road after crossing the Bagmati on the hill in a residential area
overview: Nice location, good food. Garden wing has small rooms, but the other rooms are good.

name: Hermosa Lodge
address: 78 Mecox Road, Water Mill, New York
overview: An ideal Getaway for those looking for Romance, Relaxation or Adventure in The Hamptons.

name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
overview: AC does the trick by wrapping quite small rooms and limited facilities in modern design in very toned-down hues. Don't expect anything fancy, this is Marriott's lowest-tier brand in Spain. Some of the rooms begin to show dents and cracks after guests failed to properly navigate the narrow bits. The location next to the Sants station is convenient even if a bit sombre.

name: Ovolo Hotel – 286 Queens Road Central
overview: Boutique hotel that opened in 2012. 60 Rooms. Queen or twin mattresses, AppleTV, loot bag, rainfall shower, electric curtains, free minibar, free breakfast, free Wi-Fi, happy hour.

name: Nonaka Onsen
address: From the junction of Highway 240 and Highway 241, take Highway 241 SW several kilometers. Turn SE onto Highway 861, follow this uphill for several kilometers, and the onsen is on your left.
overview: This hotel and onsen is situated in the mountains at the base of a hiking trail for Mt. Meakan.

name: Best Western Grand City Hotel Köln
overview: The former Four Points became a part of the Grand City Hotels chain, which focuses on budget-oriented hotels in Germany, as well as a part of the Best Western network. The hotel's building is anything but pretty and the room appointments somewhat outdated, but this is made up for with free Wi-Fi and a convenient location.

name: Rixos Presidents Hotel Astana
overview: Make no mistake about it, this is the most luxurious hotel in Astana. For starters, standard rooms come with heated tiled floors in the bathroom, step in showers and jaccuzi tubs, LCD wide-screen television, and ''free'' wireless internet (although it is not very consistent). The service is friendly and professional. There is a bar, a cafe, and two restaurants, and the best conference facilities in Astana. The spa has the best exercise equipment in Astana, and the pool is lovely. It is within walking distance to the ministries and the better restaurants, and the breakfast buffet is more than fantastic (they've been known to put out caviar!) complete with a harpist. The main drawback? So many VIPs prefer to stay in this hotel (visiting presidents, prime ministers, and other big-wigs) that you often have to fight security to get in and out!

name: Chokai Ohira Campground
address: From the Jinego Rest Area, take Highway 70 SE.  At a T-junction, Highway 70 turns N, but don't follow it -- keep going straight.  After about 5km, the pavement turns to gravel, and the campground is about 3km farther.
overview: This isolated campground itself is not very scenic, but it is near the trail head for Hinoto Dake (丁岳), a good day hike.  It has one toilet building, a small area for dish washing, a covered eating area, and a light.  There is no resident caretaker.  The road and campground are closed in winter.

name: Pretty Penny Vacation Home
overview: Waterview walk to ocean beach vacation rental home.  Inside the Cape Cod National Seashore.

name: Ritz-Carlton
address: Jl. DR. Ide Anak Agung Gde Agung Kav.E.1.1 no.1, Mega Kuningan
overview: The flagship hotel of the Ritz Carlton brand in Jakarta, with standard 5 star service. Bathrooms have floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the other skyscrapers popping up in this fast-growing area. Many types of suites to choose from. Free wireless internet. Only has 2 restaurants (Italian and international) and a bar, but generally enough to fit everyone.

name: Villa Babilla
overview: German-owned hostel.

name: Lajitas Golf Resort & Spa
overview: Rooms vary in size, decor and price from simple hotel rooms with "Cowboy Bordello" style rooms in the Badlands Hotel part of the resort, to one-of-a-kind suites, luxurious condos, and even 1,2, or 3 bedroom houses. Resort amenities include horseback riding, an amazing golf course, ATV/jeep/river tours, a Spa, two pools, two restaurants, and the infamous Thirsty Goat Saloon.

name: St. Mark Hotel
overview: This hotel offers 25 guest rooms all with private en-suite facilities. Book online for best deals.

name: Guavaberry Spring Bay
address: on Tower Road south of Spanish Town, 5–10 minute walk from Spring Bay Beach
overview: Has one- two- and three-bedroom cottages, each with a kitchen/living/dining room and deck.  The houses are tucked among more of the giant granite boulders.  The honor-system self-serve commissary is small but has all the necessities for snacking, drinking and dining. No restaurants on premises, but several within a mile or so.  It also manages several villas in the area, ranging from really nice to the spectacular Casa Rocalta.  Guests of the villas have access to the Guavaberry commissary and office staff.

name: Hôtel Gavarni
overview: In the heart of the Passy village and its fashion boutiques. It's the first independent hotel in Paris to have been awarded the European Ecolabel. Fully air-conditioned, free WiFi.

name: Galleria Park Hotel
overview: A boutique hotel with a half-acre private urban park. Good linens, flat-screen TVs and complimentary wine hour.

name: Lomas Mironas Half Acre Ocean View Villas
address: Localiad / Barrio: Lomas Mironas Provincia: Puerto Plata Munucipio: Zona Urbana, Between Cabarete / Sosua
overview: easy access to country style horse back riding and is within a few mile of noted El Choco National Park (Parque Nacional "El Choco" und "Las cuevas de Cabarete" - the caves of Cabarete) An incredible 77 square kilometers of jungle, lagoon, caves, forest, orchids and open backcountry to explore.

name: Backpacker's Freak Hostel
overview: 14 rooms with or without air-con, one 4 beds air-con mixed dormitory. Hot/cold showers 24/7, Balinese style common area and cable TV/movie room, kitchen facilities provided for guests. Clean, with friendly staff and quality beds. Free Wi-Fi throughout, free breakfast, easy going and low density. The owner, Sean, speaks good English.

name: Hotelli Puustelli
overview: The only hotel in Nivala, a bit aged but decent. WiFi and breakfast are included in the price.

name: Le Grande Plaza Hotel
overview: Executive floor with lounge, outdoor pool, South Indian restaurant. 10km from airport.

name: Hotel Rheingold
overview: Re-opened in 2013 after complete renovation, claimed to be entirely barrier-free.

name: MainStay Suites
address: 3951 East Hwy 98 , Port St. Joe, FL, 32456
overview: Looking for a hotel, motel or affordable lodging near Port St. Joe? The new MainStay Suites is the first and only AAA-rated hotel in Gulf County, located 15 minutes from historic Apalachicola, and one of only four along the entire Forgotten Coast to receive a 3-diamond rating, with affordable nightly, weekly and monthly stays.  MainStay Suites is located near many points of interest including Cape San Blas, St. Joseph Peninsula State Park, Mexico Beach, Port St. Joe Marina and Salinas Park. Port St. Joe Marina offers recreational opportunities like charter boats for offshore fishing, and local captains that offer guide services for fishing in St. Joe Bay. Boat rentals are also available, as well as a restaurant and ship's store. Area activities include the Florida Seafood Festival, Scallop Festival, Christmas On The Coast, fishing tournaments, Music in the Park events, sporting events and parades.

name: Hotel Erzherzog Rainer
overview: The Hotel Erzherzog Rainer is one of the five Vienna Schick Hotels.

name: Fox Hostel
overview: Renovated 2nd floor apartment in old building (sign on balcony). Cheerful interior design by a woman with taste. Community kitchen and lounge. Spotlessly clean, and -- quite unusual for Georgia -- solid bathroom fixtures.

name: Atrium Pansion & Wellness
overview: Room prices incl. all taxes, a rich continental breakfast, unlimited high speed Internet access, and free of charge parking use. - High Season: Apr-Aug, Christhmas, New Year. - Open: 24/7, Reception: 6:00-22:00, Wellness: 8:00-22:00. - Wellness services: luxurious bubble bath up to six-person, two-person infrared sauna, five-person Finnish sauna. Massage: Traditional and numerous special kind.

name: Hotel Colosseo
overview: 14 rooms.

name: River View Guest House
overview: In the heritage district of Chinatown, back terrace overlooking the river. Recently converted Chinese shop house, spacious clean fan rooms, shared shower rooms, high quality beds and bedding. All rooms have windows. Use of kitchen, Wi-Fi. No children. Charming owners.

name: Hotel Belvedère
overview: Located in the historic city centre of Schoonhoven.

name: Mellington Hall Hotel
overview: 1870's Gothic mansion set in 280 acres of mature gardens and tranquil parkland with mullioned windows, oak panelling and beautiful staircase. 10 individually designed rooms and suites, all ''en suite'' with unlimited Wi-Fi. No pets allowed. Afternoon tea and home made cakes in the ''Offas Dyke Bar''. Lunch 12.00–14:00, Dinner 18.30–21:00 served in one of 4 restaurants: the ''Cwm Dining Room'', the ''Mahogany Panelled Restaurant'', the ''William Morris Room'', or the ''Shropshire Lounge''. Local ingredients and suppliers are used wherever possible with many ingredients traceable to source. Graded *** with Welsh Tourist Board. The most luxorius camp site I have met. Camp by lake next to facilities block. Phone owner for entrance code. Pay £5 pppn (2014) in the morning to groundsman. 5 star hotel next door are polite but claim to know nothing about camping as its under separate ownership. Hotel

name: Miyako Hotel
overview: A downtown Japanese hotel offering classic comfort accommodations, meeting rooms, and a health spa with Shiatsu massage, close to attractions.

name: easyHotel Rotterdam City Centre
overview: A budget hotel operated by the same group as the airline easyJet and accoding to the same principles - the basic accommodation is free, but everything else costs extra.

name: AAA Northlands Motel
overview: Close to Northlands Mall and QE2 Park.

name: Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf
overview: This hotel is newly renovated and centrally located.

name: The Chedi
overview: Five star luxury with traditional Omani architecture.

name: La Ribaudière
overview: A good mid-range option. Very popular, good restaurant.

name: Baan Esan Country House
overview: Cute traditional northeastern-style guesthouse 5 minutes from Sakon Nakhon airport, with a beautiful garden and landscaping. Jasmin and fragrant flowers, orchids, spa, sauna, Jacuzzi. Wi-Fi, satellite TV. English spoken, Breakfast included, latte, cappuccini, meals to go, motorbike rental

name: Byron Beachside Accommodation
overview: Sleek & Spacey, Gorgeous Light-filled & innovative Warehouse apartments. Located on the fringe of Byron Bay Village, an easy stroll to the eclectic mix of shops & restaurants on offer. Walk to Main Beach and many of the attractions around Byron Bay, or enjoy the comforts of the Butter Factory pool, garden courtyard & BBQ area.

name: Tune Hotels Pasar Baru Jakarta
address: Jalan K.H. Samanhudi no. 25, Pasar Baru
overview: AirAsia group hotel adopting its business model. You pay what you use!

name: Wigwam Motel
overview: Sleep in a giant tepee (as the natives did, although they did it without air conditioning or cable TV). Various historic vehicles on-site. This motel's [[novelty architecture]] is the basis for the [[Route 66]] 'Cosy Cone Motel' in Pixar's 'Cars'. 15 units, non-smoking, listed US National Register of Historic Places.

name: Villa Montazzi
overview: 18th century villa with lots of space: 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 4 living-rooms, library, diningroom and kitchen.  Views of the hills and the Apennines in the distance. Large Italian garden surrounding the property. Antique furniture, billiards, table-tennis, above ground swimming pool.

name: Le Bleu Balcon
overview: Small, three room, bed and breakfast in a typical Plateau apartment building. Shared bathrooms.

name: Bakkhali Tourist Lodge
address: take bus from Kolkata and the ferry across the Hatania-Doania river
overview: The only lodge near the beach is run by the West Bengal Tourism Development Corporation (WBTDC) at Bakkhali. Credit cards accepted.

name: NRI Residency
overview: offers guesthouse style accommodation with clean and large AC rooms with US style private bathrooms.

name: Rio Gande
address: Exit 67 on the A7, take B248 then B64 for 10km then take B445 and follow signs for town centre, follow signs for town centre and moblie home park.
overview: Location: On the small river of Gande, right on the edge of the historic centre, accessible from the street "An der Wiek", next to the parking lot of Rudolf Cahn of souls Stadium. Separate space for campers, quiet location in the countryside, close to the Centre. Up to 2 minutes walking to the marketplace. Maximum of 3 days stay is allowed.  Shopping and restaurants 200 mtrs away.  The web site offers a full list of amenities etc.

name: JW Marriott Mexico City
overview: One of the premier Mexico City hotels, the JW Marriott Hotel Mexico City rises 26 stories high in the exclusive Polanco District. Located in the heart of the business and entertainment sector, this flagship Mexico City hotel is within walking distance to Auditorio Nacional, the city's financial hub, and some of Mexico's best shopping, dining and night life.

name: The Charles Hotel Munich
overview: The ''Charles'' is a luxury hotel at the Old Botanical Garden and within walking distance to the historic center. If you want to give yourself a treat, like butler service and a spa, and bring big money, that's the place for you.

name: Tourist Office
overview: Big variety of accommodation, mostly in local's homes, so it's best to contact the local tourist office.

name: Takama Guest House
overview: This Japanese style house transformed into a cosy hostel is run by a modest welcoming guy. It has two clean 4 bed dorms for ¥2000 per person and a double for ¥3000 per person. Free Wi-Fi and a shared PC available. It was opened around September 2011.

name: Kokkola Camping
overview: Cottages, trailer park, tenting area.

name: Novotel Antwerpen
overview: This is an old-style low-rise suburban Novotel, complete with a garden with an outdoor pool. The good news is that it was completely renovated, so expect reasonably fresh, nice appointments and features such as the inBalance gym and a game station for kids. The location is north of the docklands, which makes it a reasonable choice pretty much only for those arriving by car.

name: Sheraton Walker Hill Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel famous for its casino, swimming pool and seasonal dance parties. Populated with a lively crowd of regular expats.

name: Driftwood Lodge
overview: Nice Lodge.

name: Debbies Bed&Breakfast
overview: Rooms with free internet and television.

name: Moscow Home-hostel
overview: Located in the picturesque quiet park zone, 20 minutes walk to the Kremlin.

name: Locanda Diana
overview: The building and the rooms are quite simple.

name: The Penrose Inn Bed and Breakfast
overview: Arguably one of the best. The service, amenities, and delicious, hot breakfasts are miles above average. Their view of Bell Rock and Courthouse Butte is unmatched.

name: Courtyard North Charleston
overview: Free WiFi, but only in the lobby & large business center.

name: Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge
overview: This is the only full service hotel outside of Jasper Township. Has a world-class golf course on site, also a world-class restaurant. Expect to pay world-class prices.

name: Karma Jimbaran Resort
overview: Resort offering completely private 3-4 bedroom villas. 2 min walk to the beach and a few of the villas have ocean views. Gay/lesbian friendly staff and management. Member of ''Leading Small Hotels of the World''.

name: Airport Hotel
address: Star Gate Rd, Near Old Airport Rd
overview: A pretty good hotel which originally opened in 1955 under the name of “Speed Bird House” owned by Pakistan's national flag carrier airline PIA for its transit passengers and walk in guests. The hotel have some 244 air-conditioned rooms including some executive rooms. Facilities includes standby generators, cable TV in rooms, free WiFi, gym, sauna, jacuzzi, steam bath, swimming pool and free airport pickup/drop.

name: The Old House
overview: B&B accommodation, 600 yards from Pennine Way.

name: Camping Zeeburg
overview: This campground is near the city. It has camping cabins, wagonettes, tent sites and RV sites. A good store, free wifi and restaurant/bar round out the amenities. A good, clean and cheap place to stay if you do not mind walking to the bathroom and paying €.80 for a hot shower.

name: Youth hostel Pro-social
overview: Youth Hostel of ’Pro-Social’ House on Blumberger Damm have become a highlight for young tourists in the Marzahn-Hellersdorf region of Berlin. 153 beds in apartments with modern, well-furnished rooms of 1 to 4 beds, all have sofa/living area, as well as separate shower and WC, a small entrance hall). These are available for young tourists, youth groups, school classes, language course groups, cultural ensembles, sports teams, in fact anyone who wants to explore Berlin. Youth Hostel puts on satisfying and healthy meals for guests.

name: Radisson Blu Mammy Yoko Hotel
overview: Freetown's first truly 4 star hotel. Recently refurbished to a very high standard. It is well located near to local bars and the beach.

name: Hôtel Montpensier
overview: Another semi-cheapie right in the middle of everything.

name: Aphrodite Studios
overview: Aphrodite Studios - a group of 20 spacious studios for 2, 3 or 4 persons - is located at Megali Ammos beach (else Ftelia) that is one of the most known beaches of Skiathos island.

name: Soppong River Inn
overview: This is surely one the more comfortable places to stay. Natural accommodations in tropical gardens along the Lang River with a teak deck overhanging the river. Rooms and cottages range from standard to luxury with air conditioning.

name: On Top Backpackers
address: Filleul St near The Octagon and Moray St
overview: Small dorms, good clean facilities, good staff, good attitude, right next to the Octagon and two blocks from a 24/7 Countdown supermarket. Built over a pool hall and bar; one minute from most facilities including cinema, library, information centre, banks, food etc. 24/7 swipe-card access.

name: Pfister Hotel
overview: Milwaukee's most famous and luxurious hotel, which has been serving visiting VIPs since 1893.  Blocks from all of downtown's most exciting attractions, including the Art Museum and the Third Ward.  Even if you can't afford to stay, it's worth your time to take a walk through the building and explore the spectacular lobby, or check out the museum's impressive art collection.

name: Omni San Francisco Hotel
overview: A luxury hotel with marble floors and wood paneling in the lobby and very nice rooms.

name: Bed And Breakfast Mari e Monti
overview: Contrada aratico. Bed & Breakfast for €30 for person a night. The b&b have a 2 main room, a bedroom, a small kitchen with a fridge, and a small bathroom

name: Windermere Lodge
overview: Is a four star graded luxury pine lodge in Limefitt Park, Troutbeck.

name: Iowa House
overview: A small bed and breakfast in an old fraternity house that's well furnished with friendly service. In a nice neighborhood and very convenient to Campustown.

name: El Zopilote Mojado
overview: This hostal is downtown but located in 3 buildings around the quiet Plaza Mexiamora. In the ''El Zopilote Mojado'' building is a coffee shop with excellent coffee and desserts, and upstairs are the rooms, tastefully done. There is another building called ''Perros Muertos'', colorfully decorated, with all the services (kitchen included) and two terraces with gorgeous views. Finally, ''La Casa del Infierno'' is located in Callejon del Infierno. This house has two small apartments and a main house, fully equipped with very Mexican decorations.

name: Ryusendo Onsen Hotel
address: 日本 〒027-0501 岩手県下閉伊郡岩泉町岩泉町字府金48
overview: This hotel and onsen is located a few kilometers south of the caves.

name: Sophienberg Slot
overview: Build by the king as a 'small' retreat due to its excellent view over the sound, this classical mansion set in a beautiful garden right by the sea mainly functions as a event and conference center. During peak season (July-Mid August) however, they kindly offer reasonably priced bed and breakfast to casual guests.

name: Botaba Bed and Breakfast
overview: Botaba Bed and Breakfast is surrounded by native bushland. 'Adults Only' with 2 rooms, each with private ensuite facilities and direct access to the garden. Fluffy bathrobes and natural body products are provided . Cooked breakfast each morning.

name: Holiday Inn Woking
overview: Due in part to the presence of a large consulting company in Woking, a large corporate Holiday Inn is located in the centre of the town.  It's expensive but more comfortable than your average Holiday Inn.  Expect cheaper rates at weekends.

name: Hotel-Vintage
overview: Just 5 km away Sheremetievo Airport. Free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is available on request in the Vintage’s breakfast room. Room service is available and packed lunches can be organised for day trips.Safe deposit box and free newspapers.

name: Quality Inn
overview: Free breakfast and internet, pet-friendly, no smoking, outdoor pool.

name: Hotel Rudninku vartai
overview: Cosy hotel.

name: Jumbostay
overview: Jumbovägen 4 near Arlanda Airport, is a bit of a novelty and conveniently located near the airport. A decommissioned Boeing 747 Jumbo jet converted into a backpackers' hostel. Everything inside is new and clean, and linen comes included on made beds. Flat screen TV's in each room are a luxury for hostels, and if you really want to splash out, there is the cockpit suite. On the downside, not much of an atmosphere once you get over the novelty of staying in a jet.

name: Pineapple Fields Hotel
overview: Pineapple fields is a residential Island resort development with spectacular ocean views, just a step away from our breath-taking beach on the island of Eleuthera in the Bahamas.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Cincinnati Blue Ash
overview: 4320 Glendale-Milford Rd.

name: Turismo Rural Monsaraz - Casa D. Antónia
overview: In the main street of Monsaraz you will find the Casa Dona Antónia, memorable and unmistakable with its original and highly characteristic features - its main façade, its three broad chimneys and its massive bougainvillea which, when in flower, adds colour to this marvellous building.  At the beginning of the 1970's it opened its doors to offer a traditional family welcome to visitors. As time passed these visitors spread the reputation of Casa D. Antónia, not only in Portugal but also in the world beyond.

name: Formosan Naruwan Hotel
overview: This is five star hotel for those with a large budget and an appreciation for amenities. It offers all the things a hotel of its stature should including spa and free gym.

name: NH Art + Tech
overview: Also at Lingotto, this hotel has 5 stars and features the architecture of Renzo Piano.

name: Borneo BeacHouse Backpackers
address: 122 Lorong Ikan Lais, Jalan Mat Salleh, Tanjung Aru
overview: Fairly shabby hostel and a fairly nasty beach. Located far outside the city. Staff are friendly but not very knowledgeable. Only worth staying at if you have an early flight or are in transit, or if you don't mind dirty sheets and broken toilets. Located near some hawker stalls where you can get cheap Malay food for RM5-6.

name: Radisson Blu
overview: The only hotel within the airport terminal.

name: Hilton Salalah
overview: A popular choice for European visitors. It is located roughly 12km outside town and runs a shuttle service to and from the Gold Souq daily. The hotel cannot really be recommended, however, as the service is appalling and a general sense of "the inmates running the asylum" pervades.

name: Intercontinental Paris Avenue Marceau
overview: The "other" Intercontinental in Paris contrasts with the lavish historic ''Grand'' by having a more subtle, postmodern decor. The location in a converted historic building provides for spatial limitations clear in all areas of the hotel, but with only 57 rooms the property has almost a boutique feel to it.

name: Venngarn Palace
overview: A 17th century palace, though there are historical records since the 12th century. Among most Swedish people, the palace is known as a rehabilitation home for alcoholics during the early 20th century. Today, it is used as a conference hotel.

name: Apartments Valparaiso Experience
overview: All apartments are fully furnished with free and stable Wi-Fi and cable TV. Newly built quality duplex apartments, central heating, double glazing windows, wooden ceiling beams and wooden floors, each unit with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, bright living room and equipped kitchen and ample deck terraces with panoramic views over the ocean, city and coastline. Remodelled building with 2, 3 and 4 bedroom apartments on a safe and central location on Bellavista hill.

name: Typoeth Cottage
overview: Self catering holiday cottage in secluded valley, less than 10 minutes from Llandysul. Twin beds, with option for a third bed. Wood burning fire. Enclosed rear garden. Dogs are welcome. Dog training sessions are available.

name: DND Building
overview: Good place for longer-term stay. Large rooms with a/c, cable TV, Wi-Fi, fridge (but no cooking facilities), cold water shower. For weekly or monthly stays, electricity bill is extra.

name: Hotel Royal
overview: The hotel offers free wireless internet access and free premiere movie channel (German & English). It features a very central location with only a few minutes to walk from Munich's historic center, Marienplatz, Hofbräuhaus and the Oktoberfest site.

name: Hotel Sara
overview: Rooms for one to three people and renovated albeit very simple. Clean and basic, this hotel features lurid red and green corridors, a handful of satellite television channels, a few rooms with small jacuzzis and a garage for two cars.

name: Radisson Hotel Harrisburg Hershey
overview: A very nice hotel with a variety of different types of rooms, two different restaurants, a fitness center, and convention space for businesses. Its location is ideal to enjoy the quieter aspects of the town of Camp Hill while still being close enough to travel to Harrisburg and Hershey.

name: Putri Island Resort
address: Departure from Ancol Marina pier no. 9
overview: This is the first resort erected at the islands. 75 cottages, all with double or twin beds. Not your fit if what you want is a quiet atmosphere! You can use the glass bottom boat, a special cruise to see the sunset, & an undersea aquarium!

name: Störsby Bed & Breakfast
overview: A lovely countryside farm equipped to accommodate single travellers or whole families, if needed for all their holidays. The lady running the place speaks all sort of languages (if needed with her hands) and makes you feel welcome.

name: Crystal Hill Kofa Campground
address: in the Kofa National Wildlife Refuge, off of Hwy 95 south of Quartzsite
overview: Located on a dirt road with 16-29 campsites available. RVs permitted, no maximum. No water, 14-day limit. Visitors are permitted to collect any quartz crystals they may find in the area without the aid of tools - no digging!

name: Tamarind Village
overview: Apartments of one, two or three rooms with satellite tv and open veranda with view of the old town. Two pools and a whirlpool.

name: Beverly Laurel Motor Hotel
overview: A popular hotel, next door to Swingers.

name: Melia Barcelona Sky
overview: Upscale hotel in Poble Nou neighbourhood. Amenities include free high-speed internet, minibars in all rooms, 24 hour access to the gym, pillow-top mattresses and a pillow menu.

name: Ramada Inn Downtown
overview: Cheapest traditional hotel to stay next to downtown.

name: Gorge View
overview: Hostel with male, female, and co-ed dorms, along with private rooms. All bathrooms en-suite. Reception hours from 9AM-7PM daily; late check-in is possible if arranged in advance. Free wireless internet, laundry facilities.

name: Hostels Granada Nest
overview: Youth Hostels Nest in Granada.

name: Lake Paringa Heritage Lodge
overview: Motel, backpackers and van sites near Lake Paringa.

name: Red Garter Bed and Bakery
overview: Listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

name: Sokos Hotel Viru
overview: This is a large matchbox of a building and, for a long time, it was the tallest modern building in Tallinn. It's very centrally located at the edge of the Old Town. In the Soviet days, when Tallinn was a hotbed of espionage, Viru was the city's premier hotel and every single room was famously bugged by the KGB. Today it's just a very good Finnish-run business hotel, and even the gray facade has been whitewashed.

name: Hotel Santa Maria
overview: A three star hotel.

name: Lodge on the Desert
overview: Founded in 1936 as a dude ranch on the edge of town, Lodge on the Desert is now in the heart of the city. However, it still exudes desert style and beauty. The 35 rooms are beautifully appointed with unique Southwestern flair.

name: Hamar Hostel
overview: This hostel, part of Hostelling International, is located near Vikingskipet, a fifteen minute walk from the city centre.

name: Luxembourg Youth Hostel
overview: 2, rue du Fort Olisy. A nice clean hostel with a friendly atmosphere and only 10 minutes on the bus from the city centre. 23.90€ per bed in a shared dorm, discount with HI membership. Breakfast free, other meals €5 - €10.

name: Pullman Berlin Schweitzerhof
overview: The former Sofitel found a new lease of life as an ultra-modern Pullman. It is located in Budapester Strasse, a relatively quiet upscale street running along the Zoologischer Garten. some distance away from U-Bahn or S-Bahn stations. The hotel is appointed in the beige/brown/ecru theme also found in other Pullmans in Germany.<br>The rooms facing the zoo offer striking vistas, while the ones on the opposite side face a wall of an office building across the courtyard. Fortunately, there are small lobbies on every floor with views of the zoo and complimentary tea and coffee. All rooms offer a full range of modern comforts, including the possibility to link your devices to the room's audio/video systems. There is free mineral water in the rooms, but do note that the WiFi incurs extra charges over the room prices.

name: Jahongir Hotel
overview: A two star hotel.Economy rooms are with shared bath

name: Corvin Hotel
overview: *** Twenty rooms.

name: Interpoint Hostel
overview: Operated by the YWCA of Turku, this is the cheapest place to sleep in Turku, but for good reason: It is just 30 mattresses on the floor, and 1 shower. If that is enough for you, then this is your place.

name: Ishøj Strand Camping
overview: Just next to the nearby hostel, both are jointly operated by the Danish hostelling organisation. Shared building with reception, kitchenette, bathrooms,  and other sanitary facilities. Campfire, playground, football fields for the kids, and walking distance to the beach.

name: Danhostel - Copenhagen City
overview: Rooms are clean and minimal, if not to say Spartan, although the hostel prides itself on having rooms designed by renowned design house Gubi.... It looks more like a room by Ikea - not that this is necessarily a bad thing, considering it is a hostel, and the view are great! Everything extra comes with a cost, but the lobby is super nice.

name: Moan Laur Bed and Breakfast
overview: Cosy traditional Irish cottage in the heart of the Dingle Peninsula with great views of the Slieve Mish Mountains. Within walking distance of the Dingle Way.

name: Days Inn at the Beach
overview: Your typical Days Inn; across the street from the zoo.

name: Hotel d 'Europe
overview: 5-star

name: Hotel Northern Lights
overview: Centrally located with 37 rooms. A sauna, swimming pool and small café are avalible.

name: Ramada Plaza Toronto
overview: Restaurant, business center, meeting & banquet rooms, indoor heated swimming pool, hot tub, complimentary WiFi, underground parking available, central location.

name: Paradise Inn & Suites Hotel
overview: Onsite 24 hour Tim Horton restaurant, complimentary deluxe continental breakfast with waffle bar, waterslide, hot tub, free high speed wifi, fitness center, pet friendly, free parkings with hookup,  free local phone, flatscreen TV, mini-frig & microwave, full kitchen available, accessible rooms.

name: Hodgdon Meadow
overview: This campground is located north of Crane Flat near the park entrance and is open year-round.  Reservations are required from April through September, and offers 105 sites for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length. Four group sites are available for 15-25 people. Water and flush toilets are available.

name: Catalonia Albeniz
overview: A simple and slightly dated hotel right next to the Clot train station.

name: Auscoprut hotel
overview: three-star hotel. 24 rooms

name: Courtyard Detroit Troy
overview: Good size and quality rooms. Small gym and pool. Breakfast is Starbucks style.

name: Millenium Hotel
overview: Splendid. -All 51 rooms with: Bathroom, Cable TV, Minibar, Terrace, Airconditioning, Internet, Telephone, Heating system.  +Tel.:+ 355 86 820308

name: Yuzana Garden Hotel
overview: 37 rooms in a renovated colonial building.

name: Krishna Chura Homestay
overview: Hospitable family home with modern facilities.

name: Coconut Tree Hotel (West End, Half Moon Bay)
overview: Great accommodations for travelers on a budget. All cabins have air-con and a refrigerator. Cabins in West End & West Bay. Associated with [http://www.coconuttreedivers.com/ Coconut Tree Divers]

name: KM Apartments
overview: Affordable apartments, to 5 minutes from Plaza de Armas in Taxi.

name: Auberge et Chalets sur le Lac
overview: Rooms and chalets for rent, refrigerators, boat docks on-site, outdoor pool. Whirlpool bath in some rooms. Additional charge for pets.

name: Hamersay House
overview: Formerly the Tigh Dearg Hotel, a new hotel (opened in 2005) located about 15 minutes walk from the ferry.

name: Hilton Netherland Plaza
overview: Originally the Netherland Plaza Hotel, a favorite of Bing Crosby and many other celebrities who frequented Cincinnati during it's golden age of WLW radio. Hilton's historic luxury hotel in Cincinnati is the located inside of historic Carew Tower Complex in the heart of Cincinnati (Fourth and Vine Streets). The Carew Tower is the 2nd tallest building in Downtown Cincinnati, and an Art Deco architectural landmark.

name: Matsue Urban Hotel
overview: No nonsense business hotel. Rooms have LAN internet.

name: St. James Hotel
overview: The oldest hotel in town, in operation since 1875.

name: TNT Hostel Moscow
overview: Hostel located in the one of the safest places in Moscow, on a small side street within the Central Bank of Russia and Federal Guard Service buildings.

name: Hotel Playa Sol
overview: Directly on the sea-side.

name: Spléndido Hotel
overview: Rumor has it that this hotel was originally built by a former president at the turn of the 20th century for his mistress. The hotel is located near the Plaza de Independencia and the Teatro Solis. Many of the best restaurants, music, bars, and sightseeing spots are literally within a few steps of the front door.

name: Kosrae Nautilus Resort
overview: 18-room modern hotel with air-conditioned rooms and restaurant, or outside dining by the swimming pool. Free airport transfers, full service scuba dive operation including NAUI scuba instruction. Tour and rental cars arranged. Located adjacent to the Lelu causeway facing east to the Pacific Ocean, with 3 acres of manicured gardens.

name: Merweb Hotel
overview: Newish, pleasant four-star hotel.

name: Chipata Motel
address: Just north of intersection with Lundazi Rd
overview: Clean if somewhat run-down doubles from US$10.  Also hosts many concerts, which can be good to visit, but not so good to try to sleep through.

name: Maliba River Lodge
overview: Maliba River Lodge offers guests self-catering accommodation in [[Ts'ehlanyane National Park]] and is the perfect stay over for budget travellers and tour groups. Each Chalet sleeps 8 people.

name: Furnace Creek
overview: (Year round).  Located 196 feet below sea level, Furnace Creek has 136 sites with water, tables, fireplaces, flush toilets, and dump station. No showers, but nearby Furnace Creek Ranch offers pool and shower for $5 per day.

name: Isalo Rock Lodge
overview: This 60 room resort occupies an incredible location, surrounded by sandstone formations and with a sunset view across the rocks that is nearly worth the hefty room price on its own.  This is a top-end resort, built from local materials in order to blend with the natural setting.  The large rooms that contain amenities such as air conditioning, mosquito nets, mini bar, safe, deck, etc.  Property amenities include a pool, desert gardens, bar, restaurant, and spa.  The resort also offers a few hiking options, including the short (five minute) hike up to a hiking trail up to Giorgio's Window, a sunset overlook atop a sandstone formation.  Visa accepted for payment.

name: Glidden House
overview: A renovated and expanded mansion in University Circle on the campus of Case Western University. This is one of the most luxurious lodging options in Cleveland.

name: Hotel Mirabeau Eiffel
overview: Though it is off centered, It is new, clean and somewhat affordable

name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic
overview: This hotel with a spa is actually a bit north of the actual Olympic Village. Due to its constrained location within one of the old blocks of Poblenou, the experience there may be less rewarding than in some of the newer hotels.

name: Hotel Flamingo
overview: Reasonable hotel with basic air conditioned rooms. Internet is available in reception. Swimming pool and bar/restaurant outside. There is Wireless available at the bar/restaurant. Safe parking.

name: Old Vienna, mini hotel
address: Malaya Morskaya ulitsa, 13/ Gorohovaya 8 ( Малая Морская ул., д. 13 / Гороховая ул., д. 8)
overview: A both stylish and "home-cozy" mini-hotel of business class level, located in the centre. All 14 rooms with: air con, Wi-Fi, bathroom, sat TV, telephone, mini-bar, hair-drier, DVD. Breakfast (buffet) included in the price.

name: Tay Inn
overview: Highway 7 motel with wi-fi, a/c, refrigerators, outdoor pool. No pets.

name: The Fairmont Banff Springs Hotel
overview: One of the [[grand old hotels]], few hotels can compare to the majesty of the Fairmont Banff Springs Hotel. Nestled in the trees overlooking the rest of the town and valley it is a magnificent location for a magnificent building. Multiple restaurants, a heated outdoor pool and a wide range of accommodation in a fantastic building. All this comes at a price though, and the Banff Springs is an expensive hotel. Also booking very early is required. Among the luxurious amenities, you can indulge in their three waterfall treatments whirlpools and indoor Hungarian mineral pool (that actually has music underwater to soothe you as you float into complete relaxation) or enjoy treatments at the onsite Willow Stream Spa. Bike and ski rentals are available at the hotel and can be booked in advance.

name: Hotel Ichan Qala
address: Yusuf Hos Hojib ko'chasi ( ул. Юсуф-Хос-Хожиб), 75/10
overview: A four star hotel. Sixty eight rooms: Superior, DeLuxe, Junior Suite, Suite, Presidential Suite and Villa

name: Ermitage Hotel
overview: A small four star hotel with genuine St. Petersburg spirit. Located in the historical centre. Offers 4 double rooms that allow usage of a fully equipped study and a magnificent hall with fireplace - and with the whole staff of the hotel at your disposal.

name: Porto Angeli Hotel
overview: 5 star resort.

name: Sleepy Hollow Motel
overview: Road.

name: Santiago Marriott Hotel
overview: A popular business hotel in Las Condes, near excellent dining and shopping. Offers comfortable accommodations, a Lobby Bar, two first-rate restaurants, meeting space, and other modern amenities and services.

name: Auberge Vieux Port
overview: A good deal for the price, this historical building, set back from the street, books up early.

name: Westbay Inn
overview: A guesthouse some seven kilometers north of the city center in Västervik.

name: GuestHouse Bon
overview: Located in northwest Kyoto, immediately east of Daitokuji. Inexpensive bicycle rentals. The guest house owner has lived in Western countries before and can speak fluent English and a pinch of Spanish. All Japanese-style rooms, but can be converted to dorm style upon request for larger parties.

name: Central Backpackers Dunedin
overview: In the heart of the city, 1 minute from the Octagon.

name: New Kow Loon
overview: This is a lively place on the market, combining a restaurant with a hotel. Rooms are simple but adequate and breakfast is included. The restaurant serves a broad range of Surinam dishes, from different cuisines.

name: Mandukhai Hotel
overview: A nice inexpensive hotel located in UB city center. The hotel staff speaks little English but rooms are large and include TV. Bathrooms are shared.

name: El Monte Sagrado
overview: A resort with luxurious themed suites, a spa, a restaurant & bar, meeting space, and wedding facilities.

name: Hotel Darya
overview: It include in the price Wi-Fi, Satellite Channels, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, and Sona.

name: Cumulus Pinja
overview: A small hotel, located in the center of the city.

name: North Clifton RV Park
overview: Full hook-ups for RVs, with sites for tents. Call for availability.

name: Radisson BLU Royal Garden Hotel
overview: Modern palace of glass, brass and marble with 295 rooms. Centrally located, excellent communications, but a little soulless.

name: Quality Hotel - Inn at False Creek
overview: Has the trendy boutique look and feel with brick walls in the rooms accompanied by modern finishings. Rooms are mixed with two double beds, a single queen or a single king. There are also some extended stay rooms with a kitchenette. Wifi is complementary and there is a seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Ramada Hotel Dresden
overview: On the southeastern outskirts of Dresden. Do not mistake it with the "Ramada Resident", which is in a similar direction, but quite a distance away from this hotel.

name: Long Lin Guesthouse
overview: Clean, spacious and well-decorated. The owner is very friendly and helpful, as is the service. Tours, buses and boats can also be booked through the guesthouse and may include pick-ups.

name: Pink Manila hostel
address: 2551 Don Pedro street cor. Bautista street
overview: Fan dorm beds. Has a swimming pool.

name: Amaroossa Cosmo
overview: Located within the Pasar Minggu area. Wide rooms with mirrors on the wall behind the bed. Large restaurant and coffee shop for a banquet or informal meeting.

name: Sheraton Oran Hotel & Towers
overview: One of the fanciest hotels in Oran with breathtaking views of the ocean from each room. The hotel also features a complimentary airport shuttle, restaurants and a tennis court

name: Hotel Arctic
overview: Formerly the Nova Inn.

name: Ciudad Vieja Hostel
overview: Located near the historical heart of the city and in the middle of Montevideo’s nightlife. Free breakfast, Internet, kitchen access.

name: Llamacorral
overview: Recommended camp site for the last night.

name: Hotel inside railway station
overview: 13 rooms right inside of the railway station building. Shared bathroom. No WiFi.

name: Hotel Carlton Rioja
address: Avda. Gran Vía Rey Juan Carlos I, 5
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Hotel Ivy
overview: Located in the heart of downtown. Connected to seven miles of skyway, connecting guest to attractions such as the Convention Center, Nicollet Mall, Orchestra Hall and the Guthrie Theatre regardless of weather.

name: HI-Maligne Canyon
overview: Closed Wednesdays Oct-Apr, open all other times. This small, 24 bed hostel, is an excellent place to get away from things for a while. Though it lacks running water, you'll not miss anything else. There's a good sized kitchen, a supply of drinking water, and a very friendly and relaxed atmosphere.

name: Nap Hostel Pecs
overview: Is in the main pedestrian street of the historic city centre. The hostel is in a building of eclectic architecture built in 1885. The rooms are spacious and colourful, the bathrooms are modern and there is a fully equipped kitchen for you to use. From the balcony, you can have a beautiful panoramic view of the whole city and of the Mecsek Mountains. -+mobile: +36 30 2770733

name: Mini Hostel Odessa
overview: Cheap, safe and secure hostel in the centre of Odessa. Free Wi-Fi, lockers, linen, coffee and tea. English-speaking reception 24/7. Guests of the Mini Hostel Odessa get a discount if they stay in the Mini Hostel Kiev or the Mini Hostel Lviv.

name: Brunxu Apartments
overview: Apartments for rent surrounded by exotic vegetation that characterize the Pacific Coast of Costa Rica.

name: Chuparosa Inn Bed & Breakfast
address: 1300 S Madera Canyon Rd, Madera Canyon
overview: Ideal for birdwatchers.

name: 7 Century Guest House
overview: Newly renovated guest house, but somehow already a bit worn. 2 single (150 baht), 4 double (180-220 baht) and 1 triple rooms (250 baht). Singles can be a bit mouldy due to poor drainage and ventilation. Good hot shower (private for single rooms, shared for double and triple). Terrace. Free Wi-Fi. If they have a laptop free you can borrow it to take to your room. Fan in rooms. Kitchen free to use. Soft beds. Service also available in German. Help with booking trips, treks, motorbikes and other things. Friendly staff.

name: Firth Hotel
overview: Family run B&B and licensed bar.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Munich City East
overview: The Courtyard occupies a building between the Residence Inn and the Motel One close to the Ostbahnhof

name: Delta Kingston Waterfront
overview: Renovated 2013, former Ramada/Radisson.

name: Jaulares
overview: Buffet restaurant and private cabins accommodation.

name: Radisson BLU Royal Hotel
overview: Five-stared hotel centrally located opposite the Central station and the Tivoli. The entire hotel from the exterior facade through to the swan and egg chairs gracing the lobby have been designed by famous Danish architect, Arne Jacobsen. Free broadband, fitness centre, gourmet restaurant "Alberto K" on the 18th floor.

name: Atlet Century Park
overview: A cheap hotel in the middle of Senayan close to Gelora Bung Karno. Semi-Olympic size swimming pool. The restaurant only provides Indonesian food. The 16th floor executive room will also entitle you to an executive lounge with never ending helping of snacks.

name: Nobis
overview: Branded as "Stockholm's first contemporary luxury hotel", opened in 2009 in a 19th century building. The building used to be a bank office, known for the 1973 hostage robbery which coined the term ''Stockholm Syndrome''. The lounge is 28 meters tall.

name: Kentucky Dam Village State Resort Park
overview: The park campground features 219 paved sites with water and electric hook ups.  Comfort stations with showers and flush toilets are available as well as an onsite grocery store.  The campground is closed November 1 through March 31.

name: The Aviator Hotel
overview: Farnborough Road. A four-star "luxury" hotel.

name: Giraffe Manor
overview: The converted home of the founders of the African Fund for Endangered Wildlife, located a few kilometres from the city center, sitting on 57 ha (140 a) of land. The giraffes can be fed at the front door or even from the second floor bedroom window!

name: Pullman Central Park
overview: A sleek 5 star hotel above the Central Park Mall. Chic and spacious rooms with a sense of black and white. All day dining at Collage with live cooking demonstrations and top off with a wine at Vinoteca or a Bloody Mary at Bunk bar. Also provides spa, massage, fitness and pool for your wellbeing.

name: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel
overview: The former Hilton was taken over by Accor's upscale business hotel brand Pullman and underwent extensive renovation to its rooms and public spaces. It continues to offer close-up views of the Eiffel Tower from the balconies of its relatively spacious for Paris Deluxe (32 sqm) and Superior (26 sqm) rooms, while the Classic rooms (26 sqm) face the courtyard.

name: Royal Barracks Guest House
overview: Every room features a queen size bed, private bath and fireplace, and private entrance to the courtyard.

name: The Clift Hotel
overview: Hotel features Jeffrey Chodorow's Asia de Cuba restaurant, the Redwood Room, the Living Room, private apartments, penthouse suites and meeting facilities.

name: Le Grandeur Jakarta
address: Jl. Mangga Dua Raya, Jakarta 10730, Indonesia
overview: 350 room business hotel. At the Mangga Dua shopping complex. The La Avant is the primary restaurant and despite its French name, it is famous for the pulled Chinese noodles (''La Mien'') that has a silky taste.

name: Benson KOA
overview: Spots for tents and RVs, cabins available. Hookups and water at some sites, showers and pool on the grounds. Free wi-fi, pets accepted.

name: Premier Inn, Albert Dock
overview: The hotel is in original warehouse, has been well transformed and has the vaulted ceilings. While room allocation is mostly luck some rooms have classic views over the dock; others of the new Liverpool Arena. Early booking essential; cheap/discounted rooms now impossible to find because of the high demand/location. Ranked as top Liverpool hotel on Tripadvisor. No hotel parking - nearby at about £12/day.

name: Oasis Las Vegas RV Resort
overview: Nice clean RV park south of the Strip, 50 amp full service hookups. Two pools and hot tubs. You'll need to drive or take a shuttle to the Strip. Easy access from I-15.

name: The Old Courthouse
overview: Bed and Breakfast from 25 - 30 pounds per person per night.

name: Sukayu Onsen
overview: One of the most famous old onsen in the area. The exterior and interior are of wood, and the main bath, though large, will unlikely hold up to 1000 people as it is famously claimed. The water is white and is reputedly good to treat reuma. The whole onsen smells of sulfur from the water, which adds to the charm once you get used to it. The large bath is open 24 hours and is one of the few remaining mixed-sex baths (be warned!), except 8-9am and pm when it is female only. It is near a nice short walk that takes you to a termal-heated wooded bench. Serious hikers can relax in this onsen after walking the Hakoda mountain. Rooms are Japanese style, and food is served in the room, ryokan style. Alternatively you can stay for a longer period and cook your own food in the cooking facilities.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Thousand Oaks, CA
overview: Guest rooms and suites with complimentary hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking. Pool and fitness center are also provided.

name: End of the Trail...er
overview: Two bedroom guest house with kitchenette, large bath and private deck with unobstructed view of Great Basin National Park. One bedroom has a queen-sized bed, the other a twin-sized bed. Comfortable for 1-3 guests. A unique artist's retreat that is clean and quiet. Season: May 1 through September 30th. No smoking and no pets.

name: Pine View Guest House
address: Southeast side of town, off Umodzi Highway)
overview: A nice place offering double rooms from $20.

name: Hostal Tres Mascaras
overview: Fairly big hostel with rooms surrounding a courtyard sporting both parrots and budgies (although caged). The yard is a bit run down, but the rooms are nice. Wifi, hot water, simple breakfast on request.

name: The Beech Tree Inn
overview: The Beech Tree Inn Bed and Breakfast offers 10 guest rooms in the outskirts of Boston.  The inn is just a short tram ride from many of the cities events and activities.

name: Mercure B&P Tel Aviv
overview: The hotel is in the center of Tel Aviv and offers spacious and contemporary 4 star accommodations. This makes it ideal for business and leisure travelers.

name: Elysian Fields Inn
overview: Convenient for walking into the French Quarter, 3 blocks from Frenchmen Street clubs. Hosts, Leigh and Jim are very knowledgeable of the NOLA music scene. Has secure covered parking.

name: Raijan Aitta
overview: Handmade linen and flax products, plus raspberries and strawberries in summer and cottage accommodation from €30/person.  The surrounding countryside and nearby lake are beautiful, but you'll need your own wheels to get here.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Tempe
overview: Rates include free wi-fi and breakfast. 12 miles from downtown Phoenix.

name: YMCA hostel
overview: Hostel popular among school groups. Dorm bunks, singles and doubles with/without shower available. Extra charge for linen, breakfast and internet usage.

name: La Petite Auberge
overview: A handsome wood-frame house built in 1916 for the Langlois family, La Petite Auberge's location in the heart of downtown Chandler just a block off Route 132 isn't what you would call quiet. However, owner Gilda Grenier really does a good job crafting a pleasant, relaxing experience for her guests. The four guest rooms each are equipped with cable TV, free wireless Internet, and fireplaces; two bathrooms are shared among them. There's also a comfy sitting room where breakfast is served each morning from 7AM to 9PM: a full spread of French toast, pancakes, cereal, homemade jams, a selection of meat, and coffee. Parking is on-street, but free of charge. Website in French only.

name: Mount Royal University Guest & Visitor Housing
overview: Fully furnished one-, two- and four-bedroom apartment and townhouse units on the Mount Royal campus in southwestern Calgary (address is for the administrative office, not the residences). Two- and four-bedroom units have private bedroom keys, and include local phone calls, voice mail, and wireless internet.

name: Arabian Nights Hostel
overview: A very fun hotel located next to Khan el Khalily and near the Citadel.  Staff are very friendly and helpful.  There is a great view from the roof, with an Arabian style tent set up.  They are now having a free Sufi dancing show on their roof every Sunday. Comfortable clean rooms, good help with trip ideas and Cairo tips.  Free wifi, air conditioning, breakfast and as many hot drinks as you want.  Rooms start from 80 Egyptian pounds.

name: Villa Seminyak Estate & Spa
overview: 76 rooms in 52 villas.

name: Hotelli Cumulus Lahti
overview: Pet friendly hotel in the center of Lahti. There are conference facilities for 50 people. The hotel has 171 rooms, bar and disco.

name: Ahruaycocha
overview: Alpamayo Base Camp - good destination for a side trip on the third day.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: 64 room hotel on Rideau Canal, restaurant, wi-fi, some rooms have refrigerators or whirlpool baths.

name: Waterhead
overview: 4 stat town house boutique hotel.

name: Hotel Sportivnaya
overview: Quite OK hotel. Friendly staff, breakfast is included in the room rate. Sauna with a pool. Cons: small rooms, poor Wi-Fi signal.

name: Chateau Royal de Saint-Saturnin
overview: 13th century chateau-hotel in the Volcano Regional Park. Table d'hote restaurant, large car park, all rooms have en-suite bathrooms.

name: Hotel Granvia Okayama
overview: Plenty of luxury to be found here, including an indoor pool, sauna, gym, and eight restaurants & bars.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, nonsmoking, pool, pet-friendly.

name: Cebuview Tourist Inn
overview: All rooms are fully A/C with cable TV and ''en suite'' WC/hot and cold shower. Family rooms are also available for those travelling in groups. Free Wi-Fi in air-con lobby. Relatively clean and large rooms for this price bracket. Elevator and honest staff. In nightlife area.

name: Camp Mack's River Resort
overview: 265 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Pool. Wi-fi internet access (for a fee).

name: Hotel des Arts
overview: The hotel displays the work of contemporary local artists.

name: Dan Tel Aviv Hotel
overview: Dan Hotel Tel Aviv is one of the shoreline Tel Aviv Hotels, lapped by the blue Mediterranean and located at the center of everything yet away from it all. For your choice, 2 Tel Aviv Hotels - Dan Hotel Tel Aviv and Dan Panorama Hotel Tel Aviv.  Perfect for a sun and fun vacation, a high-pressure business trip, or a bit of both.

name: Hostelling International Houston
overview: Located in a 1917 mansion built for one of Houston's former mayors, this hostel is within walking distance from all the best restaurants, shops, and nightlife that Montrose has to offer. Also just a short bus ride, or if weather permits a 20 minute walk from the Museum District and Downtown. Regularly hosts pub crawls, museum tours, travel classes, and Texas sized BBQ's in the backyard. HI Houston is also the only hostel in the Hostelling International network with a swimming pool, to help escape those Texas summer days.

name: Abraham Hostel Jerusalem
overview: Popular, larger hostel that keeps a community feel. Free breakfast, wi-fi, and Old City tour.

name: Sheraton Batumi
overview: Direct beach access and friendly service. 203 rooms including 26 suites.

name: Bull's Head and Lodge
overview: Lodge that adjoins the village pub, handy for the airport and M56

name: Alamo Campground
overview: 4 tent sites, no water. Reservation only, made in the Kris Eggle Visitor Center on the first day of the visit.

name: Time Hotel Melaka
overview: air-con rooms, all of which have cable TV, comfy duvet, and private hot and cold rainshower. High-speed Internet access, currency exchange, and business centre. While staying here, you can visit some interesting places like A'Famosa Fort, and Jonker Walk.

name: Old Cataract Hotel
overview: Live it up like the aristocrats of old! Part of the Sofitel Legend chain of hotels, the Old Cataract Hotel overlooks the Nile River opposite the island of Elephantine.

name: Seaport Hotel
overview: One of the new deluxe hotels that's sprung up around the South Boston waterfront area in the past couple years.

name: Oasis Backpackers' Hostel
overview: Pleasant hostel on the edge of the Albayzin district with a lively atmosphere. 24hr tea & coffee, welcome drink, daily activities, internet & wifi and a lovely patio and big roof-top terrace.

name: Kaya Pansiyon
overview: In the heart of Bodrum, but in a peaceful location. Rooms with balcony, TV, air conditioner and bathroom. Venere top clean 2013 and Tripadvisor certificate of excellence 2013 awards.

name: Art Hostel Rio
overview: Fairly new hostel in what used to be the Hotel Hispano Brasileiro.

name: Mellow mood Marco Polo hostel
overview: Staff not particularly welcoming or helpful. Very clean and well maintained. Easy to find. Internet access was expensive (250ft/half hour) in the portal. Breakfast for fee.

name: Le Quiet
overview: 47 room hotel/motel, wi-fi, meeting facilities, restaurant adjacent.

name: USA Hostels San Francisco
overview: Great hostel operating in two buildings just off Union Square. All rooms have their own bathrooms.

name: Had Suay Resort
address: Ao Bo Mao Beach, Pathio, Chumphon
overview: Basic modern, clean bungalows on the beach with individual balconies. Air-con, cable TV. Views of the long sand beach bay and Ko Khai. No restaurant. Free pickup from nearby airport.

name: Hotel Laterum ****
overview: Is in western part of Pécs. Hotel Laterum has been a provider of youth- and group tourism for over 15 years, while also serving as a meeting place for both international and domestic conferences, various events, weddings.

name: Recompence Shore Campground
overview: Eco-friendly campground set on 625 acres on the shore of Casco Bay. Run by Wolfe's Neck Farm, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. 115 sites (22 with 30 amp service), kayak, bicycle and canoe rentals, camp store & hiking trails.

name: Hostel Zeleni Most
overview: mobile phone: +387 65 404 666. Right across Kod Nane-restaurant

name: Tornion Kaupunginhotelli
overview: Situated in Tornio centre by the river. 98 rooms with shower and toilet, telephone, tv and wireless Internet connection. 5 different restaurants and a sauna compartment.

name: Riad Basma
overview: 5 double rooms with bathroom.

name: Toyoko Inn Okayama-eki Nishiguchi Hiroba
overview: A nice and affordable hotel chain with a good reputation. Free Wi-Fi in rooms and lobby. Free breakfast from 6:30AM-9:30AM. There are actually three Toyoko Inns around Okayama Station, so if you're a fan of the chain, you may want to check the others if this one is full or to compare prices.

name: Park Plaza Mandarin Eindhoven
overview: Located in the city centre and close to the train station, has an indoor swimming pool and 3 restaurants

name: Hotel Gloria Budapest and Szapáry Restaurant
