overview: ***. There are 26 doubles and the 2 apartments all with private bath, refrigerator, SAT TV, direct dial telephone and hair-dryer. Capacity: 60 beds. Services: 24-hour multi-language reception, enclosed parking place, garden, free transfer, rent-a-car, ticketing, laundry. - +phone=+36 70 9349 013. There is also a restaurant (up to 50 people). Small hotel in a very quiet green belt of the city. Rooms with breakfast.

name: Hillbrook Inn
overview: Bed and breakfast with beautiful rooms and suites featuring iPads with free Wi-Fi, and breakfast daily. Fine dining restaurant on-site.

name: Albergo Ristorante Santa Maria
overview: An charming hotel immerse in nature. 7 rooms, 19 beds.

name: Loews Hotel Vogue
overview: Close to the corner of rue Sainte-Catherine in the centre of city's main shopping district.

name: Real Azteca Hotel
overview: Seems quite nice, reasonably clean, air, wifi, restaurant.

name: Harolds Mansion
overview: popular "backpacker" hotel. Rooms are spacious and clean with a/c or fans. Free coffee all day & rate includes a small breakfast in the upstairs cafe. Free Internet/Wi-Fi as well. This is where many of the foreign tourists stay, especially divers. If you are travelling out to Apo island you can leave your large bags there safely. Harold himself is extremely friendly and helpful. Harold is happy to have Peace Corps volunteers visit. There is also an attached massage place that is clean and cheap. Dive shop in the same building, tours arranged.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Munich City Center
overview: A typical Courtyard property in the dense quarter immediately south of the Hauptbahnhof.

name: The JNF Grove
address: Just beside the town center's traffic circle
overview: Has taps for drinking water, but the toilets are permanently out of order.

name: Holiday Inn Express
overview: 15 minutes from the MSP airport and downtown. Complementary continental breakfast served daily.

name: Chong Hoe Hotel
overview: Air-con and TV rooms without bathroom for RM30 and air-con singles/doubles with TV and bathroom for RM50 onwards. The rooms are nice and clean, Wi-Fi in rooms.

name: Csikar Inn Pension
overview: Pansion: twenty one rooms (bathroom, TV, mini bar, telephone) 54 persons. Services: parking: 50 cars, bowling and fitness room, sightseeing, hiking tours to explore area attractions, horse riding (nearby) -Its restaurant has 120 seat, there is a terrace for 100 persons and the Events Hall capable of holding 200 persons

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Front Royal Blue Ridge Shadows
overview: 2012 IHG Torchbearer Award Winner (Holiday Inn's Highest Honor) and 2011 IHG Newcomer Award Winner (Best New Holiday Inn).  A conference hotel with 124 Guest Rooms, 26 one bedroom suites and conference facilities seating up to 300 people for banquets. The hotel offers free wireless internet, coin-op guest laundry, 24 hour fitness center and business centers and a heated indoor pool/whirlpool. Guest rooms come with 32-inch LCD TVs with HBO, Refrigerators and oversized desks with ergonomic chairs.

name: Romantik Hotel Schloss Rheinfels
overview: Attached to the hotel, through the small shop is a restaurant excellent view of the valley.

name: Peppersauce Campground
overview: Located in Coronado National Forest on the northern slope of Mt Lemmon, this picturesque campground is managed by the National Forest Service. Toilets and water, no hookups, RVs up to 22'.

name: Alex30 Hostel
overview: Central hostel with breakfast buffet. Youth Hostel card is not required to stay. WiFi €1; also a computer terminal at regular rates.

name: Hotel-Gasthof Opel
overview: This hotel occupies a 19th century building around 3 km from the center of Bayreuth and run by the Opel family. Free wireless internet and free parking is available.

name: Danubius Bio Sport Hotel Lövér
overview: **** 117 rooms (most with balcony) , three suites. All rooms with hair dryer, minibar, radio, TV, bathrobes on request. There are some connecting and smoking rooms. The hotel service include: laundry service, room service, hotel safe deposit box, souvenir shop, parking facilities for cars and coaches, playroom for children, playground, resting park, free WiFi in common areas.- There is the 'Borostyán Restaurant and terrace' (serving Hungarian and International cuisine also diet and spa menus), health bar, drink bar.

name: Palm Beach Hôtel
overview: Air-con, TV, pool, restaurant (expensive), & bar

name: Prince George
overview: The Prince George Hotel offers guests 189 rooms. There is a restaurant on the premises.

name: Chill Out Guest house
overview: A/C dorms beds and fan double rooms. Free tea and coffee, free wifi, open kitchen.

name: Backpackers San Pedro
overview: Very friendly backpackers atmosphere. There's music, hammocks, and a picnic table in the common area and usually people to chat with in the evenings. WiFi works well and there are two computers for public use. The employees are very friendly and helpful too.

name: Bike and Tours Rooms
address: Lot 50 Taman Kafoh, MDLD 1470, Jalan Segama
overview: Comfortable rooms - homestay-like - with AC and fan, free WiFi, breakfast buffet included in room rate and free flow of coffee and tea. Free airport pickup and drop-off. Bike rental and tours. Meals on request. [http://goo.gl/maps/JjqFb map]

name: Mark & Meadows Resort
overview: 3 star property spread over 5 acres with swimming pool, fishing pond, games room, children's park, multicusine restaurant, banquet halls, conference halls, 32 cottage style A/C rooms with running hot/cold water.

name: Puri Bambu Hotel
overview: All rooms have balconies overlooking the pool or gardens. 2 restaurants and a large pool with a sunken swim-up bar. Complimentary airport transfers.

name: Residence Inn Davenport
overview: Kitchen/kitchenette, free high-speed Internet, continental breakfast, indoor pool and fitness center.

name: 8 Clarendon Crescent
overview: This is a lovely B&B where guests are warmly welcomed by Christine and David. Each room has an ensuite bathroom and the breakfasts will keep you going through the day.

name: Hostelling International Youth Hostel
overview: The rooms are clean, but very basic in terms of amenities. The hostel hosts large groups of young children that often run around the halls screaming. There's also a curfew requiring guests to be in the hostel no later than 22:59, though its possible to come back at a later time, when arranged in advance.

name: Casa Moro
overview: A small bed and breakfast with 4 guest rooms; all with private bathrooms, internet access, maid service daily and a great breakfast every morning of your stay. The house is three levels with two patios and many common spaces. Dinner is offered for those who want that option.

name: Aston Marina
address: Marina Mediterania,Tower A, Jl. Lodan Raya No. 2A,
overview: 358 units of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments plus 2 exclusive penthouses. Apartment style hotel with kitchen, but you still can have breakfast downstairs.

name: Narai Hotel
overview: Great value for money, as the rooms are luxurious with flat-screen televisions, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and nice views over the city. Amenities include a huge breakfast as well as room service. All of this for a cheaper price than other hotels in the area.

name: Scallywags Mango Retreat
overview: Six rooms with private garden and outdoor shower, flat screen TVs with satellite service, mini bar, wifi. Also has a restaurant on the beach.

name: Sunshine Bedz
overview: A small and friendly family run hostel with modern but basic facilities. Breakfast is included in the price and free Wi-Fi/computers also available.

name: Gantapi Guesthouse
overview: Decent clean rooms, small garden with view of the palaces, hot water.

name: The Lion Hotel
overview: 22 rooms

name: Bally's
overview: A moderate hotel and casino, but the location at the center of the Strip and the large rooms makes it one of the best values around.

name: Barsana Hotel
overview: Khaprail Road, Matigara. A beautiful hotel with all the modern amenities. Very reasonable as per the infrastructure and facilities.

name: Lodge de Palmarin
overview: The Lodge de Palmarin lies just south of the village of Diakhanor along a quiet stretch of the Petite Côte. The superb tranquility of the lodge is only enhanced by the hospitably of its staff. In true Sereer fashion, terranga at the Lodge de Palmarin is instantly recognizable. A stay here has the distinct feel of a visit with family or old friends

name: Helter Skelter Hostel Berlin
overview: Double rooms start at €46/room, big dorms start at €13.

name: 54 Boutique Hotel
overview: Across the road from the Natural History Museum.

name: Mon-Repos
overview: Member of Swiss Quality Hotels International. Three star superior hotel situated 1km away from the railway station and 1.5km from the city center.

name: Palace Station
overview: A modest hotel that's part of the local Station Casinos chain, with lower rates and better games than those typical of Vegas hotels.

name: À la Revasse
overview: Open all year. Located in a residential section of Percé town centre, convenient to all the action but secluded enough for guests to enjoy some peace and quiet, À la Revasse is a sturdy old house with five comfy guest rooms, all of which boast private baths and are decorated in a maritime theme. Here, the Tourist Wharf and all the shops and attractions are just a short walk away—ask the knowledgeable owners for tips; they've lived in Percé their whole lives and know the town inside and out—but you can also just relax on the porch or, if it gets nippy, inside by the fireplace. Breakfast in the morning features homemade local favourites, such as blueberry pancakes and old-fashioned chopped pork ''creton''. There's free WiFi, and free parking in the driveway—or, if you've arrived on the '''Route Verte''', there's a shed out back to store your bike.

name: Hostal El Velero
overview: The modern hotel is located on the beach-front just next to the marina. The rooms are spacious but there is no breakfast available. On the ground floor of the new building is a pool and veranda with loungers. Beautiful sunset views are guaranteed.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Pribaltiyskaya
overview: Overlooking the Gulf of Finland. 1193 rooms. Hotel services include a business centre, a fitness centre, an on-site spa, a hairdresser, gift shops, currency exchange, visa support and concierge, 24-hour medical services and a free shuttle to the city centre.

name: Hotel Astoria
overview: Astoria is owned by DGI-byen, and guests get a free pass to the DGI pool and gym, no smoking

name: Duo Inn
overview: Apartment hotel. Fairly far out in northwest Kyoto but the prices are reasonable. Prices are significantly lower for stays of 7 or more nights. Payment by cash only. No daily cleaning and no bath towels provided. Bus journey from Kyoto Station takes about 50 minutes.

name: AmericInn
overview: Heated indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, and guest laundry facilities available. Free wireless internet and free breakfast. Pets allowed.

name: Golden Leaf Hotel Perlach Allee Hof
overview: Standart 3 star hotel, with all necessary amenities.

name: Ponderosa Motel
overview: 22 rooms, some with kitchenettes. Indoor pool and hot tub.

name: PrideInn
overview: Singles, doubles and triples equipped with kitchen. Conference room.

name: Shodlik Palace Hotel
overview: A four star hotel

name: Hotel Central Plaza
overview: Hill Cart Road, Pradham Nagar. Located about five minute taxi ride from main bus station. Clean and acceptable facilities.  ₹650 non A/C to ₹3,500 for suite.

name: Daphnes Villas and Apartments
overview: 10 self-catered cottages sleeping 2-7 people. Air-con, Internet, library, playroom, playground, maid service, bed linen, bicycles, BBQ all included in the price. Walking distance to beach, supermarket, taverns and car rental. Open May - October.

name: Aloft Minneapolis
overview: Located in the Mill District, across the street from the Guthrie Theater, Mill City Museum, Gold Medal Park, and the Stone Arch Bridge. Includes an on site bar, XYZ.

name: Americas Best Value Inn - Golden Gate
overview: A 100% non smoking hotel with 40 rooms; the Golden Gate is on Lombard St and so has good access to public transportation. They have a restaurant and bar on the premises, and offer free wi-fi, free continental breakfast, and limited free parking.

name: Che Lagarto Suites Copacabana Santa Clara
overview: The Suites has two types of rooms: Private and Private Low Cost. Breakfast, public kitchen and WIFI included.

name: The Red Caboose Motel
overview: All of the rooms are converted railroad cabooses. The restaurant is a real dining car. Located next door to the National Toy Train museum and near the Strasburg railroad and the Choo-Choo barn. Free petting zoo on site. Observation tower on site. Rooms are not fancy and Wi-Fi coverage is spotty.

name: Days Inn Midtown Albuquerque
overview: Shuttle service to and from airport and convention center from 7AM-11PM daily.

name: My City Hotel
overview: The hotel in the conspicious white early 20th century building may look like many others in Tallinn with the slightly outdated and pretentious decor, but behind this veneer lies a true dedication to detail, extending as far as featuring a bathtub duck in the courtesy toiletries set.

name: Hotel International
address: In Front of Blour Tower, Emam Ave.
overview: Renovated interior, very clean and quiet, semi-international standards (meaning new western bathroom, soap, clean towels, room service, buffet breakfast, TV, mini-bar, English-speaking staff ...). Worth a good European 3 star hotel.

name: Snake River Campground
overview: Campsites consist of a cleared area, fire ring and table. In addition, vault toilets, garbage cans and drinking water are available. All sites are on a first-come, first-served basis.

name: Cova Hotel
overview: This hotel has 96 well decorated rooms in the heart of downtown. All rooms have 300 thread count sheets, high definition TVs, complimentary breakfast, and free wi-fi.

name: Five Flags Hostel
overview: Friendly hostel in the centre. It offers an 8-bed dorm and a private room with a double bed. The hostel has clean bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen and a common room with cozy sofas and an Internet-connected computer.

name: Cliff Edge Hotel
overview: A nondescript, 3 stories high, modern hotel sharing a spectacular view with the others in this location. 18 ''en suite'' rooms without TV or phone or a closet to hang your clothes but satellite TV in the reception area. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Car park for 12 vehicles is guarded 24 hours. No standby generator, laundry service. Dismal restaurant with an even more dismal menu and kitchen.

name: Fredensborg Store Kro
overview: A Grand old hotel right by the castle, in both the best and worst sense of old - at its best it is elegant and timeless, but the rooms are starting to show its age, and could an update to modern times. The in house '''restaurant''' Anna Sophie, fares much better, and serves upscale food in a beautiful old room.

name: Vardaan Hotel Jammu
overview: Vardaan Jammu is located at a walking distance from Inter State Bus Terminal and 5 minutes drive from Residency Road Shopping Centre. 27 Tastefully decorated rooms, sports cafe', business centre, travel desk, meeting rooms, banquets are among the services available.

name: Greenwich Village Hotel
overview: A quiet, comfortable NGO-type hotel. Ten minutes walk to main road.

name: Best Western Desert Inn
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pets accepted.

name: Hotel Dve reki
overview: The best hotel in the town on the banks of two rivers.

name: Moon Gate Villa
overview: Stylish accommodation set within an exotic garden, 2 minutes from Kerikeri Village, walking distance to restaurants, wineries and craft shops.  A unique, modern villa with waterfalls and reflective pools; king suites with luxury linens.

name: Hotelli Puustelli
overview: A basic hotel in the town centre of Lieksa.

name: Martani Hotel
address: Jl. Yos Sudarso no.18, Tanjung Pandan
overview: Subpar hotel in a central location. Room with simple breakfast. Family room has a home theater system!

name: Bloom Luxury Hotel
overview: A nice choice as compared to other budget hotels in the city in terms of quality. Some balcony rooms are also available. Ask at the reception.

name: Lucy Backpackers
address: Lot No.25, Lorong Dewan, Australia Place
overview: Look behind a stamp-makers shop for this nice little house with two dorm rooms available at a competitive rate. B&B. Friendly owner, friendly cat. Free, secure Wi-Fi. Nice and central. Safe lockers available.

name: Annex Turtle Hotori-An
overview: About fifteen minutes on foot from Shinkyō Bridge, in a quiet area near the Kanmangafuchi Abyss; includes a hot spring bath and internet access.

name: Hotel City Heart and Café Heart
address: Golden Temple Rd, Jallan Wala Bagh
overview: Offers views of Golden Temple and the city. Three star. Rooms in Hotel: 35.- Services: 24 Hrs Front Desk, Valet Services, Express Check in, Express Check out, Laundry / Dry Cleaning Services,Drive-in Parking, Valet Parking, ATM / Bank, Car Rental, Concierge Service, Currency Exchange, Doctor on Call, Multi Lingual Staff, Sitting lounge at each floor, Safe Deposit Box, Room Service, Computer use available fax, High Speed Internetl, All Major Credit Cards Accepted, Gift Shop

name: Alpinist
overview: A great value in the center of Bishkek; the Alpinist has single, double, and triple occupancy rooms available with satellite TV and internet ports, a full service cafe, a conference room, and - being true to its name - a climbing wall!

name: La Luna Inn
overview: A rejuvenated 1960s Motor Inn. The bespoke furniture and colorful decor creates a bright, fun, and fanciful atmosphere here.

name: The Seagull Inn Bed & Breakfast
overview: On beautiful Marblehead Neck just steps from ocean and harbor, this old New England inn has been restored with cherry floors, Shaker furniture, and original paintings. Comfortable and private guest suites, expandable for families. Water views from porch, dining room, some suites. Beautiful gardens. Kayaks and bikes free for guests. Beaches nearby. All rooms have private baths, TV/VCR/DVD, phone and refrigerator.

name: Hotel Kolari
overview: Breakfast included. Sauna. Free WiFi.

name: 101 Hotel
overview: Named after the postcode for central Reykjavík.

name: Kóbor Macska Pansion
overview: [http://muemlekem.hu/muemlek?id=9177 About the building]: built in Baroque style, 18th century origin, the Neoclassical facade, made in circa 1830.  - About the accommodation:  Services: free parking, pet-friendly. Fourteen rooms,  43 people. Languages ​​spoken: Hungarian, German. Mobil:+36 30 9276543

name: Water Street Inn
overview: Spacious 41-room inn overlooking the St. Croix River with views of the Stillwater Lift Bridge. Rooms feature queen sized beds, double whirlpool baths, gas fireplaces, and balconies. Breakfast, wine dinners, and American cuisine offered at the on-site restaurant and Irish pub.

name: Omena Hotel
overview: from 45€

name: Caladh Inn
overview: Handy for the ferry and the bus station.

name: Grunau Hotel
overview: Larger hotel located 3.5 km east of the city center. Features wireless internet and bicycle rental.

name: Best Western Chesterfield Hotel
overview: This hotel is a piece of England in the middle of Trondheim. It's within walking distance to bus- and railway station, shopping malls and museums. Buses to and from the airport (Værnesekspressen) stop right outside this hotel.

name: Rygerfjord
overview: <br>A decommissioned diesel passenger ship, transformed to a hostel/hotel, with rooms at different price levels.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Hotel
overview: Big hotel complex streching to both sides of the street. Good sauna and pool facilities, one on the top floor and another one underground. Free broadband in the rooms, and you can rent a tandem bike for €10 /2 hours. There is a nightclub, a restaurant and a pub in the hotel complex.

name: Caspian Hostel
overview: Great location in the Old Town. 2 dorm rooms and 1 private room.

name: Hotel Goliath am Dom
overview: Very nice, small and comfortable Hotel right next to Regensburg Cathedral. You can reach every point of interest from here by foot.

name: Jailhouse Accommodation
overview: Newly renovated heritage backpacker accommodation with a colourful history - the former Addington Prison (closed to inmates in 1999). The Jailhouse has single, double, twin, dorm and family rooms available. Wi-Fi and free parking. Secure online bookings available.

name: Holiday Inn Express
overview: Beautifully renovated in 2009, 81-room resort property in the heart of Rehoboth Beach, next to Tanger Outlets. Free amenities include hot breakfast buffet, wireless internet access (wifi), fitness room, outdoor swimming pool and parking.  Rooms feature a refrigerator, microwave and wet barsink to name a few.

name: Hotel Kailas
overview: Is the closest hotel to Ellora Caves and is a few meters from the entrance. The hotel offers cottages and standard rooms. A few of the cottages overlook the caves but are priced slightly higher than the normal cottages.

name: Brauereigasthof Rothenbach
overview: non smoker rooms with shower, WC, phone and TV.

name: Aso Shrine
overview: The shrine dedicated to the mountain. You can sleep in the parking lot (there are public toilets), or you can find some remote spot on the grounds.

name: Love Hotels
overview: The mountain road behind Mandeok is (in)famous for a wide selection of love motels

name: Hotel Marlin
address: Calle de la Media Luna, Calle 35 No. 10–35
overview: Popular with backpackers, this centrally located, clean hotel with nice rooms with private bathroom and air-conditioned in all dorms, communal kitchen, free internet, free Breakfast, and tours services. Information for sailboats to the San Blas islands and Panamá is also available.

name: Hammersholt B&B
overview: Cozy and comfortable bed and breakfast in natural surroundings.

name: HI-Nantucket
overview: Limit 7 nights, on the beach, price includes Breakfast

name: Extra Hotel
overview: Well-known in town. Typical Thai mid-range hotel, just a little worn. Minimal English.

name: Kenwood Hall
overview: A former country hall now situated in the pretty Edwardian suburb of Nether Edge.

name: Hotel Bontemps
overview: Great Hotel to stay in. Stay connected to dish network A/C.

name: Lake Wales Campground
overview: 118 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Pool. Tent camping permitted. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi available.

name: Songdowon Tourist Hotel
overview: Offers 83 rooms.

name: Okean Hotel
overview: Said to be a good second choice hotel (but having sampled the first choice, I'd be looking at this one next time).

name: Radisson Blu Espoo
overview: A hotel of the luxury chain Radisson in the Aalto University campus in Otaniemi, right next to the Keilaniemi business district, popular among business travelers and academic visitors.

name: Santateresa
overview: Friendly hotel on spectacular location on the highest ground in Bonifacio upper city on the southwestern pinnacle. Only the marine cemetery is between the hotel and the limestone cliffs overhanging the sea 70 meters below.

name: Hotel President Wilson
overview: Modern five-star hotel with one of the best Lebanese restaurants in town. Many rooms with lake view and bright colours. Popular with arab families and UN staff. Very popular during the summer.

name: Embassy Suites Hotel Tempe
overview: 6 miles from Phoenix Airport PHX, and 2 miles from the main ASU campus.

name: Leesons Residences
overview: It provides furnished units for as low as Php 10,000 a month and unfurnished units for as low as Php 9,000 a month.

name: Natures Inn
overview: Family run home stay, clean and modern, dorms and double rooms, bed linen provided, sharedbathrooms with seat toilets and showers, hot and cold water showers, free WiFi, fans and air-con

name: Rover Hostel
overview: Clean and well arranged hostel with comfortable, quiet, and safe rooms. There is a common room for guest use with free internet access, WiFi, coffee and tea. There is one bathroom/shower with hot water all day long. Clean sheets, luggage storage, spacious lockers, personal reading lights and plugs, fully equipped laundry and kitchen facilities.

name: Tulip Inn Rotterdam-Centre
overview: The Tulip Inn offers a splendid location, in front of the tram stop right at the start of the Erasmus Bridge with brilliant views thereof, as well as the Kop van Zuid across the Maas.

name: Rio All-Suite Hotel and Casino
overview: Claims to have some of the largest standard rooms in Las Vegas.

name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus - MGallery Collection
overview: The rooms are nice and smallish, but still stylish.

name: Vadászkürt Restaurant and Pansion
overview: Four rooms with 12 beds. Parking is free (in front of the inn), WIFI is free throughout the house. All rooms with in-room safe, bathroom, hair dryer, mini bar, large screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi

name: Bed & Breakfast Almirante
overview: Located in a quiet area of the center of Valencia, at only 2 minutes walking from the Cathedral, and very close to the best spots of the old city, the lively area of El Carmen, and the old riverbed.

name: Quality Inn Waddling Dog
overview: Accommodation; includes an attached pub and restaurant; free Wi-Fi.

name: Pusat Belia Youth Hostel
overview: Brunei's only youth hostel, it is designed more for school groups than for backpackers. Dorm beds are B$10/night, making it the cheapest sleep in town. Male and female sleeping quarters are separated, so this can be an inconvenience for couples. The location, however, is quite convenient as it is close to downtown BSB. The rooms are spacious and clean, as the commodities. The free WiFi is not always available. It is best to arrange a bed in advance, since the manager is not always present. He generally arrives at 7:30PM but is reachable by phone during the day. The e-mail addresses indicated online are wrong. There's also a swimming pool nearby ($1, 8AM-6PM).

name: Kursuscenter Røsnæs
overview: Rooms with free internet.

name: Rauhalahti Spa Hotel
overview: Offers rooms and a swimming pool department (indoor and outdoor pools, a jacuzzi, an ice-cold pool, a children's pool, a waterslide, saunas and a steam room).

name: Vincci Maritimo
overview: The other Vincci is just as maritime as any other hotel in Sant Marti, as it is actually close to the Diagonal and not the seaside. It is also less adventurous in style, but nonetheless very pleasantly and contemporarily outfitted.

name: Canada's Best Value Inn
overview: Discounts for CAA/AAA, AARP, military, government, seniors (60+). ID required for discounts.

name: Anthony's Key Resort
address: Carretera Pavimentada Principal, Sandy Bay, Honduras
overview: Private cabanas on the palm studded hillside and lagoon. Serene and peaceful with views of the ocean. Diving available on site.

name: Days Inn and Suites Davenport East
overview: Free breakfast, business center, Internet access, fitness center and indoor pool

name: ADA-Logements
overview: A good value bed and breakfast with 12 rooms, with a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere.

name: Radisson Blu Daugava Hotel
overview: On the left bank of the Daugava, with views of the Old Town.

name: Best Western Hotel Svava
overview: Comfortable four-star hotel inside a modernised historic building, attached to the Svava shopping centre. Great breakfast buffet (included in price), and rooms have tea/coffee maker.

name: Mamba Point Hotel
overview: Mamba Point has 55 air conditioned rooms, TV, 24 hour electricity, a bar and an international restaurant.  It's near the water and several of the western embassies and UN agencies.  It also has wireless internet connection in the lounge.

name: Tropics Hotel & Hostel
overview: Dorm rooms have four to eight beds per room. Private rooms have TV and phone. Barbecue, pool.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya
address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes 629
overview: Trying to make the most out of a very small building in the Gran Via.

name: Hotel Strandschlösschen
overview: Directly on the promenade and just several metres from the beach. 33 rooms for one to three people in art nouveau style and a good restaurant. Closed in January. Minimum three nights during high season.

name: SwissBel Inn Kristal
overview: A three-star international hotel located in the heart of Kupang. Only 20 minutes from El Tari Airport, the hotel allows easy access to the business and government district as well as some of   the most noteworthy sites located in the vicinity, making it the ideal choice for business and leisure travellers alike

name: Best Western Santaka Hotel
overview: Hotel is in the heart of Kaunas center, and, offers 92 stylish and well-equipped rooms with air conditioning systems. In the Hotel’s enclosed back yard there is a free parking lot and garages. Nightclub and restaurant '''Europa''' is adjacent to the hotel.

name: Lindner Hotel Leipzig
overview: One of the best values in Leipzig.

name: Faden House
overview: A small guesthouse across the street from Grand Hotel. Great location in Gombe, a block away from the River Congo (great walking/jogging route) and many of the European embassies. About the same price as the Grand Hotel, but here the price includes free wifi in all the rooms, and no harassment from drunk foreign soldiers or local prostitutes. A calm oasis in Kinshasa. Some English spoken. Only 9 rooms (avoid rooms 1 and room 3). Also a well-used conference facility, and the quality of service deteriorates when staff are occupied with a function there. There are small fridges in the rooms, but no safe deposit facility; and only a couple of French/Congolese TV channels.

name: Casa de Esperanza
overview: Bed and breakfast near Mount Baker Park and Lake Washington.

name: De Munut Cottages
overview: The Munut Cottages is a traditional Balinese Architecture with Spa, public swimming pool, internet services, free wifi, deluxe room, super deluxe room, fit for couple and family.

name: Hôtel Britannique
overview: Anglophiles in Paris could do worse than to stay at this most Anglophile of French hotels. The location is good, at the very east end of the 1st, within an easy walk of Notre Dame, Les Halles, and above the central hub ''Métro'' station.

name: NH Den Haag
overview: Located at the heart of the ''Beatrixkwartier'' business district and within some distance from the old town and most tourist attractions. That said, being right at the tram stop within the spectacular ''Netkous'', getting from it to any place in the city should not be a problem. It is one of the few hotels in the city located in a tall tower, so you can choose a room on one of the upper floors and enjoy sweeping vistas.

name: Pension Cordoba
address: north-east of the main medina square
overview: very friendly staff, nice welcoming rooms and a big and comfy roof terrace

name: Aston Manado City Hotel
overview: Enjoy a beautiful hotel in the very heart of Manado that combines exceptional service and attention to detail to ensure a most memorable stay. The delightful Aston Manado City Hotel offers over 100 rooms and suite with dramatic views of the city skyline. Experience the best restaurants, entertainment, and shopping, as well as the city’s fines attraction, all within easy walking of the hotel.

name: My Rainbow Rooms GAY Bed & Breakfast
overview: Lisbon's only exclusively gay Bed & Breakfast is housed in a luxurious 6 bedroom, 3 bathroom apartment in a beautifully restored 1920's neo-art deco building. With three meter ceilings, rich hardwood floors, modern baths, elegant furnishing and sophisticated amenities, this gay hotel is centrally located in a quiet residential area in the heart of the capital, only two minutes walk from the Saldanha metro station. Breakfast and free wireless internet are included.

name: Comfort Suites
overview: Free WiFi, refrigerator, coffee maker, and microwave in all rooms. Business center, fitness center, indoor heated pool, laundry service, free newspaper, and free breakfast available.

name: Travellers Rest Hotel
overview: Eleven fully ''en suite'' rooms in the oldest established hotel in Kisoro. Large and comfortable guest lounge displays an eclectic collection of local art and cultural artefacts but the highlight for many will be the log fire that is lit many evenings. Guinness and Nile Special beer, together with the other usual suspects and malt whiskies served at the English pub style bar at one end of the guest lounge. Bathrooms are spacious and beautifully tiled. Rooms are grouped around a spacious, central garden courtyard and Rooms 1, 2, 3, and Mutanda have especially exhilarating views of the surrounding dormant and extinct volcanoes. Both the dogs and the staff are extremely friendly and affable. Evening meals are extremely tasty and varied and available to visitors not staying at the hotel, but must be booked by 15:30 on the afternoon they are served. Cash only, no plastic accepted.

name: Harbour Cottage Gardenstown
overview: Harbour Cottage offers the best of Scotland's coast and country. Lovely detached cottage with en-suite & WIFI in Gardenstown Scotland on Moray Firth – close to harbour and beach where you can see the dolphins and other wildlife in their natural habitat. Affordable accommodation - ideal for couples...and their dog!

name: Hotel Bijou
overview: Hotel Bijou is inspired by San Francisco's rich cinematic history, adorned with movie palace stylings and Hollywood portraits, and features a mini movie theater in the lobby.

name: Coast Edmonton Plaza
overview: The Coast offers fine suites with all excellent views and a neat restaurant that is friendly.

name: Tufenkian Dzoraget
overview: Luxury western hotel, with excellent comfortable rooms, design, views.  Luxury prices as well. There is also a restaurant with a full (and expensive) menu.

name: B&W Courtyards
overview: Three 19th century buildings connected by lush courtyards. Private baths. Architectural award winner. Just 4 blocks to the French Market.

name: Ranbanka Palace
overview: The Ranbanka Palace Hotel, which is named after the Rathore war cry –“Ranbanka Rathore“ (The invincible in battle) was built for Maharajadhiraj Sir Ajit Singh ji, younger brother of Maharaja Umaid Singh ji of Jodhpur. Maharaja Ajit Singh built his palace close to Umaid Bhawan, which is now a part of the hotel. The hotel was commissioned as a heritage hotel in the year 2000 with only 35 operational hotel rooms. After restoration, upgrading and refurbishment, more rooms were added, taking the total room inventory to 80 rooms. This hotel is a good place for a wedding banquet, with 150-course Rajasthani meals, processions of dancers, elephants, camels and horses along with all the traditional music and dances.

name: Csaszar Hotel
overview: - free Wi-Fi

name: Quality Inn & Suites
overview: Free high-speed Internet, continental breakfast and indoor pool.

name: Belle Cour Hotel & SPA
overview: A charming four star boutique hotel near Victoria station.

name: YMCA Interpoint
overview: Open start of July to mid-August, and lends out 36 beds to sleep on, which are usually in high demand, so remember to book ahead. There is curfew between 0.30AM and 7AM, you might want to consider if you plan to part take in the good night-life.

name: DK international Hotel
overview: All rooms A/C and breakfast included. Close to the Bangladesh bus stations. There are better deals out there but not quite as new as this place.

name: Hôtel Acacias Etoile
overview: A clean, well run hotel in the side streets near Place Charles de Gaulle. The staff is friendly, the rooms aren't large, but they are immaculate.

name: Steigenberger
overview: Los-Angeles-Platz 1. Located at a quiet square near Kurfürstendamm.

name: Boathouse
overview: Pub, hotel, good food,

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
overview: Boston, Massachusetts 02116. Most Bostonians consider this hotel to be the nicest in Boston.

name: Harbor RV Resort & Marina
overview: 90 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Pool. Tent camping permitted. Handicapped access. Wi-fi available (for a fee).

name: Amur Hotel
overview: Classic building on Lenina street, though it lost some of it grand old-world charm when it was renovated back in 2005, and the 78 rooms are for the most part very kitschy.

name: Villa Källhagen
overview: <br>Just outside the built-up area in Östermalm.

name: Fazenda Catuçaba
overview: Farm resort hotel popular among foreigner visitors. It is composed of a large farmhouse from 1850 and private villas. Food is organic and grown within the farm. The resort offers several activities, like trails, horse rides, and rafting, that must be reserved at least 1 day before.

name: Hermis Hotel
overview: 4 star hotel situated at the main entrance to the city from Vilnius direction, offers 13 modern rooms with Italian cuisine restaurant '''Portofino''', wellness center and conference hall.

name: Coral Khartoum
address: Near the Al-Mogran Park and the confluence of the Blue and White Nile, about 3km to the west of the city center
overview: The former "Hilton" hotel in Khartoum, under new management since several years back. Excellent service and nice views over the Nile.

name: Motel One Stuttgart
overview: The other Motel One in Stuttgart is in Feuerbach-Ost, an industry and office district north of the city. It is situated in front of a Stadtbahn stop and offers the usual Motel One standard.

name: Villa Diamond
overview: next to Sv Dimitri. Recently modernised. Nice double room with ensuite and breakfast €35 [June 2010]

name: Topanga Ranch Motel
overview: 30 ocean-front cottages located across from Topanga State Beach.

name: Holiday Inn Express Frankfurt City Hauptbahnhof
overview: WiFi and breakfast included in the room price.

name: Villa Melina Boutique B&B
overview: A 5 star bed and breakfast located 7 min from airport, Interislander, Te Papa and CBD.

name: Fisherman's Camp
overview: Fisherman's Camp is a campsite situated on the shores of Lake Naivasha (meaning 'rippling waters' in Masai). A fully equipped cottage and 4 Bandas (Kenya's equivalent to small challets) are also available. The site also has its own bar and restaurant (phone 254 5 050 462 for bookings).

name: Hotel Congress
overview: This historic hotel was the site of [http://www.hotcong.com/hotel/history.php John Dillinger's arrest]. The rooms are small, but have a funky, historic feel.

name: Sheraton Hotel Newfoundland
overview: Offers 301 rooms with free wired and wireless internet use. Newly renovated lobby and lounge. Many rooms feature views of the harbour and downtown.

name: City Sleep
overview: Clean and minimal but comfortable cheap accommodation in the centre of town.

name: Pier 4 Hotel
overview: Hotel located right on Great Egg Harbor Bay. Free wireless internet and continental breakfast.

name: Rouxinol Luxury Guesthouse (4 Stars)
address: Beco de Moçambique nº 16, Bairro Cruzeiro
overview: Near the Embassies in Miramar and the Center of Town.

name: Lord Elgin
overview: Is centrally located on Elgin Street across from the National Arts Centre, a stone's throw from Parliament Hill, and is one of Ottawa's two classic hotels (the other being the Chateau Laurier). It has recently been upgraded. While it has "splurge" rates, most rooms are reasonably priced. Good value, and a Starbucks off the lobby.

name: Novotel Budapest Centrum
overview: A unique combination of standard Novotel rooms and opulent historic common spaces behind a richly decorated facade. 227 rooms, 363 beds. Restaurant, bar, sauna, whirlpool bath and massage treatments. 7 modern conference rooms. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Indoor parking nearby.

name: Danubius Health Spa Resort Helia
overview: Luxury hotel.

name: Casa Luis
overview: Dorm and private rooms with small breakfast from 12$. Laundry, cooking, air-condition etc. for pay. Very friendly owner. Located a bit outside from the main attractions in the Mud Town but just one minute from the green mosque

name: Mirhav
overview: Fantastic design/decor, very "Armenian" while still being comfortable and modern. Excellent staff, beautiful garden, good food.

name: Fleming's Hotel Muenchen Schwabing
overview: A hotel in the middle of Schwabing, with rooms featuring a mixture of modern design and typical German homeliness.

name: Omni Hotel
overview: A modern luxury hotel connected to PETCO Park via a skybridge across the street, the Omni was built along the new ballpark and has a few baseball relics inside, such as Joe DiMaggio's cleats in the lobby, Babe Ruth's 1932 contract with the Yankees in the Presidential Suite, and a broken bat autographed by Willie Mays in the fifth-floor hallway.

name: The Sedona Dream Maker Bed and Breakfast
overview: An extraordinary B&B made of logs and love in a luxury log home.

name: NH Frankfurt Messe
overview: The other NH in Frankfurt is a more contemporary affair, with rooms featuring fresh green accents in line with NH's latest interior design guidelines.

name: Aquisito
overview: Hot water, internet, kitchen, airport transfer (additional cost). Can be VERY noisy though - especially the rooms on the ground floor are like sleeping on a busy thoroughfare, plus the added benefit of hearing the doorbell (which rings all night every time someone comes in) and every word said in the reception area. Make sure to pack earplugs and/or sleeping tablets

name: Ben-Gurion College
address: By the sign from highway 40, 2 minutes south of Sde Boker
overview: Various guesthouses and inns offered by the college.

name: Ocean Breeze Executive B&B
overview: Many rooms have a view of the Vancouver skyline, small pets are allowed and it has wireless Internet access.

name: Hotel Andalucía
overview: Free wi-fi, baggage storage.

name: Scandic Hvidovre
overview: Far away from public transportation and gets some criticism for its cleaning standards. On the upside if you manage to get a room in the upper floors of the back building, these seem to be of a better standard, and there are an indoor swimming pool, sauna and gym area as well as a decent restaurant on the premises.

name: Hotel Rotterdam
overview: This hotel is situated a little bit out of the city center on the (very) busy Schiekade street.

name: Aston Hotel Belitung
overview: The largest and one of the best places to stay in Belitung. If you want a high unobstructed view of the sunset, this is where you'll find it. Western standard hotel service, large restaurant for a buffet, a swimming pool and bar overlooking the sunset.

name: Conbini Ayers Rock Hotel
overview: This hotel is a remodeled dormitory.  There are vending machines and laundry machines.

name: B&B Swiss STAR
overview: A Swiss managed bed & breakfast in the historical centre of the city. Stylish, safe and very clean. 8 rooms (5 with attached bath) and a big, fully equipped kitchen. Free breakfast and tea/coffee. Free Wifi and local phone calls. Non-smoking. English speaking staff.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Resort Zanzibar
overview: Reputable, all-inclusive resort with a wide beach front, a swimming pool, 2 restaurants, bars, spa and fitness center, live music at night, and free wifi in public areas and rooms. This is the former site of Nungwi Village Beach Resort and is located immediately east of Flame Tree Cottages.

name: El Faro Beach Hostel
overview: Inexpensive backpacker hostel with good service. Has a swimming pool, free Wi-Fi & parking, communal kitchen, nightly big-screen movies. Both shared dormitories and private rooms with AC or fan.

name: SW Hotel
overview: Named after its owner Sam Wong, this budget hotel is decorated with everything Asian.  The rooms are a bit smaller than standard but it is situated in a very central location in Chinatown and the price is reasonable.

name: Pasick's Bed & Breakfast
overview: One bedroom with in Victorian home in the historic district within walking distance to downtown and Centre College. Wi-Fi, fireplace, whirlpool tub.

name: Nilaveli Beach Hotel
overview: Great 4 star hotel nestled right in front of Nilaveli Beach.

name: Ibis Düsseldorf Hauptbahnhof
overview: A clean hotel with the basic equipment. The hotel is situated in the central railway station which also is the hub for local transportation, therefore the connect to both inside and outside Düsseldorf are excellent.

name: Hotel Madrid
address: right behind the Kasbah, just before Hotel Parador if you're coming from the bus station
overview: Great service staff, always willing to help. They have maps and can give information on the town. The rooms aren't special, and have the "cheap hotel" feel. They have hot water - and one cannot stress enough the importance of hot water during the cold months! Ask the desk for your TV remote. The lobby is quaint, and enjoying breakfast while listening to the hotel canary sing (it's a real bird - not a euphemism for a lounge singer) or watching English channels on the lobby TV is a great way to start the day.

name: AV Hotels Pvt Ltd
overview: North Indian Vegetarian cuisine +phone=+91 33 2268-7746, +91 33 2268-7748, +91 33 2268-7749

name: Hotel Villa Trompenberg
overview: A villa in the most affluent neighbourhood of Hilversum, it feels a bit like a B&B. Tranquillity, warmth and ambiance are key values for this hotel. Children, pets and smoking are not allowed. No services or answering of phone calls after 12:00.

name: Days Hotel Boston
overview: Note the name is Days ''Hotel'', not ''Inn''-- this can certainly cause confusion when getting directions. This hotel has gone through several incarnations and seen lots of wear. While not convenient for walking to popular destinations, there is plenty of parking and a large supermarket across Western Ave.

name: Westin Princeville Ocean Resort Villas
overview: All villas have full kitchen, whirlpool tub, washer & dryer, full-size sofa bed, and LCD TV with DVD player.  2 restaurants: Nanea Restaurant & Bar, Wailele Dining & Bar, and Princeville Market.

name: Jimbaran Garden Homestay
overview: Quiet and peaceful hideaway.

name: Motel Montenegro Rivijera
overview: Quite a decent option on a E-75 Belgrade-Athens highway. Rooms equipped with AC, TV, good size fridge, private bathroom. Friendly and helpful staff.

name: Belmond Charleston Place
overview: A full-service four-diamond hotel. Michelin-rated restaurant, spa, 24-hour room service, cafe, and club.

name: Gwern
overview: Gwern is a 190 acre family-run beef and sheep farm on the Menai Straits, in peaceful countryside with magnificent views of mountains and sea.

name: ETO PARK HOTEL Business & Stadium
overview: **** Rooms include: bathroom, TV, phone, minibar and free Wi-Fi.

name: Carpe Noctem Party Hostel
overview: A mid priced place. Perfect for single and young, who want to be part of an interactive and lively hostel experience as well as maximising the city in the day time and seizing the night when the sight seeing has ended.

name: Duchess Pension
overview: Not the newest pension anymore but offers clean beds and quiet rooms. Not all are the same, so have a look before checking in. Friendly and helpful staff. Try the sandwich with French baguette. Wifi for 50p (for the length of your stay)

name: Place Louis Riel Suite Hotel
overview: Suites are available in studio, one or two bedroom layouts. Each has a complete kitchen and living space. Daily and extended stay rates are available. Centrally located.

name: Martinspark Hotel
overview: Also offers long-stay holiday apartments. All rooms are nonsmoking with free wi-fi. There is an onsite restaurant and bar.

name: Spitsbergen Hotel
overview: Restaurant, bar, Champagne cellar, sauna, training room and free wireless Internet access. Historical building, now atmospheric hotel. Closed for winter (Dec-Jan).  Excellent views down the valley from the restaurant.

name: Stanton Manor Hotel
address: Stanton Saint Quintin, Near Chippenham, SN14 6DQ
overview: Combining heritage with a modern approach, set in private grounds. Enjoying a relaxed meal or for longer visits whilst exploring the local area. Private, AA Rosette award winning cuisine, with local, seasonal produce and an experienced chef, menus can be fully tailored to suit requirements. The entire house can be reserved to ensure a private dining experience. Placed at the gateway to the Cotswolds, with a range of private rooms and corporate facilities, inviting accommodation and a welcoming restaurant open to non-residents

name: Adagio La Défense Esplanade
overview: Accor's mid-range aparthotel is right off the Esplanade, next door to Sofitel .

name: Tucan Hotel
address: Just north of the main road
overview: The Tucan Hotel is a friendly and vibrant hostel that caters more to budget travelers.  Rooms are clean, there are plenty of hammocks, and room to camp as well.  The Tucan offers a great free shuttle to the Ballena Marine National Park and other area beaches.  They also have Wi-Fi, computer access, kitchen use, coffee and parking all of which are free.  The Tucan has a restaurant and bar on site, and usually a rather mellow atmosphere.  They have a small library and rent bicycles, surfboards, and snorkel gear.  Also, be sure to hang out in the treehouse out front.

name: City Sanctuary Bed and Breakfast
overview: A lovely restored villa set in gardens just minutes from the city's attractions. En suite. Spa bath.

name: B&B Globetrotter Catania
overview: An antique building that has been recently renovated. 200m from the Dome, cathedral and Via Etnea. Globetrotter rents independent apartments with fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, air conditioning, TV, DVD, HiFi, internet Wifi and hairdryer.

name: Villa Kennedy
overview: Best hotel in town with outstanding service. Top prices for top service. Build in a former mansion with just 160 rooms and a ballroom.

name: Hotel Los Bracos
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Uist Outdoor Centre
overview: self catering - 20 beds in 4 person rooms.

name: Mövenpick Resort & Spa Tala Bay Aqaba
address: South Beach Road - Tala Bay Area
overview: New property on the southern shores of the Red Sea. 302 rooms, including 145 family rooms, various suites and two Grand Suites all share a modern design and light-coloured furnishings. All rooms have air-conditioning, TV, coffee and tea making facilities, direct dial phone/voice-mail, wireless LAN throughout the resort as well as hairdryer, 24-hour room service, in-room safe box. Superior rooms and suites allow for added comfort. Non-smoking rooms and rooms for the physically challenged are also available upon request. A special benefit is the free minibar, available in all rooms. In addition, Casalingo, an Italian restaurant, is on premises and open 18:30-23:30 every day. It has a contemporary Mediterranean decoration, with a live cooking counter and wood-fired pizza oven. Casalingo serves authentic Italian dishes, seasonal specialities and pizza, plus a selection of fine wines. Guests can enjoy their dinner on the terrace or in the air- conditioned restaurant.

name: Residence Inn
overview: This hotel looks over Brasa Sq and has a terrace with a pleasant breeze.

name: Beloe Ozero (White Lake) Hotel
address: Smylyanskoe highway (Смилянское шоссе, 14-й км) - South 10km - Stepanky station 2km East
overview: Maybe closed?

name: Holbrook / Petrified Forest KOA
overview: Spots for tents and RVs, cabins available. Hookups and water at each site, showers and pool on the grounds. Wi-fi extra, pets accepted.

name: Halifax Heritage House Hostel
overview: Located in the heart of downtown Halifax, this hostel offers free Wi-Fi to its guests and has a kitchen. The hostel is easily accessed by bus, metro, or train.

name: Inn at Harbor Hill Marina
overview: Beautiful bed and breakfast in the marina district of the quaint Connecticut seaside village of Niantic. The property features two buildings: the original Main Inn and the newly opened (as of 2014) Captain Clark House. Guests can enjoy magnificent water and nautical views from any one of the 16 guestrooms, each with its own unique decor and special amenities, some with queen or king beds, soaking tubs, fireplaces and private balconies.

name: Punta d'oro
overview: Not very big, it has got a minimarket and a beach. Free Wi-Fi available.

name: Canyon Campground
address: 35000 East Pacific Coast Highway Malibu, CA 90265
overview: A large vehicle-accessible developed campground across PCH from Leo Carrillo State Beach.

name: Ski Breezy
overview: Catered chalet accommodation in a beautiful chalet close to the centre of Chamonix.

name: Scandic Ariadne
overview: At the northern cruiseferry terminal in Värtahamnen. Unusually tall for a Stockholm building.

name: Pullman Barcelona Skipper
overview: The Skipper is situated at the northwestern tip of Barceloneta's harbour and offers modern design, luxury features and views of either the harbour and sea or inland Barcelona.

name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge Hotel
overview: Five star luxury hotel in a Modernist tower across the road from Harvey Nichols, with views over Knightsbridge and Hyde Park.

name: Foxbridge Bed and Breakfast
overview: Peace and serenity in the woods...hot, gourmet breakfast. Active military ID discount.

name: Bed and Breakfast Spain
overview: Valencia-BedandBreakfast-Spain is a beautiful and spacious country home, located in the heart of the Valencia (Spain) orange growing region of Spain, yet only 45 minutes drive from Valencia (Spain) airport or 1hr 25 minutes from Alicante.  Only 3kms outside the town of Gandia, it is set in a rural location amongst verdant citrus groves and commands stunning views of the surrounding mountains.  Your hosts, Nigel and Mark, run the Valencia-BedandBreakfast-Spain Guest House with all of its facilities and comforts like a small country hotel and combine this with a welcoming feeling of informality and relaxation. Our aim at Valencia-BedandBreakfast-Spain is to provide an exceptional standard of individual service to our guests, making them feel that they are in a friendly and informal atmosphere where they can relax and unwind without the usual constraints of a conventional hotel.

name: Pullman London St. Pancras
overview: Located equidistantly from the St. Pancras and Euston railway stations, the former corporate Novotel was taken over and completely refurbished by Accor's upscale Pullman brand. It features rather spacious rooms and interesting views from upper floors, as well as modern decor and fitments and all the creature comforts expected from an upscale hotel.

name: Suginoi Hotel
overview: A luxury hotel with multiple wings and a connected game center and aqua-fun park. In true Beppu style, it has its own ''onsen'' on the premises.

name: Antica Locanda dei Mercanti
overview: With/without private terraces. Large double rooms. In an old palazzo in the heart of the city. Charming boutique hotel.

name: Cumberland Falls State Resort Park
overview: The park has a campground containing 50 campsites, ranging from primitive to electric/water hookups, and is open from March 15 through November 15. The campground has a comfort station with showers and flush toilets.  A camp store carries firewood, ice, and a basic selection of groceries.  Reservations may be made through the park website up to one year in advance.  A two night minimum stay is required on weekends and holidays.

name: Corinthia Hotel Khartoum
overview: This 250-room, 5 star hotel is undoubtedly Khartoum's premier hotel. Located in the ''Burj al-Fateh'' an iconic tower built in 2008 with financial support from Libya. All rooms have panoramic views over the Nile. As well as being a hotel it has several restaurants and cafes, and a health centre and spa which are open to guests and membership holders.

name: Guesthouse Sunna
overview: Great guesthouse located in one of the most iconic places in Reykjavik, right across the square from Hallgrimskirkja. Very clean, very comfortable, with friendly service, and internet. They also include breakfast in the morning, with fresh bread baked on the premises. A little on the expensive side—11600 kr for a single room. Another great feature is their airport/tour bus service.

name: Noah's Ark Bed & Breakfast
overview: Six rooms with private baths.

name: Minshuku Mutsukari
overview: This Minshuku is a further away from the ski slopes, but it's nice, has free parking and no curfew. The house leans a little and the tatami rooms are not brand new, but the landlady is lovely and you can have meals included if you wish. They have a Japanese-style (single-sex shared) bath for relaxing after a hard day on the slopes. There is a bus stop outside.

name: Hunor Hotel and  Restaurant
overview: **** Services: event organization, restaurant, bar, guarded parking, interior swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, solarium, massage, bowling, table football, billiards, conference room, ski storage, tennis courts, internet access, Wi-Fi, sun terrace, barbecue terrace, private garden and woodland walk, bicycle rental, tour management, lake scenery, diet dining options, 'pig slaughter'.

name: Centro Motel Calgary
overview: 32-room boutique motel, modern decor. Free amenities include wi-fi, phone calls, parking and breakfast.

name: Hotel Heredia
overview: One of the cheapest hotels with adequate interior. Close to Parque Central.

name: Delta Hotel
overview: New Gower at Barter's Hill.  Near George Street, Mile One Stadium and the St. John's Convention Center.

name: Ralph and Malph B&B
overview: Set in a modern apartment and just 5min walk away from the Vatican City. Single, Double, Triple rooms available. Three bathrooms and kitchen.

name: Gower Edge Self Catering
overview: Spacious detached property which sleeps 8 in comfort. Wales Tourist Board 3*. Children and pets are most welcome. Short breaks and longer stays available.

name: Eduard
overview: Four star?

name: Omena Hotel Lönnrotinkatu
overview: The same budget hotel chain has another hotel a couple of blocks south.

name: Serrano's Backpacker's Inn
overview: Backpacker cabins in the back yard of Serrano's Mexican Restaurant (see above). Reservations taken up to 24 hours in advance.

name: Adobe Nido Bed and Breakfast
overview: A comfortable and relaxing Southwest style adobe inn with jetted tubs in all rooms and an outdoor Finnish sauna. Healthy breakfast every morning.

name: Danhostel Helsingør Vandrehjem
overview: Easily one of Denmark's best located hostels, directly on the beach, with good facilities - including guest kitchen, laundry room, free wifi and bike rental

name: Villa Corallium
overview: A luxury villa with amazing sea and mountain views.

name: Royalson Hotel
overview: A recently opened accommodation in town with a good in house restaurant serving delicious Pakistani Bar BQ. It has quite spacious rooms equipped with basic amenities.

name: Elephant on the Moon
overview: Quite different than usual Krakow hostel, located outside centre, in a peaceful neighborhood, has a flower garden and eco-friendly ideas. Got some prizes for good atmosphere.

name: Best Western Pannonia Hotel
overview: **** The oldest hotel in the city with free Wi-Fi. 'Classic' double room (single-, double and twin beds) with mini bar, LED TV, free Wi-Fi . 'Comfort' double room same as Classic, plus air-conditioning,and some rooms with a small balcony or terrace. 'Antique apartment' same as Classic just bigger with one or two rooms inside. 'Family apartment' with two separate rooms

name: Marriott Cincinnati at RiverCenter
overview: Containing a Marriot and Embassy Suites, as well as the Northern Kentucky Convention Center is located near the foot of the historic John Roebling Suspension Bridge, which connects Cincinnati and Covington's downtown areas. $200+/ night.[http://marriott.com/property/propertypage/CVGDR]

name: Hotel Drisco
overview: Built in 1903, this is a higher-end, boutique hotel right in the heart of Pacific Heights.

name: PTDC Motel
overview: Government-owned motel with six spacious room and a good restaurant, adjacent to the museum.

name: Wildrose
overview: (Year round).  Located at 4,100 feet in the Panamint Mountains, Wildrose has 23 sites, with tables, fireplaces, and pit toilets. Drinking water is available during the Spring, Summer, and Fall. Although it is windy enough that you'll need to take care to secure your campsite, it is still high enough in elevation that it presents more pleasant weather for camping than the valley floor. Being farther away from the more popular areas of the park induces a quieter setting as well.

name: Addar Hotel
overview: Serviced apartments with free wi-fi and breakfast, 24-hr coffee shop, onsite restaurant and gym, rental cars available.

name: Zambeta Apartments
overview: Zambeta Apartments is a small, family-run pension in Arillas. 300 meters from the beach, near the center of Arillas but still quiet, with a beautiful garden. Clean, light and spacious apartments for couples or singles. Two meditation centres within 1 km, a third one at 3 kms.

name: Ropatinis B & B
overview: Located three minutes drive from town's centre, this is a lovely homestay with inviting hosts. The gardens and views are beautiful. There is a choice of en suite units or rooms inside the main house (with and without en suite). Breakfast is provided, dinner by arrangement.

name: Hilton Munich City
overview: The Hilton enjoys a direct underground connection with the ''Rosenheimer Platz'' S-Bahn station, where many lines, including the S1 and S8 going to the airport, stop. Otherwise, it is a pretty nondescript and a tad aged business hotel, although situated right next to the most charming part of Haidhausen.

name: Ty Uchaf
overview: The oldest of the three properties, a 17th-century single-storey white-painted cottage. Sleeps 2.

name: Hotel Keikoku
overview: Located nearby the Kinsenkyō.

name: Sania's house
overview: Beautiful place with clean rooms, swimming pool. Wi-Fi and breakfast included.

name: Estancia La Jolla Hotel & Spa
overview: . A rancho style conference and vacation resort located adjacent to the University of California at San Diego.

name: New River Campgound
overview: RV park and campground located on the banks of the New River between [[Charleston (West Virginia)|Charleston]] and [[Lewisburg (West Virginia)|Lewisburg]] along US 60. |

name: Crescent City Guest House
overview: 4 Guest rooms each with private bathrooms. All taxes, maid service and continental breakfast included. Free off-street parking and WiFi. 3 blocks from the French Quarter.

name: Hotel Rivoli
overview: Hotel Rivoli, which was a Franciscan convent dating back to the 14th century, is now an excellent 4-star hotel.

name: Yanagijaya Campground
overview: Campsite right next to Kids' Land (こどもの国 ''Kodomo no kuni''), west of the sand dunes. There are free showers in the Cycling Terminal building next door.

name: Cave Creek Park
overview: Space for RVs and camping along with clean hot showers, trails, and a rodeo arena. Electric hook-ups available; reservations can be made [http://www.maricopacountyparks.org/ online].

name: Second Home Peru
overview: Pool, hammocks, garden, wifi, mini-bar.

name: Chateau Dupre Hotel
overview: This 80-year old inn offers a complimentary continental breakfast in its elegant lobby.

name: Nuovo Hotel Quattro Fontane
overview: A 3-star hotel housed in an entirely renovated 18th-century palace.

name: Ritz Carlton
overview: The one four-diamond hotel anywhere in the area. It's the Ritz; it's nice.

name: Tukul Village Lodge
overview: Internet and shops across street, a newish place with very nice, spacious "tukul" (round, native style with thatched roofs) and ''en suite'' shower rooms with better views from their private balconies than most other hotels in this area. Restaurant and 20kW standby generator.

name: Wilson Conservation Area
overview: Forest with man-made lake, canoe rental, beach access, nature trails and 100 campsites, Children’s Safety Village, Children’s Water Festival and McKinlay Woodlands Memorial Forest.

name: Best Western Hotel Weisses Kreuz
overview: Onsite restaurant and bar.

name: Hotel de Wereld
overview: Named after the famous hotel in Dutch Wageningen where the German capitulation was signed in 1945. It’s a motel-like hotel from the fifties.

name: Gasteiner Hof
overview: The staff is friendly and helpful, and the breakfast is good. Some rooms have shared bathrooms, which can be quite cold at night.

name: Courtyard Marriott Tbilisi
overview: Six-storied Courtyard Marriott Hotel was built at 1990's, in post-modernist style.

name: Boomerang Village Resort
overview: Externally similar to mountain chalets, the cottages are furnished in Thai-style, offering a very congenial and relaxing ambience. The property boasts panoramic views of Kata Beach and is located approximately 80 m above sea level. The beach is about 900 m distant.

name: Lower Pines
overview: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|15px|frameless]] Located in Yosemite Valley, this campground is open from March through October, requires reservations, and offers 60 sites for both tents and RVs up to 40' in length.  Water and flush toilets are available.  Three larger sites are also available for groups of up to 12 people for $30 per night. Campsites 7, 13, 14, 18, 20 are wheelchair accessible.

name: Marriott Fisherman's Wharf
overview: 285 rooms and 11 suites.

name: The Guesthouse on Main
overview: The Guesthouse on Main, in its relaxing garden setting, is located just  and is close to restaurants, convenience stores, petrol stations and fast food outlets.  There is ample off-street parking. Each room has a fridge, kettle, a 54cm television with satellite channels and are air-conditioned. Each suite has its own entrance. A hearty breakfast is served in the morning.

name: Kalisma Hotel
address: Jl. K.S. Tubun no. 15-17, West Jakarta 10260
overview: 5-minute walk to Tanah Abang at Central. A simple room that has a small TV and fridge, and a small decent restaurant. Lots of green plants within the property.

name: Sandpiper Inn
overview: A beachfront bed & breakfast on Lake Michigan.

name: Golden Tree Hostel
overview: The only hostel on the island; dorms, private rooms, and an outdoor dome available for sleeping accommodations. The hostel also has a kitchen, sauna, hot tub, pool table, fire pit, free wifi, computer station, towel rentals, and bike rentals.

name: Fosshotel Lind
overview: Located one minute walk of the city centre close to the main shopping street Laugavegur. Rooms on the upper floors have great view of the Hallgrimskirkja. There is a restaurant at the hotel called Confusion. It offers aperitivos for reasonable price. Tours are bookable at the reception.

name: Hogwartz Backpackers
overview: 5 minute walk from the Octagon. Maximum 4 share room, no bunks.

name: Akkotel
overview: A refurbished boutique hotel along the eastern wall of the old city. Uniquely designed rooms with high ceilings and hand made furniture, and eager-to-please innkeepers make it a great upscale option in Akko.

name: Hotel Royal Castle
overview: Though they claim to be a three  star hotel 2 is more like it.

name: Garn Fach B&B
overview: A quiet rural 4-star bed and breakfast in Llanwnda on Strumble Head, close to the [[Pembrokeshire Coast Path]] and ideal for walkers

name: Sachas Hotel
overview: The Britannia Sachas is a popular hotel located near Manchester city centre. Its Tripadvisor reviews page makes for famously entertaining reading.

name: Ararat Colonial Lodge Motel
overview: Features 19 spacious ground floor rooms and a heated pool, gym and sports courts and barbecue area.

name: Hotel Murillo
overview: Very conveniently located in the Juderia, with friendly service. Free wi-fi throughout the building, self-service laundry facilities available.

name: Sziget Guesthouse
overview: Parking in closed yard. One single and two doubles. Bankcard usable. Free Wi-Fi. All rooms with mini-kitchen, fridge, bathroom, toilet. In the garden can be using cauldron for cooking and barbecue. Free train station shuttle. +phone=+36 20 3675083.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace
overview: is a stunning reconstruction of this Art Nouveau masterpiece. Located in central Pest, it faces the beautiful Chain Bridge, the Danube and the Castle Hill. Its restaurant and cafe are amongst Budapest's finest, and well worth visiting in their own right. More at '''[https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Budapest/Pest#See 'see' chapter]'''

name: Xenia Poros Image Hotel
overview: Featuring spacious rooms and suites with a splendid sea view, a conference room, fitness centre, one restaurant serving local delicacies, private marina, beach bar and a long sandy beach with complimentary sunbeds and umbrellas for all guests.

name: LITiNTERP Kaunas
overview: Offers eight cosy rooms, each equipped with natural wooden furniture and en-suite bathrooms with original pictures of Kaunas Old Town and furniture made from Lithuanian wood. Each room has tea/coffee making equipment and all necessary dishes. Guests can access their rooms at any time since they have their own keys. All rooms are non-smoking. Breakfast included. Free WiFI.

name: Grand Hyatt Amman
address: Hussein Bin Ali Street, Jabal Amman
overview: A favourite of the expat set for its laid back ambiance, terrace views and quality restaurants. Located at 3rd Circle.

name: Ideas Manzil
overview: Ideas Manzil could be called Bangladesh's first "heritage accommodation," meaning it is the kind of place which attempts to display and preserve the richness and heritage of Bangladeshi culture.

name: Ukraine
overview: 70 r / 125 beds.

name: Hotel "Imperial"
overview: Bad combination of price and quality. Old furniture, cigarette's smell.

name: Cumberland Point Campground & RV Resort
overview: A privately owned campground featuring 54 sites with electric, water, and sewer hookups. Amenities include a fishing pond, general store, wifi, playground, shower houses, and a laundry facility. The campground is open year round.

name: Registan Plaza
overview: Four star hotel opened 2004, centrally located, restaurant, swimming pool

name: Kamakura-Hase Youth Hostel
overview: As a word of warning, the owners of the guest house are very strict towards upholding their rules.

name: Ruby Room
overview: A handful of B&B-style rooms above a rejuvenation spa in an 1896 building, with amenities geared toward relaxation — lush, comfortable decor, but no television or telephones. But it's right in the midst of the lively Wicker Park scene, so you won't miss them...much. Two-night minimum stay on weekends.

name: Reykjavík Backpackers
overview: A new hostel right on the main shopping street, run by travelers and adventurers.

name: Hotel am Schloss
overview: A higher end option is the Hotel am Schloss, just below the castle and in the middle of the Old Town. Double rooms are approximately €90.

name: Nicollet Island Inn
overview: While the downtown hotels are hardly far away from Northeast, the Nicollet Island Inn splits the difference. Located on Nicollet Island, in the middle of the Mississippi River between downtown and Northeast, the Inn provides luxury small hotel accommodations, as well as an excellent restaurant.

name: Cafe Paradise
address: Right at Half Moon beach, Contact Person - Sahil
overview: -Open only Nov-Mar.

name: Tonnam/Tonlux Guesthouse
address: In front of Riverside Guesthouse on Talad Kao Rd
overview: Run by a nice Thai couple. They have a small garden access to the small parking lot just in front of Please Bar and Gibbon Bar.

name: Byblos Resort & Casino
address: Main Road to Manuel Antonio Park
overview: Offers all the modern amenities and comforts of a three-star boutique resort, all rooms at Byblos are spacious and offer ample views of the local Wildlife, Garden Areas or Pacific Ocean. Accommodations feature air conditioning, telephones, cable TV, safe box, hair dryer, mini-refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker, and are designed with furniture of farm grown hardwoods by local craftsmen.  Complimentary remote control gated parking and Wi-Fi is available.

name: Kamejikan Guest House
overview: Wonderful helpful staff English-speaking and delicious coffee shop. Quiet and a stroll away from the beach.

name: Sheraton Lisboa
overview: Panoramic bar on 26th floor. Spa available. Near Picoas metro station.

name: Bergen Hostel Montana
overview: Situated on the hillside of Mount Ulriken. Bus connections are good. For families this typical hostel is an excellent choice for those traveling on a budget, with decent and clean facilities in a quiet area. Its location is however not ideal if you plan to enjoy the nightlife of Bergen. Free Wifi, two well equipped guest kitchens and free parking for guests. Member of Hosteling International receive 10% discount. Breakfast included. Linen and towels not included.

name: Napoleon Hostel
overview: Good hostel with an excellent location in the quiet city centre.

name: Canyon Cabins
overview: Nestled in the tall cool pines of scenic Upper Canyon, yet just minutes from everything Ruidoso has to offer.  1-3 bedroom cabins, each with kitchen, fireplace, and air conditioning.

name: DJH Neuhausen
overview: Youth hostels in Bavaria are aimed at youth in the literal sense of the word (unlike other places where they are also for the young in heart).

name: Hotel Pearl City
overview: A nice business hotel in central Akita City.

name: IYHA Tel Aviv
overview: PO Box 22078, Tel Aviv 62260. The hostel is located near Hayarkon Park, offering easy access - by foot or a short bus ride to the city's main cultural and tourist attractions.

name: St Christopher's Berlin
overview: A new well maintained hostel with large public bar downstairs located in Mitte. Generally good security and friendly international staff. Part of a large independent hostel chain.

name: La Casa de Izel
overview: Nice and simple hotel, well located in central Santa Tecla. Clean and carefully maintained. Kind and helpful people. Has private rooms and dorms. Features hot water, free wifi, rooftop terrace, laundry service (4.5$), daily smiles. No AC (but unnecessary).

name: Le Village Guest House
overview: New clean place from same owner as Oasis GH in KL. One 7-bed mixed (ceiling fans) dormitory. Common area with couches and TV/movie room, kitchen facilities provided for guests, western/asian toilets. Free Wi-Fi, free tea/coffee, free hot and cold water from dispenser, free left luggage, free city map, no curfew/24 hr reception, paid laundry service/PC. Carpets everywhere, no shoes.

name: Hotel Victoria
overview: Three-star. Junior Suites feature two-person jacuzzi bathtubs. Free wireless Internet in most rooms and lobby.

name: Aboriginal Cultural Center
overview: This beautiful, modestly priced hotel is generously decorated with aboriginal carvings making for a unique experience. Located across the road from Taitung Forest Park and a short walk from the beach. The hotel also has a nice gift shop stocked with well made authentic aboriginal handicrafts. Bicycle rentals next door.

name: Jacob's Apartments
overview: Decent apartments with bathroom and kitchen, close to the railway station. The apartments vary in size, the largest can hold up to seven people.

name: Hotel Dormy Inn Premium Otaru
overview: You get a free bowl of ramen at night in the downstairs buffet room from the guy with the glasses, who is an all-round customer service legend. There is a LAN cable sort of hidden next to the phone in the rooms that you can use to get free internet. Lovely, clean and extremely well-serviced rooms.

name: Country Hearth Inn
overview: This hotel is ideally located less than a block from the green expanses of the Presidio. They offer a complimentary continental breakfast and limited free parking.

name: Scrapbooking in the Pines Retreat Center
overview: Retreat in this perfect place to get away well suited for scrapbooking (of course) but also stamping, quilting, gaming, and crafting.

name: Alfa Hotel
overview: <br>Close to the city center.

name: Skjalm Hvide Hotel
overview: Three star hotel in a village outside Slangerup. Family run with 54 rooms with internet access. The hotel has restaurant, bar and meeting facilities.

name: The Royal River Hotel
overview: This is a good hotel near the Krung Thon Bridge. Rooms are large, comfortable and clean. The deluxe rooms of this hotel have a big balcony with a nice view over the river. It is relaxed to splash into the pool after a hot day of temple tramping.

name: Taj Mahal Palace
overview: One of the finest ''grand old hotels'' in the world, favored by visiting presidents and premiers since it's opening in 1903. Built in grand Victorian style in and complemented by an adjoining highrise in 1973. Expect five star amenities and a hefty price coming with it. The hotel was damaged in the Mumbai bombings in 2008 but have now been reopened and fully restored.

name: HI-Campbellton
overview: The only hostel in Canada that is located in a lighthouse. Open June 8 to August 15.

name: Texas Spring
overview: (Closed in summer). Located at sea level, Texas Spring has 92 sites with water, tables, fireplaces, flush toilets, and dump station. Texas Spring is first come first served with self registration. From March 17 through April 15, Texas Spring is designated primarily for tent camping with a limited number of RV sites. For the summer, reservations for the two Texas Springs campground group sites are available by calling (760) 786-3247.

name: Best Western Plus Quail Hollow Inn
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pool, pets accepted.

name: Palladium Hotel
overview: In this nature's ornament, between a green pine-covered mountain and idyllic beaches, we have built one of the most beautiful hotels in Halkidiki (Chalkidiki) wishing to offer to our visitors a perfect, friendly, family environment for holidays in Krioneri with modern infrastructures and showing the same incomparable Greek hospitality.

name: Hotel Bratislava Kiev
overview: Three-star hotel located on the left bank of the River Dnieper near International Exhibition Centre in Kiev. Has 337 fully-renovated guest rooms and suites.

name: Radisson Blu Water Garden Hotel
overview: Huge luxurious hotel sprawling over seven acres of manicured grounds and gardens with water features. All rooms are clean and contemporary. The hotel is almost a resort as it has a large outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts, spa and a golf course. It hosts Bangla parties at weekends, which go on until late and which can be very loud and heard in rooms.

name: Courtyard Denver Stapleton
overview: Between the airport and downtown Denver. 24-hour market on-site.

name: Aux Jardins de l'Anse
overview: Open all year. Aux Jardins de l'Anse is situated in a rather strange location—an out-of-the-way, almost isolated part of inland L'Anse-à-Beaufils—but it's perfect for those visiting Percé during the winter, a time when, unlike most area hoteliers, owners Odette and Jean-Guy are as busy as any other season. In fact, taking good care of offseason visitors at a time when most services are closed seems to be a major point of pride here, with a long slate of winter activities on offer including dogsledding excursions ''([[Percé#In the winter|q.v.]])'', sleigh rides, and snowmobiling.
