But Aux Jardins de l'Anse is perfect for the other three seasons too, with lobster fishing excursions in the spring, brilliant colours covering the mountains in the fall, and the gardens that give the place its name providing a summertime floral feast for the eyes and nose. The main house boasts four rooms, all with lovely views either over the gardens or out to the sea in the distance; the "Petite Suite" boasts a queen size bed, private bath and lounge and Internet access while the other three have double beds, shared baths and peaceful sitting areas. There's also a detached chalet with a private terrace, a full-size private bath, and additional amenities such as a refrigerator and barbecue grill. Breakfast comes either as a gourmet five-course meal in the midmorning or as an abbreviated continental breakfast beginning at 6AM: perfect for early-rising hikers hitting the '''River Trail''' a short walk away. Website in French only.

name: Adriatico Arms Hotel
overview: Cozy hotel in the middle of Malate but nevertheless quiet inside the rooms. Very friendly and helpfully staff and security. Rooms and bed are quite big and clean the same with the attached bathrooms. The staff cleans each room and bath every day. The aircon is a bit noisy.

name: Albergo Ristorante Royal Victoria
overview: 43 rooms, 97 beds. In the city centre; rooms with a view on the lake and towards the city centre. Conference rooms, swimming pool and garden with access to the lake.

name: Birchwood Inn
overview: Elegant country bed and breakfast featuring comfortable rooms with private baths, luxury linens, and free Wi-Fi. Breakfast included. Pet friendly rooms available.

name: Nashville Downtown Hostel
overview: Single-sex and co-ed dorms available, along with private rooms. Shared bathrooms in hallways. The hostel also featres a kitchen, common area, and pay laundry facilities. Free wireless internet offered; internet terminals also available for a small fee.

name: Green Village Hotel
address: Jl. Ahmad Yani No. 4 Tanjung Pandan
overview: Inland, away from downtown Tanjung Pandan, makes this hotel lucky enough to offer bungalows for its residence. Garden style hotel, with multiple swimming pools, a restaurant and some gazebos, and an indoor karaoke room.

name: Pangea People Hostel
overview: 8 minutes away from Alexanderplatz.

name: Queen Mine RV Park
overview: 25 spaces, accepts pets.

name: Roycroft Inn
overview: A National Historic Landmark, opened in 1905 by Elbert Hubbard as part of the Roycroft Arts & Crafts movement. Fully restored in 1995, it is furnished with original Roycroft furniture and Stickley reproductions. 28 luxury suites, three dining rooms, outdoor dining, banquet facilities and a lounge.

name: Singsaker Sommerhotell
overview: Is a lovely studenthome converted into a summer hotel while the students are home during the summer. It's located near to city center and the University. The standard is simple, but upgraded this year (summer 2008). The breakfast buffet is included. The hotel opens in the middle of June and closes in the middle of August (this may vary). Be early to book if you want a room with bathroom, although the common bathrooms are really nice too.

name: Hotel Messmer
overview: Also has holiday apartments, and a well-regarded [http://en.hotel-messmer.at/restaurant/in-bregenz-lake-constance restaurant].

name: Novotel Semarang
overview: Novotel is in the CBD area.

name: Bed & Breakfast Torino Inn
overview: Private bathroom. Free WiFi.

name: Casa Chiara
overview: Around the corner from Porta Nigra, this is a solid 3-star hotel with vaguely Italian-style rooms and a sunny roofed garden for breakfast.

name: Fat Margeret's
overview: Hostel with a big living room, kitchen and a lot of clean toilets and showers. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Che Lagarto Suites Copacabana Anita
overview: The Suites has two types of rooms: Private and Private Low Cost. It is located 4 blocks away from the beach.

name: Cumulus Oulu
overview: The Cumulus Oulu is a cosy hotel for a pleasant business or leisure visit.

name: Hotel Soho Barcelona
overview: A design hotel build in 2006. Offers 54 modern and spacious rooms and a rooftop deck with pool. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Kanha Village Eco Resort
address: Near Kanha NP, Village Boda Chhapri, Mandla
overview: An eco friendly wildlife resort with construction from locally available biodegradable material like clay, straw, etc. Bath area areas cement / RCC construction. Cottages have family pool, Air conditioners, mini refrigerator, writing table, sitting area, etc.. Adjacent to a pond and dense forest so if lucky possibilities of viewing wildlife from resort is always there. Resort got "Best Eco Tourism Initiative Award 2010". Only place in Kanha which is following responsible and sustainable tiger tourism rules. Come Celebrate Nature Celebrate Life

name: Yyterin Kylpylähotelli
overview: 230 Beds in 113 Rooms. Price includes use of sauna and baths. Located on Yyteri sand beach.

name: Biei Poteto no Oka
overview: Domitory room (youth hostel), Pravate room, Cottage, Log house

name: Tamara Hotel
address: Jl. Jendral Sudirman No. 30, Tanjung Pandan
overview: A simple hotel inland away from downtown Tanjung Pandan. Rooms only. Spacious room with minimum design and adequate amenities.

name: Bianco Pansion
overview: ***. Agoston family's pansion. Services: large, safe parking place, a sauna, a fitness room, a breakfast room with a fireplace and a garden, a water-rotating pool, airport transfer, free keeping of parcels, dogs are welcome, free internet, Wi-Fi, free bike rental for 2 hours per day.

name: Atana Khasab
address: After Al Darah Border it's 38kms or about 5kms from Khasab airport and the city center
overview: Sea view rooms, swimming and children pool plus play area, gym, WiFi. Licensed with an onsite restaurant. Offers free shuttle service between the hotel and anywhere in Khasab – they will also pick you up if you call. This is the default hotel for package tourists and bigger groups, and generally is completely booked at the weekend. Formerly known as Golden Tulip.

name: Ovolo Hotel
address: 256 Tung Chau Street, West Kowloon, Hong Kong
overview: Design-Boutique Hotel in West-Kowloon. Year opened: 2011. Rooms: 63, 2-3 bedrooms suites with AppleTV, living room, rainfall shower, free minibar, free Breakfast, free Wi-Fi, free Happy Hour. Outdoor terrace. Winner of Tripadvisors Certificate of Excelence 2013

name: Hotel Merlin
overview: Three-star accommodation in the center of Prague on the banks of the Vltava River, next to Dancing House near the metro station ''Karlovo náměstí''

name: Hotel Triton
overview: Located just outside Chinatown, directly across from the south gate. Trendy, modern, and a little pricey. But the rooms are nicely appointed, and they offer a free tasting of local wines every afternoon.

name: Helnan Palestine
overview: The hotel, most recently refurbished in 2002, is set on the Mediterranean Sea and is surrounded by 350 acres of gardens and beaches. It faces the Montaza Royal Palace, once home to the royal family.

name: Best Western Hotel Carlton
overview: Best Western Hotel Carlton is a personal, 19 room hotel in the very center of Helsinki, only 100 metres from Helsinki Central Railway Station.

name: Hotel Portinari
overview: This calls itself a Design Hotel. Each floor has a different style but that is really all the difference to a normal hotel. Top floor restaurant for breakfast and a good view of local favelas.

name: Älvagård
overview: Situated 8 km north of Haparanda in charming countryside surroundings.

name: The Fulbari Resort & Spa
overview: Nepal's only 5-star resort located outside of the capital. About ten minutes from the airport and offering unfettered views of the surrounding Himalayan ranges. Alongside the hotel is a former glacial canyon and the Seti-River gorge. Facilities at the hotel include four restaurants, one bar, a spa/health club, golf club, and a casino for those slow or wet nights.

name: The Olde Bakery B&B
overview: Six quilt bedded rooms, 2 friendly dogs, cozy breakfast, cash only, non-smoking, laundry service available, double w/no bathroom €70, double w/bathroom €80.

name: Malibu Beach Inn
overview: Has perhaps the most central location of Malibu hotels, on PCH in the heart of Malibu.

name: Sofitel Budapest Chain Bridge
overview: The Sofitel began life in the 1970s as an "Atrium Hyatt", and thus exhibits many Hyattesque features of that time, like the large bay windows and the said atrium, where the breakfasts are served. Redecorated and refurbished since, it offers rooms of fairly generous size, with classic appointments. The name is not an exaggeration, as the hotel is right next to the Chain Bridge, and the best rooms offer a view thereof and across the Danube to Buda. The less expensive, however, face the very narrow street at the back of the hotel.

name: Hostel Pipištrelo
overview: Located in the centre of Pula, close to the main town square forum, the rooms are individual mini art galleries and the whole hostel is a design project bursting with spirit.

name: Bougian Villa
overview: Bougian Villa is a South African-owned Guest House claiming to offer the best accommodation in Lubumbashi. In-house restaurant (which offers good value home-style meals for breakfast, lunch, and supper), also a full bar, wifi internet, dstv, etc.

name: Ibis Bastei, Königstein, Lilienstein
overview: Three sister ibis hotels in a row on Prager Straße, near the Hauptbahnhof. In addition to the standard rooms, they offer studios for up to three persons and apartments for up to four persons.

name: Bergen Guesthouse
overview: Situated behind Bryggen, the guesthouse consists of two houses, one with a two bedroom apartment and one in which four rooms are available. All rooms can be fitted with a baby bed free of charge. Some of the bedrooms can also be rented and used as living rooms or offices on request.

name: Dunedin Leisure Lodge
overview: Offers hotel rooms & suites, all with either a balcony or patio area, free parking. Short walk to the CBD. Restaurant & bar on premises.

name: Hyatt Place Las Vegas
overview: Popular for business travelers. 42" flat panel HDTV and free wi-fi in each room. Free breakfast and airport shuttle.

name: Comfort Hotel Hachinohe
address: clearly visible from the eastern exit from the new (Shinkansen) Hachinohe train station
overview: A convenient, clean business hotel.

name: NH Belagua
overview: Rooms with double windows to keep out street noise. Like many European hotels, neighbor rooms can still be heard. Moderate to expensive in price, probably geared more towards the business traveler. Great continental buffet breakfast included with room.

name: Alf Leila Boutique Hotel
overview: Located in the center of Dahab just a short distance from the beach, Alf Leila hotel has a different theme for each room - all in Arabian style. The courtyard features a dip pool and a cozy lounge. All rooms have new air-conditioners, a minibar and private bathrooms. All suites include an extra dinning area, balcony and mosquito net; while the Royal Suite additionally comes with an LCD screen, DVD player and a movie library. ( Prices from $12 for a bed in a co-ed dormitory room )

name: Hotel Widder
overview: Known for excellent service and unique location in the old town, but just 1-2 min from Bahnhofstrasse.

name: Four Seasons Jimbaran Resort
overview: On the shores of Jimbaran Bay and regularly voted as one of the best resorts in the world. 147 rooms are all villas with either a plunge pool or a pool. Beach side cafe.

name: Lor-In Belitung
overview: 20 air-conditioned cottages overlooking one of the island's best beaches. Has a pool, a restaurant, typically resort-like. The bathrooms are outdoors (not communal though). The drawback is its remote location from other attractions.

name: The Hairy Lemon hostel
address: Rruga Mitat Hoxha, 8th floor (lemon logo on door), Koder
overview: A small 18 bed hostel run by a great Irish lady. Has hot shower, laundry, free breafast, 24 hour tea and coffee, internet, comfy bunks, large balcony with awesome view of the beach and Corfu. Just a hop skip and a jump from a nice beach with beach chairs and beach umbrellas free after 4 PM!

name: Bali Plaza Hotel
overview: Adjacent to the municipal government, the public square and connected closely with large high-end stores, hotels, office buildings and entertainment squares. The hotel has a perfect location for business, leisure and entertainment. The hotel features a high-end exotic restaurant, coffee shop and sauna center and decorated by the combination of modern and Bali-style design.

name: Aabana Beach and Watersports Resort
overview: Beach resort. Cottages are about 60 meters from their own beach, having extra small bamboo huts for their guest on the wide and nice beach. All cottages have big terrace, air-con, warm and cold water shower, flatscreen LCD satellite TV, individual safety digital box, refrigerator and free Wi-Fi. There are also cottages which have a kitchen on the terrace for private guest use. They offer boat tours around the island, fishing tours, snorkeling tours and jet ski.

name: Centre of the Universe
overview: With only 3 detached Thai-style bungalows in a private garden, this has to be the smallest boutique hotel with the biggest swimming pool in Chiang Mai. Very friendly and helpful staff. Each room has air-con, TV, Wi-Fi, fridge, tea and coffee making facilities and access to 3 swimming pools.

name: Hostels by Nordic
overview: Opened in 2010.

name: Atlantis Hotel
overview: 24 hour reception

name: Kirsebærkroen
overview: Built in 1780, this intimate B&B in a white half timbered house with thatched roof, offers 'mini apartments' with kitchenettes and a small attached patio with table and chair.

name: Family-run Hotel Regence
overview: Friendly and welcoming hosts. High-speed Internet, sauna and pool. Large and comfortable rooms, each room includes refrigerator and a stove.

name: Guesthouse Comfort
address: 59 Lva Tolstogo str. (Ул. Льва Толстого,  ул. Хамза Хакимзаде)
overview: 24 hours room service, breakfast, bar, Dinner and Conference halls, laundry , transportation, Wi-Fi, telephone services, copying, scanning, printing.

name: Zöldfa Guest House
overview: Four rooms.

name: Stage Stop Inn
overview: Has an onsite restaurant, outdoor pool, free wi-fi. Non-smoking and pet-friendly.

name: Hotel Pearl City Kobe
overview: An older mid-range hotel on the artificial island next to the Kobe airport (accessible by the Port Liner). Shows its age inside and out, but still does the job well and the views are quite nice.

name: Hamdan Plaza Hotel
overview: Free breakfast with wi-fi.

name: Formule 1 - IBIS Rua Silva
overview: Three star hotel. Rooms: 250

name: Eendracht Hotel
overview: Historic house in the oldest part of town in Dorp Street.

name: Radisson Plaza Hotel Minneapolis
overview: Built on the site of the original Hotel Radisson (which opened in 1909), Radisson Plaza Minneapolis has an important historical significance for Minneapolis, and continues to be a thriving hotel. Featuring the outstanding FireLake Grill House & Cocktail Bar (try the "purple rain" martini at the bar, and the... well, really just about anything from the kitchen), underground parking, skyway access, and affordable packages.

name: Residencial Maravilha
overview: A charming place with friendly management.

name: Vilalara Thalassa Resort
overview: Located by the sea where nature is found in its purest state, the Vilalara Thalassa Resort, with its expressive but tasteful architecture, is a place dedicated to well-being and the senses.

name: Hotel New Heaven
overview: Twenty rooms with a shower.

name: Tropical
overview: Getting a bit run down

name: Shahriyar Hotel
overview: Five-star but not worth the price. It is located far away from the city center. Often used by business travelers.

name: Panska Hata
overview: 10rooms / 21 beds.

name: Marina Beach Hotel
overview: Basic 2-star accommodation, but great location and includes cookie facilities.

name: Hill House Holiday Cottage
overview: Tranquil village location with rural and estuary views. Sleeps 9 + cot in four bedrooms. Good for large family holidays. Pets welcome.

name: Moose Lake Motel
overview: No pets.

name: Manor House Backpackers
overview: Set in 2 colonial homes and surrounded with beautiful gardens there is nowhere more pleasant to stay in Dunedin. 10min walk to the octagon.

name: Guest House Artemi
overview: Nice modern rooms in a private house

name: Wellington Arms
overview: Room in building attached to the pub.

name: Ariston Hotel Milan
overview: The Ariston is a three star hotel with 52 bedrooms (single, double and triple), private parking, a wine bar, a breakfast hall and a conference room able to host up to 25 people. Among the other services, the Hotel Ariston Milan also offers private bath, satellite TV, free internet access and a bike service, since the Ariston Hotel of Milan is an ecological accommodation.

name: Bellagio
overview: One of the most upscale hotels in Las Vegas, the Bellagio features an art gallery, a massive indoor flower garden, and the Cirque du Soleil show "O". One thing to do at the Bellagio (you do not have to stay there) is to have afternoon tea at the Petrossian Bar; it costs around $32 per person and is very classy, but you have to book at least a day in advance.

name: Maison Giulia
overview: Guesthouse near Campo de Fiori and Trastevere.

name: Vecchia Masseria
address: C/da Cutuminello Km 68 S.S. 117 bis direzione Gela
overview: The farmhouse, 3 Ears, use of a receptiveness of 56 places bed in double rooms, apartments and a suite, endowed with all the comforts: bathe in room, conditioned air, heating, tv, and in some apartment also angle cooking and angle living; you furnish in poor art, beaten iron, cooked and ancient cerammics make the comforting and refined structure.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Dresden
overview: In a business district of Neustadt, shares the office block with some institutions and company offices.

name: Eliconial Paraty Pousada
address: Rua Sete de Setembro, 5 - Jabaquara Beach -
overview: In a quiet environment 165 ft from Jabaquara Beach in Paraty, the small Eliconial hotel provides charming rooms with balcony and kitchenette. Free Wi-Fi, pool and parking are available. Guests at Eliconial Paraty Pousada can take a dip in the jacuzzi, chill out on the tropical grounds or enjoy a varied breakfast by the swimming pool. For additional relaxation, there is also a spa unit in the hotel.

name: Buda Castle Apartment
overview: The apartment is very close to Fisherman's Bastion, to the Chain Bridge and Danube river, there is perfect public transportation. See also ''Rent in Hungary'' in the [[Budapest#Apartments|Apartments section of Budapest]] for details on this operator.

name: The Howrah Hotel
overview: A heritage property, with a lot of character and one of the oldest hotels of Kolkata. Renowned for homey atmosphere and offers very neat and clean, airy rooms - one of the safest hotels in the locality, with cordial staff. Attached baths and cable TV. Five minutes walking distance from the railway station and bus stand. 5,000 sq ft garden. +phones =+91 33 26412149-28490240/55538251

name: Auberge Dardara
overview: With gastronomic restaurant with local specialities and local farm products.

name: Rodeway Inn
overview: 58-room hotel. Non-smoking, free breakfast and wi-fi, pets welcome.

name: Motel Capri
overview: This is a small family run motel with just 46 guest rooms.  Thankfully, this one is set back one block from the noisy Lombard St in a quieter residential area.  This is definitely an older, slightly jaded motel, but the rooms are clean and the staff are extremely friendly.  It's close to the shopping on Union St as well.

name: Suite Jazz
overview: Circa 1861, the building has typical high ceilings, chandeliers, hardwood floors, Cable TV, WIFI Internet Access, Central Air, a fully stocked kitchen and more! A queen sleigh bed, travertine tiled shower & original artwork by fabulous artists. This apartment is conveniently located above a bicycle shop, Bicycle Michael's. Minimum stay 2 nights, starting at $125/night. Located at the heart of the Frenchmen Street music & dining, between Snug Harbor and d.b.a., facing The Spotted Cat, a few doors from Adolpho's, Marigny Brasserie, Cafe Rose Nicaud, Negril and the Praline Connection. Windows have added sound protection. Sylvia is one of New Orleans' best ambassadors and a great concierge/hostess/tour guide.

name: Golden Gate Hotel
overview: A charming budget hotel in an old Victorian.

name: Ambassadors Hotel
overview: Popular three star hotel situated on Collingham Road between Earls Court and Kensington. The hotel offers 140 en-suite rooms, all with modern amenities. Book direct for best rates and low prices.

name: Juyoh Hotel
overview: Very nice cheap hotel, prices ranging from ¥3200 for a single (''¥2980 with a discount coupon printable from their web page, includes cleaning service every other day'') to ¥6400 for a double (''¥5960 with coupon''). Internet access available in the lobby, five PC's and Macs available; wireless and ethernet support for laptops.

name: Hacienda Corona de Guevavi
overview: A historic bed and breakfast which once hosted John Wayne, with murals by Mexican bullfighter-turned-painter Salvador Corona.

name: Gîte Saharien
overview: A desert logde on the outskirts of town, made up of several clay brick bungalows, hot showers and WCs are available. The restaurant serves great food.

name: Cathay Hotel
overview: Frequented by western backpackers.

name: Mercure Budapest Korona
overview: On the outskirts of District V., but well-connected and far more modern and comfortable than the other Mercure, even featuring a swimming pool. It consists of two buildings, linked by a spectacular glazed bridge over Kecskemeti utca.

name: Ryokan Funamisou
overview: A Japanese ryokan. Includes public and private (family room) natural hot spring bath. Quiet and surrounded by nature along side the kinugawa river. Provide Japanese cuisine with seasonal, fresh ingredients. Friendly manager who speaks Italian. Popular among local Japanese and starting to attract overseas customers. Recommended for a local Japanese experience. English online reservation available.

name: Chalet Vert et Blanc
overview: Provider of luxury catered and self catered accommodation in Chamonix.

name: King Charles Inn
overview: Outdoor heated pool, wireless internet access, manager's reception, fitness center, and a buffet breakfast.

name: The Lord Nelson
overview: Lovely views overlooking the Public Gardens just below the Citadel.

name: Pera Palace
overview: ''The'' [[Grand old hotels|grand old hotel]] of Istanbul opened in 1892 to welcome the courteous passengers of the legendary Orient Express connecting Paris with Istanbul, Pera Palace situated on a hill overlooking the Golden Horn hosted kings, kaisers, emperors, czars, and shahs in a literal sense throughout in its history. However, most renowned guest to the date is perhaps Agatha Christie, who wrote ''Murder on the Orient Express'' in room 411. It was renovated in 2006 with its tastefully decorated rooms.

name: Coastline Cottages Kauai
overview: Oceanfront cottages.  Their Turtle Cove Cottage overlooks a Hawaiian sea turtle sanctuary and their Poipu Kai Cottage have private swimming pool. Tip:  Five night minimum stay however every 7th night is free.

name: Elegant Hotel
overview: All rooms have air-conditioning, a cable TV, and an en-suite toilet and bath. Some of its amenities are restaurant and bar, a business center, and a beauty parlor.

name: Footsteps Backpackers
overview: A nice little hostel not too far from the trendy area of Bellavista.

name: Leipzig Marriott Hotel
overview: 231 guest rooms. Wifi.

name: Embassy Suites Albuquerque
overview: Great hotel overlooking downtown.

name: Summer City Hostel Schönherz
overview: It's an 20 story high building. Mainly functions as the student hostel for Budapest University of Technology and Economics, but has some rooms for travellers (off the academic period there are more rooms), most of them however are only available for larger groups.

name: NH Diagonal Center
overview: The hotel is not really on or near the Diagonal, nor especially central, but all in all offers the usual NH standard in the middle of Sant Marti.

name: Pension Esterhazy
overview: Has become filthy. No kitchen, only a fridge, no wifi. Don't stay here unless you're desperate.

name: Hotel Royal Inn
overview: Rooms : 18,

name: Hotel Anna
overview: 11 rooms, 2 apts, 3 suites. +phone=+36 30 2187272

name: Westgate Las Vegas Resort & Casino
overview: This 3000 room hotel/casino is situated just north of the Las Vegas Convention Center, a couple of blocks east of the Strip. A monorail station is located next to the lobby.

name: Hotel Menara Peninsula
overview: Convenient location, not terribly disturbed by the traffic despite at a main road, close to Sudirman and Taman Anggrek Mall. A good deal of rooms overlooking the breathtaking buildings on both sides of the hotel. The suites feature a large desk and free Internet, while the top floors include a dedicated check in desk and complimentary breakfast. Two of the restaurants offer signature fusion of dishes.

name: Guarda Golf Hotel Crans Montana
overview: The Guarda Golf Hotel Crans Montana is a five star superior resort directly on the fairway of the 9-hole golf course and close to the Crans Montana centre. Open all year round. With just 25 rooms, it offers a warm, intimate ambiance. Three restaurants and an ultra-modern Wellness & SPA.

name: Darist Hotel
overview: Great location if you want to walk around and explore town a bit, the rooms can be hit or miss, especially considering the price. The restaurant is a convenient if uninspired place to eat, regardless of whether you sleep there or not.

name: Maure Sansō
overview: Bath is ''Maruseppu hot spring'' that sourced free flowing. Large bath room and outdoor bath. There is also bathroom in each guest rooms.

name: The Inn San Francisco
overview: An old Victorian house converted into a bed and breakfast.

name: Pacific Victorian Bed and Breakfast
overview: An elegantly decorated Victorian style Inn 1½ blocks from the beach.

name: Pension Sighișoara
overview: Cozy family friendly B&B in a quiet part of town, under German management, with inside parking and common garden terrace.

name: Hotel Poleski
overview: Frontal view of Wawel Hill, a modernly fitted hotel with friendly and helpful staff.

name: Hotel Szoloskert
overview: All rooms with satellite flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and a bathroom with a shower. - Standard (16 sqm); Comfort (24 sqm); , Superior (24 sqm); Deluxe (30sqm). Jacuzzi and the steam room

name: Hotel Arcadia
address: Knyagini Gagarinoy St., h. 25/186-188, Alushta district, pos. Utyos, Crimea, 98541
overview: Hotel Arcadia features newly-renovated rooms, cozy restaurant with the sea view, own beach only 10 m from the hotel, and heated swimming pool with salt water. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Azalai Grand Hotel
overview: Swimming pool, tennis court, internet access. The hotel is by far one of the oldest in town. For a while, it was the most run-down as well but has recently been thoroughly renovated. Nice-sized, very clean rooms with large windows that open. Good service. Restaurant reasonable but the bkfst buffet is a little overpriced. Both the jewelry lady and Tuareg crafts vendor in the lobby will try to massively overcharge you. Give them a miss: you'lll do better at the Marché des artisans in town. Small bookstore in the lobby with a decent selection of Malian books and newspapers. Staff haven't figured out how to clean out the pool - give it a miss. Internet reliable and fast, by local standards.

name: Buda Castle Fashion Hotel
overview: Four star.  - 25 large rooms and luxurious suites.

name: Solaris
overview: Located in a historic townhouse with a timber frame and steep stairs, this charming hotel offers creature comforts such as Japanese washlets in its 23 rooms. Located over a nightclub, which may become an issue.

name: Drummond House
overview: Three-room bed and breakfast in historic 1830 stone house beside Tay River Turning Basin, private baths, outdoor pool, hot tub, a/c, wi-fi, free long-distance calls.

name: Redtop Hotel
overview: A four star hotel close to the Pecenongan late-night dining area. Rooms are small though. Note that Wi-Fi and airport transfer requires surcharge.

name: Tidur Tidur Guesthouse
overview: This building has a design studio at the front, and the guesthouse running at the back. Run by a young local designer Stanley Chin. Melaka river is at the rear. There are all private rooms for 2-4 people, double-decked concept. Well ventilated rooms with fan and shared air-con. Shared clean toilets with hot shower, shared dry kitchen and facilities, shared Living space. Free Wi-Fi. Group bookings accepted.

name: Courtyard Boston Tremont Hotel
overview: This 4 star hotel is across the street from the Wang Theatre.

name: Patrik & Tezz Guesthouse
overview: Swedish managed guesthouse, 3 min walking distance from town proper, located on the water. 2 double bed rooms (queen size bed) - 550p/night, 2 twin bed rooms (2 single beds) - 450p/night. 2 shared cr´s with hot shower, living room w ref and TV, wifi. Motorbike rental - 400p/24hrs, Island hopping with boat.

name: Campeggio del sole
overview: By the lake. This is the second biggest camping site in Iseo, after Sassabanek. It has got a mini market and two swimming pools. Here you can play tennis, volleyball, football and table tennis.

name: A&O Hostel Munich Hackerbrücke
overview: The ''A&O Hackerbrücke'' is a classical backpacker hostel, with free wireless internet connection, its own bar and a bike rental.

name: Marriott Gaslamp Quarter
overview: 22-floor hotel in the Gaslamp neighborhood with most of the services and features typical of Marriotts (sadly, no pool or jacuzzi). Rooftop bar, on-site restaurant.

name: Hotel Caravel
overview: Cheap hotel: a bit off the beaten track but there are good bus connections.

name: Hotel Lindsay
overview: The hotel is well lit and clean. The hotel was recently renovated and its facilities, including a room minibar, hot water, tea and coffee, make it a good value four star property. New market is right on the door step, and provides plenty of local interaction right on the doorstep.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart NeckarPark
overview: The Garden Inn is right between the Porsche and Mercedes-Benz arenas and mostly caters t the visitors of those venues. Prices tend to skyrocket during major events. The hotel is quite a bit away from the city centre and public transportation options are limited. The entire hotel is appointed in a very modern, elegant and consistent theme.

name: Jalan Jalan
overview: Similar to Sama-Sama, budget fan equipped dorms for RM16. A very cute backpacker’s place with a serviceable staff with a pleasant outdoor garden. The A/C rooms are located a hundred meters down the street. Free tea or coffee, no breakfast.

name: Numa no Hei Campground
address: About 20km SE of Iwaizumi.  From Iwaizumi, take Highway 455 east.  Take Highway 45 south about 5km.  Take a side road east, down to the ocean and the campground.
overview: A nice campground on the ocean.  There's a sandy beach, and the campground has bathrooms and showers, a large fire pit, and vending machines.

name: Zum Mühlengrund
overview: with shower, WC, phone and TV.

name: Hotel Complex «Chervona Hora»
overview: with sink, shower and toilet , A/C, SAT TV, internet

name: Sofitel Berlin Kurfurstendamm
overview: The distinctive, multi-tiered wedding cake of a hotel peeks out from behind the Swissotel at the corner of Augsburger and Joachimstaler Strassen, making one of the few remarkable achitectural statements along the Kurfurstendamm. Originally launched as the Concorde Berlin, it became a Sofitel at the start of 2014, retaining pretty much everything but the name - including the simple yet refined decor throughout the hotel and many posh facilities (yet no pool).

name: Bught caravan and camping site
overview: Bught Lane, Inverness, IV3 5SR, is just off the main road out to Loch Ness and Fort William. Open March to November, it is situated conveniently for a very pleasant 20 minute walk along the river into the city centre.

name: Hotel Camayene
overview: A rather small but fine hotel.

name: Zámecký hotel Třešť
overview: Hotel with a restaurant located in the historical castle building with a natural park. The hotel offers bike rental for making trips to the scenic surroundings.

name: Hotel Excelsior
overview: The first class hotel is centrally located, only 200 m (220 yd) from the central station and only a 10 min walk through the pedestrian zone to the Marienplatz. The breakfast is offered as a buffet and does not leave anything to be desired. Free wireless internet access is provided.

name: Hotel Kasbah Mohayut
overview: Beautiful hotel with a friendly and knowledgeable staff, fluent in English/French/Arabic/Berber and other languages. Many rooms include terraces overlooking the Erg Chebbi and air conditioning. Rooms are comfortable and clean, with private bathrooms (Western style). Hotel also features a swimming pool, free internet connection, and a restaurant. You can arrange for desert excursions by camel with guides and Berber tent accommodations.

name: L'Armada Guesthouse
overview: The rooms and toilets are very clean. Nice living room with free tea and coffee the whole day. Free Wi-Fi. The owners are very friendly and helpful. Close to Chinatown, river view in some rooms.

name: Scandic InfraCity
overview: 320 rooms.

name: Antebellum Meadows Inn B&B
overview: An Antebellum Inn Built in 1847 as a private residence, renovated in 1900 and again in 1980 as the first B&B in New Bern. We offer 7 rooms with a full breakfast each morning. Off street parking behind the Inn. Park your car and walk to all the Historic downtown restaurants, shops, two riverfronts and the Tryon Palace & Gardens/NC History Center. Rooms:

name: Catalina State Park
overview: Reservations can be made [https://azstateparks.itinio.com/catalina/ online].

name: Hotel Suter Inn
overview: Three-star hotel near Carol Park, the Palace of Parliament and Autogara Filaret.

name: Jugendgästehaus Berlin International
overview: Central location near Potsdam Square with quiet surroundings.

name: Doubletree Downtown Memphis
overview: Located only a few blocks within walking distance from exciting Beale Street; a relaxing accommodation in a convenient location.

name: The Benson Hotel
overview: A grand historic hotel located downtown.

name: Hakuginsou
overview: This hostel has dormitory style rooms with bunk beds and 2 private Japanese style rooms for 4. It also has a huge tatami room for large groups.  Camping is available in summer.  There are onsen and rotemburo (outdoor baths) — men, women, and mixed (swimsuit required) — and saunas. It is located at one of the trail heads for hiking Mt. Tokachidake in the summer, or for a backcountry ski ascent in the winter — they also rent snow-shoes. Shared kitchen facilities are available, with pots, pans, microwaves, rice cookers and gas hobs (¥50 for 20 minutes of gas). There is a small shop with chocolate, drinks, and microwavable rice.  Not much English is spoken.

name: Abitart Art Hotel
overview: Design rooms & suites with private bathrooms and breakfast included. art exhibitions, Wi-Fi, meeting rooms, company agreements, inner restaurant with DJ set.

name: The Shilo Inn Hotel
overview: 134 Rooms

name: Enkelana Hotel
overview: recently renovated, three star, 60 Rooms, 128 Beds

name: Top Twelve Hotel
overview: Family owned and run and it shows in the spotlessly clean bedrooms and common areas and the attention to detail which means that (almost) everything works – a rare treat in Ethiopia! Two stories high with a nice little lawn to enjoy the afternoon coffee ceremony; spectacular views from the twin sunloungers of each private balcony. Shower rooms are up to European standards and each bedroom is beautifully furnished with locally themed and sourced furniture and furnishings but without TV or phone. 200 station satellite TV in the reception/restaurant area. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Car park is guarded 24 hours. 20kW standby generator, laundry service, weekly barbecue.  Worth a visit – even if it is full and you can not sleep in one of its 12 ''en suite'' rooms – because of two features: A) Its modern Ethiopian renaissance architecture and interior design that ranks amongst the best in the whole country – no chipped marble and faux Louis XIV curlicues here. B) A right up-to-date Polish wall map of Ethiopia and surrounding countries (so modern it even shows the border crossing with the new country of [[South Sudan]]) and showing relief and all major features of interest to the traveller such as filling stations and ATMs together with an accompanying wall poster (in English with photographs) listing the major tourist sights and features. <br />

name: Andes Hostel & Apartments
overview: Mixed and women-only four- to six-bed dorms , private rooms and apartments. Price includes breakfast, Wi-Fi, and daily housekeeping service. Great staff and fun weekly events.

name: Sportsman Inn
overview: 10-minute walk from village.

name: Cambiance 't Witven
overview: The Witven offers camping grounds but is also a popular place for recreational day trips. They also rent out chalets.

name: Villas del Playa
overview: Luxury condos located right on the beach facing the sunset on the Caribbean Sea. 2 bedroom, 2 baths. 3 bedroom, 3 baths. 3 bedroom, 3 bath penthouse with 1,900 sq ft rooftop that has full kitchen, BBQ pit and private pool. Each condo has full stainless steel granite counter-top kitchen, central air-con, U/V water filtration, comfortable living room with couch that folds into bed, flat screen TVs with cable in every room, washer/dryer, free wifi, and beach side swimming pool. Wheel chair accessible with elevator.

name: Sofitel Munich Bayerpost
overview: The Sofitel is immediately adjacent to the Hbf main hall and opposite the Le Meridien. Despite a historic facade, it maintains a very contemporary ambiance.

name: Hôtel Président
overview: Purpose-built luxury hotel, on-site restaurants, nightclub and a large swimming pool.

name: Camping Le Betulle
overview: Open from 1st April to 30th September. It has got a beach, an out-door swimming pool and a restaurant.

name: Fortunatus Hotel and Leisure Center
overview: *** - Wellness services: swimming pool, a sun yard, Finnish sauna, infra sauna, steam sauna, jacuzzi, salt room, massage, fitness room, standing solarium. - Restaurant, bar, grill terrace: for 140 person. A banquet hall which is hands-free projector. Internet Wi-Fi.. Parking: free guarded parking inside the yard. Reception: 24 hours. - Mobil:+36 20-9353-940. - Swimming pool entry / incl. swimming pool, sauna, fitness room usage / HUF 1000. Breakfast:HUF1000. Half board / breakfast. dinner / HUF3000.

name: Parkside Inn and Spa
overview: Aveda Spa, therapeutic mineral pool, steam room, fitness centre, and Hair Artistry salon. Best Western Plus hotel with suites and conference rooms, beside Stewart Park.

name: Nunattaq Suites
overview: Apartment suites.

name: Ocean Beach International Hostel
overview: A popular hostel with backpackers and budget travelers.  There is a bus line on Cable Street that makes it possible to reach the airport.

name: Hotel Swarn House
overview: This 3 Star hotel is a heavenly abode for tourists coming in from all walks of life to visit the Golden Temple, which is just a walk away. It offers super deluxe and deluxe rooms to stay in. Guests are served a delicious spread, comprising Mughlai, Continental, Chinese, Italian and Punjabi specialties. Corporate travelers are also offered a spacious banquet space, which is an ideal place to conduct weddings, prayer meetings and business conferences.

name: Alexia Hotel Apartments
overview: Family owned and run hotel apartments, situated near Grecian Beach.

name: Beijing Zaoyuanju Hotel
address: 17 Zhangwang Hutong, Jiugulou Street (旧鼓楼大街张旺胡同17号; Jiùgǔlóudàjiē Zhāngwànghútòng)
overview: Rooms with free internet. Ticket office and laudry service available. Western restaurant, bar and room service. The rooms and especially the bathrooms are small. There is some noise from other guests and from the hutong life outside. Great location close to bar areas and sights.

name: Courtyard Parsippany
overview: Located in the Parsippany business district.

name: Matkakoti/Gasthaus Marita
overview: 11 rooms with 25 beds.

name: Sapporo Garland Hotel
address: 〒064-0807 北海道札幌市中央区南7条西5丁目1番地
overview: This hotel is centrally located in the Susukino entertainment district of the city.

name: Mega Matra
overview: At the main street of East Jakarta. The hotel looks grim at the outside, slightly better on the inside. Small coffee shop and noisy lounge for a night out downstairs.

name: Fremont Hotel & Casino
overview: 32,000 square foot casino and 4 restaurants.

name: Microtel Inn & Suites
overview: Enjoy consistency, quality, reasonable prices and great service.

name: Caroline Lodging
overview: 6 to 15 mins from the main square and located in safe and quiet part of Huaraz. The owners can be strange and even cold at times, but this is a bargain basement hostel and they will definitely help you if you ask. Don't be put off by any chilly exteriors, rooms and bathrooms are clean and hot water works reliably. The price includes continental breakfast with different extra (tortilla, juice, ...) every day. Breakfast starts at inconvenient 8AM, so you will miss it on days when you start early for a hike. They have also laundry service, free tourist information, mountainbikes, free kitchen facilities, book exchange, bbq, mini cinema + dvd (free to use). They have free Wi-Fi at reception and computers with Internet for 1 sol per hour. Just call and they pick you up for free from the bus station.

name: Budget Hotel
overview: Mainly targeting small companies who want to house employees, but when business is low they might accept travelers. Rooms are quite simple, but adequate.

name: Hostel Suomenlinna
overview: All year open hostel located at the Suomenlinna sea fortress. Great for a quick escape from the city. The ferry runs from 6AM to 2AM so you are not totally cut off.

name: Hotel Escondidinho
address: Stone town, Praca das Amoreiras, near the Marinha
overview: Tastefully renovated double storey building with 10 rooms, swimming pool and restaurant

name: The Desert Hills Motel
overview: Offers a variety of stylish deluxe suites, as well as standard accommodations. Amenities include a swimming pool, patio deck and large palm trees.

name: Camping Igueldo
overview: Open all year. You must book at peak times or be lucky. It is very international with free Wi-Fi covering the full campground, lockers (but no fridges), some places with power plugs, a bar, a minor shop and a couple of restaurants nearby, and a bus directly to the beach and centre. It has a beautiful view to the green foothills of the Pyrenees.

name: Old Rittenhouse Inn
overview: Historic bed and breakfast offering rooms, luxury suites and a private cottage. Stunning views of Lake Superior. On-site restaurant.

name: NH Lingotto
overview: Four-star business hotel in a former Fiat Lingotto factory located just outside city center.  Large high ceilinged rooms. Tip: ask at reception for key to the roof!

name: Hotel Jaapon
overview: Reasonably clean AC and non-AC rooms available with a very small private bathroom and cable TV. Beds are surprisingly comfortable given the thin and well worn mattresses. Location is central and just metres from Sudder St. phoneextra=+91 33 2252 0658

name: Victories Hotel
overview: This hotel is billed as Harbin's 3rd 5 star hotel, but most likely it's 3-4 stars. It's also way out at the edge of the city by the exhibition center, but due to this, prices can drop. If you have business at the expo center, this is the place to be.

name: Casa de San Pedro Bed and Breakfast
overview: Chef Lark Beaugureau also offers cooking classes.

name: Haikko Manor
overview: Old feudal manor turned luxury spa and hotel by the seaside, popular with Finnish honeymooners.  Features a Japanese-style ''Yorokobi'' bath section.

name: Hotel Ambasador Chojny
overview: In the southern part of the city in a small park. Free parking, swimming pool and sauna included in the room price. The hotel restaurant is a popular place to hold a wedding reception.

name: Grand Hotel Serre Chevalier
overview: Grand Hotel offers twin, double, triple and quad rooms with no, half and full-board. 2-minute walk from the ski lift station and a ski rental shop (discounts available).

name: Mabre Residence Hotel
overview: This 41 room hotel occupies a grand neo-Classical Russian Monastery. High walls give it an exclusive feel. Sauna, fitness center, and pool. Wi-fi in rooms. The Steakhouse Hazienda is located in the hotel.

name: Adam's Mark Buffalo-Niagara
overview: Downtown Buffalo's largest hotel. Convenient to the First Niagara Center, Coca-Cola Field, and Canalside, with excellent waterfront views. Dry cleaning and laundry service, gift shop, pool, fitness club, business center, restaurant and bar ("Harbor Bistro").

name: Hotel Best Western Meteor Plaza
overview: A 4 star hotel located in the City Center on walking distance from all major historical sites. It offers 73 air-conditioned rooms which are all furnished. Amenities include shower and/or bath, WC, hair dryer, satellite/pay TV, wireless high- speed internet access free of charge, IDD telephone, personal safe, coffee/tea maker and mini-bar.

name: Black Rock Campground
overview: Located in the northwest corner of the park, this campground is not accessible from the main park roads.  100 sites, water and flush toilets available.

name: Kaibab Lake Recreation Site
overview: Managed by Kaibab National Forest Service. Tents, trailers and RVs under 40'. Drinking water, no hookups, vault toilets.

name: Best Eastern VM Central Hotel Hotel
overview: Said to be the best hotel in town, well located on the main street and with a lively bar.

name: Ingwenya Lodge
overview: Self catering holiday accommodation.

name: Château du Bosc Theroulde
address: Route du Bosc Theroulde - 76710 Bosc Theroulde
overview: B&B 8 miles from the city center,within easy access from the A-28-A29-A151 motorways, this is an elegant Napoleon III style building in a fully secured walled park of 4 ha.

name: Spa Hostel Khaosan Beppu
overview: Clean and cozy. English-speaking desk staff. Has own public natural hot spring (free for guests).

name: Ibis Hotel Stratford
overview: 104 room hotel with the usual identikit, Ibis set-up.

name: Linnunlahti Camping
overview: You can bring your tent or caravan, or you can rent a cottage. Next to the campsite is a small beach, should you whish to swim in the lake. Opens only for the short summer (June–August).

name: Hotel Park
address: Between Shahnaz and Golestan Park, Emam Ave
overview: wi-fi, tv, minibar, air conditioned rooms, and some English speaking staff. It is located in the down town close to the historic sites.

name: Oh! Kentucky Campground
overview: A privately owned campground featuring 70 campsites ranging from primitive to full hookups.  The campground features a store, pool, laundry facilities, and shower houses.

name: Harpers Ferry Vacation Rental
address: 408 Alstadts Hill Rd, Harpers Ferry, WV 25425
overview: Just an hour from the Washington DC and Baltimore, MD beltways; 1 hour from Fairfax, Virginia (VA); relax amidst the Blue Ridge Mountains near Historic Harpers Ferry, WV, in the Shenandoah Valley, adjacent to the Shenandoah and Potomac Rivers; minutes walk to the Appalachian Trail. Enjoy the wildlife; deer abound in the morning and evening. Prime Outlets in Leesburg, VA are a half hour and Hagerstown, MD are 45 minutes away.  Accommodations: Historic Home, 3 Bedrooms + Convertible bed(s), 2 Bath (Sleeps 8-10), hot tub  Explore Harpers Ferry National Historic Park, Appalachian Trail, Hollywood Casino at Charles Town Races and Slots, Antietam Battlefield, tubing, canoeing and kayaking on the Shenandoah and Potomac Rivers, white-water rafting with River Riders next door, Mountain Heritage Arts and Crafts Festival (June & Sept.), fine dining, shopping and antiquing in quaint historic towns of Shepherdstown, Harpers Ferry, and Charles Town, WV, Leesburg, VA and Frederick, MD; hiking and biking along river roads and C&0 canal or simply relaxing in you private outdoor hot tub.

name: Leo Boutique Hotel
overview: Near Váci utca, small, friendly and modern three-star hotel. It has air conditioning essential in summer. Take time to savour the ancient and ornate lift.

name: Vritomartis Naturist Resort
overview: Nudist resort.

name: Forsthaus Jägerhaus
address: at the bottom of Steckeschääferklamm take the path straight on and up the hill rather than right to follow the trail.
overview: Excellent food and quality rooms

name: NH Luxembourg
overview: Luxembourg's NH is an airport hotel, located within walking distance of the Findel Airport terminal buildings (although walking through the traffic arrangement around the airport is not recommended), with common spaces such as the gym, restaurant and conference rooms directly overlooking the apron and runway. Otherwise, it is a fairly standard NH hotel.

name: Courtyard Calgary Airport
overview: 100% non-smoking, no pets.

name: Holiday Inn Express The Hague - Parliament
overview: The HIExpress, only opened in December 2012, is right off the Plein and has breakfast and WiFi included in the room prices. Be aware that some rooms face the rather small inner atrium rather than the outside.

name: Hotel Genius Milan
overview: The Genius Hotel is a three star accommodation which presents 38 bedrooms with private en-suite service. Milan is the Italian fashion and business capital, so the rooms of the Genius also present Wi-Fi Internet connection. The hotel is located between Castello Sforzesco and the Duomo.

name: Holiday Inn University Plaza
overview: A 218 room hotel attached to the '''Sloan Convention Center'''

name: The Oaks Hotel, Leisure Club and Spa
address: Colne Road, Reedley, Nr Burnley BB10 2LF
overview: 50 bedrooms with free Wi-Fi, restaurant located within the ‘old house’ offering locally sourced produce, lounge bar, conference suites (largest accommodates up to 200 delegates), extensive grounds and outdoor terraces. Disabled access level 2, accepts children of all ages, gym, health/fitness/ beauty facilities, indoor pool, sauna, solarium. Pets and LGBT accepted. Special provisions for cyclists and "Lone Female Travellers" (sic).

name: Best Western Carlton Plaza
overview: Featuring free internet and complimentary bicycle rental.

name: Atlantis House
overview: 40 yds from the Atlantic Ocean and Rest Beach. Beautiful landscaping with only 2 private Jacuzzi Suites. Perfect for Honeymooners and special occasions. Complimentary Wi-Fi, off-street parking and bikes.

name: House of Two Urns Bed and Breakfast
overview: Offers full breakfast, free parking, and charming rooms. Most have private en-suite bathrooms; all guests have access to free WiFi, kitchens, laundry and wonderful deck/garden areas.

name: Ibis Hotel Ambassador
address: Walking distance to the COEX in Gangnam-gu at Samsung-dong, next to line 2 subway system Samsung
overview: Convenient for international travellers as it is very close to the check-in and limousine server at KCAT, Korea Air City Terminal, next to the COEX. Free shuttle to KCAT and free wired Internet.

name: Absalon
overview: Two blocks from the Central Station, communal shower and toilet facilities. Complimentary breakfast, on-site laundry.

name: Ramada Inn
overview: Outdoor pool, free breakfast, wireless high-speed Internet access.

name: Hostel Mures
overview: HI hostel

name: Tynset Hotel
overview: A hotel and a motel.

name: 7Seasons Hotel
overview: 4 storey ferro-concrete hotel has 37 Queen-bedded rooms, 5 twin-bedded rooms & 1 family room being renovated. All rooms have individual air-conditioning and well screened sliding windows. Soft top, orthopaedic mattresses are particularly good quality and comfortable. Queen-bedded rooms have hip baths, wash hand basins and WC; the twin-bedded rooms are slightly larger and the bath is swapped out for a modern shower cubicle. Free Wi-Fi & satellite TV with 4 channels available including CCTV4 and Al Jazeera. Some guests report meals as inedible and when enquiries were made about a steak ordered 47min earlier, the reply was "not so long now, maybe 10 minutes".

name: Topanga Canyon Inn
overview: A secluded Bed and Breakfast off Topanga Canyon Boulevard.

name: Hotel Sofitel Jardin Des Roses
overview: 5 star hotel located close to the Royal Palace and a park, considered by some the best (and one of the most expensive) hotel in the city

name: Neuhkama lean-to shelter
overview: There is probably a ford at the shelter. There are remnants of pitfalls somewhat upstream from the shelter.

name: Pullman Hotel G
overview: This 38-storey property is on the lower reaches of Silom Road. Rooms have a safe deposit box, minibar, satellite/cable TV and in-room high-speed internet with a fantastic view of Bangkok from ceiling to floor window. The Scarlett Wine Bar inside the hotel is a great visit.

name: The Oberoi
overview: Luxury hotel right on the waterfront.

name: Mercure Bregenz City
overview: Two restaurants, pets accepted.

name: Meikles Hotel
overview: Despite the problems experienced in Zimbabwe in recent years Meikles has managed to maintain its standards as one of Africa's best hotels. All the usual amenities and excellent service.

name: Comfort Suites Sabino Canyon
overview: Newly renovated and centrally located.

name: Best Western Olympic Inn
overview: The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. They provide complementary breakfast in the morning, soup in the afternoon, and fresh-baked cookies in the evening. Free wifi, pool, and hot tub.

name: Harbor View Guesthouse
overview: Stylish two-story townhouse apartment, water view, across street from Eagle Harbor waterfront.  Quiet, comfortable, self-contained.  Private entrance, deck, patio.  Short drive to historic downtown Winslow, 35-minute ferry ride from Seattle.  Suitable for romantic get-away, executive retreat, small families, over 55's too.  Wifi, cable TV.  Two-night minimum preferred.

name: Forrás Guestrooms Kőszeg
overview: Four rooms, two bathrooms, a full-equipped kitchen, 2 large living-rooms with cable TV. In its garden is a pond with a small thatched-roofed garden house. In the garden can find an open-fire facility suitable for making grilled and stew-pot food. Capacity: 15 beds. The Guesthouse is let out to only one group at one time. + Mobil: +36 30 4283310, +email: forrasvendeghaz@gmail.com

name: Weldi Hotel
overview: *** Air Conditioning. Free parking. Number of rooms: 13. Number of beds: 27. Outdoor pool. Languages ​​spoken: Hungarian, English, German. Free Wi-Fi. Buffet breakfast. Room service, Airport shuttle, 24-hour front desk, Tour desk, Luggage storage, Meeting/banquet facilities, Fax/photocopying.

name: Radisson Blu
overview: One of the best hotels in the city with quite luxurious rooms.

name: Shin Hotel
overview: It is a good 15 minutes walk from the train/bus station on the other side of central. Decent rooms with restaurant attached.

name: Hotel Karlos Arguiñano
overview: The hotel and restaurant share the same place, see the picture for the exterior.

name: Hotel Complex Kayon
overview: Offering an indoor pool, bar, sauna, beauty salon, Conference hall, billiard table and a restaurant. - 24-hour front desk, Internet Wi-Fi, a garden with barbecue facilities, a ticket service and luggage storage. - Ten rooms.

name: Hotel Morabeza
overview: A pleasant resort with a great beachfront.

name: Fehér Páva Restaurant and Hostel Budapest
overview: Two single, four 4-bed, seven triple, one 5-bed, four 6-bed rooms.

name: Off-Broadway Studios
overview: Suites with kitchens. Golf clubs and bikes available to borrow. Discounts for booking multiple units at once, up to six total. Advance booking required.

name: Shearton Madrid Mirasierra
overview: A modern luxury hotel located in prestigious residential district Mirasierra, overlooking the Sierra de Guadarama. The hotel is also home to the [http://www.restaurantverdil.es Verdil Restaurant].

name: Byron Bay Beachfront Apartments
overview: Located on Denning Park, on Main Beach.  This is the perfect family holiday in Byron Bay, self contained 2 & 3 bedroom apartments.

name: Birmingham Central Backpackers
overview: Digbeth. Birmingham's only independent hostel features a central location only streets from The Bull Ring, and next to the nightclubs of Digbeth. Beds in a shared dorm can be found for as little as £9 if you've got a sharp eye out and both breakfast and various foods in the evening are included, making it the West Midlands only half-board hostel. It is in the oldest part of the city, right near where the original manor house once stood. The area can look a little uninviting (this is what you will find outside the very centre of this industrial city), but the hostel makes up for it by being socially inviting (films/football can be watched and they have a Wii, playstation and xbox) and, as mentioned, still being close to The Bull Ring. They offer nightly events such as quiz night, beer tasting, movie nights and disco, and the common room is probably the best around.

name: Hotelli Käenpesä
overview: A basic, clean hotel in the town center. Also has a restaurant and a pub.

name: Budai Hotel and Tavern
overview: twelve room (35 + 2 beds). Wifi, Sat TV, Safe. A closed garage price €4/day/ vehicle. Airport transfer: € 15 (up to four people). Bicycle rental: Free. Teaching tennis with court hire (not the hotel): €16.5/hour.

name: School House Inn Bed and Breakfast
overview: A charming b&b which was originally built in 1918 as the Garfield School. The original school blueprints are displayed in the stairway.

name: Nevsky Forum Hotel
overview: 29 rooms different categories. All with: bathroom with bathtub or shower, sat TV, telephone, air conditioning, mini-bar, Internet (LAN/Wi-Fi), electronic safe-box, hair-drier. Room-service, business & conference facilities, transport & excursion service, visa support & registration service, laundry.

name: Hostel Buisto
overview: 17 rooms with 42 beds. Located in the very centre of Pori.

name: Crowne Plaza Monomotapa
overview: Backing onto the Harare Gardens park, this moon-shaped hotel provides comfortable accommodation.

name: Padangbai Beach Inn
overview: Great beach bungalow created in a semi modern, semi traditional style. Split level with attached bathrooms, sit toilets with cold water showers, breakfast included. Also has hotel styled rooms. No WiFi

name: Sheraton Frankfurt Congress Hotel - Niederrad
overview: Do not mistake this hotel and the other Sheraton at the airport itself.

name: Pitotalo Miekkala
overview: A typical Bed and Breakfast hotel, 10 kilometers from Lappeenranta towards Joensuu.

name: Onneyu Hotel
address: Onneyuonsen, Rubeshibe, 留辺蘂町温根湯温泉
overview: In Onneyu Onsen town.

name: The Brookstreet
overview: In [[Kanata]] is a newer luxury hotel and resort popular with technology companies and visiting sports teams. Facilities include a full-service spa with 11 treatment rooms, a championship golf course (The Marshes), a European PGA-approved short course (Marchwood), a four-diamond restaurant (Perspectives) and a fitness studio with whirlpools, steam rooms and indoor and outdoor pools.

name: Hotell Gästis
overview: A small family-run hotel located in the heart of Varberg, the basement houses the '''Lenin Baths''', a spa establishment made as a replica of a bath in Saint Petersburg often used by Lenin.

name: Uist Outdoor Centre
overview: self catering - 20 beds in 4 person rooms.

name: Chalet Suzanne Country Inn & Restaurant
overview: Chalet Suzanne is an eclectic building offering a fine dining experience and many, unique rooms for overnight board. The site was originally envisioned as an upper-class community of fine homes, golfing, tennis, and more. When the Depression hit, investors withdrew and the founder's husband passed away, leaving the widow to do what she knew best—entertain and make people feel at home—and thus Chalet Suzanne was founded. When a fire destroyed much of the original structure, it was rebuilt with pieces of the barn and other structure and improved over time. Free wi-fi available. There is also a small aircraft landing strip.

name: CVJM Youth Hostel
overview: Clean hostel with good breakfast and friendly service. Please note that the "House Rules" prohibit unmarried couples sharing a room.

name: Bodøsjøen Camping
overview: Nice camping. Too bad it's near the airport, so the Boeings and even F16s will fly right over your head. Beautiful surroundings apart from the airport.

name: The Fulton Steamboat Inn
overview: The hotel is shaped like, and decorated like, a paddle-wheel steamboat.

name: Canyon
overview: (06-Jun to 11-Sep). 272 sites, showers, flush toilets

name: Bat Hotel
overview: Known as "Letuchaya Mysh" in Russian is a mid-range hotel in the same class as the Atlantik.

name: Wusum Hotel
overview: A new high standard hotel (some say the best in Sierra Leone).  There is a good pool, air conditioned rooms, full electricity from 1900 - 0800 (no air conditioning at other times) and wireless Internet.

name: Flinders Station Hotel
overview: 24-hour reception. Centrally located. Twins and doubles have TV.

name: Gasthaus & Pension Heidehof
overview: This 3 star hotel is set in a large park and has direct access to the Europa-Wanderweg hiking route.  The hotel is family run and each of the rooms are brightly decorated.

name: Virunga Motel & Campsite
overview: Gardens and grounds are better maintained than the newish 2-storey accommodation block which has 4 ''en suite'' rooms on each floor, each with table and chair. Windows and doors are ill-fitting and the ventilation slats are not insect-screened. Door locks are more secure than most. In June 2014, satellite TV and Wi-Fi was only "planned" so they are poor value at USD50 for a double or twin, incl. a light, cold breakfast. Campers fare better with two nice, shaded grassed areas and a toilet and shower block that has both hot & cold water for USD6 per person. There are also 9 smaller, older, self-contained chalets at USD25 for a double or twin.

name: Shibetsu Grand Hotel
overview: The hotel located central city.

name: Inn at Playa del Rey Bed and Breakfast
overview: A New England style beach house, located three blocks from the Pacific ocean and five minutes from Los Angeles International Airport.

name: Marriott Suites Downers Grove
overview: Reasonable sized rooms but limited space for cloths and luggage for a suite style hotel. Even though not cheap still have to pay extra for internet in the room!

name: The Padre Hotel
overview: This boutique hotel offers five unique food and beverage venues.

name: Wyndam Santa Monica
overview: Hotel is quaint, comfortable and some rooms have a partial ocean view.

name: Dancing Eesti
overview: The staff here can find you anything that you need in Tallinn from legends of the city to secrets of the underground tunnels. A must for people who want to chill or party. Free computer use and Wi-Fi.

name: Betsy's Hotel
overview: 57 rooms. No pricing information on website.

name: Hideout Ranch
address: 11730 N Horses Hideout Rd, San Simeon
overview: An overnight guest ranch that also offers horseback riding into the Dragoon and Chiricahua Mountains. Horseback riding is also available for day visitors.

name: Basecamp Spitsbergen
overview: The most atmospheric of Longyearbyen's luxury hotels, this attempts to simulate a trapper's lodge with seal skins and driftwood aplenty. Don't let the humble name fool you though: 'camping' here will cost you from NOK1590/night in peak season (but only half that in winter).

name: Shatan Hotel
overview: Rooms with free internet and aircon. Business center, ticket office, laundry service, hair dressing, bath center, billard and table tennis available. Chinese and Western restaurant and room service.

name: Hotel zur Mühle
overview: Very popular restaurant and beer garden.

name: Comfort Suites
overview: 100% non-smoking studio suites. Indoor pool and spa, free Wi-Fi access, complimentary breakfast.

name: Hotel Ibis Genève Centre Gare
overview: A typical clean chain hotel, with basic facilities in the rooms. The hotel is centrally located, yet on a quite calm street so it's a great base for weekend sightseeing travelers.

name: Sea To Sky Hotel
overview: Choose from standard rooms with two queen beds or one-bedroom suites. Rooms include microwave, mini-fridge and complimentary breakfast. Wireless internet is also available.

name: Fraser Suites Harmonie Paris La Défense
overview: A higher-end apart-hotel close to the Esplanade de la Defense metro station

name: Discovery Lodge Hotel
overview: Hotel suites. Also has a restaurant (see section above).

name: Wildebeest Camp
overview: Wildebeest Camp has moved from its original location to Mokoyeti West Rd in Langata. It is a beautiful, clean camp with dorms, camp sites, permanent tents, and higher-end rooms. The common area has a comfortable TV room and a reasonably priced restaurant with an outdoor patio. What you get for your money is great -- breakfast is included, WiFi is extremely fast. The obvious downside is that it is very far from the city center -- though that makes it easier to visit other sites like the Giraffe Center, Elephant Orphanage, and Nairobi National Park

name: Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club
overview: This hotel is also a large time-share complex, so rooms include kitchen, two baths and living area.  The property has several pools, is located on Poipu Beach, and provides amenities such as wireless internet access, fitness room, and beachfront bar/snack shop.  There is no restaurant.  The property is busy and popular with families, so those seeking a quieter getaway might choose to look elsewhere.

name: Courtyard Hartford Windsor
overview: Located right off Interstate 91 in the suburbs of Hartford.

name: Hanza Hotel
overview: 3 star hotel in Riga center.

name: Lusy's Home Guest House
overview: TV, hot shower, fan and a water bottle.

name: Laurel Creek RV Park
overview: This campground offers 16 full hook up campsites for rent.  The campground is open year round and offers daily, weekly, and monthly rates.

name: Leinmach Guest House
overview: Markets itself as a quieter alternative to a hotel. Rooms have Wi-Fi and tv, and rates include breakfast. They have a pool and are located next to a golf club. Restaurant with Swahili and Chinese specialties.

name: Alexander House Boutique Hotel
overview: A 4 star hotel close to the Mariinsky (Kirov) Theatre. Designer interiors and a homey atmosphere, 19 rooms, individually furnished and designed.

name: Arizona Hotel
overview: This 3-star hotel is in a renovated villa from the 18th century.

name: Awarradam Jungle Lodge & Spa
overview: Awarradam is a small island in the Gran River. The resort is setup by the government and managed by METS. It had 14 cottages for 2 or 3 persons. All have a terrace with hammocks overlooking the river. Transport, food, drinks (coffee, tea and juices) and guided tours are included. Most employees are local people and live in the employee-village across the river. The organization is set to receive groups. If cottages are vacant individual travelers are welcome.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Los Angeles Westside
overview: Opened April 2008, this hotel features 260 spacious rooms and suites in addition to 10,000 square feet of flexible meeting space and a full catering department.

name: Saba Rock Resort
overview: A resort sitting on its own little island near Bitter End Yacht Club.

name: Quartzsite Yacht Club Motel
overview: Free wi-fi. Has a bar and restaurant onsite.

name: baxpax downtown Hostel Berlin
overview: Hip, stylish cross between Youth Hostel and Hotel with a mixture of top level service and multi-cultural and cozy atmosphere. They have a nice bar, a roof top terrace with a pool and free wifi.

name: The Grand Hotel Sitea
overview: Within easy walking distance of the Piazza San Carlo. Decent restaurant, unfailingly polite and helpful staff. Rooms well appointed, and well serviced.

name: Nanohana Lodge
overview: Clean and well-managed, just off Lakeside Rd (Baidam Rd).

name: The Park Hotel
overview: The unassuming exterior hides an elegant and homely interior with stylish Indian features.

name: Ramada Vilnius
overview: 55-room hotel. Wi-fi in the lobby but not in the rooms.

name: Varosi 4 seasons Hotel
overview: Varosi 4 seasons is a new, charming hotel, build with the local architectural style of the 1900's, with stone and wood. Varosi 4 seasons is located in Varosi, the old neighbourhood of Edessa, just a few steps from the impressive waterfalls, overlooking the plains of Pella.

name: The Roof of Bamiyan Hotel
overview: Sits above the town to the south-west and offers fantastic views over the Bamiyan valley. Good if you have your own transport, otherwise it's a long walk up the hill. The manager, an Afghan veteran of the hippie trail, can organize reliable vehicle hire and the like. Popular with NGO workers and journalists.  It definitely has the best view of all the hotels in Bamiyan, but the rooms are dirty and they do not maintain the rooms very well. They advertise hot water, but it's available only about half the time and you need to take quick showers because it runs out fast. Also, it is difficult to get to town since it's on top of a hill. If you want to eat at the hotel, the prices are set and are expensive. 500 Afs for lunch, 500 Afs for dinner. Paying 500 Afs for local food is extremely expensive. Even with all these faults, if you want great views, there isn't a better place than the Roof of Bamiyan.

name: Classique Lodge Motel
overview: 5 minutes to Westfield Riccarton Shopping Mall.

name: Trudeau Park
overview: Campground. Event and banquet centre, ten room + three suite inn overlooking Stoco Lake.

name: Hotel Garni Palatin
overview: Very nice place to stay, it is ideal if you take a mineral water drinking course, because the range from this hotel to the closest spring is roughly 20 meters. The hotel is modern furnished, and despite being given only 3 stars looks like a typical four stars hotel. The only disadvantage is absence of a restaurant (breakfast is possible though).

name: Pitlochry Youth Hostel
overview: Great 62 bed hostel near the town centre in a fine stone mansion.

name: Jefferson Inn and Suites
overview: Free high speed internet available. Microwave and refrigerators in room.

name: Mae Hong Son Guest House
overview: Rooms are basic, but clean and staff are very friendly. Free Wi-Fi. Good restaurant & bar, bicycle/motorbike rental, laundry service (40 baht/kg), and tour service.

name: Le Bas Manoir
overview: High quality B&B with two rooms. Ensuite bathrooms, Free WiFi,access to garden, deliciuos breakfast. 18th century estate.

name: Giant Guest House 1 & 2
overview: '''Two'''(!) guest houses. Cheap basic rooms, hot showers, free Wi-Fi, free shared computer, free bicycles, free water, reggae bar attached (Freedom Bar 16:00-24:00). Can book everything here and sightsee by bicycle. Kitchen with cooking lessons available and massage school 200 m away. Watch out for the 300 baht room "switch" after they pick you up in the airport. They will give you this price in front of the guesthouse.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Positioned halfway up a hill, with a great view on the east side and nothing but trees and dirt on the west. The facilities are starting to show some signs of age, and the staff is occasionally inattentive, but breakfast is slightly better than at the Best Western. Free continental breakfast bar, incl. waffles; heated indoor pool; exercise machines; whirlpool rooms avail.

name: Dalsbruks camping
overview: Tents and caravans. Limited service. Nature trails nearby.

name: Druzhba
overview: 164 beds, 72 rooms

name: Hotel MABI
overview: Just off the market place, must be owned by a group of dentists. Little jars of sweets are everywhere in the public spaces.

name: Luna & Simone Hotel
overview: Small yet comfortable hotel with friendly staff.

name: Hotelissimo Haberstock Swiss Quality Hotel
overview: The hotel was completely renovated in 2003 and is located 200m from Munich Central Station and 300m from the city center.

name: The Resort Hotel
address: 11, Madh-Marve Road, Aksa Beach, Malad (West), Mumbai - 400 095
overview: Five star hotel, located close to Aksa beach. +phones= +91-22-2844 5538, +91-22-2844 5260, +91-22-2844 5318

name: Ulfsunda Slott
overview: A palace in a waterfront park, where each room is unique.

name: Ledson Hotel
overview: Classy inn located on the Plaza with six rooms. Whirlpool tubs in each room and private balconies. Ledson is owned by a wine country family - you can taste the families wines in the tasting room and restaurant on the ground floor. Free internet, and discounts for wine club members on rooms.

name: Marken Gjestehus
overview: A 73-bed hostel located close to the railway station. Lockable closets in all rooms. No mixed sex dormitories. Breakfast not included. Reception: May–Sep: 09:00–23:00, Oct–Apr: 09:30–16:30.

name: Geufron Hall B&B
overview: Geufron Hall is a five-star contemporary country house B&B situated high above Llangollen, nestling in the shadow of Castell Dinas Bran. There are four ensuite bedrooms offering free internet access, a sitting room, dining room and the use of the paved terraces and access to the extensive gardens. Geufron Hall has been featured in Tatler, Country Living, The Week, and many other regional and national magazines and newspapers.

name: Davlyn B&B
overview: Wi-Fi.

name: Fuzhou Lakeside Hotel
overview: Ask for a room with view of West Lake. This was Fuzhou's first five star hotel, now past its prime. Still a lovely location, though.

name: Khaosan Kyoto Guesthouse
overview: Opened November 2010. Staff are very friendly and they provide heaps of local information. No curfew, free (but somewhat slow) Wi-Fi access, free tea and coffee available at Japanese style living room.

name: Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel & Spa
overview: Nicely designed with hand-carved fretwork.

name: Hotel Rio Perlas
overview: Five-star resort in Orosi valley.

name: Best Western Plus Barclay Hotel
overview: fitness facility, steam bath, hot tub, heated pool, King Suite, Honeymoon Suite.

name: The Bulls Head
overview: Public House, Restaurant & Guest House. Mobile: +44 7876 744061. Restaurant and bar. Tel: +44 1457 853291.

name: Näsby slott
overview: In Täby, a 17th century manor, rebuilt in 1902.

name: Woonhotel Eindhoven
overview: Although prices tend to lie just over €250 per week for a standard double, this is one of the few places where you have a kitchen at your disposal, allowing budget travelers to self-cater. This place has a few different locations in the city, but the main one is on the Leenderweg. Other locations are Boschdijk 167 and Hastelweg 8. Expect simple rooms and limited service. Prices exclude a €100 bail.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Antwerpen
overview: Some rooms feature Nespresso machines. The heated pool and fitness centre at the Radisson Blu Astrid, 100 metres away, can be used free of charge.

name: Green Hectares Bed & Breakfast
overview: Working cattle ranch and B&B.  Luxury rooms with ensuite bathrooms in  "Red Barn" or rooms in the Ranch house with shared bathrooms.  Full hot ranch breakfast with fruit salad and homemade jellies and honey.

name: Bumi Langkawi Homestay
overview: 15 min drive from jetty at Kuah. The homestay has 4 rooms, 2 bathrooms and kitchen complete with electric appliances such as TV with Astro, refrigerator, washing machine, and water heater. Air-con and fan and provides blankets and towels. This homestay is spacious and suitable for a large group vacation trip (max 15 person including children; additional charges will apply for extra blankets, towels and pillows).

name: Grand China Hotel
overview: The hotel seems a bit dated at first, but its location, good service and breakfast definitely make up for it. Also, the rooms have a nice view over the city and are spotlessly clean. To top it up, there's a panoramic rotating restaurant at the top floor that is really worth it.

name: Romai Camping
overview: Place for 1,500 tents and caravans. Cold-hot water, electricity, car parking and taxes are included. Free children under age of 3. Pets are free, Free WIFI.

name: Biscuit Palace
overview: Gay-friendly bed and breakfast in the center of the Quarter.

name: Esterházy Open Air School
overview: Three rooms. Mostly for small school group.

name: Comfort Hotel Holberg
overview: A little bit outside the center of downtown, but still no more than a few minutes walk from the fish market, this hotel is probably one of the lesser known accommodation options in Bergen. The hotel is quite new and modern. With facilities in the typical mid-range class, it might however be a bit pricey compared to its competitors. About kr 1500 per night for a standard double room.

name: Riad Verus Dorm
address: Derb Arset Bennis, Douh, Batha, Fes Medina
overview: Single sex dorm rooms in a beautiful Riad. Includes hot showers, fresh linen and soft towels, free Wifi, AC and heating, flat screen TVs. Large breakfasts, plenty of chill out spaces, large terrace with incredible views over the Medina, night club, VIP pod, fun lively atmosphere, sheisha pipes, cooking classes, yoga. Quote Wikivoyage in your reservation for a 10% discount. English, Spanish and French spoken.

name: Nail Bay Resort
overview: With its remote location, Nail Bay is perhaps the most private of the resorts.  Apartments and villas are scattered over 148 acres.

name: Swan Hotel
overview: Near Icheri Sheher Metro station.

name: Garfield Suites Hotel
overview: All-Suites hotel features large rooms with full kitchens, many with balconies offering a great view of the city.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Solna
overview: The Park Inn Solna is part of the Solna Centrum and thus directly on the blue line of the T-bana. The difference between the Standard and Superior rooms is pronounced - the former are only 15 sqm and fitted out as simply as possible, while the Superior rooms are 25 sqm and quite modern and elegant as you would expect of a Park Inn.

name: A Beary Good Hostel
overview: An airy hostel in a renovated shophouse.

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Regina
overview: About €100 per night for a double room with bath and breakfast.

name: Ecotel Vilnius
overview: 168 room hotel that occupies a former shoe factory. 10 minute walk to everything. Popular among sports groups as it is right near the stadium. Extra long beds for tall people.

name: Villa Fontana
overview: 9 rooms – all with air conditioning, SAT television and private bathrooms.

name: Shangri-La Hotel
overview: By far the nicest hotel in town with good service and facilities, far cheaper than other Shangri La's and offers big discounts most of the year except for the ice festival.

name: Chateau Rhianfa
overview: Panoramic views over the Menai Straits, Château Rhianfa is set in a Grade II listed Victorian villa.

name: Casablanca Bed and Breakfast
