overview: Family run bed and breakfast located right on Duval Street just steps away from Old Town. Swimming pool and restaurant/bar located on the premises.  Each room has its own private porch and private bathroom.  Family friendly.

name: Park near Umeda Station
overview: Big, quiet, no toilet, no rest hut. This one is located near Umeda Station (around 20 min walk), so it's a good spot if you are in northern Osaka. It's a bit far if you want to go to America-mura or Dotonburi Canal though.

name: Tourist hotel "Rosava"
overview: Two star.

name: Finca Sommerwind
overview: Great place outside of town. Nice facilities, wonderful hot showers.

name: Abbey Hotel
overview: Budget hotel close to the BBC Television Centre. Discounts for long stays.

name: Hotel Malta
overview: Open daily. This recently renovated hotel offers a restaurant, nightclub and English-style bar.

name: Premier Inn Birmingham City Centre (New Street)
overview: There is no shortage of Premier Inns in Birmingham. This one is next to the New Street railway station.

name: Bosön
overview: Hotel and hostel in an athletic environment.

name: Pagoda Guesthouse & Cafe
overview: Offers a rooftop restaurant; Wi-Fi

name: Best Western University Inn
overview: County Seat Restaurant & Lounge[http://www.countyseatrestaurantandlounge.com], golf course, wi-fi, indoor pool, banquet and meeting facilities for 250. 99 rooms. Fax: +1 315/386-1025, checkout 11AM , check-in 3PM.

name: Alfa Art Hotel
overview: All 42 rooms are equipped with telephone, TV, mini bar, Internet-access, safety-box and bathroom. +phone=+36 1 453-0060.

name: Hilton Antwerp
overview: The Hilton is located in a 1885 listed building that was originally the ''Grand Bazar du Bon Marché'' department store. The hotel has a restaurant and a rootfop cafe overlooking the ''Groenplaats''.

name: Starlight Restaurant and Villas
overview: On the beach near the centre of Lovina, opened in 2011. Cottages with double bed, large wardrobe with shelves, tea and coffee making ingredients, a small refrigerator and flatscreen TV with sat channels. Cottages have safes, air-con, fan and a mosquito net, high-quality modern sanitary facilities and walk-in showers with extra large shower heads. 4 person cottages have a second, twin-bedded room. The restaurant has an open kitchen, beachside dining and life acoustic music. Depending on the weather you may be able to sit on the beach with a bonfire or at one of the outdoor areas. Sometimes it is possible to spot dolphins from the beach or the restaurant. Free internet for guests.

name: Kharaa Hotel
address: New Darkhan, south of cultural center
overview: All rooms have bathrooms, TV, and WiFi internet. Breakfast included.

name: Wild Cow Springs Campground
overview: This campground is managed by the Bureau of Land Management. No drinking water, grills and picnic tables, vault toilets, trailers under 22'.

name: NH Ciudad de Valladolid
overview: Close to shopping.

name: Jolly Ville Luxor Resort
address: 4km from Luxor/East and a free shuttle bus/boat service
overview: A nice comfortable hotel with 332 rooms & suites. All the rooms are bungalow style, with satellite TVs, direct dial telephones, mini-fridge, private baths with showers and bath and individually controlled air conditioning. There are also terraces which usually face large garden areas and sometimes unusual for Egypt, non-smoking rooms. Recreational activities include an outdoor swimming pool, four tennis courts with flood-lighting, a jogging track, soccer field, table tennis, bicycles, a billiards room, volleyball courts, gymnastics, massages and felucca sailing. The main restaurant is good for breakfast but the dinner Buffet is expensive.

name: Blue Hotel
overview: With view of the archipelago, and a Turkish hamam spa.

name: Sarawan Hotel
overview: Good central location in Saddar town. Rooms are large and the whole is solidly reliable if lacking some charm and beauty but overall a decent choice, all in all.

name: Merchants House Hotel
overview: 31 rooms and six suites. The hotel is a small complex of 14th and 16th century buildings with rooms all looking in on the central courtyard. The historic buildings contrasts nicely with the luxurious designer interiors of the rooms.

name: Hotel Liberté
address: off Ave de Mopti, north of the centre
overview: The rooms here have no mosquito nets and no grilling on the windows.

name: Atrium Hotel
overview: This business-class hotel is centrally located, easily found while driving, and newly built. Rooms are comfortable, 4 stars are claimed, at least 3 stars are really delivered. Free wi-fi in rooms and lobby.

name: Scandic Espoo
overview: A newly renovated chain hotel next to freeway 1, best suited for those traveling by car as there isn't very much to see within walking distance.

name: Maharshi Niwas
overview: 10 AC double-bedded cottages

name: Fort Boonesborough
overview: A campground located at the state park and on the banks of the Kentucky River. Features 167 campsites with electric and water hookups, shower houses, laundry facilities and a grocery. The campground is open year round. Reservations may be made through the website up to one year in advance.

name: Bed 'n Roses
overview: Offers quality accommodation, mid prices.

name: Perkūno Namai Hotel
overview: The hotel was the first private hotel in Kaunas. It is in a residential district named Žaliakalnis adjacent to the old oak forest. Hotel offers 29 modern rooms.

name: Business Center Hotel
overview: A new 4-star hotel, located in the center of the city.

name: Lucky D's Hostel
overview: Fun hostel in San Diego's trendy East Village. The hostel offers free breakfast, free dinners, free internet, free house phone, free pub crawl and free use of linens and towels. They also run a weekly tour to Tijuana.

name: Casa Bertha
overview: Free kitchen, terrace and wireless internet use.

name: Bed & Breakfast Oracabessa
overview: Small and friendly guest house with a private beach where, in season, guests can watch the turtles nesting or hatching.

name: The Chinggis Khaan Hotel
overview: Free high speed internet is very reliable. Rooms are spacious and "wannabe luxurious". The best feature was the breakfast that was included in the price of the room.

name: Parkhotel Krems
overview: A three-star hotel, free wi-fi available in most rooms.

name: Euroglobe
overview: A budget hotel, which seems more like a hostel with shared bathrooms, a TV room and a simple kitchenette on one of the floors. It is pretty outdated, but at least this is reflected in the prices.

name: Hotel Grand Chancellor
overview: A waterfront hotel situated along Sullivan's Cove with 244 rooms that are modern and clean. Facilities include a bar, heated pool, fitness centre and sauna. This hotel can be busy during exhibitions and conferences in the connecting Federation Concert Hall, which is also home to the Tasmanian Symphony Orchestra.

name: Summer Hostel Academica
overview: Summer hostel in the heart of Helsinki. ''Open June–August only''.

name: Riders Corner
overview: De facto motorcyclist headquarters in Chiang Mai. Clean and comfortable. Full restaurant and bar. Five rooms and frequently fully booked. Free Wi-Fi. Secure parking for motorcycles. English owner is helpful and free with information. Sells great maps of north Thailand.

name: YMCA International Hotel
overview: 88 rooms and dormitory. Restaurant, swimming pool, coffee shop, massage.

name: Hotel "Valencia" (temporarily closed in 2014 for renovation)
overview: Very decent hotel. Conveniently located, friendly staff, good value for the money.

name: Viva La Vida Hostel
overview: 1 minute from the beach, just opened in April 2009, they have free Internet both WiFi and a public computer and a massive TV with cable. right in the heart of the city and they have a Beautiful terrace where you can have a beer and watch the sun set. the staff its very friendly and the food its good & clean they always have an option for vegetarians. If you want a more community experience, choose Oasis. The security lockers here are very small.

name: Kube Hotel
overview: Stylish and atmospheric, the Kube Hotel exudes a high tech and luxurious decor. All the rooms come equipped with individual air conditioning, digital door opening, multi-function computer (DVD, CD, TV screen), cable TV, ADSL Internet, strongbox, mini bar, and fully equipped bathroom. As its name might suggest, the rooms feature some sort of cubism design and even the bedside tables look like ice cubes. Go out at night in your very own hotel, with a DJ spinning in the bar nightly, as well as being Paris's first-ever ice bar.

name: Best Western Inn & Suites at the Commons
overview: Beautiful hotel with spacious extended stay suites.

name: Renaissance Barcelona
overview: Situtated in a rather nondescript building one block away from Passeig de Gracia, the Renaissance offers contemporary style typical for the chain - except for guest bathrooms, who seem to have evaded renovation.

name: Lee's Ford Resort Marina
overview: A full service marina featuring a restaurant and cottage rentals. There are 17 cabins available featuring full kitchens and ranging from 1 to 4 bedrooms.

name: InterContinental Hotel
overview: A translucent cool-blue tower that doubles as a city landmark.

name: The Sebastian - Vail
overview: A recently built hotel and private residence club. Formerly the Vail Plaza Hotel, this hotel's amenities include flat screen HDLCD TV with premium channels, iPod/iPad docking station, DVD/Blu-Ray players, a mini refrigerator, individually controlled HVAC and high speed wireless internet access. On-site are a spa and three restaurants.

name: Kannur Beach House
overview: An inspiring seafront home stay in a clean, sandy beach village. For relaxation and good local food.

name: Hotel Inarin Kultahovi
overview: With a riverfront sauna.

name: Castle Stahleck Youth Hostel
overview: a great experience.

name: Hotel Ortadoğu
overview: Carpet floor rooms with en-suite bathrooms, TV. Next door to convenience store, very close to bus stops. Staff were helpful, spoke some English.

name: TBILOTEL
overview: a High Class Business and Leisure Hotel. offers 18 very comfortable room, standard and semi-suites, with balconies, Free Wi-Fi Internet, satellite TV and international phone.

name: Giraffe Executive Inn
overview: Decent and clean hotel right next to the bus station. Rooms are small, but with attached bathroom. Probably best what you can get in the whole country for this price.

name: Petite Auberge
overview: A French provincial style inn. Cozy parlor with fireplace, afternoon wine and hors d'oeuvres. Many of the 26 guestrooms offer fireplaces. Breakfast buffet each morning.

name: Le Farakaba Campement Touristique
overview: This locally-owned campement is known for its hospitable environment and reasonable pricing. Iba and Awa have created a welcoming spot with pleasant rooms and tasty food.

name: Budapest Hotel***
overview: 280 air-con rooms and 9 suites. WiFi.

name: Izymrud
overview: Three star 614753

name: Grand Sahid Jaya
overview: A local luxury hotel chain, decent facilities for the rate.

name: Columns Hotel
overview: Small elegant hotel in a Victorian mansion. Also has a great bar and live music downstairs.

name: Hotel Panoráma
overview: Sauna, solarium, massage and salt chamber are available. The restaurant has 120 seats, with home-cooked Hungarian and international dishes. The lobby has a cozy drink bar

name: Soul Kitchen hostel
overview: 2 min from metro, free breakfast, free laundry, free WiFi, free international calls, big kitchen, fridge, microwave, activities. Visa Support RUB1000

name: Kirtipur Hillside Hotel
overview: large rooms, some with views toward the mountains; restaurant.

name: Osh- Nuru Hotel
overview: A big former Soviet hotel with partly renovated rooms, but also great budget offers in old-fashioned twin rooms (from €19 per room). The staff speaks English and there is a nice pool and bar. Wi-fi is available in the rooms. Check the latest offers online.

name: Kotoni Bed&Breakfast
overview: The first Guest House in Gjirokastra, since 1992, comes up with more traditional rooms and a characteristic restaurant. Each room has coloured satellite Tv, bathroom, heating. Located 200 meters far from the old bazaar, you can have a great view of the old and new part of the town. -  +phone=+355 69 23 66 846

name: Hampton Inn Charleston Historic District
overview: Features antebellum decor in a restored warehouse with original hardwood floors. Complimentary hot breakfast and high speed wireless internet connection.

name: Locomotive light hostel
overview: No curfew, no lockout, Free internet - terminal and wifi, Free breakfast drinks, Kitchen. Cycle rental available (near the hostel)

name: Imperial Resort Beach Hotel
overview: You'll either loathe or love this massive and architecturally distinctive building very different in scale and style to the other buildings in Entebbe. The wavey frontage and electric blue cladding leave few people neutral. Inside, there is a large atrium with glass fronted lifts at each end. Like most of Uganda, service is slow and rather hit and miss. Its 181 rooms spread over four floors are large and furnished in an Arab potentate style with good views over Lake Victoria and the extensive grounds but have poorly functioning, central air-conditioning. If you open the windows that have no screens to cool off, the lakeside location means your room will then quickly become an entomologist's delight after dark.<br />Business people will appreciate the Ziba conference centre with its 1000 seat capacity equipped with six hi-tech screens descending from every corner of the ceiling, with a follow-on camera and a cordless digital sound system remotely controlled. There's a state-of-the-art simultaneous translation system. In addition to the Ziba, this hotel has nine other conference halls each with a seating capacity of 10-250 people. There's also an amphitheatre with a Dolby Digital Pro-Logic surround soundsystem.<br />However, first impressions count and the loose guard rail in the lift and dribbling shower in the changing rooms rather set the tone. Try your [[Bargaining|haggling]] skills and you may end up with a bargain in this often empty hotel.

name: Four Seasons
overview: Conveniently located at the corner of Menteng, at the Kuningan business area. Grand rooms with scenic views of Jakarta's office towers. A chic steakhouse or a roundtable Chinese restaurant for a dining option, many lounges for a snack or drink — The Bar hosts a tango, slow rock or jazz night once a week each.

name: Albergue Aonikenk
overview: Free internet access and breakfast are included. Great view of the bay from the dining room/kitchen/living room.

name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Orion
overview: Fitness Center. High Speed Internet Wi-Fi. 67 beds, 30 rooms

name: House of Colors
overview: Not quite your ordinary apartment rentals; in a 19th-century house situated in a quiet neighbourhood. Features 3, nice, colorful (as the name might give away) one bedroom apartments with full kitchen, dining table and a small living room. Also has a lovely little garden with tables and free use of old but serviceable bicycles.

name: Fernow Cabin
overview: A retired US Forest Service Fire Guard Station, this 3-BR log cabin housed fire fighters in the summer. The cabin can sleep up to 8 people, and is furnished with bunks, stove, and pots and pans, and vault toilet. Campers must bring their own bedding supplies. Open April 15 - November 15 (weather-dependent), water available from May 16 - October 16. Reservations can be made online.

name: Hotel Angamos
overview: Small hotel with clean and tidy rooms, double beds and hot water on demand. If there is none, you simply ask the owners to turn it on. Family run business and you can turn up to at any time of day/night. Close to the centre and safe. There is no hotel sign, just ring the bell.

name: Rock Canyon Campground
overview: Isolated public campground up Rock Canyon (between Squaw Peak and Y Mountain). Access road is only partially paved; used 4-wheel drive. No water. Vault toilets. Gate closes at 10PM. Excellent access to rock climbing and hiking.

name: Enchantment Resort
overview: Pricey, but very nice.

name: NH Frankfurt City
overview: A typical example of the NH chain in Germany, with ''gemuetlich'' interior fixtures and subdued yet clashing colours that perhaps only Germans find appealing. Large windows with an openable section, good breakfast as always from NH and a location close to the old town.

name: Alex Men Lodging
overview: The guesthouse is a villa in traditional Vietnamese-style, private rooms with Asian ambience.

name: Hotel Victor
overview: Inexpensive 3-star hotel in the Quarto Miglio area. Convenient for exploring the Appian archeological zone but infrequent bus services needed to reach downtown. Parking available.

name: Astra Hotel
overview: Don't expect any views, but beyond that, standard rooms are charming. Furniture is bit old-style but quite simple and fully functional. Bathroom equipment is more or less up-to-date, but not more than that.

name: Marriott Union Square
overview: A trendy San Francisco boutique hotel. Formerly the Hotel 480, this hotel has been completely renovated to become a Marriott.

name: The Vine Retreat
overview: Ecologically conscientious guesthouse, organic farm and restaurant at the foot of a small range of jungle entrenched mountains called Phnom Vor. Famous Kampot Pepper plantation and a unique naturally filtered swimming pool. Remote, tranquil and beautiful. Good base for trekking and mountain biking or just relaxing.

name: ibis Budget Dresden City
overview: This ibis Budget is located in the Altmarkt-Gallerie shopping centre. It is appointed according to the brand's newest standards, with rooms featuring an extra third bunk bed available. Rooms are very basic, with the shower accessible directly from the room and the sink / vanity right in the room.

name: Saitsijoki lean-to shelter
overview: There is probably a ford at the shelter. A path follows Saitsijoki westwards to Saitsijärvet.

name: Erebuni Hotel
overview: a good choice in terms of price and accommodations.

name: Ramada Frankfurt Messe
overview: Slightly older but well-maintained hotel located near the Messe exhibition centre, but far from anything else. Pool and gym. Free shuttle ''from'' the airport, but €7 for the return trip.

name: The Resort at Isla palenque
overview: The Resort at Isla Palenque opened in 2013. As of 2014 it has 10 rooms available, as well as two restaurants and bars, and plans to begin construction on vacation homes in 2014. The ten rooms are spread over the island along with two restaurants and bars, a spa, a 200 acre nature preserve, 12 beaches, and miles of hiking trails. The resort is well regarded for its attentive and highly personalized service.

name: Mandarin Oriental Prague
overview: Part of the Mandarin Oriental chain. Very expensive.

name: JNN Hostel
overview: TV and kitchen.

name: Holiday Inn
overview: Rooms comes with fridge, microwave and flat screen TVs, while some suites have kitchenettes. The hotel includes free high-speed internet, indoor pool, sauna and fitness facility.

name: Lane Xang Hotel
overview: A majestic old hotel from decades ago, built 1960. It is one of the oldest hotels in Vientiane. Boasted the first elevator in the country. The charm of past glory, see the bathroom fittings. Hunter S. Thompson wrote dispatches from here after scrambling out of Saigon as it fell. They claim that English, French, Japanese, Thai, Russian, Vietnamese and Lao are spoken. The restaurant has traditional Lao music and dance performances every evening from about 19:00, which you watch while eating your dinner of (recommended) Lao food. Get there early to secure a table with a good view of the stage

name: Hotel Banjisht
overview: Banjishte Hotel and Spa is the perfect place for accommodation in Debar. It is located 880 m above the see level. If you adore the nature and the clean mountain air, you've got to visit this hotel.

name: Beau Fleuve Bed & Breakfast Inn
overview: Legend has it that the city of Buffalo owes its name to French explorer Louis Hennepin, who, when he passed by the mouth of the Buffalo River in 1679 on his ship ''Le Griffon'', exclaimed joyously about the "beau fleuve" (beautiful river) that lay before him. The Beau Fleuve Bed & Breakfast Inn has operated since 1990 in the former '''Albert J. Wright House''' on Linwood Avenue. The themes of the Beau Fleuve's five guest rooms were chosen in honor of the immigrant communities who populated Buffalo over the course of the 19th century and fueled its industrial might—French, Irish, German, Italian, and Polish people predominant among them. The Beau Fleuve offers its guests central AC, minibars, coffeemakers, and other amenities in their impeccably decorated and luxuriously appointed rooms. Large, sumptuous breakfasts are served daily in an upscale atmosphere in the American Indian-themed dining room. On-site or on-street parking.

name: Friendly Fun Franks Hostel
overview: The biggest party hostel in Riga. Australian/British/Latvian owned. Popular with Brits in Riga for stag parties, so expect a lot of guys who want to party.

name: La Reserve Hotel Chelsea
overview: Small hotel offering 43 en-suite bedrooms in the extreme south-east of the district bordering Chelsea. The hotel overlooks Chelsea Football Club.

name: Best Western Sonoma Valley Inn
overview: A locally owned and operated Best Western. A few blocks from Sonoma Plaza, this hotel is pet friendly and has a pool, jacuzzi rooms and free breakfast. Free wifi and laundry facilities you can use. Expensive for a Best Western - but not your typical, either.

name: Marigny Manor House
overview: Step back in time and enjoy Southern Hospitality at it's best in this 1840's Grand Greek Revival Home just 5 blocks from the French Quarter and Riverside streetcar.

name: Tybee Cottages
overview: Makes a handful of some of the finest properties on the Island available to your family. Most accommodations are right on the beach. Each property is furnished with all of the conveniences of home, just bring your favorite beach chair and swimsuit.

name: Over The Rainbow
overview: Vegetarian guest house, 3 miles from Cardigan bay coastline (Aberporth and Tresaith).  Quite secluded guest house, a restored georgian mansion nestled in 18 acres of garden and woodlands.

name: Housekeeping Camp
overview: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|15px|frameless]] Despite its name, Housekeeping Camp (located near Curry Village) offers 266 sturdy tents for visitor lodging.  The "tents" have a concrete floor, three concrete walls, canvas tops, and sleep six in bunk beds and double beds.  Linen is not provided but may be rented for $2.50 per night. Open during the summer season only.  Housekeeping Camp is the only lodging in the Valley that allows for a fire and cooking.

name: NIPS Serviced Apartments
address: EC 98, Sector I, Salt Lake City
overview: Geared to meet the demands of IT sector employees for short or long stays

name: Airport Christchurch Motel
overview: 4 minutes drive to the airport, but not on any flight path.

name: Pension Romania
overview: Spacious rooms.

name: Diana Pansion and Restaurant
overview: Breakfast included.

name: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort
address: Avda. P. Vaquer Ramis, s/n Magalluf - Majorca 07181 Spain
overview: Three star hotel that is being upgraded. Has five rooms with access for disabled holidaymakers.

name: Creekside Lands Inn
overview: Rooms located along the peaceful Long Branch Creek, a tidal saltwater creek, teeming with shrimp and fish. Features include a private dock reaching into the creek, outdoor pool with barbecue grill, complimentary continental breakfast and free Wi-Fi for guests.

name: Park Hotel
overview: Only  four-star hotel in the city. 36 rooms

name: Sentrim Castle Royal Hotel
overview: 68 singles, doubles, triples. Conference room, casino and restaurant in the hotel.

name: Park Inn by Radisson
overview: Tallest hotel in Downtown Toledo with sweeping river views and Fifth Third Field - Home of the Toledo Mud Hens

name: Hotel Veenus International
overview: Rooms: 25.

name: Inverness Youth Hostel
overview: Victoria Drive, A modern 4 star hostel with excellent facilities. Some small rooms en-suite, internet, laundry. £10.75-13.50/5.00-12.00 (adult/child). Open all year.

name: Temple View
address: Golden Temple Road, Atta Mandi, Katra Ahluwalia
overview: A small two star hotel with eight rooms. Services:  free parking space,  24-hrs room service,   Free Internet access (wi-fi),  Travel assistance, Laundry, Doctor on call, Guide Assistance, Payment by all credit/debit card, Hotel transfer

name: Mere Court Hotel
overview: Hotel & Conference Centre

name: Days Inn Globe
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pool.

name: Casa Caluca
overview: Popular holiday apartment for holiday weekend, short term, and long term rent. In a quiet area with sea views over Taganga. COP40.000 per day, or COP650.000 per month.

name: Hilltop on High Street
overview: Offers en suite and B&B.

name: Hotel Garni Erber
overview: Excellent quality rooms, good breakfast.

name: Wittrup Motel
overview: Probably as close to an American style motel as you are going to find in Copenhagen, 60 rooms with their own doors facing the parking lot.For a motel the restaurant is surprisingly good.

name: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@
overview: A little run down Holiday Inn Express offers some of the cheapest hotel stays in Barcelona with breakfast included.

name: Bed & Breakfast Bravo!
overview: On the 9th floor of a residential building. Price includes a hot breakfast in the morning and high speed Wi-Fi.  The safety of all guests is the highest priority, and staff is on duty 24 hours a day every day.  All rooms are non-smoking and alcohol is not allowed on the premises.  Food and snack items are available at any time.  Laundry and ironing service is available on site.

name: Cosmopolitan
overview: The resort's uniquely vertical multi-tower design offers spectacular views of the city. The new 2,995-room resort features residential-style living spaces with expansive private terraces.

name: Attic 12 - Bed&Breakfast
overview: At 12th attic floor rooms have air conditioning, central heating, circular bath, LCD TV satellite and wi-fi. Panoramic "Solarium" with sun loungers and barbecue.

name: Amari Watergate
overview: Modern four-star hotel with all the facilities you'd expect, including a few restaurants good enough to attract non-guests, especially the American-style Henry J. Beans Bar and Grill. It's a stone's throw from Pratunam, across the Saen Saep Canal if you're walking from Ratchaprasong.

name: Campus hotel
overview: hostel

name: The Brumder Mansion
overview: On the Westside next to Downtown in the Bed and Breakfast district.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Sanaa
overview: Large hotel with pool outside the city center. Great view and probably one of the safest hotels in Sanaa.

name: Corvin Pension
overview: Three rooms. The key is to pick at the reception desk of Hotel Corvin (from the guest house approx. 30m)

name: Tovmed Hotel
overview: Also here is a Restaurant +phone=+380 432 690208, - 19 rooms/38 beds.

name: Grand Orzu Hotel
overview: A three star hotel 50 guestrooms, including twenty one single rooms with king size beds, ten luxe rooms  and 19 double rooms with two standard beds.

name: Ruka Golden Cottage
overview: 250m2 chalet, accommodating up to 10 people. Beautiful views toward Ruka ski slopes.

name: Metro Hotel
overview: A reasonably priced hotel at the corner of Page and Divisadero Streets, one block north of Haight Street. The rooms are quite basic, but functional, clean, and quite inexpensive for the central city. There is an excellent French restaurant downstairs, with outdoor dining and weekend brunch. Rooms directly over Divisadero Street can be quite loud on the weekends.

name: Summer Hotel Härmälä
overview: Located on a lakeside location, 4 km from the city center in a residential area, near bus routes. Located next to the Härmälä camping area.

name: Golden Bay Beach Hotel
overview: Part of the Lordos Golden Hotels in Cyprus. 5 star hotel located near the town of Pyla, 10 kilometers from central Larnaca.

name: Swansea University
overview: Swansea University offers accommodation to the public during Summer and Easter holidays. They can offer a wide range of accommodation ranging from bed and breakfast non-ensuite single rooms through to self-catering apartments. They can accommodate large groups for events and conferences in the local area. Accommodation is available in Swansea University's Singleton Park campus set in beautiful parklands which is 5 minutes walk to the beach.

name: The Philadelphia House
overview: Small backpackers hostel with free wireless internet, security lockers, 24 hour reception, and laundry facilities. Dorms are either 4-bed or 8-bed and they are all mixed gender.

name: Paradise Guesthouse
address: About 1.1 km from the northern beach (ferry) on the eastern bank
overview: Owned by a sweet Lao family. Watch the sunrise and moonrise from the hammock of your Mekong River bungalow with beautifully decorated shared bathrooms with sit-down toilets,  mosquito net, fans, electric 24/7. Restaurant is open 06:00-21:00/22:00 (depending on season). Boating trips can be arranged with the family. Wi-Fi.

name: Crown Inn
overview: It's location right in the middle of the center, on the Markt, is this hotel's biggest asset. Rooms are clean but many have no outside facing windows. It can be quite noisy here, so ask for ear plugs at the reception or bring your own. On Sundays you can book a late check out (5PM) for €12.50 extra

name: The Granary at Roch Mill
overview: Self catering holiday cottage in Brandybrook valley close to Newgale Sands, Solva and St Davids . Sleeps 2-4, Sat TV, WiFi, usual appliances. Private 6-acre gardens alongside river. Ample parking. Inside Pembrokeshire Coast National Park.

name: Victoria de Malate Hotel
overview: Thematic rooms.

name: DoubleTree Suites
overview: Located a few blocks from the Minneapolis Convention Center, and just one block from Nicollet Mall.

name: Ciklámen Holiday Home and Tourist Hotel
overview: +phones=+36 94 362-892, +36 70 6118376. Seven rooms with bath. Capacity 43 pers.

name: Camping Tête d'Indien
overview: Open Jun-Sep. This little campground is located north of the town centre, behind the majestic '''Indian Head Rock''' ''(Tête d'Indien)''—hence its name—and offers a full slate of activities that takes advantage of its off-the-beaten-path location in the wide open spaces: a volleyball court, a horseshoe pit, a private beach, snorkeling, kayaking, and plenty of opportunities for wildlife spotting. As for the campsites themselves, they accommodate both trailers and tents (41 sites between them). "Primitive" tent sites are available for those in search of a more rustic experience, with fire rings, ecosan toilets, and access to common showering and laundry facilities; all the others boast fire rings, electrical and water hookups, and in some cases, private fireplaces and sewer and cable TV hookups. A choice of mountain or ocean views are available, that latter looking onto lovely '''Plate Island''' ''(Île Plate)''. Tête d'Indien's friendly staff are always on hand to help with any questions you may have about the campground itself or things to do in the area.

name: The Circus Hostel
overview: 2-Bed rooms start at €28 per person, sleeping hall starts at €19. Not to be confused with the hotel of the same name across the street.

name: Belægningen, Avedørelejren
overview: Definitively ranking among the best options in the district, this hostel is fitted into the old sleeping quarters of the soldiers stationed on the old fort the hostel is located in. Free internet terminals and cheap bike rentals.

name: Kioussi Zakynthos Villas
overview: Luxury villas with private swimming pool. Tastefully decorated and close to the famous beach of Kaminia.

name: Rhenigidale Youth Hostel
overview: A hostel run by the Gatliff Hebridean Hostels Trust in the remote village of Rhenigidale, which is 6 miles from Tarbert on foot, or 13 miles by road. The road has only been there since 1990 and the only way in used to be on foot or by boat. The hostel does not take bookings, and has no phone.

name: art'otel
overview: The trendy, modern ''art'otel'' fits the theme of the area really well, and is close to the Chocolate Museum, and the Altstadt as well. Some rooms facing the ''Rheinauhafen'' have glazed balconies "floating" over the water. Rooms are appointed in a comforting white-ish theme, there are stained glass windows between bedrooms and bathrooms, and the washbasins are to be found on a long table in your room, where you will also find a Nespresso machine.

name: The Carlyle Inn
overview: Suite accommodations.

name: Albergue Free Style
overview: The Free Style has an excellent view of the bay from their 3rd-floor common room.  The hostel is clean, new and well-maintained, with internet costing $1 per half hour, and breakfast is included. The kitchen is clean and fully stocked, with room for perishables. Dorm rooms, private rooms and private rooms with kitchenettes are available.

name: Langøyene Island
overview: Not an official campsite; however, Langøyene Island is the only island in the inner part of the Oslo fjord that allows free camping (tents only). You may only stay 2 days unless you have special permission. You must keep the island clean. Police have their own boats and enforce these laws via hefty fines.

name: Thermal Camping
overview: Hungary's first and only five star campsite. - More than two hundred plots over hundred sqm each with 16A power connector, water-, and sewage connection. -  Services: twenty eight toilets, twenty  four showers, eighteen washbasin, fourteen wash stall, one baby bath, changing table, and even two toilet and shower for handicapped guests, plus two chemical toilets, fourteen dishwashing, four suitable for textile washing basin, washing machines, dryers, irons.  - Siesta: 12.00-14.00 - Café, grill, sports ground and playground, sporting goods and bicycle rental

name: Ariston Molino Hotel Abano Terme
address: Via Augure Cornelio, 5 - 35031 Abano Terme - Padova
overview: Special free services: entrance to thermal pools, acqua gym class, bikes, attended car park, terrace table and chairs, TV, minibar, beauty kit. The hotel is downtown and close to the centre and has inner thermal pools with treatments centre.

name: London Bridge Resort
overview: On 110 beautiful waterfront acres.

name: Hotel King
overview: 4 star hotel in the centre of the city, part of the Mokinba Hotels. Good location near the Duomo and top Milanese style service.

name: Green House
overview: A simple and functional guest house with 80 rooms close to Khao San Road. Some rooms are cleaner than others, so inspect before checking in. There's a wide range of rooms, including single, double and triple rooms with either fan or air-conditioning. Beside a guest house, it is also a restaurant, travel agency and internet cafe.

name: Hunguest Hotel Platánus
overview: ***. 133 rooms (standard, apartment, superior and honeymoon suite categorirs), 284 beds. Rooms with two or three separate/double beds and shower or bathtub, Air-conditioning, direct dial telephone, minibar, SAT TV. Suite include two rooms, superb luxury bathroom and Jacuzzi. - Services: eight conference rooms, souvenir shop, fitness center, the lobby bar, private parking lot, Wifi internet

name: Hyatt Regency Montreal
overview: Attached to the Complexe Desjardins.

name: Gulnara's B&B
overview: Clean, and comfortable. Rides from the airport can be arranged for a reasonable price. Unfortunately the owner can be very rude and unfriendly sometimes.

name: Solar Club Hotel , Restaurant and Mini ABC
overview: Free private parking • Central-room safe • Phone • TV room • Kitchen • Garden, Mini Golf • Sports equipment rental • 24 hour reception. - Restaurant: Familiar restaurant and garden is suitable for 40-40 people. Meals are made exclusively Hungarian ingredients and homemade taste represented! Monday to Friday, offers a varied menu! Menu A: HUF890, Menu B: HUF990. Open: Jun-Aug 08:00-22:00, Sep-Mar 12:00-20:00. - Mini ABC: basic foods (milk, bread, rolls, packaged cold cuts, cheese, butter, mineral water, etc.) available. Open: M-F 08:00-10:00 and 16:00-18:00, Sa 08:00-10:00.

name: Haraldsheim Youth Hostel
overview: The biggest HI hostel in Oslo. Not too far from the action (but it is hard to find), walking distance to the lively neighbourhoods of Torshov and Grünerløkka. Located in a very quiet area of Oslo, this is a place you'd go to sleep, not to party. The breakfast is outstanding for a hostel and is vegan-friendly, although with reduced choice. It is advisable to reconfirm your booking before you come and inform at what time you are going to arrive although the reception is open 24 hours.

name: Cae Gwyn Farm
overview: A reasonably priced B&B near Coed-y-Brenin with four ensuite rooms which can be either double or twin rooms. Beautiful Farm 2008, Regional Winner.

name: Villa Sissy
overview: Nine rooms.

name: Armagh City Youth Hostel
overview: Modern youth hostel near the city centre.

name: Sokos Hotel Seurahuone
overview: The traditional wing of Hotel Seurahuone was built in 1956, and it was renovated in 1989 when the new wing was completed. The hotel has 80 high-quality rooms - most of them with a view over the lake. 51 of the rooms are non-smoking and a few designed especially for women.

name: Campingplatz Obermenzing
overview: Situated close to the end of autobahn A 8, the camping site has the corresponding background noise. The sanitary facilities have been renovated in 2013 and are up-to-date now.

name: Rasa Sentosa Resort
overview: Run by Shangri-La Hotels, with 459 rooms this is by far the largest hotel in Sentosa, offering a rather generic package holiday experience. The main selling point is that this is the only full-fledged beachside resort in Singapore.

name: Hotel Makanda by the Sea
address: Main Road to Manuel Antonio Park
overview: Hotel Makanda By the Sea contains 12 acres of wildlife sanctuary, 100 meters above the ocean. Villas and studios are located throughout botanical rainforest gardens with views over the sixty mile coastline.

name: Dunagiri Retreat
overview: The retreat overlooks deep rural valleys and the Himalayas. Accommodations are comprised of two lovingly restored guesthouses located within expansive gardens. [[Dunagiri]] offers stylish accommodations and delicious local cuisine.

name: Central Hostel
overview: Cosy hostel near the centre, WiFi, TV and living room.

name: Hotel Crown Palais Kobe
overview: The location near JR Kōbe station is good and internet rates can be had for around ¥10,000 a night (plus taxes).

name: Acehostel Hotel Agency
overview: . Private rooms, one corner from the walking street and second block from Danube. Small hostel and apartments surrounded by pubs and restaurants. No Luggage Storage!

name: Caravanserai
address: 10 minutes past Sde Boker you'll see the sign to the left
overview: Touristic farm with several rooms for families and small groups, and some large tents for large groups

name: Hilton Munich Park
overview: The Hilton has floor-to-ceiling picture windows showcasing a distant view of the Alps. The hotel offers 3 restaurants, a bar, an indoor pool with fitness center, and 24 hr room service. 20% early bird rebate available.

name: Pullman Aachen Quellenhof
overview: Spacious, comfortable rooms (although some could do with a little redecoration), a swimming pool, fitness area and excellent breakfast buffet.

name: Rooms Inn
overview: Basic hotel in a residential area.

name: Holmehuset bed and breakfast
overview: This bed and breakfast has two doubles with shared facilities. Small kitchen, shared living room with TV and terrace available.

name: Trecigogne
overview: Trecigogne seems to be the most popular budget option. It was fully booked when I visited, so no comment on the accommodation.

name: Hotel delle Fiere
address: Via Trieste ang. Via Piccinelli - 22076 Mozzate - Como
overview: 4-star wellness hotel in Mozzate, between Como and Milan.

name: Krabi Riviera Villa Rentals
overview: 17 villas for rent nightly/weekly with private swimming pool on Ao Nang Beach.

name: Ramada Plaza Menam Riverside
overview: This is a good, luxurious hotel with great views over the river and a friendly staff. A downer is its slightly off location, but it is right beside an express boat pier and there is a free shuttle boat to the Skytrain.

name: Carlsbad Seapointe Resort
overview: A seaside resort located adjacent to Carlsbad State Beach. Each condo has full kitchens, fireplaces and balconies with views. Two ocean view pools, lighted tennis and basketball courts, a putting green and fitness center.

name: Hôtel Brighton
overview: The executive and deluxe rooms offer a breathtaking views of the Louvre, the Jardin des Tuileries, and the Eiffel Tower. Classic Parisian-style hotel next to shopping and cultural hot spots.

name: Stanford Court Hotel
overview: Another 4-star hotel with marble baths and free limousine service.

name: Hotel Arinofy
overview: A short walk from the taxi brousse station, Arinofy is a convenient budget option. Basic rooms and meals available.  The train station is close enough to walk.

name: Grand Canyon Bed and Breakfast
overview: The closest B and B to the Grand Canyon.

name: Radisson Blu Kuwait
address: Al Bida Al Tawoun Street, Salwa
overview: This five star beachfront resort hotel is only a few minutes away from the center of Kuwait city and major shopping areas. There is a large selection of business, recreational and leisure facilities, wide range of recreational activities. There are also amazing restaurants to choose from as well as a convenient free city shuttle service. The major drawback is the raw sewage being dumped into the sea a few hundred meters away. If you have a sensitive nose, best to not stay here.

name: Hilton Prague
overview: Large modern hotel right on the bank of the Vltava close to the Old Town. Double rooms range from €155 per night for a simple guest room to €215 for an executive suite.

name: Lange Jan Hotel
overview: Right in the town centre, located on a bustling square and on top of a bar, this cosy place is a real city hotel. It can be a bit noisy, especially when you have a room on the front side. Earplugs are provided. Some rooms in this budget friendly hotel have private toilets, others shared ones. They're not very spacious, but pleasant enough. The staff is very friendly and the breakfast is good.

name: Afalina Hotel
overview: The Afalina Hotel is located near the central railway station of Khabarovsk. It is a small pleasant hotel with friendly staff. Hotel building was built in 1994, and renovated in 2008. There are 26 rooms of European style in different categories. Every room has its own design. All rooms are air-conditioned, equipped with TV, internet access, phone, safe, refrigerator, new shower units. Hotel facilities: restaurant, bar, sauna, billard room, parking lot, laundry service, pet-friendly.

name: Star Dome Inn
overview: All rooms have a private bathroom with cold water. Hot water is only available in the more expensive rooms. Internet is available for 60 baht per hour and there are laundry facilities. The inn is next to a disco/pub, so expect excessive noise in the lower floor rooms.

name: Malany Villa & bus stop
overview: This is where the mini buses stop. Therefore this is likely to be the first place to stay you will see.

name: Chester Hotel
address: General Kariba Street, near Moi Rd
overview: Clean, secure, and comfortable hotel with pleasant staff. Wireless internet in lobby, good restaurant.

name: The Wheatbaker
overview: Located in the residential heart of Ikoyi, 35 kms from MM International Airport. Owned by Legacy Hotels and Resorts, a South African hospitality chain. Members of its Legacy Lifestyle programme get a discount.

name: Quality Inn Airport
overview: This quiet hotel is less than a mile from the airport and the Marine Corp Airstation Base. Low rates for families of all budgets. Restaurant and bar on premise has live entertainment throughout the week. Handicap rooms, suites, single rooms with king beds and double rooms with queen beds, non-smoking and smoking rooms available. Pet friendly hotel. Nearby malls and golf courses.

name: Hôtel City
overview: A nice well-kept hotel at the other end of pont Bessières from the Cathedral, and thus offering some magnificent views.

name: Camping Korona
overview: Not exactly in Kraków itself, 12 km to the south from the Kraków's centre, city buses reach this location (not often though).

name: Kentucky Camp Dispersed Camping Area
overview: Dispersed camping is permitted, no drinking water onsite.

name: Mint House
overview: Really friendly and helpful staff. Centrally located, clean and good prices for dorms and rooms. Rooms have dedicated bathrooms that, strangely, are not en suite, but all across the hallway. Keep an eye out for room rates changing after you've already checked-in (e.g., +100 baht). Don't be a wimp when this happens.

name: Slavutych Hotel
overview: Economy hotel with great service. Located on the Rusanivka island.

name: Hotel Midtown Pritam
overview: This is a decently good hotel and is very close to Dadar station. - Here is the '''Pritam Da Dhaba''': a traditional Punjabi restaurant with a very warm interior ideal for a quite drink

name: Sacred Valley Inn
overview: Tourist favourite since 1998. Great location in Lakeside. Lovely airy rooms - some with balconies. Delicious breakfasts on the roof with amazing views.

name: Koryo Hotel
overview: The most luxurious hotel in the city together with Yanggakdo Hotel. Has 45 floors and over 500 rooms. Centrally located in the city centre near the train station, makes you less isolated than the Yanggakdo.

name: Hotel Tossa Beach
overview: 4 star hotel 150 metres from the beach and 200 meters from the town centre. Only all inclusive basis.

name: Jurys Inn Chelsea Hotel
overview: Affordable hotel of one of the better hotel chains. All rooms are ensuite and large by London standards.

name: Holiday Inn Munich City Centre
overview: Renovated in 2008 from top to bottom. Small indoor pool (no gym), bar, and restaurant. Directly connected to the S-Bahn via an underground pedestrian mall.

name: The Sebel Harbourside Kiama
overview: Contemporary South Coast NSW hotel offering Kiama accommodation only 90 minutes from Sydney. Kiama accommodation overlooking Kiama Harbour and walking distance to the famous Kiama blow hole.

name: Azalaï Hôtel Indépendance
overview: Surrounded by art/artifact vendors, also offers haircuts, pedicures, massages

name: Arden Street House
overview: B&B, homestay and en suite. 20 min walk to the Octagon. $45-130.

name: Peppers Awaroa Lodge
overview: Built in 1991 and located at the northern end of the park on 19 hectares of private land, the lodge offers 12 suites, 10 deluxe rooms and 4 family rooms.

name: Hotel Centra Riga
overview: The service here is spectacular, and the management has a habit of upgrading people for no extra charge. Flat-screen TVs and minibar. In a historic building.

name: Summer hotel Rentukka
overview: This is situated in the student village of Kortepohja, about 2 km from the city center.

name: Axel Hotel Guldsmeden
overview: Central hotel in traditional Balinese style with real modern art, teak beds and small balconies, informal and organic approach to doing business. Also has a small cosy courtyard garden and bar and a fantastic Balinese style spa.

name: All Nations
overview: 24-hour reception.

name: Golden Leaf Hotel Altmünchen
overview: Central yet quiet location, just a few minutes by bus from the Marienplatz, the heart of the city. Furnished in an Old-Bavarian style, it creates a warm and inviting atmosphere in each of its 32 rooms. All rooms have wifi access and cable TV, and pets are allowed in this hotel.

name: The George
overview: Luxury boutique hotel by the river Avon and Hagley Park. Two restaurants, 50 Bistro and Pescatore.

name: Lindner Hotel Kaiserhof
overview: Spacious rooms with nice and modern furnishing. The hotel has all amenities of a modern business hotel.

name: Austria Classic Hotel Wien
overview: Formerly the Hotel Nordbahn, this is a good, friendly hotel and also the birthplace of Max Steiner, perhaps the most legendary of the pioneer film composers. The hotel offers 81 non-smoking rooms, all with shower or bath and WC, hairdryer, telephone, cable-TV with flat screen, radio, safety deposit box, minibar and free of charge WLAN, a small workout gym and a business-meeting room, breakfast buffet until 11:00. Most of the rooms are facing the quiet courtyard.

name: Oh Casa Sintra
overview: This townhouse is set back from the main tourist street amidst the leafy mansions of  São Miguel.  A pocketful of rooms within walking distance from the historic center.

name: Kensington West
overview: Refurbished 2 star hotel offering 24 hour reception, wireless internet, and flat screen TVs.

name: Džajića Buk Rooms
overview: Džajića Buk Rooms is set next to Neretva River and features a private beach with sun loungers and parasols, a bar and barbecue facilities. The on-site restaurant and bar feature a terrace with views of the surrounding mountains. All rooms at Rooms Džajića Buk feature natural materials and wood-panelled walls and ceilings, as well as wooden furniture. Rooms feature a safe and a coffee maker. Guests have access to a shared bathroom with shower. The restaurant is decorated in rustic style and serves local specialties and a selection of local wines. Breakfast buffet is served each day. Football and basketball courts are located on site. Guests can park for free on site. The owners can arrange rafting excursions on Neretva River, hiking trips to Prenj Mountain, fishing and hunting trips. Excursions to Boračko Lake and Rakitnice Canyon can also be organised upon request. All guests are offered free pick up service from the bus and train station in Konjic.

name: St Christophers
overview: Part hostel, part hotel. Each room is designed by local Dutch artists.

name: Boutique Hotel Civitas
overview: 28 rooms with free high speed internet access, LCD TV, safe. Services: Drink in the room on request, deep garage (price is not included), 24 hours reception, Taxi order, Reveille service, Transfer, Program organization Payments: traveler's check, credit card, foreign currency acceptance. - Eight types halfboard menus for €11.

name: Sheraton Denver Downtown
overview: On the 16th Street Pedestrian Mall in downtown, 3 1/2 blocks from the Denver Convention Center.

name: Gîte du Cap-Blanc
overview: Situated a short drive (or a relatively easy 25-minute walk) from Percé town centre in the shadow of '''Cap-Blanc Lighthouse''', this charming ''gîte'' is the property of Paulette and Carol and their friendly cat Timinne: the most gracious hosts you could want. Here you have your choice of three rooms with a queen bed and a private bath, or two rooms with a full-size bed and shared bath. Breakfast takes place in an airy dining room with huge picture windows looking onto the sea.

name: Bástya Pansion
overview: Eleven double rooms, four four bed rooms, one five bed room. All rooms with bathroom, TV, refrigerator, free Internet WiFi. Other services: Non-stop reception, parking (car, bus, truck), central safe copying, Fax, Mail service for guests, breakfast (7:00-10:00). Airport transfer (Vienna), gratis over 5 nights. Constitution of the dentistry. +Mobile phone +36 30 4912267

name: Garh Panchakot Prakriti Bhraman Kendra
address: Situated at the foothill of Panchet Hill
overview: It is property of West Bengal Forest Development Corporation. Head Office: 6A, Raja Subodh Mullick Square, 7th Floor, Kolkata- 700013, Phones: 033-22370060/61 033-22368483/22365202. Another Kolkata office: BD Market, Salt Lake, Kolkata-700064. Phone: 033-23341756. Divisional Office: Divisional Forest Officer, Kangsabati Soil Conservation Division, PO Raghubpur – 723 101, Phone: 03252-222231.

name: Hotel Due Mondi
overview: Singles, doubles, and suites. Breakfast included.

name: White Rock Campground
address: off of Ruby Rd and I-19
overview: Located a short distance from Peña Blanca Lake, this popular campground is managed by the Coronado National Forest. RVs 22' and less, no hookups. No water, vault toilets.

name: Crossings by Grandstay Inn & Suites
overview: Complimentary Gourmet Express Breakfast, indoor pool, high-speed Internet, meeting rooms.

name: Hidden Valley Campground
overview: Hidden Valley is the first campground after the West Entrance Station.  45 sites.  There is no water available and motorhomes and vehicles longer than 25 feet are not permitted.

name: GombitHotel
overview: This design hotel is squeezed into a tall stone building. The simplicity of the design may not be to everybody's liking, especially when the design surprisingly gets in the way of practicality, and it turns out that the owners' idea of simple design is IKEA. Still, it is perhaps the most centrally-located hotel in the Citta Alta.

name: Daugirdas Hotel
overview: New business class four stars hotel and restaurant "Daugirdas" is situated in the very Old Town of Kaunas, in a restored XVI - XIX century building, 50 m from the Town Hall, in the confluence of the biggest Lithuanian rivers. 48 rooms.

name: Blue Swallow Motel
overview: While the Cozy Cone Motel is the Wigwam Motel in Holbrook AZ, its neon "100% Refrigerated Air" slogan came from the Blue Swallow, a 14-room roadside motel restored to the era of neon light, vintage furniture and dial telephones. The Blue Swallow is just one of multiple historic motels from the heyday of Route 66 which are preserved or restored on Tucumcari Blvd.

name: Simply Homy Guest House
address: Jalan Palagan Tentara Pelajar No. 21D, Sleman, Yogyakarta
overview: Simply Homy Guest House salah satu jaringan penginapan di Jogja dan Bandung yang tersebar di 22 titik strategis, berprinsip syariah dengan Sensasi Hotel Berbintang!

name: Kleopatra
overview: Four star hotel +phone=+380 3849 65684

name: Mercure Mechelen Vé
overview: A stylish hotel on one of the most ancient markets of Mechelen: the fish market. The hotel is constructed in a factory where they used to smoke fish, but has a trendy, modern feel.

name: Tiki Hut Hostal
overview: New Cabanas opposite the "Dreamer Hostal" in second row with a small but nice pool.

name: Hotel des Indes
overview: A former residence of a seventeenth century aristocrat, this über-luxury hotel opened its doors in 1881 and has been serving artists, musicians, and other celebrities ever since. It is located down the street from some of the major diplomatic missions such as the American and French embassies, and has also hosted heads of state such as Dwight Eisenhower and Jacques Chirac. Be sure to check out the ultra-luxurious bar and lounge.

name: Mumbo Island
overview: Run on strict eco principles and is entirely off grid, it has only 7 tents, which are set into the bush on the tiny heart-shaped uninhabited islet attached to the island by a wooden bridge. Waters around the island are bilharzia-free and perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and kayaking. Mumbo is fully catered.

name: Costa Sands Resort Sentosa
overview: Offers simple "kampung" huts  (maximum 3 people) for $50/36 peak/off-peak and new air-con chalets (maximum 2 people) for $125/98; there are additional discounts for trade union NTUC members. In addition to the nearby beach, guests can use a swimming pool.

name: Brandenburger Hof
overview: Located in a quiet corner of City West, this cozy hotel features a very good restaurant.

name: Boutique Hotel Vera
address: Suvorovsky prosp. (Суворовский проспект ) 25/16 (close to Grand Hotel Emerald)
overview: Up-to-date and cozy rooms; 4th to 6th floors of an old building. Staff speak English by default, not Russian, which is quite rare. 6th floor features mansard windows. Some rooms have poor sound isolation from the corridor (eg. 514, 604). Free internet over wire, cable supplied. Breakfast: no frills; no hot plates but fresh fruits; no espresso, only American coffee.

name: Kershader Community Hostel
address: Ravenspoint, Kershader, South Lochs, Isle of Lewis, HS2 9QA
overview: Modern hostel affiliated to the SYHA, run by a local group. As it is small and sometimes used by groups, advance booking is recommended.

name: The Widow Kip's Country Inn
overview: A Renovated 1830's Victorian bed & breakfast.

name: M Hotel
overview: Stylish business hotel in the commercial heart of Tanjong Pagar.  The gym features a miniature climbing wall.

name: First Hotel Kristiansand
overview: also known by the former names Hotel Fregatten and Hotel Sørlandet

name: Hostel United
overview: 24-hour reception, 4-6-8 dorms, free wi-fi, shared laptop, clean bed linen, towel, free tea/coffee, lockers, big social area, big well-equipped kitchen. Helpful and outgoing staff who speak English, German, Russian, Ukrainian fluently. This is the hostel with a low price and great service.

name: 3Dogs Hostel Sao Paulo
address: R Coronel Artur Godói, 51 Vila Mariana, São Paulo - SP - CEP: 04018-050
overview: Big City Oasis. Come here to chill out the big garden. Quiet neighborhood, lots of green, cobblestoned streets. 2 Metro Stations away from Avenida Paulista, 20 minute walk to Ibirapuera.

name: Tumbleweed Hotel
overview: Family run hotel consisting of 16 rooms and eight Casita apartments. The only main street hotel in Cave Creek. Local hospitality since 1971.

name: Hotel Cantemerle
overview: Charming 3* hotel in a park with duplex or standard rooms all with private terraces. The facilities include a very good Provençal restaurant (c. 25€ to 50€/person), a large outdoor heated pool and a spa with a big indoor pool with water jets, a steam room and fitness equipment. This hotel is very quiet.

name: Navalai River Resort
overview: Great riverside view of the Chao Phraya as you can hear the river flowing. The room looks spectacular; the style of the interior combines Thai traditional design with modern decoration. There's Wi-Fi available that works inside the rooms. Also has a great restaurant downstairs, the Aquatini Bar and Restaurant that is listed separately in the Eat section.

name: Microtel Albany Airport
overview: The hotel is about 20-30 minutes from downtown Albany, and cab fare is about $20 on average. There is a bus stop about 100 feet from the hotel, but it can take almost an hour to get to the city this way, and the hotel doesn't provide bus schedules or seem very knowledgeable about the area buses.

name: Hafod Lon Holiday Apartment
address: 2 Plas Hafod Lon, Lon Ganol, Llandegfan, Ynys Mon, LL595UD
overview: Self-contained first-floor two bedroom apartment with its own private entrance. The apartment is situated in the village of Llandegfan between the town of Menai Bridge (1.5 miles) and the seaside town of Beaumaris (2 miles). The apartment occupies the top floor of a large private manor house, overlooking the Menai Strait towards the university town of Bangor and the Snowdonia Mountains beyond. The property is located in a private spot down a private lane and has of parking space if you need somewhere secure to park your trailer, boat, canoes, etc.

name: Woolverton Inn
overview: Country estate bed and breakfast set on 10 acres above the scenic Delaware River, surrounded by 300 acres of farmland. Rooms and cottages, three-course country breakfasts.

name: Hotel Villa Magnolia
overview: Tranquil garden hotel with 5 rooms and 1 apartment, en-suite bathrooms, Wi-Fi, A/C and secure parking.

name: Best Western Plus A Wayfarer's Inn & Suites
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pet-friendly.

name: Billiton Hotel & Klub
overview: A quiet sanctuary right at the center of bustling Tanjung Pandan. High end resort with a pool and its own restaurant. Perfect for honeymooners, but a bit far from the famous beaches.

name: Karmey Har HaNegev
address: 2-3 km north of Mitzpe, turn west following the sign to the farm
overview: An agricultural and touristic farm containing lodges for couples and families as well as large tents for groups. You can also ask for a guided tour of the farm, as well as order rappelling trips and bicycle rentals.

name: Welcome Centre Hotels
overview: Similar standard to Protea but not as expensive

name: Hotel Wesselényi
overview: ***10 single rooms, 16 double rooms, 2 triple rooms and 2 suite rooms. Services: Free Wi-Fi. -. Conference Room for 30 people with the following rentable equipments: flip chart, overhead projector, TV, VCR, CD player. - Restaurant: Hungarian oven-baked dishes. Cafe. Finnish sauna, Jacuzzi ( open: 06.00-22.00 ) ( ~ 6EURO p.p.), Marcal Teniscenter (9 tennis courts, 2 squash courts, body building, bowling ) Booking: +36 96 510 040. Beauty Saloon: Hairdresser, Schwarzkopf haircare, Cosmetics, Manicure Construction, Massage. - Rent A Bike: bicycles for renting and touring plan if you order in advance. For Motorbike Lovers - Here can touring plan and partner hotels if you order in advance. Airport Transfer Vienna-Budapest-Bratislava (1-4 people) 100 Euro/one way. Supervised, closed parking for 15 vehicles. Dry cleaning and laundry within 24 hours.

name: Moha guesthouse
overview: Pension +36 20 429-0095, Restaurant: +36 20 470-2110. Phone numbers live only Tu-Su 09:00-21:00. - Restaurant is open : Tue-Sun 11:00-21:00. - Twelve rooms.

name: Frida Studios
overview: Nice cozy studios.

name: Twin Peaks Hotel
overview: Not the Ritz but a cheap budget hotel option

name: Hotel Panorama
overview: ** Private bathroom with shower, TV (40 TV Channel!), Radio, Refrigerator, summer fan in the room. Free WIFI throughout the building, microwave use, bicycle storage, Ski storage, Mobile BBQ.By appointment: bike rental, excursion by bus, boat trip, guide. +Mobil: 30/597-6378

name: Hotel Batha
address: near Bab Boud Jeloud beside Post Office
overview: Tourist Hotel in font of Pension Batha. Almost full. The outside of the hotel is great but the room are very basic and old. Just around the corner towards the Bab Bajeloud is an internet café run by a couple of very nice guys who speak English and will be more than willing to give you some insights on the best places to visit and explore in the city.

name: Amanzo'e Aman Resort
overview: This well-known resort offers panoramic views of the Peloponnese countryside and coastline, a private beach club in a picturesque bay and a restaurant.

name: The English Inn
overview: Built in 1885, this is a historic place to stay.

name: Denver Marriott City Center
overview: A beautiful hotel in downtown Denver offering panoramic views of the Rocky Mountains and the city skyline.

name: Corran House
overview: small ensuite dorm rooms and private guest rooms, sea-front location.

name: Hotel Hanasaari
address: Hanasaari conference center, Hanasaarenranta 5, Hanasaari island
overview: Located in the Laajalahti bay between Espoo and Helsinki, Hanasaari island fits exactly the hotel, a short road to it and a stretch of the highway Länsiväylä. The hotel is often used for conferences, although it is also within a walking distance (1 km) from the Keilaniemi business district. Very easy to reach by bus via bus stops on the Länsiväylä. Notice that there is an unrelated Hanasaari power plant in Helsinki; ask the taxi driver for the hotel in Espoo!

name: Royal Hotel
overview: PO Box 47.

name: AmericInn Lodge & Suites
overview: Located on Brooks National Golf Course with  61 guestrooms. Free breakfast buffet, free WiFi, indoor heated pool and sauna, and public patios.

name: Holiday Inn Montevideo
overview: Glitzy hotel one block from Plaza Independencia. The rooms are in good shape and there are widescreen cable tv, minibar, and bathtub even in the most affordable room type. The view from the windows is not too wonderful, however. The price for the breakfast buffet is rather steep (USD16), so if it is not included in your room price you would probably be better off having breakfast at some nearby café instead. As of May 2014 the pool and the gym are under renovation. Wi-Fi is available in some of the rooms as well as in the conference center.

name: Hotel City Inn
overview: **** 66 rooms 139 beds. Services: Foreign language staff (English, German), 24-hour Reception Desk, Conference Rooms, Business Corner, Wireless and cable internet access, Non-stop drink- and snackbar with garden access, Wellness section (for a fee, 7 EUR/person/1 hour), Sunbathing terrace, Easy access areas (wheelchair accessible), Shoe shine machine, Baggage and safe room, Wake up call service, Garden, Garden terrace, Playground, Guarded car park with surveillance (for a fee, 11 EUR/car/night), Robe/dressing gown rental, Taxi service, Concierge, Flower service.

name: Ambrosia Victoria Historic B&B
overview: Ambrosia Victoria bed and breakfast is a historic 1897 heritage home.

name: Red Tree Lodge
overview: Budget friendly; Amazing, dedicated staff; Pet friendly; Very clean, with queen rooms, king rooms, bunk/family rooms, as well as a full suite available.  All rooms feature en suite bathroom, air conditioning, T.V., microwave, small fridge and in-room coffee. Amenities include breakfast snack, free wireless internet, free parking, movie room with free guest rentals available, games room with poker table, pool table, foosball table, indoor pool, private hot tub & sauna, large clean guest kitchen accessible to everyone with everything you need games room. Meeting spaces available for 10 -160 people. Average prices range from $130 in peak season (Jan-Mar, Jul-Aug) to $110 or less offseason. Watch for frequent specials. Repeat guest, corporate and group discounts.

name: Wombats City Hostel Vienna: The Base
overview: It is clean and simple.

name: Pension Blues, Pub, Restaurant
overview: Capacity: 10 rooms, 24 people. Opening time: Restaurant, Bar: 13:00-22:00, Pension: 24/7 +email agroholps@t-online.hu

name: Hotel Cerny Slon
overview: Small, family run 4 star hotel a few meters from the Old Town Square. Rooms have private bathroom, satellite TV, IDD telephone, WiFi and safety deposit boxes.

name: Hilton Hotel
overview: You can decide if the modern architecture with mirrored windows is a triumph of commercial design or a hideous blight. 322 rooms.

name: Kensington Riverside Inn
overview: Boutique hotel in Kensington, just across the river from downtown, with an amazing exterior display of "Whoville" from "The Grinch who Stole Christmas" during the holidays.

name: Star Motel and Restaurant
overview: Open all year round, 0-24. Rating: * Capacity: 8 rooms, 16 beds. Wi-Fi. Non stop catering facilities (130 persons receive appropriate) Parking, conference room, 24 hour reception, Pets Allowed, Satellite / Cable TV, Sauna,

name: HI - Chamounix Mansion Hostel
overview: On a scenic bluff above the Schuylkill River and 45 minutes to downtown Philadelphia's cultural and historic attractions. Associated with Hostelling International. Curfew at 2AM, daily lockout between 11AM and 4:30PM.

name: Hotel Oso Perezoso
overview: Hotel Oso Perezoso is a three-story structure, perfectly designed to catch the cool breezes of Taganga and enjoy a chill atmosphere amid a 360 degree view. The first floor has three rooms and a store, free bag storage, and a book exchange. The second floor has four bright guest rooms with views of the ocean that open onto a breezy open-air corridor. The third floor is a gorgeous rooftop Tsunami bar and cafe with WiFi internet (C$5,000 extra), a 800GB jukebox, plenty of room for hammock chillin' and a sassy parrot. From here you can watch the sun rise over the mountains, watch the sun melt into the Caribbean, sip on a cold beer, and order something from the full-service restaurant. Restaurant and bar are open to the public. Room prices range from 15,000COP a night per person (hammocks), to 20,000COP a night per person (first floor), to 28,000COP per person per night (on the second floor). All rooms have private baths, excluding hammocks. Big breakfast is included with each room rate.

name: Emerald Hotel
overview: One of Pristina's largest hotels, the Emerald is located on the south-western edge of the city on the highway to Skopje, past Bau Market. Large conference center.

name: Palms and Spas, Corfu Boutique Apartments
overview: Elegant apartments within olive groves and palm trees, overlooking the Ionian Sea. The accommodation has Suite rooms (with private outdoors jacuzzi/hot-tub, living-room) and smaller quaint Studios; all have sea views and Messonghi beach is just 100 meters/5 mins away. Free Wi-Fi in the rooms and parking on site.

name: Hotel Bologna
overview: Is right across the street from Porta Nuova station. Single rooms are €50 per night and the staff are sweethearts.

name: Sim's Cozy Garden Hostel
address: 211 North Section 4, First Ring Rd (一环路北四段211号)
overview: Previously managed by an experienced travelers couple (Singaporean husband and Japanese wife). Has a small garden and great atmosphere and look. Toilets are equipped with paper, there is a lockable security box at your bed, mosquito-coils adorn the rooms and corridors, the bar-restaurant provides guitars and cold beers, Western and Chinese food and so on. Staff is friendly, helpful, speaks English and are able to arrange tours. Free quality Chengdu map available. There is internet access for ¥5 per hour at the bar. Free Wi-Fi access which works in most bedrooms. If you do not want to stay in the dorm, is advisable to make a reservation some days in advance. Transport can be arranged to pick up from the airport.

name: Starlight Pines Bed & Breakfast
overview: 1912 Victorian style B/B. Four guest rooms with private baths, Lily with private balcony overlooking Mount Elden, Dragonfly with wood-burning fireplace.

name: LOCATION HOSTEL in Ligovskiy, 74
address: Ligovskiy, 74. 3rd floor of cultural centre Loft Project ETAGI
overview: Skype: Ligovskiy74. Dorm with window 18( 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 beds); Dorm without window 15 ( 6 beds); Double/twin with window 20( dbl bed/two separate beds) RUB700; Twin without window ( bunk bed / two separate beds ); Design room RUB3100-4000 per room. - "CAMPUS" КАМПУС (creative student campus) Bed in a dorm RUB8400 per month, 280/night. Accommodation cost for 01.05.2013-01.09.2013

name: Gran Hotel Princesa Sofia
overview: Steeped in established tradition and a dedication to service. Private Health Spa and Haute Cuisine restaurant.

name: Little America Hotel Flagstaff
overview: Antique, continental flair. One of the more unique hotel experiences that Flagstaff has to offer. Free airport shuttle from 7AM-10PM.

name: Ghoomakad homestay network
overview: The Ghoomakad homestay network is a collection of hospitable local families in Rakkar with basic amenities for travelers. Clean and comfortable stay is assured. Round the clock internet and information facilities are available at the Ghoomkad cottage.

name: Digha Tourist Lodge
overview: Bookings can be done from the Tourism Centre at 3/2, B.B.D. Bagh (East), Kolkata, ☎+91 33 2243 7260.

name: Hospedaje Posada Costa Serena
overview: Located just next to San Martin in the middle of town, this posada offers simple accommodation with an excellent position. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms, 2 computers are available for the use of those without laptops, residents have full use of a kitchen, the room price includes all-day breakfast and snacks (e.g. coffee, cakes) and the managers are very friendly.

name: Hotel Asterisk
overview: Smallish, but clean and quiet rooms in two buildings across a residential street. Generous check-in/checkout, good breakfast (included). Close to tram stop, walk to Rijks/van Gogh museums.

name: Plateau Country House
overview: Luxury 5-star accommodation.

name: Saratoga Arms
overview: 31 rooms.

name: Lost Dutchman State Park
overview: Has sites for tents and full hookups for RVs; toilets, showers, and water available onsite.

name: K.S. House
overview: Another budget guest house that offers 55 standard rooms with either a fan or air-conditioning. They have a great cafe/restaurant with nice food set on a rooftop. Breakfast not included even though the website says so. Also, the free Wi-Fi does not reach most rooms. They do have internet terminals in the lobby, but you have to pay a fee to use them.

name: Gabriel Motor Inn
overview: Modern style motel rooms and ensuites with reverse cycle, split system air-conditioners.Queen beds in all rooms.All rooms non smoking and 1st floor.

name: Hotel Villa Zurquí
overview: Cozy hotel with chalet style rooms with restaurant (Restaurante Las Calas). Located on National Route 32, the main access from the Central Valley to Limón and the Caribbean.

name: Huntington Hotel
overview: A former apartment building-turned-luxury hotel with individually decorated rooms.

name: Down by the River Bed and Breakfast
overview: Santa Fe-style lodging in a scenic location by the San Pedro River.

name: Lakeview Campground
overview: Located by Parker Canyon Lake on the west side of the Huachuca Mountains, this campground is managed by the Forest Service. There is a small general store on the site, and boats are available for rent. RVs 32' and less, no hookups. Drinking water, toilets.

name: Hotel Gaweye
overview: Four-star hotel - great view, older but decent conveniences (hot water, semi-functional central air-con). Don't walk near the ravine that runs near there to the center of town - renown for banditry. Great swimming pool and high speed internet.

name: Mayfair Darjeeling
overview: Hill resort offering good views. This property was once the summerhouse of the Maharajah of Nazargunj.

name: Hotel Gilde
overview: Upper budget hotel in the historic center of Deventer. Some rooms have a balcony and view over the inner garden, but not all of them. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Ravintola-hotelli Tiiranlinna
overview: The price includes a ticket to the nearby swimming centre Vesipekka, WiFi in the room and breakfast.

name: Casa Grether Carlos
overview: It offers one comfortable and clean room with all modern facilities. The room is equipped with a air conditioner, private bathroom and private entrance. It’s possible have breakfast, dinner and salsa lesson with professional teacher.

name: InterContinental Boston
overview: The InterContinental Boston Hotel, a new symbol of elegance and luxury on the Boston Waterfront. The 424 guest rooms & suites of this 5 star hotel are conveniently located close to the Boston Commons, Faneuil Hall, Quincy Market, North End, Logan Airport, Boston Convention Center and other downtown Boston attractions.

name: Orange (former Apelsyn)  Hotel
overview: Also there is a Restaurant, Wi-Fi, a Sauna.

name: Old Town Inn
overview: Cool historic inn, three separate buildings, dating from the 1800's. Located across the street from the Phoenix and Cowpokes and three blocks from Washington Square. Good community feel in a very localized neighborhood open to all. One bright yellow building you shouldn't miss.

name: Primo Hotel
overview: Modern 3 star hotel, free parking, cable TV, only en-suite rooms.

name: Merlyn Court Hotel
overview: Lovely and friendly family run bed and breakfast hotel. Totally no smoking. Located in a quiet Edwardian Garden Square. Bright and clean rooms. Family rooms are available.

name: Hotel Korpikartano
overview: Variety of summer and winter activities are offered.

name: NH Bergamo
overview: The NH is hidden behind the Mercure, in a modern building slightly recessed from the street. The rooms are slightly worn and dated, and their windows are small, but this is compensated by the commendable NH breakfast buffet and the location a few steps from the train station.

name: Francis Marion Hotel
overview: Once the largest and grandest hotel in the Carolinas when it opened in 1924, this place was named for a general of the American Revolution and re-opened in 1996 after a major restoration. Restaurant serving Southern cuisine, cocktails and jazz piano in bar, and spa on-site. Hotel services include a doorman and bell service, concierge, valet parking, room service, wireless internet, business center, newsstand and gift shop and a well-equipped fitness center.

name: Radfords Lakeview Motel
overview: Clean and modern motel by the lakeside, with great service.

name: RGB Hostel
overview: Opened in 2013 in a new district of Taitung, this hostel has friendly staff and funny decoration such as a world map with hosts' hometowns and a short indoors climbing wall.

name: Albergo Mimi Ohrid
overview: Guest house, quiet yard.

name: Shaven Crown
overview: Comfortable accommodation in fabulous historic building (14th-century gateway and Great Hall). Evening meals available.

name: HaYarkon 48 Hostel
overview: Located in the heart of Tel Aviv about one minute's walk from the beach, double room from USD$42, dormitory USD$10.50 with good discounts for booking ahead. 15 shekels to store luggage.

name: Christchurch Top 10 Holiday Park & Motels
overview: Deluxe motels, cabins and tent site facilities for overnight stays, group trips and longer vacations. 5 minutes walk to Northlands Shopping Centre, supermarkets, restaurants, bars, cinema and bus stop. 10 minutes drive to Christchurch Airport and 5 km to city centre.

name: Friends hostel, Vosstania
overview: MORE units:Friends on Kazanskaya (Друзья на Казанской); Friends on Chekhov (Друзья на Чехова); Friends by the Hemitage (Друзья у Эрмитажа); Friends: rooms, on Griboyedov street, 12 (Друзья. Комнаты на Грибоедова 12); Apartments for daily rent at 'Friends' (Квартиры посуточно для друзей)

name: Shilla Seoul
overview: One of the city's premier hotels.

name: Sunset Business Hotel
overview: Business class hotel as the name suggests. Rooms could be bigger but in room mod cons pretty nice. Some English spoken.

name: Hotel Ambassador
address: Near the Swiss Liaison Office in the Velania neighbourhood
overview: This is also up to the standards of a discerning visitor.

name: Palma Pansion
overview: Four double, three triple, a quadriple and a family room. +Mobil: 36 30 8410250.

name: Hotel Girnar
address: Adalat Road, Pannalal Nagar, Maharashtra State Highway 30

name: Burkes' Backpackers Paradise
overview: Affordable backpackers accommodation in dorms ($15 per person per night), double rooms, twin rooms ($30/night) and camping ($7 per person per night). Self-catering kitchens available and WiFi Internet access at extra cost.

name: A Wicher Garden Bed & Breakfast
overview: Road.

name: Tullamore Court Hotel
overview: Large hotel with a business conference centre.

name: Best Western Hotel Docklands
overview: The name is absolutely correct - the Best Western is in the docklands area. The hotel could use an update to contemporary standards, but can be cheaper than more central hotels.

name: La Bellasera Hotel & Suites
overview: A luxury boutique hotel that is also the home of the popular Enoteca Restaurant & Lounge.  The hotel offers well appointed/over-sized guest rooms and suites that are provided with every amenity expected of a fine hotel.  Spa, concierge and evening turndown services are available along with an exercise room, outdoor pool, whirlpool and meeting facilities for up to 150.

name: ibis Barcelona Plaza Glories 22@
