overview: Historic 19th century building transformed into a small hotel. Privately managed.

name: Quiet Cannon Hotel
address: Man O' War Cove, Fogo Island
overview: Seasonal restaurant (May-Sep), patio,  wi-fi, continental breakfast. Non-smoking, pet-friendly, 13 rooms (incl. 2 efficiency units) open year-round.

name: Casa Augusta
overview: 5 basic apartment with a huge private pool surrounded by a  green garden.

name: Holiday Inn Rotorua
overview: Four star plus hotel, with suites available. Pohutu Cultural Theatre with nightly Maori cultural show and traditional Maori feast. Free shuttle runs from hotel to i-Site office in town from 8AM-9:00PM.

name: K-West
overview: Modern, fashionable hotel with a day spa.

name: Birkenhead Manor Boutique Guest House
overview: Lovely warm guest house boasting excellent service and beautifully clean rooms. Close to the beach with stunning views of Table Mountain. Rates include breakfast. Free wi-fi.

name: Pension Kristina
overview: Ten air.con. rooms with bathroom, fridge and TV. - Free parking, continental breakfast.

name: Hotel Maribo Søpark
overview: Hotel with a view of Sønder Lake.  Offers 107 rooms, most of which have a balcony.  Restaurant and wellness available.

name: Daravand Guest House
overview: Daravand Guesthouse was opened by an Armenian carpenter in Dilijan on the scenic road to Jukhtak Monastery. Built in a quiet canyon, the guesthouse is very comfortable and cozy. The canyon affords many hiking opportunities and has 2 monasteries in the forest within easy hiking distance. Seven guest rooms are available. A library and games room and billiard room are available for gaming. Open air dining area is also available, overlooking the beautiful valley. The bar, living room and nice garden provide areas for guests to congregate and relax. The owner, Razmik, is very accommodating and helpful, speaks decent English and is a considerate smoker.

name: Hotel Mucha
overview: This brand new boutique hotel occupies a gorgeous spot on the left bank of the Mucha river just after it leaves Lake Mulehe. The river is clean and swift flowing and kingfishers often dart from the fringing reed banks. All 10 rooms are ''en suite'' with some of the nicest bathrooms in Uganda and either face the river or towards the volcanoes to the south. Fly screening is excellent and there are back-up generators.,They also allow smoking.

name: Beautiful Wales Sea View Luxury Holiday Barns
address: Ceilwart Ganol Farm, Llanaber, Barmouth LL42 1YS
overview: 5 Star Holiday barns with stunning sea views from the lounge and decking of Penty Buwch and Penty Mochyn.  Situated on an equestrian property that is also home to chickens, ducks, grey faced dartmoor sheep and sometimes pigs.

name: Hotel Terboyo Indah
address: Jl. Terboyo Industri Raya No. 30 Semarang
overview: Located in the northeastern part of Semarang, in the same area as Terboyo Bus Terminal.

name: The Rookery
overview: An atmosphere and decor that more recalls a private gentleman's club than a hotel.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Leusden-Amersfoort
overview: Luxury hotel in the town of Leusden, directly east of Amersfoort.

name: Comrade Hostel
overview: A nice clean hostel, with an intimate atmosphere, located only 10 minutes walk from the Red Square. The owner Dennis is really helpful. Free Wi-Fi internet. *NOTE: Comrade Hostel can also provide an "invitation" for the Russian Tourist visa.

name: Hotel Romana Residence Milan
overview: The Romana Residence modern hotel of the historic centre of Milan, located only 250 metres away from the Duomo. All the 66 bedrooms of the Romana Residence Hotel, divided in double, twin, triple, family, junior suite and suite, come with private bath and modern facilities. Some also have a small kitchen, and many face the garden of the hotel.

name: Mälardrottningen
overview: [ˈmɛ:larˈdrɔtniŋən], a private yacht launched in 1924.

name: Grand Hyatt Santiago
overview: Has a 1000 square foot lagoon-style pool, health club, and several restaurants.

name: Miramar Hotel
overview: This stylish boutique hotel has an amazing contemporary design, although it does mix in some elements of historic Thai architecture. Wi-Fi is available in all the rooms, but you need to buy an access card at the lobby first. There's also a luxury restaurant and massage facilities.

name: Gateway Torres Strait Resort
overview: 22 self-contained a/c rooms, salt water pool

name: Quality Inn & Suites
overview: Pet-friendly, free breakfast.

name: J Residence Kundasang
address: 300 meters from Mount Kinabalu National Park
overview: J Residence is the nearest lodge outside Mount Kinabalu National Park, and with rooms price three times lower than the chalets and lodges inside Kinabalu Park. J Residence is suitable for travellers who need budget, simply basic, close-to-nature accommodation and peace & quiet around Kinabalu Park Headquarters.

name: Pullman Stuttgart Fontana
overview: The Pullman is in the outer district of Vaihingen, directly opposite a major S-Bahn and U-Bahn stop, roughly equidistant to the airport and Hauptbahnhof. Good quality rooms. Good breakfast buffet. Staff not always to the standard you would expect.

name: Dar Antonio
overview: Nice guesthouse right in the Medina. Clean and quiet with a great view on the top floors. Hot water on demand. Shared facilities. Not for people with mobility problems.

name: Best Guest House
address: 29 & 31 South Usman Rd, Corner of Damodaran St.
overview: Double and triple A/C and non-A/C rooms with bathrooms and cable TV.

name: Hotel Am Klostersee
overview: Old style German hotel.

name: The Emperor Beijing Forbidden City Hotel
address: 33 Qihelou St. 东城区骑河楼大街33号
overview: Boutique hotel in residential neighborhood near Forbidden City. Interestingly designed rooms are named after emperors rather than numbered. Free breakfast from rooftop restaurant with sweeping views over the Forbidden City. Long walk to subway stations.

name: Sofitel Malabo Sipopo Le Golf
overview: More 5* luxury and price.

name: Cress
overview: Inn for single use mainly.

name: The Garden South Park Inn
overview: This inn is in the heart of downtown Halifax. It consists of 23 air conditioned rooms with private baths. Rooms start from $99 and vary with the season. The friendly staff can help you make reservations and suggest new places to visit.

name: The Allegria Hotel
overview: Beach front hotel property with restaurant headed by chef Todd Jacobs that has been reviewed by New York critics.

name: Simply Rooms & Suites
overview: New 4 Star hotel boutique hotel offering high spec bedrooms in an excellent location off Kensington High Street (opened May 2010).

name: Blackmore's Bed & Breakfast
overview: 15 minute walk to Dalhousie LRT (tram) Station, simple healthy breakfast, non-smoking, no pets.

name: Hotel am See
overview: Located on the Easter Lake, indoor swimming pool, free parking, bar, lounge, fitness facilities,beauty treatments and sauna. Children under 6 stay free.

name: Pickwick Hotel
overview: A historic hotel with very nice guestrooms and flexible meeting space.

name: Platanus Pension and Restaurant
overview: Open 24/7.

name: Smith Lake Farm
overview: Smith Lake Farm's agritourism suite, is a new two bedroom accommodation with all the amenities. Swim in the private lake in the summer or ski or snowboard Mt. Washington in the winter!

name: Belmond Copacabana Palace
overview: An iconic hotel dating back to 1923, with a history of hosting the famous and wealthy. Arguably the best hotel in Rio.

name: SpringHill Suites
overview: Accommodations include complimentary Internet, flat screen TV, and pantry area. Guests will also have access to complimentary hot breakfast, complimentary parking, indoor pool and fitness center.

name: The Farm House Hotel
overview: Air-con, fan, cable TV, free Wi-Fi. Call reservation for your convenience. Pick-up taxi 100 baht/ person, 300 baht for car. For taxi: show this message to Farm House Hotel: ไปโรงแรม ฟาร์มเฮ้าส์ ตรงข้ามที่ทำการอำเภอเมือง.

name: Halletts Bed & Breakfast
overview: Halletts Bed & Breakfast is a boutique lifestyle B&B, surrounded by views of green rolling pastures and mountain backdrops.

name: Jahongir B&B
overview: Jahongir B&B is located in the heart of Historical part of Samarkand within 5 minutes from Registan Ensemble. Comfortable rooms with modern amenities. Services include: dinners on request, wireless internet, taxi on call, guide services, laundry & dry clean.

name: Anne ma soeur Anne
overview: Boutique studio-hotel.

name: Garden Inn
address: 7 Wenming Lane, Wuyi Street, Old Town District, Lijiang, Yunnan
overview: Beautiful views of the mountains and valleys below. Rooms are comfortable and clean (updated 2012 : dorms bed aren't comfortable and not safe, piece of wood which support the mattress was moving). Great atmosphere and wonderful staff that go out of their way to make sure your experience in Lijiang is a special one. Free Internet. Staff can organize trips: Lijiang to Qiaotou ¥35; Lijiang to Lige island ¥80 one way. Many more trips on request. Airportshuttle if you order in advannce ¥80.

name: The Corporate Hotel
overview: High level of rooms, sauna, jacuzzi and free internet.

name: Hotel JHS
overview: At the heart of Parque do Povo, the JHS is an economical option for your stay in the city.

name: Budget Host Inn/Westgate RV Campground
overview: The hotel has a 14 site RV park on the property. All sites have full hookups.

name: Lux Melati Hotel
overview: Large hotel, basic rooms with air-con, TV, and shower. Less than five minutes away on foot to Tanjung Pendam beach or the Tanjung Pandan city center.

name: Hotel Jakova
overview: Built in 1999. Situated in the new part of town 5 min away from the city center by car.'''Services:'''WiFi Internet access, restaurant, parking, bar.

name: Pula Art Hostel
overview: Small, family-run, newly refurbished art hostel in the centre of Pula. This hostel offers 2 fully equipped kitchens and beds for couples; grill on  terrace; Free Wi-Fi; 24h access; Cable TV.

name: Albergo Ristorante Centrale
overview: 2 stars hotel. 16 rooms, 24 beds.

name: Fehér Hajó Pension
overview: Services: Aqua-Fit Club in the basement. (Gym season ticket for 1 month/day ticket HUF4900/500, sauna daily ticket Tue, Thu and Sun from 15:00 (summer only on Tue) HUF800, 1 hour massage - on prior appointment  HUF4500

name: Sedia Riverside Hotel
overview: In large grounds on the banks of the Thamalakane River. The rooms have ensuite bath but also colourful African decor. Chalets have one or two bedrooms with air conditioning and satellite TV. There is also a campsite. They also offer the largest swimming pool in town, a terrace bar, an indoor bar, and a dining room.  Plenty of birds to watch.

name: Hotel Saron
overview: 24-room "B" category hotel. Open from April to October.

name: La Valencia
overview: . A Luxury Spanish-style hotel, famed for its views of the La Jolla Cove.

name: Arizona Charlie's Boulder
overview: Casino hotel and RV park. Easy access from interstate and reasonable prices; great for overnight stays passing through Vegas.

name: Grand Hotel Karavia
overview: Formerly the old Sheraton Hotel that was abandoned for 10 Years, fully Renovated in 2010

name: Hotel de Wageningse Berg
overview: Atop the Wageningse Berg hill. Very nice vantage point looking out at the Rhine river and plains. Reopened late 2013 after extensive reconstruction.

name: Hotel Senator Gran Via Madrid
overview: 4-star hotel. Restaurant, bar, and meeting space.

name: Hotel J
overview: Hotel J overlooks the Nacka Strand, a haven in the far east of Nacka that is accessible e.g. using the Sjovagen ferry (line 80). Despite the closeness to the city, this area has resort-like qualities and, thanks to its steep hill rising immediately next to the lakeside, may be said to have a Monte-Carlo-like feel.

name: Hotel Zipser
overview: The Jugendstil hotel in the centre of Vienna is a family-run business, and offers special rates for families.

name: Hotel Metropolis
overview: It's on the eastern outskirts of the Tenderloin, but there can be people sleeping in stairways and panhandling right next to the hotel, so it's authentic enough. Inside it is perfectly clean.

name: AmericInn
overview: Indoor heated pool, hot tub, sauna, and guest laundry available. Free Wi-Fi and free breakfast. Pets allowed.

name: The Langham Hotel Boston
overview: Originally the building of the Federal Reserve Bank, this AAA four-diamond Boston hotel is now a national architectural landmark. The hotel overlooks the gardens of Post Office Square and is steps from Boston's shops, restaurants and attractions such as Faneuil Hall, Newbury Street, the Freedom Trail, and the financial district. Cafe Fleuri inside is now known as one of Boston's finest restaurants and is known for its Saturday Chocolate Bar Buffet and Sunday Jazz brunch.

name: Hotel Memorial Union
overview: One of the very few options in the center of town is this place in the historic Memorial Union building on campus. Geared towards people doing business on campus; not many services or features, but the location can't be beat.

name: Best Western Plus
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast.

name: Floracion Aoyama
overview: A conveniently placed, if somewhat expensive hotel, it can be found by the Omotesando station in a quiet spot with a good view of the park. It features both a restaurant of reasonable quality and a spa - expect to pay through the nose, though.

name: Chutti Holiday Resort
overview: Reservation from Kolkata: +91 33 99 0357 0921 Ilaco House, 3/1 Brabourne Road, Kolkata

name: AC Hotel Zaragoza Los Enlaces
overview: Convenient if you plan to use Zaragoza as a stopover on your Madrid-Barcelona train ride, as it is only 5 minutes by bus from the Delicias station (or half an hour by foot, if you feel like walking 2 kms. Great value for an AC property, even if a bit older and quite away from the city centre (30 mins by bus).

name: Tyn Rhos Country House Hotel Bangor
address: Ty’n Rhos, Seion, Llanddeiniolen, CAERNARFON, Snowdonia,LL55 3AE
overview: Has superb gardens. There is a large choice of individually decorated rooms and the establishment. It also has its own restaurant, with lounge, bar, main restaurant or conservatory areas, which serves delicious and visually beautiful food sourced locally.

name: Heartbreak Hotel
overview: Owned by Elvis Presley Enterprises.

name: Peacock Guest House
overview: Located at Dattatraya Square. 15th century architecture recognized by world heritage. For peaceful and green environment.

name: Ovolo Hotel - 2 Arbuthnot road
overview: Design boutique hotel with Apple TV, free 1Gbps WiFi, free breakfast at cafe, full wash and dry services, free mini bar, free local calls, 24-hour gym and flexible checkout. Smoke free.  Free access to 9000 citywide hotspots

name: Hawkstone Park
overview: This property includes 2 championship golf courses.

name: Imperial Park
overview: Nice and rather large resort. Quite far from the beach though.

name: Conley Bottom Resort
overview: A privately owned resort featuring a full service marina, houseboat and cabin rental, a campground and a restaurant.

name: Hostel Pristina
overview: Free pickup from bus station for the group of 3+ person with minimum stay of 2 nights, washing machines, cable TV, Wi-Fi in whole building. All rooms with shared bathroom.

name: Isrotel Ramon Inn
overview: The local luxury hotel.

name: Youth Inn 2
overview: Very clean, rooms with air-con, fan, en suite bath. Helpful and friendly staff. Free drinking water in room, bicycle hires 10,000 kip. 12 hr free Wi-Fi with captive portal or [http://www.atcyberia.com/wifi.php Cyberia Hotspot Wi-Fi] at 6,000 kip/hour. The original, older Youth Inn is on the other end of the same road near to the river and has slightly cheaper rooms, but of a lower quality. Avoid the 4th floor in cool season.

name: Hotelli Turistihovi
overview: Basic hotel 400 m from the railway station. Breakfast costs 6€ extra.

name: Hotel Saket
overview: 1.5 km from Sambalpur railway station

name: Motel One Wien Prater
overview: Situated on a corner plot between the Prater park and the Messe Wien trade fair grounds, the Motel One is a chain hotel focusing on inexpensive accommodation in pleasant, modern settings. Expect the familiar brown-and-blue theme and small but functional rooms. Some rooms have views of the Riesenrad, but as the hotel does not differentiate between its rooms, you have to negotitate with the front desk to get one. The hotel only opened in December 2013, so it is relatively new amongst Vienna's hotels.

name: Premier Inn Birmingham City
overview: As typical as a Premier Inn gets, it is situated in a nondescript 1970s building with simple rooms - but just around the corner from to the St. Phillip's cathedral.

name: Tiara Park Atlantic Lisboa
overview: Luxury hotel with 331 rooms each decorated as one of the four elements. Glass-and-concrete building, but great for travelling with children if you don't mind 10 minutes walk to the downtown. Private parking; close to park and a large public playground (Parque Eduardo VII).

name: Hotel Stefanie
overview: Hotel Stefanie boasts to be the oldest hotel in Vienna, in operation for over 400 years. It features classic vienesse style, relatively small rooms of irregular shapes (most with view of a small courtyard) and sumptous breakfasts. Expect classic vienesse hospitality, with a hint of pride, rather than modern comforts.<br>There is a tram stop in front of the hotel and a church next door, so it is not exactly the quietest hotel in Vienna.

name: Bethpage Motel
overview: The Bethpage Motel offers rooms that are all equipped with LCD TVs and also offers free internet.

name: Wales House
overview: A unique bed and breakfast in a historic home, the Wales House tries to make you feel at home during your stay. Plus a bonus is Skye, the friendly canine resident!

name: Westin Minneapolis
overview: Recently built into the historic Farmers & Mechanics Bank in downtown Minneapolis. The wine cellar is built into the former bank's vault. Appropriately, the bar/restaurant is called BANK.

name: Brewster House Bed & Breakfast
overview: Located in an 1888 Victorian home. With 7 rooms, all with en-suite baths, free WiFi. Itinerary planning available. Gourmet hot breakfasts daily, afternoon refreshments.

name: Pur-Navolok Hotel
overview: Probably, the most comfortable and expat-friendly hotel in the city, located in the center on the embankment of Northern Dvina. 4 stars.

name: J-Hoppers Kyoto Guesthouse
overview: A clean backpackers hostel. Rental (worn-out) bikes ¥500/day, Internet ¥300/hour. No curfew; up-to-date local information by local staff.

name: Friendship Hotel
overview: Great location, walking distance to Zhongyang Dajie and decent rooms.

name: Shady Nook RV Park
overview: 49 sites. Hookups, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Handicapped access.

name: Dorint am Nuerburgring
overview: At the racetrack. Some rooms have a really cool balcony looking on to the starting grid of the track. Obviously rooms are booked well in advance and are not cheap on race days (invite some friends to share the price of the prime seats).

name: Llanhuar Lodge
overview: A great place to stay is in the canyon at a place called Llahuar lodge. They have hot springs and a great view. In the evening they serve vegetarian menu for 10 soles. The best trip is a 4 day hike from Cabanaconde to Llanhuar Lodge then to the remote an sweet village of Fure to visit the waterfall then back via the Sangalle area (Oasis).

name: The Victorian Inn
overview: A block away from the Historic Main Street and the free Gondola, this hotel has large 275-325 square foot rooms with kitchenettes, a suite and a cozy cottage house. A free daily continental breakfast served every morning from 8-10AM, daily maid service and on-site parking. Other facilities include free Wi-Fi, outdoor hot tub, dry sauna (winter only), BBQ pits, and bike racks.

name: Country Lodge Hotel
overview: Hill Station. Well located and popular hotel overlooking Freetown. Has a pool, fitness room and good bar/restaurants.

name: Buddy Lodge
address: BF, Buddy's Shopping Plaza, 265 Khao San Rd
overview: One of the few mid-range hotels right on Khao San Road. Rooms are good with fridge, TV, phone and air conditioning. It has a great rooftop pool, balcony, room service, free Wi-Fi and bar.

name: Grand Canyon / Williams KOA
overview: RV hookups, tent sites, cabin rentals, wi-fi, showers, pool, and bicycle rental.

name: Hotel Čile
overview: Small, modest, family-run hotel in centre of Kolašin town.

name: Bentenkan
overview: Seaside rooms at this relatively new hotel have a fantastic view of the ''torii'' in the bay and the Bentenjima bridge with the ocean in the background. A restaurant on site serves fresh seafood caught in the lake.

name: Hotel Cumulus Imatra
overview: 68 rooms with TV,minibar, hair dryer and free broadband connection."

name: Porvoon Mitta
overview: Another quirky small hotel in the heart of Old Porvoo.  Ten rooms named and individually decorated after merchants and artisans who once worked in the building, ranging from tar merchants to glass blowers.

name: Scandic Front
overview: New stylish hotel. Spacious rooms with great views. Trendy bar.

name: Hilton Nordica
overview: Premises include a spa (NordicaSpa) and a restaurant called VOX. The hotel is located outside the city centre, but the area is well served by busses.

name: Intercontinental Prague
overview: One of the older Western hotels in Prague, the Intercontinental is located very close to the centre

name: New Palm Tree Hotel
overview: Singles, doubles and triples, all with bathroom, tv and A/C and a terrace towards the inner courtyard. Wi-Fi. The coffee shop and reception are open 24h.

name: Victor Hotel
overview: Services: Safe parking, Non-stop reception, Breakfast, Money Exchange, Laundry, Sightseeing and other programs, Rent a car, Internet, Fax, Pets allowed, Credit cards accepted

name: Matkakoti Aaro
overview: In the city center. Shared toilet and bathroom, refrigerator and microwave oven. Breakfast is included in the room price.

name: La Nueva Esperanza
overview: We offer rooms with basic amenities you need like, free WiFi, cable TV, hot water, stove / refrigerator shared dining room and foyer area, garden areas, and small pool. Because of our central location, right by the town square, easy short walks to Laguna Bacalar, restaurants, and all attractions.  We have 7 rooms with basic amenities you need like, free WiFi, cable TV, fan, hot water, stove / refrigerator shared dining room and foyer area, green areas.  When you visit The New Hope Bacalar, you can swim in the lagoon and its clear waters, kayaking, windsurfing, catamaran rides or boat, or visit the nearby archaeological ruins. Ask for tourist information.

name: Queen Anne Hotel
overview: The Queen Anne provides a real San Francisco experience, being an 1890 Victorian Hotel between Pacific Heights and the Civic Center, and near Japantown. Some rooms have fireplaces, and afternoon tea is served daily.

name: Casa Alpina Hotel
overview: Welcome to the Casa Alpina. You will find our immaculately clean, comfortable and affordable hotel rooms in a quiet and beautiful surrounding. All rooms, kitchenettes, and suites have cable television, refrigerator and wireless Internet access. Some are equipped with in-room coffee and A/C. To start your day, enjoy our complimentary continental breakfast. We are conveniently located only a few kilometres from Red Mountain Resort and Redstone Golf Resort and just minutes away from downtown Rossland.

name: Golden Pond Resort
overview: A resort located on Lake Cumberland that offers 2-5 bedroom cabins for rent. There is a 2 night minimum stay.

name: Nuorgam Holiday Village
overview: Offers  accommodation in apartments and cottages and camping facilities.

name: Inn on Bourbon
overview: A beautiful historic hotel located on the site of the old French Opera House. Notable for its balconies overlooking Bourbon and Toulouse Streets and a beautiful courtyard with pool.

name: Hostel Kosmopolit
overview: Hostel `Kosmopolit` is a beautiful contemporary building with 120 square meters of residential space and a spacious garden. We offer a wide range of services and amenities that make us distinctive from other similar facilities  such as free high-speed internet, WiFi, garden barbecue grill and bar, self-service kitchen with dining room and balcony, lounge room with self-service bar, cable TV and computer with internet, air-conditioning in every room, 24 hour service and assistance and many more.

name: Days Inn University of Minnesota
overview: A couple blocks east of the University of Minnesota. Convenient access to Downtown Minneapolis. Complimentary shuttle within a two mile radius, plus shuttles to and from the airport for a fee.

name: Marriott Hotel
overview: A five star hotel situated opposite the historic building of Frere Hall and provides very tight security due to the close proximity of the Japanese consulate. Quality of the hotel is best, with elegant rooms and good service. Few good restaurants are located inside the hotel such as "Dumpukht" for Bar B Q, "Suzie Wong" for Chinese and a popular "Nadia Coffee Shop" for continental and Pakistani cuisine. Hotel offer business facilities along with Leisure Club which includes tennis and squash courts, swimming pool and a fitness centre complimentary.

name: Hotel Horizon
overview: Free Wi-Fi.

name: Vagabond Inn & Suites Klamath Falls
overview: Free wifi and wired Internet. Coffee and tea maker in the room. Free breakfast and a newspaper, air conditioning, and a heated indoor pool. Children under 18 traveling with parents stay free. Pet-friendly rooms available for $20 per pet per night extra.

name: Sunflower Guest House
overview: Clean and great location. Those who tote lots of luggage be warned there are stairs to climb to top floor reception.

name: Hostal Epu Pewen
overview: Nice, very clean, comfy hostel with charming decoration including Mapuche elements. Woodfires keep the main areas warm during winter. Very friendly managers, knowledgeable about all activities available around Curacautín, also propose tours of their own and can rent gear (skis, snowshoes, snow clothing, sledges...). The hostel promotes sustainable tourism and ecological conduct: recycling bins, compost and solar hot water (during summer) are available. Wi-fi, hot water, big and nice kitchen, ''quincho'' (covered terrace for BBQs), cable TV in the communal room, parking. Breakfast is available for an additional CLP2,000 or 3,000.

name: Housez 43
address: 43 Mirza Ghalib Street, Park Street Area
overview: All rooms equipped with air-conditioning, TV, and private bath.

name: Angel at Rose Hall Bed and Breakfast
overview: Walking distance from shops, restaurants, and galleries. Private, off-street parking is provided.

name: Hotel Vere Palace
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Hotel Azarbaijan
overview: Dirty and noisy, definitely not worth it.

name: Milan Suite Hotel
overview: Modern four star hotel located in the north district, well connected to the city centre and Fiera Milano. 40 bedrooms divided in double for single use, suite and junior suite. All the rooms come with en-suite service and the breakfast included. Facilities include two meeting halls, private parking and limousine service.

name: The Mandala Hotel
overview: Hotel on Potsdamer Platz, Kulturforum, Neue Nationalgalerie and the Philharmony.

name: Omena Hotel Yrjönkatu
overview: A self-service budget hotel concept with no front desk in the centre near Kamppi. Book and pay on the Internet and let yourself in with a passcode. Toilet, shower, 26" LCD-television, small fridge, microwave, water kettle + disposable cups, coffee, tea, hair dryer and dining table. Omena-breakfast €7.50/person. Business-package €16/night includes Internet connection, two volitional movie per day and breakfast. Parking €17.50/night.  Omena hotellis have been established in most major Finnish cities and are used widely by Finns travelling in their own country.

name: Premier Inn
overview: Reasonable sized rooms, standard basic furnishings but large TV. Stairs a little annoying. Good all you can eat cold buffet or fresh cooked breakfast at the attached Beefeater restaurant.

name: New Joe Guest House
overview: A basic guest house with small and simple rooms, but at least they are fairly clean. Try this place if you're just looking for a cheap place to sleep. It has a nice laid-back cafe/restaurant attached to it. They serve Thai and Western food, such as pizzas, and is set in a garden environment.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton
overview: The DoubleTree hotel offers 8,000 square feet of flexible meeting space.

name: Sissi Pension
overview: Free wifi internet access. A little bit north of downtown. The Pizza Max Cafe is on the first floor.

name: Matsue Universal Hotel Main Building
overview: The Universal Hotel chain has several buildings around Matsue Station.

name: HotelVeszprém
overview: Services: 24-hour reception, wake-up service, safe, telephone in rooms, breakfast-room, free Wi-Fi in the lobby area of the hotel and in some rooms. Continental breakfast

name: Golden Monkey Guest House
overview: Clean, brightly painted, budget place in central location, with the best food in town. Really helpful staff which might open up the kitchen for you in the late evening and help organise transport next morning. This whole establishment is fragrant and can access free Wi-Fi. Large area out front for overland travellers to park their vehicles at night and there is an armed guard. Most doors and windows close reasonably tightly and securely and the air-bricks are screened for mosquitoes. Can be very noisy at night with the metal doors and thoughtless Americans and Israelis having loud conversations long into the night. Large towels are a bonus.

name: Marquis Reforma
overview: Awarded The Best Business Hotel in Mexico City for Travel and Leisure Magazine in 2004, this 5-star hotel is one of Mexico City's finest. Built in the Art Deco style, it has an exclusive feel through its high standards of fittings and furnishings. Ice sculptures are frequently used as decorations in this area. There are excellent views to be had of the woods and castle of Chapultepec, as well as the Glorietta de Diana Cazadora.

name: Scandic Triangeln
overview: A gigantic edifice towering over the Triangeln shopping center, the former Hilton offers views over the city from rooms on higher floors, as well as from the top-floor gym. The hotel is undergoing a thorough renovation as of 2014 - you may want to ask for a renovated room when booking.

name: AMEDIA Hotel
overview: In an industrial district close to the railway tracks

name: Osakaya Hiina no Yu
overview: We have opened a new dining room with a huge fish tank! Fully enjoy the beautiful Kaiseki Ryori (traditional Japanese meal brought in courses), delicate as well as bold. The menu changes every month. We are also proud of our natural onsen which is famous as a beauty bath.

name: Jammin' Rimini Backpackers Hotel
overview: Clean large private rooms 1-2-4-6 beds all bathroom ensuite. Bar and reception 24h. Linen included hand given at check-in. Discounted tickets for discos and amusement parks. Small pets allowed upon authorization. At Jammin' Party Hostel, with a small extra, you can also have: buffet breakfast, WiFi, bicycles hire, self laundry, cocktail bar. Open June–August.

name: Ramada Plaza Hotel
overview: Owned by international hotel chain (Ramada) Wyndham Worldwide. This is considered as airport hotel because of its very close proximity to airport.

name: The Farm Villa
overview: The farm villa is a family run hotel in Ranthambhore ideally located to visit the National Park.  You can eat the vegetables that are cultivated in the farm, around the hotel. Enjoy your stay in a peaceful environment with a hospitable family. The owner is a guide in the park for 15 years and can help you arrange your trip.

name: Express by Holiday Inn Stuttgart Airport
overview: Typical European Express furnishings, reasonable breakfast, good selection of English TV channels, shuttle bus to airport.

name: Mesa / Apache Junction KOA
overview: RV hookup sites, tent sites, and cabins for rent. Wi-fi, pool, and showers.

name: Kentucky Camp
overview: Cabins are furnished, but guests must bring their own sleeping bags and pillows. For site description see listing above.

name: Copthorne Hotel
overview: One of the hotels serving the ICC and a monument to the era in hospitality mercifully gone by.

name: Gárdonyi guesthouse
overview: breakfast included

name: Mövenpick Hotel Berlin
overview: Uniquely designed hotel in Berlin's city centre, centrally located nearby Potsdamer Platz in the former Siemens building on Schöneberger Straße.

name: Zolotapava Hotel Complex
overview: 15 rooms

name: EFÖ
overview: Tel. +358 50 557 4723 (''only during summer, during winter available rooms can be booked through the school +358 6 317 4913''). EFÖ is short for "Evangeliska Folkhögskolan i Österbotten", which is Swedish for The Evangelical Folk High School in Ostrobothnia. During the summer when the school is closed it becomes a summer hotel. Smoking and drinking alcoholic beverages are banned.

name: B&B - Pension Grant Lux
overview: Accommodation with parking and cycle storage facilities. Behind the old town walls with views of the Dyje valley and National Park. 6 rooms (1 twin, 2 double, one triple, 1 four bedroom and 1 four bedroom with the possibility of an extra bed). All rooms have solid wood furniture, bathrooms with hydromassage showers c/w radio and lighting, radio/alarm, satellite tv, minibar, and WiFi.

name: Ledra Samos Hotel
overview: Surrounded by breathtaking scenery and natural beauty.

name: Nordhostel
overview: Located in the very center of the city — a stone's throw from the Hermitage. Free internet access and continental breakfast. A grungy place, but it has an good location and is relatively cheap.

name: Mini Hostel Kiev
overview: Located in the city centre with English, German, Russian, and Ukrainian staff. Free Wi-Fi, coffee, tea, linen, maps, and free pub crawls. Guests of the Mini Hostel Kiev get discounts for to stay in the Mini Hostel [[Lviv]] and the Mini Hostel [[Odessa]].

name: Historic French Market Inn
overview: Great location with reasonable rates, it's known for its courtyard atmosphere.

name: The Wandering Paisa Hostel
overview: New hostel with comfortable Beds, included Linen, Nintendo Wii, Free wifi, Bar, Laundry Service, Hammocks, Sun Deck/Patio, Rooftop terrace, Library, 24 hour hot water, Bilingual staff, Lockers, Kitchen, Tour Information, 24 hour reception.

name: Porvoo Camping Kokonniemi
overview: Camping and caravan ground plus 10 cabins for up to four people. Showers, sauna, kiosk, BBQ shelter, playground. Open June-August only.

name: Pai Village Boutique Resort & Farm
overview: Small boutique resort, consisting of natural bamboo cottages surrounded by lush gardens and equipped with free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning and hot water showers. Beautiful design, peaceful atmosphere and friendly service.

name: Murataya Ryokan
overview: Small traditional inn runs has 11 Japanese style tatami rooms with common toilet and bath facilities. The staff speak good English and are incredibly helpful. Wifi is available, as well as a PC downstairs. Breakfast can be had with a prior reservation.

name: Casa Blanca Hostel
overview: Run by Danish/Colombian couple (Mike & Diana) Casa Blanca Hostel opened in August 2008 in the safe and convenient location one block of the famous La Sexta avenue. The hostel offers big well equipped self-catering kitchen and dining area. There's a large living room with 42" flat screen, cable TV package and lots of DVD's, reading section and magazines, free WiFi and guest computers, hot water showers, 24 hour reception, laundry service, airport pick-up, mini market, free parking for cars and motorcycles (indoor) and an outdoor patio. Dorms beds range from 15.000 to 20.000 COP. Double bed private from 35.000 to 50.000 COP and twin bed privates from 35.000 to 55.000 COP (with possible 3rd bed on sofa bed).

name: Ambassador
overview: Rooms are okay, proximity to the train station a plus (about 5 minutes on foot). Near the red light district which is a minus (you don't have to actually walk through the red light district to get to the hotel though).|lat=50.10698 | long=8.66824|address=Moselstrasse 10

name: Arpoador Inn
overview: Clean place, older interior, only a sidewalk apart from the beach.

name: Best Western Normandy Inn and Suites
overview: On site restaurant. Indoor pool, spa, and sauna.

name: Ngong Ping SG Davis Hostel at the Po Lin Monastery
overview: Reservations made at are not always acknowledged upon arrival, but sometimes when you're told they're booked solid you can still get a bunk. At last enquiry, you needed to be a member of the Youth Hostel Association in order to stay. Membership is available online.

name: Shangri-La Hotel
overview: Complementary Breakfast & Free Airport Pick Up.Room service. - All rooms are furnished with contemporary furniture and hard wood floors, an electric teakettle. Private bathrooms have a hairdryer, hot/cold shower facilities and free toiletries. A comfortable seating area and cable TV are included and all rooms are fully air-conditioned. Free Wi-Fi. Massage option at the spa. 24 hour concierge.

name: Hotel Charles
overview: - János Restaurant (five star?) serving rich buffet breakfast at 7AM. - At noon: Hungarian dishes (goulash soup, veal paprikash), fish specialities, Italian pasta recipes, special chocolate cakes, and the ever popular Wiener Schnitzel. Room types: Standard studio, Deluxe studio, Deluxe Apartman. 73 rooms 160 beds.

name: Kronen Hotel
overview: The independently operated Kronen Hotel may have some very questionable interior fittings, responding to the German idea of ''Gemuetlichkeit'', but wins over guests by great service and location just 800  east of the Hauptbahnhof, in a quiet area.

name: Lafitte Guest House
overview: A boutique hotel located in the residential area of Bourbon Street. Visitors will enjoy the sights and sounds of Bourbon Street as well as a retreat into their own personal French Quarter home.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel
overview: Vasagatan. The Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm boasts an enviable location next to Central Station and the Arlanda Express train. Within a 15-minute walk of Old Town and near popular areas for shopping, its amenities include free internet and health centre.

name: Holiday Inn Turku
overview: Short walk from Market Square, this hotel is clean, convenient and moderately priced. Breakfast spread is decent and included in the price. Overall this is a good hotel especially for a short business visit to Turku.

name: Riverplace Hotel
overview: Four star hotel overlooking the river.

name: Hotel Y Boulevard
overview: Includes a free breakfast. '''NOTE: Temporarily closed until the end of 2014.'''

name: Cedars Motel
overview: Small, 15 unit motel. Features wireless internet, microwave ovens, refrigerators, and air conditioning.

name: Hotel Questenberk
overview: Romantic, baroque-style, 17th century hotel. Each of the Single, Double, Deluxe Double rooms as well as the three Royal apartments are originally furnished and equipped with TV, WiFi, phone, safe, and minibar.

name: Tombstone Bordello Bed & Breakfast
overview: Built in 1881, this former brothel was once owned and operated by Big Nose Kate. Within easy walking distance of downtown.

name: Monte Carlo
overview: Modeled after the opulent Place du Casino in Monte Carlo.

name: Carmel Mission Inn
overview: Combines a private garden setting with the warmth of a country inn. Offers free Wi-Fi access.

name: Thermal Hotel Harkány
overview: The only four star spa hotel in Southern Transdanubia with 131 standard and superior, elegant and modern style rooms and apartments. - Services free of charge: half board, Internet access (Wi-Fi) in public spaces, aqua gym, saunas, swimming pool, different saunas, petanque, bowling tracks. Payment services:Parking, AC, Full board, All Inclusive, Hotel Spa Pool.

name: Oravankolo
overview: A modest cabin for 5 persons. Includes a sauna in a separate building.

name: Hotel Camino Real Polanco
overview: This 5-star hotel surpasses hotel expectations to be somewhat of a work of art. It combines modern architectural profiles with obvious pre-Hispanic pyramid reminiscences. It has been the headquarters for two soccer World Cups and for the Olympic Games. It's a true example of opulence and well worth the indulgence.

name: Shirreff Hall
overview: Early May to late July.

name: Jeonju Guesthouse
overview: B&B with dormitory beds, a cafeteria, a kitchen, a rooftop area for barbecues, and free internet.  The staff speaks English.

name: Wyndham Parc 55 Hotel
overview: A highrise hotel with large rooms, lots of amenities, and great views of Downtown.

name: Hyatt Regency Birmingham
overview: Linked directly to the International Convention Centre (ICC) and is 5 minutes from the National Indoor Arena (NIA).

name: Völgyikút Wellness Pension
overview: Nine aircon rooms. Finnish Saunas, infrared saunas, steam room, jacuzzi pool and gym free of charge

name: Swallow Cottage Benllech
address: Talwrn, nr Benllech, Isle Of Anglesey
overview: Detached barn conversion

name: Kaunas Hotel
overview: It offers comfortable rooms with views directly onto the avenue, has an elevator and provides a sumptuous breakfast in its cellar restaurant for the more discerning traveller. 85 rooms.

name: Hotel Queensland
overview: Rooms : 41

name: The Red Boat
overview: <br>A boat-hostel. The boat was launched in 1914.

name: La Casa del Barrio
overview: Fantastic for backpackers, this affordable clean, comfortable hostel is a value. Prices can vary but see the website for details (in English & Spanish), which also has a reservation service. The hostel has shared rooms, showers and a cooking area. One of the most attractive thing about this hostel is the couple who own it -- they're welcoming and very helpful.

name: Palacio de Marquesa
overview: Perhaps the best -- and most expensive -- of a number of B&Bs in the region.  Non-smoking rooms only, 2 night minimum.

name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites
overview: A suburban aparthotel brought up to AC standards, with large rooms, a pool and not much to do in the neighbourhood - but only 600 m from the Metro station.

name: Ramada
overview: Free wireless internet, on-site gym and pool. No smoking, no pets.

name: Meridian Hotel
overview: Not related to the international chain of similar name. The lobby displays photos of notable former guests, including President Medvedev, which gives both an indicator of class of service and price.

name: Protessilaos Hotel
overview: Overlooking Pagasitikos Bay. Free Wi-Fi, buffet breakfast. Guests can also enjoy breakfast in the privacy of their rooms. The hotel also features a TV lounge with fire place, a meeting room, a cafeteria and a bar, as well as a lovely terrace.

name: The Torch Doha
overview: Located in the distinctive 300m-high Aspire Tower built for the Asian Games, the Torch Hotel offers modern-appointed rooms over 51 floors. There is also a rotating restaurant which offers 360° panoramic views of the city.

name: Hilton Checkers
overview: AAA Four diamond, renovated 1920s luxury hotel. Weekend packages are offered.

name: Courtyard Tysons Corner
overview: A big Marriott with conference facilities.

name: Hotel Sita Continental
overview: Its basic, new and clean.

name: Rhytm
overview: Two star. 6 rooms/12 beds. Room Service. Conference hall. Possibility to order breakfast in the room. Laundry and ironing clothes. Taxi. Restaurant. Finnish sauna. Wi-Fi

name: Youth hostel Trier
overview: Directly on the banks of the Moselle.

name: Brent House Hotel
overview: Hotel connected to the Ochsner Medical Center. Heated outdoor pool, jacuzzi, and fitness center available. All rooms include a microwave and refrigerator.

name: Royal Hotel
overview: Historic guesthouse directly located on seafront near the pier. The Royal is one of Eastbourne's few remaining original Sea Houses. Popular with tourists and walkers, modestly priced and dog friendly.

name: Radisson Blu Astrid Hotel
overview: Some might say that the biggest benefit of staying at the Astrid is not having to look at its peculiar postmodern facade. More tangible benefits include splendid location on the Astridplein just by the Antwerpen Centraal and large rooms with modern comforts.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Malmö
overview: The new Park Inn, only inaugurated in 2012, is the only hotel in Vastra Hamnen, located in the midst of an office / industrial area. The immediate surroundings might not be the most touristy, but the hotel is reasonably close to Malmö Central Station, and the city's compactness makes it easy to get to the centre from there as well. If you prefer to cycle there, the hotel has bikes for rent.

name: Oak Creek Bed and Breakfast
overview: Oak Creek Bed & Breakfast near Athens, Texas, is a quiet romantic couple's retreat nestled deep in the East Texas woods. It's the perfect weekend getaway and a home base for the area's numerous attractions.

name: Rimrock Resort Hotel
overview: Perched dramatically on the edge of Sulphur Mountain, the Rimrock has a spa and several fine dining restaurants.

name: NH Mechelen
overview: In the historical part of the city.

name: Mercure Hotel Amersfoort Centre
overview: Fairly new, modernly decorated hotel next to the city centre. Breakfast is slightly overpriced but otherwise this is a fine place with ample facilities. Parking is free.

name: Assaha Lebanese Village
overview: A bit of a strange one this – based in an attractive, if slightly kitsch, dry stone palace, the Assaha Village combines a large restaurant, conference facilities and even a ‘museum’ with intimate, middle eastern themed bedrooms. Its part of a small chain with sister hotels in Beirut and Doha. Prices, however, are sky-high at SDG360 for a single room and SDG480 for a double.

name: Lake Lodge Cabins
overview: All units include private bath including shower. The Western cabins are the most modern, the frontier cabins were built in the 1920s but recently refurbished, and the pioneer cabins were built in the 1920s and have not been recently refurbished. Open mid-June through late September.

name: Hida Tourist Information OfficeHida Hotel Plaza Takayama
overview: The staff speak English and are a mine of information for the area.  Open daily from 8.30 AM to 5 PM.

name: Hotel Kager
overview: Four star hotel with 37 rooms,- all air conditioned from double rooms to suites with two bedrooms,- small meeting room, Restaurant in Wine cellar. In the restaurant varied main meal (both local and international food, game, poultry and fish dishes) simple soups and desserts. The Wellness section includes fitness, massage and dentist units.

name: Jamahal Resort and Spa
overview: A boutique resort with 13 private villas, two of which have their own private pool. In house spa and lounge. Good location just across the road from the Intercontinental hotel and easy walking distance to the beach.

name: Centro Hotel
overview: Centro Hotel is a modern hotel with a personal touch in the center of Turku. Located in the inner courtyard of its building block,  this family owned Hotel is perhaps bit more personal than the chain Hotels in Turku. Just 4 minutes to the Market Square but at a peaceful location.

name: Evergreen Motel
overview: On Seaway Trail. Microwave, fridge, Wi-Fi in rooms. Pines Grub and Pub restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Kirkenes Snow Hotel
overview: Open from December to early April.

name: The Eco-farm
overview: Family-run organic farm, only accessible by trail through the rainforest. Experience life on the farm, learn about organic farming, natural medicines and rainforest preservation. Private rooms, dorm accommodations or camping options. Recommended by National Geographic in their South American Staylist, 2011.

name: All Seasons Holiday Park
overview: Offers a choice of affordable, self catering accommodation in 3 hectares of peaceful parkland close to Lake Rotorua - motel units, tourist flats, cabins, backpackers lodge, camping & campervan sites

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Dublin Airport
overview: This four-star accommodation was formerly The Great Southern Hotel Dublin Airport and is located within the airport complex just five minutes from Swords by frequent bus service. 24 hour courtesy shuttle to passenger terminals.

name: The Royal Highland Hotel
overview: A completely refurbished luxury Heritage hotel and a landmark of Inverness. Opened in 1856 and offers a true Highland ambiance.

name: Canaima Camp
overview: Canaima Camp has 120 rooms built as cottages, divided into double, double, triple and quadruple rooms, which remain an excellent architectural approach that respects the natural landscape and has all the necessary comforts and conveniences for guests, daily maid service, hot water, electricity and private baths. In a viewpoint on the Laguna de Canaima is the restaurant, where you can enjoy an exquisite and varied cuisine.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Reynosa/Zona Industrial
overview: Each room comes with a king or queen-size bed(s), 32-inch LCD TV sets, and individual air-conditioning and heating unit.  Services: Buffet breakfast included, toll-free 800 and local calls, broadband Internet access, and free transportation within 10 km (about 6 miles). Airport shuttle. A Fitness Center, Free Parking, and a Swimming Pool are also available.

name: The Carolina Inn
overview: Opened in 1924 and donated to the University of North Carolina in 1935, the Carolina Inn is the only hotel technically on the UNC campus. When you're in town for the big game, and not on a tight budget, this is the place to stay. It's within easy walking distance to Franklin Street and every Friday evening hosts a pleasant celebration on the front lawn with bluegrass music and drink specials which is open to the whole town. Oh, and if you plan on staying here when your son or daughter graduates from UNC, go ahead and make your reservation when they are accepted to the university.

name: Djidjack
overview: Wandering the lush gardens of Djidjack you might just come across the one of the area’s resident spirits. That’s because, located on the grounds, is one of the many sacred sites highly regarded by the region’s Sereer population. More specifically the spirit, known as Cupaan, is said to inhabit a sacred baobab. The careful observer may even spot its face. If spirit hunting is not your thing, Djidjack offers much more. Its family-friendly environment, with wide-open spaces and a laissez-faire staff is perched along a long, quiet stretch of the Petite Côte. If quiet time with a good book is for you, the expansive main lodge also houses an extensive library. No matter how you spend your time you’re sure to enjoy yourself at the Village de Vacance of Djidjack.

name: Scandic Foresta
overview: [fɔˈrɛˈsta] near Millesgården. Great view of the Stockholm harbor.

name: OldHouse
overview: Dorm and hotel rooms are tiny but the furnished apartments are nice, with kitchens and bubble baths. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Sublim Eiffel
overview: Funky decorated rooms located within 15min walk from the Tour Eiffel.

name: Hotel Rialto
overview: In a less touristy area of the town and might be equally hard to find.

name: Calistoga Wine Way Inn
overview: Historic bed and breakfast. Charming rooms all with private baths and full breakfast included each morning.

name: Hotel garni Gerichtsschänke
overview: Half-timber framed family run hotel with 35 beds.  Located in the centre of town.

name: Munich Jaeger's
overview: ''Jaeger's'' is one of many youth hostels in that street. It features clean and comfortable lodgings, with a simple breakfast served each day - a great place to meet other travelers.

name: Awentsbury Hotel
overview: Selly Park (''close to the university''). Offers mid-range B&B in a quiet environment within 10 minutes walk from the university.

name: Quanjude Tianshan Hotel
overview: A hotel of the famous Beijing Duck chain (the restaurant is on level 2, do get the duck while you're here!), well located in the Uyghur part of town, close to the Grand Bazaar. Free wired internet in all rooms. Try the samosa and naan on the opposite street for a delicious and cheap snack during your stay.

name: Original Sokos Hotel Vaakuna
overview: A hotel smack in the heart of town, right beside the Market Square. Free broadband and sauna for customers.

name: Best Western Hotel Kampa
overview: Authentically decorated hotel evokes the splendour of the 17th century and welcomes its guests with wonderful internal architecture and pleasant hotel comfort.

name: Hotel Nataraj
overview: With restaurant and bar

name: Plus Prague
overview: Friendly hostel with regular events.

name: Reef Hotel
overview: 150 singles and doubles, all with balcony, A/C, safe, tv and bathroom. 3 restaurants, 4 bars, tennis, gym and 3 pools. Located in a tropical garden. Wi-Fi is not included in the price.

name: Casa 6
address: Rua Barão da Torre 175, no.6 - Ipanema
overview: Has a double room and some dormitories.

name: Kalamazoo House Bed and Breakfast
overview: A popular downtown bed and breakfast in a beautifully restored Victorian showplace.  Free high-speed WiFi, in-room HDTV/DVD, free parking. Romantic rooms with fireplace and double whirlpool, or rooms for the business traveler.

name: Auberge Montréal Espace Confort
overview: Private room with bathroom and small kitchen.

name: Asia Nakhonsawan Hotel
overview: Pleasant spot, reasonably priced, buffet breakfast included, Wi-Fi.

name: Auberge La Gueïla
overview: A small, charming, auberge with just six rooms and a small courtyard. On-site restaurant and library, and it's even possible to get a massage!

name: Le Panorama
overview: Open May-Oct. We'll start with the bad: Le Panorama suffers from its somewhat inconvenient location south of the town centre, and its name is a bit of a misnomer: the views of Percé Rock are quite disappointing. That said, the 23 rooms at this reasonably priced roadside motel are all recently renovated and include coffeemakers, fridges, air conditioning and kitchenettes. There are also four new detached chalets on the property available for guests staying 3 or more nights; these include additional amenities such as flat-screen TVs and full-size kitchens. Heated outdoor pool is open from mid-July to the end of August. Guest laundry is available. Free WiFi Internet.

name: Suites at Fisherman's Wharf
overview: The Suites is a small (24 suites) but comfortable and modern hotel that offers one or two-bedroom floor plans with many amenities.

name: Sur Hotel
overview: Basic, with free wi-fi and breakfast, within walking distance of the souq and bus stop.

name: The Bed & Breakfast Inn at La Jolla
overview: Bed and Breakfast steps from the beach. Comfortable rooms and suites.

name: Hotel Severnaya
overview: An older but decently-maintained hotel in the downtown area, closer to the railway station than the other hotels.  Part of the Intourist Hotels group.

name: Holiday Inn Dubai - Al Barsha
address: Sheikh Zayed Road, Al Barsha 1, P.O.Box 115443, Dubai
overview: 310 elegant rooms. a choice of 3 bars, choice of 2 fine dining restaurants and 6-storey high atrium and piano lounge. Gymnasium, roof top pool, massage rooms, sauna and spa.

name: El Castillo del Mar
overview: Great German-owned hotel on the west side of the beach. At the hotel there is a branch of Kai Ecotravel, who was the first offering La Guajira tours for the big public.

name: Novotel Paris Tour Eiffel
overview: The largest Novotel in the world was originally built as a Japanese hotel Nikko, and retains many interesting design elements of the former, like the capsule-style windows, and the Japanese restaurant Benkay. It is by now not ageing that well though and awaits the long-overdue renovation.

name: River Man Hotel
overview: A cheapy, but some of rooms are really big and bright. Rooms area clean and have fans and shared bathrooms. Breakfast can be organized on request. It's next to a mosque and a busy walking street, so check which room your getting if that’s an issue for you.

name: Nowa Gdynia SPA & Wellness Resort
overview: Located outside Łódź, this is a SPA resort with many attractions like a sports center or an aquapark.

name: Garden House Inn
overview: A fun and relaxed B&B, with 10 rooms, all with private baths. Amenities include a heated lagoon style pool with spa jets and a cascading waterfall, surrounded by tropical gardens that weave throughout the Inn grounds. Along with a nightly happy hour, a continental breakfast is available each morning.

name: Hotel Fifty
overview: Convenient to downtown and MAX train stops.

name: Avenue Park Hotel
overview: fan single with common bath/ fan double with common bath/ air-con single with common bath, cable TV/ air-con double with common bath, cable TV.

name: Pemberton Gateway Village Suites
overview: Mile One Eating House downstairs. Condo-style units: kitchens, balconies, heated bathroom floors, flat screen TVs, WiFi and free underground parking. 360° Mountain views.

name: Hamersay House
overview: Formerly the Tigh Dearg Hotel, a new hotel (opened in 2005) located about 15 minutes walk from the ferry.

name: Shangrila resort
overview: Is the most popular resort of the country.

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
overview: In Nacka, a four-star waterfront hotel, with central Stockholm within sight and reach.

name: Holiday Inn
overview: Reasonable sized rooms, outdoor swimming pool.

name: Inn on Main Street
overview: A romantic Victorian B&B two blocks from cafes and galleries. Mountain views during breakfast on the porch.

name: The Westhaven
overview: Queen and King motel units.

name: Tabriz Hotel Pars (Also called Hotel Shah-Gulu)
overview: Five-star but not worth the price. It has a swimming pool. Located far a way from the city center. Often used by business travelers.

name: Hotel Sapporo Mets
overview: A nice hotel with reasonable prices.  The hallway carpets have some light stains, but the rooms are clean, and have a bathroom and a fridge.  The breakfast buffet is included with stay.

name: Hotel Relax
overview: On the more expensive side beginning around 15.000 – 30.000cfa. It has a pool.

name: Långholmen
overview: Spectacular hostel built in an old prison where you actually stay in the old cells (making them limited to the size). The place is clean, and the staff is nice and friendly. The atmosphere is really one of a kind. It is also a hotel and the breakfast buffet holds top-standard and costs 75 SEK. They have a guest kitchen, internet terminals, washing machine/dryer, and there are a lot of green areas and bathing opportunities around. Subway stop is about 7 minutes by walk.

name: Nayoro SunPillar Youth Hostel
overview: Hostel in an orange house.

name: Hotel La Misión
overview: Small, cute hotel. Great location in historic district. The original building dates from 1762.

name: Cave Creek Ranch
overview: Located in the Chiricahua Mountains, makes an ideal base for birdwatchers and hikers.

name: Mercure Paris Haussmann St Augustin
overview: Another typical Parisian Mercure, farther to the east than the other two.

name: SpringHill Suites Thatcher
overview: Nonsmoking, free breakfast and wi-fi.

name: Iron House Hostel
overview: Independent hostel. Ricardo, the owner, is a resident of San Miguel and is always happy to show you the real gems of the town: the best sights, clubs, restaurants, bars, hot springs, artisanal markets. Weekly and monthly rates available.

name: The Orchard Hotel
overview: A stylish ‘green’ boutique hotel with beautiful rooms and suites, as well as meeting space, a fitness center, and on-site dining - Daffodil Restaurant.

name: Nyatapola Guesthouse
overview: A simple and clean bed-and-breakfast run by a family of woodcarvers on the upper floors of a traditional house on top of their art shop. Located in a small street connecting Pottery and Taumadhi squares in the heart of the old town. Semi-private doubles for NRP600 and up.

name: Mövenpick Nabatean Castle Hotel
overview: Mövenpick Nabatean Castle Hotel is a 10 minute drive from the entrance to the historic site of Petra, situated in a breathtaking secluded position on a hillside at an altitude of 1,400 metres. All the hotel's 90 rooms and suites are spacious and most have extraordinary views over the Great Rift Valley. Interconnecting rooms and non-smoking rooms are available on request.

name: Citrus Heights Patong Hotel by Compass Hospitality
overview: 77 room hotel with large rooms, quite modern facilities and has private balconies overlooking the mountains. Swimming pool and car park. Close to restaurants and pubs.

name: Best Western Hotell Baltic
overview: Three-star hotel opposite the Kulturmagasinet complex, with views of the waterfront.

name: Suite Novotel Wien City
overview: Not to be confused with the regular Novotel in the same district, the Suite Novotel offers fully furnished apartments with a mini-kitchenette suitable for longer stays. It is located on the district's main thoroughfare, the Lasallestrasse linking the Innere Stadt with the east bank of the Donau, next door to ibis and ibis budget, although the official address is that of a side street. This is one of the older-style Suite Novotels, with somewhat outdated decor.

name: Hotel Metropol
overview: A historical luxury hotel in the center of Moscow, built in 1899-1907 in Art Nouveau style. - In 1918, the hotel was nationalized by Bolshevik administration, renamed Second House of Soviets and housed living quarters and offices of growing Soviet bureaucracy. - Today, Metropol has 365 rooms, and each is different in shape or decoration.

name: Esk Valley Lodge
overview: Boutique bed and breakfast accommodation 15 minutes north of Napier in a renovated house of character formed from one of the original homesteads in the valley, with gardens and vineyard.

name: Americas Best Value Inn
overview: 58 rooms, cable TV, many rooms with mini-fridges and microwave ovens. Pets welcome, $10/pet per night extra. (Don't forget to ask for treats at the front desk for your 4-legged family members.)

name: Casa de Pita
overview: This Guanajuato B&B has location, location, location and remarkable value; one block from Plaza Baratillo and another block to Plaza Union and Teatro Juarez – the heart of Guanajuato City and easy walking distance to all within-city attractions. Very safe location, clean, friendly, Wi-Fi and great breakfast in a colorful, truly Mexican home.

name: Inveraray Youth Hostel
overview: 28 bed SYHA hostel, with beds costing around £9-15 per night.

name: The Golden Lion Bed & Breakfast
overview: 3 rooms, 1 is a suite. WiFi. A 1840 Greek Revival home listed on the National Register of Historic Places. A genealogical resource and research center for the surname Jone.

name: Story Book Cabins
overview: Upscale rustic knotty pine cabins nestled amid the tall trees of Ruidoso's Upper Canyon. Amenities include full kitchen, washer/dryer, fireplace, hot tub, and deck views of Sierra Blanca.

name: Asahiplaza Shinsaibashi
overview: Sauna available, and there is a separate area for women.

name: Hotel Bristol
overview: Four star hotel. A member of a Belgian Hotel chain. Located near the International Eastern Railway Station and The Central Avenue of Budapest (Rákóczi Street). - Services: 24 - hour Reception, business services, Bristol Garden (glassed covered breakfast area), buffet breakfast, drinkbar, ADSL/WIFI internet connection (free of charge), conference rooms, lobby, programme arrangements, taxi and airport transfer service, rent a car service, Finnish sauna, fitness corner, laudry service, luggage room. Comfort Double Room (2 Adults + 1 infant), Deluxe Room (Max.: 3 adults + 1 infant), Executive Room (Max.: 4 adults + 1 infant), Comfort Triple Room (Max.: 3 adults + 1 infant) , Comfort Family Room (Max.: 4 adults + 1 infant)

name: Khan Be'erot Paid Campsite
address: Take highway 40 towards [[Eilat]] into the crater, until you see a sign pointing left towards the campsite; it's a dirt road from there
overview: A large campsite with some large, fixed tents, operated by the [http://www.parks.org.il/parks/ParksAndReserves/Pages/default.aspx Authority for Parks and Reserves]. There are toilets and showers. Prior coordination is sometimes required.

name: Hangar Adama
overview: A Dance Company and a Dance School which offers a variety of accommodation: camping, a funky dormitory and luxury mudhouses.

name: Lambert Inn - Whittier
overview: Offering an AAA 2-Diamond garden hotel in the heart of Whittier.There are jacuzzi suites and free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Colbert
overview: French run, and situated close to the government ministries. Aid workers and French government folks will customarily stay there. There are old and new wings, the old wing is certainly inferior to the Carlton, the new wing on a par or better. The Colbert has a lovely spa, two restaurants and a coffee shop/patisserie. The efficient and knowledgeable staff will help you navigate the challenges of the city. 140 rooms.

name: Copenhagen Camping
overview: Brand new camping grounds on the southern tip of Amager opened in 2008, within walking distance of a beach.

name: Dodo Hotel
overview: Modern rooms with shower, WC, flat-screen TV, and hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi. French owned.

name: Prima Tel Aviv
overview: 105 Ha'yarkon Street. In the heart of the city that never rests the Prima Tel Aviv combines business amenities with relaxing atmosphere, one block from the lively seaside promenade and popular commercial districts. This intimate and affordable hotel offers 60 lovely rooms, complete with on-premises secretarial services, free internet access in the lobby, ample meeting rooms and more.

name: HI-Banff Alpine Centre
overview: With private rooms, 2 spacious kitchens and lounge areas, 2 fireplaces and restaurant Cougar Pete's Lookout & Kitchen. 20 minute walk to downtown Banff. New to HI-Banff "The Storm Cellar, Banff's Pub and Game house" features drink specials, games (pool, darts, foosball) and an eclectic bunch of servers.

name: Yess! Hotel
overview: New and modern hotel at a moderate cost. The hotel offers excellent service, premium beds and a healthy breakfast. The hotel is located in the city centre, only a 200m walk fra the bus, train and ferry station. Check-in from 15:00.

name: Hostel Caldas
overview: Established in typical colonial style house of the nineteenth century, in calm and relaxing ambience, 50 meters from the Plaza Caldas. Facilities: Free Wi-Fi, computer with internet access, 24h reception, kitchen, laundry service, lockers, bicycles for hire, tour information.

name: Le Meridien Versailles-Montreal
overview: This boutique hotel is in the chic Golden Square Mile neighborhood. This hotel features 108 rooms.

name: Don Chan Palace
address: Far out at the eastern end of the river promenade
overview: This hotel was completed in 2004, ''almost'' complying with the municipality's by-laws which at the time limited buildings in Vientiane to 7 storeys (Don Chan has 14). The place to be if you are looking for panoramic views, although this comes at a cost--this monstrosity has singlehandedly ruined the Vientiane skyline. It has a swimming pool overlooking the Mekong and a popular open-air beer garden overlooking the Mekong which gets crowded late in the evening. Rooms are showing their age, and often smell of stale cigarettes. Slightly far from the centre, but hotel provides shuttle service to city centre. Careful when shopping for jewellery in the shops in the lobby.

name: Cairo Moon Hotel
overview: A beautifully designed hotel with lots of open space and a gorgeous terrace where you can have breakfast overlooking Cairo.  The rooms are large with high ceilings and lots of light.  They offer free breakfast, wireless internet and hot drinks throughout the day.  Dorms are 60 EGP and rooms start from 100 EGP.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Orange
overview: Three-star hotel.

name: Saiwai-so
overview: Both Western and Japanese-style rooms are available, with dinner served for ¥1200 and breakfast ¥400.

name: Beary Nice!
overview: Sister hostel to the popular A Beary Good Hostel. Friendly and very nice.

name: Crowne Plaza Glen Ellyn-Lombard
overview: Indulge in luxury lodging at the Crowne Plaza Glen Ellyn-Lombard, an upscale Glen Ellyn, Illinois hotel near downtown Chicago that treats business and leisure travelers to well-appointed guestrooms and suites, indoor swimming pool, onsite restaurant, 24-hour business center, complimentary high-speed Internet access and value hotel packages.

name: Hotel Mezquita
overview: Conveniently located right next to the Mezquita, this is good value with friendly service. Free wi-fi, luggage storage available.

name: Snowed Inn B&B
overview: Two large suites with private balconies

name: Seurahovi
overview: Has a popular restaurant.

name: Ounaskoski Camping
overview: Camping site (100 places) on the other side of the river with view of the city, c-store, cafeteria, laundry, sauna, playground.

name: Imperial Guesthouse
overview: 24 hours hot water and free WiFi

name: Motel One Stuttgart-Hauptbahnhof
overview: This hotel is in the centre of Stuttgart, one block from both the Hauptbahnhof and the Koenigstrasse. Appointed in a modern and sleek but basic way like all other Motel Ones.

name: The Arizona Inn
overview: This charming and classic 1930 resort was built by Isabella Greenway, Arizona's first woman to serve in the U.S. Congress (1933-1937). Colorful stucco casitas and suites ramble through meticulously, groomed grounds. The Arizona Inn has won top awards from Zagat and Condé Nast, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

name: Homestead Studio Suites
overview: An extended-stay–oriented hotel with "studio suites," which are a bit nicer than your average hotel room, and include kitchens. WiFi comes with a one-time per stay $5 charge.

name: The Green House on the Hill
overview: Small, friendly bed and breakfast 5 minutes walk from the heart of Napier, in a quiet setting, surrounded by trees.

name: Mercure Grand Hotel Alfa
overview: The historic Grand Hotel Alfa, situated right opposite Luxembourg's train station, now operates as a Mercure. The hotel is slightly dated on the inside, with historic common spaces preserved and room decor that will make you want to go to sleep quickly.

name: Matahari Lodge
overview: Clean hostel/guesthouse, with private A/C single, double rooms and mixed dormitory with shared showers. 24/7 reception with security system. Single and double rooms are windowless but quiet. Helpful staff, TV lounge, free breakfast (toast, PB&J, tea & coffee) and internet(WiFi & Desktops @ TV lounge).

name: Flora Simonyan B&B
address: Right next to the parking lot of Haghpat Monastery
overview: Family run place with simple but quite decent rooms. Can prepare some meals.

name: Old Town Guesthouse
overview: Nice and very friendly family guesthouse owned by a French guy and his Malay-Chinese wife. The place is very clean and has a great atmosphere. The rooms and the bathrooms are clean. Free Wi-Fi, laundry service, breakfast included, kitchen, tv room, bike to rent, books echange, nice communal area. Dorms and rooms available.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Located near many attractions and businesses such as Bass Pro Shops and Wal-Mart.

name: Seal Cove Inn
overview: Located a few hundred feet from the ocean (but without ocean views), and surrounded by gardens and a eucalyptus grove, this European-styled inn has just ten rooms, each equipped with fireplace.  It's on the pricey side, although if same-day or next-day days may be available to those who call.  In addition to the impressive grounds, a gourmet breakfast is included (prix fixe menu includes items such as homemade scones and poached eggs), there is a daily wine reception, and the comfortable lobby offers a fireplace and view of the grounds.

name: English Point
overview: 23 rooms and 3 suites with view to the old town. Rooms are comparable to apartments with complete kitchens, design furniture and media outlets in all rooms. They have a spa, gym, several pools and a marina.

name: ibis Wien Messe
address: U1 Vorgartenstrasse, the Praterstern train station within 300 m walk
overview: Despite the name, the ibis Wien Messe is not really closer to the Messe than the Suite Novotel next door, and it is rather on the wide Lasallestrasse affording good connections to the Innere Stadt and Donaustadt. It is a rather modern ibis with a nice restaurant and typical ibis rooms.

name: Asturias
overview: A 2 star hotel. The Asturias is only 200 meters from the central Puerta del Sol.

name: Bunchrew House Hotel
overview: County house hotel on the waters edge of the Beauly Firth.

name: Adamkaly Hotel
overview: The hotel is located central close to the traffic light junction. It is more a homestay, but still most comfortable accommodation in town. Double rooms with/without bathroom are 1000/700 som including breakfast. Wi-fi is available for 50 som.

name: Phuoc An River Hotel
overview: Roof garden restaurant on the sixth floor provides the best views in Hoi An. Clean rooms, good food, friendly staff, and beach road riverside location make the Phuoc An River Hotel unique in Hoi An. Spa, Gym, Pool, Poolside Bar, Coffee Garden. The hotel is a 15-20 min stroll to/from the beach, and within walking distance of the ancient town. Bicycles are free for guests. Good service and good breakfast.

name: Waitsboro Campground
overview: A campground located on the shore of Lake Cumberland operated by the US Army Corp of Engineers. The campground is open April-October and features 17 RV sites with electric hook ups and 5 primitive tent only sites. This facility also features a boat ramp, shower houses, a laundry, and picnic areas.

name: Anker Hostel
overview: 290 beds. Very centrally located, 5 minutes walk to the central station or Grünerløkka.

name: Hotel Uyah Amed Spa & Resort
overview: 16 spacious bungalows and one family villa (4 persons) with private bathroom and solar heated water. Takes environmental considerations seriously. Simple in-house spa, restaurant and bar. Bicycles for hire.

name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson
overview: Free high-speed Internet, continental breakfast, and indoor pool.

name: Herberg De Koppelpaarden
overview: A two story apartment with separate bedroom, kitchen, dining room and living room. Nicely decorated in the style of the 1900s.

name: Olevi Residents
overview: Really nice and comfortable hotel in the middle of the Old Town. Free internet access. It has a very good hotel restaurant. The building is from the 14th century and has lots of character.

name: Hotel de Rouen
overview: 3 min walk from the Louvre.

name: La Maison Marigny Bed and Breakfast
overview: One of Travel & Leisure Magazine's TOP TEN B&Bs.

name: Sea Rock Inn
overview: A coastal bed and breakfast, Sea Rock Inn located along Agate Cove offers cottages and suites with ocean views and luxurious amenities.

name: International hotel
overview: Recently restored, it has an indoor swimming pool.

name: Dolphin House Beach Resort
overview: Resort near Nagaon Beach

name: Novotel Köln City
overview: The Novotel is further south and faces the ''Pier 15'' building across the busy Bayenstrasse. The rooms are very standard Novotel fare.

name: Hotel Raunerhof
overview: The four star hotel is next to the Reiteralm-planai ski slope with a direct view over the Enns Valley and the Dachstein mountains.

name: Beomeosa Temple Stay
overview: You can stay at the Beomeosa temple, learning and practicing Buddhism. Note that this is immersive, so not really to be treated like a hotel.

name: Best Hostel
overview: <br> Hostel is nice enough but not the kind of place where people hang out and talk to each other.

name: The Ein Gedi Field School Inn
address: On route 90 about 1 km north of the Kibbutz, follow roadsign to Field School
overview: Inn rooms fit for families and groups in a location offering a great view of the oasis underneath

name: Peachtree Inn
overview: Modern hotel over ground-floor retail plaza, 74 rooms and suites, conference facilities for 20-200 people.

name: Crystal Suites
address: Vegetable & Fruit Market Road, Way 6702, Block 167 Wadi Kabir
overview: It offers 78 well appointed suites, all of which have a 32” LCD TV, DVD player, electronic safe box, and direct dialling facility. Some of its amenities are a restaurant serving finest Mughlai and Afghani recipes from ‘Kareem’s of Bombay, an open to sky Atrium with children’s play area and dining facilities, and ballrooms with 1000 persons capacity for marriage receptions, and corporate and private functions. They also undertake out-door catering facilities wherein Crystal Suites will offer unique experience to the local public and tourists.

name: The Westin Bellevue Dresden
overview: The only luxury hotel in Dresden on the "other" side of the river (in Neustadt), right at the riverbank, next to the ''Japanisches Palais''. Originally built in the 1980s as a part of the state-owned DDR chain ''Interhotel'', it was taken over by Starwood in the 1990s. While the hotel uses photos of the reconstructed baroque building in its marketing, most of the rooms are in the much less impressive expansive wings. The "belle vue" the hotel name alludes to is the view of the Innere Altstadt, that some rooms providing sweeping vistas of, while the others offer views the much less picturesque Hotel Maritim on the other side of the river and the rooms with "Neustadt view" face communist-era blocks across the busy Grosse Meissner Strasse. | image=Dresden bellevue2.JPG

name: Extended Stay America - Olympia - Tumwater
overview: A hotel designed especially for longer stays with studios featuring fully-equipped kitchens and plenty of work space.

name: Camping Zierikzee
overview: The camp site is located on 15 minutes walk from Zierikzee centre. A bus station is on 200 meters distance.

name: Saluja Residency
overview: Business Centre is complete with all modern facilities like secretarial services, fax, Internet, e-mail, photocopying.

name: Catalonia Atenas
overview: One of the three ''Catalonia'' hotels in the area, this one is a tad north from the Clot train station. Rooms are small, fixtures and furniture have their best times behind them but prices are very reasonable.

name: Hotel Split
overview: Hotel Split

name: Quality Inn Monarch Shores
overview: Amenities include high quality furnishings, heated swimming pool, complimentary wireless internet access, free deluxe Continental breakfast, microwaves, refrigerators, coffee makers, irons, hair dryers and satellite TV in every room.  100% non-smoking.

name: Location Hostel
address: Admiralteyskiy prospekt (Адмиралтейский просп.), 8. Entrance shared with restaurant 'Olivie', top floor.
overview: Good and new hostel in the city centre almost in front of the Hermitage. Great staff and good and clean rooms. Free towel. The showers are ok, worked all the time, but the ceiling in showers is not too high! Free WiFi for all customers and an internet computer to use.
