Microwave, fridge and washing machine available but no cooking plate available. 24h reception. - +7 (812) 490–6429 - Tea/coffee (during the day)+ berry cake( in the morning time), - Bed linen, towel incuded-

name: Acme on Malaya Morskaya Str
overview: Stylish, modern design. Rooms come with a fridge, TV-set, tea/coffee makers, and WiFi. Non-smoking.

name: Hotel Adagio
overview: A luxury boutique hotel featuring a fresh design that bridges its Spanish Colonial Revival architectural roots to a clean and contemporary design aesthetic. 2½ blocks away from the Powell St Cable Car line, 6 blocks from the Moscone Convention Center.

name: Hótel Frón
overview: By Laugavegur, the main shopping street.

name: Trump International Hotel
overview: 64 floors. Sweeping panoramic views of the city. 1,232 suites and 50 penthouse suites, complete with floor-to-ceiling windows. The Spa at Trump and Health Club.

name: Hotel Panizza
overview: 3-star hotel in central Milan Magenta district, offers 22 rooms at affordable rates.

name: W Barcelona
address: Plaça de la Rosa dels Vents, 1
overview: Located beachfront along Barceloneta boardwalk, the hotel has 473 rooms, including 67 suites, two WOW suites and one Extreme Wow Suite with 360 degree panoramic views.

name: Oban Youth Hostel
overview: A SYHA hostel. 4, 6 and 8 bed dormitories housed in a large Victorian building, on the Esplanade. Great sea views. Within easy walking distance of the town centre.

name: Prince Albert Guesthouse
overview: Victorian home with a very large front patio that looks onto Commercial Street. Hot tub and gardens in the back. Each room offers a private bathroom, cable TV with DVD, iPod connections, air conditioning (in season), ceiling fans, mini fridges.

name: Cottonwood Campground
overview: Located next to the park's south entrance. 62 sites, water and flush toilets. There are also three group sites available for $25 per night.

name: Roaring Billy Lodge
overview: Located two minutes from the town center, this homestay offers two bedrooms with shared bathroom and a special cooked breakfast.  Your host Billy is a seasoned bushman and offers educational walks in the evenings.

name: Courtyard Denver Airport
overview: Free 24 hour shuttle service to & from the airport.

name: Hostel Kutaisi
overview: In the hostel Kutaisi you will be served by experienced people (English spoken). Amenities include free Wi-Fi, internet, linen, towels, shampoo, coffee, tea, cable TV, maps, different guide books, advice about Kutaisi and Georgia in general.

name: STF Hostel Malmö City
overview: Rönngatan 1. The IYHF hostel in town. Dorm bed 180 SEK, singles from 325 SEK, doubles from 430 SEK. Add 45 SEK to the price if you're not a member of the IYHF. It opened in 2006, so it's relatively new and fresh. Helpful staff.

name: St Michael's Abbey
overview: For something a bit different, why not stay in a Benedictine monastery? Male visitors may stay in the monastery itself and share the monks' daily lives. Separate accommodation exists for female visitors and families. All such visits must be pre-arranged and are entirely at the discretion of the monks themselves.

name: La Casa Roja
overview: Hostel located in an old renovated mansion. The shared kitchen is huge and excellent. It's a party place, so it can get a bit noisy. Run-down area. Pool.

name: Hotel Nuh
overview: It has an impressive lobby area but a bit shabby rooms. The rooftop restaurant has views of Ararat. WiFi

name: Gran Mahakam
overview: A premium hotel at the Blok M area. Classical interior with grand rooms and restaurants. Rates do not include breakfast, but it includes an exceptional selection. Its restaurants, Le Gran and Aoki, are well-known despite is priciness, inviting diners from even outside the hotel to delight themselves.

name: Travelodge Swords
overview: An ideal accommodation for anyone travelling through Dublin Airport, the Travelodge offers comfortable, three-star guest rooms as well as an on-site restaurant. The hotel is a short walk from Swords Main Street.

name: One Malaysia Guesthouse
overview: Free pickup from transport terminals, free WiFi, free English newspaper, free mineral water. Very kind and friendly owner. Please call in advance.

name: The Claiborne Mansion
overview: An outstanding 19th century mansion, an impressive guest list, and a wonderful hostess, Cleo. In and of itself worth a visit to New Orleans.

name: The Old Kirk bed and breakfast
address: The Old Kirk, Dyke, by Forres
overview: This traditional Scottish Kirk was built in 1856. The conversion into a 3 room bed and breakfast is an imaginative blend of traditional materials and modern touches retaining the character without creating a gothic atmosphere.

name: Dragon Hill Spa and Resort
overview: If you have never been to a ''jjimjilbang'' then this is perhaps a good place to start. A little on the pricey side for a bathhouse but the premises is modern, gaudily theme-decorated and incredibly tourist-oriented. Extensive signage exists in English, Chinese and Japanese as well as dedicated multilingual staff, even in the dead of night. Has the usual array of spas, saunas, heated sleeping rooms and Korean restaurants plus a small Japanese-style game arcade, screen golf, swimming pool (swimwear required), terrace restaurant and outdoor cinema on the roof. You can also have your photo taken in traditional Korean attire if you so desire. Sleeping mats are in short supply in line with Korea's favorite running gag, but headrest cubes and blankets are unusually available by request from the locker room attendant with a ''very'' hefty deposit: be sure to guard them well in the wee hours. All expenses incurred are charged to a wrist tag and paid for upon departure. Oversize luggage storage available and promise of a Capsule Hotel in the near future.

name: Residencial RosymarInn
address: 16 Rua Tenente Valadim (known as Rua Madragoa) Praia, Santiago
overview: Newly renovated bed & breakfast located in the heart of the city of Praia, known as Plateau, near the Presidential Palace. Friendly staff, very clean and quiet rooms. Breakfast included.

name: Le Meridien Munich
overview: Le Meridien has all of the old-world flair one expects from a charming European hotel, combined with modern amenities. High speed internet access and sleek conference rooms for business meetings provide an elegant atmosphere for corporate events.

name: Appartements & Zimmer Almhof
overview: The country house "Almhof" offers recovery amidst pure, untouched nature, a rich breakfast buffet and comfortably furnished rooms and apartments.

name: Century Park Hotel
overview: Good quality four-star hotel with spacious rooms. The fitness and pool areas are nice, and there's a good view of the city if you're sleeping at the higher floors. Breakfasts are particularly nice with a large selection of Western and Asian cuisine.

name: Blenny House/Cabins
overview: Jenny offers remote cabins for two people and a full family house for 6, but possibly more people. the accommodation is on the quiet end of West End on Roatán. So the noise from nightlife is far away. The location is beautiful. The cabins offer a double bed, private bathroom, porch with ocean view and outisde kitchen. The family house has two nicely decorated bedrooms with bathroom in each. Upstairs is a huge living area and surreal ocean view terrace. It has a kitchen with oven, microwave, cooking facilities, dishwasher, etc. Jenny is a good host and she will make your stay is comfortable.

name: Bikercamp Camping & Pansion
overview: 2 double bedroom, and 1 triple bedroom. Run by a biker since 1991. Offers showers, a pub, and laundry service. Free parking. Tent space: 25 little

name: Hotel Bristol
overview: The Bristol is a Warsaw landmark in its own right, imbued in history. Heads of state, royalty and various celebrities of different eras stayed here during its many decades in operation. It is also directly on the Royal Route, a short walk from Old Town and not far from many other historic attractions. Recently renovated again, it joined Starwood' Luxury Collection of prestige hotels.

name: Orzu Hotel
overview: A two star hotel. 34 Rooms, Sixteen singles, sixteen doubles

name: Emperador Terraza Hotel
address: Jiron Fitzcarrald 191, corner with Nauta St
overview: Located right off the Plaza de Armas (Main Square) in Iquitos, this small, charm and elegant hotel is situated close to the city’s famous historic buildings, banks, ATMs, malls, tourist services, and convenient located 2 blocks away from the riverwalk. Emperador Terraza features a classical and contemporary design, with 12 comfortable rooms with modern amenities including flat screen TV, air conditioner or electric fan, telephone, fitted closet, safe box, private bathroom with shower, hot water and 110/220 volt outlet. A mini-bar is also available for a small additional charge. Additionally, the hotel features 24-hour reception desk, breakfast/bar room, room service, wireless Internet area, Internet PC (wi-fi), luggage storage and specialized tourist information. Their staff is friendly, polite, helpful, reliable, and are excellent in providing advice, some of them speak English. They accept MasterCard, Visa, American Express and Diners cards. Book in advance is strongly advisable. Rates include continental breakfast (it may be delivered to your room).

name: Gardenhouse
overview: A selection of rooms and bungalows. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Bud Gett Hostel
overview: This modern hostel is situated half way between the railway station and the city centre. Its decoration is inspired by a Dutch painter Piet Mondrian and beds are made when you arrive.

name: Hotel Lakolk
overview: Great location, you can walk right through the dunes to the wide beach. Also have 4-person family apartments with a small kitchen.

name: Le Bourget Aero Suites
overview: Complimentary wireless high speed internet access, a European style bistro & espresso bar, on site fitness center, heated indoor pool, and business center.

name: Hello 2 Hotel
address: 31 Chau Van Liem St, Ninh Kieu
overview: Friendly and comfortable. Massage and spa in-house.

name: Hotel St. Regis Detroit
overview: Luxury hotel in stately European styled elegance, casual, old-world feel, intimate setting, urban location, fine restaurant, La Musique - Cajun steakhouse, private fitness center, and 10,000 sq. ft. of meeting space in the historic New Center area with Cadillac Place, adjoins the beautiful Fisher Theatre, a National Historic Landmark, featuring Broadway shows, behind is Cuisine (French) Restaurant. Nearby are Ford Hospital, Wayne State University, Motor City Casino, and downtown.

name: Bulldog
overview: Friendly hostel in the heart of the Red Light District. A coffeeshop is conveniently located on the ground floor, this is also where you get your breakfast.

name: Park Inn
overview: Modern concrete block on the other side of the river from the Swan.

name: Mercure Den Haag Centraal
overview: The main upside for staying at the Mercure is actually not having to see the outside of the building, which is an ugly block clad in blueish plastic. Otherwise, this Mercure is a business-oriented hotel with very modern appointments and a brilliantly central location, leaving not much to be desired - and charging for that appropriately.

name: Sanboen Campground
overview: This campground has tent spaces and a large cabin (with electricity, running water, and kitchen) for rent.  There is also a playground and zip line.

name: Skyway Hotel
overview: You'll probably think you're at the wrong place when you arrive and see the red tiled roof, immaculately shaved lawn and smartly clipped box hedge. Once you go inside, it's clear that this place doesn't see too many big-spenders. The reinforced concrete construction with internal courtyard keeps the public areas cool but make sure there is a fan in your rather dilapidated but not too unsanitary room. Like most tourist offerings in Entebbe, there's a 24/7 armed guard and a high wall. There is a 4.6kW standby generator. Two channels of centrally-selected satellite TV are available in most of the rooms and almost all have an ''en suite'' shower, wash hand basin and WC. Make sure you ask for a mosquito net since most of the room windows are not screened. Intermittent Wi-Fi via Orange cellular ISP and a meagre breakfast is included in their tariff. The 8 bunk dormitory on the first floor is a light and airy room with windows (without net screening) opening on to a mature shade tree. The large bathroom for this dorm actually has a hip bath and hot water and each bunk has individual mosquito nets. Popular with those few UN staff that have to pay for their own accommodation. Main business is budget safaris. ''Room tip'': Room 7 on the second floor is larger and quieter than most, is fairly effectively mosquito screened (May 2014) and has views from 2 windows in two walls set at right angles.

name: Mercure Doha
overview: A four-star hotel belonging to the Accor group. Located pretty much in the town centre, it has a sauna, a swimming pool and various restaurants. Shuttle buses go regularly from and to the airport. Its location means you can actually walk around and see things just outside the door (unlike most Doha hotels, which are someone isolated), but it is also a little less tranquil.

name: Sea Breeze guest house
overview: Central but quiet location. Dbl with fan: 60BZD, with a/c: 80BZD

name: The Astor
overview: Kabab-e-Que restaurant +phone=+91 33 22829958

name: Skanstulls vandrarhem
overview: You don't require a STF card at Skanstulls vandrarhem but the prices are still cheap and the standard is higher than the STF hostels. And compared to the STF hostels, this is more flexible. Skanstulls hostel opened in May 2007 and is a clean and central hostel. Very close to popular SoFo. Book in advance since it is almost always fully booked.

name: ViaVia Guesthouse
overview: Some rooms have A/C and/or ensuite bathroom; every room is different, but all are clean and comfortable. WiFi is available. Breakfast is served at the guesthouse, plus they have an excellent restaurant and tourist agency nearby.

name: Hotel Monte Vista
overview: Stay at the same hotel where some scenes of Casablanca were shot. Opened in 1927, the hotel hosted such illustrious guests as Bing Crospy, Spencer Tracy, and Jane Russell, and is widely reputed to be haunted.

name: Seagull Hotel
overview: Seagull is probably the best hotel in Cox's Bazar. It is modern and safe, with its own landscaped walkway to the beach. It does have a hidden bar - from the reception area, walk towards the main restaurant and turn right, then through part of the kitchen and upstairs. Nice swimming pool outside.

name: Rastila Camping
overview: The only camping site inside Helsinki borders. Seventeen minute metro ride from the Central Railway Station.

name: Hotel Twentyseven
overview: This cool designer hotel is located a few meters from Rådhuspladsen. The rooms are small but have a very stylish minimalist feel. Prices are in the mid-range, The Absolut Ice Bar is next door where the walls and seats are made of ice, and the Absolut cocktails are served in ice glasses, is operated by the same guys The walls, bar and seats are also all made of ice.

name: Madera Kubo B&B
overview: Another good spot for birdwatchers.

name: Gunners
overview: Upstairs from the restaurant and bar; long-term rates avail.

name: Hotel Northern Lights
overview: Small hotel in the lower part of town, the priciest and arguably the best hotel in town but don't expect anything too fancy. There's a small café downstairs, breakfast must be ordered the night before.

name: Hotel Victory
overview: On the southern side of the city, about 15 minutes walk from the centre.  A friendly and upmarket hotel.  Rooms have air conditioning and wireless internet works well throughout.  Excellent breakfast with lots of fresh fruit and pastries.  Dinner in the restaurant - about €10 for a meal with drinks.

name: Inn at Marina del Rey
overview: 68 rooms, including 36 suites. Amenities include: complimentary continental breakfast each day, free high-speed wireless Internet, outdoor heated pool, exercise room, interior courtyard, covered/secure parking.

name: Holiday Inn Cologne-Bonn Airport
overview: Within walking distance of the airport (unless you have a lot of luggage), but they run a shuttle. Sometimes you can find a decently-priced room here when prices in town go through the roof. Nothing (but the airport) in walking distance.

name: Hotel Madrid Preciados
overview: 4-star hotel in excellent location.

name: Albergue Juvenil
overview: Nice [[Hostelling International|HI-Hostel]] close to the center. With kitchen and Internet access.

name: Royal Orchid Sheraton
overview: This is a luxurious hotel at the banks of the mighty Chao Phraya River. It is close to River City shopping mall and the express boat.

name: Motel 6
overview: This is part of a budget model chain.  It offers clean rooms in a convenient location.

name: Sherry Netherland
overview: Full concierge assistance, elevator attendants, beautifully furnished rooms.

name: Wink Hostel
overview: High style and high tech converge at Wink Hostel, the flashpackers’ travel accommodation of choice. Featuring "pod" style custom-designed beds, Wink's designer concept indulges guests with their private sleeping sanctums, while allowing for socialising as well. 3 min walk to the train station.

name: Hotel De Las Letras
overview: Old building with tasteful modern interior. Well sound-proofed against the busy Gran Via outside. Very comfortable beds. Rooms with TV, hi-fi, mini bar, bath/shower. Optional breakfast buffet with wide choice of good quality food and drinks. Pleasant, comfortable bar.

name: Bud's RV Park & Marina
overview: 31 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Handicapped access.

name: annette O Mahony
overview: Award winning 5 star Failte Ireland guesthouse over looking Brandon Bay . Pamper your self in our luxurious spacious beautifully decorated rooms with panoramic sea views, Irrestible breakfast/lights meals menu offered,Listed in all major guides.

name: The Strand
overview: A deluxe colonial hotel built by the Sarkies Brothers in 1901. Meticulously restored, the Strand has huge airy rooms with vintage fittings, teak flooring, and furniture, a cafe and bar.

name: Pabos Borough Campground
overview: Open early Jun through late Sep. Boasting an ideal location at '''Pabos Borough Park''' directly adjacent to some of the finest beaches in all of Quebec, Pabos Borough Campground is a perfect choice for families with children as well as inexperienced campers—a number of trailers and tents are available for rent for those without their own, and themed celebrations including "Pyjama Day" and "Western Day" are a hit with the younger set. Pabos Borough Campground has 128 campsites; water, electricity, and sewer connections (or any combination thereof) are available, as well as primitive campsites located directly on the beach. There's also WiFi Internet, a public phone, a children's playground, horseshoe pits and a pétanque terrain, an extensive network of hiking trails, laundry facilities, and a community lounge with a small kitchen area and indoor activities available for rainy days. Shower and toilet facilities are handicapped-accessible.

name: Gulevi Safranbolu
overview: Housed in three adjacent mansions all dating back to 18th century.

name: Backpacker's Inn
overview: Actually a school, more or less converted into a youth hostel in summer. It is large (320 beds) and really centrally located, close to the subway (200 m), and within walking distance to downtown. There is a shopping mall and several supermarkets nearby. The showers are in a separate building (since the only ones available are those at the gym hall), and the sleeping rooms (14 beds) are classrooms. Breakfast (decently priced) and internet (expensive, go to an internet café instead) are available. If you need a cheap place to stay and want to meet a lot of people, this is for you. 135 SEK in the dorm for STF members [http://www.stfturist.se/] and 180 SEK for non-members. However, one should be careful about his luggage, thefts occurred.

name: Sunset
overview: (Closed in summer). Located at 190 feet below sea level, Sunset has 270 sites with water, flush toilets, and dump station. NO Fires Allowed.

name: Sheraton Ambassador
overview: Excellent rooms in upscale hotel, two blocks to Macroplaza. Free valet parking, excellent on-site restaurant.

name: Lido camping
overview: This camping site is on the lakefront on the opposite side of the lake (from Schliersee). The downside is the noise from the close rail tracks (hourly service from 7:00-23:00)

name: Hotel du Manoir St-Denis
address: at rue Ontario; metro Sherbrooke or Berri-UQAM
overview: A clean, modern, comfortable room with color cable TV, telephone, air conditioning, hair dryer, fridge, private bathroom, continental breakfast, and high speed wireless internet.

name: Fantasy Island Beach Resort
overview: Resort with air-con rooms, satelliteTV, refrigerator, telephone and tennis courts.

name: Hotel Fischerstüberl am See
overview: Hotel and restaurant with fish specialities from the Tegernsee.

name: The Inn at 7 Central
overview: A blend of space, amenities, privacy and location. 13 rooms all with private entrances in the center of Provincetown.

name: Backpackers SR
address: Rruga Mithat Hoxha Num 10, Lagja 4 Sarande, 7500
overview: Centrally located in the heart of town, close to everything Saranda has to offer.  Bus route 6 min walk, Corfu ferry 1 min, Bus st. to Ksamil/Butrint 1 min, Bus st. to Greece 2 min, beach in front of the hostel, the famous promenade (xhiro) on our doorstep, the farmers market, fresh fruits & vegs 1 min. Open year-round.  14 dorm beds in a new building.  Free breakfast.  Free wifi.  Kitchen.  Free Security lockers.  Free linen & bedsheets.  Free coffee and tea.  Roof terrace.  Beach BBQ dinners in front of the hostel in the summer.   Run by Tomi, a local resident, who is such a nice and helpful guy.  He will make you feel right at home by going out of his way to help you out.  Knows lots of information about day trips to Butrint and the Blue eye.

name: Sari Inn House
overview: Modern 2 story, 4 bedroom house (sleeps a max of 8) built in 2006 & renovated in 2012. Fully equipped kitchen to cook for yourself or you can have the chef cook for you. All bedrooms have ceiling fans and A/C and are lockable. The main bedroom has an ensuite and both bathrooms have hot water. Large spacious living area and 2x lounge rooms with TV and DVD. Spacious tropical gardens and fully fenced swimming pool. Room rate includes breakfast, airport transfers and local transport.

name: Yyterin Kievari
overview: 20 beds (+20 In the summer). Located near the Yyteri sand beach.

name: Courtyard Kuwait City
overview: ''Much'' nicer than your average Courtyard, but priced to match.  22 stories of understated modern style built around a soaring atrium.  Large but shallow rooftop pool, decent gym, free wired Internet in every room and wifi in the lobby, amazing breakfast buffet.  Directly connected to the Arraya Centre shopping mall.

name: CAB INN Scandinavia
overview: Quite large hotel with small rooms, which is to be expected from a Danish budget hotel. Many rooms have bunk beds. On the upside it is centrally located and very close to the Forum metro stop, and staff is usually welcoming and accommodating.

name: Bridge Cafe Bed and Breakfast
overview: Small and friendly Brecon town B and B, with just 3 rooms especially for hikers and cyclists.  Log fire, real coffee, free WIFI, plenty of maps and guide books to borrow. Evening meals Fridays and Saturdays from Easter to end of October.

name: Hostal Romandia
overview: Located in a quiet residential district, the Hostal Romandia is a central bed and breakfast style accommodation perfect for business travelers, students, or guests who want to get a good night's sleep in order to discover the fascinating city of Santiago's attractions during their stay.

name: Brookhaven House B&B
overview: Brookhaven is a purpose built, family run, Irish Tourist board approved guesthouse overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and Waterville Championship Golf Course. Within easy reach of other championship Golf courses in Killarney, Tralee and Ballybunion.

name: Brunelleschi Hotel Milan
overview: The Hotel Brunelleschi Milan is a reputable 4 Star in the centre of Milan close to the Duomo and La Scala Theatre.

name: Ryan Mansion
overview: An exceptional 5-star Bed and Breakfast located in a Heritage home in downtown St. John's.  Marble en suite baths feature heated floors and therapeutic tubs for two. Extravagant suites are arranged over 6 rooms and offer the ultimate in guest accommodation including en suite baths featuring personal steam/shower rooms and century old tubs carved from granite! A collection of local, national, and international artworks, sculpture and artifacts are exhibited throughout the mansion, and a cozy library offers a selection of books & games.

name: Calumet & Arizona Guesthouse
overview: A bed and breakfast in a beautifully-restored historic home.

name: Hotel Santa Susanna Resort
overview: Santa Susanna Resort is approximately 1.2km from the beach and approximately 900m from the tourist part of the town. The hotel has 215 rooms.  There is a daily bus service to the beach and town free of charge for the guests from 9.00 until 22.00 hrs (last bus) and it runs every 30 minutes.

name: Zaya Guesthouse
overview: Zaya has two locations in the city center, and both are in modern recently renovated apartment buildings. The place is more suitable for a person looking for clean and calm place to sleep than a backpacker looking for a rowdy and noisy dorm. Free wireless internet in the rooms. Also organizes tours.

name: Chakrabongse Villas
overview: An absolute splurge accommodation, these are three private apartments in an amazing garden setting with a riverside view at Wat Arun. The villas are beautifully decorated and furnished with dark wood, silk and teak floors. Amenities include air-conditioning and a small pool. Very expensive though.

name: The Swan
address: Mereside Rd, Bucklow Hill, Knutsford WA16 6RD
overview: A Premier Inn

name: The Priest House Hotel
overview: Country house, scenic location by the river Trent

name: Hotel Montana Palace
overview: The only four star hotel in Krusevo, with excellent restaurant. The view of Krusevo is breathtaking. Prices are lower than you might expect for such a hotel. There are directions to this hotel from most places in town.

name: Maritim Strandhotel Travemünde
overview: Completed in 1974 and has 35 floors. The completion of this building was a milestone for the tourism industry, and it is still the tallest building on the German Baltic coastline at 119 m. This edifice houses the hotel, a pub and on its top floor a restaurant with wide views over the complete region. The spa area is completely renovated but the rooms are not. It is very popular for receptions and associations or company parties, so reserve in advance during holiday seasons.

name: Hotel Canal Beagle
overview: On the Beagle Channel near the harbor.

name: Ritz Carlton
overview: This high-rise hotel is one of the newest in downtown, with stunning views from the upper floors. It's across the street from LA Live, the Convention Center, and the Staples Center.

name: Hampton by Hilton Birmingham City North
overview: The new Hampton brings some colourfulness to Birmingham's economy hotel market, merging new with old as it is located in a building dating back to 1910. Its name honestly describes its location northwest of the city centre.

name: USA Hostels
overview: The #1 rated hostel in Los Angeles (by hostelworld guests) in 2007 and 2005, USA Hostels is in the heart of Hollywood off Hollywood Blvd on a quiet side street. This 150-bed hostel offers female and mixed 6- and 8-bed dorms and private rooms, free all-you-can-make pancakes, free coffee and tea all day and free wireless internet. The hostel runs many free and discounted activities and tours and a free shuttle three times per week to Venice and Santa Monica beaches.

name: Armenian Royal Palace
overview: Not big hotel in a quiet area of the city.

name: Rosersberg Palace
overview: A 17th century Baroque palace built at the height of the Swedish Empire, used as the summer residence of Charles XIV John (named Jean-Baptiste Bernadotte, serving as Napoleon's general, before his coronation) during the early 19th century. The palace museum offers guided tours during summer. Textile furnishings are original; this is very unusual, as textiles are normally replaced as they wear out through the years. The palace contains an early replica of the [[United States]] Declaration of Independence, gifted from the USA in 1801, as well as other interesting artifacts.

name: Praga
overview: four star

name: Hotel Tekla
overview: Located among student housing in the neighbourhood of Palosaari north of the city center. Take bus line 1 from the market square to get to the location. Evening sauna (not on Sundays) and free passage to the gym is included in the price. Some rooms are used as student housing during winter.

name: Best Western Hotel Reykjavík
overview: Just outside the city centre, 10–15 minutes walking, but well located with regards to the bus system.

name: St Davids Holiday Park
overview: is set in an idyllic location of outstanding beauty with its own private beach with stunning views of the coastline and Red Wharf Bay.

name: Beijing Fuhao Hotel
address: 45 Wangfujing Avenue (王府井大街45号; Wáng fǔ jǐngdà jiē)
overview: The hotel offers 104 air-conditioned rooms with mini-bar, cable TV, free internet and fridge. Among its facilities are Lao Chongqing Hot-pot City Restaurant, Wangfujing Roast Duck Restaurant, a sauna club, and a night club/KTV.

name: The Bulkeley Hotel
overview: Built as a Georgian show piece in 1832, the hotel now boasts a garden with a terrace, as well as a fine restaurant, a coffee shop, a bar and a lounge. The Bulkeley Hotel offers stylish rooms. Creative cuisine prepared with local produce is served in the hotel's restaurant.

name: Hotel Kauppi
overview: A budget hotel/motel about 1 km from the city center, near Kauppi recreation forest.

name: Redwood Inn
overview: Standard but clean budget motel which is just one block away from Van Ness Ave, so it’s convenient for public transportation and for getting to other areas like [[San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf|Fisherman's Wharf]].

name: Genjiyama Park
overview: HUGE park, very beautiful and quiet, has rest huts, toilets, beautiful views... your one and only park if you ever stay in Kamakura (and you should). Absolutely no drawbacks, one of Japan's best parks for camping.

name: Red Palm
overview: A small hostel in a historical 2-storey building with friendly hosts. Basic but clean rooms upstairs and offers broadband Internet and a hang-out lounge downstairs. There is a small bbq area in front of the house. Downside is there is only 1 combo bathroom shared by all hostel occupants. Free Wi-Fi and 2 computers available.

name: Guest Hotel Manggar
address: Jl. Eks Bioskop Mega, Lipat Kajang 2, Manggar
overview: If you are stuck, or decided to tuck yourself at the east coast, this is the best accommodation available. Limited number of rooms, but modern and fancy.

name: Columbus Motor Inn
overview: The Columbus Motor Inn is in the nice part of North Beach, on the border of the Fishermen's Wharf district, within easy walking distance of all Fisherman's Wharf attractions, and from Washington Square. Public transportation is very convenient, with the No. 30 bus stopping at the door, and the Bay and Taylor Cable Car Turntable a short walk away. Rooms are spacious, with good views and balconies on most Columbus Side rooms. Parking is limited, but covered: the first two floors of the building are parking, with all guest rooms above. No on-site food, but nearby restaurants cater to every budget and taste.

name: La Maison Anglaise
overview: Award-winning Responsible Tourism - Authentic Moroccan Experiences with longstanding guides. The guest house is staffed by experienced and knowledgeable English-speaking staff who offer our guests traditional hospitality and authentic food and a wide range of activities that offer an insight into culture and environment in a spotlessly clean and well-managed 9 bedroom guest house, conveniently located for both visits on foot to places of interest in the town and the wider region of scenic mountains (both the High Atlas and the Anti Atlas, the parched range which borders the Sahara), valleys and the Atlantic coastline. Holidays are tailored to visitors interests; special interest group holidays in a subjects as diverse as dancing, art, wildlife, bird watching and yoga  amongst others. Special diets catered for

name: Doogles
address: Follow the dirt road past the bus station and taxi's.
overview: Mulonga place, near the bus station, this South-African run place is a travelers meeting place and fairly cheap. Very popular among expatriates and is quite lively around happy hour. Rooms start from 10 USD/night. Skyband Wi-Fi access, pool, convenient location. Highly recommended.

name: NH Rijnhotel
overview: Located on the River Rhine, this hotel offers 68 guest rooms with stunning views and many tourist attractions within a short distance.

name: Malibu Country Inn
overview: A charming Cape Cod style hotel tucked along the beachside bluffs of Malibu.

name: Crockfords Tower
overview: All-suite hotel exclusively for casino high rollers.  Even if you aren't staying here, take a peek at the lobby and its several million dollars' worth of Chihuly glass.

name: Vila Americana
overview: Four-star villa close to the Green Forest with apartments and pool, visited by diplomats and officials.

name: Hotel du Lac
overview: Great location, reasonable prices, free wi-fi, nice swimming pool

name: Tirconaill
overview: Beautifully refurbished home, located in the village of Swords, only a 7 minutes drive from Dublin airport and on direct swift bus link to city centre. ( 20 minutes ) Also located 3km from Malahide railway station. There are many restaurants and pubs one minute walk away. All our bedrooms are ensuite with TV, hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities. There is free private parking at the rear of the house and prices include breakfast.

name: Boszorkany Hostel
overview: Student dormitory open to travellers in July and August. Every two double rooms share a bathroom, a toilet and a fridge. As an extra, every room has broadband internet access for free: 100Mbit/sec! You can park your car here for free, too - just a few minutes far from the center.

name: Edale Youth Hostel
overview: The YHA youth hostel is a particularly large establishment, offering a range of services. Advance booking during school holidays and weekends is advisable.

name: Village Hotel
overview: IQ Farnborough business park

name: La Place Rendez-Vous
overview: Resort hotel and convention centre on the shores of Rainy Lake. Free wireless internet in all rooms. Restaurant and bar on site.

name: Whalers Cove Resort
overview: Collection of spacious beach condo rentals that include daily housekeeping and kitchens.

name: Hotel at Conference Aston
overview: Situated on the Aston University grounds, the Conference Aston is a convention centre with an on-site hotel. Hotel guests can enjoy the facilities of the Woodcock Sports Centre across the road, including a full-sized Victorian swimming pool

name: K+K Hotel Opera
overview: “Váci utca” is just a short walk away, while the “Opera” underground station is right next door.

name: I Portici Hotel Bologna
overview: A luxury property in the heart of town, walking distance from the main train station, the city centre shopping area and nearby to Bologna fair exposition area. Four stars.

name: Ramada Resident Hotel Dresden
overview: In the southeastern suburban district of Laubegast, halfway between Loschwitz and Pillnitz but on the eastern bank of the river. Do not mistake it with the other Ramada, which is also outside of the city centre, but not really near this hotel.

name: Hotel des Alpes
overview: The second cheapest hotel.

name: Sheraton Lagos
address: 30 Mobolaji Bank Anthony Way, Airport Rd, Ikeja
overview: Close to the MM International Airport in the heart of Ikeja. Offers 325 guest rooms and 7 suites with high speed Wi-Fi access

name: Stayokay Zeeburg
overview: This 480 bed hostel is located to the east of the city centre in a typical Amsterdam neighbourhood. Amsterdam's historic centre is less than 15 minutes away by bike or tram. The hostel is in the same building as Studio K, a budget diner and movie theatre.

name: Sawasdee Smile Inn
overview: This hotel has a unique colonial architecture, with more than one hundred rooms available. Sawasdee Hotels is a big chain with plenty of other locations as well. Things can get impersonal, the cleanliness is so-so and rooms are very basic and small. It really is for backpackers only, who do not have a lot of demands. There are other hotels in the area that offer bigger rooms, more amenities and better service for a similar price.

name: Okan InterContinental Astana
overview: The first luxury hotel in Astana, the service is very good and the room quality is consistent. Singles/doubles from KZT 46000. A very good breakfast bar is included, and there are is a popular Italian restaurant (Pucchini's) and an eastern-style (Turkish) restaurant, as well as a pub on the mezzanine floor. Expensive (but fast, reliable) wireless internet, and a nicely equipped business center. A nice range of conference facilities. Unfortunately, the once nicely equipped gym (pool, exercise room/equipment, saunas) is closed through the end of 2007 for a full renovation. Located in the old area of town, within walking distance from many restaurants, it is a long way from the government buildings on the other side of the river now that the government has moved.

name: Casa Malibu Inn
overview: Located on the beach in the heart of Malibu.  It is quaint among Malibu hotels, with only 21 Beachfront and GardenView rooms and suites.

name: Hotel Bahia 2
overview: Gets bad reviews on various web sites.

name: InterContinental Cairo Citystars
overview: A 790 room property.

name: Lánchíd Design Hotel and Restaurant Budapest
overview: Superb view. - A ‘quick breakfast’ (a cappuccino or a tea or a hot chocolate plus an orange juice and two croissants) is available in the bar of hotel for €4,99.

name: Nikko Minshuku Narusawa Lodge
overview: A Japanese traditional guest house.

name: Hotel Great Value
overview: Offers modern facilities.

name: Designer Hotel Greulich
overview: Located in the heart of Zurich's vibrant Aussersihl district, the stunning Hotel Greulich is a haven of style and comfort with a renowned gourmet restaurant. Online booking.

name: Waverley Inn
overview: Unique 19th century property downtown, filled with antiques. Rooms start from $109, and vary according to the season.

name: Marina Hotel
overview: Has good views of the harbor, but with two nightclubs is quite noisy at night. Free wi-fi available only in lobby.

name: Novotel Munich City
overview: Opened in 2004, this 4 star hotel has 307 air-conditioned rooms, a modern restaurant and bar with terrace, free spa area with gym, swimming pool, sauna and steam bath, underground parking and a separate conference centre with terrace and 5 modern meeting rooms. Two restaurants and a garden terrace (summer only). Buffet breakfast €19 per person.

name: Spolohi Hotel
overview: Has 49 beds, some luxury suites.

name: In Itinera B&B
overview: Bed and breakfast art and design in the heart of Palermo. Rooms with free wifi, minibar, bathroom with shower or bath and Chromotherapy, air conditioning

name: RM Guesthouse
address: 2F RM Building, North National Highway corner East Rovira Road, Bantayan
overview: Wi-Fi available.

name: Best Western Plus Calgary Centre Inn
overview: 5 min walk to 39th Ave LRT (tram) platform. No pets. Complimentary breakfast, indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton
overview: All suite accommodations with complimentary breakfast buffet, high speed Internet, and 24 hr. business center

name: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Upper East Side
overview: Free high-speed Internet & large work desk in each room.

name: New World City Hotel
overview: This hotel is for those on a lower mid-range budget. Rooms are okay, and some of them have a fun view over the canal. Some rooms are a bit dated though. It's only a short walk to Khao San Road, but is still far enough not to be annoyed by noise.

name: Baymont Inn & Suites
overview: Free Wi-Fi Internet, continental breakfast, and indoor pool.

name: Sheraton Langkawi Beach Resort
overview: In 38 acres of spacious, lush tropical surroundings with private beach coves.

name: Poroholma Camping
overview: . Open in summer 15 May - 31 August. A nice camping ground located by the seaside in Otanlahti. You can sleep in a hostel dormitory, cabin, your campervan or your tent. Also has a guest harbour if you're arriving by boat.

name: Ermitage Bouquet Hotel - Rouen, France
overview: Offers 10 rooms and 3 suites (some with fireplace), furnished in Charles X style with modern facilities (hydro shower or whirlpool bath, Wifi, air conditioning, electric shutters, etc...). The staff are very helpful.

name: Sawasdee Welcome Inn
overview: This is a decent guest house that is quiet, as it is off the busy Soi Rambuttri, but still close enough so you can walk there. Rooms are dark, and you get nothing more than a bed and a sink. Don't expect English-speaking staff either.

name: Springside Inn
overview: On the North end of Owasco Lake. They have newly renovated rooms and a restaurant.

name: Raha Leo
overview: Calm and clean hotel with a nice atmosphere and friendly staff that’s famous with backpackers. Run by a church, double rooms will only be granted to married couples. The proximity to the bus station may be useful.

name: Hotel Dafam Semarang
overview: Three-star hotel for business and leisure travellers, comfortable accommodation.

name: Furnace Creek Ranch
overview: Located in Furnace Creek, this establishment is the ranch style ''family oriented'' version of the above Inn with 224 rooms and rates ranging from $105 to $174 depending on the season and type of room. 760-786-2345

name: Yeti Hostel
overview: Two four bed rooms, one eight bed room. 24 hour front desk staff, free WiFi, free safety box, non-smoking policy, airport pick up/drop off service

name: Aliante Casino + Hotel
overview: A casino-resort hotel on the northern side of the Las Vegas valley, about a 30-minute drive from the Strip.

name: Ostello Olinda
overview: Hostel converted from an old psychiatric ward, though other buildings on the grounds are still used for psychiatric treatment. Reception desk is only open from noon to 8PM, and the staff only speaks enough English to keep the place functioning. Entry after dark requires checking in with the gate guard. No curfew, but remember that the guard-gate is closed from 1:30AM to 6AM. It is located out in the suburbs near the Affori Train Station. Easily reached from the city center by commuter trains, or bus 70. The yellow-line of the subway is currently being extended and will eventually reach this location.

name: Bethany House
overview: Founded as a retreat centre and hygienic, tranquil base for visiting Roman Catholic clergy and missionaries in 2007, Theresa keeps everything spotless and homely. Rooms are in villas separate from the main house at the bottom of the well-kept garden and have a double bed and a single bed, both with mosquito nets, although all the windows are also properly screened. Shower room has a flush WC and is ''en suite''. The ceilings are high and have a fan. There is also a tiny food preparation area with running water and a sink but no fridge or cooking facilities in one corner of the room. If you e-mail, a reliable meet and greet service can be arranged from the airport for USD10. The library in the main house has an interesting selection of tomes, not all of them ecclesiastical, but there is no internet; Theresa does usually answer emails promptly, though.

name: Watson Lake Campground
overview: Open April-October, Th-M nights only. Dry camping only, showers and toilets available (for campers only). Reservations can be made by phone or at the Parks and Recreation (824 E Gurley St) at least 7 days in advance. [http://www.cityofprescott.net/_d/camping_rules.pdf Camping rules] and [http://www.cityofprescott.net/_d/watson_reserved_camping.pdf campground map] can be downloaded; for park description see listing above.

name: Cotswold Water Park Hotel
overview: Four Pillars Hotel Group. New (as of 2014) 4-star hotel and apartments on the Lakes at South Cerney, outside Cirencester.

name: Malmaison Birmingham
overview: The Malmaison is an upscale property with an on-site spa, brasserie and wine cellar. It is located within the Mailbox multi-purpose centre.

name: Embassy Suites San Diego-La Jolla
overview: All-suites hotel.

name: San Augustine Bed and Breakfast
overview: Detached, modern, Georgian type town house. Five minutes walk to Swords, with pubs, shopping centre, restaurants and castle. On Bus route 41 to airport and Dublin.

name: Hostel Buffalo Niagara
overview: Buffalo's only hostel is a friendly, safe, and clean facility in the heart of the Theater District. The charming innkeeper and her hip staff run a first-rate facility—Hostelling International named it the third-best hostel in the United States in 2007, though Hostel Buffalo Niagara is no longer HI-affiliated—and are knowledgeable about local points of interest and worthwhile events and activities. Hostel Buffalo Niagara offers a choice of dormitory-style accommodations or private rooms, and boasts a full kitchen, game and media room, living room, a small library, and an attached art gallery (the '''BOX Gallery''') that features changing exhibits of works by local artists. The hostel is only steps away from '''Shea's Performing Arts Center''', the '''Alleyway Theatre''', and the '''Chippewa Street''' nightlife.

name: ACHAT Comfort Hotel Zwickau
overview: A reasonably-priced hotel from a German chain in the north of Zwickau, close to the August Horch Museum and right by the ''Neue Welt'' concert hall.

name: Ropi open wilderness hut
address: between Ropitunturi (945m) and Akkispahtatunturi, at the east bank of Ropijoki
overview: Open wilderness hut (8 persons). Wood fired stove. 2 km from the Roabivuopmi palsa bog. Unmarked paths from Iitto and Ropisalmi (both about 11 km). Pitfall remnants upstream Baikaboldnejohka on the way from Ropisalmi.

name: Polus Pansion
overview: Reception daily 06:00 - 21:00. From 21:00 - 06:00 there is a surveillance monitoring system and security guard !A shower, toilet, sink, television, safe and fridge in the rooms. The upstairs rooms are air-conditioned. Rooms: eleven double, one suite (with two rooms and with a mini kitchen), 3 four-bed-rooms (suite-like with a mini kitchen).

name: Vacation Apartments in Cartagena's Old City
overview: Renovated US-style studio, 1 or 2 bedroom apartments (can also be combined to make 3 or 4 bedroom apartment) with cable TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, fans, linens (including beach towels), washer/dryer, hot water, and full kitchen (except studio which has a mini-kitchen). The studio and one bedroom apartments have balconies. www.VacationRentalsCartagena.com

name: Bienville House
overview: Lovely courtyard, pool and balconies

name: Hotel Carlton
overview: A reasonably-priced boutique hotel with decorations that feature international travel. Non-smoking and pet-friendly hotel, and certified as a green business. Saha Restaurant in the lobby serves Arabic fusion cuisine.

name: Cardigan Coastal Cottages
overview: Luxury 12 person farmhouse, offering both B&B and self-catering holidays.  A large, luxury barn cottage sleeping up to 16 and a 2/4 person barn cottage, both available for self-catering breaks.

name: Horizon holiday cottages
overview: Offers fully-equipped self-catering family cottages and cabanas in a rural coastal valley suburb of Cape Town. Easy access to the beaches, the city and its many attractions,

name: Karmei Avdat Farm
address: 10 minutes south of Sde Boker, following a sign to a dirt road
overview: An agricultural and touristic farm with three double rooms and three family huts. Tours in the farm and lectures about wines and agriculture in the Negev can be arranged

name: Zleep Hotel Ishøj
overview: Very compact rooms and few of them are a bit run down. Sometimes the reception is manned, but most of the day you check in through a computer located at the hotels entrance, which inside a shopping mall on the 6th floor - but it is hard to beat the price which has a free breakfast included.

name: Hotel Kaduku
address: at Sheshi Demokracia, immediately next to the Rozafa Hotel
overview: Highly recommended - friendly staff, large clean room with A/C, right in the city centre.

name: Hotel Pavlou
overview: In the heart of Neorion Bay in front of the beach. Recently renovated.

name: Hotel Moskva
overview: Decent hotel, Soviet-style, renovated in 2010. Convenient location, friendly staff, clean. Great selection of food for breakfast. Poor soundproofing. Some rooms have old furniture and bad WiFi.

name: Kosenda Hotel
address: Jl. KH Wahid Hasyim No.127, Jakarta
overview: Midway between Thamrin and Tanah Abang. Boutique hotel that applies concept of brown wood throughout its furniture and colors. 3 restaurants with minimalist design.

name: The Octagon Safari Lodge
overview: With Irish Pub

name: Pangoni Beach Resort & Spa
overview: 50 single, double or triple suites with their own equipped kitchen. The rooms are equipped like apartments with everything from entertainment systems to kitchen equipment and cutlery, some also have a private jacuzzi. Two bars, a restaurant, a pool and a private beach.

name: Mornington
overview: In a calm area.

name: NH Salzburg City
overview: This 4* hotel offers comfortable rooms and is located in the heart of the city. The hotel itself is very modern and offers many amenities to make the stay very comfortable.

name: Hotel Essaouira
overview: The hotel has singles with a shared bath from Dh 50 and doubles from Dh 90. It is more or less like the others, but it's all painted in the traditional way, which gives it charm. Toilets and showers are bare-bones, a norm at this price range. Hot water does not stay hot for long. Overall a very good value and comfortable place from which to explore the old town.

name: Hotel & Palais Strudlhof
overview: The Hotel is next to the famous stairs "Strudlhof".

name: Malibu Shores Motel
overview: Located across from Surfrider Beach, this motel is more well-suited for families than most Malibu hotels.

name: Hotel Foresta Chokai
overview: Hotel and onsen on the base of Mt. Chokai.  There is a restaurant, a cafe, and a gift shop.  It's about 10 minutes by car to Yashima Ski Area.

name: B&B Iris
overview: Friendly family run B&B. Comfortable, clean but smallish rooms with shared bathrooms. Which can be a bit noisy. It is possible to camp as well. Owners can help arranging transport. They also organize dinners parties gathering all guests together backpackers style. Nice setting and fantastic views over the river. Great meals.

name: Hotel Laxmi Park
overview: With a restaurant serving Indian, Chinese and Tandoor food with room service. ICICI Bank and SBI ATMs are available

name: The Hub Hotel (formerly Mamba Point)
overview: They have one of the best restaurants in town, including a smart sushi restaurant. The hotel has been upgraded and renamed. It now has a nice swimming pool.

name: Rådvad Vandrehjem
overview: Really out of the way place in the middle of the forest, on the Mølleå river, in a house which used to be a boarding school dating back to 1917. If you really want to escape the rush, this idyllic village is a good option. You better have a canoe and your own wheels handy though, as the bus only goes here 5 times a day. Otherwise it is a 20 minute walk through the forest to the nearest bus stop that sees regular traffic.

name: The Pines (B&B)
overview: The Pines Hotel is fully licensed and prides itself on its home cooking and friendly atmosphere. Over 20 rooms, wireless internet, private car park and wheel chair access. There are facilities for small conferences, wedding receptions and private functions. A beer/patio garden open all year. New restaurant serving Greek and Cypriot cuisine, the Chef is Greek national

name: Baan Nitra Guesthouse
overview: 11 rooms and 2 dorm rooms with 2 bunk beds each (4 people/room), one shower and a big fan. Each bed has a locker. Clean simple, and cheap.

name: Camping Scandinavia
overview: This campsite has 400 pitches available with sanitary blocks available nearby.  There is also an indoor swimming pool, sauna and fitness room for you to enjoy.  If you ever need any supplies you can always run down to the onsite shop for convenience.

name: Hôtel Les Amandiers
overview: The hotel rents apartments too, some of them have sea view.

name: NH Hotel Maastricht
overview: About a 25 minutes walk from the city center, but very convenient if you are attending a conference or fair in the Maastricht Exhibition & Congress Centre [http://www.mecc.nl/source/mecc_maastricht/e_index.asp] next door. The hotel is comfortable enough, however, only the "deluxe" rooms really come up to the standards of other NH hotels. The standard rooms look tired by comparison, and some of them are quite noisy.

name: The Ein Gedi Beit Sarah Guest House
address: On route 90 about 1 km north of the Kibbutz, follow roadsign to Field School
overview: A guest house just on the border of the oasis with 51 rooms, some of which with balconies.

name: Ibis Hotel Antwerpen Centrum
address: Good location in the city center, near the Stadschouwburg theatre and the Vogeltjesmarkt.
overview: While the room rates tend to be low, the breakfast in the hotel tends not to be, but fortunately there are plenty of cafes in the immediate area and a market on the ''Theaterplein'' square in front of the hotel Saturday and Sunday mornings. If you're a very light sleeper try to get a room on the side that doesn't face onto the ''Theaterplein'' as the market traders start setting up pretty early!

name: Atlant
overview: Two star +phone=+380 312 613799

name: The Old Presbytery
overview: 10 rooms, goofy floor plan, nice lounge, quiet, fine breakfast. Double €110, bigger double €150, biggest double €170, family quadruple €180, 2 quadruple suites with no breakfast €170, free wi-fi and internet access, private parking.

name: Route 66 International Hostel
overview: Only hostel in town - it's a cozy little place with friendly staff and a nice patio. Centrally located, within walking distance of Downtown and fairly close to Old Town.

name: Czech Inn
overview: With it's chic-modern design, Czech Inn offers a wide variety in accommodation from shared rooms, private double rooms, and apartments. Breakfast buffet served daily, with a trendy bar to try your favorite Czech beers and cocktails. Prices from 275Kč for a shared room and 1,250Kč for a private double room.

name: Bunratty Castle Hotel
overview: Sophistication and classic style are the hallmarks of the renowned Bunratty Castle Hotel, which is part of the Blarney Group Hotels. The Hotel has been restored to its rightful position as one of the most intimate and charming hotels in the west of Ireland. It embodies the highest of traditional values, with spacious rooms, glorious dining and a spa of exquisite indulgence.

name: Hyatt Place Albuquerque Airport
overview: Great airport hotel.

name: Bazpackers
overview: Inverness, IV2 4AB, Clean and informal. This hostel is quite small so booking in advance is advised. They have a resident cat called Polly. £ 15 Dorm.

name: Memanbetsu Lakeside Campsite
overview: Period Jul - Sep. Located side Lake Abashiri. There is hot spring near.

name: The Doctor's Inn of Berea
overview: A bed and breakfast located in a Greek revival style home.

name: Smart Hostel, Hotel and Apartments
overview: 5 minutes away from U Seestr.

name: The Greathouse Inn
overview: A house constructed in 1917 featuring 3 bedrooms and within walking distance of Berea College.

name: Hilton Prague Old Town
overview: 305 rooms, including 20 suites in a central location, 5 min walk from Palladium shopping centre. Gordon Ramsey's Maze Prague restaurant is open throughout the day. Kosher food is available.

name: Ciragan Palace Kempinski
overview: This hotel is in a residence of the last Sultan. Rooms come with air-con, TV, minibar and safety deposit box. Hotel has several restaurants and lounges, pools, jacuzzi, Turkish baths, gym and other amenities.

name: Hotel Izmailovo Gamma-Delta
overview: On Saturday and Sunday there is a ''Vernisazh'' market. *Note: this hotel cannot issue visa support documents, make sure you have another way to get your Moscow visa voucher.

name: Hotel Dion
address: Joska Jordanoski Str. b.b. (ул. Јоска Јорданоски  бб), City Pool
overview: 14 rooms: double, rooms with 3 beds and rooms with 4 beds, all with bathrooms, TV, telephone and internet.- Phone. +389 0 48 430965

name: Pan Pacific Sonargaon Hotel
overview: For a long time was considered one of the top hotels in the city. In room internet access is available and works well. The hotel also has a swimming pool to enjoy.  A room on the Pacific floor (7/8) will cost US$290 including breakfast. These rooms are a good choice since laundry and wired internet access are included in the price, plus a free bar in the Pacific lounge from 18:00-20:00. There are good restaurants and service is excellent throughout the hotel.

name: Romantik Guesthouse
overview: One room and one apartment. - Bedding, refrigerator, kitchen with equipment, pets are allowed, satellite TV.

name: Røsnæs Kro
overview: Located in the middle of the Røsnæs peninsula, a perfect starting point for exploring Røsnæs.

name: Guest house Hutorok
overview: Comfortable homestay in old style Karakol house. 2 Bathrooms, 10 beds, nice garden, good food, quiet, about 1.5km uphill walk from town near Park Pobeda. No English spoken. The houses are from 1938 and 1960. On the way to the ski resort of Karakol. Booking through Nomad's Land Ecotourism agency.

name: Chateau Les Aulnois
address: 61, Rue du Général de Gaulle, Pierry
overview: Recently refurbished chateau & former champagne house, now a small luxury hotel with gourmet food.

name: Steigenberger Hotel de Saxe
overview: This hotel of the German luxury chain is located in a reconstructed historic building and appointed inside in various shades of beige and brown. Unusually for Dresden, it is the most expensive rooms that are located on the floors within the sloping roof, so the gain in surface they offer does not translate into usable space. | image=Steigenberger Hotel de Saxe am Neumarkt.JPG

name: Traders Hotel
overview: The newest and best hotel on Male, run by the Hong Kong based Shangri-La group. It's outfitted like a 5-star hotel... and priced to match.

name: The Fairthorne Cottage Bed and Breakfast
overview: Rooms with fireplaces, comfy linens and robes, feather pillows, whirlpool tubs, beach chairs and bicycles.

name: Bear Valley Ger Camp
address: 8 km from Ölgii, 5 km west of airport
overview: A tourist camp with ten gers and a restaurant that serves local and international fare. The camp has hot showers, indoor toilets, WiFi internet and computers, and laundry service. Meals are included in the price of rooms.

name: Magnolia Hotel Denver
overview: Downtown Denver hotel featuring guestrooms and suites, a restaurant and bar, and event space for meetings, weddings, and special occasions

name: Ambassador Conference Resort
overview: Convention centre, extensive athletic and recreational facilities, indoor water park. JM's Restaurant and Lounge on-site. Near train station.

name: Sama-Sama Guest House
overview: A laid-back guesthouse with 8 rooms. Rooms are basic, with no air-con. Large, friendly hang-out area with "no TV, just reggae" and occasional live music, and a nice back courtyard with burbling fountain. Laundry available.

name: Clarion Hotel
overview: This hotel has a huge atrium with indoor pool and arcade. A restaurant and sports bar are attached. The hotel features a Hertz rental kiosk.

name: Fosshotel Baron
overview: Located on the eastern edge of the city centre close to the main shopping street Laugavegur. Rooms on the upper floors on the northern side have great views across the sea. There is a 24/7 supermarket right behind the hotel. There is a restaurant, bar and tour desk. There are many types of rooms and price ranges.

name: Hotel Pension Enzian
overview: A friendly, family run hotel with large double bed rooms. Small hotel with a personal atmosphere. Within 1 minute foot distance is a S-Bahn station and a good Spanish restaurant. Serves breakfast, wireless is €4 per day.

name: Scandic Malmö City
overview: Rather large rooms (family rooms up to 38 sqm), all featuring kitchenettes, which can be very handy for longer stays

name: Hampton Inn & Suites
overview: Rooms come with two queen beds or a king bed. Suite options are also available. Amenities include free hot breakfast, free Wifi, free bike rentals, a free shuttle service to downtown (operates between 7AM and 8PM) and gym/fitness center with sauna and whirlpool.

name: Jeunotel
overview: This hotel near the university and sporting complexes offers 55 Casual rooms aimed at younger travellers, with 6 rooms designed for the needs of chaperones.

name: Grant Village
overview: The Grant Village lodging options consist of two six story buildings containing fifty rooms each. This hotel complex provides the basic amenities without some of the flair of the Old Faithful Inn but at prices that are a bit lower, and Grant Village may have greater availability due to the number of rooms available there. There is a post office nearby, as well as a cafeteria, a soda-jerk diner, and a sandwich shop in the complex, as well as a reservations-only restaurant serving local fare. Even if you decide not to eat at the restaurant, do go in to check out the large array of beautiful photographs taken by one of the long-time Yellowstone Maintenance heads, who is also one of the park photographers. Open late May through late September.

name: Emir Palace
overview: 4* hotel.

name: 25 hours Frankfurt by Levi's
overview: This hotel by the German "lifestyle hotel" chain features design elements inspired by the Levi's jeans brand. The rooms are in different colors 60´s or 70´s or 80´s style. There is a music rehearsal room on location as well, available for rent.

name: Citin Urbana Samui
address: 199/99 Moo 6, Bophut, Koh Samui Surat Thani 84320 Thailand
overview: Modern setting and only a few minutes away from the beach.

name: Hôtel Albert Premier
overview: Elegant four star hotel situated close to the old city and Central railway station. 42 rooms with en-suite bathrooms, restaurant, internet access, sauna, fitness room, garage, meeting facilities.

name: Betekints Hotel and Restaurant
overview: **** Room prices include:  buffet breakfast, spa complex and the Camera guarded, enclosed parking. - The hotel consists of two parts, the buildings of the hotel and the guesthouse, offering 38 rooms of different categories. - Services: Internet access: line and wireless Internet in the rooms and in the public areas. (ask the receptionists for access code), Minibar (The fridge of the room is only available for the drinks of the hotel). Air-con rooms. Restaurant (Breakfast from 07.00 – 10.00 o’clock, there is a possibility to take away a breakfast bag), other time: 11.30–15.00 and18.00-23.00, Wellness and Fitness services(steam cabin, Finnish and infra sauna, mashed-ice machine, solarium, varied massage services and cosmetics treatments, adult and child swimming pool, Jacuzzi and the bar in the pool area ensure the body-soul comfort. Gym lessons. Open daily 07:00-21:00, Fri and Sat 7.00-22.00), Laundry, Ironing and Dry-Cleaning (On demand – for extra charge), Pet (can be brought into only in superior rooms or in the deluxe apartment), Facultative programs (Bike-renting,–for extra charge, please indicate your demand on weekdays 24, on weekends 48 hours before,– hiking, walking).

name: NH Berlin Mitte
overview: Renovated in 2008, this hotel offers 392 spacious bedrooms, meeting rooms and a spa.

name: Caritas Oswald International House
overview: Also located in Tin Wan. It is a budget-priced hotel close to local markets and convenience stores.

name: Hostal Ciudad de Segorbe
overview: A tranquilo place, not yet discovered by the backpacker crowd. Run by a friendly Spanish-Colombian team, this hostel provides cozy, wooden floor rooms with clean bathrooms and steaming hot showers. The owners have good knowledge about the region. Breakfast is included and is, for once, not a synonym for cheap cereals or eggs and arepa.

name: 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
overview: Bed and breakfast. Pet friendly rooms available.

name: High Peaks Hotel
address: 163 Cook Flat Road - Lake Matheson Road
overview: 54 rooms with bathrooms.

name: Radisson SAS
overview: Four star hotel

name: Laurel Inn
overview: Built in 1963, this renovated hotel has a comfortable yet fashionable interior. Each room is spacious and similar in size to a studio apartment with some even having kitchenettes.

name: Hotel Astor
overview: A small but elegant hotel close to the trainstation and a short walk from the town center. Most of the rooms have their own Finnish style sauna. The price depends on which day you are staying. Weekends are cheaper as are some summer months.

name: Plaza de Armas Hostel
overview: On the central square with a great view out over the plaza near the subway and museums. Small (located on an upper floor of a building) but lively place with good staff. Free internet with three computers, Wi-Fi throughout the establishment, common room equipped with a two TVs and a DVD player.

name: Scandic Eremitage Hotel
overview: Part of the Scandic chain of hotels, which is one of largest mid-range hotel-chain in Scandinavia, and housed in the same building as the Lyngby Storcenter mall (see listing in buy section), the hotel have recently been renovated.

name: Ambassador Hotel
overview: 18-room hotel. Several rooms have baths in addition to showers. Popular restaurant on the first floor.

name: Mississippi Headwaters Hostel
overview: Operated by Hostelling International through a partnership agreement with the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources.

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel
overview: Renovated in 2011 the Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel inear the old town and Königsallee shopping district

name: James Island County Park and Campground
overview: This park has over 600 acres, walking and biking trails, a dog park with a lake, kayak and canoe rentals, a waterpark and a 124 site RV park that is first class. There are also lovely furnished cabins with nice views of the wetlands and an area for primitive camping. It is on James Island, but is approximately 6 miles from downtown Charleston and approximately 7 miles from Folly Beach.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kingman
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pool, laundry facilities and gym.

name: Hotel Omuhi'piti
address: Close to the fort in the north of Stone Town
overview: Now reopened following refurbishment and is the nicest (and only) hotel on the island. Air conditioned rooms. Prices start at MT2,600/night.

name: Abineau Lodge Bed & Breakfast
overview: A quiet hideaway with 8 rooms, 6 miles south of Flagstaff. Away from the train noise but close enough to enjoy all the region has to offer.

name: Dobrodiy Hotel and Restaurant
overview: Wi-Fi, Cafe

name: Guesthouse Na Tsvetochnoy
overview: free WI-FI  +phone=+7 905 619-6255

name: The Royal Lotus Hotel
overview: Giving you modern living conditions in a tropical setting and nestled alongside the Giritale Tank.

name: Astoria Palace Hotel
overview: One of the newest hotels in Rio. Fantastic rooftop pool with a great view of the beach.

name: Holiday Centre Järvisydän
overview: 30 min. drive from Savonlinna, in the village of Rantasalmi, right next to Linnansaari National Park, offering excellent surroundings for nature activities all year around. Summer cottages villas. Medieval style restaurant Piikatyttö.

name: Comfort Hotel
address: Across the square in front of the train station
overview: A business hotel conveniently located next to the train station. Rooms are small but clean, and the price includes breakfast.

name: Lanikai Resort
overview: Large suites overlooking the ocean and garden. Set on a sandy beach on Wailua Bay.

name: Home Inn (Beijing Jiaodaokou)
address: 113 Jiaodaokou East Street (交道口东大街113号; Jiāodàokǒudōngdàjiē)
overview: Small rooms with free internet. Business center and laundry service available. Chinese restaurant and room service.

name: Skodsborg Kurhotel and Spa
overview: The hotel is in historical buildings, which have been the royal summer residence for some years during mid 19th century. Access to fitness centre and swimming pools included in the room price. Spa treatments available against surcharge. Rooms with TV, radio, Internet, trouser press, hairdryer and desk. Restaurant and café. Rooms and food quality are great, surroundings are beautiful and quiet, but the spa is seen better elsewhere.

name: Pinnacle Hotel at the Pier
overview: Opened in 2010 and has lovely rooms and amenities overlooking the Vancouver skyline.

name: Heyward Mews
address: Roganstown Hotel and Country Club, Roganstown
overview: These holiday homes are in a courtyard setting with open plan living area and French doors onto the patio. Guests have full access to the leisure facilities at the adjacent Roganstown Golf & Country Club.

name: El Encanto Bed & Breakfast
overview: Small high quality hotel 5 minutes walking from the village and close to the Cahuita National Park where sloths, monkeys, birds and other types of wildlife can be seen. The beach is just 100m.

name: Mini Hostel Lviv
address: Sichovykh Streltsov St.,(улица Сечевых Стрельцов) 12, Ap. 16
overview: Close to the Opera House and the main square. Free wi-fi, maps, coffee, tea, and free pub crawls. Guests of the Mini Hostel Lviv get discounts for to stay in the Mini Hostel [[Kiev]] and the Mini Hostel [[Odessa]].

name: 3BE Backpacker's Hostel
overview: This hostel offers good value beds in 4 to 12 person dorms and is popular with backpackers. It's simple but clean with friendly staff, good facilities and a central location. Breakfast is not included but can be booked for an additional €7.50.

name: Grand Hotel Amrâth Amsterdam
overview: An upscale hotel established in the monumental Scheepvaarthuis, the first building in Amsterdam School style that used to be the headquarters of six shipping companies. Breakfast is not included in the lower rates, but all include Wi-Fi.

name: Mahai Camp Site
address: In the valley below the Cascades
overview: Stands with and without electrical plug points are available, be sure to specify when booking if you need electricity. Ablution facilities are clean and well maintained. There is a laundry with coin operated washers and dryers, dish washing facilities (''including boiling water on tap'') as well as Telkom card and coin pay phones. The only problem with the camp is the large number of pine trees that consume huge amounts of water causing some of the stands to be devoid of grass. After the summer rains this is not as big a problem, but if you visit during the winter it is best to avoid electric stands 1 to 14 and 42 to 50; electrical stands 15 to 25 will have a lot more grass cover and less dust. If you do not require electricity, non-electrical stands 3 to 5 are probably the best in the whole camp. There are two security guards on 24 hour duty in the camp, mostly to ensure that wildlife that wander in is promptly escorted out again (''Baboons seldom come near the camps as they are shot at with paintball guns to scare them away, but bushbuck often wander in'').

name: Arbor Inn at Griffin House
overview: 1 1/2 miles from Hamilton College. They have parking.

name: Jasper Inn Alpine Resort
overview: Cozy fireside accommodation and casual fine dining.

name: Arctic Polar Oy
overview: Nice 2–6 persons apartments and a restaurant (Arctic Mutteri).

name: Hotel Meridian
overview: Located between city center and Solombala, with shared bathrooms in cheapest rooms.

name: В Тбилиси!
address: Intersection Tsinamdzgvrishvili Street ~53 and Giorgi Mazniashvili St
overview: Homestay/hostel run by Gia, a friendly elderly man who, besides this hostel, helps tourists to explore the wide surroundings of Tbilisi, also with his ancient blue Moskvitch taxi. The rooms are large, the beds comfy and the sheets and shower clean. Gia speaks way better Russian then English though.

name: Budget Inn
overview: Clean and basic. Free wi-fi, microwave and fridge, pool.

name: Apache Spirit Ranch
overview: A guest ranch just outside of Tombstone, which also offers guided horse riding excursions, as well as lessons.

name: Bed & Breakfast Rapperswil
overview: Nice room with view to mountains. Free WiFi. Very near old-town, train station and lake. Help-yourself breakfast (but many cafés in near walking distance). 6 direct trains per hour to Zurich (36 mins travel time).

name: Gaslamp Hostel
overview: Hostel with easy access to the historic Gaslamp District. They have 4-bed and 6-bed female and co-ed dorm rooms as well as some private rooms.

name: Cape Coast Views
address: 95 High Level Road, Green Point, Cape Town
overview: Eco friendly guest house located in trendy Green Point. Central to most attractions. Walking distance to bars, cafes, shops and taxi rank. Includes secure parking, wifi, continental breakfast, solar heated pool, bar fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and more. Starting price - R550 per room. Self-catering - R750 for the unit.

name: Rapunzel Guesthouse & Café
overview: Brand new hostel located right next to Galata Tower. Hostel staff speak good English and they are very helpful. Great music, valuable suggestions, wi-fi access and refreshing breakfast is for free.

name: Stayokay Maastricht
overview: This hostel opened its doors in 2007 and offers 38 rooms. It has a deck looking over the Maas river and is a delightful place to have a beer in the evening. The hostel is clean, but as with many chain hostels, it does not have a kitchen and may lack atmosphere for those looking to meet other travellers.

name: The Provincetown Hotel at Gabriel's
overview: Historic hotel with a sunny garden courtyard and made to order breakfasts. Family & pet friendly.

name: City Backpackers
overview: Close to the central station. Clean and friendly, with free wireless internet and computers. Plenty of common areas to meet fellow travellers in, including a great café at reception. Prices range from 230 SEK to 280 SEK for a dorm bed.

name: Golden Well Hotel
overview: Boutique hotel with one of the most beautiful views in Prague and restaurant terrace leading directly to Prague Castle.

name: Tygyn Darkhan
overview: In the center of the city, it hosts one of the best known local restaurants (see [[#eat|above]]), a souvenir shop, bar, conference room, exercise room, sauna, pool, money change, and breakfast included.

name: Hotel and restaurant complex Aragvi
overview: extraphones=+380 472 551811, +380 93 2142571 - All room with minibar, Wi-Fi, air con and sat TV

name: TRYP Berlin am Ku'damm
overview: One of the hotels in Lietzenburger Strasse, parallel to the Ku'damm.

name: Hotel Fairway
overview: Three star hotel. Rooms: 27

name: Desert Dove Bed & Breakfast
overview: A romantic, secluded and scenic bed and breakfast inn, close to Saguaro National Park. Mt. Lemmon lodging.

name: Grantly Hotel
overview: No-frills budget hotel in an converted Edwardian house. Single, Double and Family rooms available.

name: Keswick Youth Hostel
overview: In a nice setting in the town by the river.

name: Negresco
overview: Famous landmark hotel in Nice. Houses Le Chantecler, a bar and a brasserie. Worth a look even if you are not staying there.

name: Oban Backpackers
overview: Private hostel, relaxed, fun, clean and cosy. Landrover day tours of 'hidden Argyll' available leaving daily.

name: Residenza Calvino Milan
overview: Residenza Calvino boasts 42 self-catering apartments for short vacations and stays. It is placed in the northern area of Milan. Services include the wi-fi internet connection, LCD TV, kitchen, bathroom and reception.

name: Hotel Keppler
overview: In the entertainment district with 34 guestrooms and 5 suites. A winter garden and bar is available within the hotel.

name: Wombats City Hostel Vienna: The Lounge
overview: It is clean and chic with a party atmosphere. Opened 2006, it touts an imperial facade from 1880.

name: Mayfield Inn & Suites Hotel West Edmonton
overview: 327 guestrooms, indoor swimming pool, dinner theatre.

name: Llyn Rhys Campsite
overview: Has 40 pitches and 4 caravan sites.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, indoor pool, gym, pet-friendly.

name: Sawridge Inn
overview: 153 rooms, most with private balcony and mountain view. Conference Centre, Hearthstone Lounge, Champs Sports Lounge, Mountain Wellness Spa, indoor pool, hot tubs, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness centre and business centre.

name: Bloc Hotel
overview: The Bloc Hotel offers ultrasmall rooms (10 sqm) all wrapped in minimalistic, modern decor, which can appeal to design enthusiasts.

name: Orto de' Medici
overview: 3-star hotel with wide choice of rooms: Romantic Junior Suite, Deluxe room with view on the garden, Superior Room with private balcony and view, Classic and Family rooms. The name comes from the historical garden ("orto" in Italian), where Lorenzo de' Medici used to train young sculptors, including Michelangelo. Calm atmosphere, breakfast served on a patio, Terrace Music Bar from April to October.

name: NH Atlanta Rotterdam
overview: The Atlanta combines a historic 1930s building with a newer one adjoining De Bijenkorf department store. While the common areas entice with art deco charm, some of the cheaper rooms have fallen behind the times and are now badly worn. On balance, the Atlanta is in the very centre and offers brilliant views from its rooftop breakfast room and terrace, as well as from selected rooms.

name: Hotel Nora
overview: Nice location near the lakes and the good shopping and nightlife options in the district. Newly renovated (2002), and it comes with free wireless internet and breakfast buffet.

name: Columbia Resort Travemünde
overview: Casino and hotel in one complex that opened in 1825. This art nouveau building houses several rooms and suites, most with outstanding sea views. Its casino closed in 2012, and today there is an excellent restaurant and bar on the premises.

name: Happy Neko
overview: Budget accommodation in traditional Japanese style. There are many restaurants and onsens in the neighborhood. Free parking. They speak Japanese, English and Czech.

name: Sofitel La Defense
