overview: The hotel has 12 hotel rooms in simple (shared bathrooms), semi-deluxe (separate bathrooms), and deluxe (separate bathroom and sitting room). There is a restaurant and WiFi throughout. All bathrooms have hot showers.

name: Bed & Breakfast Klaas Vaak
overview: The building in the historical centre dates from 1560 and has 15 rooms. It has a garden of 1460m²

name: Hotel Twins
overview: Wide-screen TV, Discount for 3 days+ orders, Free WIFI internet

name: Doubletree Guest Suites Raleigh/Durham
overview: All-suite atrium hotel located lakeside near Research Triangle Park and ten minutes from the airport. Rooms feature refrigerator, microwave, and wetbar area.

name: Swallow Plough & Harrow Hotel
overview: Near the International Convention Centre, National Indoor Arena and the Bull Ring Shopping Centre.

name: Hotel Yeti
overview: On a side street no more than 75 m off Baidam Rd (turn near La Bella Napoli restaurant) away from the lake. Draped with flowering vines. Clean, quiet, free Wi-Fi, nice garden. Modest breakfast available. Next to the Hotel Bedrock.

name: Hotel Cumulus Lappeenranta
overview: 95 rooms with TV, radio, pay-channel, hair dryer and free broadband connection."

name: Haus Anna Bed & Breakfast
overview: A B&B near central Rauma. Offers a few rooms and breakfast. Clean facilities.

name: Saarijärvi wilderness hut
address: at west end of Saarijärvi, north of Salmivaara
overview: Open wilderness hut (10 persons) and reservation hut (10 persons).

name: Hostel-Albania
address: Rruga Beqir Luga 56, Rruga Vehbi Agolli
overview: New Hostel, opened in 2009. Old Tirana Villa with about 350m². Very spacious rooms and a large garden.

name: YHA Te Anau
overview: 90 bed hostel in the town centre.

name: Sokha Angkor Resort
overview: A new resort in the city centre with large salt-water pool and state of art lobby. The resort has 6 restaurants and bars. Guests stay at this beautiful resort can acquire temple passes at the lobby.

name: Red Carpet Inn Grand Island
overview: Convenient to Niagara Falls via the North Grand Island Bridge. All guest rooms have extended-service cable TV, refrigerator, and air conditioning. No wireless Internet service.

name: Hotel Aldero
overview: Hotel (4*)

name: Castlehaven Caravan Site
address: Castlehaven Lane, Niton, Isle of Wight
overview: Caravan park right on the waters edge giving incredible sea views.

name: Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort and Spa
overview: Part of the international luxury chain. In Bar al Jissah, which is about 30 minutes past downtown Muscat. The hotel can be challenging to find, so make sure you have a good map if you are driving. The Shangri-La is on a beautiful section of the coastline.

name: Duman Hotel
overview: Duman has 40 rooms, most are in a new building that opened in 2011. Rooms are simple, semi-deluxe, and deluxe. There is a restaurant and nightclub in the hotel.

name: Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe
overview: The Renaissance is a thoroughly modern property with floor-to-ceiling windows in the posh Avenue Wagram, just a short walk from Place de l'Étoile. The building was designed by the same Christian de Portzamparc who gave the Palais du Congres its current appearance.

name: Wyndham Bay Point resort
overview: This resort overlooks the beautiful St. Andrew's Bay in Panama City Beach. The resort houses a spa and fitness center, and offers guests an array of activities in the area including world-class golf courses, water sports, deep sea fishing.

name: White Wind Inn
overview: Built in 1845 as a sea captain's house, this award winning bed & breakfast is in the heart of Commercial Street. With twelve guest rooms and a "great" room with fireplace and grand piano, the breakfast is expanded continental.

name: Magic 24 Sauna
overview: A ''jjimjilbang'' located very close to Daejeon's primary Express Bus Terminal, this is situated conveniently for those merely passing through town. The building is a nondescript white cube with a simple backlit sign in hangul (no English) which sticks out like a sore thumb amongst all its trashy neon neighbours. This jjimjilbang offers hot and cold public baths from the natural thermal springs of Yuseong district.

name: Hotel Modelo
overview: Owned and operated by the same family for over 100 year the Hotel Modelo offers old world charm in the heart of Quetzaltenango.

name: Sparks
overview: Funky designer hotel in the corner from Mangga Dua and with good BRT access. You can choose not only your room type, but color as well (green, blue or purple). The upstairs is a loud bar with disco and dancers. Not suitable for families but may be great for bachelors or bachelorettes.

name: Hjørundfjord Camping
overview: Open from 1 June to 1 September (some cabins can be rented the whole year).

name: Mirage hotel
overview: Easily the most expensive hotel in Kazan, but in a prime location with the greatest number of amenities. Claimed to be 5-star, although in reality they seem to be on a solid 4-star level.

name: Madzsar Jozsef College
overview: PERIODS: year-round guest apartment, a guest room and a few dorm rooms  for 4-10 persons; in  season (between July 1 and August 31) for 139 persons,- ROOMs: # Double dorm rooms with sink and built-in wardrobe; # Triple-suite dorm room; # Guest Rooms: one bed, kitchenette; On every floor lounge with TV, toilets, showers, kitchen; # Guest Apartments: apartment with one double and one single room with private entrance, bath, bathroom, kitchen. - SERVICES: 24-hour reception service; closed storage for bicycles and motorcycles; courtyard parking, free Wi-Fi internet, laundry facilities; kitchen on each floor, electric cooker, microwave oven, refrigerator; fitness room, computer room; soft drinks and coffee machines; education, training, conference, suitable classrooms (between 20-190 people)

name: Motel Chandler
overview: Situated close to the '''Place du Havre''' shopping centre yet boasting a full slate of amenities, Motel Chandler is equally suitable for business travallers and tourists. Rooms contain either one king or two queen beds, as well as air conditioning, iron and ironing board, coffeemaker, refrigerator, and a flat-screen TV with cable. Soundproof rooms, local newspaper delivery, and up to one extra bed per room (subject to a $10 upcharge) are also available on request. Relax on the sundeck in the summer, in the sauna or hot tub in cooler weather, and year-round at the lovely onsite restaurant where locally-brewed '''Pit Caribou''' craft beer is on tap. Free WiFi is available.

name: Jumbo Rocks Campground
overview: The largest campground in the park, located near the junction of the park roads in the northern part of the park. Sites are surrounded by scenic granite formations.  124 sites, no water available.

name: Dusita Resort
overview: Cosy air-conditioned bungalows. Really good food and a beach you will never want to leave.

name: New Road Guest House (B&B)
overview: This friendly, family run B&B in the heart of Chippenham has ten bedrooms, five in the Main House and five in the Coach House in the garden, with a mixture of singles, doubles, twins and family rooms, all of which have Freeview TV and a hospitality tray

name: Sulaymani Palace Hotel
overview: For now, this is the best hotel in town, although it is by no means up to international standards. Nevertheless, it's a decent enough experience

name: Emirates Palace
overview: Built at an estimated cost of US$3 billion, this was by many accounts the world's most expensive hotel to build, with oodles of gold and marble plating every available surface. The scale of everything is gargantuan — you need directions just to find your way from the gate to the lobby. The hotel feels like it's straight out of Las Vegas, minus the slot machines. To visit the Palace, you will need a reservation for a restaurant or bar of the hotel.

name: Pousada Bela Vista
overview: In a charming sobrado architecture building, this is perhaps the nicest mid-range accommodation.

name: Jamaica Bay Inn
overview: resembles a West Indies resort complete with lush garden, lovely beachside pool and marina views.  Its restaurant features trellis-covered outdoor areas.

name: Crossland Economy Studios
overview: Tiny rooms, but clean and inexpensive.

name: Camping du Cap Rouge
overview: Open mid-May through late Sep. Located in the district of Saint-Georges-de-Malbaie, an easy (and lovely) 25-minute drive from Percé town centre, Camping du Cap Rouge is an 85-unit campsite that has it all: a common room and kitchen area with a stove, refrigerator and dishes, a combination bathroom/shower/coin laundry facility, a convenience store out front that sells beer and wine, basketball and volleyball courts, lawn bowling, trout fishing in the stream on the east side of the property, and a full slate of organized activities too. As for the campsites, there are spaces for tents and trailers either oceanside or inland in the woods, and the majority of sites are hooked up to electricity, water and sewer. Even if you don't have your own tent or trailer, du Cap Rouge has you covered: you can rent them (see website for rates)!

name: Paár Siesta Hotel
overview: *** 30 apartments with all comfort TV/radio/minibar/telephone/ a little kitchen. The sauna and the massage-bad, sauna, fittnes room, HUF1500 p.p. for the guests.

name: Palace Hotel Sello
overview: A brand new design hotel next to Sello shopping center.

name: Grand Hôtel
overview: A [[Grand Old Hotel]] considered to be one of the most luxurious hotels in Scandinavia, overlooking the Royal Palace. A bastion of elite hospitality, this is where the famous, infamous and traditional nobility stay, in fact room No 702 is the astounding Nobel Room, where the literature prize winners stay overnight. Its old world luxury and sense of style is well maintained in every room, with some in the Royal Gustavian style, others are intriguing traditional/modern mixes. The rooms are quite pricey but you get what you pay for in terms of service and comfort. The best rooms overlook the water, although these are highly sought after and invariably are booked out. The facilities include a fitness centre, several banquet halls, an upscale bar (the Cadier Bar), and a restaurant which gives an excellent Swedish ''smörgåsbord'', one of the very few establishments in Scandinavia that still does so. Even if you aren't staying here, its an experience to check out the piano bar, a delightful end-of-the-evening place to get a sophisticated drink.

name: City Express
overview: Amenities: Bar/Lounge, Business Center, Fitness Center, Free Breakfast, Free high-speed Internet, wheelchair accessible

name: Hotel Westa
overview: The rooms are clean, private, safe, spacious, and have private bathrooms. Located next to a market for food and clothing.

name: Hotel Metropol
overview: '''Services:'''restaurant (with a diverse cuisine), conference room, banquet hall, reception 24/7, WiFi Internet, underground parking.

name: Langi Langi Beach Bungalows
overview: A very well maintained Hotel with a nice Italian restaurant, located right after Amaan Bungalows.

name: Hotel Bethel
overview: A very good budget option with a prime location on Nyhavn and great views over the canal. Used to be a ''Sømandshjem'' or Seamans' Home, and it still shows in the atmosphere of the place - so don't expect anything fancy!

name: Bed, Brood en Eieren
overview: This authentic place is situated in Delfshaven. Breakfast eggs from their own chicken, it is claimed.

name: Kasnäs Archipelago Spa
overview: Modern spa hotel by a big marina, a ferry harbour and the national park visitor centre. Accommodation in small houses.

name: Junput Resort
overview: This is the only accommodation available there, 1 km from Junput Bazar. There is no spot booking facility so it is better to book a room before reaching there.

name: Holiday House Bed & Breakfast
overview: Three-room B&B, $20 deposit on reservation, no kids under five.

name: Haeundae Grand Hotel
overview: Unlike the three hotels named above which are located on the boardwalk or on the beach itself, this one is located off the boardwalk, however still very close to the beach (''about five minutes walk''). Good amenities but each (''swimming pool, gym, etc.)'' charges separately.

name: Hotel Le Regina Warsaw
overview: Very comfortable hotel, that wants to go out of its way to make its guests comfortable.  The hotel is located in the Old Town, but can be a little confusing to find, so be sure to take a cab or have the front desk to arrange for you to be picked up.

name: Siri Guesthouse
overview: A family-run guest house on a popular, but quiet lane. Fan and air-con rooms, all with bathrooms and hot water. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Grand Hatika Hotel
overview: Huge hotel facing Tanjung Pendam Beach. Adequate rooms, small pool, and restaurant. WiFi at lobby only. Be aware of the loud live music at the beach every night!

name: Im Wasserturm
overview: Kaygasse 2;. A luxury hotel built inside of a 130 year old water tower. It has a designer interior and a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views. Price: €180 - €840 per night

name: Beijing Harmony Hotel
overview: International 3 star hotel with only 3-minutes walk to the Beijing Railway Station and Dongdan Shopping street. Convenient location for tourists.

name: Fredensminde
overview: Bed & Breakfast.

name: Six Senses Yao Noi Beyond Phuket
overview: Spa resort.

name: Guest House Flodgård Mohair
overview: Two nice rooms share a bathroom, at kitchen and a sitting area. Clean an tidy.

name: Resort A-rosa
overview: Traditional, but completely renovated grand old hotel in the centre of Travemünde, in the middle of a green garden. It's the former spa house of the town and has an amazing outdoor pool. 185 rooms and suites with sea view. Strong focus on spa and fine food.

name: Star Hotel
overview: 61 comfortable rooms and suites: 1 Presidential apartments, 14 suites, 7 junior suites, 27 double rooms and 12 single. Built in 1920

name: Dora Guesthouse
overview: 50sqm apartment include two connecting double rooms, bath, small dining area and kitchen (coffee maker, microwave, fridge, electric kettle, electric stove, etc.). Extra beds can be ensured. All year open. Free shuttle from train station. Mail address: Vadvirág u.11, +phone=+36 30-3968249

name: Hotel Surya Pesona
address: Jl. Pamugaran Desa Bulak Laut, Pangandaran, Ciamis, Jawa Barat, Indonesia
overview: This hotel is next to a wide stretch of sandy beach. Restaurant serves freshly caught seafood. 24-hour coffee shop and massage centre.

name: Doha Marriott Hotel
overview: In a slightly out of the way location, but since nowhere in Doha is really walkable, that's not a huge strike against it. It has two towers of excellent four-star rooms and a selection of restaurants few hotels can match: the Mexican is acceptable, the pan-Asian quite good, the buffet nothing special, and the Indian really great. Alcohol is available in the restaurants, but there is no cocktail lounge or bar. There is a disco attached to the hotel that has a door policy to match Studio 54 at its 1970s peak (again though, showing up in a Maserati will get you whisked inside).

name: Mercure Paris Royal Madeleine
overview: Decorated in brown and beige, this Mercure tries to make the most out of a historic ''immeuble'', with all the necessary compromises - some bedrooms are smaller than their en-suite bathrooms!

name: Hida Takayama Temple Inn Zenkoji
overview: Clean, spacious rooms, no meals but has kitchen and owner speaks very good English.

name: Crosspoint Sofia Hostel
overview: A brand new hostel with a friendly atmosphere.Free Wi-Fi; 1m-wide spacious and very comfortable beds; metal lockers. Offers mixed and female dorms as well as private rooms. Great young staff with an attitude working there.

name: Sport  hostel
overview: Summer Hostel.

name: Nolin Lake State Park
address: 2998 Brier Creek Rd. Mammoth Cave, KY 42259
overview: The campground features 32 sites with electric hookups.  Amenities include shower houses, laundry, grocery, boat ramp, playground, and a swimming area.  The campground is open April 1 through October 31.  Reservations may be made up to one year in advance and there is a 2 night minimum stay on the weekends.

name: Hotel & Casino Marienlyst
overview: A stones throw away from the palace of the same name, this historic, 4 star, beach front hotel from 1858 is one of nations most renowned, and was thoroughly renovated a few years back. Has a private pool, wellness and conference facilities as well as one of only 3 licensed casinos in the country.

name: Chokai Plateau Hanadate Campground
overview: This campground has both tent sites, with tarps or tents for rent if desired, and cabins.  The scenic area has a nice view of Mt. Chokai.

name: Cityhostel Berlin
overview: 11 minutes away from Brandenburg Gate & Potsdamer Platz.

name: Asia Adventure Lodge
overview: Smaller hostel with a friendly family feel located right in the heart of town next to Internet cafe, banks, travel agents, supermarkets and nightlife, plus the colourful and deliciously diversified Sunday Market. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Taiyo no Sato Campground
overview: This is a very large campground in the foothills of the mountains.  There is a very small store here that sometimes has fresh vegetables and little else, so stock up in town.  There are spots for tents and RVs.

name: Hotel Atithi Aurangabad
address: P-3, Jalna Road, Seven Hill Flyover

name: Holiday Inn Birmingham City
overview: An old Holiday Inn in an office/commercial area of the centre

name: Mittry Lake Wildlife Area
overview: Managed by the BLM, with vault toilets, no drinking water, 10-day limit.

name: mk hotel münchen
overview: A simple and inexpensive two-star hotel with free Wi-Fi

name: Proton Hotel
overview: A/C rooms equipped with TV with satellite channels, free high-speed internet access and shower with bathtub. Some of its facilities and services are business center, bar, restaurant, conference room and fitness room/gym.

name: Rambuttri Village Inn
overview: Quiet series of uninspired buildings with small rooms, its main draw is its relaxing rooftop swimming pool. However, their website neglects to mention that it shuts down at 18:00 despite alluring photographs suggesting otherwise. Its rooms range from basic fan rooms to "deluxe" air-conditioned rooms. Biggest issue is the staff. If you have a problem, neither staff nor management will care about complaints nor will they offer refunds or compensation, even if it is the hotel's fault. They require a 1,000-baht refundable key deposit that can only be paid in cash (Thai baht only). If you cannot produce the deposit, they will not let you in your room even if you have already paid for it beforehand. There is no communal area. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Kettle's Country House Hotel
overview: This three-star hotel is situated in rural countryside just outside the town of Swords. The elegant hotel has 25 bedrooms and a range of special events facilities. Only ten minutes by bus to Swords with five daily services (route 41b [http://www.dublinbus.ie/en/Your-Journey1/Timetables/All-Timetables/41b/]).

name: Scandic Hasselbacken
overview: A classical hotel on Djurgården.

name: The Grand Beach Hotel
overview: The Grand Beach hotel in Tel Aviv, Israel, is your choice of Tel Aviv hotels.

name: The Old Courthouse
overview: Bed and Breakfast from 25 - 30 pounds per person per night.

name: Hotel Morales
overview: Free wi-fi, bicycles available for rent.

name: Hotel Monte Campana
overview: Many types of rooms, hostel to cabins with private kitchen and bathroom. The property has the Diligencia restaurant, and a swimming pool with slide and jacuzzi.

name: Hostellerie du Beffroi
overview: 3-star hotel. Themed stays are available in history or oenology. Languages ​​spoken: English, German, Italian.

name: Glacier Guides Lodge
overview: New in 2010. 12 rooms, 2 queen beds, private bath, satellite TV, continental breakfast, internet, wi-fi, air conditioning. Eco-sensitive operations. Part of Glacier Guides and Montana Raft Company (providing rafting, hiking, fishing trips). Open May - October.

name: Derry City Independent Hostel
overview: A friendly, independent hostel, run by two backpackers who have been traveling around the world for quite some time themselves. The hostel actually consists of three separate houses, all spread out within walking distance of the old town and the Bogside murals.

name: Red Chili Hideaway
overview: Red Chilli has moved to Butabika -- don't end up at the old location! Clean and safe accommodation ranging from camping, dorms, to private rooms. A major backpacker hangout. They've got a beautiful swimming pool, hangout space, restaurant, bar, pool table, free Wi-Fi, and generally it's a good place to get information from other travelers. You can sign up for budget trips to Muchison, and, if you're lucky, get a discounted gorilla permit if there is a last-minute cancellation.

name: Pirwa Hostels Peru
overview: Services: Free continental breakfast, free pick up, free internet access, 24 hours reception, in house bar and more.

name: Lurio
overview: Clean and modern town centre hotel. No bar, but has good restaurant that will send out for beer/wine. Internet available free on first floor

name: Lungi Airport Hotel
address: Turn right out of airport then first left
overview: Close to the airport. Has good air conditioned rooms, swimming pool, bar and power most of the time.

name: Åndalsnes Vandrerhjem
overview: Youth hostel located across the river direction Ålesund.

name: Pontiac Hotel
overview: Clean and comfortable hotel.

name: Multi Rest House
overview: Entertainment: pool, playground, sauna, restaurant, billiards, bar, cinema Catering: FB meal – 7000 AMD

name: Hotel Lena
overview: Also in the center of the city, with a bar, barber shop, and money change. Breakfast and WiFi included.

name: Hotel Cerro del Sol
overview: Design hotel with 15 rooms, gardens, swimming pool. Double room with views, parking, WiFi and breakfast from €50/night. The hotel also offers tickets for the Alhambra and forfaits for Sierra Nevada.

name: Hotel Interporto
overview: Easily accessible from the Caselle highways and the nearby Caselle international airport, the three star Hotel Interporto is located in the Turin area.

name: Sutton Place Hotel Ueno
overview: Mid-range hotel, in the Renaissance Group. Rooms have en-suite toilet. Staff speaks English. Breakfast included. Free internet access in the lobby. The hotel is located in a quiet street in Ueno, 2 minutes walking from JR Ueno Station and 5 minutes walking from subway Ueno Station. From Keisei Ueno, terminating station of the Skyliner from Narita Airport, the walk is about 10 minutes.

name: SJP Motel
overview: A family-run motel on the north side.

name: Asia Backpackers
overview: Rooms from 250 baht. Also rents bicycles for 100 baht per day.

name: Clarion Hotel Amaranten
overview: Rooms with internet.

name: Quality Inn
overview: great hotel located right off the interstate exit 14, good clean rooms, excellent front desk customer service and competitively priced.

name: Quinta Real Saltillo
overview: New luxury hotel about 10 minutes north of downtown.

name: Coffee Home Hostel
overview: Located right next to main square. Chamber hostel — 20 beds, English, Spanish, Russian speaking staff, free Wi-Fi, touristic information, free maps, breakfast, coffee & tea, linens & towels included, laundry. Coffee interior style.

name: Maple Lodge Bed and Breakfast
overview: A.A.& Failte Ireland 4 star quality B&B. Safe parking/walk to restaurants. Guest Sitting Room/Patio picnic area. Breakfast menu. We are here to advise on planning your visit eg. Relaxing beach walks/golf.

name: Admiral Hotel
overview: Charming hotel on the waterfront, in an old harbor warehouse from 1781. 10 minute walk from the little mermaid.

name: Cha Cha Villa
overview: Nice looking boutique hotel that is especially worth it for its amazing jungle gardens that include a waterfall and a pool. It also has a nice garden restaurant. Rooms have all the amenities, including air-conditioning, cable TV, en-suite bathroom and coffee/tea facilities. The views are a bit deceiving though. Do not leave valuables from your room, as you have to be careful with the cleaning staff. There are also no lockers available.

name: Inn Luanda
address: Rua Francisco Sá de Miranda, nº 50
overview: Boutique hotel located in residential area close to center.  Very clean and good air-con with free WiFi.  Breakfast was included and they can prepare lunch and dinner.  The manager speaks English.

name: The Open House
overview: An intimate 17-suite hotel set in harmony with individual surroundings and a contemporary/colonial architecture style.

name: Mini Tiga Homestay
overview: Artistic place. All rooms have fan and private bathroom with western toilet but the charm of the place is the hospitality of the owners. Free breakfast and coffee/tea all day. Free wifi. Daily homemade yogurt by the Frnch owner Catherine. Offers surf lessons and guided tours to the National Parc. Motorbike and surfboards rental. Mini bar cool drinks and cold Bintang beer. Backpacker and surfer atmosphere.

name: Kaunas City Hotel
overview: Very fresh tourist class 2 star hotel offers 44 large rooms, a cafe, grocery store, wireless Internet connection, 24 hour reception, and other facilities.

name: Hotel Park Soltau
overview: This modern hotel is located into the centre of Soltau and offers a wide range of leisure activities swimming pool, sauna, biosauna solarium or even try out the bowling alley located in the recreational area. There is an onsite restaurant where you can enjoy a quick snack or try something from the a la carte menu.

name: Oak Hotel
overview: Small, but clean and efficient rooms, free internet computers, a collection of travel books, coin laundry, and an English-speaking staff make it a useful stop for foreign visitors.  Guests with their own LAN-enabled laptops/netbooks can get free internet access in the privacy of their own rooms; just borrow a connection kit from the front desk.  Located near Inarichō Station (Tokyo Metro Ginza Line) and the Kappabashi-Dori kitchenware street.  Ueno Station is a long but manageable walk away.  Offers a discount for ISIC cardholders.

name: [[San Juan]]
overview: Tiny road side town.

name: Revolver
overview: A Beatles themed lodge and restaurant. The lodge features five cosy rooms, each named after the fab four and Brian Epstein, considered the fifth Beatle. Very affordable, each room has a double bed, attached bathroom with hot water and closet. The lodge showcases a constantly growing list of Beatles memorabilia. Free WiFi available.

name: Gran Melia Fenix
overview: Distinguished by a grand and glowing white exterior; bathed in neo-classical design; an illustrious interior of flowing banisters, bold colors, and noble décor.

name: Amrâth Hotel Lapershoek
overview: Quite a luxurious hotel in a green location. Comfort and superior rooms feature a shower, bath tub, hairdryer, phone, television and internet. Junior suite rooms also have a jacuzzi, bathrobes and mini-bar.

name: Live Good Guesthouse
overview: A basic and clean guest house. Rooms with shared bathrooms are small and spartan, and there are no power outlets. There are different kinds of rooms, the double fan room goes for 200 baht. There are internet, restaurant and laundry services available downstairs.

name: Cargills Hotel
overview: A 50 room property surrounding a beautiful courtyard garden, award winning restaurant and lounge bar. Close to University, Hospital and CBD.

name: Hotel Nest
overview: Good hotel but away from the beach. They are adding more rooms and plan to put in a swimming pool and gymnasium. The distance from the beach won't really matter since they have a jeep standing by at all hours to ferry guests to and from the beach. The restaurant has seafood such as prawn and topshe. Non-guests are welcome to use the restaurant. The hotel also has a boating park.

name: Golden Ostrish Hotel, Restaurant, and Cake shop
overview: A [http://muemlekem.hu/muemlek?id=9130 monument] . The Ostrich hotel is the former White Horse inn. [http://www.koszeg.hu/en/koszeg/varosnezes/latnivalok/golden-ostrish-hotel-69.html This] is one of the oldest hotels in Koszeg, and even Hungary. It is operated as an inn since 1597. - HOTEL with beauty salon. Capacity 35 beds. Buffet breakfast, free parking, free high speed internet access, free use of hotel bicycles - RESTAURANT: phone=+36 94 563 329 capacity 120 persons, separate hall plus 35 person. The medieval vaulted halls and floral cozy terrace with view to one of  the most beautiful squares in Hungary. Menu: Soups / starters HUF 400-1000 / 800-1300; Perch, trout, tuna/ specialitites dishes HUF 1500-2000 / 1800-2600; pork / chicken, turkey dishes HUF 1100-1450 / 1100-1450, pasta HUF 800-1000, salads / desserts HUF 500-1100 / 400-600. - CAKE SHOP with 35 seats. Daily fresh products from own bakery.  phone=+36 94 563 345.

name: La Dauphine, Residence des Artistes
overview: A Bohemian, laid-back, unpretentious, 2 room 1896 guest house for the budget-minded traveler- with a 3-night minimum; private baths, free Internet & great walking location for French Quarter-Marigny. Advance reservations required. Ray & Kim are the warm and friendly hosts.

name: Thai Cozy House
overview: Family-run guest house with decent rooms that have cable TV, fridge, air-conditioning and hot shower. The cheaper rooms do not have windows. It is just far away enough from the crowds, but close enough to the action. They also have plenty of other services, including a restaurant, travel agent and internet.

name: Sofitel Malabo President Palace
overview: 5* luxury and price.

name: The Trend Hotel
overview: Friendly, helpful hostel staff. Rooms are clean with bathroom, big windows and TV and the air-con is very strong for the small-sized rooms.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Los Angeles Downtown
overview: Featuring spacious rooms, modern decor, and a variety of amenities in Little Tokyo.

name: Sandija motel
overview: Probably the best motel in Kaunas, opened in 1996, offers 26 modern rooms with wireless internet access and a lot of amenities. Motel is conveniently located just off the Vilnius-Klaipėda motorway.

name: Colonel By Inn
overview: Hotel with restaurant, wi-fi, breakfast, outdoor pool, refrigerators, free local calls. Business meeting space for 25 people. Some rooms have balcony, DVD player, sofabed, jacuzzi tub. Extra charge for pets, cots or rollaway beds.

name: Isokurkkio open wilderness hut
overview: Open wilderness hut (6 persons). Wood fired stove. Just upstream from Isokurkkio ("big rapids"; 30m/3km), followed by Vähäkurkkio and Pahtakoski (15m/2km).

name: Hotel Arctic
overview: The world’s most northerly 4 star hotel with a 5 star conference centre. On-site restaurant, café & bar. Free of charge shuttle bus to/from the airport and city center.

name: Quality Inn King City Hotel
overview: The Quality Inn King City hotel located near Monterey Bay and Carmel in Central California. Information on local attractions, rates, rooms, and reservations. Enjoy the comforts of home when you stay at Quality Inn King City Inn! Each of our gracious Standard King, Standard Queen and Double Queen guestrooms is a model of comforting convenience.

name: Hotel & Hostel Altstadt Spandau Berlin
overview: 5 minutes away from U Altstadt Spandau.

name: Free camping in Ortanella
address: Ortanella, in the direction of Prato San Pietro
overview: The camping area is indicated with signs; it is not equipped but it has a fountain at a very short distance and there are picnic areas and the ''Percorso vita'' around.

name: Hotel Grace
overview: Two star hotel. Sixteen Dbl Bed rooms. Room Semi-Deluxe: Ventilated/Airy Rooms. Attached Washroom, Hot/Cold Shower, Color T.V. -Deluxe rooms: More Spacious & Brighter Rooms, Fridge,Relaxed Wooden Chairs & Glass Tables.

name: Arc
overview: A trendy boutique hotel with prices to match its style.

name: Spa Hotel Caribia
overview: Spa Hotel Caribia, situated on the outskirts of Turku's city centre, is good choice for families. It has a big spa decorated in Caribbean style. It also houses lots of conferences and other events. Don't miss the big and pink statue outdoors by the contemporary artist Alvar Gullichsen; Its a mix between Duck and Pig called ''Posankka''.

name: Hotel Condado
overview: C/ Aribau 201. A 3* hotel located at the business and shopping hub of Avinguda Diagonal.

name: Hyatt Regency Tokyo
overview: 744 rooms and suites with views of Mt Fuji and Shinjuku Central Park. Regency Club lounge for free continental breakfast, tea service and evening cocktails. Hosts a roof-top pool and healh spa.

name: Baan Rimtaling
overview: Dorms, single, and double rooms, and bungalows, all with hot showers. Overlooks the Mekong. Free pickup at bus stop. Free ride to border in morning. You can learn Thai cooking here or have a Thai massage. Free Wi-Fi. English spoken. Ask for Maleewan.

name: Saphari Club Hotel
overview: - 65 rooms / 110 beds.

name: The Palazzo
overview: The Venetian's sister property located right next door, The Palazzo has an extraordinary 50-floor luxury tower with 3,066 suites, along with a 100,000-square-foot gaming casino, and a 450,000-square-foot meeting and convention facility. It is home to over 60 boutiques, Barneys New York, the Canyon Ranch Spa Club, the 40/40 Club, the Broadway play Jersey Boys, and 15 restaurants.

name: Alfred Pension
overview: family atmosphere, 20 rooms for 45 persons. Sauna in the pension, Horse riding, Tennis, Massage, Garden, park, Walking course, excursions. Free Wifi internet, Air condition.

name: The Beverly Hilton
overview: Walk to Rodeo, enjoy the restaurants along the way.  Be sure to stop at the Buena Vista Cigar Club and say hello to Rigo - ask him to make a recommendation and enjoy a good smoke.  Or stay in your room and order up room service and be treated like royalty.  Circa 55 in the hotel has a delicious roasted crispy duck, or you can walk next door to Trader Vics and enjoy a Mai Tai made right.  You may not spot a celebrity here, but you will definitely be treated like one.

name: Sahafi Hotel
overview: One of the best hotels in Mogadishu. The manager is very helpful, the staff are attentive and the food is good. Although the compound is probably your safest bet, if there is such a thing, in Mogadishu a BBC producer was shot dead in front of the hotel in 2005, and two French citizens were abducted by gunmen in 2009.

name: Beach Luxury Hotel
overview: A mid-range resort hotel set amongst lush tropical gardens and palm trees, offering unique views of China Creek and the Arabian Sea. This female-friendly hotel has 82 spacious bedrooms with free Wi-Fi located at some distance from the shopping area, but close to the business district. There are 4 good restaurants including the only floating buffet restaurant in Pakistan, "Seafront BBQ", and a 24/7 coffee shop available inside the hotel. Have standard, superior and deluxe rooms, and extra person will be charged Rs 1,200/night. All guests provided with free buffet breakfast, airport pick/drop, swimming pool/gym, Free WifI, welcome drink, Deluxe and suites are on top floor and offer some fantastic views of the Arabian Sea Creek, Karachi Harbour and Mangroves, mini bar in room, tea maker, LCD TV, free laundry, assorted cookies, newspaper, and what not. Discount rate is given to corporate guests.

name: Osaka Castle Park
overview: (NOT TESTED) Very big park, public toilets, possibly rest huts. Many places to hide, looks quiet at night. Possibility of security guards during the night. Located pretty far from downtown Osaka, it's a long walk.

name: Best Western Captain's Quarters
overview: Downtown 93-room waterfront hotel on Oswego River with restaurant, pool, fitness and conference facilities, newspaper, continental breakfast.

name: Comfort Hotel Vesterbro
overview: Good location, and the lobby area is well designed, but rooms a rather on the small side, and some rooms are reported to begin showing obvious signs of wear and tear, but otherwise clean.

name: Best Western Mission Bay
overview: A kid friendly hotel off I-5 nearby.

name: LEO-Hotelli
overview: A hotel in central Myllykoski

name: Tigon Hostel
overview: The Hostel is a part of Tigon Premium Hotel, a two star hotel, offering comfortable and affordable accommodation for budget traveller. Strategically located in the central of backpacker area of Hue, the Hostel overlooks the Perfume River and the city’s most iconic landmark, Trang Tien Bridge. In addition to prime location, Tigon Hostel provides its guests with modern facilities, friendly services right in two Star Hotel with especially cheap price. It's a good choice for young travellers who love to share the dorm and be active making friends during their stays. Mixed dorm with no breakfast is $5; mixed dorm 10 bed $7; male/female dorm 6 bed $8; deluxe city view dorm 6 bed $9; private single $18; Twin $24; Double $22. Check out with them to get best price and offer.

name: Super 8
overview: Gym, indoor pool, laundry, free wireless internet, and free breakfast available. Pets allowed with a $10 surcharge and $50 refundable deposit. No smoking.

name: Oura campsite
overview: Just near the beach. Open during July, August and Golden Week. Toilets with running water.

name: Bacara Resort & Spa
overview: Located on 78 acres of oceanfront property, this resort is an upscale experience that caters to luxury travelers. There are 354 guest rooms in 19 separate villas, each in a Spanish style. Property amenities include saline infinity pools, a private beach, clay tennis courts, a 42,000 foot spa and fitness center, and nature trails through the adjoining wetland and forest. The onsite Miro restaurant provides great views of the coast with excellent food and service. With all that said, you pay for the experience, and this resort is not for the budget traveler.  In addition to quoted rates there is a $25 per day resort fee that includes a bottle of wine in your room, two bottles of water, access to fitness center and spa, and internet access.

name: StayAt Parliament
overview: A modern hotel in an old apartment building in the elegant residential district of Töölö, formerly ''Accome Töölö''. Rooms are modern, spacious and have nice views to the park across the street and to the others architecturally beautiful buildings. A twin room goes for €77–128, a one bedroom room €96–176 and the biggest two bedroom apartment with a sauna and a balcony €110–184.

name: Johanna Hostel
overview: Changed owner a couple of times and also the name but still on the same place.

name: Risley Hall
overview: Early June to late August. Single accommodations only.

name: Holiday Inn London Kensington Forum
overview: 4 Star hotel near Kensington High Street with 906 rooms offering the usual Holiday Inn services

name: Le Richemond
overview: Five star hotel with spa. Almeder suite rate as one of the top ten most expensive suites in the world. Art deco style.

name: Culver Hotel
overview: Listed on the National Register of Historic Places and located in the heart of downtown Culver City, this hotel opened in 1924 and offers a unique lodging option with rooms featuring antique furniture.  The hotel was once owned by John Wayne and served as accommodation for most of the cast of the Wizard of Oz during its filming.

name: Rånäs slott
overview: An estate with history back to the 14 century. The palace was built in the 1840s.

name: River House B&B Getaway Retreat
overview: Two waterfront bed and breakfast lodges offer northern Illinois travelers luxury Jacuzzi and fireplace suites for romantic B&B getaways as well as child friendly vacation lodging, group retreat or family reunion accommodations, or short term weekly rental.

name: Clarion Hotel Sign
overview: Branded as a "design hotel", with bold architecture and timeless furnishings.

name: HI-Lake Louise Alpine Centre
overview: A large hostel in the town.  There is a café at the hostel. In winter, dorm beds from $27 (non-member $31), private rooms from $78 (non-member $86). In summer, dorms from $34 (non-member $38), private rooms from $99 (non-member $112). Ski packages are available. Pets not allowed.

name: Kayumanis Jimbaran Private Estate & Spa
overview: 19 contemporary villas with private pool, fully-equipped gourmet kitchen and 24 hr butler service.

name: B&B-Monsanto-rooms at Taverna Lusitana in Monsanto Village
address: Rua do Castelo, 19, 6060-091 Monsanto IDN, Portugal
overview: B&B-rooms at Taverna Lusitana in Monsanto Village in Portugal is an accommodation with two double rooms with private bathroom, TV & Free Wireless Internet. Breakfast is included in the rental price. Relax and enjoy your lunch or dinner at the terrace with a view. Lunch packet on request for your excursions in the area with a lot of historical Sites.

name: Hotel Lord Berri
overview: All rooms come with air conditioning, cable TV, and free wireless internet. Choice of rooms with shared bath in the hall or suites with private path.

name: Al Muntazah Plaza Hotel
overview: Fully furnished 2-3 bedrooms apartments as well as standard hotel rooms, situated on the prestigious Al-Muntazah Road convenient for the corniche, city centre, airport, supermarkets and the shopping centres.

name: Regency Suites Hotel
overview: A boutique hotel in the heart of midtown with a mix of European charm and down-home southern hospitality.

name: Che Lagarto Hostel Ipanema
overview: Has both private and shared rooms. It is located one block away from the beach. You have access to WIFI, a public kitchen and the bar. The breakfast is included.

name: Coastgate Hotel
overview: 34 singles or doubles, all with balcony. Wi-Fi. Restaurant on the roof. Conference room. Room rates include breakfast but they also offer half board and full board.

name: Linnasmäki
overview: Affordable accommodation located in peaceful countryside surroundings just 4 km from Turku centre. Guests can use the swimming pool and sauna area.  There are plenty of hiking routes with bicycles available to rent during summer. Guests can stay in either a hotel or a refurbished hostel that also offers family rooms and apartments. Individual rooms equipped for disabled guests are also available. Plenty of free parking for guests.

name: Four Seasons
overview: The first five-star hotel in town. It has a great but expensive Italian restaurant and a decent cigar/cocktail lounge just off the lobby. The pool and beach area are for hotel guests and spa members only.

name: Llwyndu Farmhouse
overview: A traditional farmhouse B&B, with the main building dating back to 1581. Its elevated position boasts fabulous views of Cardigan Bay and Lleyn Peninsular. The farmhouse accommodation comprises of three double en-suites and The Granary has two family rooms, a double and twin (all en-suite). Evening meals served. Accolades include; Visit Wales 4* Guest Accommodation, Trip Adviser Certificate of Excellence 4.5 points, AA Diner Award 2014 and Best British Cheeseboard.

name: Iron Horse Hotel
overview: 100-year-old warehouse in one of the last intact warehouse districts, transformed into a modern boutique hotel. Between downtown, the vibrant restaurants and bars of the near south side and the happening fifth ward. Across the impressive 6th street viaduct from the new Harley-Davidson Museum. A one of a kind upscale hotel geared for business travelers and motorcycle enthusiasts alike.

name: Hotel Sans Souci
overview: Opened in December 2012, Hotel Sans Souci Wien is right across from the Museum Quarter and a 5-minute walk from the Ringstraße. The large spa area includes an indoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is available.

name: Bet el Kerem
address: Near the Tombs of the Nobles, close to the ferry boat to Aswan centre
overview: Only hotel accommodation on the west bank. Quiet atmosphere, hospitable staff, clean rooms, small (8 double rooms), restaurant for guests on the roof terrace. Marvellous view over the Nile, the desert and the Nubian villages.  Perfect place if you are looking for something different! Bike rental available.

name: Ferreira Viana
overview: As long as you don't mind climbing three flights of stairs (no elevator), this is as good a value as any among the budget hotels in the area, with friendly service.

name: YMCA
overview: Modern hostel / basic hotel next the botanic gardens.

name: Hotel Magnus
overview: A new 3-star hotel in the centre of Kaunas, near recently renovated Central railway station of Kaunas. 82 rooms. Hotel has parking space for 30 cars and at least 3 buses.

name: Le Centre Sheraton Montreal Hotel
overview: Offers 825 newly renovated rooms, free internet use in the Link@Sheraton lobby connectivity hub.

name: The Falcondale hotel and restaurant
overview: A Country House Hotel in 14 acres of grounds, including lawns, woodland and gardens. Built in an Italianate style in the 19th Century as a private house, and converted to a hotel in 1980. All 18 rooms are en-suite with free wifi internet access. A 2AA rosetted restaurant is open to non-residents.

name: Hostel Vaasa
overview: Located outside the city center on the island of Vaskiluoto in connection with Hotel Fenno. There is no regular bus connection to this location so unless you are driving or you really want to walk you need to take a taxi.

name: Hostel Colonial
overview: Nice basic hostel, with Internet and shared kitchen. It is located in the old town in an building from the 17th century.

name: Hellas
overview: just in front of a beach

name: The Ring Hotel
overview: Casual luxury five star boutique hotel. Has an unexpected interior, which mixes the traditional with the modern. Many of the building's historic details have been preserved to ensure the hotel remains all of its historic charm.

name: Hostal del Barrio
overview: Hostel in a quiet area but nonetheless quite near to the hotspots of Barrio Bellavista. The rooms are not huge but very clean, including the bathroom. The German owner cares ver much about his clients. CLP$15.000 for a single with own bathroom. Breakfast is included and is rather large for Chilean hostels.

name: County Lodge Hotel
overview: Nearly 1 mile east of the town centre, near Colgrain Station.

name: Penpark Place
overview: This hotel is quite far from Khao San Road, but on the plus side, that's why this hotel is in such a peaceful environment. It is a clean and quiet place with a nice garden and river view at the rooftop. Rooms are quite large with a wide window. High-speed internet and free Wi-Fi available. A good place to relax, meet friends, and to have an early-morning coffee.

name: Athithi Guest House
overview: A well maintained hotel at low rates with AC and non-AC rooms.

name: Cab-Inn City
overview: Part of a chain, this hotel has good small rooms at an affordable price, just behind Tivoli and Glyptoteket. 24 hour reception.

name: Lada-Service Hotel
overview: Also there is a Restaurant

name: Murree Holidays
overview: Amurree.com is the first service in Murree to provide online reservation and booking. It is situated in main city with beautiful mountains and landscape

name: Sacred Valley Inn - Kathmandu
overview: Lovely rooms in this clean, comfortable hotel in Thamel. Great location - close to all the action but on a quieter lane. Good rooftop area to sit and relax and eat. Simple but delicious food served in the restaurant. Helpful knowledgeable staff.

name: Rovshan Hotel
overview: Good service and cold beer sold at reception for UZS2,000 a bottle.

name: Saimika Park
address: 3 kms before reaching the marketplace, there is a diversion to the right. drive for 1/2 km to reach saimika park
overview: Saimika park is a 65-acre plot of land with a restaurant, 7 guest rooms, two of which are made in traditional design using locally available construction material,a dormitory is available for backpackers. A conference hall is also available. Some of the amenities include a plunging pool, a basketball court,tennis court, fishing pond and trekking guides to take you to visit community forests. There are also indoor board games available.

name: Carnegie Court Hotel
overview: This three-star hotel is conveniently located on Swords Main Street, just minutes from Dublin Airport. The hotel prides itself on providing comfortable accommodation, traditional hospitality and excellent service.

name: Hotel Vermont
overview: Affiliated with the nearby '''San Marco Hotel''' and '''Hotel Carlton''' in Leblon. Very friendly and helpful service.

name: Hotel Kong Arthur
overview: A very classic and stylish hotel with a nice and friendly atmosphere. Good location near the lakes and ecofriendly too as it is CO2-neutral. The hotel is right next door to the amazing Avalon spa, and in the summertime you can have the (really good) breakfast outside in the courtyard.

name: Plas Cadnant Hidden Gardens and Cottages
overview: Winner, Best Place to Stay (Self Catering) Wales National Tourism Awards 2013. Five beautifully restored cottages set in secluded Hidden Gardens. Walled Garden; woodlands; waterfalls. Self catering cottages with luxury accommodation. Choice of cottages from cosy Brewhouse sleeping 2 to grand Coach House (sleeps 12/13) with semi professional kitchen.

name: Manhattan Hotel
overview: Small and clean hotel opposite main station, so perfect for early departures and/or late arrivals. Free WLAN and good buffet breakfast with multilingual staff. Rooms are good but avoid rooms facing the street as the area is busy late at night

name: InterContinental The Clement Monterey
overview: A contemporary respite from the busy streets of Cannery Row. A semi private courtyard overlooks the water, with a sustainable seafood restaurant and views of the water. Pricey, modern, zen and beautiful.

name: 5th Corner Hotel
overview: Business hotel in a restored building from the 19th century. Al the rooms are decorated in warm autumn tones and equipped with AC, sat TV, free wireless Wi-Fi, safe and mini-bar.

name: Elite Hotel Savoy
overview: Central location opposite train station. Comfortable traditional hotel. Breakfast is a very relaxed affair.

name: Viramma Resort
overview: A luxury resort on the Darjeeling highway.

name: George Borrow Hotel
overview: Hotel and restaurant

name: Excalibur
overview: Named after the mythical sword of King Arthur, this family friendly hotel has a large pool and rides for the kids.

name: Tune Hotel
overview: Single room from RM70+++ (promotional prices can be as low as RM10-30+++, check website regularly several months in advance, nice and clean. A/C and other '''services are not included''' in the online price, but can be purchased separately.

name: Carlton Hotel
overview: 95 rooms 196 beds

name: Holiday Inn
overview: Not flashy, but gets the job done. Holiday Inn was founded in Memphis in 1952.

name: Lobstick Lodge
overview: Restaurant, five hot tubs, indoor pool. Fall has the cheapest rates (<$100 is common), while summer is high season (June - August).

name: KING's Hotel Center
overview: Three star hotel, cheaper when online booking via the website, with or without breakfast, internet access and four poster bed in every room, friendly service, dogs allowed.

name: Tenomuotka open wilderness hut
overview: Open wilderness hut (8 persons). Wood fired stove. The hut is at a series of rapids, 20m/1.5km before the hut. After the hut the river enters a gorge with a passage called Pirunportti ("Devils gate") 2 km after the hut.

name: Inya Lake Hotel
overview: The Inya Lake Hotel, Yangon is on the shore of Inya Lake, just a 15 minute drive from the city centre. The colonial-styled hotel, with its teak wood floors and an oriental feel, is amid a 37 acre tropical garden. Also caters seminars, conferences and banquets.

name: Camping Tornio
overview: 15 cottages, 60 camping places with electricity for caravans and campers. A beautiful beach and riverside sauna. Rental boats.

name: NH Wien City
overview: NH brings the peace of mind by offering predictability of the chain's usual standards. Of note is the generous size of rooms (25 sqm), unusual for Vienna, as well as the fact that all of them are equipped with a kitchenette.

name: Ramsis Hilton Hotel
overview: Business center, fitness center, outdoor pool, various restaurants and bars.

name: Heartland Hotel Auckland Airport
overview: Closest accommodation to the airport.

name: B&B Tango
overview: Offers daily room service, excellent location, seven blocks away from the main street, with warm and drinkable water 24 hours available, free Internet, cable TV in the living room, optional TV in the room, conditioned atmosphere, safe box at the front desk, buffet breakfast and the good quality that only the owners/hosts can give you.  Tango show free with the unique view of the Beagle channel and the islands that surround it.

name: McHood Park / Clear Creek Reservoir
overview: Grills and restrooms available, but no hookups or water connections. For park description, see listing above.

name: Picacho / Tucson KOA
overview: Open Sep-Apr. Spots for tents and RVs, cabins available. Hookups and water at some sites, showers and pool on the grounds. Wi-fi, pets accepted.

name: Westin-St Francis Hotel
overview: Now a member of the Westin chain, this is an iconic San Francisco hotel. The lavish lobby and cafe area are used as a meeting place by quite a lot of people who aren't guests there, despite the pricey lattes and ritzy atmosphere. In a peculiar bit of design, the lobby has a side entrance to the Harry & David store, should you need to pop over for a few chocolate-covered cranberries. A ride on the exterior glass elevators offers a splendid view of the skyline, and can be done even if you're not staying. Although the St. Francis has a reputation for being pricy, it runs off-season specials.

name: Andalgó Hold Guesthouse
overview: 2-4 bed ensuite rooms with TV.  well-equipped kitchen and dining room

name: DroomHotel 't Heinenhoes
overview: Small, charming hotel in a small village some 10km from Assen. It's run by a couple and has a great restaurant with a daily menu. They offer bike rental and upon request they'll arrange for flowers or chocolates in your room.

name: Finnhostel Lappeenranta (Huhtiniemen matkailukeskus)
overview: About 2 km west of the city center. The prices include breakfast and the use of the swimming pool.

name: Hostel Feldkirch-Levis
overview: The 700-year-old building is a former infirmary and has been recently renovated. Open year round, reception 07:00-23:00, no curfew, free wi-fi.

name: Casa Rosario
overview: Simple hotel. Rooms include phone, hot/cold shower, Cable TV & A/C, with refrigerator & Internet at additional charge. Restaurant, business center, and laundry service.

name: Kumamoto Castle Park
overview: Really huge park, many possibilities to find remote spots. Be careful, because quite a few roads go through the park; camp away from those (it's very easy). Public toilets, but no rest huts.

name: Q!hotel
overview: This hotel makes the most of its small spaces by wrapping them in striking design based on white, black and dark red, as well as geometric curves and concaves. Some rooms have unusual features, such as bathtubs right next to the beds. The name of the hotel is a play on the Ku'damm, ("Q" = "Ku"), as well as the German word for cow ("Kuh", pronounced the same as "Q" or "Ku").

name: Atlanta Hostel
overview: Dirt-cheap, centrally-located, and family-run Midtown hostel has shared facilities and is perfect for travelers looking to save some cash for the Midtown bar scene.

name: Hotel Ristorante Milano
overview: This hotel has a beautiful position by the lake side.

name: W Montreal
overview: A luxury hotel, the W Montreal has 152 rooms, spa, and a restaurant - Otto Ristorante. This hotel is located between downtown and Old Montreal.

name: Hotel Concorde
overview: Formerly the city's main conference venue, this older hotel is now a fairly good bargain for good sized rooms with a nice view of the castle park. 6 on-site restaurants, broadband service, and on-site car rentals are available.

name: The Wellington
overview: Located in quiet area. Rate includes simple breakfast. Internet access available. 10 min from Victoria Station.

name: Panamint Springs Resort
overview: Located just inside the west entrance, this resort is the most economical lodging option. The rooms are small and very outdated.

name: Holiday Inn Express-Six Flags
overview: Smoke free. Complimentary breakfast, free Wi-Fi internet, 24-hour shuttle service to and from the DFW airport and nearby shopping and dining within 5 miles. Outdoor pool and spa.

name: The Water Wheel Inn
overview: A hotel with free hot breakfast.

name: Where Else Resort
overview: Funky, chilled out bamboo eco-tourism village surrounded by old coconut palm trees. Each bungalow is unique. Restaurant serves Indian & Thai food, in a clean, friendly, quiet and, above all, relaxed atmosphere. Feeling Bar is on the premises.

name: Bridalveil Creek
overview: The Bridalveil Creek campground is located along the road to Glacier Pass and is open from July through early September.  The campground's 110 sites are first-come, first served, and sites are available for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length.  Water and flush toilets are available.

name: Jimbaran Puri Bali
overview: Private walled cottages and villas with private pools. Large communal pool, decent restaurant and in-house spa facilities. Directly at the beach and some sea view villas in the first row of bungalows.

name: Hilton La Jolla Torrey Pines
overview: Bluff-top Hilton hotel overlooking the famous Torrey Pines golf course.

name: Radisson Blu Al Mahary Hotel
overview: Opened in 2009 and still in first class condition in 2012. It has excellent rooms, restaurants, spa facilities and meeting rooms.

name: Hotel Eldorado
overview: The Eldorado, a former ''maison de rendez-vous'', was once home to the kept women of the 19th century bourgeois. Now a very cute ''no'' star hotel, its charm more than makes up for what it lacks in amenities (who needs a TV in Paris anyway?). The  staff are super friendly, the décor is garage sale chic, and there's a lovely courtyard that fills with neighbourhood hipsters on warm evenings. It also has a very good location and you can easily avoid the noise of Pigalle or Montmartre's high prices, but they're within stumble distance if you decide to explore. For early risers breakfast (€5, until 10:00) is served in the attached restaurant/bar. Some English spoken, especially for those who pet the cat sprawled across the reception desk.

name: St. David's Hotel and Spa
overview: Havannah S. A really great stay for those who want that little bit extra. Fronting the bay it offers spectacular scenery and is little more than 5 minutes away from the cosmopolitan bay area. Built and originally operated by the Rocco Forte Group, it was sold in 2006 to the Principal Hayley Group.

name: Bells Oficis
overview: Small bed and breakfast

name: Hotel Indigo
overview: Hip midtown hotel with nouveau New England decor across from the Fox Theatre and close to the MARTA train. Includes events like a doggie happy hour.

name: The Quitanda´s Terrace Guest House
overview: Is separated from the beach by a garden outside, has six exotic decorated suites, individually decorated, offering you every comfort in an air conditioned with king-size beds or twin size bed, private bathroom, and much space in an atmospheric 300 year old house. Rates from about 75 p.p.s incl breakfast. Advance bookings advised.

name: Shalvat HaMidbar
overview: Lodges inside the town.

name: The Fairmont Copley Plaza
overview: Recently renovated and restored, this Boston hotel features 383 rooms including 17 elegant suites. The Fairmont is located near historic Beacon Hill, Copley Place, the Hynes Convention Center and the Freedom Trail.

name: ibis Budget Stuttgart City Nord
overview: An older-style Etap hotel (blue fittings) that was not updated to the newer "green room" standard when rebranded as ibis Budget. Free WiFi in the rooms and foyer however the login webpage is very bad and sometimes the "Gratis WLAN" link doesn't display.

name: the b
overview: Super centrally located at Roppongi Crossing (center of night life area), 2 minutes to subway Hibiya and Oedo line, renovated in spring 2006, nice but small rooms.

name: Manzanita Campground
overview: Open year round, with 18 single-unit sites with tables, fire pits, vault toilets, and drinking water. No hookups, 7-day limit. Reservations can be made [http://www.recreation.gov/camping/Manzanita_Az/r/campgroundDetails.do?contractCode=NRSO&parkId=75143 online]. Campers may use the coin-operated showers in Cave Springs Campground (listed above).

name: Perminalen Hotell
overview: Perminalen offers slightly higher standards at slightly higher prices. OK cafe with good, old Norwegian homely grub at nice prices.

name: Machhapuchhre Guesthouse
overview: Free Wi-Fi, kitchen & dining room in hotel, views to Lake and mountains.

name: Hotel Missoni
overview: 1 George IV Bridge. Situated on the Royal Mile and designed by Rosita Missoni.

name: Scandic Järva Krog
overview: A Scandic hotel next door to the ibis Styles Jarva. Slightly outdated and stark fitouts, but no major drawbacks. Only the superior rooms have air conditioning and coffee/tea facilities, as well as irons and a maritime-themed decor.

name: The Victorian Inn
overview: A Victorian style home built in 1903.  This bed and breakfast offers 2 rooms for rent.

name: Pemberton Valley Lodge
overview: All-suite hotel (units range from studio room to two bedroom), contemporary, lodge-style atmosphere. Outdoor hot tub with 360⁰ mountain view.

name: Tirana Backpackers Hostel
overview: Small hostel, with just 25 beds, situated in a beautiful villa built in 1940. Dorms are spacious and well lighted, back garden. Bikes can be rented for city tours.

name: Wick Caravan And Camping Site
overview: There is a nice camp in Wick, by the river, 5 minutes walk from the train station.

name: Honeymoon Inn Manali
address: Left Bank, Aleo Manali, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175131
overview: Honeymoon Inn is 1.5 Km. from the main bus stand on the left bank of the river on the road going towards Nagar. Honeymoon Inn is a 59-room hotel with extensive lawns and indoor facilities.

name: Golden Ball Club
overview: *** Capacity: 84 beeds. Buffet breakfast. Unlimited use of the sauna and fitness room. Closed parking place with camera. Wi-Fi. - Half board (breakfast + lunch / dinner) 3-course menu (half menu card optional) € 10p.p. Full board (breakfast and dinner) 3-course menu (half menu card optional) € 20p.p

name: Shutters
overview: One of the only hotels in Santa Monica that is directly on the beach. Share pools, spas, etc. with Casa del Mar.

name: Hársfa Pension
overview: Doubles with bathroom (sink, shower, toilet) , TV, wifi. +mobil: +36 30 2372436

name: Hotel Ampère
overview: One of the most inexpensive luxury 4 star hotels in Paris. A garden in the heart of the elegant 17th arrondissement, not far from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysées.

name: Hotel Waldschlößchen
overview: This is a  family-run hotel set away from the local traffic, on the mountain directly in front of the forest. Ideal for rest and recreation. A big car park for cars and buses is available right outside the hotel. A la carte restaurant with local specialties.

name: Hotel Le Patio
overview: Decent mid-range motel-style hotel located in Quartier Louis.  Rooms are clean and hotel has free wifi.  Continental breakfast available for 8000 CFA (12€).  Hotel is within walking distance of M'Bolo shopping center and several restaurants.

name: Ca' Zose
overview: A quiet street off S. M. Salute, by the S. M. Giglio ''traghetto'' (when it's operational, 50 cents will get you to S. Marco), within easy walk of either Accademia or the Zattere (no need to brave the hordes of tourists on the #1 line, take the #52 from bus or train station). The helpful staff speaks Italian, English, French and Veneto. 10% discount on rates if paid in cash - ask Walentina, the proprietress. All rooms are named after stars (in the sky, not of movie kind), and all have A/C (indispensable in summer). Buffet breakfast included.

name: Urakawa Campground
overview: Campsites and simple lodgings on an beautiful green island at the convergence of two mountain rivers. Campfire pits, showers, and shared toilets. The locale is good for swimming in summertime.

name: Amajambere Iwacu Community Camp
address: Mgahinga Gorilla National Park main entrance
overview: Community bandas and camping set right at the park entrance. Cheap to visit, excellent location.

name: Travelodge Wirral Bromborough
overview: Opening Autumn 2009

name: Mayan Princess Beach Resort & Spa
overview: 1-2 bedroom villas with kitchens, 250 ft swimming pool and a diver center.

name: Fort Tuthill County Park Campground
overview: Facilities include a few hook-up sites, picnic tables, fire rings, portable toilets, and water spigots. No water or electricity available. Reservations can be made by phone or [https://activenet020.active.com/coconinoparksandrec/ online].

name: Taos Territorial
overview: A historic compound which has been restored as a vacation rental near the center of town. The half-acre compound consists of the Taos Territorial, the Chicken Coop and the Historic Wagner A and Wagner B Casita's, hand painted by local legendary artist Jim Wagner.

name: Hotel Oewa Asia
overview: A hotel which is slightly derelict, but is unique as it has witnessed Semarang's history from the Dutch colonial era. Located in Semarang's Old Town (Kota Lama) area.

name: The Fairmont Palliser
overview: The [[Grand old hotels#Canada|original landmark hotel]] in downtown Calgary, originally built in 1914 by the Canadian Pacific Railway in the era when luxury was an art. Along with the other former CP hotels (The Banff Springs Hotel, The Empress, The Chateau Frontenac, Hotel York, etc.), this is one of the grand old dames.

name: Quality Inn Downtown Victoria
overview: Meeting & banquet facilities, pet friendly, on site restaurant, heated indoor swimming pool, free WIFI, fitness room, free local phone, kitchenette available, jacuzzi suites, executive suites

name: Green Gables Inn
overview: Complimentary breakfast. Kitchen/efficiencies available. Pool. Pets allowed. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi internet access.

name: Biras Creek Resort
overview: A secluded luxury resort with beaches on both the north and south sides of the island, includes complimentary boston whalers, hobie cats, windsurfing, sun lasers, kayaks, and folk boats for visitors interested in water sports. Rates include breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Only reachable by helicopter or boat (runs from Gun Creek hourly).

name: Hotel/Losmen Candi
overview: Clean & tidy with various options to suit the budget traveller including 4 person rooms.

name: Agriturismo il Forest
overview: Beautiful view from the bedrooms.

name: Hotel Satelit
overview: calm place

name: B&B Villa Mimi Pansion
overview: A friendly and cosy pension with six guest rooms and a large garden. Rooms: Green Lily (tween) Yellow Daffodils (double) Silver Tulip (tween) Red Rose (Deluxe) Violet Blue (tween) White Rose (Suite). MINIMUM stay two nights in special period three nights! - Only cash!

name: Novotel Paris Gare Montparnasse
overview: Located in a quiet corner of Montparnasse, and if you don't mind a 10-min walk to the Metro, this is a nice and relatively new hotel. Easy access from the Montparnasse-Bienvenüe Metro: just take the stairs all the way up to the train platforms, exit on Boulevard de Vaugirard, take a left and follow the street up to the hotel. There is a Velib' City Bike Rental park just outside the hotel.

name: Rifugio Brioschi
overview: Managed mountain shelter with beds and restaurant.

name: Maria Tours and Hostel
overview: Carters mainly to Arab families with small children, due to location additional traffic noise. Security camera installed inside the dorm watching your sleep. Laundry 5 L.

name: August Jack Motor Inn
overview: Non-descrept on the outside but clean and functional rooms. There is high-speed internet in the lobby and most rooms can access the free wifi. Some rooms have kitchenettes.

name: Novotel Christchurch
overview: Built in 2010 and reopened in 2013. Meeting and conference rooms, restaurant, bar, gym and 154 rooms. Qualmark rating of 4 Star Plus.

name: Boutique Hotel's
overview: Newly built, free wi-fi and parking for guests, tv lcd with cable in every room, breakfast 21 PLN.

name: Mar y Selva Ecolodge
overview: Rain-forest ecolodge overlooking Ballena Marine National Park.  It provides a relaxing immersion in the rain-forest with breathtaking views of the Three Sisters Islands in the Pacific while being just 10-15 minutes from several beautiful beaches and many activities. Dedicated to making your stay memorable, protecting the environment,and offering you all the comforts of home, we are a non-smoking establishment.

name: C&N Central Station Hostel
overview: Second location for C&N.

name: Hotel ** & Hostel Rila
overview: HOTEL Rooms: single, double, triple and quadruple rooms with bathroom (shower and toilet). In addition to these five bedded studios (2 double, 1 single and 1 bathroom). - Services: 24-Hour Front Desk • En-suite rooms • Telephone in all rooms • Safety deposit box, luggage room, bike storage • Tourist information, free maps • Phone Card, Postcard Stamp • Budapest card discount • Public telephones, fax. • Program management: sightseeing, tour, concert • Laundry Laundry • Wake-up Service • Hair Dryer, Iron rent • Crib • Pets are welcome • free closed parking. HOSTEL: Two-bed rooms with shared bathroom and a five-bed dorm with separate beds +phone=+36 1 2161621.

name: White Wolf
overview: White Wolf is open only from July through early September and is located along the Tioga Pass Road.  The 74 sites are first-come, first-served for tents and small RVs up to 27' in length only.  Water and flush toilets are available.

name: Ounasloma Luxury Cabins
overview: Ounasloma has 13 luxury cabins located in a small area just off the main road and very close to the lake. All mod cons and underfloor heating to keep it nice and toasty when it's -35 centigrade outside! Run by a nice man called Alpo who is also a great source of advice for local activities.

name: Grand Hyatt Tokyo
overview: A part of Roppongi Hills, and not to be confused with the more famous Park Hyatt of ''Lost in Translation'' fame, which is in [[Tokyo/Shinjuku#Sleep|Shinjuku]]. Sleek and minimalistic, all black, gray and brown, with expensive design that never hesitates to sacrifice function for form, but the superlative service makes up for it.

name: SAIT Conference Housing
overview: On the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology (SAIT) campus in southwestern Calgary (address is for the administrative office, not the residences). May only be available in summer months.

name: Jagermeister Pansion
overview: Rooms are equipped with a television, shower, toilet, air-conditioning and a mini bar. guarded parking, storage for motorcycles and bicycles, rent-a-car and rent-a bike, managing of mail, receiving faxes, money exchange, cab ordering, wake-up service, information on cultural and leisure programs, transfer from Vienna / Schwechat airport, organizing dental-medical services, wireless Internet

name: Oswego Inn
overview: Twelve-room hotel with Wi-Fi, continental breakfast.

name: Ananas Hostel
overview: Is between the new cultural center and the old city wall. The house has a small garden with place for tents, campfire, outside cooking, tulips and roses. Hostel rooms: 1 mixed dormitory room with 6 beds, 2 private rooms with 2-2 beds, 3 places for tent. - 23.9 / 6.9 reception. Bike rental. Free WIFI.

name: Nap Hotel and Restaurant
overview: 86 rooms with 245 beds. Free WiFi. Parking (HUF1500 per car per day), Pet-friendly, three star hotel. Massage HUF 8000 per hour. Also there is a conference room with terrace and a beauty salon.

name: Diamond House
overview: A chic boutique hotel in the quieter Samsen area. The cheaper-end rooms are not that big and do not have windows. The rooms are clean though, and have cosy Thai atmosphere. Staff is also very helpful if you have questions or problems. A tip is to book this one on their website as their walk-in rates are much higher.

name: Golden Tulip Amersfoort
overview: Located out of town, in a forest area right outside of Amersfoort. Easily reachable and a nice base when you have a bike or car. Breakfast is somewhat expensive but rooms are nice and clean, with pleasant views.

name: Hotel Imperial
overview: Built in 1863 as a Viennese residence for the German Prince of Württemberg in neo-Renaissance style. In total imperial style and impeccable service.

name: Hotel Schloss Weikersdorf
overview: A former palace with foundations dating to the 13th century, this hotel has hosted many Austrian luminaries and royalty. Has an on-site restaurant.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amersfoort A1
overview: Luxury hotel in northern Amersfoort.

name: Hospedaje Soma
overview: With only a ten minutes walk to the dock, it is just far enough away from sometimes noisy downtown but still in reach of all necessary services which the village provides. This really quiet place offers a dormitory $8 per person, spacious private rooms $22 with shared bathrooms, $30 with private bathroom and cabins with private bathroom and a solar run hot water heater from $43 on with fan to $53 with AC. The rate for all private rooms includes a standard breakfast. Dinner is served for guests in the evening. The guesthouse has a nice and cozy tropical garden with some space to hang out and chill and provides free WIFI for its clients. Soma offers a laundry service and tours and hikes can be organized from there. Please note that they only accept reservations by email.

name: Clonamore House Hotel
overview: Small hotel on outskirts of town

name: The Kennedy School
overview: A decommissioned elementary school converted into a hotel by the McMenamins's group who also have several other converted buildings in the Portland area. Each room was made from one-half of an old classroom with items like blackboards, coatrooms, and so on still in place. The hotel has a full restaurant with its own bar and large outdoor patio. Be sure to try the Cajun Tater Tots! There's also a second-run movie theater (free with hotel stay) with a bar/cafe and table service. Also on site are the Concordia Microbrewery, Detention Bar (smoking allowed), Honor's Bar (non-smoking), Cypress Room (smoking allowed), and an outdoor soaking pool. Free Wi-Fi and great artwork throughout.

name: Park House Women's Hostel
overview: Women only.  Single rooms with shared facilities.

name: Mazama Campground
overview: Open mid June to early October (weather permitting). Has 200 sites, Reservations are not taken, however sites are usually available. Running water, flush toilets, picnic tables, and fire rings are provided.

name: Hotel Finn
overview: A young, regenerating hotel right in the city center.  Even though the rooms are small and fairly no-frills, the hotel is comfortable and cheap. Under new management, the hotel seems to be getting better (and cheaper) by the day. There are 27 rooms, which can accommodate from one to four people per room. Location absolutely perfect.

name: Mövenpick Resort & Spa Dead Sea
overview: The Mövenpick Resort & Spa Dead Sea is found in a traditional village setting nestled amongst lush gardens that serve to restore your well-being and balance. Set on the northern shores of the Dead Sea, the resort and its Spa is an oasis of tranquillity. Despite the antique look of the village, all 346 rooms are luxuriously furnished in warm and natural colours. The latest Beach Rooms and Beach Suites are contemporary with modern furnishings and large terraces. Self-controlled air-conditioning, satellite TV, direct-dial phone, coffee and tea-making facilities, hairdryer, and a safe are standard fittings in every room. A special benefit is our free minibar, available in all rooms. As well as the famous ZARA Spa, there are several swimming pools, some of which feature different mineral concentrations, including a heated pool for winter. A wide private beach runs along the Dead Sea shore, and there are jacuzzis, tennis courts and a fitness centre. There are also a total of four restaurants and several cafes and bars.

name: Amara Sanctuary
overview: Surrounded by 3.5 hectares of tropical rainforest, this hotel features 120 rooms in a converted British army barracks as well as 10 standalone garden villas. Three pools, in-house spa, easy walk to the beach.  Disabled-friendly.

name: Oban Bay Hotel
overview: Corran Esplanade, Oban, PA34 5AE, +44 1631 562051. Rooms from £47 ppn

name: The Tobermory Hotel
overview: Comfortable family run hotel with spectacular views and superb food produced from best local produce.

name: Quality Hotel & Resort Kristiansand
overview: Right next door to Kristiansand Zoo, the resort also has its own outdoor play area with a Zip wire ride, climbing frame, beach volleyball court and heated 25-meter swimming pool.

name: Brownies Hostel
overview: Cafe, kitchen facilities, internet access, lockers available.

name: Aparthotel Las Gaviotas
overview: 139 air conditioned and fully equipped apartments and studios with terrace or balcony.

name: West Bay B & B
overview: Clean, quiet, and affordable rooms located just one block from the west bay beach. Air-con, TV, DVDs to borrow, beach gear to rent, internet cafe. The owner Glen is fantastic and very accommodating, he also cooks breakfast every morning.

name: Half Moon Ranch
overview: Set in a dramatic canyon, the house can accommodate up to ten people. Reservations can only be made online; the property is maintained by the US Forest Service.

name: Hotel Fortuna West
overview: 159 bright and modern single, double or triple bed rooms, breakfast buffet, Bohemian and international cuisine and inviting lobby bar. There are also several conference rooms available for up to 120 people.

name: The Outbuildings
overview: Restaurant with rooms. Five luxurious en-suite bedrooms, restaurant and events venue with wedding licence.

name: Santa Rita Lodge
overview: This 80-yr-old lodge has fully equipped cabins and casitas. Small dogs accepted ($25); no smoking in cabins. There is a small gift shop onsite.

name: Crane Flat
overview: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|15px|frameless]] Crane Flat is open from June through September, requires reservations, and offers 166 sites for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length.  Water and flush toilets are available.  Campsites 423 and 427 are wheelchair accessible.

name: Camping Liza
overview: Just like the two campsites next door, Liza is crowded with kayaks and rafts. Has a nice bar that also serves pizzas and other food. Free WiFi.

name: BackpackerBerlin
overview: Cosy hostel providing room types such as dorms and private accommodations. Bathrooms and rooms are very clean and you´ll be equipped with wifi, internet, free coffee/tea, washing machine, computers, common kitchen.

name: West Inn Taiping
overview: One of the latest boutique accommodation in Taiping, West Inn is conveniently located 300m to Tesco and Taiping Sentral. With only 18 well furnished suites, unmatched facilities and services at West Inn are also worth mentioning.

name: Hostelling International-Fisherman's Wharf Hostel
