overview: Even if you're unsure about hostels, you should still consider this place; the location alone makes it worth your while, as it is in a park-like setting with great views of the Golden Gate Bridge and Alcatraz and is within easy walking distance of [[San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf|Fisherman's Wharf]]. It has a total of 150 Beds in dormitory style rooms. Quite clean and safe, with wi-fi, laundry facilities, lockers, and free breakfast.

name: Tang House
overview: Situated in a completely renewed century old historic house. All rooms have air-con, free Wi-Fi, 2 free computers, breakfast available, common area with TV, fully equipped kitchen. Very clean with a family atmosphere. Friendly and helpful staff. 5 min walk to many delicious eateries, bars and shops.

name: Hotel del Sol
overview: Voted CitySearch San Francisco's "Best Budget Hotel", "Best Family-Friendly Hotel," and "Best Hotel Pool" in 2006. Part of the fancy Joie de Vivre hotel group, this formerly nondescript motor lodge was rejuvenated with some cool colors, interior design, and upgraded management.

name: Grand Canyon International Hostel
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast, free coffee and tea available throughout the day.

name: Inex Drim
overview: This is a four star hotel that is perfectly matching with the old architecture of this town and the old bazaar around it. It is on the bank of the Drim River. There are 50 rooms inside, a few restaurants, a night club, a casino, an automatic bowling room, indoor and outdoor pools, a congress center, and a tennis court.

name: Geary Parkway Motel
overview: This former dive has been completely remodeled with clean rooms, nice televisions, microwaves, blowdryers, irons, and mini fridges.  Reasonable prices, safe and neat - the owners have put a lot of effort into making this motel quiet and nice.

name: DoubleTree Downtown Pittsburgh
overview: It hosts the Bigelow Grille and a complimentary swimming pool, on top of all the normal DoubleTree features.

name: Matkakoti Tiira
overview: 17 beds. Located near the Yyteri sand beach.

name: Hotel Pullman Paris La Defense
overview: Renovated in 2013 as a part of Accor's initiative to refurbish all five Pullmans in Paris. Less expensive rooms retain much of the 1990s-style furniture, while the more expensive ones conform better to the current Pullman corporate standards.

name: Utano Youth Hostel
overview: Near Ryoanji and Kinkakuji in northwestern Kyoto. There are three bus lines that go out there (26 from Kyoto Station, 10 and 59 from Sanjo-Keihan station) and the stop is right in front of the hostel (Utano Youth Hostel Mae). Bicycle rentals are available and guests are welcome to use the kitchen, bath and laundry facilities.

name: Wings Hostel
overview: A new backpackers' hostel in Cheboksary (open since August 2013).

name: Sunset Cafe
overview: There are common bathrooms about a minute's walk away.

name: Grand Victorian Bed & Breakfast
overview: Historic bed and breakfast in the Garden District. Complimentary breakfast, private baths, free wi-fi, steps to the street car

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Calgary-University
overview: From Vancouver, go east on the [[Trans-Canada Highway]] (Highway 1) then turn left (northwest on Banff Trail, Calgary); it will be the 2nd or 3rd building on the left.

name: Botel Maastricht
overview: This hostel is on a boat on the river Maas, next to the city center. Breakfast is optional during weekdays and obligatory on weekends.

name: Hotel Safari
overview: Good service and you might be able to negotiate a better price. Looks bad from outside, but from the inside is fairly new and clean.

name: Eteri Guesthouse
overview: A few new rooms. If you need to find an owner - she works in Akhtala monastery.

name: Holiday Inn Express Birmingham Oldbury
overview: Where comfort meets great value rates, all guests receive free WiFi in public areas and a complimentary breakfast to set you up for your day.

name: Kyukamura Kishu-kada
overview: This Kyukamura is built on the top of a mountain, 100 metres above sea level and looks out on the ancient fishing port of Kada. We are proud of our Longtooth Grouper Fish cuisine.

name: Hotel Wales
overview: European style boutique hotel.

name: Holiday Inn LAX Airport Hotel
overview: Offers free 24-hour airport shuttle.

name: Hakuna Matata
overview: Set on the far southern arms of the island, Hakuna Matata is the fisherman’s paradise in a fisherman’s paradise. The spacious grounds are the ideal embarkation point for excellent fishing throughout the delta. Here you’ll find private huts and communal shower blocks; the inviting bar and restaurant offer a great meeting place among the campement’s vast grounds.

name: Hotel Am Domplatz
overview: Business hotel direct in the city center with modern and well furbished rooms.

name: Marriot Hotel
overview: Very close to the airport

name: Lochside Caravan and Camping Site
overview: 108 caravan stances, 73 of which are on hard standing with a separate camping site for 53 tents.

name: Vogelstrand Guest House
overview: Intimate family run bed and breakfast guest house with six rooms. Continental or health breakfast with an array of dishes made from local produce. The outside areas are designed in a quiet country courtyard style.

name: Renala au sable d'or
overview: Open since 1991 Renala restaurant and the sable d'or hotel is located next to sea. The bungalows are situated in a private coconut grove one of the best place in the tourist village . the restaurant open by reservation provides a diversified food that is never the same as the menu changes with the seasons for freshness guarantee. a unique experience in Morondava.

name: Ursuline Guest House
overview: Ursuline Guest House offers 13 guest rooms, each with private bath, ceiling fan, air conditioning/heating, cable television and wireless Internet access.

name: Berwick Youth Hostel
address: Dewars Lane Granary, Dewars Lane, TD15 1HJ
overview: 55 bed hostel in a 240 year old granary.

name: The Manhattan Hotel Rotterdam
overview: This towering high rise is located just across Rotterdam Centraal. Luxurious rooms that are sometimes to be had for as little as € 100,-. Check the site (walk-ins pay far more)

name: Premier Inn Birmingham Broad Street (Brindley Place)
overview: The Premier Inn at Brindley Place is the chain's most up-to-date property, with a marked difference in fittings over the other ones in town.

name: Hotel le Colombe
overview: Offers decent air-conditioned rooms. It also has a smaller annex further down the road, the Colomb II, which offers cheaper accommodation. Re-opened spring 2013 after the end of hostilities.

name: A Prince of Wales Motel
overview: Pets allowed. Free wi-fi.

name: Bondi Beach Holiday Homes
overview: A selection of 10 furnished holiday homes with modern comforts & spacious living areas. All homes are near Bondi Beach with public transport nearby. Wi-Fi Internet, linen, bath and beach towels all included. Short- and long-term stays possible.

name: Ramada Encore Doha
address: Ahmed Bin Mohammed Bin Thani St
overview: A comfortable four-star hotel with a few pleasant surprises. The Indian restaurant is one of the best in town (and, because it's in a hotel, it serves alcohol). The pub on the hotel's ground floor is a large club that on weekends comes alive as a disco under the guidance of a Filipino cover band and hundreds of Asian workers letting loose after a hard 6-day work week. The Library Bar, on the hotel's top floor, has a small, slightly worn clubby field populated by large-bellied expats. But the beer is cold and the mural around the walls is something to behold.

name: Hotel Goldener Anker
overview: Highly reviewed hotel very near the '''Margravial Operahouse''', featuring wireless internet and on-site parking.

name: Hostelling International-Downtown
overview: Clean, cheap, safe and fun.

name: Renaissance Las Vegas Hotel
overview: Non-gaming, non-smoking hotel.

name: Maison DuBois Bed and Breakfast
overview: Marigny bed and breakfast not far from the French Quarter.

name: New Siam II
overview: One of the best hotels in the Soi Rambuttri area. It is just enough off the main drag to be quiet, but still close to the action. They advertise as having the largest rooms for the price and that claim seems to be true. The rooms are clean and well-maintained, and the staff is friendly. There are safe boxes in some rooms and lockers downstairs. The restaurant menu is basic and the food not too exciting, but the sofas are good to meet people.

name: 1870 Banana Courtyard B&B
overview: In 1800s former elite bordello. B&B now, great location. Balcony rooms with a view or budget rooms, each w/different theme. Lagniappe: free soft drinks, bottled water, generous continental breakfast. Tropical courtyard with hammock, verandah with porch swing. Wi-Fi. New fangled stuff, ensuite like: private bathrooms, cable TV, phone, heat and A/C. Gated parking lot.

name: Jernbanehotellet
overview: Restaurant and bar available.

name: Meeting Place
overview: Guesthouse with about 7 rooms in old wooden building with shared toilets and showers. One of the few remaining cheap places to stay in town. Has nice courtyard garden with tables and chairs and a couple of hammocks. Friendly owners.

name: Lakeside Holidays
overview: Three-room guesthouse on Hwy 37 and Stoco Lake.

name: Hilton Istanbul
overview: Hotel offers a business center, fitness facilities, pool and Turkish baths. Rooms have high speed internet access.

name: Twelve Hotel
overview: Located in Atlantic Station, this sleek, contemporary hotel features stainless steel appliances and LCD televisions, and is located amidst the Atlantic Station shopping district.

name: America's Best Inn
overview: Nothing fancy, but a clean and comfortable hotel, situated a few blocks south of the Wharf.

name: Rodeway Inn
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pet-friendly.

name: Radisson BLU Polar Hotel Spitsbergen
overview: The world's northernmost full-service hotel, with restaurant, pub, sauna, free Internet access and a guest computer. Book activities in the reception.

name: Yuzan Guesthouse
overview: This is a Japanese style house that has a very cozy feel. Owner speaks good English and is very helpful. Free Wi-Fi and a shared PC available. Bike rentals and Western breakfast available. Ceilings are low so be prepared to hit your head on random beams often.

name: Melbourne International Hotel & Hostel
overview: A hostel whose only real selling point is its price. It's in a gritty part of town and doesn't look like much from the outside, but inside it's decent and well protected. Private rooms and dorms available. Very close to downtown, just two blocks away from a light rail station.

name: The Park Hotel
overview: A range of accommodation from dorm-style bunk rooms, through motel-style family units to hotel rooms. Free parking, large lounge with open fireplace, on-site bar and restaurant.

name: Hellerup Park Hotel
overview: Up scale hotel in classical mansion just of the main street in Hellerup, in a beautiful park. Shared facilities are top notch, but the standard rooms are rather crammed for the price and the furnishings are classic, some might call them outdated. Free wireless throughout the hotel, and internet terminals available at every floor.

name: Hotel Hölle
overview: Hotel Hölle is comprised of 15 rooms, and is on the edge of the city center. The hotel has various sized rooms to suite your level of comfort. The on site restaurant, A la Carte, serves the best of Austrian cuisine, and is open daily from 8AM-12AM.

name: Hotel Reventazón & Guesthouse
overview: In Orosi city.

name: Al Sultan Beach Resort
overview: A medium-sized, five-star hotel with private beach, swimming pool, jacuzzi and fitness center. The facilities are accessible to day visitors for a fee. Two unlicensed restaurants are also onsite.

name: Durty Nellys Inn
overview: Dorms are clean and the beds comfortable. The Irish pub downstairs gives discounts to people staying in the hostel (€3.5 for a pint of Amstel, €6 for a burger and chips). Breakfast 09:00-11:00. No common area apart from the bar itself.

name: Ali Hotel
overview: Is an up-scale choice with 24 rooms overlooking the city ponds. Has a swimming pool, casino and fitness facilities.

name: Petronilla Hotel
overview: The boutique hotel earns great reviews thanks to the commitment of the family running it, even if one can find their taste in decor a bit too eclectic.

name: Pousada Favelinha
address: Rua Almirante Alexandrino 2023 - between Laranjeiras and Santa Teresa
overview: Might be your choice if staying in a favela is your cup of tea.

name: Hotel Mithila
overview: Established in 1920, this is a relatively clean hotel and reasonably priced.

name: Guest House Matsuyama
overview: Run by the super friendly Tamanoi-san of The Sophia Club NPO. It has a number of different rooms both Western and Japanese style some of which are self-catering. All have private bathrooms. Tamanoi-san speaks good English and knows 'everyone' in town. Internet, bike use included.

name: Park Hotel
overview: Built in 1929, this art deco gem is Lubumbashi's classic hotel. The inner courtyard has an excellent restaurant, with delightful live jazz most evenings.

name: Circle Hotel
address: right in the centre of town
overview: Check your room carefully for working bathroom fixtures and cleanliness before agreeing to take it.

name: Best Western Sahara
overview: Free breakfast and Wi-Fi, outdoor pool.

name: Waunifor
overview: Historic estate with 6 holiday cottages offering self-catering accommodation and 2 large eco-friendly meeting rooms set in 4 acres of grounds and gardens. Pottery and craft studio on-site.

name: RatiLanna Riverside Spa Resort
overview: A luxury boutique resort on the bank of the Mae Ping River and the centre of Chiang Mai. Only minutes away from Chiang Mai Airport and the Night Bazaar.

name: Mystic Roots
overview: Mystic Roots. Cabañas, Suites on the Sea Front, private access to a beach, and Coffee Bar with WiFi.

name: Bellevue Hotel
overview: The only hotel at the top of Penang Hill, with good views to match. A colonial style bungalow with 12 rooms that are very simple and a little worse for wear. A simple breakfast of eggs, toast, spreads, tea and coffee is included. You are paying for the privilege of staying on the peak with exceptional views.

name: The Levante Laudon
overview: Rents apartments on a quiet street behind the city hall (''Rathaus''). All apartments have a usable small kitchen; the two-room apartments have separated living rooms and bedrooms. Perfectly suitable for families.

name: Park Hyatt
overview: Superior service. With Italian marble bathrooms complete with a deep sunken bath with inset TV, twin basins, separate lavatory and therapeutic shower.

name: Park Hotel Vossevangen
overview: Park Hotel Vossevangen has 131 rooms, including 15 deluxe rooms and a side wing with multi-bed rooms. All rooms have their own bathroom and toilet.

name: The Old Pandy Inn
overview: Accommodation and food service; Free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Opera
overview: Smaller hotel located on a quiet street between Kgs Nytorv and Nyhavn.

name: Terminus Hotel
overview: Capacity: 60 persons. : Coffee, soda vending machine, enclosed courtyard . Limited parking for cars, 24-Hour Front Desk. +phones=+36 1  236-0458

name: The Presidents' Quarters Inn
overview: A prominent Oglethorpe Square historic inn (circa 1855), with 16 large rooms in the theater center of the Historic District. Private off-street parking, nightly turn-down, afternoon wine and hors d'oeuvres, bedtime cordial, and delightful breakfast.

name: Discovery Inn Ukiah
overview: Ukiah California Hotel, Discovery Inn offering comfortable and affordable accommodations located in the heart of Mendocino Wine Country.

name: Ryokan Seikanso
overview: In the Naramachi section of the town, among the tangle of narrow lanes and old houses. Tatami mats, classical architecture, and a well-kept inner garden feature in this traditional ryokan. The rooms are showing their age, but each features a samovar for tea and a small room with a table overlooking the garden. The shared bathrooms have been recently remodeled. Japanese/Western breakfast for ¥700/450 is served in the tatami dining room. Curfew 11PM. The manager speaks very passable English, can lend you a variety of guidebooks (in several languages) and puts out his own laptop in the common room in the mornings and evenings for guests to catch up on e-mail.

name: The Z Hotel
overview: Beautiful hotel with really nice views, it is a bit more luxurious compared to others located near it's location. It also has a nice Swimming pool.

name: Koblenz Youth Hostel
overview: located in the fortress "Festung Ehrenbreitstein". From there you have a nice view over Koblenz

name: Tawana Bangkok
overview: This hotel has an ideal location, right in the middle of all the action, but without the noise. It is well-maintained and the staff is friendly and helpful. Interesting features are the outside swimming pool and fitness centre. The only downer is that they charge extra for Wi-Fi access.

name: Sanctuary House Hotel
overview: Small hotel in a lovely old building close to Westminster Abbey, part of a popular Fullers pub.

name: Rausu Nature and Green Campground
overview: This campground has tent sites and RV sites.  It overlooks the Pacific Ocean to the east, leading to good views of the sunrise.  The mountains of Shiretoko are also visible to the NW.  There are bathrooms with electricity and running water, and clean covered cooking areas.  It is next to a ''park golf'' course.  The caretaker closes reception at 6PM, so latecomers should pay in the morning.

name: Shangri-La
overview: Definitely a five-star hotel, but not quite as superlative as The Oriental or The Peninsula (across the river in Thonburi). The Shangri-La partly makes up for it with its excellent location next to both the Skytrain and the express boat.

name: Indian Hills Inn
overview: Most reasonably priced downtown hotel. Best choice is deluxe single king bed room, which opens to a large, grassy courtyard with tall trees.  One of few properties that offers multi-night discounts and weekly rates.  Complimentary continental breakfast and wifi.  27" TVs.  Ski season shuttle stops at hotel lobby.  Airport shuttles (Faust & Twin Hearts will pickup and drop off at hotel lobby.

name: Rockcliffe Hotel
overview: 15 bedroomed licensed North Shore Promenade 3* hotel

name: Lalibela Hudad Eco-Retreat
overview: Located on a 10 hectare ''amba'' (mesa) at an elevation of 3,300 m, several km from Lalibela. There is a road part way there; access the rest of the way is by foot or mule. Accommodation is in tukuls spread out over the ''amba'', each with its separate tukul outhouse. There is no running water. With luck you will spend the evening around a campfire with locals who will sing, dance and give you a traditional leg wash and massage from the knees to the toes. Night temperatures are cool at this elevation, so take extra layers for round the campfire, but there will probably be a sweater provided in your tukul.

name: Apple Economy Hotel
overview: Hotel is set in Kaunas' Old Town area and has 14 double rooms. Breakfast is not included in room price.

name: Kale Hotel
overview: A family-run guesthouse. Rooms with satellite TV. Roof-top terrace, swimming pool, free wi-fi, Ottoman Corner, restaurant, day trips and excursions.

name: The Burgundy Bed and Breakfast
overview: Gay owned and operated, affordable rates, walk to the French Quarter.

name: Intersail Hostel Christina
overview: A floating hostel. Small cabins, bedlength is 1.90 m, but great staff and a nice spacious sun deck. Breakfast, sheets, towels are included in the price. Shared shower and toilet. Four person cabins are better to be used for only three adults. Don't take too much luggage in these cabins.

name: Days Inn Davenport
overview: Free deluxe continental breakfast, free Wi-Fi Internet access and a rec room.

name: Rifugio Bietti
address: Grigna Settentrionale (city council of [[Mandello del Lario]])
overview: Managed mountain shelter with beds and restaurant.

name: Days Inn
overview: No smoking, pets accepted, free wi-fi and breakfast, pool.

name: Discover Rwanda Youth Hostel
overview: Discover Rwanda Youth Hostel offers clean beds in dorms and private rooms as well as a free breakfast, internet access, and hot showers. It also has space for campers inside its 24-hour guarded gate. Discover Rwanda is an Aegis Trust social enterprise in which all proceeds go towards social programs offered by its parent organization at the Kigali Genocide Memorial.

name: Camping 'Pod Krokwią'
overview: Place for tents and campervans as well as small wooden houses and rooms.

name: Embassy Suites Downtown
overview: An all-suite, full service hotel.

name: Bossotel Inn
overview: In a rather quiet dead-end street, that ends at the Shangri-la Hotel, it is close to Silom Rd, the river, and various public transport networks. Rooms are nice and clean, and feature air conditioning and a fridge. The hotel has a pool and a spa, and prices include breakfast.

name: Bridge Bay
overview: (27-May to 18-Sep). 432 sites, flush toilets, RV dump station.

name: ibis Styles Luxembourg Centre Gare
overview: The "green-pillow" ibis Styles is one of the hotels filling up almost the entire block in front of Luxembourg's train station (although the ibis itself does not face the station, but rather the narrow Rue Junck leading up to it). Everything in the hotel is on the small side, but on balance breakfasts are always included in the room rates.

name: Hyatt Regency Hotel
overview: Integrated into the Convention Center and Rupp Arena.

name: Love Lane Inn
overview: Cheap and minimal guest house. The owner can be grumpy but serviceable. Curfew from 2am to 7:30am. Horribl mattresses but big rooms.

name: Hotel Zur Post
overview: reasonable quality rooms. Free wifi.

name: Silver Mine Bay Hotel
address: From the ferry turn right and continue along the water.
overview: Swimming pool, sauna, beach side. Breakfast included. 128 room hotel and resort.

name: Lochmaddy Hotel
address: 2 minutes walk from the ferry terminal.
overview: An established hotel next the ferry terminal.

name: Hotel Bellavista
overview: The only 5 star hotel in Girona.

name: Hotel Fagus
overview: **** 147 rooms with 298 beds. A wellness and conference hotel. The wellness part include: Children's indoor pool (20 m², 34 °C); indoor Jacuzzi (5 m² , 36 °C); indoor swimming pool (72 m², 26 °C), Finnish saunas, steam bath, fitness room. Other services for free: Bathrobe, hair dryer, in-room safe, free parking in the hotel's outdoor parking, free Wi-Fi. Services for fee: table Tennis (HUF300 / half hour, 500 / hour); car rental, babysitter: HUF 2500-3500/ hour, tickets for Lake Neusiedl cruise, theater, etc.. ; billiards: HUF400 / half hour, 700 / hour, pets receive 3.000 / night; minibar, parking in the hotel garage HUF1,500; room service, taxi order and flower delivery. For Children: Mini (playground) Club on the second floor, also a wooden and sand pit playground in the garden. - At the special holiday periods and long weekends there is animation programs for the youngest. - Rooms: #Deluxe double rooms (separate beds, or a limited number of double beds, air-conditioning, bathroom with bathtub or shower, satellite television, internet access (WiFi), room safe, mini bar, telephone and hair dryer); # Superior Deluxe Rooms (these are particularly quiet and all with beautiful panorama, larger than deluxe room; more exclusive design, with a bathtub and a shower-bath, and also have a work area); #Executive Suite (top floor exclusive suites unmatched panoramic view, flat TV, sofa, work space, recessed bath and shower); #Junior Suite a double deluxe room with a comfortable living room (armchairs, a small kitchenette with refrigerator, air condition, bathroom with bathtub ); #Apartman (include 2 Deluxe double rooms with a common living area in the middle, direct access to the garden, air-condition); # Deluxe family rooms (2 adjoining double rooms with twin beds or a limited number of double beds).

name: Rhein-Hotel Diehl's Terrassen
overview: Is situated directly at the Rhine, below the Ehrenbreitstein fort, with a view of the ''Deutsches Eck'' from every room. 4-star, but unfortunately only a few metres from a busy railway.

name: E-City Bed & Breakfast
overview: Situated in Tornio centre, by the beautiful Tornio river.

name: Ravintola-hotelli Raahen Hovi
overview: In the city center.

name: Belle Campground
overview: A primitive campground located near the North Entrance Station.  18 sites, no water available.

name: Lazy Dog Ranch
overview: Located within the San Pedro National Riparian Conservation Area. Two suites available, with pool. No smoking indoors, pets accepted.

name: Mere Court Hotel
overview: Hotel & Conference Centre

name: Neringa Hotel
overview: 60-room hotel. Foreign magazines, beautiful flowers, sauna, fitness center, wi-fi, pool, bar. Breakfast included.

name: Citin Pratunam
overview: Smack in the heart of Pratunam, close to the Baiyoke Tower II. The rooms are small, but cosy and modern, and feature 32 inch LCD TVs and free Wi-Fi. They also have a great spa and a cafe serving vegetarian-only dishes. There's a free tuk-tuk shuttle service to nearby shops and BTS stations.

name: Pitlochry Backpackers Hotel
overview: Twin, double and dorm rooms are available plus a wonderful sunny lounge, overlooking the main street.

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Katajanokka
overview: Housed in what was the ''Nokka'' prison until 2002, this classy hotel has retained the original exterior and the internal corridor, but the rooms themselves, built by combining two to three cells, retain no trace of their past.  Walking distance to city center.

name: Bibaushi Libaty Youth Hostel
overview: B&B style, no dinner. Irregular opened in winter.

name: Black River Retreat
overview: Private couples resort.

name: Off Grid Getaways at Flagstaff Nordic Center
overview: Offers yurts and log-sided camper cabins to rent. Yurts and cabins have bunks or mattress pads and wood stoves; no electricity or water. Wi-fi and showers are available at the main lodge, which also offers mountain bikes for rent. Reservations can be made by phone or online.

name: Dingle Town Bed and Breakfast
overview: A modern town B&B overlooking the harbour of Dingle town

name: Really Central Hostel
address: 10, Bogdana Khmelnitskogo, Floor 2. Apt. 50 (access via second courtyard)
overview: Very friendly, one communal dorm, two private twin rooms. English speaking staff, Wi-Fi and communal kitchen.

name: Hotel Henri IV
overview: A few steps from Notre Dame and the Louvre, nearby Boulevards Saint-Germain-des-Prés and Saint-Michel, 3 min from Subway Pont-Neuf and only 30 min from Paris Orly airport.

name: Bed&Breakfast
overview: Walking distance to all attractions. Rates from DKK400.00 2 bed room.

name: Radisson Hotel Gateway Seattle-Tacoma Airport
overview: Nice accommodations, friendly staff, and reasonable rates. It's also conveniently located across the street from the airport.

name: Meroe Tented Camp
overview: The only lodging option near Meroë, with a spectacular location to watch sunset over the pyramids. The camp is comfortable, but utilitarian...these are ''tents'' after all. Each tent has electricity, a private veranda (for views of the pyramids at sunrise/sunset!), beds, & a few furnishings. Toilets are in a concrete building behind the tents with one toilet assigned to each tent. Showers have cold water only. Food is available...mostly Italian cuisine thanks to its Italian owners. Locals occasionally stop by to offer crafts and camel rides.

name: Solo B&B
overview: Solo B&B is newly built, in 2006, annex in the private territory, which provides excellent lodging facilities. Currently offering 2 homelike and modernly designed (27 sq.m.) rooms with the separate entrances and outside terraces that lead to the spacious private garden.

name: Rastaholms Värdshus
overview: Is not a reggae club, but an islet with a marina, a hostel and a restaurant.

name: The Village Inn of Woodstock
overview: Bed and breakfast with on-site tavern.

name: Hotel Molo
overview: ***. phone=+36 84 319004. In high season rooms only with half board in other time optional, weekend, single supplement

name: Cipta Hotel
address: Jalan Kyai Haji Wahid Hasyim No. 53, Menteng, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia 10350
overview: Air-conditioned rooms with comfy beds, a telephone, mini-bar, refrigerator, and a writing desk and chair along with complimentary bottles of mineral water. Breakfast for a separate fee at Blueberry Pancake House.

name: Harborside Inn
overview: Boston, Pleasant, remodeled in the boutique style (exposed brick, modern furniture without being uncomfortable). Rooms are a decent size, comfortable bed, no desk, nice TV, wireless internet free in all rooms, clean. Very quiet - no street noise at all. Coffee available in the lobby all day for free. No restaurant or room service. Basic travelers hotel - no gym. Close to Fanueil Hall, Aquarium, many restaurants within walking distance. Close to Financial District. Close to various convenience stores.

name: Clarion Suites Gateway
overview: Recently refurbished Melbourne CBD hotel which is overlooking the Yarra River and is in the heart of Melbourne’s central business district. All suite and 4,5 stars Melbourne CBD hotel.

name: The Monks Bunk
overview: Cheap and very cosy hostel in central Kaunas. You feel at home immediately. Very friendly host. No breakfast or meals included, but you can cook in a fully equipped kitchen..

name: Realou Franschhoek
overview: Realou is a 7 Suite 4 Star Guest House situated in one of Franschhoek’s historical (1868) monuments. It is located in the heart of Franschhoek Village next to the famous restaurjavascript:void(0)ants. Painstakingly restored with each suite having its own private entrances it has a heated swimming pool and a garden Jacuzzi. Guests can feel safe and secure while sunbathing or having a barbecue.

name: ANA Hotel
overview: Two restaurants and a bar on-site.

name: Çim apartments
overview: Run by the very friendly and welcoming Çim, the spacious & clean apartments are a good alternative to traditional hotels/hostels. In the evening Çim may cook a great Turkish dinner for 15 TL pp and travelers often share a bottle of Rake in the evening. Shared bathrooms, breakfast included, some apartments have kitchen and a washing machine that may be used for free.

name: Aboriginal hostel
overview: . Next to the National Museum in the city centre. Staff very helpful and speak very good English.

name: Hotel-Pension Theresia Regina
overview: Budget hotel that delivers a clean and comfortable stay. Decor is a bit dated but for the rate and considering the location, it's good value.

name: Kingdom Youth Hostel
overview: A former athletic training facility, a treat for the active or indolent. Friendly managers as of 2005. Inexpensive, with excellent showers and plenty of hammocks, internet access and a small bar. Outside of Acapulco proper, but that means it's near a quiet beach; a cab ride into the disco zone is about 10 pesos.

name: Hotel Restaurant Goldener Engel
overview: The Goldener Engel is located in a half-timbered building overlooking the picturesque Marktplatz in the centre of Heppenheim`s Altstadt. Although the building is old, the interior is very modern from an apparently recent renovation. The location is very quiet. The restaurant serves German cuisine.

name: Rantasipi Tropiclandia Spa Hotel
overview: A hotel in connection with the tropical spa next door out on the island of Tropiclandia. More value for the family with kids than the lone traveller.

name: Beacon Hotel
overview: Fourteen-room hotel with meeting facilities.

name: Hotel Golden Heritage
overview: Rooms : 35

name: Hotel Tomo
overview: Each room has anime-style murals and views of the city. Fun stuff like gaming suites, bean bag chairs and glow-in-the-dark desk blotters.

name: The Hotel Starmade
overview: Hotel offering free pick-up service, high speed internet and DVD movies.

name: Maitai Camp & Cabins
address: 7 km (4 mi) up the Maitai river valley
overview: Cabins, camp sites and a bunk house are available for accommodation. The camp is only accessible via a foot bridge and the whole site is surrounded by the Maitai river. An industrial kitchen and a huge hall with a small stage and a competition size billiard table is available for group gatherings.

name: Hotel Kuba
address: SE 3,3 km - near to 'Park Home of Hunters'
overview: At Kumanovo Bath

name: Villa St Clement the Lesser
overview: Exclusive 4-star villa in a quiet alley away from the traffic.

name: Rater Tara Diner Rabi Guest House
address: Tinni House, Phul Danga, Taltor Rd, Behind PHE Bunglow.
overview: A double storied garden guesthouse having AC rooms, CTV, Refrigerator, attached western toilets with Geyser, fan etc. All rooms & toilets are well maintained & linens are cleaned. Separate driver accommodation is available on nominal charges, Car parking is free. Locality is totally sound & air pollution free.

name: Hotel Oazis
overview: Small hotel in the center. Clean, cozy rooms with narrow beds; wifi, A/C, heating. One of the few budget options in central Kutaisi.

name: Circus Circus
overview: A cheaper and less upscale casino that caters to families. The Manor Motor Lodge is in poor shape; the Tower rooms are somewhat better.

name: St Lawrence Country Guest House
overview: A small country guest house providing bed and breakfast with stunning views across the countryside to Caldey Island. Close to the [[Pembrokeshire Coast National Park]] and an ideal base for walking, sightseeing and cycling and for those brave enough to tackle [[Ironman Wales]] we are just 10 minutes from the starting line

name: De Bonte Wever
overview: This place is located on the edge of Assen, near the Asserbos, but has good facilities including indoor and outdoor pools, an extensive spa, and bowling alley, most of them free.

name: Tokhouse Vacation House
overview: Free internet Wi-FI

name: Hotel le Fleuve
overview: North of the city centre, this place offers decent rooms with air conditioning and hot water for 20000CFA, as well as cheap meals.

name: Hesehotelli
overview: Hesehotel is owned by the burger chain Hesburger, and its situated in one the second floor of one of their biggest restaurants near central Turku, right next to Turku bus station. It has 15 rooms and 46 beds. Room equipment includes air conditioning, a fridge, digital TV and free wireless internet access. You can order breakfast and other food from the restaurant below and check-in is also done at the counter of the restaurant. Parking space reservation price is €5/day.

name: Motel One Munich City-East
overview: Modern and sleek interior with simply decorated rooms. Downstairs is the "One Lounge" with a lobby, breakfast café and bar in one. Free wifi access is available (incl. in breakfast price).

name: Vincci Bit
overview: This unexpectedly stylish hotel is two blocks towards the north from the Diagonal shopping centre. Each floor's corridor is decorated in a different, unusual theme and the cheerful yet tasteful variety of decor makes up for quite small and simple rooms. For thrifty holidaymakers, a Lidl supermarket is around the corner

name: Ametiszt Hotel Harkány
overview: Friendly hotel with own restaurant lunch, dinner menus available. Air con, bicycle rental, garage available. Can accept credit cards.Packages fro five or seven nights.

name: Green Valley Guest House & Backpackers
overview: Large and well kept walled gardens in a quiet residential part of town make this a peaceful and secure budget option. ''En suite'': single USD40, double/twin USD50, family USD70; shared ablutions: single USD20, double USD25; dorm: 4 bedded USD12 pp, 6 bedded USD8 pp; camping: USD5-8 pp. Free Wi-Fi & satellite TV.

name: Hotel Enfrente Arte Ronda
overview: This hotel is almost entirely designed with recycled materials. Free wi-fi.

name: SpringHill Suites Denver Downtown
overview: Across from the Pepsi Center in LoDo.

name: Hotel Karin
overview: Twenty a/c, dbl. rooms. Accept Budapest card

name: Ambrose Hotel
overview: While 20 blocks from the beach, the Ambrose Hotel offers great style and comfort for less than the large beach-front hotels.  Very convenient if visiting someone at St. John's Santa Monica Hospital.

name: Humlebæk Bed & Breakfast
overview: By the beach with private access and parking. 30 sqm apartment with living area, dining area and sleeping area. It has TV, fridge, stove and kitchen appliances. King size bed, children's double bunk bed and baby weekend.

name: Sir Toby's Hostel
overview: Bohemian style hostel experience filled with Czech antiques. Communal hostel where it's easy to meet other travelers. They show Czech films with English subtitles, have regular Czech beer tasting and sometimes local musicians come to play. Also very clean. Not right in the center but 10 minutes away or so by tram.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel
overview: The international hotel chain, Radisson Blu has begun construction of a 12 storey building with 154 rooms in one of the city's trendiest spots on the ''marginal'' road along the beach. This new property will feature a striking design, ocean views and will be competing with the best hotels in the city. There are several restaurants and bars across the road. Free Internet for guests and delegates. The hotel will hosts, an ocean view bar, a Filini restaurant (offering exquisite Italian cuisine in a stylish atmosphere), a cigar bar and a lounge bar. The hotel opening is now delayed until early 2012. Opening rate at US$220, breakfast included.

name: Hotel San Ramon
overview: A charming 6-room hotel. Free wifi and breakfast.

name: Schæffergården
overview: Excellent option for the price, this hotel and conference center is housed in big baroque mansion from 1755, in quite neighbourhood. Nice views over the large park on the property - you can even arrange a picnic with row boat in the dam. Also home of a nice restaurant.

name: One Love Hostel
overview: 4-8 bed dormitories. Breakfast buffet.

name: The Westin Grand Berlin
overview: Five-star hotel provides newly decorated accommodations facing the famous boulevard. Pomp architecture of the GDR.

name: St Lawrence Country Guest House
overview: A small country guest house providing bed and breakfast with stunning views across the countryside to the sea and Caldey Island. Close to the [[Pembrokeshire Coast National Park]] and a good base for walking, sightseeing and cycling and for those brave enough to tackle [http://eu.ironman.com/triathlon/events/emea/ironman/wales.aspx#axzz2qprvonAU ''Ironman Wales'']  Gumfreston is just 10 minutes from the starting line.

name: Granados 83
overview: Enric Granados 83. Set in a 19th-century hospital, it has been converted into a Nouveau Art Decó styled hotel. Its structure of oxidised iron is reminiscent of New York's Soho loft, and it stands in contrast with the stone and glass façade and the elegant, minimalist zen styled interiors.

name: Sokos Hotel Vaakuna
overview: Very nice hotel in a central location. Fine sauna and meeting facilities.

name: Hotel Hof van Wageningen
overview: A conference hotel much used by the local university. Very small but comfortable rooms. Short walk to the town centre. Elevators hopelessly inadequate so ask for a low floor.

name: Camplins Cumberland Retreat
overview: One and two bedroom cabins overlooking Lake Cumberland.

name: Hope Guesthouse
overview: Good basic traveler hotel two minutes walk from the Nyabugogo bus station on a main road. There is a large pub next to the hotel with good food and the usual football TV in the evenings. Downstairs is a massage place. There are also some VISA-accepting ATMs next door. There are plenty of buses to the city center, or walk for about one hour up-hill. Next to the Hope Guesthouse are many other guesthouses with even cheaper clean rooms.

name: The Sonoma Hotel
overview: A historic hotel with 16 rooms and suites located on the Plaza. A classic B&B feel with antiques and French country furniture. Guests receive complimentary wine in the evening, and dinner can be enjoyed downstairs at the girl and the fig. Can get noisy at night as the bars close.

name: Bedbunkers Backpackers Hostels
overview: Each dorm includes built-in lockers, comfortable mattresses, pillows and blankets. 24-hr hot water showers and toilets that are shared. Housekeeping every day. 24 hr-reception with free Wi-Fi.

name: Rotonda
overview: 3 star hotel entering the city of Thessaloniki. Free Parking lot, VIP taxi service and free WiFi.

name: Preciosa Hotel
overview: An affordable old hotel situated in downtown area.

name: Sarova Whitesands Beach Resort
overview: 335 rooms of which 8 suites and 3 rooms for physically handicapped persons. This resort advertising itself as "East Africa's finest" has three restaurants, three bars, four pools, a wellness and fitness club and arranges different water activities such as diving, snorkelling and water skiing. Rooms have Wi-Fi, A/C, bath, satellite tv, a tea and coffee maker and a hair dryer, some rooms also have a balcony with sea view.

name: Bishop Lake Outdoor Centre
overview: Outdoor sports store, propane, recreation centre on 96 acres on Bishop Lake. Four room motel and 75 trailer sites with laundry, toilets, showers.

name: Tynset Camping
overview: A camping site with small cabins, bed and breakfast and motel.

name: Camp Mack's River Resort
overview: Kitchen/efficiencies available. Pool. Pets allowed. Handicapped access. Wi-fi internet access (for a fee).

name: Nevsky Grand Hotel
overview: Just around the corner from Nevsky Prospect, 5 minutes from the subway and a 10 minute walk from the Hermitage Museum. Free and very reliable wi-fi access in all rooms (very speedy: 5Mbit/s), and air conditioning in every room. Rooms are very small, but functional. Staff speak English well, and breakfast is included (available 7AM-11AM). Shortcomings: no fridges in rooms; steep staircase at the entrance is difficult for a stroller.

name: Hotel Pärnu
overview: Centrally located — most things worth seeing can be reached within ten minutes by foot. The outside doesn't look very appealing but the rooms are clean and modern, with well working Wi-Fi, balcony and air conditioner. Their Restaurant Embecke is on the ground floor. The room price includes a generous breakfast buffet and the use of the hotel's sauna.

name: Hotel Nais
overview: An easy to find three star hotel, just off the main street. Close to the action but quiet. Breakfast is included.

name: Hotel Andersen
overview: Central and friendly budget hotel, the top-end rooms are upgraded and in very nice condition, the cheapest ones share bathrooms on every floor, but get's the job done if you just need sleep, and you wake up to a really hearty breakfast buffet in the morning. Friendly and personal service.

name: Nikko Park Lodge
overview: This laid-back, friendly and unapologetic lodge is located about twenty minutes' walk from the town center, although the owner is happy to provide rides to and from the train stations (and to the temple area in the morning). There are twin, double and four-person rooms at ¥3990 per person. English is spoken. The lounge has comfortable sofas and a warm stove for the winter. Although most of the rooms have showers, there are lovely Japanese-style hot baths on the first floor. Zen yoga classes are offered every morning at 7AM for ¥300. A simple breakfast is ¥395 and the vegan 'zen' dinner (¥1800, reservation required) is recommended, but be prepared to spend a couple of hours waiting for your meal after the advertised starting time. Parking is available.

name: Nordic Light
overview: Stepping into the Nordic Light hotel, you're given a lesson in modern Scandinavian design. Displaying a minimalist yet well equipped decor, this hotel is as chic as it gets. Each room features individual, specially designed light exhibits, which guests can adjust to suit their mood, and several have excellent views over the city centre. Light is showcased throughout the hotel in an ever-changing variety of shapes, colours and intensities. The hotel is located in the city centre of Stockholm right next to the best shopping, nightlife and the express-train to Arlanda airport.

name: Hotel Goldener Hirsch
overview: Highly reviewed hotel near the train station. Staff can speak English, French, and Italian.

name: City Corfu Marina Hotel
overview: A classic hotel with a modern style.

name: The Franklin Hotel
overview: Guestrooms are decorated with black and white pictures of historic Franklin Street. Many rooms have balconies overlooking Franklin Street.

name: Bernina
overview: Member of Swiss Quality Hotels International. Three star hotel located right next to the railway station in the heart of Geneva. The airport is 6km away.

name: Muskátli Guesthouse
overview: Six room for 13 persons.

name: The Red Coach Inn
overview: Historic bed and breakfast inn since 1923. Modeled after the Old Bell Inn in Finedon, England. Overlooks the Upper Rapids. Two-bedroom suites, one-bedroom suites and guestrooms, uniquely decorated with period antiques and reproductions, kitchens, fireplaces, canopy beds, air conditioned, other luxury appointments. Continental breakfast and newspaper are provided daily in the restaurant, plus champagne with fruit and cheese in your room upon arrival. Smoke-free. Pets are not allowed.

name: Comfort Hotel Weimar
overview: In the northern part of Weimar, 10 minutes drive from the city centre, and has its own free car park. Easy access A4 motorway (Autobahn A 4) or the local public transport system.

name: Grand Paradise Hotel
overview: Aging upmarket hotel that could do with a face lift (2014). Has a swimming pool that non-guests can use for 120 baht.

name: Daulat Niwas-Dugari Ki Haveli, Bundi
overview: An Architecture which is Of 500 years purest examples of Rajput architecture old belonged to youngest Son of Rao Raja Umed Singh or Shriji (1739-1770), the saintly ruler of Bundi gifted this property in early 1739 AD to his younger Son Rao Raja Sardar Singhji Of Dugari. Presently owned by Rajmata Sahiba Daulat Kanwar Of Dugari. The Family is already running a Camp in Bundi Called "The Ummaid Bagh Resort, Bundi". The Grandson Kunwar Shivam Singh Dugari & Bhanwar Shantanu Singh Dugari came out with the fantastic idea of converting this old architecture into : "The Cheapest B&B Haveli of Rajasthan". The basic concept being: "To Provide Luxury At Cheapest". List Of ''Special Things'' you get when you stay at Daulat Niwas, Bundi: Last Night No Charge, For Royal Enfield Bikers 25% Discount on Dining at The Ummaid Bagh Resort, Bundi Personalised Tour to Dugari Fort, Lake Kanak Sagar and Dugari Bagh, Wifi in All The Rooms, Express Check In - Check Out and Roof Top Snack Bar For In House Guests Only.

name: Dragsholm Slot
overview: Old castle

name: Glen Eden Hotel
overview: A two star hotel. Rooms with bath or shower, air conditioning, direct dial international telephone, internet access, satellite TV, mini-bar, hairdryer. In the hotel: lobby, reception. security service, restaurant, children's play room. Laundry service.

name: Auberge NOLA
overview: Hostel offers mixed dorms, female-only dorms, and one private apartment with its own bathroom and kitchen. Security lockers provided in dorms. Dorm guests from abroad must provide a foreign passport; American dorm guests need an out-of-state ID ''and'' a student ID. Dorms restricted to guests under 40 years of age. Apartment guests need an out-of-state ID or foreign passport and can be of any age. Office open 8:30AM-10PM; arrivals outside these hours are possible if arranged in advance.

name: Frankfurt Hostel
overview: Right in front of the Hauptbahnhof. Offers dorms and rooms and has multilingual staff. Upside is all you can eat breakfast, downsize is dynamic pricing (late bookings come at a higher price). Social third floor terrace. Free "pasta dinner party" on Saturdays.

name: Scandic Victoria Tower
overview: A new-built skyscraper hotel at Kistamässan at the Helenelund railway station.

name: Ambrosia Guest House
overview: In Dhanmondi Residential Area. Tk 2,876 per night, with breakfast and free broadband Internet connection from the rooms.

name: Solglimt Inn Bed and Breakfast
overview: In Canal Park, on a sandy beach. Solglimt was awarded a Green Designation from Green Routes for using environmentally friendly and locally produced products.

name: Florentia Guest House
overview: Safe parking and accommodation

name: Thamada Hotel
overview: Clean and central, but basic. The first international hotel in Yangon, and while it obviously has been taken over by a "private" businessman, but good value for money anyway.

name: Hotel Andaluz
overview: The closest thing Albuquerque has to a grand old hotel, this downtown spot is a historic and lavishly-decorated hotel, with Moroccan and Spanish-inspired architecture throughout, very elegant ballrooms, and some luxuriously appointed rooms.  A Mediterranean restaurant and a rooftop lounge are also on the premises.

name: NH Milano Touring
overview: This 4-star hotel, surrounded by many famous monuments, has 282 rooms, a restaurant, parking, Wi-Fi and a bar.

name: Gran Prix Hotels & Suites Cebu
address: 3rd Floor Coast Pacific Business Center, Corner F. Ramos St and General Maxilom Ave
overview: Or +63 32 253-3072. Superior, suite, deluxe and family rooms with A/C, flat-screen cable TV and bath with hot and cold shower. WiFi, function/meeting room, airport transfers and laundry service.

name: Platinum Hotel
overview: Boutique non-gaming hotel, all rooms are suites with kitchen and private balcony. Two blocks from the Strip.

name: Inn at the Forks
overview: Features modern style and commitment to service in a spectacular natural setting offering many amenities, including a convenient shuttle service to downtown. Guests may choose from 117 guest rooms and suite, each designed with contemporary lodging elegance. Rooms are smoke-free and furnished with the utmost attention to detail.

name: Montville Grove
address: 318 Western Avenue Montville, Sunshine Coast 4560 Australia
overview: Self-contained accommodation in Montville for couples. Three cottages with spas, fires and views.

name: Gugark Hotel
overview: At the corner of th central square, a block or two from the bus station. Good no-frills budget option.

name: Red Door Resort
overview: Resort on the north shore of Mille Lacs with eleven cabins (two bedroom or three bedroom) and ten motel rooms. Both cabins and motel rooms come with full bath, satellite TV, and air conditioning; cabins come with full kitchen. Boat launch and restaurant on site.

name: Rausu Onsen Campground
overview: This campground is well situated for people seeking to climb Mt. Rausu.  It's also across the highway from a free onsen.  Deer are frequently seen in and near the campground, so food must be properly stored.

name: Citrus Hotel Johor Bahru by Compass Hospitality
address: Lot No 7, Seksyen 33,Jalan Melayu, Off Jalan Masjid India 50100 Kuala Lumpur
overview: All rooms have air-con, 32” LCD flat screen TV with cable and satellite TV channels, IDD telephone, free wireless Internet connection and ensuite, fully-equipped bathrooms, personal electronic safe and wardrobe.Hotel located across the road from City Square Shopping Center, walking distance to the famous pedestrian street, Meldrum Walk, and within easy reach of the CIQ (Customs Immigration Quarantine) Complex as well as Singapore bound and local taxi stands.

name: Hida-Takayama Tenshōji Youth Hostel
overview: A temple-affiliated youth hostel on the eastern outskirts of the city, a 20-minute walk from the station. A bed for the night is ¥3000/night for HI members and ¥3300/night for non HI members

name: Mercure Frankfurt City Messe
overview: This Mercure thrives only on its very convenient location, as its rooms have been outdated for far too long and other areas leave much to be desired at well.

name: Hotel de l’Amitie
overview: Very large with a pool; rooms range in price from 5,700 CFA (shower and bed) to 26,500 CFA (Salon, refrigerator, complete bathroom, air conditioned, television).

name: Sakura no Sato
address: 52, Hosogoe-machi, Kakunodate 角館町細越町52
overview: Minshuku by Japanese-style buildings. It is located in the northeast of Samurai town.

name: Winstar Hotel
overview: Winstar Hotel is a new standard hotel designed and decorated in Chinese modern style. Wi-Fi, air-con, hot shower, minibar and colour TV with cable channels. Fountain Beer Park, Lim Breng Restaurant, Star Coffee Shop, and Thai ancient massage.

name: Fishing Bridge RV
overview: (20-May to 02-Oct). 344 sites, showers, flush toilets, RV sewer station. This is the only campground offering water, sewer, and electrical hookups, and it is for hard-sided vehicles only (no tents or tent-trailers are allowed).

name: Camping Mühlenbach
overview: Perfect for a short break or a long holiday, they have 80 pitches available to park your tent.  There are laundry houses within the immediate vicinity of the pitches containing showers, toilets, washing machines and dryers. There is an onsite shop for you to get you groceries if you run out of food or washing up liquid or even try the restaurant onsite.

name: Jolly Hotel
overview: This small beach village before reaching Sarande has a beautiful beach, and the Jolly Hotel has 4 person. You can negotiate. The staff, food, room, and location are all great.

name: Baguio Village Inn
overview: Extremely clean, basic, quiet, situated on a busy street. Common shower area but very clean. Approximately 15-20 min walk to downtown (Session Rd.). Free WiFi.

name: Das Triest Hotel
overview: Designed by Sir Terence Conran, it has not only a special restaurant, but a special highly-rated bar too.

name: Gyöngyvirág  Pension and Camping
overview: Rooms three categories all with TV.  Five rooms with washbasin, shared shower up to four persons per room. Six  two beds rooms with private shower, lavatory blocks, three of which have a private balcony. Four studio rooms for 2-4 persons with patio or balcony. Two studio rooms for 2-4 persons without balcony. Studios with shower, dining room with kitchenette. - Extended continental breakfast 08.00-10.00 (optional). Services: lunches, dinners can be organized in nice restaurants, all floors are equipped with communal fridge, sauna can be used for a fee, secured parking in the garden, playground, kitchen, garden barbecue, stew pot cooking facilities. -  Camping: open mid Apr-end of Oct. Twenty five tent and ten-twelve Campers places. Free services: barbecue, kitchen, enclosed bicycle storage

name: L-Shape Hotel
overview: Reasonable hotel with average but overpriced restaurant serving mostly Western food. Free Wi-Fi, but unstable even by Ethiopian standards.

name: Okay Guesthouse
overview: Large and busy guest house with restaurant, terrace, Internet cafe. A good place if you like hanging out with other travellers. They show movies every evening. The rooms are basic but clean, the cheaper rooms are sometimes very small and do not have a window, the more expensive rooms on the 2nd floor are generally a bit better. Somewhat quiet in the evening. They provide food, rooms, buses & tours. The rooms are rather bleak and sad by Cambodian guesthouse standards but cheap and relatively clean. Check your bed for bedbugs as they are common here.

name: Hotel Tehnograd
overview: Restaurant, tours

name: Willow Pond Bed & Breakfast
overview: Located on the Western Slope in Grand Junction, Colorado, Willow Pond B&B is a beautiful 1916 farmhouse offering eco-friendly lodging with pastoral views, an old willow tree and a little pond. Willow Pond B&B is a venue for Grand Valley artists and musicians to offer their talents. Locally made paintings, ceramics, photography, handmade crafts, soaps and music CD's are available at the inn. Willow Pond Bed and Breakfast features monthly musical house concerts, gourmet cooking classes, and special vacation packages.

name: Boston Hotel Milan
overview: Elegant two-star hotel with 25 single, double and triple bedrooms with private bath, shower, Wi-Fi connection and air conditioning.

name: Revere Guest House
overview: A restored nineteenth century colonial house furnished with antiques and modern amenities.

name: New Siam River Side
overview: A great location at the banks of the Chao Phraya River, with the express boat pier and the Khao San Road area closeby. If you're willing to pay extra for it, make sure that you actually book a "river view room", as many of the other ones face the road! Rooms are quiet, clean and just good. The breakfast is big and varied, and served buffet-style beside the pool and river. Definitely worth it. The attached restaurant can also be visited by non-guests and mains go for 100 baht or less.

name: Mbind Jam
overview: The family atmosphere at Mbind Jamm compliments the simplicity of the campement and highlights the hospitality Sérères are known for. Enjoy the dining area right on the water, where you can watch the ebb and flow of inter-island pirogue transit and fishing boats.

name: Hotel Sinclairs
overview: Pradhan Nagar. A well maintained hotel with good facilities. Located about a five minute taxi ride from main bus station.

name: Berg en Zee Guesthouse
overview: Elegant and comfortable Gordon's Bay guesthouse with sea views from every room. Situated just 50 metres from the beach and in walking distance to restaurants. Children welcome.

name: Grand America Hotel
overview: A landmark high-rise on the south end of downtown, intended to be "the best hotel ever built". The five-diamond hotel features a lovely courtyard and some of the most elaborate chandeliers and mirrors in the world.

name: Bastion Deluxe Hotel Maastricht
overview: Part of a Dutch chain of four star hotels at sub-four star prices. If you are used to the full four star service this will be a disappointment, but it is only a five minute walk into the city centre and provides free wireless internet service.

name: Posada Los Cántaros
overview: Charming rural hotel near Malaga with fantastic hill-top views over the surrounding countryside.

name: Le Saint-Laurent
overview: Simple and cheap. Near historical monument. Free Wi-Fi. Food available.

name: Windy Harbour Farm Hotel
overview: Woodhead Rd, Glossop

name: Hotel Viktória
overview: Three star.

name: Motel Venecia
overview: Decent, big (60m2) apartments. Good location. Fantastic owners. Wi-Fi. 2 big shops right underneath the building. Fully equipped kitchen. Long term rent is also possible. There is no lake view from apartments and bedroom lacks sunlight.

name: Novotel Vilnius Centre
overview: Very popular 159 room hotel opened in 2003. Tall building located in the centre, close to both Opera House and Cathedral square.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites
overview: A brand new hotel situated near the center of Carrboro, and within easy walking distance of Franklin Street and the UNC campus. Free breakfast, internet fitness center, outdoor pool, meeting space.

name: Hotel de la Poste
overview: The classic hotel of Saint-Louis. This is where pilots flying mail from South America and Africa spent their nights during stop-overs. Jean Mermoz, the most famous French aviator in the inter-war period spent his last night here before disappearing over the Atlantic in 1936. All rooms have air conditioning and free WiFi. The onsite restaurant offers great views over the mouth of Senegal river.

name: Hyatt Regency Albuquerque
overview: Large hotel right in downtown Albuquerque, in the smaller of the two tallest highrises with the pyramid roof.

name: Independence Square Inn
overview: Family run guesthouse, single, double/twin, triple or quad room with private or shared bathroom. Breakfast, LCD tv, A/C. Price from 40€

name: Fairmont Hotel
overview: One of the most famous hotels in the city, having been gutted in the 1906 earthquake and fire, and rebuilt. The lobby is fantastic, and many rooms have fantastic views.

name: Hitchin' Post RV Park and Motel
overview: Sites are cramped but cheap. They take your name but don't take reservations if they are nearly full (beware!).

name: Tivoli Lisboa
overview: The five-star flagship of the Portuguese Tivoli hotel chain is most known for its rooftop terrace bar with splendid views.

name: Quality Inn at ASU
overview: This hotel is only five miles from the airport and very close to ASU. Easy access to freeways for travel in Tempe. Breakfast and wi-fi included.

name: Bergen YMCA Hostel
overview: Decent youth hostel right in the center of town, with a rooftop terrace where you can sit and look out over the old town center. Reservations essential. Bed linen included, no breakfast. Reception: 1 Apr–31 May: 08:00–21:00, 1 Jun–31 Aug: 07:00–00:00, 1 Sep–2 Nov: 08:00–21:00, 3 Nov–31 Mar: 08:00–15:30.

name: Chaplin's Guesthouse
overview: A six-suite guest house along the Mekong. Each room has air-con, flat screen with cable, ensuite bathroom, and private balconies overlooking the Mekong River. On site restaurant that serving Western food, along with a bar with pool table and TV showing various sports.

name: Gistiheimili Hjálpræðishersins
overview: Literally in the heart of Reykjavík, a few meters from Austurvöllur and the parliament building.

name: Hotel Sopoti
overview: A formerly grand hotel, it feels somewhat forgotten; rooms are basic, ask for one with a balcony to get a view of the castle, bathrooms are shared. The manager of the hotel is a refined older gentleman who also runs the bar/kafe downstairs. He knows some English.

name: Grand Hotel Verona
overview: An elegant aristocratic building decorated with paintings and sculptures of some of best Italian artist of the 20th century, for this luxury four star hotel of Verona. From the Grand Hotel one can easily reach by walk the famous Arena and the other monuments of the historic centre of Verona.

name: Hotel Karraz
overview: Next to Les Halles Metro Station.

name: Seitala
overview: At a good fishing location. Accommodation (rooms, cottages, camping); fishing permits; boats, motors and equipment for rent; rowing service; willow grouse hunting.

name: Motel Adams
overview: Hotel in center of town.  Near post office. Restaurant on premises. Autobus Orleans Express has a ticket agency in the reception counter of Hotel.

name: Al Diyar Hotel
overview: Has Wi-Fi, pool, gym, and restaurant.

name: Roosevelt Lodge Cabins
overview: Frontier cabins offer two double beds and private bathroom with shower. The Roughrider Cabins are sparsely furnished and heated with wood burning stoves (two "presto" logs are provided) and offer communal showers and shared bathrooms. Open mid-June through early September.

name: Mardi Gras Hotel & Casino
overview: Free complimentary shuttle service to the Strip.

name: Silken Diagonal Barcelona
overview: Postmodern extravaganza right next door to the Agbar tower.

name: Dom Dostoevskogo
overview: A small and comfortable mini-hotel in the centre, in the same building where the famous Russian writer Dostoevsky used to live. 10 cozy rooms with plasma TV sets, safe, and free wireless internet.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel
overview: This is one of the newer hotels in Bamako with excellent, large rooms and free wifi throughout the hotel for guests. The ACI 2000 area of Bamako is however quiet and removed from the hustle+bustle of downtown.

name: Bazouk du Saloum
overview: On Bazouk’s lush grounds, a sense of quiet and privacy reigns. With a number of individual bungalows opening right onto the water, you’ll feel like the delta flows before you for your private enjoyment. A few different-sized options (huts and bungalows) are available.

name: Whispering Spruce RV Park and Storage
overview: Open May 1-Oct 31. Hookup types: Power, water & sewer; power & water; no hookups.

name: Casa Ko
overview: A cosy traditional house offering an amazing view on volcanoes Osorno, Calbuco and Puntiagudo as well as Llanquihue Lake. Home-made dinner with organic vegetables from the garden. French run.

name: Park Inn Hotel Krakow
overview: Ul. Monte Cassino 2.

name: Silk Road Hotel **
overview: 18 rooms. Rooms for 2, 3, 4 person.

name: Baan Orapin
overview: Only 6 rooms in a beautifully restored old Thai house set in a small garden. Air-con, hot water.

name: Classic Cottages
overview: Established in 1977, with over 750 handpicked and personally inspected holiday cottages throughout Cornwall, Devon, Dorset and Somerset.

name: Hostal Alcatraz
overview: The most central of the four hostels. Good showers, lockers outside of the dorms, no private rooms, nice staff.

name: Matkakoti Patria
overview: Budget hostel near railway station.

name: Holiday Inn Chateau LeMoyne
overview: An historic hotel occupying what were originally four separate 19th century townhomes.

name: Mercure Hotel Dresden Elbpromenade
overview: The Mercure Hotel Dresden Elbpromenade is on the outskirts of Dresden, right on the river Elbe. It has 103 rooms with Wi-Fi access, which is also available in the public areas.

name: Ritz-Carlton Istanbul
address: Suzer Plaza, Elmadag, Askerocagi Caddesi No: 15, Sisli.
overview: Standing tall near the Bosphorus, the Ritz Carlton is located in the heart of Istanbul overlooking the Bosphorus and Dolmabahce Palace.

name: Pápai Kóter Tourist Hostel
overview: In schooltime six rooms,  holiday time over twenty rooms. - Services: 24-hour reception, bus parking, catering, fishing facilities, medical service, horse riding, guarded parking, TV room, hiking, WIFI/WLAN, football ground, parking in a closed garden.

name: Grand Hotel
overview: large hotel containing a number of restaurants, bars and function rooms. Some rooms starting to show their age.

name: Fiscardo Bay Hotel
overview: This boutique hotel sits on the side of the hill with views directly across Fiskardo and the bay in front, just 80m from the main harbor.

name: 4You Hostel & Hotel
overview: Clean hostel at a very good location near the central station. Included in the price is a breakfast and wireless internet access. The hostel has its own bar and bike rental.

name: Pondok Impian 2
overview: Midway between downtown Tanjung Pandan and Tanjung Binga beach. Quaint exotic exterior, adequate facilities for a star hotel, superb view. Breakfast was on par with price. You cannot plunge into the beach directly from the hotel though.

name: Scandic Lahti
overview: Formerly known as Next Hotel Salpaus. Standard mid-range hotel of the Swedish chain.

name: Motel 6
overview: Indoor pool

name: Hotel Erwin
overview: Newly launched full service boutique hotel about 200 feet from the ocean in the heart of Venice Beach. Rooftop lounge called High with incredible panoramic views of the ocean and City of LA. Hotel has spacious rooms and 2 room suites, ideal for families. Many rooms have beautiful ocean views. Hotel has gated indoor parking.

name: Taulipampa
overview: Recommended camp site for the second night.

name: New Central Guest House
overview: This is a very basic guest house with small rooms, but it is quite cheap (and close to Khao San Road). They have no facilities, except for a free Wi-Fi hotspot, which doesn't reach every room. Toilets can be broken, and then need a bucket to flush. Ensuite showers work fine though. The doors are locked at night, so knock hard to wake up the owner and he can let you in. Unfortunately popular with the older male contingent, who can be violent towards the guests — both the hotel's and their own.

name: Grand Hotel Europa
overview: Prestigious luxury hotel. 50 rooms.

name: Macdonald Campground
overview: Just minutes from the BC Ferries terminal; a good base to start exploring Gulf Islands National Park Reserve.

name: The Retreat
address: Erangal Beach, Madh-Marve Road, Malad (W), Mumbai 400 061
overview: A five star beach facing hotel.

name: Cairo Downtown Hotel
overview: We have old colonial building from the earlier British era the interior has very high ceilings, large rooms, beautiful polished wood floors, iron balconies, and comfortable beds. Our rates is affordable so you can enjoy the Middle East even if you are traveling on a budget.We keep our hotel clean and comfortable so our guests can relax after enjoying their time in Egypt.

name: GuestHouse Inn
overview: Serves both tourists and business travellers. Free wireless internet. Free hot continental breakfast. Some pet-friendly rooms.

name: Peräpohjolan Opisto
overview: Situated 2,5 km north of Tornio. 30 rooms with a toilet and shower. Cooking facilities and washing machine.

name: Hôtel Bel'Espérance
overview: Run by the Salvation Army, the Bel'Espérance is less hotel like than many hotels; they have a little kitchen with small individual refrigerators if you want to cook, and considering how close the hotel is to the Wednesday morning farmer's market on blvd Helvetique there's a pretty good chance you will want to. You can take your meals on the rooftop terrace or in the big, comfy lounge area.

name: ibis Styles Frankfurt City
overview: WiFi and breakfast included in the room price.

name: Borneo Gaya Lodge
overview: First opened 2008. Bed sheet and towel, free hot & cold drinking water, complimentary breakfast. Spacious carpeted living area with LCD TV (AstroChannel) but without window, free WiFi, books and a small kitchen with refrigerator. No curfew and 24 hr security with CCTV and computerised door lock. Friendly staff. Tour information available.

name: Milimani Backpackers & Safari Centre
overview: Milimani Backpackers is located on Oldeani Crescent Rd (moved from its old location on Milimani Rd). During the day it's a safe 15-20 minute walk to the city center. It has internet, WiFi, hot showers, and bar. They offer dorms, doubles, singles, twins, camping space, permanent tents, and cabins. Milimani also offers good-value safaris and other trips.

name: Pearl Continental
overview: This five star hotel is the most sophisticated hotel in the city and provides international standard facilities with quality service. Hotel has total 258 rooms and 21 suites which includes some stylish rooms. Tennis and squash courts, swimming pool and a health club are located inside the hotel building. Among the restaurants inside the hotel are, rooftop "Chandni" for Pakistani, "Taipan" and "Marcopolo" for Chinese, a steak house "Jason Steak House" and "the Royal Elephant" for the sea food lovers, also a 24 hours nice coffee shop and a small shopping centre in the lobby. Overall a high standards hotel. This was the first-ever five-star Intercontinental Hotel in Pakistan, and has hosted Queen Elizabeth II, Nelson Mandela, and other world leaders and royalty. Its known for its classic luxury and an array of restaurants including Sakura serving authentic Japanese food on the hotel's top floor, which has views of downtown Karachi.

name: Hotel Prinz
overview: All rooms are equipped with cable TV, wifi access and 24 hr room service. Business travelers can continue to work at the two conference rooms located onsite.

name: Hotel Villa
overview: Continental breakfast.

name: Hotel Sea Gull
overview: Excellent views, good service, ask for a room in the new building.

name: Hostel Erottajanpuisto
overview: A small, clean, and friendly hostel with a central location.

name: Rapsbollen bed & breakfast
overview: Wellknown, cosy bed&breakfast north of Kåseberga and 15 min east of Ystad. Price per room includes breakfast, bed linnen, towels and 30 min qigong each morning before breakfast. Small café and art gallery. Bicycles for hire. Close to the sea and white sand beaches.

name: A la Bonne Heure
overview: Charming new bed and breakfast just above Parc Lafontaine, two blocks from Mont-Royal shopping, restaurants, nightlife. Only four rooms, so book ahead.

name: Hotel De Utrechtsche Dom
overview: Characteristic family hotel in the centre of Gouda. Breakfast included.

name: Horizon Village & Resort
overview: The hotel is connected to the Tweechol Botanical Garden, a private garden of 50 hectares. The garden has many animal shaped shrubs. Former president Jimmy Carter stayed here when in Thailand for the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_%26_Rosalynn_Carter_Work_Project Jimmy & Rosalynn Carter Work Project].

name: Intercontinental Wien
overview: See above for the bar.

name: Kauai Coast Resort at the Beachboy
overview: Spacious condominium accommodations. 108 studios, one bedroom and two-bedroom condominium accommodations all decorated with red, gold, and green fabrics, carpeted floors, and island-style accents.

name: Akzent Hotel Höltje
overview: This is a family run hotel that is situated in the centre of Verden.  There is the opportunity to use the indoor pool and sauna to unwind at the end of the day.  There is an onsite bar and restaurant that has a wide range of drinks and fine cigars.

name: Hotel Palafitte
overview: The five star hotel "Palafitte" is located at the lake.

name: Hotel Alexander
overview: Free Wi-Fi. Breakfast buffet.

name: Four Seasons Amman
overview: A wonderful luxury hotel.

name: Avenue Hotel
overview: A well located mid range hotel, with an impressive lobby and common facilities for the price - including sofas and a fireplace. The rooms are quite big by Copenhagen standards, nicely furnished and clean, though the carpets could use a replacement as they are beginning to have small stains many places. The rooms facing the main street can have noise problems, if you want the windows open. Internet is pricey.

name: Novotel Cairo Airport
overview: Closest hotel to the airport.  The lobby and public areas have been given a facelift and are now bright, modern, and airy, but the rooms still look and feel like a cheap motel with lumpy beds, and noisy air conditioning.  Adequate for a one-night transit, but you wouldn't want to spend your whole vacation here.  Free half-hourly shuttle bus from/to airport.

name: Howe Hall
overview: Late July to late August.

name: Hotel Vendome
overview: Operating since 1917, with free breakfast and wi-fi.

name: Harborview Inn & RV Park
overview: We are a locally-owned and -operated motel and RV park right out on the Port of Garibaldi, Oregon. We are 50 yards from the boat launch and marina. If we were any closer, you'd be wet! Perfect for fishermen and families, we offer boat & trailer parking along with special rates for guests of our charter partners.  Our 16 newly remodeled rooms with rates starting at $49/night are cheery and charming, featuring 1 or 2 queen beds, refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, flat screen TV with free cable & wi-fi. You can walk to restaurants, museums, antique shops, bakery, grocery stores and even ride the historic steam train.  Our 30 space RV park features hot shower, 20, 30, 50 amp electric, water, sewer, cable TV and wi-fi all included in the rates, which start at just $27.50/night.  We are right on Tillamook Bay with 3 major bays and 7 major rivers. You can launch your boat from here, go clamming & crabbing, and we're within easy driving distance of the towns of Tillamook, Bay City, Rockaway Beach, Manzanita, Wheeler, and Nehalem.

name: Clarion Hotel Ernst
overview: Recently renovated hotel. It is a modern first class hotel in the heart of the city centre. The hotel was built in 1858 and has long traditions as a hotel. Each room has a characteristic of its own, they may vary in size furnishing and decorations.

name: The County Hotel
overview: The most central of all the hotels.

name: The Century House
overview: an Ascend Hotel Collection Member

name: Sofitel Luxembourg Le Grand Ducal
overview: The other Sofitel is in the Bellevoie district, with a location affording brilliant vistas of the Alzette river Valley and the old town of Luxembourg. Of particular note in terms of views are the top-floor bar and restaurant. The hotel itself is appointed in a very modern theme, contrasting with the classic Sofitel Europe.

name: Santa Claus Holiday Village
overview: Hotel-like accommodation in cabins in Santa Claus Village, Arctic Circle.

name: Hotel Ashmyany
overview: A hotel with rather basic facilities close to the centre.

name: Mickleover Court Hotel
overview: Menzies Hotel

name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson
overview: A run of the mill three star hotel with a nice gym.

name: Zsófia Guesthouse
overview: Massage: from HUF1800, Horseback Riding: HUF2500 / hour, Bike rental: HUF1,500 / day. Skeet: HUF4500. - All rooms have double bed, shower, lavatory, toilet, satelite TV, internet with WIFI, water heater, micro and fridge.

name: Four Points by Shearton Panoramahaus Dornbirn
overview: The Four Points is located out of town by the A14 motorway, in the oval Panoramahaus tower, which sits atop the "Home of balance" fitness and wellness centre with an outdoor pool. On the hotel's top floor, the "Sky-Restaurant" and "Sky-Bar" offer excellent views over the city of Dornbirn and the surroundings. Some of the rooms on lower floors do overlook the neighbouring Messepark shopping centrum, which is far less spectacular. Rooms have varying categories, and their appointments and features belie the brand's humble character.

name: Best Western Hotel Haaga
overview: Best Western Hotel Haaga is centrally located since it's only 15 minutes drive from Helsinki-Vantaa airport.

name: Hotel Kapri
overview: Rooms come with TV, separate bathrooms, WiFi.

name: Comfort Hotel Okayama
overview: Western-based chain with rooms about 5% nicer than the usual business hotel; wireless internet access and continental breakfast are included.

name: Hotel Inglês
overview: Nice location next to the park, but a bit overpriced compared to similar accommodation in the area.

name: Lugano Imperial Suites
overview: It offers 36 suites apartment, fully furnished short and long term special stays for families and executives. It offers rooms equipped with home theater, kitchen and broadband Internet access. Some of its facilities and services are restaurant, bar, sauna, massage service, concierge and rooms service.

name: Novotel Krakow Centrum
overview: Four stars, leisure centre with swimming pool, sauna etc. 198 rooms.

name: Friendship Motel
overview: From RM28 for a small A/C room with shared bathroom. Free internet.

name: Bayreuth Youth Hostel
overview: The youth hostel provides adequate accommodation at very reasonable prices. As with all hostels, most beds are in dorm rooms, and the rate includes a bed, sheets, and a breakfast. Dinners are also available nightly. Guests over 27 will pay a slight surcharge. Caution, many times in summer large groups of school children will visit, making the hostel very loud.

name: Esplendor Resort at Rio Rico
overview: Pets accepted.

name: Pulau Labuan Inn
overview: 35 rooms with attached toilet and A/C. Wifi in room and breakfast. Attached restaurant.

name: The Keating Hotel
overview: A modern luxury hotel with an on site bar, spa services, and Italian designed rooms.

name: Te Araroa Holiday Park
overview: Decent holiday park that is a short walk from the beach. There is a general store and other facilities on site.

name: Chez Lala
overview: Rooms are basic and a bit dingy, but the price is right. WiFi is available in the restaurant area, and you are close enough to walk anywhere else in Tulear.

name: Calabogie Lodge Resort
overview: In village, on north side of lake.

name: Camping Březový Háj
overview: Open Apr-Oct

name: Yavapai Campground
