Perched on the north east side of the island, the hostel is at the end of the east beach, and has views over the Sound of Harris to Harris, mountains on the mainland, and Skye.

name: NH Podium
overview: The usual NH fare packed into a nice corner building a minute away from the Arc de Triomf.

name: Hotel Fenyves Panoráma
overview: Is a family atmospheric three star hotel, which is on the hillsides of Mecsek by the pine forest, right above the centre of the town.

name: Sandy Patch
overview: Self-catering 3 bedroom 4 star bungalow lies in a quiet cul-de-sac off A496 in Southern Snowdonia, has a fine view of the World Heritage Site, off-road parking: close to railway station.

name: Mosser Hotel
overview: Nice, clean hotel with small rooms but a great location.

name: Hotel Riverside
overview: A capsule hotel with the usual bachelor amenities like a bath/sauna and meals (for a bit extra).

name: Hotel City Palace
overview: Opened in 1999 by Sheraton and was run by them until a few years ago, when they left having lost money after some alleged financial irregularities. The hotel is one of Tashkent's taller buildings. The rooms are still very good, but service and maintenance...Bar/restaurant bills must be paid in cash.

name: Victory Hotel
overview: <br> 45 rooms

name: Loews Santa Monica Beach Hotel
overview: A beachfront resort overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Around the corner from Santa Monica's Third Street Promenade.

name: Hotel Twierdza
overview: Three star hotel in the former 19th century Austrian fort (part of ''Festung Krakau''). Additional attractions: paintball, quads etc.

name: The Oasean Hotel
address: In Cansado, turn right when the road ends in a T.
overview: A more upmarket hotel with restaurant, tennis courts and beautiful ocean side view. It is one of the oldest hotels in town.

name: Jim's Guest House
overview: Good value bed and breakfast. Family suite available.

name: Hostel Stayokay Bunnik
overview: Located in the woods on the East end of Utrecht, in Bunnik. The hostel is located in an very old building in the forest of the fortress "Rhijnauwen". Easy to reach by car (15 minutes from the center) or bike (25 minutes from the city), but not recommended if you plan to go clubbing all night, in which case you’ll want to stay in the city centre.

name: Hodeidah Land Resort
overview: Pleasant hotel just outside the main town. Has a number of villas arranged in a circle, some of which have their own private pools. Wireless internet is available.

name: Hotel Viktorija
overview: 27th March 10. Exclusive location in the centre of the city

name: NH Stuttgart Airport
overview: Between the airport and the town centre. The rooms are comfortable. Beach club restaurant.

name: Hotel Ansgar
overview: Basic hotel in the lower end of the Copenhagen price range, right behind the central station. Small rooms, but you can sometimes get substantial discounts, to make it worthwhile if you just need a bed. Free wireless internet. All rooms are non-smoking.

name: Muchiutt Park Hotel
overview: Receptivity and quality are the strong Muchiutt with easy location is just 6 minutes from downtown

name: Ebsens Hotel
overview: Classical hotel with 18 rooms and one larger family room with kitchenette.  Restaurant serving well prepared traditional food.

name: Riverbend Guest House B&B and Cabin
overview: Located in scenic Chilliwack River Valley, this is the perfect place to stay in Chilliwack BC if you want to be near fishing, kayaking, rafting, sight-seeing, and hiking. Scenic beauty combined with ideal location, as well as friendly hosts, means you will enjoy your stay in Chilliwack. Book your guided fishing adventure on the Fraser River. Less than a 5 minute walk to the Chilliwack River.

name: Red Sea Hotel
address: Just off Independence Rd, 10 minute walk to the city centre
overview: Another budget option, with clean, but basic rooms and services and no hot water. The helpful manager will often offer to personally drive guests to their destination.

name: Quality Inn
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast, laundromat, pets accepted.

name: D&D Inn
overview: A huge hotel (by Khao San Road standards) with a roof-top swimming pool, massage facilities, and a very clean and efficient 24 hour internet cafe. All rooms have attached bathrooms, air-conditioning, TV, and rates include breakfast and use of the pool. They do not allow check-in until after 13:00.

name: Danhostel Hillerød
overview: A large hostel in the forest on the outskirts of Hillerød, has bikes for hire.

name: Hotel du Vin
overview: Offering a dark take on its lush Victorian common spaces, the Hotel du Vin brands itself as lifestyle accommodation, with a number of facilities to match, including a cigar lounge.

name: Days Inn Kingman West
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pet-friendly.

name: Capital Suites
overview: Hotel suites.

name: The Saint Louis Hotel
overview: Luxurious furnishings, with a beautiful courtyard.

name: Reuan Cha Mao
overview: Bungalows and restaurant on the beach. Basic two room accommodation with air-con, hot showers and cable TV. Beach restaurant in a timber pavilion serves seafood and fresh local produce. Popular with local visitors from Chumphon on weekends.

name: Hôtel Saint-Honoré
overview: Close to the Louvre. The place was renovated in the last few years, so the comfort level is pretty good considering it hasn't received a star rating yet.

name: Lotz Cisterns campsite
address: At HaRukhot junction, few kilometers north of Mitzpe Ramon, turn to route 171 and drive past the crater's northern cliff until you reach it
overview: West of the crater itself and not far from the [[Egypt]]ian border.The campsite sometimes has running water and even a night guard; check with [[#Inns|the nearby Field School]].

name: The Inn at Hermannhof
overview: Historic bed and breakfast featuring beautiful suites with complimentary breakfasts, fireplaces, whirlpool tubs & modern amenities. Located in the center of downtown.

name: Cliffrose Lodge
overview: Motel with beautiful grounds and friendly staff.

name: Qods Hotel
overview: Clean and excellent staff. [June 2011]

name: Hostel Panget
overview: Former pension in Dragsfjärd. Toilets ensuite, showers in some family rooms. Breakfast and linen included.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Luxembourg
overview: The DoubleTree is on a woody hill in Dommedagne, north of the city, in a quite remote location. There is a bus stop down the road, a bit of a walk away, though. The hotel is quite new and very nicely appointed, leaving nothing but a better location to be desired.

name: Osper
overview: This is basically a public bath, but staying overnight is an option. Besides the baths, there are tatami rooms, mangas, TV sets. Put your bag and clothes in a locker, inside you will hang around in Japanese pajamas. Males and females not mixed.

name: Hotel Michael
overview: Designed by and named after architect Michael Graves, but mostly in shades of lime.

name: Four Seasons San Stefano
overview: Edging the Mediterranean in a setting of legendary glamour, discover an intimate enclave within the stately Grand Plaza shopping and residential complex. Indulge in classically elegant accommodations, European spa treatments and terraced restaurants with fresh sea breezes. Four Seasons care outshines all else in Alexandria. Alexandria's top hotel and priced to match.

name: Swissotel Metropole
overview: Five star hotel with nice old ambiance. Very kind service, in front of it is a park, may be a nice view, but to see much of the lake or the jet d'eau you should take a room on 3rd level or higher (one of the suites).

name: Best Western Plus Grand Hotel Victor Hugo
overview: A fairly characterless but solid hotel in the north of the city

name: Hotel Írottkő
overview: *** HOTEL : Fifty rooms all with private bathroom, telephone and television. Services: 24-hour concierge, elevator, in the lobby free wireless Internet, bicycle rental. Alsothere is a wellness, a café, a restaurant and a summer garden, hairdresser, pedicure and massage therapist, as well as bank branches and ATM. Parking: HUF250 fee per night, the parking permission card (caution HUF2000) valid for daylight and night. Breakfast is included in the room price (time 07:00–10:00) - RESTAURANT with sixty seats and banquet room for forty persons. Famous about local specialties and vegetarian dishes. Soups / starters HUF400-1100 / 300-800; children's menu  ( three courses) / salad dishes 990 / 1300-1500; hake, catfish, perch / beef dishes HUF1300-1900 / 00 / 1700-2700; pork / chicken, turkey dishes HUF1000-1700 / 1100-1600, pastas / veggies 700-1200 / 900-1000; salads / desserts HUF400 / 500-700. Try the local special spirit 'Irotttko palinka' (quince, pears, plums, apples and grapes 44% alcohol content). Phone=+36 94 562451, open daiy 11.00-22.00 - WELLNESS: Free for guests: Finnish sauna,Tepidarium, Infrared sauna, Jacuzzi, Steam Room, Fitness room. For fee: ALOHA massage parlor, skin rejuvenating peeling treatments, salt chamber  (HUF600 / 45 min), a hair salon, manicure, pedicure. Phone to massage =+36 94 562453. Open daiy 08:00-11:00 and  14:00-21:30

name: The Lymm Hotel
overview: A McDonald Hotel, AA 3 star. During the 1966 Football World Cup the Brazilian team stayed here!!

name: Rodos Palladium Leisure & Wellness
address: Rodou Falirakiou Av, Kalithea, Rhodes, 85100, Greece
overview: Rhodes most awarded five star hotel right on the beautiful beach of Kalithea, just 4 km from Faliraki and 9 km from Rhodes Town.

name: Hotel Ogni Murmanska
overview: Hotel and resort complex overlooking the city from it's eastern mountain slopes. This is a good option if you are exploring the surrounding nature and wildlife rather than Murmansk itself. Standards are good, there's 80 beds in 37 rooms as well as several cottages. The restaurant is very nice and popular, if somewhat overpriced. All major credit cards are accepted.

name: Miramar Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel, Cuban advisers used to live here during the Cold War.

name: Safari Inn
overview: Around Libya Street, has singles with private bathroom from usd 20000Tsh per night with simple breakfast. The hotel has an Internet café, and there are restaurants nearby.

name: Grand Hyatt
overview: This is an opulent building designed by a Yemeni prince in what seems almost a parody of Arabian palace styles.

name: Grand Hotel Pristina Unio Commerce
overview: A state company during the Communist era and in the process of privatization, The Grand Hotel has not been substantially renovated yet—and as such the place is very worn and rightfully mocked for its ironic name. Dangerous electrical connections, and substandard bathrooms especially require attention. The hotel offers seven halls for every kind of activities, Meeting/Conference rooms, Bar, Restaurant,  Room service, Fax. wireless and cable internet, business center. Room Facilities: Minibar, Telephone and cable TV.

name: Hotel Viktoria
overview: Newly renovated (June 2011) and family-owned hotel, situated in a new residential area that offers quietness and fresh air.

name: Camping La Pista del Andino
overview: Located on the slope of Club Andino overlooking the city.  Great for hikers and mountain bikers.

name: Ein Gedi Country Hotel
overview: Kibbutz Hotel

name: Intercontinental Amman
overview: Another hotel popular with foreign professionals.

name: Kinuya Hotel
overview: A great hotel for backpackers, staff can speak English. Two PCs with internet access are available at the lobby.

name: Hotel Gran Via
address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 642
overview: Very central, and originally a palace, the public spaces of the hotel live up to that history. The rooms are large, but otherwise relatively modest. About €80 per night for a double room with bath.

name: Rwenzori View Guesthouse
overview: Family run, nice garden. Home cooked meals at big joint dinner table. Breakfast included.

name: Elysium Resort & Spa
address: Rodou Falirakiou av, Kalithea, Rhodes, 85100, Greece
overview: The island's most prestigious five star resort set on the beautiful cost of Kalithea, 4 km away form Faliraki and 9 km from Rhodes town. Spacious and modern accommodation, executive floors for VIP guests and the world famous ESPA spa center promise a unique holiday experience in luxury and style.

name: Rex Hotel
overview: North of the city center, the Rex Hotel has a trendy designer feel to it, rooms have vintage photographs and gilt mirrors against concrete walls and the bathrooms are tiled in slate. Free internet is available and staff are extremely helpful, even posting out letters and offering advice if needed.

name: Hotel Dormy Inn
overview: A 12-storey business hotel that features a hot spa (onsen) and open bath (rotenburo) on the top floor with views to Mount Fuji.

name: The Copley Square Hotel
overview: Located in historic Copley Square, walking distance to Fenway Park, Newbury Street and Boston Common. This Boston hotel features 143 hotel rooms and suites. The Copley Square Hotel offers on-site dining and entertainment at its restaurant, XHale Restaurant, and music lounge, Saint. XHale Restaurant is a casual meeting place for breakfast, dinner or cocktails; Saint is a boutique music lounge which serves drinks and provides live music.

name: Boulder Station
overview: A modest hotel that's part of the local Station Casinos chain, with lower rates and better games than those typical of Vegas hotels.

name: Maverick Motel
overview: Free wifi, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, TV, hair dryer, iron, and ironing board in the room. Provides free breakfast and a daily newspaper, and laundry and fitness facilities. Children under 18 traveling with parents stay free; 10pm curfew for children.

name: Suzhou Watertown Youth Hostel
overview: Centrally located in a traditional Suzhou block-house with all the modern conveniences, including free Internet access & WiFi, DVDs, bicycle renting (25/15¥ full/half day).

name: La Joya Inn
overview: Private gay men's clothing optional resort. Gay resort in heart of Pam Springs.

name: Crown Plaza Hotel
overview: Has a grand view north up the beach towards the Intercontinental.

name: L Hotel Island South
overview: A new hotel in Aberdeen. It opened in 2010.

name: Hotel Sevilla
overview: Located on Morelos Street (which runs north-south) between Escobedo and Colón, in the Zona Centro. It is in the 170's block, located on the east side of the sidewalk. The lobby room has a guest computer with Internet, free of charge. Filtered water is also free.

name: Hotel Rákóczi
overview: *** 10 rooms with double beds and 2 two-bedded rooms. The breakfast room is open for 24 hours, and operates as a café. Roofed and open-air parking places, HUF1000 per day. - Services: Full dental attendance. -

name: Niedersachsenhof
overview: Comfortable 85 room hotel with good restaurant (see above).

name: Orion Mont Aux Sources
overview: Situated in the Northern Drakensberg, the ORION MONT-AUX-SOURCES hotel welcomes guests from all over the world.

name: Grootbos Private Nature Reserve
address: is on the R 43 from Stanford to Gansbaai
overview: An upmarket 5-star lodge in a 1700 ha private nature reserve overlooking the Walker Bay. The lodge is between [[Hermanus]] and Gansbaai and provides an excellent retreat for travelers looking for luxury accommodation in the [[Overberg]] area.

name: Gouverneur Hotel Rimouski
address: 155 René-Lepage Blvd East Rimouski (Québec) Canada G5L 1P2
overview: Near Tim Horton's and Marie Antionette restaurants.

name: Hatyai Genting Hotel
overview: Airy. Much better rooms than you can get in the city centre for similar prices. 495 baht for a spacious room with queen bed, 570 baht for a room with two beds. Clean; free Wi-Fi; TV and big fridge; air-con; hot water. Some decent local food places to eat over the road. A long stroll or short ride to the city centre or the bus station. Gym downstairs: 30 baht/day or 600 baht/month, or 450 baht/month for restricted memberships (morning or afternoon only).

name: Shibetsu City Cycling Terninal
overview: Located in Tsukumo Suigo Park, which features a free camp ground. There are 50 rental bikes,

name: Radisson BLU Hotel
overview: The hotel is an eye-catcher because it looks like a blue coin on the edge. It is just located at the border of Rödelheim and Bockenheim.

name: Østerport Hotel
overview: Is located at Østerport station right at the tracks (it is soundproofed), apart from being really central with most trains in and out of Copenhagen just a minute away, it is close to most of Østerbro's main attractions, and right at the outskirts of [[Copenhagen/Indre By|downtown]].

name: Caesars Palace
overview: Renowned for its originality and features, Caesars Palace offers 3,300 hotel rooms and more than 26 different restaurants and cafes.

name: The Rutland Arms Hotel
overview: Serves food

name: Grand Holiday Villa
overview: New management has taken over the hotel as of April 1, 2012 and offer much promise than in the past. The hotel is undergoing extensive renovation at the moment and many facilities are being updated to international standards - it is expected to become the largest free WiFi internet hotspot in Khartoum. The swimming pool is among the largest in Sudan and has been recently renovated. Features: Unlimited Free WiFi, Nile Terrace Restaurant (Water Sprayers on Year Round), Free Breakfast. The restaurant now serves continental cuisine and comes highly recommended. Rooms start at US$100 and include a continental breakfast and internet for all guests.

name: YHA Nelson Central
overview: In the heart of the city this 5 star hostel is ideally situated for exploring the city of Nelson and the surrounding area. The friendly and helpful staff can assist with anything from advising on local shops, cafes and restaurants to activities and tours. This Hostel has excellent kitchen facilities with all you could need, as well as large dining and relaxing areas. The garden is great for summer BBQ’s and relaxing in the afternoon. They offer a selection of accommodation from shared rooms to double en-suite's. Great for people travelling on a budget. Dorm Bed $34, Double ''en suite'' Room from $99

name: Hotel Bellevue
overview: Has wireless internet access, and a lovely atmosphere with a waterfall running into a small swimming pool. The food is delicious, and it's a pleasant nice place to stay. The owners are French, and very welcoming.

name: Hotel Azur
overview: a modern, family friendly hotel

name: Vedbæk Quality Hotel Marina
overview: Very quiet location across the street from the beach. There are lots of sports and recreational opportunities in the area. Rooms with free internet, trouser press and iron. Some also with safe and fridge. Conference rooms, table tennis, table football, billiards, jacuzzi, sauna and fitness available. Rooms are bright but the decor is uninspired.

name: Nasruddin Navruz Hotel
overview: Centrally located and clean. All rooms have TVs and air conditioned. The price does not include breakfast. Owners and staff can be extremely rude and impolite depending on their mood. Wifi available but they would even unplug the cable in front of you if you are not their favorite customer. Does not provide a stamp on the registration paper, NOT to be trusted and definitely not recommended [Aug 2012] {GPS N 39.46.17.7 , E 064.25.14.0

name: Hotel Espana
overview: Also has wifi.

name: 63 Orange Street Bed & Breakfast Inn
overview: This grand 1884 home offers a comfortable combination of charming, elegant Victorian antiques and 21st century amenities with full breakfast.

name: Hollmann Beletage
overview: Boutique hotel. Only 25 rooms, contemporary design, gourmet breakfast.

name: Hotel Helikon
overview: Wellness rooms with a massage, sauna, or have a swim in our pool, play tennis on our 8 outside and 2 tennis halls, play biliard or play a bowling with your familiy.

name: Angliter
overview: The most expensive and probably the only deluxe hotel in the city of Vologda

name: Regent Warsaw Hotel
overview: Outside of the city centre and on the border of the [[Warsaw/Mokotów|Mokotów]] district, it requires a bus or taxi ride to get to most attractions. The Regent nevertheless remains a firm favourite with frequent travellers due to a combination of lush comfort, large bathrooms and a location at the doorstep of the Łazienki Park.

name: Petrovka Loft
overview: Luxury budget hotel located ten min stroll from Red Square.

name: Labbnäs Semesterhem
overview: Nice quiet location 5km from Dalsbruk, very good local food in the catering restaurant. A rectory since the 17th century, Labbnäs was bought in the 1950s by Amos Andersson, donated to the Martha organisation and transformed into a pension. Now schools and conference groups are common guests. Rooms in the main building and as small apartments with kitchen in a modern building nearby. Events such as sing-alongs and flea markets are arranged. In wintertime there is a hole in the ice for swimming (join the weekly group or heat the sauna and go by yourself).

name: The Mishnish Hotel
overview: Main St, Tobermory, Isle of Mull. Hotel on the seafront, near the pier. B&B from £30. Bar is popular with locals and visiting yachtsmen.

name: Hotel Skeppsholmen
overview: At the Skeppsholmen waterfront, combines central location with seclusion.

name: Nordic hotel
overview: Basic rooms, friendly staff. Some rooms get traffic noise from Autobahn.

name: 71 Nyhavn Hotel
overview: This place is a top notch, historic, waterfront hotel - right at Nyhavn. With wireless internet, satellite TV and all other amenities you would expect from a four star hotel

name: Village Inn Lodge
overview: The lodge features 72 rooms, each with a private patio or balcony.  62 cottages are also available for rent.  The cottages come in 1,2 or 3 bedroom configurations.  An outdoor swimming pool is available for use by the guests of the lodge and cottages.

name: Druzhba
address: 50086, Украина, Днепропетровская обл., г. Кривой Рог, ул. Телевизионная, 12

name: Albergue Cruz del Sur
overview: Hostel.

name: Boutique Hotel Lumière
overview: Relatively small, luxurious hotel with good, clean rooms and a central location. Breakfast is served in the next door bakery, but quite good.

name: Futuro Hotel Bishkek
address: Кыргызская республика, г. Бишкек, ул. Хивинская 29
overview: This brand new fantastic hotel offers great rooms with splurge facilities and latest multimedia as Wi-Fi, english channels and movies on demand. Great 24h service and if you have an early flight they prepare a lunchbox for you. The only downside is the location 5 km east of the city center at the Chuy Ave, but there are frquent bus connections.

name: The Victorian Inn
overview: The Victorian Inn, Telluride! Located downtown Telluride, one block away from Historic Main Street and one block from Free Gondola; 5 block radius to all shops, restaurants, parks and festival grounds. Hotel rooms with (1) one or (2) two queen beds 275 sqft - 325 sqft, kitchenettes, a suite and a cozy cottage house. Daily continental breakfast served from 8AM to 10AM - Fresh coffee, orange juice, hot cocoa, apples, assorted cold cereals, oatmeal and fresh baked cinnamon rolls. Daily maid service, on-site and off-site parking, FREE WI-FI, Outdoor Hot Tub, Dry Sauna (winter only), bbq pits, bike racks, and friendly and informative staff who can help you with any arrangements. $89-$350

name: Principi di Piemonte
overview: Another 5 star hotel right in the center of the historical district and around the corner from shopping hub and pedestrian street, Via Lagrange.

name: Midtnes Hotel
overview: Guesthouse with friendly staff and excellent views of the fjord from the breakfast room. They don't take cards, so be sure you have enough cash.

name: Feudo San Giorgio
overview: Feudo San Giorgio Farmhouse, Sicily, in the heart of the Madonie Park, Palermo province, close to Castellana Sicula and Polizzi Generosa.

name: Eknäs semesterby
overview: Camping, pier and cottages. Also beach, kiosk, café, sauna and cooking facilities. Boats for rent.

name: Petnehazy Club Hotel***
overview: Indoor pool, massage services, tennis courts, bicycles to rent.

name: Quintal House
overview: Restored three-story heritage guest home accented with antique and modern functional furnishings and local artisan and craft pieces. Three rooms, all with serene harbour front views.

name: Prospect Cottage
overview: A three bedroom home suitable for up to 6 people. Sip drinks on the elevated wooden deck with views of the Lagoon and the 'Heads'. Easy access to the Garden Route and Klein Karoo. A three minute walk to central Knysna and the lagoon.

name: Tongmyong Hotel
overview: Good service with a billard and a bookshop.

name: The Hotel Minneapolis
overview: Recently renovated, this boutique style hotel built in a former bank (the old vault doubles as a wine cellar) offers classy and modern style all at once. Guest rooms are smaller but offer all the amenities of a luxury hotel. The lobby area is inviting with a beautiful lobby bar with free billiards as well as a full service restaurant known as the Max.

name: Marcopolo
overview: A decent hotel midway between the Hotel Indonesia Roundabout and Cikini. Rooms can be booked with or without breakfast.

name: Hotel Corps De Garde
overview: This charming, historic hotel is housed in a monumental 1634 building. Although equipped with all the modern day facilities you'd expect, it manages to retain its historic atmosphere, making it one of the finest places to stay in town. The only downside is that there's no space for an elevator, but the staff is very helpful, the breakfast very good and the lounge quite inviting. It has bikes for rent but note that car parking in the direct surroundings can be expensive.

name: Har HaNegev Field School
address: Follow signs to the Alpaca Farm, then to Field School
overview: Comfortable, inexpensive inn rooms. The school also provides tourist information and can conduct guided tours (must be ordered in advance).

name: Plaza Athenee
overview: The legendary hotel in Avenue Montaigne and home-away-from-home to numerous celebrities is undergoing an expansion, after the ownership (Sultanate of Brunei) purchased three adjoining buildings. While the Plaza Athenee remains closed between October 2013 and May 2014, the well-heeled patronage is invited to stay at another Dorchester Collection property in Paris, ''Le Meurice'' in [[Paris/1st arrondissement|the 1st arrondissement]].

name: Days Inn Calgary Airport
overview: In northeast. Vacation packages, pool and water slide, fitness centre, airport shuttle.

name: Frida's Inn
overview: Operated in a historic home, with wi-fi, laundry facilities, and multilingual staff. Bookings can be made online via expedia.com or venere.com.

name: Cumulus Hämeenpuisto
overview: Located on a boulevard at a southern part of the city.

name: Hotel Amarabati
overview: Modern facilities are available.

name: Hostel World House
overview: Nice and friendly new hostel, popular with long-term travellers. Free internet.

name: Kunigaiksciu Mene Hotel
overview: Three-star hotel is in the city of Kaunas, close to the historic centre and its 13th century castle. The hotel consists of 8 single and double rooms.

name: InterCityHotel Wien
overview: The InterCityHotel chain, a part of the German Steigenberger Group, focuses on hotels right next to train stations. This particular one is a block away from Westbahnhof, but still offers all the usual amenities, including a free all-day ticket for public transit. The decor is simple but modern and tasteful, especially for Viennesse standards. Some more expensive ''Business Plus'' rooms feature terraces with a view over the rooftops of Vienna.

name: DuBeau Hostel
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast, free coffee and tea available throughout the day.

name: Iris Pension
overview: Scandinavian style hotel for 26 people in 11 rooms.

name: Keekorok lodge
overview: Bungalows in single-storey blocks, restaurant, swimming pool, regular lectures on Masai lifestyle.  It has a timber walkway stretching into the park, and next to the resident hippo pool.  It is easy to spot hippos, crocs, buffalo, gazelle and elephant without leaving the lodge.  They run their own game drives, and are only 1km from the airstrip, so you can book your own flights, accommodation and drives here without having to engage a tour company.

name: Lakeside Cottage Luxury B & B
overview: A luxury bed and breakfast cottage set in 5 acres of botanical gardens with a private lake with fountain and bridge over the lake stunningly silhouetted in lights at night, sitting at the gateway to the Dandenong Ranges and Yarra Valley region. Featuring a comfy King Bed, oval spa, gas log fire and sunny conservatory overlooking the rose gardens. Linger in the gazebo perched by the lake and feed the ducks or wander the gardens exciting the senses with the colours and aromas. Breakfast provisions included so you can enjoy the late checkout of 12 noon with a 2pm check in. Stunningly beautiful both day and night. Short or long stays welcome. A memory to last a lifetime.

name: Polskyi Dim Hotel
overview: - Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel El-Aljazeera
address: On the lower road about 500 metres after the airport going towards town
overview: Many rooms.

name: Hotel De Jonge
overview: Although the interior is a bit outdated, this hotel offers spacious rooms with all the basic facilities right in the city centre. On weekends, rooms in the front can be a bit noisy.

name: Danhostel Maribo
overview: In nice surroundings next to Bangs Have and Sønder Lake.  Offers 98 beds in two floors.  Guest kitchen, billiards, table-tennis, bob, foosball and children's playroom available.  Open 1 Feb-19 Dec.  The reception is open 8AM-10AM and 4PM-6PM.

name: Baba Lodge
overview: Fine meals in a great outdoor dining area overlooking the "Damside" end of Phewa lake. Gynendra will make you welcome.

name: Hotel Bulvar
overview: Hotel Bulvar offers cozy hotel accommodations, all of which have air-conditioner, a plasma TV with cable, a telephone, and private toilet and shower. Some of its amenities include high-speed Internet access, dry cleaning/laundry, and massage service.

name: Mercure Luxembourg Centre
address: just 200m from the TGV railway station
overview: a good 3 star with 68 rooms at reasonable prices.

name: Glencoe Youth Hostel
overview: 62 Family Bunk Rooms.

name: Peacock Lodge
overview: Terrific home stay B&B, with very friendly family staff. A bit out of the centre. Has bike rentals. Free Wi-Fi in the rooms, includes breakfast outside in the garden. Hot shower. Can organise airport transfers, bus tickets, etc. Standard double US$35, Deluxe double US$55 (Sept 2014)

name: Bed & Breakfast Zierikzee
overview: Basic but good rooms. Breakfast additional for €10 p.p.

name: Dina's Hostel
overview: Old world charm, tall ceilings, beautiful architectural details, extremely clean rooms (bed and bath) and helpful staff. Some rooms have AC and private bathrooms others have fans and share bath. Just let them know which you prefer and they are happy to accommodate you. Very approachable and open for cultural exchange and discussion about Egypt.

name: Bol apartments Zlatni rat
overview: Bol Apartments are new apartments that are being built, actually a house in center of Bol is being rebuilt into four 4* apartments. Its location is the one to wish for. In the heart of Bol, just meters away from sea, 50 meters to closest beach and with stunning view.

name: Swissotel
overview: Brand new and stylish design hotel direct at the Ku'Damm. Just a step away from anything in the City West and offers good weekend rates. One of the best hotel restaurants in town.

name: Scandic S:t Jörgen
overview: A nice building with views over the Gustav Adolfs Torg market square and the Hansa shopping mall. Economy rooms have no windows.

name: Miami Beach International Travelers Hostel
overview: This hostel has 100 rooms. Dorm rooms have four beds. Half of the non-dorm rooms are private. Kitchen, internet access (on a dated computer), video rental library.

name: Radisson Hotel Los Angeles Westside
overview: This chain hotel is located close to the 405 freeway and is a ten-minute drive from the LAX airport.  Amenities include free high-speed internet access, pool, fitness center, free airport shuttle, meeting spaces and dining.  Those expecting a five-star experience will be disappointed by the relatively basic rooms and somewhat dated elevators and floorplans, but despite a bit of age this hotel offers an upgrade over many of the area's other motels.

name: Chapinorte Hostel Bogota
overview: Is the preferred accommodation for backpackers and world travelers who visit the safest and funniest area within Bogota: Zona Rosa, T Zone and Park 93. They are the first one hostel in north Bogota, surrounded by the most importat universities, embassies, parks, shopping and finnacial centers, banks, restaurants, bike roads,theatres, T & G Zone, Park 93 and not away from the historical, cultural and tourist centers. The rooms are spacefull, lightly, comfortables and includes wi-fi, towel, breakfast and hotel taxes.

name: La Pradella
overview: C'est à Préaux, petit village de l'Ardèche Verte, bercé par le chant du coq, rythmé par son clocher et ses 560 habitants que la Pradella (ancien nom du village) et ses chambres d'hôtes vous accueillent. Olivier, Edwige, Elisa et Alaya vous invitent à venir profiter en toute tranquillité du calme de l'Ardèche, dont vous pourrez apprécier les paysages et les lumières. Du farniente pour les uns au vol en montgolfière pour les autres, vous goûterez au plaisir de savourer chaque instant de votre séjour.

name: Novotel Warsaw Centrum
overview: Comfortable rooms. If you ask for room one of the higher floors, you are more than likely going have an amazing view in any direction.

name: Mouzakis Villas
overview: A complex of 3 detached fully equiped villas with private swimming pools each one of them..great view both to the sea and to the mountain...

name: Hotel Azul Kranj
overview: Hotel Azul is a newly built hotel near Ljubljana airport, located on the suburbs of town Kranj in the new commercial center. On 3 sides it is surrounded with grass fields and farm fields which extend into woods. From west to east there is a view of mountains. There are a few skiing resorts in the 10km-30km radius and in the warmer months there is plenty of opportunity for summer sports like hiking, mountain climbing, cycling, mountain biking, paragliding, golf and other nature related recreation activities.

name: Stovepipe Wells RV Campground
overview: (Year Round).  This RV campground is managed by the Stovepipe Wells Resort. It has 14 sites with full hook-ups and no tables or fireplaces. A swimming pool and showers are available. No Reservations, first come first served.

name: Radisson BLU Centrum Hotel
overview: The hotel is situated in the heart of the business district and tourist quarter of the city. It is close to the Palace of Culture and Science and Warsaw Central Station. Do note there is another Radisson BLU (Sobieski) in Warsaw, not far away but in the opposite direction, so make sure you know your way.

name: Pousada Mata Atlantica dos Sauer
overview: A beautiful quite bed & breakfast alongside the mountains of Petropolis.  There are 11 natural water springs on the compound that also has a waterfall.  Some features include:  Waterfall, Hiking Trails, Breakfast inclusive, Free Wi-Fi, Free long distance to USA and Canada.

name: Kimbima Hotel
overview: Near Man o' War bay, Aberdeen. Overlooking the Atlantic. Take the road to the Bintumani Hotel and turn right just before the hotel entrance. Good rooms from $110/night.

name: Beach Shack Chalet
overview: A friendly and tranquil chalet resort and surf center. Provides basic huts and small restaurant right on the beach. Ask for the dorm if you’re on a budget.

name: Rayavadee
address: Phra Nang. Access either from the south of Rai Leh East or Phra Nang Beach
overview: The only resort on Phra Nang Beach, with a jaw-dropping gorgeous view and prices to match. You'll be looking at upwards of 20,000 baht/night for a stay here. However, after mid-morning the gorgeous public Phra Nang Beach is quite popular and so the room rates do not guarantee the sort of privacy you'd expect. The interior is private and beautiful (supposedly, but who knows?) Non-guests are reminded with frequent signs not to enter).

name: Valencia Forest Camp
overview: A bit outside town, on a river. Accommodation includes a backpacker dormitory and some treehouses.

name: Andatel Grandé Patong Phuket
address: 41/9 Rat-U-Thit 200 Pee Road, Patong Beach, Phuket 83150
overview: Located a 3-minute walk to Patong Beach and 7-minuteto Jungceylon shopping centre and Bangla Boxing Stadium. Has a private balcony overlooking 2 swimming pools, and provides free parking on-site. Each room has a 40-inch internet smart TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. En suite bathroom. Free WiFi

name: Cailcedrat
address: Near the ''Institut Africain de Management'' (African Institute of Management) in the Ouaga 2000 neighbourhood
overview: Guesthouse offering accommodation to individuals or groups. Cailcedrat has 10 pleasant bedrooms with standard amenities (single and double bedrooms with air-con/fan, TV, fridge and bathrooms. Free breakfast and internet service. CCTV and security men. Bicycles and cars available for rent. Airport pick up. <!-- alternative website until main website can be checked and then one deleted: www.aubergelecailcedrat.com -->

name: Xiamen Old Town Hostel (厦门古街青年旅舍)
address: Kaihe Road, 24 Jiutiao alley (开禾路-九条巷24)
overview: . A family run Hostel in a three floor house located in one of the oldest parts of Xiamen, very central. The hostel has a large rooftop garden with a view of the city and harbour, wireless Internet, and big community kitchen. It is right off of the Kaihe road food market, one of the largest open air markets in China with lots of fresh veggies and seafood. You can also eat some the cheapest food in China at many small local eateries.

name: Porcupine Flat
overview: Porcupine Flat is located off of the Tioga Pass Road and offers 52 tent and RV (up to 24' in length) sites from July through early September on a first-come, first-served basis. Creek water only, must be treated before drinking.  Vault toilets are available.

name: Jungle Bungalows
overview: All the bungalows have an en-suite bathroom. There is a kitchenette, common living room and verand

name: Iseolago hotel
overview: Linked with Lido Sassabanek (open air swimming pool and tennis grounds). It has a conference centre.

name: Suburban Extended Stay
overview: This hotel offers free high-speed internet access, free coffee and an exercise room. Fully equipped kitchens in every room. Pet friendly. Special entertainment packages available for guests: golf, swimming, date nights, movie nights, etc.

name: The Bell Inn
overview: Accommodation and food services

name: Hotelli Haapalinna
overview: A budget hotel located 4 km from the city center in a residential area, near bus routes.

name: Hotel Főnix
overview: Ideal for families and for business travelers as well. 13 rooms.

name: Camp'n Aire RV Resort
overview: 102 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Pool. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi available.

name: Camping Bon Accueil
overview: In Alzingen 4 km to the south of the city. One hundred pitches. Adult €4, kid €2, pitch €5.

name: Hotel Punta dell'Est
overview: Directly by the lake, near the pier. It has a garden and a terrace by the lake.

name: Baross Boutique Apartman
overview: Three air/con rooms. Wi-Fi.

name: Pine Cove Lodging
overview: Lodge suites, a cabin and unique tree house cabins. Breakfast voucher included for two nearby restaurants.

name: White Tank Campground
overview: Located along the main park road, close to the North Entrance Station.  15 sites.  There is no water available and motorhomes and vehicles longer than 25 feet are not permitted.

name: Perla de sosua
address: Detras del Banco Popular, la propiedad # 7
overview: Perla de Sosua consist of Studios, 1 Bedrooms and 2 Bedrooms vacation condos, apartments type hotel rooms. Most with cooking facilities or kitchens, Some with full sized living rooms, balconies and separate dining rooms and all have air conditioned bedrooms, safes, ceiling fans. linen, and cleaning services provided, pool and community terrace on premises, along with free wireless internet access and free telephone calls to the USA and Canada.

name: Amara Hotel
overview: Classy, modern business hotel with its own large shopping mall.

name: Nam Mon Budget Design Hotel
overview: Quiet, clean and friendly. 24 hour front desk staff give you access to all that Can Tho and the surrounding destinations has to offer. Organises its own in-house tours such as the floating market tours, city/countryside tours by bicycle, inter-province tours. Mountain bike, car and motorbike rental.

name: InterContinental Budapest
overview: The 400-room InterContinental is one of the former sombre 1980s "Forum Hotels" built as joint-ventures between InterContinental and local state-owned hotel operators in the Soviet-block countries. It is therefore one of those hotels where your main benefit from staying in it is not having to look at it. Fortunately, there is more to it, as the front-side rooms feature oversized windows with unobstructed views of the Danube and Buda across the river. The rooms are reasonably-sized, but tend to be cluttered with oversize furniture and the bathrooms are smallish, so it is worth upgrading not only for the view. Top-level rooms come with access to the hotel's "Club Intercontinental" lounge. There is a gym, spa and a restaurant with a Danube-facing terrace in the hotel.

name: The Ginger Monkey
overview: The Ginger Monkey is a small hostel in a traditional house and is run by a couple of experienced backpackers who call the hostel home. There is one free internet terminal, free wifi, a good lounge with a DVD player and Playstation, clean showers, a washing machine, a good kitchen with an honesty bar and a very friendly dog called Wally. Breakfast and bedding are included in the prices.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Atlanta
overview: This luxurious Midtown hotel is located in the lower third of the GLG Grand tower and within walking distance of Piedmont Park.

name: Hotel Romantique
overview: Rooms come with AC, private bathroom and a balcony. Hotel has a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Wi-Fi.

name: Cottages
address: Seurakuja, and in the villages of Struka and Skitunäs (Pyhtää municipality),
overview: Suomen Kotteria offers accommodation in seaside cottages in the region around Kotka.

name: Scandic Hotel Plaza
overview: Allégatan 3. A nice hotel with decent prices.

name: Radisson Blu
overview: Östergatan 10. Central location, and very comfortable. Bedrooms are suite-sized, and include office area and living area, free Wi-fi and Internet. Breakfast is not served after 10.00AM on weekdays!

name: M+D Szálloda
overview: 30 rooms 90 beds. +email=shiwkltil@freemail.hu, +phone=+36 30 9143062

name: AIRE NATURELLE LE GROZEAU Aire naturelle
overview: 10 places of camping, in naturel site

name: Peabody Hotel
overview: Don't miss the ducks in the lobby fountain and their daily procession (11am and 5pm); you don't have to stay to see them.  Luxury extras, sheets and service in a historically and architecturally significant hotel.

name: Asmara Palace Hotel
overview: Formally the Intercontinental Hotel, out by the airport. The odd spaceship-looking hotel probably has the comfiest beds. But quite far from the city centre and with a heafty price.

name: ibis Semarang Simpang Lima
overview: 3-star hotel near the hustle and bustle of Simpang Lima

name: Fuyu Building Changdi Inn
overview: They also offer a pick-up service from Xiamen. QQ: 364804398

name: Astir of Paros
overview: Five-star hotel with private beach, 57 rooms all with en-suite bathrooms, excellent food, art gallery, health spa.

name: Camping
overview: A good beach with very shallow sea, popular for camping.

name: Itä-Suomen Liikuntaopisto
overview: In the southern part of Joensuu, less than a kilometer from the center. Shower, toilet and cooking facilities in the rooms.

name: Hotel Copenhagen
overview: Although this can seem more like a hostel at times, with shared showers and toilets and rather crammed rooms, it is a good price for Copenhagen and there is no curfew, but a doorcode for the door after 11PM. Good staff. There is one computer for internet access.

name: Golden Tulip Dibba
overview: Calm beach hotel a bit outside the center but committed to international standards.

name: Vital Hotel Tel Aviv
overview: Weizman 14 weizman center, Tel Aviv ''+972''-3-7770000. Vital hotel is a new luxurious boutique hotel, located at Weizmann center, in the heart of the cultural area of Tel Aviv. Adjacent to the "Opera House", the "Tel Aviv Museum", train station, Azriely center, walking distance from Dizengof center and more. For your convenience, an elevator connects the hotel with the new shopping center and cafes at Weizmann Center.

name: Hilton Dresden
overview: Next to the Frauenkirche. Try to get a room with a view to the Elbe river. | image=Hotel Hilton Dresden.JPG

name: JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort and Spa
overview: Resort that includes the 40,000 sq foot Aquae Sulis Spa & Salon.

name: ibis Birmingham Holloway Circus
overview: This is an older ibis whose suburban style belies its location close to the business district and the Holloway Circus evoked in the name.

name: Hotel Over de Brug
address: Ad en Vic Versteeg, Veerlaan 1, 2851 BV, Haastrecht
overview: This traditional hotel on the River IJssel, is about 5km from Gouda, in the small town of Haastrecht. It's an easy cycle to Gouda. There is a pub/restaurant. Free Wi-fi and parking.

name: Greenhouse Backpacker
overview: Free internet and breakfast included

name: Turyst Hotel
overview: - This four-storey building is located in the center of the city, 100 meters from the beach. Main services: buffet, sauna, conference hall, volleyball and basketball pitch, concert hall, gym, excursions, parking. More ☎: +380 065) 2709-111, +38 (065) 2544-999,  +38 (066) 949-16-11, +38 (093) 042-21-73, +38 (096) 582-61-74; skype: sezon-krim, icq: 626238920

name: River View Campground
overview: Located within the Gila Box Riparian National Conservation Area, much of this campground is situated on an abandoned fraudulent gold mining area which has since been rehabilitated and returned to a more natural state. Restrooms and potable water available but no showers; no hookups.

name: Elm Lodge Backpackers
overview: Friendly backpackers/hostel 5 minutes walk from the Octagon. Limited parking is found on the street.

name: Lion's Garden Hotel Budapest
overview: . The four star hotel has a large wellness area. 30 rooms

name: Hotel Janus
overview: A four star Best Western unit. 18 rooms and 9 suites.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston-Downtown
overview: Guests gain complimentary access to the adjoining YMCA fitness center (complete with indoor pool, basketball court and group classes). A full-service Starbucks is also located on the lower level of the hotel.

name: Fogo Island Inn
overview: A cultural destination with 29 guest rooms, each unique, and an art gallery, heritage library, cinema and rooftop sauna. Every detail chosen with purpose and handcrafted by locals.

name: Friends Hostel Budapest
overview: Very well located small hostel in a walking street. Clean, well equipped, friendly staff.

name: Crater Lake Lodge
overview: 71 rooms. Normally open mid-May through mid-October. Advance reservations are strongly recommended.

name: Grand Hotel Hörnan
overview: Bangårdsgatan 1, Tel.: +46 18 13 93 80. Older hotel located at the Fyris river close to the train station. Occasionally have good deals on rooms. SEK 650-1250. The hotel has an excellent and cozy bar with the full product range of the local brewery, Slottskällan.

name: Lilin Lovina Beach Hotel
overview: Beachfront villas with private plunge pools, garden courtyards, and beachfront lounges. Air-con and fan cooling, TVs/DVDs on request, free WiFi and a breakfast served in your room or at your private beachfront lounge.

name: Harap Farm Self Catering
overview: Attractive semi-detached two, three and five bedroom self catering homes set on a family run tillage farm in rural countryside north of Swords. The property is located only 5 minutes from the centre of Swords and 10 minutes from Dublin Airport. Not served by public transport but ideal location if you are bringing or hiring a car.

name: Bananarama
overview: Clean bungalows on a beautiful beach, free use of kayaks, restaurant, breakfast is included.

name: Dodo Hotel
overview: www.dodo.in.ua/hotel.html, Four star hotel. 25 rooms.

name: Americas Best Value Padre Trail Inn
overview: 100-room hotel.

name: Holiday Centre Rauhalahti
overview: Has nice cottages or holiday homes (11 also for winter use). The holiday centre is situated very near to Rauhalahti Spa.

name: Hamresanden Resort
overview: At Hamresanden, the longest beach in the Kristiansand area, Hamresanden Resort offers a variety of accommodation, from cabins and tent sites in the summer to all year Apartment Hotel.

name: Hostelling International Portland-Northwest
overview: A lovely and clean hostel in a couple of pleasant old buildings. Kitchen, internet access, and the staff are very friendly and relaxed. You can't beat the location for the price; a fairly quiet side street in a nice neighborhood near downtown.

name: Grand Hotel Kempinski
overview: Formerly known as the '''Noga-Hilton''', this very modern and luxurious hotel is a typical choice for corporate clients. Features a mini-mall, health club and conference rooms.

name: Hotel St. Pierre
overview: Embodies the architecture and ambiance of the 18th Century French Quarter.

name: Tha Phae Inn
overview: Family-run guesthouse. Friendly. Excellent value/location combination. Basic double rooms with baths, hot water & small TV. Free Wi-Fi. Common area with tables so you can bring food and eat. Refreshments for sale on-premises. Basic double air-con room with en suite shower was 350 baht as of Nov 2013 (no fridge, old furniture, but generally clean).

name: International Trekkers Guest House
overview: Quiet with good views.

name: Idrættens Hus Hotel
overview: This hotel is run by, and located on, the premises of the Danish Athletic Association, right by Brøndby Stadium with access to a steam bath, Gym and solarium.

name: Traditional Homes-SWOTHA
address: Swotha square, 50 meters away North of Patan Durbar Square, opposite to Narayan temple
overview: A beautifully restored Newari House in the heart of Patan's medieval city centre. 5 spacious, comfortable rooms with attached bathroom  and a beautiful attic suite. Most of the rooms have private balconies. Upstairs, there is a sunny roof terrace that offers a panoramic view of Patan’s pagoda-strewn roofscape, and beyond it a glimpse of the Himalaya. The staff is nice, the Wi-Fi is free and the breakfast is delicious.

name: Campanile Hotel Gouda
overview: 75 rooms with satellite TV and Wifi. Restaurant with buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Renaissance Charleston Historic District Hotel
overview: Historic decor with a modern twist and boutique accommodations with luxury amenities.

name: Savoy
overview: A family run 5 star hotel with a huge spa area and a very nice rooftop bar. It's very close to the main station (exit Breslauer Platz, turn left, approx. 100 m) and has very good weekend offers. Known as the place of choice for many (German and international) celebrities.

name: Marina Grand Resort
overview: A resort hotel located on the marina of New Buffalo.

name: Best Western Hotel Riviera Nice
overview: Hotel 3* located in the Nice Center just near the Nice Station

name: Ibis Montevideo
overview: A 5-minute walk from the old town, this chain hotel has simple but comfortable rooms and is bookable over the Internet.

name: Celtic Haven Resort & Spa
overview: Celtic Haven is a family-run holiday cottage resort on the picturesque Pembrokeshire cliff tops near Tenby. Many of the pretty whitewashed cottages date right back to the 12th Century and on-site facilities include an Elemis spa, Waves cliff-top restaurant, a headland golf course and leisure club with an indoor pool. The Pembrokeshire Coast Path is a short stroll away and many of the cottages are pet friendly.

name: Best Western Hotel Felice Casati
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Masa Inn
overview: 3-storey hotel 400 m from Kuta Beach. Rooms are clean, quiet and the staff friendly. Two really nice pools. Inclusive of breakfast.

name: Clarion Hotel
overview: A full-service hotel with indoor pool and recreation center, restaurant and lounge.

name: Hotel New Aegli
overview: Modern hotel with 80 fully equipped rooms with sea views.

name: Kongo Hotel & Casino
overview: 4-star hotel popular among business travelers, families travellers and other travellers. Rooms are well furnished with comfortable beds, bathroom, minibar, flat LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and safe box. Casino is open 24/7 and offer different sorts of fun. Restaurant offer each morning hot buffet breakfast. You can use public transport city bus line nr. 3G to reach this accommodation.

name: Tatiana Motel Tanugamanono
overview: Rooms are nice and clean and the staff is very friendly. A taxi to downtown is about 5 WST (2US$). Close to the hospital, many medical students stay here.

name: Sakura Hotel Ikebukuro
overview: Various rooms are good for groups and private. All staff speak English.

name: The Sailing Bay Beach Resort
overview: 192 rooms with sea views, all-day restaurant, open-air beach club, a grand ballroom that accommodates 400 guests and a fully equipped board meeting room for 40 guests. On-site water sports facility with a professional international team managing board sailing, kite surfing, and other activities.

name: Mt. Ardon campsite
address: Below the mountain to the north
overview: Accessible only by 4×4 vehicle or by foot. From Khan Be'erot, go north on a black dirt road

name: Grand Hotel Minneapolis
overview: Recently renovated luxury hotel and spa with rooms starting at $170 per night. Connected to the climate-controlled Skyway, letting guests walk to the Target Center, Convention Center and other buildings in any weather.

name: Meninas Hotel
overview: 4-star hotel in an exquisite historic building of the XIX century in the historic center of Madrid that has been transformed into a state-of-the-art boutique hotel. A classic atmosphere blended with modern decorative touches - a balance of unpretentious formality and well tempered cordiality.

name: Riverforest Park
overview: This campground, being north of the Thruway on the Seneca River, is technically in [[Finger Lakes Apple Country]], but it's really part of Weedsport.

name: Alcove Guest House & Service Apartment
overview: All rooms with air-conditioning, TV, and private bathroom. Breakfast complimentary, free WiFI access. They also have guest houses at other locations in Salt Lake City and Kolkata - consult their website

name: Samjeong Buyeo Youth Hostel
overview: This youth hostel is part of a large and aging hotel. The youth hostel rooms are hotel rooms with two bunk beds in each. Each of these rooms has a TV and bathroom. In winter, the hot water might only be lukewarm.

name: The Leonard Hotel
overview: Offers central London accommodation from grand suites to individually decorated bedrooms near the shops of Oxford Street and Bond Street and local attractions.

name: ibis Hotel Luxembourg Aeroport
overview: An old and worn "red-pillow" ibis located side-by-side with the ibis budget, offering marginally higher comfort at slightly higher rates.

name: Washington Square Inn
overview: Modeled after boutique European hotels it offers many services including a complimentary breakfast, and evening hors d'oeuvres. Rooms are well appointed with European antiques, cable TV, private baths, and free wi-fi. Centrally located in North Beach, it has views over Russian Hill, Telegraph Hill, and Washington Square Park.

name: Alexander Inn
overview: In a bohemian section of Washington Square West.

name: Fortune Park Galaxy
overview: Only branded chain hotel in the region. Part of ITC group of hotels. Also on premises is Restaurant Orchid, which serves elaborate buffet breakfast, lunch & dinner & multi-cuisine menu with numerous dishes to choose from.

name: Flag Varna Hostel
overview: 10 minutes' walk from the beach and the bars. Nikolay, the manager, speaks good English and Spanish. Mostly Rumanian students are living there, and they are like a family. Shared kitchen & bathrooms. Double rooms are 60lev (50lev if you bargain).

name: The Siena Hotel
overview: "European-style hotel" home to Il Palio, a AAA four-diamond restaurant specializing in modern Italian cuisine with a seasonal outlook and regional ingredients.

name: Shaw House
overview: A historic 3-bedroom stone cabin located in the eastern Dragoon Mountains. Reservations can only be made online; the property is maintained by the US Forest Service.

name: Tropical Breeze Guesthouse and Restaurant
overview: Bar and restaurant downstairs, Western and Cambodian menu. Large rooms with high ceilings, open windows, Wi-Fi, free computers downstairs, 70 channel TV, air-con or fan, en suite bath has mains pressure hot water. 24 hr check-in, security guard, security box in lobby (bring your own padlock). Free set breakfast menu of 56 items, including drinks. Tours, tickets and local transport. Visa or MasterCard accepted. Free pick up 24 hr by prior arrangement.

name: Grand Hostel Budapest
overview: Opened in 2005, this hostel is located right beside the lovely hills of Buda and 10 minutes from downtown. The unique and colourful design of the Grand Hostel was created by an renowned artist.

name: Malecon House
overview: Chic new inn on the boardwalk, comfortable large rooms, modern design, pool & gardens.

name: Boathouse
overview: Charming wooden rooms (from USD25) with fan/air-con, cheaper rooms in concrete building. Traditional Khmer-style, tropical garden with stylish huts, views on the national park. Restaurant serving fine and traditional Khmer & Western food. Friendly family atmosphere. Free Wi-Fi. Motorcycle rental is available.

name: 3B, Barranco`s Bed & Breakfast
overview: TV, wifi.

name: Boutique Hotel's (comfort)
overview: Central, newly built, free wi-fi and parking for guests, tv lcd with cable in every room, breakfast 21 PLN.

name: Tapolca Inn
overview: (website in Hungarian)

name: Calaway Park RV Park and Campground
overview: Open Victoria Day weekend (late May) to Labour Day (early Sept). Located next to Calaway Park amusement park near Trans-Canada Hwy west of Calgary. Hookup types: power, water & sewer; power only; no hookups. All sewer hookups require rigid hose connector to campground receptacles. Gates locked from 10PM-6AM, Stampede Week locked midnight-6AM. No campfires, no charcoal BBQs. Pets welcome, day kennel services at campground for fee.

name: PJ Watergate Hotel
overview: A decent hotel in the Ratchaprarop area. Rooms have air-conditioning and TV, and there's an internet café, restaurant and bar in the main area. Most staff speak at least some English, and the manager is fluent. Online booking will give you a room as cheap as 1,000 baht, which is far better than the walk-in price (and breakfast is included).

name: Tjiang Residence
overview: Unique hotel in the heart of Semarang's Chinatown (Pecinan), decorated in Chinese style. Close to Tay Kak Sie Temple, Semawis Night Market, and many restaurants and warungs in the surrounding streets.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Calgary-Airport
overview: From the [[Trans-Canada Highway]] (Highway 1) head north on Barlow Trail to 37th Avenue then take a left and it will be about the last building on the right.

name: Pension Ani Falstaff
overview: The familial bed and breakfast is located quite centrally.

name: Royal Reserve Safari and Beach Club
overview: Offers accommodations for all, including RCI timeshare members. The resort is right off the coast with enjoyable nightlife, multiple restaurant selection with diverse cuisines, gym, pools, and friendly staff.

name: ''Chill Inn''
overview: In the traditional fishing village of M'Pai Bay on north coast of Koh Rong Samloem. Beach bar and guesthouse, dorm rooms available. The sound track in the bar features funky tunes.

name: Schuster Mansion
overview: On the Westside next to Downtown in the Bed and Breakfast district.

name: Aso Michi-no-eki
overview: A Michi-no-eki (Road station). Not really quiet at night, but you can definitely sleep there if you want to climb Aso first thing the next morning. There are facilities, and a convenience store on the other side of the road.

name: Hotel Uppsala
overview: Uppsala's biggest hotel with a nice location in the city centre. Affordable and good value rooms.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Roppongi
overview: Nice and spacious rooms targeting business travelers.

name: Rest and Fly
overview: A low-cost hotel.

name: Salalah Beach Villas
overview: Located directly on the beach.

name: Okayama Royal Hotel
overview: Nicely appointed rooms; they're enthusiastic about food here, with organized events such as peach-tasting.

name: Travelodge Las Vegas Center Strip
overview: Cable TV, free parking for motor coaches and buses and a heated outdoor pool that’s open all year.

name: Quality Hotel Høje Taastrup
overview: Business hotel in the westernmost suburb of Copenhagen. Cleaning is sometimes lagging in the rooms but there is an Internet station in the lobby, a heated swimming pool and gym facilities.

name: Cumulus Airport Hotel
overview: Mid-range Finnish chain hotel, 10 min away by free shuttle bus. Renovated in 2007.

name: Bourbon Orleans
overview: Built in 1817 in the heart of the French Quarter.

name: Jufa Bregenz on Lake Constance
overview: Close to the lake and train station. Laundry facilities, meals available, wi-fi.

name: Hotel Marseille
overview: Good budget hotel, built in 2012. Rooms with kitchenette. Beautiful grounds, ambient atmosphere.

name: Lane Cove River Tourist Park
overview: Voted the best Caravan Park & Campground in Australia 2008 by the National Tourism Industry. Only 10kms from the Sydney Harbour Bridge and located within the Lane Cove National Park. 300 caravan, campervan and tent sites. 28 fully self-cantained cabins with all linen and towels supplied. Fantastic public transport links. Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Bolehill Farm Cottages
overview: Our eight peak district cottages are located in a courtyard setting surrounded by a spectacular rural landscape yet only 2 miles from the Peak District Market town of Bakewell

name: Hotel Kämp
overview: Opened 1887, this historic hotel claims to be the only true 5-star in Scandinavia, with doormen in top hats, yacht charters and prices to match: the eight-room Mannerheim Suite can be yours for only €3300 per night.  Part of Starwood's Luxury Collection.

name: Circle X Ranch
overview: Circle X Ranch is the only campsite within the National Recreation Area boundary. Trails to nearby Sandstone Peak and Boney Peak terminate here.

name: Camping Hirzberg
overview: The owners are extremely friendly and helpful. They have a good knowledge of things to see in the city and local walks in the Black Forest.

name: Berlin Guesthouse
overview: Western hotel. Good location for walking around in the center.

name: Nakajimadai Forest Recreation Campground
overview: This campground is located on the foot of Mt. Chokai, next to the Shishigahana Wetlands, a great hiking spot.

name: NH Wien Belvedere
overview: The NH corporate unformization did not quite make it to this hotel, but you can expect reasonable standards - and a simpler format of the typical Viennese hotel. Next door to the Lindner, the NH is indeed close to the Belvedere

name: Kolvi
overview: While the surrounding of the old Tatar district may not be exactly pleasant, the hotel itself is a very good value. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Le Logis du Chateau
overview: The view from the hotel is magnificent and the service is impeccable.

name: Marriott
overview: 4-Star hotel with 270 guest rooms and 8 suites, also has a Body Care Centre with indoor pool and whirlpool as well as 416 m² conference facilities. Restaurant and piano bar with live music.

name: Hotel Hay Essalam
overview: Spacious and clean rooms, also has wifi & air-conditioning. Cheaper to book directly than online.

name: Camping Mexico am Bodensee
overview: Open May – September. Has spots for campervans and tents, and has an onsite bistro. Kayaks and canoes available to rent.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Offers guests an exercise room and a business center.

name: Wawona
overview: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|15px|frameless]] Wawona campground is open year-round, requires reservations April–September, and offers 93 sites for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length.  Water and flush toilets are available. Campsites 69 and 70 are wheelchair accessible.

name: Hostal Alameda
address: Street Casas de campos, 3 (corner street Cordoba,9)
overview: Economic budget, centrally situated in Málaga center, between historical center and the Port. All rooms have private bathrooms, television and air-conditioning or heating. The hotel is on the eighth floor of a building shared with other businesses and you will need to use the buzzer (well labelled) to speak to reception so they can let you in. (Reception is manned 24 hours a day.)

name: Cresta Court Hotel
overview: 140 bed, Best Western Hotel on the north side of the town

name: Cadogan Hotel
overview: Cadogan is a classic Edwardian townhouse hotel, provides comfortable elegant five star hotel accommodation and service.

name: Minshuku Kokage
overview: Has its own hot bath.

name: Novotel London West
overview: Very large business-class hotel.  The rooms are reasonably priced with basic amenities in each room.  Wireless internet available, or basic internet through the room's television.  English breakfast available at extra charge. Restaurant/Bar/Lounge, massage center, concierge, cash machine, shoe shine machine, tourist information desk, porter, dry cleaning/ironing available, currency exchange, pets allowed with deposit.

name: Econo Lodge
overview: Close to the Safari Inn, has very simple but clean single rooms with private bathroom for 20000TSH per night.

name: Radisson Blu hotel Alexandria
overview: Located up against the water in the trendy Alex West district.

name: Vasatokka
overview: A modern and comfortable hostel about 10km outside Inari.

name: Hotel Torre Fiore
overview: Boutique hotel in 16th century masseria.

name: Sheraton
overview: The Sheraton is an architectural and minor cultural landmark in Doha, having been in town longer than any other international hotel. Shaped like a pyramid with an Imperial Star Destroyer stuck on top, it is situated at one end of the Corniche, making it visible from that long, waterfront road and walkway. NOTE: The hotel is currently closed for major refurbishment work, and is not expected to reopen until at least the end of 2014.

name: Travellers Planet Hostel
overview: 13 budget rooms with private attached shower rooms. Hot and cold showers, small library with book exchange. Common area with a Malay style living room and TV/movie room, kitchen facilities provided for guests. Clean, with friendly staff and quality beds. Free Wi-Fi throughout, free breakfast, easy going and low density.

name: Heat Hotel
overview: Very modern hotel right next to London Bridge with funky rooms with Bridge views. The lively bar (which is also the reception area) with a large outdoor drinking area with Bridge views are clearly audible in rooms, so it's not a hotel for those who want a quiet early night!

name: Southern Comfort Bed and Breakfast
overview: Located just two blocks from the St. Charles Avenue Streetcar line and minutes from the French Quarter.

name: Fossil Bay Lodge
overview: Cabins and glamping tents.

name: Hotel Büchel
overview: Also has a good restaurant offering regional specialties.

name: Oasis Koh Chang
overview: On a hillside with sunset views from the restaurant deck, where you can enjoy home-style Thai dishes, sandwiches or Western favourites. The wooden huts come with fan and mosquito net, attached open-air bath with shower. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Calabonia
overview: Restaurant, bar, swimming pool. The hotel has a small private beach with some rocks.

name: Williams Circle Pines KOA
overview: RV hookups, tent sites, cabin rental, wi-fi, showers, pool.

name: Hotel Tapanti Media de Orosi
overview: In Orosi valley.

name: Hotel Briker
overview: Clean, safe, nice private rooms with private bathroom and shower, well maintained, friendly, all of the staff spoke English, they take credit cards.

name: City Lights Motel
address: 35 Minjungbal Drive, Tweed Heads South, NSW 2486
overview: Budget Accommodation in Tweed Heads South, 10 minutes from Gold Coast Airport. 18 Rooms with deluxe, budget and family style accommodation - both motel style and self contained accommodation with cooking facilities. City Lights Motel is Wheel Chair Friendly

name: Hotel Mermoz
overview: This tranquil seaside oasis sits right on the beach and features a spa and pool. The hotel even offers child care for those parents who just need a break from the kids. Once the kids are in child care go horseback riding for 5000F or even take part in the various water sports that are offered by the hotel. Also a sure bet is the restaurant which serves up delicious seafood and other offerings. Located on the Route de Hydrobase. Hotel does not have A/C or fans, has a generator, hot water, electricity, mosquito nets. Reception speaks French and English. Hotel has fans, A/C, a generator, hot water, electricity, mosquito nets. Reception speaks French, English, Spanish and Italian.

name: Pegasus Guesthouse
overview: Friendly but reserved host who specialises in horse tours. Rooms are comfortable with outside toilet and shower. Great meals. 350 som per night

name: Buttonwood Inn on Mt. Surprise
overview: Ten room, 1820s Inn nestled on six secluded acres on Mount Surprise is minutes away from the Village of North Conway and Jackson. Hike, snowshoe, cross-country ski from our backdoor.

name: Railay Princess
address: Between Rai Leh East and West
overview: Daily breakfast and swimming pool in the valley of high limestone mountain. Slightly cheaper sister of Railay Bay Resort & Spa hotel.

name: Retiro Park Lodge
overview: Exclusive [[B&B]] set in a park on a 70 acre property 17 km from Nelson CBD with its own vineyard, olive and almond groves and a swimming pool. Dinners, featuring the best of the local Nelson and New Zealand’s seasonal produce and wines, are made by arrangement. Smokers welcome. Hosts speak native French and Spanish.

name: Chateau de Bourron
overview: Romantic chateau set in 100 acres of woodland, 7km south of Fontainebleau. Wi-Fi, restaurant, tennis, heli-pad, horse riding.

name: Grand Prince Hotel
overview: This hotel is located in Mirpur 1 near the Grameen Bank, making it popular amongst interns. Breakfast is included with rooms. Internet is available in the lobby at 50 Tk per hour.

name: Quality Cottages
address: 18a The Old Bank, Cross Square, St Davids Pembrokeshire
overview: Holiday cottage agency with a fine selection of Quality Cottages in Pembrokeshire and throughout Wales in fabulous coastal, countryside and mountainous locations suitable for couples, families, friends sharing and retirees. 80% welcome dogs.

name: Scandic Anglais Hotel
overview: Trendy boutique hotel encased in a glass exterior. In good location, combining the peace of the park with the entertainment of the city centre. Rooms are small but functional, and the hotel contains one of the most hip bars in Stockholm, always popular and only steps away from your room. The breakfast buffet lasts until 14:00. Guests are able to rent bikes from reception. The hotel has a rooftop bar with a great view, open during summer.

name: Sheraton Ottawa Hotel
overview: Sheraton Ottawa Hotel is located in the heart of downtown - steps from Parliament Hill, the National Gallery, and other major attractions. Each room features the signature Sheraton Sweet Sleeper bed, and the Link@Sheraton lobby connectivity hub offers complimentary internet and PC workstation use.

name: Elite Hotel Knaust
overview: Built in 1891 and extensively renovated 2002 this hotel is a landmark in itself, and ranks among the best in town.

name: Honeycomb Tourist Inn
address: Rizal Boulevard, corner Dr. V. Locsin St.
overview: 16 air-conditioned rooms, with hot & cold shower, cable TV, PABX telephone, Wi-Fi in the Coffee Shop, ample parking area and 24/7 standby power generator. With Restobar and Coffee Shop offering food, music and nightly fun! Complementary Filipino breakfast.

name: Accents on the Park
overview: Beautifully decorated, clean, safe and friendly hostel, with one of the best locations in the city of Nelson. Internet, lounge, kitchen, laundry, helpful staff and an adjoining bar that makes fantastic burgers.

name: Ivory Towers Backpacker Lodge
overview: In the winter, rooms are freezing cold; they do not have adequate heaters.

name: Campingplatz Nord-West
overview: Near Ludwigsfeld, about 1.5 km west from the Fasanerie S bahn stop.

name: YHA Conwy
overview: Ensuite private rooms and dorm rooms. Reception open from 0800-1030 and 1500-2230.

name: Blossom Resort
overview: The Blossom Resort is surrounded by thick pine trees at 5000 ft. above sea level, adjoining Kasauli. Guests enjoy the sweet smell of pine trees and the panoramic views of the natural environment around the resort.

name: Kalastajan majatalo
overview: Accommodation, restaurant, fishing permits, boat rental, hunting trips.

name: Francisco Grande Hotel & Golf Resort
overview: The Arizona Hotel & Golf Resort has recently undergone an $8 million renovation of its hotel rooms and suites, including the golf course and all its dining and meeting facilities. The resort's restaurants and watering holes provide a variety of casual and upscale dining and entertainment options.

name: Domaine Tomali-Maniatyn
overview: A 5 suns B&B located high above Sutton, Domaine Tomali-Maniatyn offers 5 cozy suites, a tropical indoor swimming pool, winter and summer packages, a formal dining room for up to 110 guests (weddings, seminars), spectacular views, 26 acres of land and direct access to hiking and skiing trails...

name: Best Western Savoy
overview: Traditional hotel in the city center, opposite the famous "Schumacher" brewery.

name: Brasão Palace Hotel
overview: In central of Presidente Prudente, near the boardwalk, banking agencies and the city's best restaurants.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton
overview: Contemporary hotel with more than 230 rooms. 3 restaurants for lunch or tapas, considering the medium size of the property, and a bar.

name: Hotel Whitcomb
overview: This is a 460 room historic boutique hotel. An elegant, opulent building, it was first used as a temporary city hall after the 1906 earthquake. Italian marble, Austrian chandeliers, and a short walk to the Symphony/Opera and the Asian Art Museum. It also has a piano bar/wine bar.

name: Kupu Kupu Jimbaran Rooftop & Spa
overview: Good Jl for couples, located on the rooftop of the Jimbaran Corner shopping centre (high-end), with a private beach access after 3 min ride with golf cart.

name: Storsand Gård Camping
address: Local bus towards Stjørdal, fairly frequent, day pass not valid
overview: East of the centre and maybe the most picturesqure of the lot.

name: Tharn Thong Hotel
overview: Unostentatious concrete building in the city centre, friendly staff, simple and clean rooms with fan or air-con and TV, Wi-Fi, free drop-off at the bus station, bike hire. Not quite as nice as staying at the lake front, but really OK. No English language sign. Good for the price.

name: Panoramahotel Wagner
overview: Focussed on organic food and living.

name: Hotel Avtoport
address: Turbovskoye shosse ( ул.Турбовское шоссе), 6 th km
overview: 7 rooms/14 beds.

name: Grape Hammock Fish Camp
overview: 65 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Free wi-fi available.

name: Pakachere, backpackers & creative centre
address: at the end of the golf course
overview: Pakachere is a backpackers runed by local people not far from the city centre of Zomba. You can enjoy our accommodation as a traveler but there is also the opportunity to visit our bar, restaurant and the cyber bar to keep in contact with family and friends.

name: Wanderfalls Guesthouse & Hostel
overview: There are three dorm rooms (four beds per room) and one private room (twin bunk). Free Wi-Fi, guest kitchen, BBQ grill, parking, laundry.

name: Cimarron Inn
overview: Free wifi, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, TV, and hair dryer in the room, with a free breakfast buffet.

name: Super 8 Kingman
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, accepts pets.

name: Courtyard by Marriott San Diego Sorrento Mesa/La Jolla
overview: New state-of-the-art hotel with fresh, healthy food options and Starbucks coffee. Complimentary WiFi.

name: Ibis Styles Stockholm Odenplan
overview: This ibis Styles is in a converted historic building with a sloping roof, which resulted in quite small rooms with sometimes bewildering (and challenging) layouts.

name: Hotel Universel Montreal
overview: Located within a 5-minute walk of Olympic Stadium, 10-minute walk of Montreal Biodome botanical garden, and 3.5 miles of downtown Montreal. Hotel offers a full-service spa, indoor pool, seasonal outdoor pool, sauna, gym, jacuzzi, free parking, and bicycle rack. Complimentary shuttle service is available to Viau metro station. Rooms are equipped with a fridge, coffee maker, and cable TV. Some rooms feature views of Olympic Stadium.

name: TRYP San José Sabana Hotel
address: Avenue 3, calles 38 y 40, San José COSTA RICA
overview: Centrally located hotel with conference facilities.

name: The Westin Boston Waterfront
overview: This AAA Four Diamond-rated hotel is located in Boston’s new waterfront district and is connected to the largest convention center in New England, the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. The Westin Boston Waterfront also features 80,000 square feet of meeting space on-property and 793 guest rooms and 31 suites over looking Boston Harbor.

name: Sari Pan Pacific
overview: Midway between Monas and the Hotel Indonesia roundabout, this hotel is in a strategic location. The ''Keiyaki'' Japanese restaurant is an open kitchen concept and has a number of signature dishes. Rooms are simple for the price, but has adequate facilities.

name: Grand Pelangi Resort
overview: A lower profile hotel that overlooks the western beach, but still close to Tanjung Pandan. Has a restaurant, karaoke room, swimming pool, and you can rent a car or motorcycle.

name: Millennium Biltmore
overview: The grand-daddy of all downtown hotels, with its gorgeous lobby and fancy restaurants.

name: Travelers Motel
overview: An older but well-maintained motel.

name: Hotel Granus
overview: This friendly family-run place has 12 rooms and a bit of a cosy B&B atmosphere. It's clean and conveniently located in the city centre, with fairly modern rooms and a somewhat quaint breakfast area. It gets good reviews, also suited for family stays. On weekends, the reception has limited opening hours.
