It is located in a wide and bright hall, opening up on the garden. Here you can taste Sicilian and international dishes, together with very nice local wines.

name: Luxor Resort and Casino
overview: An Egyptian-themed hotel with a massive pyramid that offers interesting room layouts. This hotel is a good option for those looking for a lower-priced but still upscale room on the Strip.

name: Hotel Königswache
overview: Small hotel next to the Technical University of Munich, that caters mostly to business travellers and visitors to the nearby university.

name: THAT'S AMORE CILENTO B&B COUNTRY HOUSE
overview: ​This lovely Country House is situated in a picturesque valley surrounded by lush vegetation, in National Park of Cilento, 3 km from Acciaroli, 5 minutes from Castellabate and only one kilometer from the Tyrrhenian Sea. It offers self catering apartments: studios, two and three rooms elegant and equipped with all comforts. The property has amenities such as free parking, washing machine, table tennis, wood stove, barbeques, internet wi-fi, patio and garden. That's Amore Country House is a perfect starting point for exploring the National Park of Cilento, the archaeological excavations of Velia, Paestum, the Caves of Castelcivita and Pertosa, the Sanctuary of Getsemani, Palinuro and much more. With a trip out of town you can also visit Herculaneum and Pompeii, Vesuvius, Capri and the Amalfi Coast. Possibility of guided tours, hiking, trekking, snorkeling, mountain biking, sailing, wind surfing, and much more.

name: Lazy Fox Inn
overview: A bed and breakfast located on the shore of Laurel Creek offering 4 rooms for rent.

name: Gooney Creek Campground
overview: Beautiful located Tent/RV Campground immediately alongside the Gooney Creek. 20A hookups. No wifi. Swimming possible in river.

name: Cappadocia Cave Resort & Spa
address: Tekeli Mah. Göreme Cad. Divanlı Sk. 83
overview: A real "cave hotel" carved into a mountainside. A spa and handicapped-accessible rooms are available.

name: Hotel Malaga
overview: Simple, but clean and large rooms. Some have balconies.

name: Onuku Farm Hostel
overview: Open Oct-Apr. Free pick-up on request from Akaroa at 12:30pm.

name: A Little Bird Guesthouse
overview: Cheap basic dorms with hot shower and free Wi-Fi. An easy place to meet other travellers in a good location.

name: Grha Wisata Youth Hostel
overview: A backpacker style hotel provided by the government. Half price for students.

name: Hostel Cosmos
overview: Friendly youth hostel.

name: Grand Hyatt Berlin
overview: During the Berlinale film festival, this is the primary hotel to stay because most major attractions are within walking distance.

name: Imperial Hotel
overview: In the centre of town on the sea front.

name: Hotel Sita Niwas
overview: Good and relatively cheap ( Rs.80) food in their restaurant. They also organise shared jeeps to the Atari border crossing for ₹250 return.

name: Samal Bahay Kubo
address: Barangay Katagman, Purok 5, Peñaplata District, Island Garden City of Samal
overview: If you want real peace and quiet, go here. No videokes, guaranteed. You could set up a tent, if you like or get a room in a Bahay Kubo (hut). The owner's wife is a mean cook, specializing in Thai and Indian dishes. There is no in-suite toilet, but the "outhouse" is very clean and has running water. The site is several minutes away on foot from two tourist spots: Moncado's Camp 23 and Balay ni Moncado (Moncado's Whitehouse). You can arrange for a pickup at the Peñaplata Warehouse Club bus stop then take City Island Express Bus from Davao City to Samal Island. Or, you can arrange a pickup from Davao City.

name: Nikko Tokanso
overview: A traditional Japanese guest house walking distance to the UNESCO World Heritage shrines and temples. The staff are helpful and friendly. The rooms are very clean, and the futons are comfortable. They have private half baths (sink + toilet). The main bathtub/onsen is public (shared among hotel guests), but you can reserve the private "family bath" for 50 minutes during your stay for no extra charge — this is a great way to get a private onsen experience, plus the antechamber to the private onsen has a sink and hair dryer. The dinner (¥3000 per person, served in a common dining room, reserve dinner time at check in on a first-come, first-serve basis — reservations for dinner can also be made at time of room booking) a great value (many dishes) and cultural experience. Breakfast is available for ¥1000, first service at 7:30AM. There is free coffee and tea in the lobby, as well as a public use computer with Internet. Information packets (in the guest room) are translated into English, Mandarin Chinese, Korean, and Spanish.

name: Hotel Novotel Montreal Centre
overview: Located in the heart of the business centre of downtown Montreal, the Hotel Novotel Montreal Centre is within walking distance of shopping, restaurants, and old Montreal.

name: Hunor Hotel ***
overview: 140 rooms and 10 suites.

name: LaGranda Hostel
overview: is a nice place run by a group of young locals in the form of democratic co-operative. Below the hostel is small cafe.

name: Hotel Karaton Luwuk
overview: Karaton Hotel, Luwuk is located at the very heart of Luwuk City, Central Sulawesi. Hotel Karaton Luwuk terletak di pusat kota Luwuk, Sulawesi Tengah.  Karaton Hotel, Luwuk is easily reached within 17 mins (10 kilometres) Airport Syukuran Aminuddin Amir, Luwuk. Hotel Karaton Luwuk dapat ditempuh selama 17 menit (10 km) dari Bandara Syukuran Aminuddin Amir Luwuk. Hotel rooms are serviced with included hotel breakfast, free internet on Wi-Fi in all rooms, and also a meeting room, all are in a very affordable price, very suitable for your business trip. Kamar Hotel dilengkapi dengan sarapan pagi, internet Wi-Fi gratis di seluruh ruangan, serta ruang meeting, semua dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau, sangat cocok untuk kebutuhan bisnis anda.

name: Carlton Hotel
address: DC-5, off Zulfiqar Street # 1, Phase VIII, DHA
overview: Built and managed by an international chain, this hotel is a mid-range beach resort. Have two restaurants serving Chinese and Pakistani cuisine. Offers a luxury cruise out to sea with a buffet dinner for up to 35 people. There are two cafes also located inside the resort hotel. Currently closed for renovations for 2 months as of December 2013.

name: One Hostel
overview: Breakfast, hot water, kitchen, bike rental.

name: Holiday Inn Tampere
overview: A business hotel, located right behind the railway station in the city centre.

name: Balcon en Foret
overview: Spacious suites with fireplace next to the Chateau Beynac.

name: Pokegama Lake RV Park
overview: RV Park has a 9-hole golf course (Par 3) and a large heated swimming pool, among many other amenities.

name: El Palauet
overview: El Palauet Living Barcelona boutique hotel, with 8 suits and a spa is located on the most exclusive boulevard, on a five-story palatial mansion built in 1906, being an extraordinary example of Modernisme (the sumptuous Catalan version of Art Nouveau).

name: The Signature at MGM Grand
overview: A luxury suite hotel behind the MGM Grand.

name: Mounts Bay Caravan Park
overview: 5 star small exclusive, family-run park.

name: The Cadillac Hotel
overview: The only hotel in Venice Beach located on the boardwalk on Ocean Front Walk and offering views of the Santa Monica Bay. All rooms have been recently renovated.

name: Hotel Muria-The Family and Convention
overview: Two-star hotel near Chinese business area. Caters to family and convention needs, has 6 representative meeting rooms, buffets breakfast, pick up service from/to airport, car wash, unlimited WiFi access.

name: The Charles Hotel
overview: Josefska 1; Romantic 4 star hotel near to the Charles Bridge. Some rooms have antique wooden painted ceilings. Rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with safe, satellite tv, phone and minibar. Each room has private bathroom and free WiFi.

name: Yyterin leirintäalue
overview: 75 cottages. Located near the Yyteri sand beach.

name: Nopolan Lomamökit
overview: Cottages available any season, Bed & Breakfast (1 single and 1 double room) open from 1 Jun through the summer. Sauna, rowing boat, grill and summer kitchen. Very pleasant family-run place. Really great breakfast with home-made bread.

name: The Green Tortoise Hostel
overview: A favorite of backpackers world-wide, price includes free internet and wi-fi, free breakfast every morning and dinner 3 nights a week, a 24-hour sauna, pool table, common room, free beer at the Beer Olympics on Tuesday nights and free live music on Sundays. An ideal location, right between Chinatown and North Beach and a short walk from downtown.

name: Woodstock Inn on the Millstream
overview: Rooms and breakfasts, on beautiful grounds along a cascading millstream.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Havnekontoret
overview: This luxurious hotel opened in the beautiful neo-classical building formerly housing the Port of Bergen harbor company in May 2006. The hotel is situated on historical ground between Bryggen and Bergenhus fort. Hotel facilities include a gym and a sauna.

name: Hotel Robin
address: 2458/3 Niwaan Bazar, Near Jallianwla Bagh, Golden Temple Road
overview: 24  rooms.

name: Santika Premiere Semarang
overview: Four-star hotel close to the city centre.

name: Zinkensdamm
overview: Very nice and fairly big youth hostel and hotel. It is very clean, the staff is helpful and friendly, however the rooms are rather small. Features a fairly big guest kitchen, a nice garden, Internet terminals, and laundry machine/dryer.

name: Sleep Inn Airport
overview: Probably the cheapest of the several cookie-cutter hotels near the Albuquerque airport.

name: Mountain View Hotel
overview: Modern architecture (using local red rhyolitic tuff cladding of volcanic origin) provides great views for each and every small room from their balconies perched one above the other, 3 stories high. 30 cramped rooms with no TV or phone, but satellite TV in the well stocked bar. All bedrooms have a hip bath with a shower above, desk and 2 chairs. No Wi-Fi in the bedrooms but free in the common areas and attractive terrace. Car park for 20 vehicles is guarded 24 hours. 20 kW standby generator, laundry service. Restaurant with the usual unimaginative, boring and misspelt ''faranji'' menu of spaghetti carbonara (without bacon!), omelettes, "steaks" (but not as anyone in Argentina would recognise) and French fries.

name: Elegant Circle Inn
overview: A good mid-range choice, centrally located. Free WiFi in rooms, bar with live music. | price=from 1250, including beakfast

name: Beau Rivage
overview: The interieur of this five star hotel is breath-taking, old European style, beautiful, service is above any doubts. Outstanding restaurants with wine selection from centuries.

name: Mercure Riga Centre
overview: This new property opened in 2014 in a converted historic building is the first Accor hotel in Latvia. It is situated just next to the railway station, and has a quite interesting postmodern decor referencing the neighbourhoods Art Nouveau heritage. The hotel charges for open air parking.

name: Malika Hotel
overview: Probably the best bang-for-the-buck in Tashkent. Well-equipped and nicely outfitted. Ownership includes an American partner.  Services: Restaurant, Business center, Bar, Laundry and ironing, Parking,  Conference hall, Sauna with Jacuzzi. Internet is non-existent in rooms, and marginally so in their lobby (email, etc., but no Skype). Also in Samarkand, Bukhara and Khiva.

name: Hotel Abrona
overview: This cosy hotel is run by people with mental disabilities, offering them a chance to learn skills that might allow them to work in the regular hotel world. Rooms are simple but well-maintained and the staff is very friendly. The hotel has 24 double rooms, all with private bathrooms and free wifi. There's also an on-site restaurant and room rates include breakfast.

name: Hotel Concordia
overview: A swanky luxury hotel right in the center of town with a beautiful view of the churches.

name: Indulgence Divine
overview: Contemporary design and history in an intimate blend. Boutique self catering accommodation for two in a 450 year old town house.

name: Drake & Longchamp
overview: Member of Swiss Quality Hotels International. Three star hotel situated 1km away from the railway station, 500m from the city center and only 5km from the airport.

name: Westin Cincinnati
overview: The Westin is located directly across the street from Fountain Square and is connect to Carew Tower via the skywalk. The hotel offers a great view of adjacent Fountain Square. All rooms are non-smoking.

name: Hotel Pension Bismarck
overview: Bismarckstraße 70, 10627 Berlin, tel ''+49'' 30-3127582. Small, familiar run house with personal ambiance.

name: Hotel Sunroute Plaza
overview: A pleasant business hotel with a magnificent view of the mountains surrounding the city and the Abukuma river flowing through the town from the top floors. Wi-fi is provided in the lobby only, rooms are equipped with LAN internet connection.

name: MainStay Suites
overview: Extended-stay hotel.

name: Argyll Hotel
overview: Fabulous rooms overlooking Loch Fyne, costing £39 - 79 per person.

name: Dorset House Backpackers
overview: Charming hostel accommodation in an 1871 heritage home, top-rated. Open again after full renovation and re-decoration. Free Wi-Fi, car-parking, spacious rooms, no bunks, all beds fully made. Set among flower gardens and 50 m from Hagley Park. On the airport bus route. Multi-share and family rooms available. Secure online bookings available.

name: Hotel Dolphin
overview: A/C, non-A/C rooms, cottages, parking, garden, restaurant. On call doctor.

name: Crowne Plaza The Hague - Promenade
overview: The Crowne Plaza is in the middle of the woodlands separating the Hague proper from Scheveningen, and thus a tram ride from either, but a short stroll from most of the international institutions located in the Hague and the Madurodam.

name: Red Carpet Inn Buffalo
overview: Walking distance from Ralph Wilson Stadium, also convenient to Hamburg Fairgrounds and ECC South Campus. All guest rooms have coffee maker, refrigerator, microwave, and expanded cable TV with HBO. Jacuzzi rooms also available.

name: Rancho Sedona RV Park
overview: Full and partial hookups with 50-amp service.

name: Carmel Valley Lodge
overview: A pet-friendly hotel with rooms, suites and cottages.

name: Das Tyrol
overview: A small and comfortable hotel.

name: Ibis Warszawa Centrum
overview: The oldest Ibis in Warsaw is in a slightly inattractive location, but reasonably close to the city centre and many attractions and easily accessible by public transit and by car.

name: Boomerang Hostel and Apartments
overview: Prime quality services, moderate prices. The manager is very helpful with giving information about points of interest.

name: Crowne Plaza Cincinnati Blue Ash
overview: Quality rooms, atrium area with swimming pool. Efficient friendly staff. Good breakfast with cold and cooked buffet.

name: Clarion Arlanda
overview: An up-market hotel opened in 2012.

name: Park Hotel
overview: One of the best hotel options for East Jakarta. Right next to the toll road. Room size may be small. Terrace Café for breakfast, Skyy rooftop bar for a night cocktail.

name: Hotel balladines
overview: Good sized rooms. Central location.

name: Hotel Monteleone
overview: Located in an elegant early-20th century sky-scraper (the only one within the confines of the Quarter itself, just constructed just before large new constructions were prohibited here) has long been one of the top upscale Quarter hotels. The hotel includes a rooftop heated pool with views of the skyline and an award-winning restaurant, the Hunt Room Grill.

name: Burton Hotel
overview: Hotel and Guest House.

name: Vila La Kola
address: Niko Doaga (ул. Нико Доага бр.) St, 21
overview: It offers: Double studios (equipped with cable TV, bathroom, terrace and mini bar) , quadruple bed apartments and five beds apartments (equipped with cable TV, DVD, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and terrace), free Wi-Fi , Common room, 24/7 available service and video surveillance.

name: Sabrina Hotel
overview: Modern budget hotel for travellers. Includes free WiFi, air con, tv and water

name: Bed & Breakfast Mannheim
overview: An affordable hotel with kitchen located within walking distance of the train stations in an historic building in Lindenhof.

name: Opus Hotel
overview: Stylish hotel in Yaletown that has made it to Conde Nast's gold list four years running. Reviewers like the modern decor and friendly staff but don't recommend it for families. Perks include free bike rentals, free in-room iPad and free Wifi.

name: La Pensione Hotel
overview: Located in Little Italy, this lovely hotel has 75 small rooms with views of the bustling neighborhood. Parking is quite tight here, but the place is quite affordable at around $80/night.

name: Hotel Amadeus
overview: Really close to the Centrale station.

name: Crocodile Nest Bed and Breakfast
overview: Accommodation lies within the huge, peaceful garden with acres of lawn creating wide open space.  Large parking area and good security. All rooms, rondavels, regular bedrooms and cabins have bathrooms en suite, as well as heaters and fans.  Several are equipped with tea/coffee facilities, fridge, television and microwave.

name: Windamere Hotel
overview: Established in the 19th century as a boarding house for bachelor English and Scottish tea planters, it was converted into a hotel just before the outbreak of the Second World War. Has been the subject of many stories in the international media. It is situated on Observatory Hill, a Darjeeling landmark. It offers Wi-Fi facility.

name: Foley's Place B&B
overview: Four rooms with en-suite bath in century-old home, non-smoking, patio/BBQ, wi-fi. Year-round.

name: Park Plaza County Hall
overview: Stylish and reputable.

name: Minshuku Sumitomo-Inn
overview: ive blocks (or street lights) straight on from Hakodate station, or take the bus to Omori-cho. Rooms are typical Japanese 15-tatami Spartan minshuku-style, bathroom included. In 2007, management did not speak English (despite its website having an English page).

name: The Acacia Jakarta
overview: Offers 208 well-appointed rooms and suites, all of which have individually controlled air conditioning, 40 channels of Cable TV, and free High Speed Internet up to 1 MB. Amenities include fitness center/gym, spa, and swimming pool. The Chinese restaurant has the all-you-can-eat dimsum at lunchtime!

name: Hotel NH Bingen
overview: Quality hotel on the banks of the river Rhine

name: Best Western Varbergs Stadshotell
overview: One of the finest hotels and spas in Sweden, proberly the most high-end you can get in town.

name: Matyas Hotel
overview: This is the main hotel in Sashalom neighborhood. 15 rooms, all of them with american styled kitchen and air conditioner. There is a small conference room up to forty people. Other services: Child friendly Hotel, Free WIFI Internet Access, VISA / EMC Cards accepted, Free Parking. -  Pre-season 02.Jan - 31.Mar, High season 01.Apr. - 31.Oct,  Off-season 01.Nov. - 28.Dec

name: Radisson Blu Plaza
overview: Classy hotel in a protected and carefully renovated, Kalevala-inspired 1917 building, located near the railway station within easy walking distance of Aleksanterinkatu.  Excellent breakfast buffet.

name: Universal Hotel Ekimae
overview: Business hotel with non-smoking rooms available by reservation only. Dinner and a buffet breakfast are included in the rate. There are a few other Okayama hotels in the same chain, so if this one is booked, they can check another branch.

name: Beaumonde
overview: A beautiful bed/breakfast with dinner. There are balconies and a roof deck. The breakfast and dinner are very filling. There is free internet. The family that runs the hotel is very warm and welcoming. Staff speaks Georgian, Russian, and some English.

name: B-Hotel
overview: A modern urban hotel by prestigious architect Alfredo Arribas. On the 8th floor you can find the endless-pool with views over Plaza Espanya and Montjuic hill. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Gustaf af Klint
overview: A boat-hostel with hotel-standard cabins.

name: The Star Hotel
overview: . The obligatory large hotel located in '''The Star''' casino complex. Don't expect the kind of accommodation deals you would find in [[Las Vegas]] however, unless you quality for admission to the ''Inner Sanctum''.

name: Treginnis
overview: Caravan Club site, level site for tourers and camper vans. Fantastic views. Water tap and disposal point. Batteries charged.

name: Kooniguy
overview: The usual straw-hut campement gets a French touch at Kooniguy, giving this place an aura of class and luxury. From the beautifully manicured grounds surrounding the enticing pool, you can take in the lovely delta view and relax in Kooniguy’s exclusivity. Not to miss here is the food: deliciously indulgent, taking local ingredients to a refined and gourmet level.

name: Carmel Country Inn
overview: Pet friendly bed and breakfast offering suites and studios with fireplaces, beautiful gardens, and bountiful breakfasts.

name: Youth Hostel Schliersee
overview: Standard youth hostel, close to the ski resort.

name: Golden Gobi
overview: Another cheap and friendly place with dorm and free breakfast.

name: Stadshotellet
overview: A typical small-town hotel, clean and modern.

name: Marmot Lodge
overview: Heated indoor pool, sauna and whirlpool. Kitchen suites.

name: Hotel Ciputra
overview: Managed by Swiss-Belhotel. Overlooking the town square and connected to Semarang's largest shopping mall, Mall Ciputra.

name: Goldener Löwe
overview: Nice mixture of ''cozy'' and ''modern'' with a restaurant that draws its ingredients mainly from local sources. Located near the Brewery Museum and the Maisel's brewery, it's just a short walk away from the Rotmaincenter or the inner city.

name: Balinoe Campsite
overview: Tents, caravans and campervans welcome. Facilities include toilets, showers, indoor kitchen and dining area, and wifi.

name: ibis budget Wien Messe
overview: The ibis budget is the ultra-low-cost version of the ibis just next door. This is a newly-built hotel rather than a converted Etap Hotel, so it features the new-style green rooms, with a shower cabin directly accessible from the room and the sink right in the room. Rooms are 15 sqm and can accommodate up to three people (third in the bunk bed), and come with free WiFi but no breakfast.

name: Solo Sokos Hotel Estoria
overview: The Estoria is a part of the same building complex as the Viru hotel, but it follows the upmarket "Solo" concept and features colourful and unique design elements throughout its interior. The level of comfort and facilities is higher than at the Viru, but the 93 rooms are placed in a smaller building with less spectacular vistas.

name: Hotel Anna
overview: Each of the 22 rooms is equipped with shower & WC, hair dryer, IDD telephone, satellite TV and a safety deposit box.

name: Gran Hotel Velazquez
overview: The Gran Hotel Velázquez is a 4 star hotel located in the Salamanca district. This hotel has been providing stylish accommodation for over 50 years.

name: Bohem Art Hotel
overview: . Expensive. Four star? Rates include breakfast. Champagne buffet breakfast.

name: Tallinn Backpackers
overview: Includes a sauna.

name: Kachina Lodge
overview: Another satisfactory hotel in the downtown area.  A tip: try to avoid rooms 283 through 286, which have problems with noise from the busy road in front of the hotel; the other rooms there are considerably quieter.  How many small-town roadside hotels/motor lodges have you stayed in that have a Frederic Remington statue out front?  This one does.

name: Annie's Lodge
overview: Decent rooms if a little faded, Globe wifi hotspot.

name: HI-Castle Mountain Wilderness Hostel
overview: A small hostel about halfway down the road towards [[Banff]], and offers a very laid back atmosphere. The facilities are excellent, with a sizeable kitchen, friendly atmosphere and beautiful surroundings. Reservations are required during the winter months, as closure dates may apply, and recommended during the summer months to ensure a bed. Dorm beds from $23, with a $4 surcharge for non-members, ski packages available. Pets not allowed.

name: Hotel Postgaarden
overview: Cheap hotel in central Lyngby, all rooms either share bathroom with other rooms in the wing, or 2 rooms share one in the new wing. Has 2 shared kitchens for cooking, and wireless internet in all rooms. The key holder is at the Post-Pub (see drink listing)

name: Reformed College
overview: hostel

name: Hotel Las Lengas
overview: This is the first eco-friendly hotel of Ushuaia and it is located over a natural elevation of the terrain. Thanks to its large floor-to-ceiling windows, which are insulated and provide natural lighting, it is possible to enjoy the fantastic views over the bay of Ushuaia and Beagle Channel from all public areas of this unique hotel. All 46 rooms and suites are completely insulated and all of them have views to mountains and/or Beagle Channel. They all have in-room heating temperature controls, LCD and cable TV, hair dryers, safety boxes, LED and/or low energy bulbs, flow regulators and dual-flush system. Wi-Fi is complimentary in all rooms and public areas of the hotel. The attached restaurant integrates traditional dishes from Patagonia.

name: Le Metropole
overview: Opened in 1902, this is one of Alexandria's two [[grand old hotels]]. Recently given a half-hearted renovation, still keeping the turn-of-the-century style. Centrally located on Alexandria's main street, which is handy for sightseeing, but lower floor rooms (esp. those facing the back) can be very noisy. Internet is available but can be spotty.

name: Hotel Josty
overview: Josty is located near the entrance to Frederiksberg Have and was founded in 1813 by the Italian artist Agostino Taddei. The restaurant is open for lunch but otherwise reserved for bigger parties. Josty operates a boutique hotel with 7 rooms of varying size, which are a bit worn, but if you can live with that they are individually furnished with lavish antique interiors and chandeliers - no Nordic minimalism here. The place used to be used by the king to keep mistresses when he lived in the nearby castle. Breakfast is not included, but is reasonable and cheap at 65 Kr.

name: Hostel Elf
overview: Husitska 11, Žižkov. Smokey common area, free internet and wacky rooms. Breakfast and free tea and coffee all day are included. Dorms, doubles, triples, privates with bathroom or without. There are four (or more) different seasons with different prices. In low season fifth night free.

name: Sawanoya Ryokan
overview: Well-known and popular ryokan, all rooms Japanese style with tatami floors. 2 rooms with bath, the 10 others share two Japanese-style baths and showers. Good neighborhood to simply wander and look at the houses and gardens. Free internet and LAN points in all rooms. Coin operated laundry. Really friendly helpful staff. Closed 29 Dec-3 Jan. Quote from book by owner "I stay here not because it is cheap but because it is friendly".

name: Sedona Rouge Hotel & Spa
overview: 77-room boutique hotel and spa located in West Sedona.

name: Sheraton Stockholm Hotel
overview: The Sheraton Stockholm Hotel is a five-star hotel in Stockholm’s central business district, perfect for both business and leisure guests. The hotel offers stunning views of Lake Mälaren, City Hall, and Old Town, as well as the largest average room size in town.

name: Kande Beach Resort
address: about 40 km south of Nkhata Bay
overview: Popular with overland trucks, this resort has camping, dorm rooms, single, twin and doubles. Activities include a great horse riding tour, scuba diving with the experienced team at "Aquanuts", there are catamarans and canoes for hire, and you can get great food at the "soft sand cafe"

name: Red Victorian Bed & Breakfast
overview: A throwback to the Haight Ashbury's glory days during the 1960s, this peace and love themed B&B has several eclectically themed rooms and suites, as well as a cafe downstairs.

name: Sovereign Inn Gundagai
overview: Sovereign Inn Gundagai is a refuge for the tired traveler. 37 well-designed units and family suites built to offer the ultimate in comfort. Adding to the elegant setting are modern amenities like cable TV, in-room Internet connectivity, radio with alarm clock, direct dial telephone, coffee- and tea-making facilities and much more.

name: Pala Hotel
overview: Beautiful hotel with a green patio, where the blind owner serves cold beer. The rooms are large and clean and all have AC. To get there you have to take a rikshaw.

name: Yes Hostel
overview: Free Wifi.

name: Odzun Hotel
overview: A 1971 old Soviet rest house that has been recently remodeled. Offers large modern rooms and cottages. Open-air swimming pool, billiards, tennis, volleyball and football fields, children playground. For some it's proven to be a very cheap and convenient spot to rest, with breakfast included. Surrounding forest and splendid views over the mountains worth a visit on its own. Transfer from the city is free of charge.

name: Satsunai River Park Campsite
overview: Open late Apr-early Nov.

name: Khao Sok Floating Bungalows
address: Ta Khun, 32/15 Nanaplaza B10-B11, Surathani-Takuapa Rd
overview: Floating bungalows on the lake. Offer lake tours, adventure tourism.

name: Hotel Antártida Argentina
overview: Centrally located.

name: Iriomote Monsoon
overview: Overlooking the bay south of Uehara, this tranquil setting offers 6 Japanese style tatami rooms and tours including kayaking and hiking to the Pinaisala Falls, snorkeling, and horse riding. Staff only speak Japanese.

name: Yuri Plateau Auto Campground
overview: This campground has camp sites and cabins.  It also has a nice view of Mt. Chokai.

name: Beach House Self Catering
address: Lower Ardtun, near Bunessan, Isle of Mull
overview: Beach House is a restored farmhouse looking over Loch Scridain, half way between Bunessan and Pennyghael. The holiday home can sleep up to eight.

name: Hostelling International-Calgary City Centre
overview: On the edge of the East Village district, near bars, restaurants, shopping centres and transit. Free breakfast and wifi. Very clean and friendly, lots of space inside and outside. There are no age restrictions, so be prepared for the possibility of sharing a room with a retiree and an 18 year old! Dorm beds and private rooms available.

name: Walnut Meadow Campground & RV Park
overview: A privately owned campground featuring 103 campsites ranging from primitive to full hook up.  The campground features a store, shower houses, wifi, and laundry facilities

name: AMBER HOUSE - at the centre! <!-- This is the actual, verbatim name of the B&B - see: http://en.wikivoyage.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk%3AIkan_Kekek&diff=2377723&oldid=2377566#Nelson -->
overview: Open all year, clean Bed and Breakfast in a lovely 1897 villa that used to be a school for girls and ''little'' boys. Traditional Rose Garden with the oldest walnut tree in the South Island hidden away at the back of the plot. One of the few that still offers a full cooked breakfast. Full board and room service available. Now has satellite HD TV, Wi-Fi, double glazing and air-conditioning. Bedrooms have ''en-suite'' showers. Quiet fringe of CBD location. Smoking or smokers not allowed(!) (''party of 4 from $37 each'') The Amber family first came to Nelson in 1842 but can understand some French, Fukien Chinese, German, Malay and Spanish.

name: B&B Familia Piatti
overview: Located in the forest, isolated from the city center.

name: Hotel am Böhmepark
overview: The hotel is situated in the centre of the Böhme park and all rooms have just been updated with a modern and comfortable finish.

name: Shangri-la EDSA
overview: A 5 star Shangri-la hotel adjoining the high-end Shangri-la Plaza Mall

name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Orion
overview: Fitness Center. High Speed Internet. 67 beds, 30 rooms

name: Hotel Cult
overview: Excellent 4-Star Desinghotel in Frankfurt/Sachsenhausen.

name: Brauerei Reichold
overview: with shower, WC, phone and TV. Motorhome parking bays are right next to the brewery.

name: Best Western Vineyard Inn and Suites
overview: Spacious accommodations and vacation packages.

name: Hotel Lido
overview: Close to the train station and outside the red-light district.

name: Comfort Suites Eugene
overview: Offers daily complimentary breakfast, indoor pool and free high-speed wireless.

name: Novotel Mangga Dua
overview: Attached to Mangga Dua Square, convenient to Ancol. Nice and crisp rooms with parquet flooring, either face the pool or the city. An ordinary restaurant, but exceptional pool and cheap massage.

name: Bizerte Resort
address: Just north of town, on the coast
overview: This hotel is large but simple, aiming to impress but failing on more than a few counts. The rate is only slightly lower for single travelers.  Room prices include a breakfast buffet, which is quite basic.  Whilst internet is provided, the signal in the rooms is extremely weak and it may not work, forcing you to use internet in the foyer.

name: ibis Budget Warszawa Centrum
overview: The ibis budget is a bare minimum, every-expense-spared budget hotel chain. Don't expect the door to manned all night and if you will arrive after the check-in deadline, you better arrange to be let into your room, because ibis Budget hotels may or may not have anyone on duty to let you in after a certain time.

name: Batavia Boutique Hotel
overview: Boutique hotel.

name: Rimkhong Guesthouse
overview: Rebuilt guesthouse, much more upmarket than before 2012. The wonderful courtyard garden full of tables and benches and charming bric-a-brac is now mostly gone replaced by concrete but a little still remains. Lots of area information posted around the courtyard. Rooms include air-con but no optional fan, good quality Wi-Fi.

name: Okhtinskaya
overview: 293 rooms, with single, double and triple accommodation. Nice views of the Neva and the Smolny complex. Free WiFi and free TV channels movies in all rooms, noncontact electronical lock keys, furniture, mini-bar, air conditioning, mirror, telephone, shower or bathtub, towels, hair dryer, toiletries, etc. Buffet breakfast is always included.

name: Pousada Quitandinha
overview: HI affiliated hostel located outside of the center in the quiet Quitandinha neighboorhood. 4 beds dormrooms in a wooden house, clean but worned out sheets, clean bathroom, friendly and helpful staff. Varied all you can eat breakfast. They cook basic but filling meals for RS6 at night.

name: Rwenzori Travellers Inn
overview: Has Wifi, breakfast included.

name: Le Méridien Etoile
overview: The very first Le Meridien in the world, built in 1972 to cater for Air France passengers arriving on the newly-acquired widebody jets. Behind the distinctive 1970s facade are updated rooms and common areas with contemporary design and facilities. The hotel faces the Palais du Congres and caters mostly for business travellers and less so to tourists than other Starwood properties in Paris. This is the largest hotel by room count in Paris, with 1,025 rooms of various types. The less expensive Classic and Deluxe rooms have more dated decor, the Urban and Executive rooms have been thoroughly updated to 21st century standards.

name: Minshuku Ichinoya
overview: Deep in the mountains west of Kinugawa, this rustic inn specializes in food cooked on the hearth (''irori''). Public hot spring next door.

name: New Koyo
overview: Do not expect too much from this hotel. Usually a line for the shared showers.

name: Hotel Vitale
overview: Great boutique hotel, right on the waterfront, across from the historic Ferry Building. Rooms with city or bay views, rooftop day-spa, and a restaurant and bar with outside terrace seating.

name: Holiday Inn — Fisherman's Wharf
overview: Among the bars, cafes, and the vast number of specialty shops in Fisherman's Wharf.

name: BP Tower
overview: Pleasant 6 storey hotel, past the Big C on the main road (Mittraphap Rd) out of the city, down a side street, sign on main road. A bit away from the city, but on the ground floor of the hotel is a mini-mart, laundry, massage, and a small restaurant. Bus to the city 9 baht, motorbike 50 baht.

name: The Backpacker Guesthouse
overview: This small-to-mid size hostel is laidback and friendly. Kitchen access, inexpensive beer for sale, a great lounge with lots of free movies to watch, hammocks in the backyard, a grocery store nearby, in a residential neighborhood near the 51/53 tramline.

name: Sjøgløtt hotell
overview: A cozy, centrally located, small hotel with sea views

name: Days Inn Blythe
overview: Free breakfast and Wi-Fi, pool, pet-friendly.

name: Casa Dos Chivos
overview: Casa Dos Chivos is a 1 or 3-bedroom vacation rental house. This chic house overlooks the ocean and nearby islands.

name: Sanchiri Mirador & Lodge
overview: Overlook, restaurant and hotel.

name: Sheraton Philadelphia City Center
overview: Just four blocks from the Pennsylvania Convention Center.

name: Quest Hotel Semarang
overview: Near Simpang Lima business district and the Chinatown district. It is 15 minutes away from the airport and 10 minutes away from the train station. Rooms are equipped with cable TV, safe and tea/coffee making facilities and have a private balcony.

name: ATLAS City Hotel
overview: Capacity:136 rooms all with shower, SAT TV, telephone, minibar, air-conditioning. 300 beds.

name: Hotel Gault
overview: Feels like you're stepping into Architectural Digest with ultra-modern furniture and rooms. Located in a converted warehouse in Old Montreal. Very helpful staff.

name: Beiderbecke Inn
overview: A full breakfast will be served in the formal dining room. Grocer Charles and Louise Beiderbecke (grandparents of jazz musician Bix Beiderbecke) built the home overlooking the Mississippi River in 1880. A contributing property in the Hamburg Historic District on the National Register of Historic Places.

name: Hotel Kummer
overview: Directly located on Mariahilferstraße.

name: Kaguraya B&B
overview: This highly-rated family minshuku has three rooms, one a large double and two connected as a suite. Shared bath. The building is a 100-year-old farm house which was remodeled 20 years ago. Light breakfast served. The same people operate Kiyomizu house in the [[Kyoto/Higashiyama|Higashiyama]] district.

name: Indian Cove Campground
overview: This campground is not accessible from the main park roads and may be reached only via Highway 62 and Indian Cove Road, between the North and West Entrance Stations. 101 sites. Water is available from the ranger station, and thirteen group sites are also available for $20/$35 per night.

name: Abou Nawas Boujaafar Hotel
overview: Great food and services. Thalasso center with an interior (30'C, salt water) pool, another outside and private beach. 3 restaurants. Deco from the 80's but not expensive. 5 minutes away from the medina and near all transportations.

name: Tallink City Hotel
overview: Tallink's City Hotel has a very central location, right opposite the Viru shopping centre, but unfortunately it is let down by poor service standards dictated by the group business that is the hotel's mainstay.

name: Fox Glacier Lodge
overview: 8 Ensuite rooms. Some rooms with kitchens,  double spa baths & gas fire places. B&B Lodge rooms include continental selection breakfast. Also Fox Glacier Campervan Park: 24 powered campervan sites. Showers, toilets, kitchen & coin operated laundry. Fresh drinking water & dump station. Free BBQ in sheltered BBQ area & picnic tables for guest use. 1min stroll to all cafes/shops, etc.

name: Swiss Garden Hotel
overview: Small hotel in quiet neighborhood. Rooms are very clean, and have air conditioning, free internet, mosquito screens, safes, and refrigerators. Children cost an additional $15.

name: Hotel Calle Mayor
overview: Boutique hotel located in a palace built during the 16th century.

name: Ibsens Hotel
overview: Nice and classical hotel, in a good area between Nansensgade and the lakes, and very close to shopping. Free wireless.

name: Aurora Staples Inn
overview: All rooms have double whirlpool tubs, complementary robes, fireplaces, and private baths.

name: Champs Elysées Plaza
overview: Unusually large rooms and suites. Elegant and sophisticated, with high tech equipment and comfort, they offer a unique mix of contemporary chic décor with ceiling moldings, marble fireplaces, and large windows looking at two beautiful and quiet streets.

name: Campingpark Südheide
overview: A family run camping site along the river Aller, suitable also as a base for canoeing trips, riding (horses rental at the site) and cycling.

name: Safari Hotel
overview: 3 star hotel with fitness centre, massage, billiards, Turkish/steam bath, outdoor swimming pool and restaurant.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Maingate South
overview: Complimentary breakfast, pool, & free wi-fi wireless internet access.

name: H Rado Hostel
overview: Boutique hostel with cool wall art, a sunny common room, and a huge roof deck. Walking distance to all the great places in Bellavista.

name: Ace Hostel
overview: Basic accommodations in large dormitories. Fabulous breakfast buffet. Excellent value. Right at the beach of Botafogo.

name: Sleep In Heaven Hostel
overview: Right around the corner from Tjili Pop - a local bar. Pretty spartan conditions, except for the common area and toilets which are recently renovated, but the only real backpackers style accommodation in town - along with the sidekick Sleep-in Green - with a outdoor beer garden, a pool table, free lockers and free internet. The staff are young and friendly and the place is clean. Alcohol from outside cannot be consumed inside the premises although you can buy beer and wine from the counter.

name: Haddad Tourism Village
overview: This tourist village has a hotel, gardens, a pool, and even a large amusement park located on the hotel's grounds.

name: Na Ulyanova
overview: A guesthouse in the center of Adler. Works all year round.

name: Mainak Tourist Lodge
overview: Not as grand on the inside as on the out, but still good value.

name: Cochise Stronghold Campground
overview: A beautifully-situated campground in the Dragoon Mountains, with camping for tents and trailers. Toilets, no water, no hookups. No reservations required, closed annually from 1 Jun - 1 Sep.

name: Hotel Colonial Inn
overview: Beautiful antique style rooms with a nice feel.

name: Pension Dr. Geissler
overview: A family run guest house for budget travellers with free Wifi internet and breakfast.

name: The Cheyenne Motel
overview: Small, quiet establishment with affordable nightly and weekly rates. Friendly service, attentive staff, and low rates you just can't get at the larger chain motels.

name: Hotel Tirifiholiday
overview: 31 air-conditioned guestrooms with separate bathrooms. Room service 24h. Complimentary full breakfast in the breakfast area. Multilingual staff, laundry facilities, free car parking, free wireless Internet access in all areas of the hotel.

name: Hotel Princi i Arberit
overview: Modern five star hotel. It is often empty, with a risk that the restaurant may be closed and the heating switched off. Internet is available. - Recreation Center include Massage Room, Indoor Pool, Sauna, Solarium. - Conference hall up to five hundreds persons

name: Hotel GreenStar
overview: In the city center. Douche and toilet in the rooms, separate beds, closet, water cooker, small refrigerator and a 32" television. Breakfast costs €5 extra, parking fee €5.

name: Tuxedo House Bed & Breakfast
overview: 10 mins to downtown by car or by transit. Non-smoking only, no pets. Full breakfast included.

name: Moevenpick Hotel Stuttgart Airport & Messe
overview: The Moevenpick is right next to the Stuttgart Airport's terminal building and thus also next to the fairgrounds. It is an upscale'ish modern hotel mostly catering to business travellers, with colorful design and high level of comfort.

name: Nuvo Hotel Suites
overview: Modern suites in the heart of the Beltine, furnished kitchen, free wi-fi and local phone. Weekly and monthly rate available.

name: UB Guesthouse
address: Near Zanzabar Museum, Entrance on backside of the building facing the Mongol Bank
overview: A clean, well-organized and centrally located youth hostel that also arranges tours around the country. E-mail ahead for a free pickup from the train station. A light breakfast, tea and coffee are included. Has received some criticism for being a bit impersonal, and the welcoming is a bit cold. Although it's written you can phone from there from 10:00 to 18:00, don't rely on it. Only a hotplate in the kitchen. Only foreigners allowed. It is strictly forbidden to receive any non-client.

name: Boathouse
overview: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast overlooking Salmon Bay before setting out for an activity-filled day at one of the nearby golf courses or just soaking up the sun next to the pool. Luxury en-suite rooms, a-la-carte restaurant, fully licensed bar and direct beach access.

name: Grand Terminus
overview: The hotel built in 1928 is elegant and has a classical style.

name: Novotel Edinburgh Park
overview: Not the most inspiring of locations, but very convenient adjacent to the City Bypass for road trips around the rest of Scotland and right next to Edinburgh Park Station for speedy transport to the city centre. Pool, gym, steam room, restaurant. Completed in 2008.

name: Vanadis Hotel
overview: A budget hotel at a currently closed-down water park.

name: Coastal Inn
overview: The hotel is comfortably located in the Bayers Lake Business Park. Rooms start from $100 and include breakfast and internet. The hotel also houses an exercise room and indoor pool.

name: Calgary West Campground
overview: Open from April 15 to October 15. Take Valley Ridge Boulevard/Crestmont Boulevard exit from Hwy 1 (Trans-Canada Hwy) on west edge of Calgary. Hookup types available: 120 sites with power, water, & sewer; 120 sites power & water; 80 no hookups. 20 & 30 amps available. Some pull-through sites. Pet-friendly. Campfires prohibited by city bylaw. Free shuttle to Calgary Transit bus stop at Canada Olympic Park; express shuttle to Stampede grounds during Stampede Week.

name: Entebbe Backpackers
overview: Free Wi-Fi. Somewhat run-down and dirty but has its own standby generator for use during the frequent power outages.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites San Diego - Poway
overview: Free hot breakfast and internet.

name: Lighthouse Inn Bed and Breakfast
overview: An officer's beach cottage (ca. 1911) with 3 rooms.

name: Intown Luxury House
overview: Single, double, junior suite and terraced junior suite. All rooms with A/C, LCD TV sets with satellite channels, hi-speed Internet connection, safe, minibar and direct telephone line. Bathrooms are fitted with marble and Jacuzzi tubs and/or showers.

name: Slieve Donard Hotel
overview: The pre-eminent hotel in Newcastle and one of the best in Northern Ireland. Includes a spa and conference centre. Close by the Royal County Down Golf Club.

name: Grande Ville Hotel
overview: The rooms are rather dated and not well-maintained, but at least they are clean. English is spoken. Everything requires an additional fee, such as the tiny swimming pool (50 baht) and the fitness room. Wi-Fi in the room costs 100 baht/hr. There's a bar on the roof, it serves Western and Asian dishes. Do not use the airport transfer service as hailing a taxi yourself is cheaper.

name: Estheréa
overview: A boutique hotel that consists of a row of 17th century buildings along the Singel canal. It has 93 rooms and 2 suites. It recently renovated 75 of its rooms. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Trianon
overview: This seven-room hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1927, and while the building and furnishings are all older, rather than feeling worn out the place instead has an antique feel.  Rooms have showers but no air conditioning, and wi-fi is available.  The parking area is behind a gate and thus offers added security.  Continental breakfast is served downstairs, while there is also an attached restaurant that serves lunch, dinner, and drinks.

name: Kuonjarjoki wilderness hut
overview: Open wilderness hut (10 persons) and reservation hut (10 persons). Stove and gas cooker. No waste bins.

name: Pemba Arti Lodge
overview: Based on Londo, the peninsula that closes the bay of Pemba this eco-friendly lodge offers beach front bungalows (B&B) and backpackers' rooms. Self catering is possible. Host table with French cooking is also available for guests under a wide restaurant and bar hut. Internet is available. PADI diving, water skiing, buoy pulling, kayaking through the mangroves, archery, French bowling, bird watching, nature walks and many other activities to discover. Don't hesitate to visit our website for further information.

name: Club Med
overview: An all-inclusive resort with many luxuries.

name: Bradford House
overview: Bed and breakfast in a farmhouse built before the Civil War.

name: Newport Farm
overview: Approached by a private avenue of lime trees, this refurbished farmhouse overlooks the Broadmeadow Estuary which is beautifully located to explore the treasures of a world renowned wildlife sanctuary. Waders, Brent Geese and Kingfisher are in abundance. Newport Farm is unique, Set on 55 acres of pasture and woodland walks, with its double arch bridge dating back to 1650, its award winning walled gardens all add to create an incredible tranquil experience.

name: Millennium Hilton
overview: A luxury hotel at the Chao Phraya river, offering a working desk, living room, high-speed internet, two LCD televisions, jacuzzi, rain shower and pool. There's a shuttle boat to River City pier and BTS Saphan Taksin station.

name: John James Audubon State Park
overview: The park has 5 one bedroom cottages as well as a 2 bedroom cottage. The cottages feature a full kitchen, a fireplace, and are available year round.  The campground features 66 electric and 21 primitive sites.  Amenities include shower houses and a playground.  The campground is open April through October.

name: Hotel BestPrice Diagonal
overview: This simple new hotel tries to live up to its name by undercutting competition by a wide margin.

name: Premier Inn Swords
overview: A stylish and comfortable accommodation, the three-star Premier Inn is a great choice for anyone travelling through Dublin Airport. 10 minutes walk from Swords Main Street.

name: Tanque Verde Ranch
overview: Guests staying at the Tanque Verde Ranch have a choice of being pampered by daily massages or hitting the trail by horse or foot. Located on 640 beautiful, acres in the foothills of the Rincon mountains east of Tucson Arizona, the Tanque Verde Ranch offers Arizona horseback riding, tennis, guided hiking, mountain biking, nature walks and much more, all included in your nightly rate. This Arizona dude ranch, founded in 1868 in the verdant Sonoran desert, offers an excellent Southwestern resort along with a historic Arizona dude ranch experience in a secluded, natural setting.

name: Victoria Park
overview: Campground and marina, 50 campsites, water/power for RVs, 30 docks, tourist info, laundry, hot showers, playground, wading pool. Wi-fi.

name: Albergue Los Lupinos
overview: Centrally located, big kitchen, free breakfast, padlockable lockers, free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel De Keizerskroon
overview: Budget hotel, right in the centre of town.

name: Jennings Resort
overview: 35 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Pool. Tent camping permitted. Free wi-fi available.

name: Mama Noots Bocawina Adventures & Eco-Resort
address: Mayflower Bocawina National Park, Stann Creek District
overview: If you plan to stay in the jungle but relatively close to Hopkins and Dangriga (12 miles away) you can stay at this spacious jungle resort located inside the Mayflower Bocawina National Park. The accommodation goes from budget to deluxe.

name: Jeruton Hotel
overview: Convenient only for the Jerudong area but excellent value withs rooms with a/c and restaurant. Car or taxi essential.

name: Kaskasjoki open wilderness hut
address: on the south bank of Kaskasjoki, follow the path between the river and a small lake.
overview: Open wilderness hut (6 persons). Wood fired stove. Kaskasjoki (''Gaskkasjohka'') runs down into Tonieno (''Doaereseatnu''). Bizeahpi and Torisvuoma palsa bogs 4 km downstream from the hut.

name: Woodson Bend Resort
overview: A resort with 480 privately owned condos. Many are available for rent and range in size from 1 to 4 bedrooms. The resort also features a golf course and on site restaurant.

name: Mercure Eindhoven
overview: Still at walking distance from the center, the recently renovated Mercure hotel offers good, spacious rooms and has a friendly staff.

name: Guildhall Tavern
overview: A hotel and pub in a restored Grade II* listed building steeped in history, with a strong heritage of association with the crafts or guilds of Denbigh Town, which included glovers, weavers, smiths, shoemakers, saddlers, curriers and tanners.

name: Villa Rogo
overview: It is a dorm-like accommodation owned by [[w:en:Pontifical Institute for Foreign Missions|PIME, the Pontificio Istituto Missioni Estere (Pontifical Institute for Foreign Missions)]] and it can be rented or used for specific events. It has 70 beds and it is at about 20 minutes walk from the centre (also with nice trails).

name: Hotel Los Heroes
overview: A few meters from Lake Arenal. Features Swiss chalets, a rotating restaurant and a small railroad track.

name: TIU Chernivtsi Backpackers
overview: the common room has computers, plasma tv with surround sound with English-speaking channels and the kitchen is fully equipped.

name: King's Hotel
overview: , three star, in the heart of the Ghetto. Rates include breakfast. 79 rooms.

name: C.S. Pattani Hotel
overview: This is the hotel of choice for most foreigners who visit Pattani. It's clean, well-managed, luxurious, and secure. There are two large pools, a cafe, and a restaurant with an included buffet breakfast. Big discounts, to 800 baht or less is possible, depending on length of stay. Next to the Big C mall. Outside the hotel are several small restaurants, cafes, karaoke, and motor bike drivers. 5 min and 20 baht to the town centre. Wi-Fi, 100 baht hour.

name: Barra Lodge
overview: Has good views of beaches and the Indian Ocean.

name: Lovett House Guest House
address: 6 Howard Street, Off Carr Road, Nelson BB9 7SZ
overview: Victorian terraced house with 3 guest bedrooms of which 2 are ''en suite''. Offers courtesy pick up from local train and bus stations; excursion planning advice; full Lancashire cooked breakfast

name: Stop Pension
overview: calm and pleasant.

name: Hotel Acinipo
overview: Has an onsite restaurant and non-smoking rooms. Free wi-fi, luggage storage available.

name: Hotel Husa Gran Vía
address: Avda. Gran Vía Rey Juan Carlos I, 71 Bis
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Dhara Dhevi
overview: In the traditional Lanna-style, this 24 hectare (60 acre) resort includes a spa, cooking classes, children's club, and fitness centre. The resort caused some local controversy when it built a reproduction temple based on one of Thailand's most holy sites on its grounds.

name: Citin Loft Hua Hin by Compass Hospitality
overview: 50 comfortable guest rooms each with a private balcony overlooking the green hills beyond; rooftop pool, sundeck, Internet stations, restaurant and a free shuttle service to Hua Hin Beach, Hua Hin Market Village, and Hua Hin Night Market.

name: Hotel De Witte Bergen
overview: This is the only hotel in Laren and it is exactly on the boundary with neighboring village Eemnes. It is located close to the A1 motorway where it intersects with the A27 motorway. It is part of the Van Der Valk chain of motorway hotels. It could be considered a mid-range hotel with decent rooms, but a lack of character and authenticity.

name: Hotel GLO Helsinki Airport
overview: The only hotel located in the airport building itself, on the service floor of Terminal 2 and with direct indoor access from Terminal 1. Day rooms are also made available for use, depending on the booking situation, between 9:00 - 19:00.

name: Sheraton Society Hill
overview: Established in 1986, it takes you back in time to the days of colonial Philadelphia. The hotel is located amidst lush landscaping and cobblestone streets in the most historic square mile in America and just four blocks away from Philadelphia's renowned Independence Hall.

name: Dahlia Inn
overview: Family-run accommodation.

name: Holiday Inn Express
overview: Free WiFi and wired internet in all rooms. Fitness center, indoor pool, self-service laundry, business center, and free breakfast available.

name: Tazawako Youth Hostel / Tazawako Lodge
address: 33-8, Kamiishigami, Obonai, Tazawako 田沢湖生保内字上石神33-8
overview: It has a Youth hostel and a normal Lodge. The bath is hot springs.

name: Hotel EMPIRE
overview: 19 room hotel and restaurant, with indoor tennis courts.

name: Hotel Severyanka
overview: One of the few hotels in town, located at one of the main streets.

name: Stewart Campground
overview: Trailers up to 22', no hookups. Drinking water from April - October.

name: Radisson Blu Saga Hotel
overview: A large hotel just outside the old town (a 10 minute walk from the city hall), by the University of Iceland campus. The building (rather than the hotel occupying most of it) is called the "Farmer's Palace" (Bændahöllin), referring to the fact that it was originally erected by the powerful farmer's association and still houses their offices.

name: Hotelli Imatra
overview: This new economy hotel is situated only 500 meters from the famous Imatra Rapids and the center of Imatra town. Hotels motto is: Sleep and save. Very good breakfast, large rooms and sauna.

name: Sofitel Lisbon Liberdade
overview: Perhaps not particularly outstanding in standards or appointments among other Sofitels in Europe (meaning though that the standards are very high), the Lisbon Sofitel boasts a very central location on the Avenida da Liberdade, smack right at the entrance to the namesake metro station.

name: Rainbow House
overview: 2 apartments (7 beds and 5 beds) with 2 rooms each, living room, kitchen and bathroom.

name: Bismarkia Suite
overview: Spacious, with a private pool, private parking, equipped kitchen, air-con and an expansive living room area. One to four bedroom suites available.

name: Gl. Avernæs
overview: A little from Odense, close to nature in a quiet and relaxing area

name: ibis Stuttgart Centrum
overview: A typical old-style (green washbasins) ibis hotel right on the Marienplatz in southern Stuttgart.

name: Mercure Jelenia Góra
overview: This leftover from times gone by is located a bit outside of town, towards [[Karpacz]]. The hotel has a swimming pool but no air conditioning in the rooms. The furniture and fittings have fallen far behind the times, but on balance the hotel provides good free WiFi. Nowadays, it is mostly used as a stopover points for package tours of German pensioners.

name: Chalets Marmotte Mountain Adventure
overview: Luxury catered ski chalet accommodation in Argentiere.

name: Carlton Tel Aviv
overview: One of the luxury hotels in Tel Aviv. Includes a high-tech room with many perks.

name: Black Sheep Hostel
overview: Creative new hostel in the middle of nightlife - small breakfast included.

name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
overview: A luxury hotel situated on a tree-lined residential street that is known for its elegance and privacy.

name: La Casa de Dante
overview: Very nice staff and a great daily fresh breakfast. Big, healthy and different every day, meat or vegetarian, whatever you prefer. Hardly any hot water in the showers though.

name: Balestrand Hotel
overview: Open 12 May–07 Sep 2014.

name: The Hermitage
overview: Classic colonial Dutch style hotel and all-suite rooms. French restaurant, rooftop bar.

name: Bed And Breakfast Mari e Monti
overview: Contrada aratico, 352. Bed & Breakfast for €30 for person a night. The b&b have a 2 main room, a bedroom, a small kitchen with a fridge, and a small bathroom

name: Dedeman Silk Road Hotel
overview: Excellent hotel in the city centre. Drinks are overpriced. Free Internet connection in rooms.

name: Domon Guesthouse
overview: Nice enough, double room worth the extra money. Views from the balcony onto the river and towards the mountains are stunning, especially at sunset.

name: La Casa Azul
overview: Beautiful hotel with charming rooms at much lower prices than the tourist traps in the city center. Wonderful views and fantastic gardens, a really romantic place to stay but also family-friendly. Comfortable beds, plenty of hot water, and nice furnishings. Friendly staff who are happy to chat and give suggestions in Spanish, but they speak only very limited English. Fine with very late check-ins, but if you go earlier, they'll let you pick your room. Pool and TVs in rooms, but no food. It is, in fact, a blue house, and locals will be able to give you directions. They're fine with (or perhaps oblivious to?) gay/lesbian couples and unmarried hetero couples staying together.

name: Belomorie
overview: Large hotel with 150 beds, built back in 1980 and renovated in 2000.

name: Hotel Afa
overview: Free Internet and a cheap restaurant.

name: Arun Residence
overview: A luxurious boutique hotel with only six rooms, close to Wat Pho in the heart of Rattanakosin. It is built in a recently renovated Sino-Portuguese river mansion that has a lot of character. Its Arun, Ratchaphruek and Jasmine suites have a balcony with a direct view of Wat Arun and the Chao Phraya River. The other rooms don't have a direct view, but still have a wonderful interior.

name: Glen Iris Inn
overview: "Glen Iris" is the name William Pryor Letchworth gave to his country estate, where he entertained friends and business associates above the Middle Falls of the Genesee.  Today, guests can relax in the very same building, or in one of several out-parcels.  The 12 standard rooms are a bit small, with either one double bed or two twin beds, but each has a private bath.  The four suites are larger, each with a queen bed, but almost twice as expensive; the largest has a private porch and a whirlpool tub.  The adjacent Pinewood Lodge offers seven efficiency units, each with a kitchenette, queen bed, and single-size sleeper sofa.  There are also three smaller houses not too far away, offering multiple bedrooms and full kitchen facilities for larger families and groups of up to eight people.  The Glenn Iris Inn is well known for its elegant restaurant (entrees $21-37) serving American and European fare, though the service is sometimes found a bit lacking for the price.

name: Hostel Ruthensteiner
overview: Free wifi, bar 7PM-11PM. Family-run hostel with nice rooms, a few private rooms and a separate dorm building across the street. Hostel has a pleasant outdoor courtyard attached to a kitchen, and an inside lounge that has musical instruments available for playing. A couple blocks away from the train station.

name: Hotel Manila
overview: Hill Cart Road, Pradham Nagar. Located next to Hotel Heritage.  ₹600 non A/C to ₹2,400 for suite.

name: Power Beach Resort
overview: Has over 75 rooms with a large variety of bungalows and villas available, from basic fan bungalows to luxury air-con villas, which have been decorated and furnished to a high standard.

name: Hotel Masaka
overview: Hotel Masaka hosts overnight guests and large enkais.  Yunosawa Onsen is part of this hotel.

name: Sambuh Elite Hotel
overview: 38 rooms

name: Berghotel Amersfoort
overview: A former farmhouse located on the Amersfoortse Berg in a wooded area. The city centre is a half an hour walking downwards. You can also walk or cycle in the nearby forest.

name: Chapel Hill University Inn
overview: On-site pool, restaurant, meeting facilities. Pet-friendly rooms.

name: Stovepipe Wells Village
overview: Motel-style lodging in Stovepipe Wells. The rooms are not fancy, and the running water in some rooms is not potable, but it is a perfectly comfortable and convenient place to stay. Rates tend to be cheaper than at Furnace Creek ($111 for a Deluxe room). Beware of the restaurant at Stovepipe Wells, though; it tends to be wannabe fancy and overpriced. Call early for reservations at the lodge. 760-786-2387

name: City Hotel
overview: In the heart of Rovaniemi, next to Sampokeskus shopping mall and Lordi's Square.

name: Maude's Hotel
overview: Near Globen, Stockholmsmässan and Skogskyrkogården.

name: Calvary Hotel
overview: ***/**** It provides accommodation and other services in two buildings in the four- and three-star categories. Wi-Fi. Solarium usage: HUF1000 / 5 min. Bicycle rental fee: HUF 2000 / bicycle / day, HUF 1000 / bicycle / half-day (maximum 4 hours).

name: Tour Club
overview: A friendly, clean hostel with both dorm and private rooms. There is a beautiful zen garden and traditional Japanese-living room with a small library of local travel information. Free wifi, coffee and tea and the chance to try on a kimono. Air-con, bicycle rental, coin operated internet terminals and laundry are also available.

name: Kendrick Cabin
overview: A retired US Forest Service Fire Guard Station, this 3-BR stone-built cabin housed fire fighters in the summer. Can sleep up to 10 people and is furnished with bunks, stove, and pots and pans; there is an outside bath house with flush toilet and shower. Campers must bring their own bedding supplies. Open April 15 - November 15 (weather-dependent), water available from May 16 - October 16. Reservations can be made online.

name: Divanga
overview: Backpackers' bed and breakfast. Includes a beautiful swimming pool that creates a great social area. The staff is friendly. Comfortable and clean rooms with shower/toilet at only C$34.000 per person, in dorm 29.000 pesos including internet and a generous breakfast. The view from the roof is fantastic, especially at sunset and a roof top bar plays excellent music. There is also a comfy TV room with cable TV and DVD player, an internet room with free high speed internet and Wi-Fi access and a restaurant inside serving excellent food. Free luggage storage. Discount for Hostelling International members.

name: Serena Dar Es Salaam Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel next to a golf course in the city centre. Hotel has large rooms, vast onsite gardens, fitness centre and a pool. It also has three restaurants, one coffee shop, and a bar.

name: HOTEL Historia & Restaurant Historante
overview: **** Cosy restaurant, meeting room for 60 people, basement hall (Wine Pub) for 70 persons and wellness department. Services: car rental, room service, tickets (cinema, theater, concert, zoo admission, etc. ..) oredering, running map, bike rental, clothes cleaning, program organization, wake-up service, restaurant table reservation, hairdressing salon, beauty salon, flower delivery, taxi / transfer.

name: Hôtel de Crillon
overview: The legendary hotel overlooking Place de la Concorde has been the epitome of Parisian luxury for centuries, and now under new Saudi ownership undergoes a restoration scheduled to finish in 2015, when it will reopen as a Rosewood property.

name: Beach Hut Bed & Breakfast
overview: Offering free on-site reserved parking, free Wi-Fi, landscaped pool/patio, queen beds, flat screened TV/cable, faux fireplaces.

name: Eplet Bed & Apple
overview: Guest house and apple juice farm with friendly staff. You can do fruit picking during summer and stay for free in dormitory or with your tent. Open from 1st April to 1st October.

name: Residencial Dabhad
overview: Has more than twenty rooms available with one double or two single beds. All the rooms are equipped with conditioned air, satellite TV, private bedroom and others.

name: Doubletree Hotel Albuquerque
overview: A luxury downtown highrise hotel with many amenities, not to mention the only place directly connected to the Albuquerque Convention Center.

name: Camping Priwall
overview: Camping ground Priwall on the Peninsula with 200 places. Pre-booking is recommended in summer.

name: Davis Camp
overview: Tent sites for dry camping (toilets and showers within walking distance); RV sites with full hookups. Laundry facility available onsite.

name: Torony Holiday Park
overview: Thirty rooms. 2-3-4 beds (different standards of comfort) rooms / TV, refrigerator, umbrella, table, chairs / available. Sports fields and volleyball courts, concrete table tennis tables, playground

name: Lembongan Beach Club and Resort
overview: Villas feature a private swimming pool, terrace and garden. Complimentary breakfast, AC, Wi-Fi, minibar and a living area with a flat-screen satellite TV are among the in-villa facilities. En suite bathrooms come equipped with bathrobes and free toiletries.

name: Carina Hotel
overview: Surrounded by shops, bars and restaurants, this hotel is a 3-minute walk from the beach, with easy access to old Rhodes city and the roads to ancient Lindos and Kalithea.

name: The Royal York Hotel
overview: is located next to the station and is the largest hotel in York as well as one of the most prestigious. Has a nice but expensive restaurant overlooking the Minster - great for an evening meal. Also has a Bar, Swimming Pool and Gym. Always ask at reception if you hear any noise from function rooms. To be safe ask for a high-floor room.

name: Homeland International Hotel
address: No.3 Zhongshan 4th Road, Danshui Town, Huiyang District, Huizhou 516211
overview: Over.  The.  Top.

name: Radisson Hotel Astana
overview: New hotel, just north of Ishim river with 180 rooms. Singles/doubles at USD 480 including breakfast, access to fitness center but excluding current VAT. Rooms are modern design, with flat-screen TV and free internet. Wi-Fi in the rooms can be dodgy, but there is a cable alternative, and Wi-Fi works fine in the lobby/lounge. Hotel has a reliable Italian restaurant, and a sports club/spa.

name: Lausanne Palace
address: Rue du Grand-Chêne 7-9 (''next to park Montbenon'')
overview: Reception operates 24 hours per day 365 days per year. This stylish 5 star just off of the old town offers superb views of the lake and mountains, and three different restaurants including the ''Table d'Edgard'' which has a Michelin star.

name: Adelaide Hostel
overview: This is a popular backpacker hostel just two blocks from [[San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District|Union Square]].

name: Auberge Poulagou
overview: Yoff Tonghor Plage. Le Poulagou is a small hotel, 2 kilometres from the airport and right on the coast. Ideal for the first days to escape the madness of Dakar. Free Internet access.

name: Hotel de Paris
overview: Private bathrooms, cable TV, telephone, air-conditioning.

name: Konig Hotel Restaurant & Café
overview: Room rates include breakfast.

name: Millennium Kebon Sirih
overview: The recently renovated hotel has wonderful views of the Sudirman and Thamrin skyline. Close to Tanah Abang and Monas. Has Japanese restaurant, and Café Sirih that serves Indonesian and Chinese food.

name: Al Wehdeh Hotel
overview: Great Hotel, but a little run down but by far the cheapest and nicest owners in town.  Nice garden and good hot water.

name: Park Hotel
overview: Park Hotel is one of the oldest boutique hotels in Finland. It is located in Art Nouveau building, built in 1902, situated right in the heart of Turku, only a short walking distance from the Market Square, close to the train station and the Turku Art Museum – yet it is in the middle of a park, overlooking a genuine cultural city landscape.

name: Maan-Soor Hotel
overview: Slightly closer to the city centre than the Ambassador, and also of Western standards. Has a restaurant, cafe, Wi-Fi and a sports centre, all set in sprawling grounds. Staff can organise flights and visas. Be aware, there is a similarly named hotel in [[Berbera]].

name: Chisun Hotel Ueno
overview: Staff aren't too good with English - expect to know some Japanese if staying here.

name: St Christopher's Village
overview: Youth Hostel with late night bar.

name: Idlewilde Campground
overview: This site is known for its beautiful scenery and is a good birding spot. Best suited for tents or pickup trucks, although trailers up to 16' are permitted. Drinking water from April - October.

name: El Hostal de Jackie
overview: Backpacker Hostal with dormitories and private rooms. Kind and helpful staff. Each bed has its own fan (can be noisy at night) in 12-bed dorm. Small but nice swimming pool on the ground floor. Price starting from $ 21,000 COP in low season ($28,000 COP in high season). Terrace Bar with Satellite TV and a hammock on the top floor. Wifi and 2 computers with internet. Kitchen available. Close to the beach (5 minutes walking). Laundry service. Checkout 11 p.m.

name: The U Prince
overview: Comfortable beds and beautiful marble bathrooms. The terrace bar has a view of the city and Old Town Square.

name: Hotel Novotel Paris La Défense
overview: A rather generic, modern Novotel, with "executive rooms" providing global standards, and the regular rooms the standard French Novotel fare with toothpaste-inspired bathroom fit-outs. Some rooms (available at a small extra) provide views over the river Seine.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Rochester
overview: A nice hotel with an incredible six-story glass arboretum (the hotel was called the "Holidome" when it was a Holiday Inn). Well worth stopping in just to see the foliage and landscaping inside. Non-smoking only.

name: Hotel Ulanskaya
overview: Hotel Ulanskaya is located along quiet and picturesque Ulansky Lane. It offers guestrooms, all of which have LCD TV with local and international channels, Internet access, and IDD Telephone. Some of its amenities are airport and city transfers, restaurant and bar, and room service.

name: Hotel Habana Riviera
overview: Paseo and Malecón, Vedado. Located along the Malecon, Havana's waterfront boulevard, this elegant hotel is considered a classic among Cubans. Its proximity to the historical-cultural center of Havana, makes this hotel the perfect place from which to explore the city. In the night time the Riviera offers excellent entertainment featuring both the exclusive Copa Room Cabaret and one of Havana's top restaurants.

name: Savoy Boutique Hotel
overview: The Savoy is the most upmarket property among those operated by the local company Tallinn Hotels. The large building stands out among its Old City surroundings, while the interior is appointed in a simple and conservative style. Due to the limitations of the historic buildings, some rooms, especially singles, are rather smallish.

name: Hotel Sunshine
overview: Nearby station.

name: Comwell Holte
overview: A 87 room hotel and conference centre in green surroundings, mainly catering to business customers, but private guests are welcomed. Nice and modern rooms, and a big terrace for outdoor dining and drinking in summer.

name: Oasis Hotel
address: Jl. Raya Gantung no. 1 Manggar, Damar
overview: Basic hotel at the east coast, close to the Burung Mandi Beach.

name: El Greco Hotel
overview: 3 star hotel in the heart of Thessaloniki. Free Parking lot, VIP taxi service and free WiFi.

name: Chintheche Inn
overview: Located on the beach at Lake Malawi. All rooms are on the beach and overlook the lake. It's all inclusive, so food is included in your stay. It's decorated with local crafts and masks, rooms are colored with bright shades. There is a pool, bar, restaurant, and activities like kayaking and snorkeling. Room rates are per person. It's owned by the Wilderness Safari company.

name: Sokos Hotel Hamburger Börs & City Börs
overview: Formerly the ''Grand Hotel Börs'', this hotel dates back to 1904 and the Hotel restaurant is even older few years older than that. This hotel remains a solid choice: The complex now has twin hotels diagonally across from each other, with the City Börs rooms being cheaper and simpler, but the combined reception is in Hamburger Börs. The entire complex has no less than 9 restaurants, bars and clubs, making this a popular nightspot among the locals. Hotel services include indoor pool and sauna. Good discounts are often available if you book a package together with the ferry companies.

name: Spencer Canyon Campground
overview: 68 first come first served sites. No RV hook-ups available, fire pits, grills, and tables are available at the sites. All campgrounds have potable water and vault toilets.

name: Amber Retreat
overview: Vacation home, rated 4-star by Canada Select. Two large bedrooms with en-suite bath accommodate up to four people. Living/dining room, library/TV room, wireless high speed Internet, full kitchen (with dishwasher), laundry. Modern interior, traditional salt-box exterior with generous wrap-around decks.

name: The Donatello
overview: 94 deluxe rooms, the most spacious accommodations in San Francisco. Elegantly decorated with original Italian art, Travertine marble, Venetian glass and European antiques.

name: Villa Gaidello Bed & Breakfast
overview: A large farm and estate of renovated farmhouses dating back to the 1700-1800s, surrounded by lush grounds and trees.

name: Harry's, El Escondite
overview: Free Surfboards & Bikes! Harry's El Escondite is a secluded 4-plex of studio-apartment style cabinas in Playa Tamarindo, Costa Rica and is a favorite 'hideout' for both returning surfers and first timers. These vacation rentals have accommodations for individuals or groups up to 8 people and host many annually returning clients. A surf guide and lessons are also available for visitors new to the area and/or surfing. Harry has been a local in Tamarindo Beach since 1995 and is very familiar with the surrounding areas and attractions. The kitchens are fully equipped with stoves, ovens, microwaves, coffee makers, toasters, all cutlery and cooking utensils. The hotel is located at the end of a quiet and private dead-end road; just a short walk to the famous surf breaks and the conveniences of downtown Tamarindo. A pool, lounge chairs and hammocks round out a great place to hangout and relax after surfing. On the 2nd floor is a large sundeck for BBQ's, dining and entertaining. Hotel services available include laundry facilities, phones and wireless internet access and a large media collection. El Escondite also has private, off-street parking for guests.

name: Vientiane Backpackers
overview: Dorm only backpackers with aircon, lockers and free breakfast.

name: Belmare Corfu hotel
overview: A friendly family run hotel close to Avlaki beach of Corfu island.

name: Gym Club Suites
overview: Located in the quiet part of historic Bisbee, just steps away from downtown Main Street. Public parking areas are conveniently available for the guests. Each unit at Gym Club Suites has a unique floor plan and furnishings. All have private bathrooms and fully-equipped kitchens including microwave ovens, toasters, coffeemakers, as well as hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. It also offers free cable TV and in-room wireless internet service. An on-site laundry facility and elevator are also available. It's a great place for a longer stay with weekly.

name: Fiesta Americana Centro
overview: Modern high-rise hotel next door to Howard Johnson, on Plaza Hidalgo and Morelos, next to Macroplaza. Outstanding location, first-class room, excellent service.

name: Hepingli Hotel
