address: Xinghua Road, Hepingli (和平里兴化路; Hépínglǐ Xīnghuàlù)
overview: Three star hotel. The cheapest rooms are quite small. Rooms with free internet. Business center, ticket office, fitness and sauna available. Chinese restaurant. This hotel should not be confused with the more up-scale ''Beijing Hepingli Hotel''.

name: Hotel Viger Bed & Breakfast
overview: A clean modern, comfortable room with color cable-TV, telephone, air conditioning, hair dryer, fridge, private bathroom, continental breakfast and high speed wireless internet.

name: Holiday Inn Express
overview: Complimentary breakfast. Pool. Pets allowed. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi internet access.

name: Sanctuary Hill Retreat
overview: Sanctuary Hill Retreat provides Bed & Breakfast accommodation located in the Manning Valley.  Located twenty minutes off the Pacific Highway at Nabiac. Guest accommodation has been specifically designed for couples but able to cater for a maximum of four guests. Children are welcome, however accommodation may not be suitable for young children, as the second bedroom is separated from the main dwelling by a breezeway.

name: Holiday Inn Eurotel
overview: Pleasant moderate hotel on outskirts of Saltillo. Off-street parking makes it a good bet for motorists. TranVia trolley stop.

name: Novotel Berlin Mitte
overview: The only hotel on Museumsinsel|lat=52.51316 | long=13.40520

name: Park Hyatt Zurich
overview: expensive but has a very nice room and spa there is a casino too

name: Naantali Camping
overview: A camping ground half a kilometer from the city center operated by the city's tourist office.

name: Courtyard Tempe Downtown
overview: 10 minute free shuttle ride from your flight into Sky Harbor Airport. From there you are just blocks from downtown Tempe and Arizona State University.

name: Hotel Romai
overview: Many sporting available for extra costs tennis, kayak-, canoe-rent, minigolf.

name: Hotel Vintage Plaza
overview: Luxury hotel with free daily wine tasting in the lobby.

name: Park Plaza Riverbank
overview: Stylish and reputable.

name: Cantiere del Lago
overview: Open from 1st April to 30th September, the camping has got a restaurant.

name: Gästehaus Talbach
overview: The familial bed and breakfast has a bit outdated decor, but is located directly inside Schladming next to the river. Breakfast is included.

name: Casas da Mata da Cerca
overview: Offers lodgings all equipped with television, living area, dining area, kitchen, and a private toilet and bath. Some of its facilities and amenities are children play center, garden, parking, golf, trekking, and tennis.

name: Annville B&B
overview: Quiet and nice B&B in the outskirts, friendly and helpful landlord, complete Irish breakfast. Unlike advertised, not all rooms are ensuite, and the common bathroom is aging but otherwise the facilities are quite fine.

name: Hotel Canari de Byblos
overview: A new boutique hotel in the heart of modern Byblos constructed in 2008, it has been featured in the New York Times as a "better option" to stay at in Byblos. Only 5 walking minutes away from the old city, it features rooms that overlook the whole city and the Mediterranean Sea.

name: Ananab Guesthouse Rio
overview: On a quiet street in a historical house built in 1917. Although it's location is in the middle of the city, you feel as if you are away from it all with views of the Statue of Christ the Reedemer, Sugar Loaf Mountain and the Atlantic Forest.

name: Grand Hotel du Niger
overview: Four-star hotel. Some rooms renovated, magnificent view over Niger river and the city of Niamey. Air-con. Great jazz and brochettes on Thursday and Sunday nights.

name: Premier Inn Birmingham Broad Street (Canal Side)
overview: This Premier Inn serves the ICC and faces a canal.

name: Mango Tree Villas
address: 4 km or about 7 min from the airport
overview: 1 and 2 bedroom villas with private swimming pool and garden located in Jimbaran village. 350 m to the beach and 100 m to the market and main temple. Breakfast and daily cleaning included.

name: Rendezvous Grand Hotel Auckland
overview: Four star plus hotel, 452 guest rooms and suites, 2 restaurants and 1 bar, 16 function rooms, perfect for business and leisure travellers.

name: Tourotel Wien Hotel
overview: A nice hotel. There are often specials.

name: Hotel Amager
overview: Modest two star hotel, fairly centrally located near the bridge to Christianshavn. Rooms can seem a bit antiquated, but the staff is nice and there is free internet.

name: Montien Hotel
overview: Built at the same time as the Dusit Thani Hotel and looks like it. Some rooms offer a clear view (and muffled noise) of Patpong, immediately opposite, a fact which seems to account for much of the clientele. While in a nice traditional style, the rooms are somewhat overpriced though.

name: Hotel Tavria
overview: Old building, but after recent renovation. Spacious rooms. Not that quite conveniently located.

name: Bonita Canyon Campground
overview: A surprisingly pleasant campground. Reservations are ''not'' accepted for the 22 spaces at this campground; it's first-come, first-served, and busiest during March and April when it's usually full every night. Vehicles must be no longer than 29 feet.  :If your vehicle is too large, or if the campground is full (not unlikely on weekends during peak periods such as spring break), try one of the campgrounds in neighboring '''[http://www.fs.fed.us/r3/coronado/forest/recreation/camping/campground-guide.shtml Coronado National Forest]'''; the Rustler Peak campground is agreeable and is fairly close to Chiricahua. (Check carefully on campground locations; Coronado is a large, sprawling place, and some of the campgrounds are definitely ''not'' close to Chiricahua.)

name: The Balmoral Guesthouse
overview: A recently modernised basic but cheap guesthouse across the road from Gillingham station. No meals, but many rooms have a fridge and hob for cooking.

name: Hotel de Geneve
overview: 5 minute walk from Cornavin Station.4 bus stops away from St. Pierre Cathedral.

name: Hotel Garni Eden
overview: In this family-operated hotel, guests will find modern and elegant rooms as well as a quiet residential location and every desirable convenience.

name: The Opal San Francisco
overview: An elegant 5 story hotel that was built after the 1906 earthquake, it has 164 guest rooms. They have a gym, laundry facilities, and all access to free wi-fi.

name: Holiday Inn Express Minneapolis Downtown
overview: Within walking distance of Nicollet Mall and the convention center.

name: Apartments Casa Alpina
overview: New cmnfortable apartment (80m2) for 6 persons. Quiet location near center of Bovec. Spacious living room with balcony and internet corner, 2 bedrooms, garden.

name: King Edward Hotel
overview: The King Eddie, how the locals like to call it, is at the most central point in Banff. The hotel offers private rooms with all major amenities, like free wireless internet, in-room coffee and tea, private bathrooms, 32" flat screen cable TV etc. and concierge service is available at the front desk.

name: Saboia Hotel
overview: Renovated in 2008 and pretends to be very up-to-date, but not very successful in hiding how 1980s it really is (especially in breakfast, which is average at most). Receptionists are very helpful, including restaurant recommendations. Private pool with most balconies facing it. Some rooms are without seaview or even a balcony. Breakfast 7:30AM-10:30AM. 15min pleasant walk to Cascais along the coast (which is comfortable with a stroller).

name: Stayokay Stadsdoelen
overview: Stayokay operates a network of 27 hostels in the Netherlands, and is the Dutch affiliate of Hostelling International. A little smaller than Stayokay Vondelpark, this location does not take groups. Free WiFi and pay internet terminals. Free security lockers are provided in the hallways outside the dorms.

name: Intourist Palace
overview: Grand, spacious with all amenities.

name: Hotel Pyramide
overview: Hotel Pyramide is a small, but luxury hotel, about 5 km out of the center of Kinshasa. All rooms have a bathroom with Jacuzzi, warm water, hairdryer and a Fridge. In March 2008 however, there was only cold water available and in insufficient quantities to take a proper shower or bath. Most rooms are very spacious (some are like a small apartment) and dispose of flatscreen TVs and one or two air-conditioning units. The hotel has no fax. Internet was said to be available but was this not tested (there was a PC at the reception desk with internet connection, but not for residents). The hotel also has an e-mail address, but the on-duty receptionist was unable to access it.

name: Rose Canyon Campground
overview: RV Camping is 22 feet and less. No hook-ups. Tents, trailers to 22' and small motor homes permitted. Drinking water and toilets available.

name: Khaosan Palace
overview: A fairly basic guest house right in the middle of the action with an impressive Thai-style entrance and rooftop pool. The rooms are a bit on the small side, but always clean and include cable television, cold or hot shower and air-conditioning or fan. The pictures on their website do seem nicer than they are in reality though. Big downside of this hotel is the noise from nearby cafes, expect excessive noise till about 04:00 if your room is at the road side.

name: Washington Hotel Plaza
overview: Basic Western-style rooms with wireless Internet; nothing out of the ordinary, but it has a coffee shop and a restaurant on the premises.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Luxembourg City
overview: A modern Park Inn in the vicinity of the train station with one of the most consistent applications of the brand's basic colours scheme, down to the coffee cups.

name: Hostelling International San Diego-Downtown
overview: Located in Gaslamp Quarter, clean, friendly, offering 24-hour desk service, free breakfast, laundry facilities, lockers, and wifi. This hostel is part of a non-profit organization, HI-USA. The only hostel in this area to offer air conditioned rooms with iPod dock alarm clocks. Also offers free activities including: Walking tours, pub crawls, a screen printing workshop and bicycle tours. In addition there are three donation based dinners offered per week.

name: Harris Hotel & Conventions Kelapa Gading
address: Jl. Bulevar Kelapa Gading Blok M
overview: The best hotel within the Kelapa Gading area. Modern and minimalist style interior with a sense of orange, in both the rooms and the public areas. Decent restaurant and swimming pool. Direct access to Mal Kelapa Gading.

name: Musch Camp
overview: A small, primitive campground 1 mile north of the Entrada Road entrance to the Park.

name: Bellahøj Camping
overview: As cheap as it gets, and as close as it gets to the city center for camping. The camping ground has a small shop, and rents out bikes for 65 Kr/day. Only open in summer (July 1st-August 31st).

name: Green Tulip Guest House
overview: Guesthouse with a roof-top garden, Internet café, and large screen TV in the lobby. Beautifully decorated and designed with elegant wood floors throughout the building. Choice of fan and air-con rooms with shared or private bathrooms.

name: Peppersauce Campground
overview: This picturesque campground is located on the northern slope of Mt Lemmon. Toilets and water, no hookups, RVs up to 22'.

name: Chateau d'Ouchy
overview: It's a still a castle, freshly renovated.  On the downside the prices have been elevated into the stratosphere making what was formerly a deal into a splurge.  Of course it still has the magnificent view of the Vaudois alps.

name: Grand Mir Hotel
overview: A four star luxury hotel for business travellers. Wi-Fi. Rates include fitness centre and a healthy breakfast.

name: Södergarn
overview: In a rural area 15 minutes from Stockholm city center.

name: Blue Lime
overview: 14 rooms with a lush exotic garden and a saltwater swimming pool. The rooms, garden and pool are modern minimalist, with concrete furniture. Free 1 Mb/s Wi-Fi. Its sister property is The Pavilion.

name: Kent Springs Cabin
overview: A 6-room cabin restored by the National Forest Service and available to rent on a nightly basis. The fully-furnished and equipped cabin is located in juniper and oak woodland by a creek, and can accommodate up to 8 people. Reservations can be made [http://www.recreation.gov/camping/Kent_Springs_Cabin/r/campgroundDetails.do?contractCode=NRSO&parkId=72773 online], or by calling the number above.

name: Bays Inn & Suites
overview: Hotel in Baytown TX. Free High Speed Internet, Free Micro/Fridge, Free Coffee/Juice,Continental Breakfast including cereal, hot waffles Pool, BBQ Grills, Meeting Room, Free Cable with HBO/Starz/Encore, Free Newspaper, Coin Laundry. Fitness Center.

name: Oceana Santa Monica
overview: Located on Ocean Avenue, Oceana Santa Monica is a boutique hotel featuring a restaurant open only to guests.

name: Ciputra
address: Jalan Letnan Jenderal S. Parman, Jakarta 11470
overview: The first giant hotel you'll encounter when you make your way to the city from the airport. Get the room on the right wing (as you face the hotel) for a city view. The Cabana Suite is suitable for a family as it includes a Nintendo Wii, as well as a direct access to the pool. Artsy style restaurant and a bar beside the pool. Attached to Citraland Mall or within walking distance to Central Park or Mal Taman Anggrek.

name: Baan Thai
overview: This is a typical guesthouse, with a restaurant and a number of rooms available. Rooms contain a fan and share a bathroom, with hot water available.

name: Hostel Avantage
overview: 7 min from metro, free WiFi, fridge, microwave.

name: 987 Prague Hotel
overview: Skype: hotel987prague1. Just for €1 more get free phone calls to Europe. Free internet.

name: Rock Lane Resort and Marina
overview: Rock Lane Resort and Marina is a family vacation destination with an island attitude. Lakeside on Table Rock Lake, families can rent boats, kayaks and SUPs (stand up paddleboards) from the public full service marina. Other options include lake cruises, scuba diving, fishing, and outdoor swimming pools.  Charlie’s Steak, Ribs and Ale is a full service family dining restaurant with an outstanding lake view. The outdoor tiki bar also has food, drinks, and live entertainment on weekend nights. There is a courtesy boat dock for lakeside dining guests.

name: Hotel Auriga Milan
overview: The Auriga is a four-star hotel right in front of the central train station of Milan. It has 52 bedrooms, all with private bath, shower, TV and internet connection.

name: Asian Hotel
overview: Basic facilities. One of the older bigger hotels from several decades back.

name: Ichie
overview: An upscale ryokan with onsen.  Large rooms can be reserved for enkais.

name: Sofitel Vienna Stephansdom
overview: The spectacular Sofitel, towering over the Donaukanal is one of the few tall buildings with direct view of the Innere Stadt and the towers of Stephansdom. Designed by the famed architect Jean Nouvel, it became a landmark itself, especially for the spectacular painted and lit ceilings over the 5th and top floors. The glazed Le Loft restaurant is visible from afar in the night and offers brilliant views throughout the days and nights so much that it is hard to get a table on most evenings.

name: Dauphine Orleans Hotel
overview: An unforgettable hotel in the heart of the French Quarter. Its historic townhouse walls and a palm-filled courtyard surround you with luxury in a bed-and-breakfast atmosphere.

name: Blakes Hotel
overview: A fashionable small ''couture'' luxury 5-star hotel respected for client privacy.

name: Mercure Budapest Museum
overview: ***104 rooms (Standard rooms and Privilege rooms with Air conditioning, Wi-Fi, Work desk, Minibar), Keycard-operated door, wake up service.

name: HCC Covadonga
overview: Recently renovated. 2 km to Barcelona City Centre and only 1 km from Sants Rail Station.

name: Penzion San Marco in Mutěnice
overview: This family actually runs two penzions, one on the main road to [[Brno]] in '''Mutěnice''' at number 727 and the other located on 'Vinařská 715' very near to the wine cellars in '''Mutěnice'''.  You will want to make reservations well in advance as it says on their website they want 20 days advanced notice with a deposit, although you may want to just contact them and find out if they have anything free several days ahead of time. The owner of the establishment speaks English.  They also rent bikes.

name: Hotel Deepak
overview: A/C and non-A/C rooms, lift, swimming pool, bar, Bengali/Chinese/Continental.

name: Alpesi Trimmel Guesthouse
overview: Self catering. Special guest kitchen with a fridge, an excellent restaurant is ~800 meters away. Open from 7:00-22:00. - Pizza, hot meals delivered to the house to order by phone. Smaller shops are nearby. 5:00-22:00 to open. Bicycle rental: +36 99-334-001, +36 20 93 57625, Alpine Taxi: +36 99 666666, +36 99 555666, Toll-free taxis: +36 80 626626. +mobil phones=+36 20 4253114, +36 70-3128475

name: Days Inn Oxford
overview: Functional chain motel in unromantic setting at motorway service station, but cheap and only half a mile from the route in an area where accommodation is thin on the ground.

name: Millennium Seoul Hilton Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel near the Central Railway Station and Namdaemun market. Shuttle buses from and to Incheon international airport. Stylish rooms, eight restaurants, various shops and services and an indoor tropical garden.

name: Vefa Center Hotel
overview: 24 rooms. Services: Air/con; Free in-room breakfast with menu; Cable and satellite TV; Free Internet (Wi-Fi), Underground Parking; Laundry; Transfer, rent a car; 24/7 presence of the staff, Security and video surveillance 24 hours; Daily room cleaning; Medical care; Mini bar.

name: Hotel Indus
overview: Sixteen rooms.

name: Omni Hotel at CNN Center
overview: The hotel is close to major sporting venues (the Georgia Dome and the Philips Arena) and has a view of the Centennial Olympic Park. They also host weddings!

name: Super 8 Motel
overview: Basic motel, good location, set back from road. Free wi-fi and breakfast, pool, pet-friendly. Clean. One of the better budget Super8 motels.

name: Eldorado Suites Hotel
overview: A former boarding house for miners, now converted into apartment suites. Pets accepted.

name: Grand Hotel Cravat
overview: Slightly worn but comfortable midrange hotel.

name: Nice Way Sintra Palace
overview: Recently opened in January 2011, Nice Way Sintra Palace is in a totally refurbished old palace house in the center of the mysterious and romantic town of Sintra.  The hostel offers private and shared accommodation, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a cozy living room which opens into a beautiful garden.  The hostel affords spectacular vistas of Sintra, crowned by two peaks, the Moorish Castle and Pena Palace.

name: InterContinental Doha
overview: Five minutes up the coast from the town centre and directly across the road from the seemingly never open Alladin's Kingdom amusement park. The pool and beach complex at are large, quiet and relaxing. The restaurants are nothing special, but the rooms are great and the nightlife decent.

name: Alpine Village Suites
overview: Lodging at Taos Ski Valley value-per-dollar is respective to the accommodation's proximity to the ski runs, but the Alpine Village is right at the foot of the runs, is reasonably priced, has large and comfortable rooms, and stays open in the summer -- great staff!

name: Danoya Villa
overview: 20 private villas of a mixed Mediterranean and Balinese style including 1-5 bedroom private pool villa, kitchen, all rooms have air-con and private bathroom. Walking distance to Batubelig beach. 24 hr reception and security. Room service available from 07:00-23:00.

name: Hotel Eldorado
overview: A former ''maison de rendez-vous'', a home to the kept women of the 19th century bourgeois. Now a very cute ''no'' star hotel, its charm more than makes up for what it lacks in amenities (who needs a TV in Paris anyway?). The staff is super friendly, the decor is garage sale chic, and there's a lovely courtyard that fills with neighbourhood hipsters on warm evenings. It also has a very good location & you can easily avoid the noise of Pigalle or Montmartre's high prices, but they're within stumble distance if you decide to explore. For early risers breakfast (€5, until 10ː00) is served in the attached restaurant/bar. Some English spoken, especially for those who pet the cat sprawled across the reception desk.

name: Llwyngwair Manor Holiday Park
overview: Llwyngwair Manor Holiday Park is located at the foot of the Preseli Hills. It is overlooked by Carn Ingli Mountain and is bounded by the river Nevern. It stands out for its beautiful location and well kept grounds. The park offers hotel, self-catering, touring and camping accommodation. The park offers onsite fishing, tennis and a licensed bar (available to all) that provides bar meals and sky TV.

name: Thon Hotel Gildevangen
overview: The hotel is ideally situated in the middle of Trondheim, a short 300 metres walk from both the train- and bus station. Airport shuttle stops right outside the hotel from the airport.

name: Sonesta Hotel and Casino Cairo
overview: A 257-room 5-star hotel with a pool, casino, and full service spa.

name: Zaghro Hotel
address: 1.5 km sur la route de zagora, tabounte Ouarzazate, Ouarzazate, Morocco
overview: It is located a bit far from the village but is neat and clean, has a restaurant and a pool to enjoy after some time in the desert.

name: Hilton Düsseldorf
overview: Renovated traditional hotel in the north of Düsseldorf.

name: Hilton The Hague
overview: The Hilton’s 195 rooms are the most spacious in the city (minimal 32 m²). This Hilton is located in the historic centre, right next to the Panorama Mesdag.

name: Inn on Castro
overview: An upscale bed and breakfast in a restored house.

name: Maison Dupuy
overview: This hotel has a beautiful courtyard with a real New Orleans atmosphere; renovated historic homes surround what is now the courtyard with a fountain and pool.

name: Cafe de Patan
address: Patan Durbar Square, Mahapal Mangal Bazaar
overview: A centrally located guesthouse in a traditional Newari house. There are great views over the temples of Durbar square, and the dining room is a very pleasant area of foliage blended with stylish Newari decor.

name: The Regent Berlin
overview: Charlottenstraße 49. Former Four Seasons hotel now managed by the Taiwan-based Regent chain. Located next to Gendarmenmarkt near Unter Den Linden.

name: Sunset Bay Club & Seaside Dive Resort
overview: Sunset Bay Club is a cozy beachfront hotel which includes 8 double standard rooms, 4 quadruple standard rooms and 1 stand alone suite set among our lush tropical gardens.  We offer on-site restaurant, bar, dive center, pool and sauna.  You can choose from our all-inclusive or bed & breakfast plans to suit your needs.  Come join us for a quiet, relaxing vacation.

name: Wancheng Hua Fu International Hotel
address: 53 Donganmen Street, 北京东城区东安门大街53号
overview: Rather basic rooms, but clean with nice bathroom and TV (Chinese channels). Some staff had trouble speaking English but all were friendly. Excellent location close to Wangfujing shopping area, 10 min walk to Forbidden City.

name: Park Manor Hotel
overview: A family-run motel on the north side.

name: America's Best Value Inn & Suites Clarence/Buffalo East
overview: Free Wi-Fi, free local and long-distance calling to US and Canada, outdoor pool open seasonally. Guest rooms include microwave, mini-fridge, coffeemaker, cable TV with ESPN; suites include whirlpool tub. Pets welcome for a nominal fee.

name: Kristaly Hotel
overview: A Wellness hotel with hearty buffet breakfast in mediterranean restaurant, -in hotel’s NEW wellness center free use of bio Finnish- and infrared sauna, amethyst steam bath, jacuzzi, Himalaya salt room, relaxing area with music and sun terrace between 8.00-21.00 -free parking in front of the hotel, - free use of WI-FI Internet and safe in the guest room, - in summer use of outdoor swimming pool and children’s playground of the near Admiral Hotel***-Pension.

name: Spa Hotel Rantasipi Siuntio
overview: A large hotel with sports facilities. Originally built at as a rehabilitation center for disabled war veterans, in a post war architecture style featuring loads of concrete.

name: Hard Rock Hotel & Casino
overview: An entertainment resort located on 16.7 acres on the corner of Harmon and Paradise Road, inside the Paradise Corridor.

name: Mercure South Marston Hotel
overview: Hotel just outside Swindon with fully equipped gym and 23 metre indoor swimming pool, as well as health and beauty spa. Special Spa Break from £75.00 per person for one night including three course dinner, full English breakfast and choice of beauty treatment.

name: Hotel La Pace Forte dei Marmi
address: Via Nazario Sauro, 15 50042 Forte dei Marmi (LU)
overview: The hotel is 200 metres from the sea and in centre but still, its complete absence of noises and its big garden welcomes you in a very peaceful and dreamy environment.

name: Radisson Quad City Plaza
overview: A full-service hotel with indoor pool and fitness center, restaurant and lounge.

name: Hotel Capital
overview: Centrally Located in the historic district. Free Cable. Hot Water.

name: The Shaza
overview: Apartments with two or three beds and a duplex with three or four beds. Two pools. On the beach.

name: Fynbos Villa Guesthouse
overview: Rooms are clean and non smoking and in an idyllic location. Offering safe off street parking for guests, and a beautiful solar-heated swimming pool is available on premises.

name: Casa de Amistad
overview: Comfortable guest house with a communal kitchen, small but pretty pool, located in the middle of Isabel Segunda.  Not fancy by any means, but several steps above the youth hostel it used to be.

name: Heavenly Valley Lodge Bed & Breakfast
overview: Newly renovated, new beds, linens, furniture, decorations and amenities. In-room fireplaces, ceiling fans, flatscreen TV, with DVD player and library of 400+ complimentary movies, iPod docking stations, kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, private bathroom, free Wi-Fi, complimentary breakfast. We also have 4 outdoor patios, with a large open park with outdoor games, and the property is off the beaten track, set back amongst tall Pines. Close to great restaurants, the lake, Casinos, shopping, golf etc. Dogs welcome. The Heavenly shuttle bus stops right outside the property offering Ski-In/Ski-Out convenience for skiiers and snowboarders.

name: Dogtown Lake Campground
overview: Open May 1 - Sep 30, this campground is maintained by the Kaibab National Forest Service. Drinking water, vault toilets, no hookups.

name: Inn at Northrup Station
overview: Boutique all-suite hotel with modern decor, a rooftop deck, and kitchens.

name: Thon Hotel Trondheim
overview: You will find the hotel in the middle of the historic district in Trondheim, only 50 metres from the town square. The airport shuttle bus and most of the public transportation stops close to the hotel.

name: Hotel Makár
overview: Most of the rooms can have spare beds so the biggest capacity reaches 100. All the rooms are at high standard, equipped with modern furniture, bathroom, air-conditioning, minibar, cable television and telephone.

name: Piapi Beach
address: along the coast, north of downtown
overview: A beach area with several budget places

name: Charlesmark Hotel
overview: In some ways, the Charlesmark resembles what the W chain would be, if it had ''taste''. Rooms are generally quite small, but comfortable: so efficiently designed, they ''seem'' far more spacious than they actually are. Complimentary Continental breakfast is limited, but a 7-Eleven around the corner can fill in any gaps, and there are plenty of good restaurants nearby. Half a block from the nearest Westbound Green Line station (Eastbound is directly across the street), and the Orange Line, and Back Bay Amtrak are within easy walking distance, even with luggage. Nice people. Complimentary Internet-connected computer carrels available in lobby; complimentary WiFi throughout.

name: El Rancho Robles
overview: A historic guest ranch operating since 1923.

name: Nadia hotel
overview: three-star hotel. 380 beds, 244 rooms

name: Mall Costanera Center
overview: The first six floors of the Gran Torre Santiago hold the newest mall in Santiago. A gigantic food court, movie theater, supermarket and stores like Banana Republic, H&M, Zara, NTS. Also restaurants and cafes like Crepes&Waffles, Hard Rock Cafe, and Applebees.

name: Hotel Florence
overview: The Hotel Florence is in northeastern Milan, easily reached from the Centrale station, with excellent public transport services (subway, street cars and buses) and full of attractions.

name: Pocitos Hostel
overview: In nearby Pocitos, a beach suburb,is a purpose built hostel with free breakfast, Internet, kitchen, fireplace, backyard and the most friendly and helpful staff. They have bicycles for hire, don´t miss the bike ride from Pocitos to Carrasco (45 minutes) or Pocitos to Escollera, Old Town, 20 minutes.

name: HI-Bonavista
overview: The hostel can be accessed year-round 7AM-11PM daily.

name: HI-Mont-Tremblant Hostel
overview: With only 70 beds and a lovely fireplace, the HI-Mont-Tremblant hostel is warm and cosy. It offers shared and private rooms, a cafe-bar on-site which serves microbrewery beers, a common kitchen, free wifi access, bike rental and different organized activities.

name: Houng Heung Guesthouse
overview: This is a colonial styled three storey guesthouse with clean basic rooms and great balconies for relaxing. Rooms have 24/7 electric hot water, Wi-Fi and fans. English speaking staff.

name: Hotel La Tour Birmingham
overview: This stylish hotel caters for the luxury end of the four-star market, with an a la carte restaurant with open kitchen and in-room "media hubs" that let one connect their devices to the room's display and sound facilities.

name: Molde Hostel
overview: Open only in the summer months (approx. June–August).

name: Apple Suite B&B
overview: Full apartment, gentle host, in the heart of city center.

name: Izaak Walton Inn
overview: Originally built as accommodation for railway personnel on the adjacent Great Northern Railway. Still retaining the railroad ambiance, guests may choose from two floors of warm, inviting rooms, from $100 per night, or choose to lodge in a converted railroad caboose. An exceptional dining room is available, with many local specialties prepared to order. The Bison Hash & Eggs at breakfast is a favorite. Rental vehicles are also available from the desk. The Izaak Walton has its own Amtrak stop, served by the Chicago-Seattle-Portland ''Empire Builder'' daily.

name: Bluey Motel
overview: We are a small 10 room locally run Motel located near the center of Lightning Ridge.

name: Sofitel Legend The Grand
overview: The Sofitel has views on the canals. Weather permitting, lunch is served in the courtyard.

name: Hostel Maya
overview: Quality, inexpensive hostel in La Paz with very friendly, helpful, bilingual staff. The terraces have a fantastic view of the city, and they're located in the best neighborhood near all the bars, museums, restaurants, and great events.

name: No. 11 Cadogan
overview: This designer hotel and private club is arguably London's finest couture space with its beautiful facilities and impeccable service.

name: Nyva
overview: 88 beds, 36 rooms

name: Comfort Hotel Malmö
overview: In a refurbished building north of the Centralstation, with an impressive gym in a historic room with gilded pilasters! Economy rooms are rather small (12 sqm) and basic, while Standard rooms (17 sqm) feature the tasteful modern decor prevalent across the hotel.

name: Francisco Bay Inn
overview: Located conveniently on Lombard St and has newly renovated rooms. All of the rooms and hallways are 100% non-smoking. Free parking.

name: LUXX
overview: This boutique hotel offers the holistic concept with its 13 individually designed rooms and suites. Rooms are designed as studio units equipped with cable television, coffee and tea making facilities and mini bar. Suites are structured as one bedroom units with stylish outdoor views, LCD-television, personalised DVD players, mini-kitchen and sofa corners. All rooms have Wi-Fi, and bathrooms with hot and cold water.

name: Hotel N'vY
overview: Modern & renovated mid-class hotel. Internet is included and good location close to the lake.

name: Copenhagen Airport Hostel
overview: A homey, if a little run down hostel. It is run by two young guys, with downtown just 15 minutes away by the metro (which is 30 Kr each way, unless you buy a discount card). Also note that they charge excessively for renting out linen.

name: Ard Cill
overview: Peaceful setting, yet only a 5min drive to Swords Village and 10min drive to Dublin Airport. Surrounded by several recreational activities, such as horse-riding, golf and many more. Spacious rooms. Tea & Coffee making facilities.

name: RIA Hostel
overview: 3 rooms / 6 beds

name: Soyuz
overview: Located in a wood-park zone, 15min ride both from the international airport “Sheremetievo-2” and the centre. The hotel's accommodation facilities encompass 29 single rooms, 119 two-person and 10 two-room luxe, All of them are nicety furnished with Italian furniture and equipped with satellite TV.

name: Hyatt Regency Cologne
overview: 5 star hotel. 306 rooms and suites with views of the River Rhine. Host to gourmet restaurant "Graugans", 13 conference rooms and a spa.

name: Vila Vandrarhem
overview: Lilla Brotagan 11. Nice and clean hostel, reasonably low prices, friendly staff, free Wifi. They also have hotel across the street.

name: Baur au lac
overview: Perfect location at the lake, excellent restaurant, popular with actors, celebrities, and politicians.

name: Hotel Villa Magna
overview: A 5-star hotel on one of Madrid's most exclusive streets. 151 rooms and suites. The hotel is surrounded by landscaped gardens.

name: Comfort Suites at the University of North Texas
overview: Closest hotel to the University of North Texas.  A 100% smoke free hotel with large spacious rooms with either 1 King size bed or 2 Queen size beds that includes free wired and wireless high speed internet access.  All rooms include microwave and refrigerator along with a free hot breakfast 6:30AM-9:30AM.

name: Tre-Ysgawen Hall, Country House Hotel and Spa
overview: 29 rooms

name: Hotel Equatorial Penang
overview: On the east coast of Penang, convenient for the airport and its industrial area.

name: Billies Hostel
overview: Clean, spacious and friendly. Only downside is the distance from the center of town. Close to the rail and airport though. Good Internet access with free wireless and a few desktops scattered about. Each bed is assigned a daily chore.

name: The Inn by the Bandstand
overview: The award-winning Inn by the Bandstand is the premier lodging establishment in Exeter, New Hampshire. This wonderful inn is an 1809 historic home located in the heart of downtown Exeter. Only two blocks from the prestigious Phillips Exeter Academy, eight miles to the seacoast and beaches, and 20 minutes from Portsmouth, this charming inn offers nine antique furnished guest rooms, all with private baths and a delicious full breakfast. We have all the modern conveniences with a touch of the past including wireless internet!

name: Dessole Bella Vista
overview: 4* hotel.

name: TR Guest House
overview: Family-run guesthouse. Rooms with fan and air-con and bungalows with fan. All with private shower and toilet. Free Wi-Fi. Motorbikes for rent. Advice on touring the old and new city. Good for the price.

name: Suharevka mini-hotel
overview: Pleasant mini-hotel with nice location in the centre.

name: AMERON Hotel Ascot Cologne
overview: This 4-star hotel is located in the city centre, not far away from the cathedral and a 5-minutes walk from the Friesen quarter.

name: Panda Hotel
address: 205 Min Ye Kyaw Swa Rd, Lanmadaw Township
overview: Comfortable, if faceless, modern business hotel located at the edge of the city centre. You will need a taxi to get around (easily available in front of the hotel). Wi-Fi available in the lobby. Offers great views of the city, especially from the upper floors. All rooms have satellite TV, air conditioning and attached baths. A very popular place.

name: Arusha Backpackers
overview: A restaurant and a bar on the top floor of the hotel. An internet cafe on the top floor for quick browsing. The other facilities available are 24 hr hot water facility in the bathrooms, a TV room, a reading room and also a massage room. They charge around Tsh 40,000 for 1 hour of massage.

name: Old Faithful Snow Lodge
overview: This lodge is one of only two winter lodging options within the park. All lodging options have private bath including shower. The western cabins were built in 1989 while the frontier cabins are simpler. Open December through March and May through October.

name: Chai Country
overview: Secluded and quiet place. Original Thai bungalows with excellent food.

name: De Bourgondier
overview: This hotel has 13 rooms. It has a bridal suite for €125 with a view over the Grote Markt.

name: Casa Loma Inn & Suites
overview: Modern, log building.

name: Marriott Champs-Elysees
overview: Behind the ''fin de siecle'' facade on the Champs-Elysees hides a much larger, late 20th-century building housing almost 200 rooms decorated in a subdued, for a Marriott property, way.

name: Siam Royal View
overview: Villas & beach bungalows.

name: Hotel Isabell
overview: ****. In a quiet neighborhood room prices include the rich buffet breakfast, roofed, camera-secured parking place, Internet-connection in the room and sauna-use.

name: Hotel Le Moran Milan
overview: Le Moran is a four star hotel of Milan. The 80 bedrooms can be booked as single, double, triple and quadruple. Services available include the en-suite bath, shower, Jacuzzi, satellite TV, internet connection, conference facilities and restaurant.

name: Casa Sarandi
overview: Named after the atmospheric breakwater that makes the port of Montevideo one of the best in South America, offers guests a warm and inviting residential ambience with modern conveniences. A four-room guest house occupying the entire third floor of a 1930s art deco style residential building in the Old City, called Ciudad Vieja in Spanish, the heart of Montevideo's artistic and intellectual life since the 1800s.

name: X Hostel
overview: Bunstel & X Hostel have joint forces and therefore the place is under renovation. No date given for reopening

name: Imperial Riding School Renaissance Vienna
overview: This Renaissance is one of the Marriott properties scattered across Vienna, located in a renovated historic building of the former Imperial Riding School - not to be confused with the Spanish Riding School, which is far away from it. With an impressive interior and rooms appointed with decorations referencing the equine history, it surely does impress.

name: The Trout Farm
overview: A budget option, cabins cost about $10/cabin/night. Each cabin sleeps two people in single beds and as well as lovely log cabins there are hot showers. The paths leading out around the plateau pass by the camp, and although no food is available at this farm, it is only a short walk to the Ku Chawe Inn. Be warned, it can be fairly chilly at night, so wrap up warm!

name: Travellers Home
overview: Central location, clean, and good amenities. Wi-fi €5/day.

name: B&B
overview: Kanizsatourist Agency,  Fő út 13.  other B&B's: Kalmár u. 7. , Zrínyi Miklós u. 36.

name: Gawa Kanha Resort
overview: Spread over 40.2 acres, the Guava (called “Gawa” locally) orchard at Malajkhand is home to a wonderful biodiversity. The orchard contains 2200 fruit bearing guava trees. The orchard also houses a herbal nursery where many carefully selected medicinal plants are seeded and nurtured with immense care. The resort is also being developed into a complete biodiversity park, with a large variety of flora and fauna available on its campus. The resort is a marvel of energy conservation. Except for a little usage for some emergency needs, the resort is completely managed through its own renewable energy setup of full of solar powered plants. One can take beautiful nature walks or roam around to the nearest townships in its electric powered golf cars.

name: myhotel Chelsea
overview: Four star hotel on a quiet residential street on the doorstep of fashionable shops and minutes from South Kensington and King's Rd.

name: Rolleston House YHA
overview: One of two YHA hostels in the centre of Christchurch. Rolleston House has been converted from a characterful house.

name: Metropole Hotel
overview: Not quite as centrally located as some other hotels, but still quite near Old Town. All rooms have satellite TV, minibar, and WiFi.

name: Oatman Hotel
overview: Hotel supposedly haunted by several ghosts. As of December 2010 the hotel is undergoing renovation and closed to overnight guests, although the lobby and bar remain open.

name: Magic Bus Hostel Kiev
overview: Cozy and welcoming hostel within walking distance to the main street Kreschatik and railway station. Uniquely designed room. Professional & friendly staff.

name: Loch Fyne Hotel
overview: The hotel offers restaurant, leisure and spa facilities.

name: Hotel Artua'&Solferino
overview: Rooms for 1-4 people. Internet access and parking available.

name: Camping Lake Shkodra Resort
overview: Modern campsite 8km from Shkodra with Restaurant, Wifi and access to lake. Organises Tours to [[Thethi]]

name: Parkroyal Yangon
address: 33 Alan Pha Phaya Road, Dagon Township, Yangon
overview: A quality hotel with 272 rooms. La Brasserie Restaurant, Phoenix Court Chinese Restaurant, Shiki-Tei Japanese Restaurant, and the Lobby Bar. The well-known disco '''Music Club''' is in the basement.

name: The Riverpark Inn
overview: Near downtown, the Convention Center and close to the University of Arizona. Terrace Cafe on-site.

name: Grand hotel Praha
overview: Luxury hotel in a historical building. Rooms with a view of the Apostolic Clock and the Old Town Square.

name: Hotel Radiance
overview: Singles, doubles and triples, all with bathroom, cable tv and A/C. Half board and full board. Conference room and a la carte restaurant.

name: Kunigunda Turist Hotel
overview: Workers' accommodation, tourist and student accommodation. 211 beds, 3-4 beds with washbasin room, restaurant, bar, game room, parking, 24 hour reception.

name: My Khe Beach Hotel 1 and 2
overview: These hotels, both under the same management, are comfortable and very reasonably priced especially given that they are just the other side of the beach road from My Khe Beach, but still only a five minute or less moto ride from downtown. My Khe 1 is older, has smaller rooms, but the electricity does not go off in the room when you leave; My Khe 2 has very large rooms, caters more to groups of Saigon tourists (My Khe gets lots of Vietnamese business and government travellers, plus some tourists and some Lao visitors, business or government). Staff at both places are friendly and pleasant, with adequate English. The only downside is no in-room Internet access.

name: Kep Lodge
overview: Offering great views from the Deluxe bungalows down to the Gulf of Thailand. Thirteen private bungalows with hot shower, minibar, tea and coffee maker, desk and a big private terrace with a hammock and sofa - full breakfast included. A popular infinity salt-water swimming pool, free bicycles, fast & free WiFi all over the lodge, a book exchange and lots of games can be found at the Lodge. New first floor restaurant, with lounge. Has a lively bar, pool table and restaurant serving local and Swiss food. Can also be used as a meeting room. Outside guest can use their pool when consuming $5/person for free .

name: Hôtel Mansart
overview: This charming 3 star hotel is next to the Place Vendome and 2 minutes walk from the Opera Garnier and famous Parisian department stores. Antique furniture and paintings create an atmosphere of typical Parisian house.

name: Lapland Hotels Kilpis
overview: Hotel. Closed off season.

name: REST Hostel Tbilisi
overview: Has 6 beds and one extra bed. Luggage storage, 24 hour reception (you may need to call though), Internet, computers, free Wi-Fi in room, cable TV/DVD, free towels, linen included, air conditioning, guest kitchen, shared bathroom/shower, laundry. Car service 4WD, and can organize tours to the North-West. However, avoid their second, much more noisy hostel "Honey Hostel Tbilisi". +phone=+995 599 164249

name: Panoramic View Hotel
overview: Opened in Sep 2012. 35 ''en suite'' rooms without TV or phone or a closet to hang your clothes but satellite TV in the cave-like gloom of the reception area. Perhaps they did not install u-bends in the plumbing, as after using the shower and going off to breakfast, one may come back to a sewer smell in the bathroom. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Car park for 12 vehicles is guarded 24 hours. Brand new bus can carry groups of up to 20 people. Restaurant, laundry service, no standby generator.

name: Holiday Beach Budapest ****
overview: 68 rooms and suites and closed, guarded parking area. A unique service is its luxury yacht port.

name: Hôtel-Motel du Rocher Percé
overview: Open May-Oct. The Hôtel-Motel du Rocher Percé is another one of those places that falls in the gray area between a ''gîte'' and a small hotel: it has 16 rooms, far larger than most ''gîtes'', but the decor boasts far more character than your average hotel, and a hearty country breakfast is served daily. All of the guest rooms here contain a comfy double bed, a chest of drawers, wireless Internet access, and private baths (full bathrooms in most cases; the four second-floor rooms boast private half-baths and one shared full bath for showering). Most rooms also have ocean views and TVs with a remote control. Kitchenette suites and private cottages are available for those staying longer periods (3 or more nights and 6 or more nights, respectively; minimum stay requirements are sometimes waived during the shoulder season). On the ground floor is an art gallery that features solo and group exhibitions by artists from around the Gaspé region; there you can also buy crafts produced by local artisans, such as handmade pottery and fine silkware.

name: Beijing Saga International Youth Hostel
address: 9 Shijia Hutong, Nanxiao Street (南小街史家胡同9号; Nánxiǎojiē Shǐjiāhútòng)
overview: Very popular with backpackers. There's a restaurant on the top floor. The staff speak some English.

name: Castillo Surfista Hostel
overview: Opened by a California surfer in January 2012, this rapidly up and coming hostel is a new and rare accommodation that is located a short walk from everything, but the neighborhood is safe and quiet. Private rooms, shared dorms, surfing trips, in-house Spanish classes, and student housing in Santiago are available.

name: Days Inn
overview: More often than not, this is the cheapest place to stay in Chapel Hill if you don't know anyone to crash with. Basic chain accommodations. Near a few grocery stores and stops on the D/F bus lines, although this isn't a very walkable part of town.

name: Youth Hostel
overview: Bookings at Youth Welfare Dept, WB Govt, 32/1 BBD Bagh, Kolkata.

name: Renwick Mansion
overview: 8-room B and B. A contributing property in the St. Katherine's Historic District on the National Register of Historic Places.

name: The Townsend Hotel
overview: The Townsend, a European-style boutique hotel, provides Forbes 4-Star and AAA 4-Diamond luxury accommodations in Metro Detroit.

name: Hotel L'Aigle Noir
overview: Built in the fifteenth century, this former hotel was long the residence of the nobles who accompanied the court of the sovereign Kings of France. During the reign of Louis XV, this noble residence was gradually converted into a luxury hotel to accommodate tourists and visiting dignitaries in the historic city. It was later used by guests of the emperors Napoleon I and Napoleon III

name: Denvir's Hotel
overview: Small hotel with six bedrooms. Established as a coaching inn in 1642. Also has a pub and restaurant.

name: Beechfield House Hotel
overview: Accommodation comprises 24 bedrooms, which can accommodate families of up to five. Has a fine restaurant offering a private menu, with a selection of private dining rooms catering for special occasions. There are four fully-equipped meeting rooms, The Garden room, The Music room, The Library and The Card room, all of which can be set up as 'boardrooms' or as presentation 'theatres', the largest of which can accommodate up to 80 people standing or 70 dining. A beauty treatment room, outdoor heated swimming pool and its own small arboretum of rare trees in the grounds. Free Wifi available throughout the hotel

name: St. Sophia Hostel Kiev
overview: Located in the very centre in a quiet green area, with a view on Sophia Cathedral.

name: Rembrandtplein Hotel
overview: Friendly staff, bar open all night.

name: United-21 Paradise Ooty
address: Woodbrook, Ooty, The Nilgiris, Tamil Nadu - 643 224, India
overview: United-21 Paradise is hill resort in Ooty by Panoramic Group which offers budget cottages.

name: Andon Ryokan
overview: Run by the same family as New Koyo, this is a well-kept ryokan north of Ueno.

name: Villa Rainer
overview: Restaurant and hotel in old villa; open in summer or by request by groups.

name: Hotel Lasaretti
overview: One of the cheapest hotels in Oulu. Located in Hupisaaret, the recreational area of Oulu, just 1km from center.

name: Wild Spirit Lodge and Backpackers
overview: Backpackers Lodge and self-catering. Accommodation incl. Dorms, Doubles and Camping. Shuttle Service to all nearby attractions. BazBus stop.

name: Victoria Hotel
overview: - Swimming pool. +T: +380 62 3814777

name: Hotel Alba
overview: A nice, mid-range budget hotel. Half of the rooms face the lake, while the other half face the city.

name: Stayokay
overview: A hostel located in the north of Arnhem. It's near the hospital Rijnstate on a main bus route from the central station.

name: Fully Equipped Short Term Apartments
overview: Very central and in a good neighborhood. Perfect solution if you plan to stay for several days and want to have the comfort of your own home.

name: Sabang Inn Dive Resort
address: 200 m east of the ferry jetty
overview: Good value for the money, many packages to choose from. Located right at the beachfront in the quiet area yet just a minute walk away from the nightlife. it is a blend of perfect location with a beach front atmosphere - a friendly staff and, of course diving.

name: Old Penang Guesthouse
overview: Budget heritage hostel with a modern fit-out in a historic restored pre-war building. Wi-Fi, In-room air-conditioning, towels and simple breakfast are included. There is also a downstairs communal area with DVDs, TV and books. Laundry service is available for an additional charge. The staff are very friendly and happy to suggest places to visit around Penang.

name: Motel One Dresden an Zwinger
overview: The more expensive Motel One in Dresden is on the edge of Innere Altstadt, and indeed reasonably close to the Zwinger, even if you won't see it from most rooms. Like every other Motel One, it features modern design and a very predictable, standardized experience.

name: Mati and Roni's DeserTent Guest House
overview: A warm, relaxing stay in the cold desert nights. In the tent you can find mattresses, clean sheets, warm blanket and pillows for the price of ₪70 (the cheapest price in the area). You can also order hot meals (made by a chef, but as a home cooked food) for ₪60, or a desert breakfast for ₪50. They can also advise you on places to visit and give you safety tips on desert travel.

name: Bawa Watson Spa'o'tel
overview: An upscale new venue that's breaking the trend from the Sudder St backpacker tide.

name: Triangle T Guest Ranch
overview: Historic ranch which offers overnight accommodation (including for RVs and tents) as well as a restaurant and saloon. The ranch has been used as a filming location for movies, TV shows, and commercials.

name: Sum-Sum Valley, Janda Baik
overview: Sum-Sum Valley, Janda Baik.

name: Arène Kulm Best Western
overview: Four-star hotel.

name: The Best Inn
overview: Amenities include air-conditioning, telephone, internet connectivity, TV (Cable), laundry service, housekeeping, room service, continental breakfast. Deluxe Suite (King size Double Bed)/Deluxe Queen (Queen Double Bed)/Deluxe Twin (two single beds) rooms with attached bathrooms.

name: El Dorado Hotel
overview: Centrally located, the El Dorado Hotel is the most high end overnight property on the Square. Very modern rooms (27 in total) with free wifi, coffee/tea, and you even get your own reusable water bottle for your stay. A super hip solar-heated pool overlooks the restaurant and will make you feel like a star while those dining watch you sunbath.

name: Radisson Blu Iveria Hotel
overview: Glass tower overlooking the river. 249 rooms. The fanciest hotel in the city.

name: Hotel Sukhman International
overview: Rooms : 25

name: Hotel Centrum
overview: Once, it was considered the best hotel in the city, but today it has lost it glamour.

name: Hollow Stream Bed & Breakfast
overview: All rooms have en suite bath, TV, and free Wi-Fi.  Complimentary tea and coffee.  Free off road parking. Only 1 hr from Dublin.

name: Super 8 Motel Taos
overview: A typical Super 8, generic rather than colorful, but OK for a night's sleep.  South of the downtown area and a bit too far to walk, but satisfactory restaurants are nearby.

name: Castanea Hostel
overview: <br>A hostel in a quiet area.

name: Pen y Graig B&B and Holiday Farmhouse
overview: Self contained B&B apartment for 2 people sharing. Self catering Holiday Farmhouse to sleep 4 or 8. Pen y Graig is 500m from Church Bay beach and the Anglesey Coastal Footpath

name: Toipirka Youth Hostel
overview: Located outside the city, near Tokachigawa Onsen.

name: Brae Lea House
overview: A guest house with ensuite bedrooms about a mile from the ferry.

name: Maison Delmas
overview: Maison Delmas a Chambres d'Hotes and is in the village within easy walking distance of the ten restaurants in the village. It has four Bedrooms and a lovely garden overlooking the town for the guests to use.

name: Hotel Hindustan International
overview: Good location near Rabindra Sadan metro station. Good food. Five star rates.

name: Hotel De Keizerskroon
overview: Budget hotel, right in the centre of town.

name: Kensington House Hotel
overview: Boutique townhouse rooms and accommodation just off Kensington High Street.

name: Rome Armony Suites B&B B&B
overview: Elegant bed and breakfast. Recently refurbished, has six rooms, all with private bathroom and super-equipped with every comfort.

name: Tashkent Apartment
overview: A house with three separate bedrooms, owned by PageTour travel agency. Owners are very nice and helpful; no problem to arrange pickup from airport, book train tickets or help to change money on the market. Only downside that they do not provide registration slips for your stay (Aug 2012). (GPS N 41.17.02.2, E 069.15.44.1)

name: Swiss Hotel
overview: A charming, cozy, 22-room hotel located in the heart of Ottawa. The Inn was built in 1872 from limestone in a 19th Century Vernacular Classical Revival. Swiss Hotel offers traditional Swiss hospitality with modern comfort. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, rooms are equipped with iPads. Optional healthy buffet breakfast is offered daily with Bircher-Muesli and fresh ground Swiss espresso.

name: Green Bridge Hostel
overview: Cheap dorms in the winter, no bunk beds, unlimited free tea and coffee.

name: Mary’s nice place
overview: A very calm tropical lodge with several rooms, not far from the beach, but it's 15 minutes to walk to the city center.

name: Days Inn Hotel of the Arts
overview: North of Downtown surrounded by transitional neighborhoods and well-established and intriguing public housing projects. Discover concierge service and high speed internet.

name: Grand Hyatt Denver
overview: 512 rooms with city views. Features the Hyatt Grand Bed, free 24 hour fitness facility, indoor pool, room service around the clock, well-lit work stations and high-speed internet access.

name: Hotel del Coronado
overview: A massive luxury hotel; the architecture is remarkable, the lodgings less so.

name: Museum Hotel - Hotel de Wheels
overview: In one of the largest ever building relocations, this hotel was moved across the street in 1993 to make way for Te Papa museum.

name: Piedras de Afilar Art Hostel
overview: Art Hostel placed at the very centre of Montevideo. Includes breakfast. Wi-Fi, bicycles and kitchen available.

name: Hotel Manor Aurangabad
overview: Three star hotel

name: Grande Colonial Hotel
overview: A landmark, historic hotel overlooks the shores of the Pacific Ocean and ideally located just steps away from the beach.

name: Mercure München City Center
overview: Draped in shades of red, the Mercure provides a rather good experience compared with the chain's average, if you can live with the orange-tiled bathrooms.

name: B&B Hotel
overview: The opposite of what the words "B&B" usually mean - new, efficient and impersonal. About 1 km from the station in the direction away from the old town (it's walkable), in an industrial zone (across from a car dealership, between a NATO installation and a disused rail line), this concrete box with a free parking lot provides surprisingly quiet, modern rooms with all amenities (including free WiFi). For truly sociofobic (or after midnight) it is even possible to check in without interacting with staff - a terminal in the lobby will take your credit card and issue the code for opening your room door; when it's time to leave, there's no key to turn in. If bed (comfortable) and breakfast (uninspired; €8) is indeed all you're after, this is the place. Don't believe Google Maps - they will send you to the wrong end of Rudolf-Diesel St., and eat in town before heading home - there are no decent restaurants around.

name: Central Backpackers
address: On the main road between Q-Bar and the VIP bus stop
overview: In the centre of Vang Vieng and a 2 min walk away from the tubing starting point. It has clean, cheap and safe rooms (doubles, twins, triples & dorms) with safety lockers. Good food available, friendly English speaking staff and big chill out area with table football, dartboard, drinking-related activities, water pipes (shisha, hookahs, nargila) and regular screening of TV shows & live sports. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Ryokan Ōnuma
overview: This ryokan stands out from the crowd by offering eight separate baths to sample — one outdoors and many privately reservable.

name: Palo Santo Hotel
overview: Green and Design Hotel in Palermo Hollywood. 24 designer-decorated rooms and suites, each with a private balcony o terrace. Chef's restaurant, gym, spa.

name: Grand Mirage Resort and Thalasso Spa
overview: A five star beachfront Resort, offering stay packages and complete all inclusive.

name: Lynx Campground
overview: Open April - October, with picnic tables and grill rings, vault toilets, and drinking water. No hookups, trailers up to 40'. Reservations can be made [http://www.recreation.gov/camping/Lynx_Campground/r/campgroundDetails.do?contractCode=NRSO&parkId=110539&topTabIndex=Search online].

name: The Thomas Bond House
overview: This house was once home to Thomas Bond, who with Benjamin Franklin co-founded the Pennsylvania Hospital, the first hospital in Colonial America. Now a bed and breakfast, it has been rated one of the top 25 best historic inns by American Historic Inns. It over looks Philadelphia’s Independence National Historic Park and the Delaware River. It has lovely Colonial furnishings and bountiful breakfast. There is wine and cheese and cookies in the evenings.

name: Amarin Inn
overview: It is down a long alley — far away from the noise of the main street, but only a few minutes walk from the action. It is fairly clean and spacious rooms of an older style, all with air-conditioning and en-suite bathrooms. Guests are allowed onto the roof to look at the Bangkok skyline, a rarity in the area. Wi-Fi is available on all floors and there is a free internet terminal.

name: Puri Bagus Candidasa
overview: Sea view and tropical garden villas, 47-bungalow beachfront resort at east end of Candidasa beach.

name: Carpe Diem Guesthouse & Spa
overview: Small luxurious spa resort featuring 19 rooms, gourmet breakfast, daily wine & cheese hour, 24 hour espresso coffee and tea station and numerous amenities to pamper you during your stay. Clothing optional spa with Provincetown's largest steam room, Finnish sauna and Hydrojet spa tub and spa deck. Full spa menu offering classic massages, scrubs & polishes, energy work and Thai Massage.

name: Clepardia campsite
overview: Open 15th April - 15th October. Bungalow rental, free WiFi, swimming pool maybe. Good public transport connection to the centre, shops, restaurants and a park in the vicinity.

name: Richmond Hotel
overview: An upmarket business hotel with very modern finishings, located in the heart of Shianbashi—if you want to exploit the nightlife to its fullest and not worry about tram service ending, this is your place. Excellent English-speaking staff can assist with tourism inquiries.

name: Rama Garden Retreat
overview: 7 large separate rooms with King & Queen size beds have garden views. Each room has air-con, cold/hot water & Wi-Fi. Large private bathroom with semi open air concept. Restaurant and lounge area open 07:00-21:00 daily serving Juice,smoothies,and healthy vegan delight dishes. The perfect place to eat/stay/surf/freedive. Laundry, surfboard & SUP, motorbike & bicycle rentals, boat transfer available.

name: Fernie Stanford Resort Hotel
overview: Indoor aquatic center pool with water-slide, onsite restaurant, hot-tubs, 24hr fitness centre, banquet facilities, free high-speed Internet, pet friendly. The hotel also has 5 bedroom chalets available for rent.

name: Arabia Felix Hotel
overview: The in Old Sana'a is a cheap way to get a feel for the old city. Rooms are basic but the charm is in staying in an authentic old Yemeni town house. Breakfast and the courtyard garden are excellent. Prices weigh in at a hefty USD25 for a double room. Other hotels in the old town include the Daoud (David) and the Talha. All three hotels offer excellent views over the old town.

name: Hostellerie du XXVIe siècle
overview: The cheapest hotel in Nyon.

name: Voyager Beach Resort
overview: All-inclusive vacation village with three pools, tennis court, beach volley field, four bars and three restaurants. Rooms have A/C and satellite tv. They also arrange water activities such as windsurfing, diving and sailing.

name: Eszter Guesthouse
overview: Two 4-bedded rooms. Payment: Cash only payment option. - Services: high chair for child, covered terrace, heating, cot, children's pool, Paddling pool, babysitting, Hairdryer, introduction to the farm life, refrigerator, well equipped kitchen, outdoor games, dogs-cats are allowed, separate rooms for parents - children, parking in closed yard, sports equipment rentals, social games, television, fireplace, barbecue place.

name: The Lodge at Sonoma Renaissance Resort & Spa
overview: A contemporary resort and spa located just south of Sonoma Plaza. Beautiful and super modern, with a big pool spotted with cabanas, a great place to nurse a hangover after wine tasting, or to cater to your family when the kids just want to have fun. Pets are allowed with a charge, and internet is additional. They have two restaurants.

name: The Loews Ventana Canyon Resort
overview: This hotel is located at the foot of the Santa Catalina Mountains. There are a total of 398 rooms on three floors. There are two pools, five restaurants, a spa, running path, hiking trails, and there are many species of birds right outside your room on the side that looks out to the mountains. There are also two 18-hole golf courses nearby the hotel. There is free access to Sabino Canyon via a van; however, complimentary WiFi to their guests is not offered. Expect average daily rates for their standard rooms to cost $250 per night during the summer and convention seasons. Typically most guests are retirees without grandchildren - younger guests with children tend to stick out like a handful of sore thumbs.

name: The Rees Hotel
overview: Established nearly 150 years ago, this hotel has king-size beds, NZ wool carpet and heated floors in the bathroom.

name: Hostal del Campanero
overview: Fanatically clean and beautiful architecture. Great character and friendly staff. Only two showers for the whole hostel.

name: Hotel Nikko
overview: Swanky large hotel with a boutique feel and very large bathrooms. Rooms are equipped with high-speed Internet, stereos and large flat panel televisions, and you can ask for the few rooms with Japanese style amenities. There is also an indoor fifteen-meter heated pool, whirlpool and a 24h gym. Hotel dining includes restaurant [http://www.restaurantanzu.com ANZU], which serves fresh sushi and excellent steaks. Also located inside the hotel's lobby is the [http://www.therrazzroom.com Rrazz Room Theater], with nightly cabaret and R&B and the Imperial Club rooms on the top floors provide some great views of the city.

name: Cozy Nest B&B
overview: Wheelchair ramp at rear entrance. 15 min bus ride to Dalhousie LRT (tram) Station. River valley view. Western breakfast. Long stays available in winter months.

name: Espoo Camping Oittaa
overview: Slightly shabby, yet friendly place. Open from end of May to end of August. A nice beach at lake Bodom just some 200 m from the entrance.

name: Fjordkroen
overview: Newly renovated Inn, some would argue a bit too thoroughly, with great views over the fjord, but a fair bit away from the town itself. Rooms with private patios to enjoy the view, and a camping ground (which seems to be full year layovers only though). There is a nice beach nearby,

name: Atmosphère
overview: Bed and breakfast offers private rooms with shared bathroom. Gourmet three course breakfast included.

name: Savoy
overview: Good value money. Excellent location in a beautiful Art Nouveau building, but don't get too worked up over exteriors as the rooms are very basic, but still clean and totally adequate if you just need a bed, service is reported to be good.

name: Taitung Hotel for Teachers and Public Workers
overview: Not actually a hostel but a hotel, it is a affordable, clean and conveniently located downtown. Offers free bicycles to borrow.

name: Skansen pensjonat
overview: Small and cosy, with only seven rooms. Located near the funicular. Reservations are necessary.

name: Thobacts Hotel
overview: Probably the 5th best hotel in Tripoli. Granted there is a big difference between it and the nearby 5 star hotels mentioned above, but it is a fraction of the price. It has been renovated and the staff are very friendly and speak Good English. Internet and wifi services were previously available but of an erratic quality. If you are on business this can be frustrating but for the leisure traveller it should not cause you a problem.

name: Beija Flor
overview: Typical budget hotel in Catete district. The rooms have no exterior windows and just open into the hallway, so take a look before deciding.

name: Villa Dihovo
address: relaxing village Dihovo in the foothills of Mt Pelister
overview: Guest house. Offers a variety of home-cooked Macedonian specialties. Organize hiking trips and offer ski instruction for beginners. Rooms are poorly soundproofed though.

name: Merwebhotel Central Doha
overview: Five star hotel designed to meet the needs of business travellers through the use of innovative technologies and tailor made services adding a subtle flair of Qatari hospitality and heritage.

name: Au Ruisseau Jaseur
overview: Cottage rentals on the Lac Mégantic shore in Piopolis.

name: Leverick Bay Resort
overview: The only North Sound resort reached by road.  The '''Water Sports Centre''' offers snorkel equipment and boat rentals, charters and water sport activities.

name: Roses and Lace Bed and Breakfast
overview: This Victorian Queen Anne was built in 1890 and is now wonderfully restored to its former glory. Wide wraparound porches with rocking chairs and a view of the Rose Garden are perfect for relaxing away from the stresses of life. There are antiques throughout, free internet, complimentary snacks, three comfortable and lovely bedrooms, all with private baths.  A wonderful breakfast is served each morning-- Roses and Lace Bed and Breakfast is a refreshing place to stay!

name: Gail Motel
overview: Motel.

name: Hiltan Taba Resort
overview: Completely unmissable at 11 storey's height, a stark contrast from the rest of the desert Taba landscape. Includes a diving centre and a very popular casino.

name: NH Amersfoort
overview: Comfortable rooms and plenty of facilities, located a few minutes walk from the town centre and the train station. There is no private parking.

name: Camping Kastrum
overview: Services: waveless 25 m lenght swimming pool, pool for children, restaurant, grocery, ice cream parlor, playground, program organization.

name: Meridiano Sur, Petit Hotel
overview: Five double rooms and two singles with private bathroom, satellite TV and Wi-Fi. There is also a loft with room for five.

name: Hotel Qaanaaq
overview: Only hotel in town, has a handful of no-frill rooms and shared bathroom. If fully booked they can help out with arranging other accommodation. Boasts its own small restaurant serving up both lunch and dinner.

name: Hotel Napoleon Fontainebleau
overview: Until 1849, when the railroad arrived, this address was that of a coach house. The hotel has been repeatedly redesigned and renovated. For two decades, "La Table des Maréchaux", the restaurant of the Hotel Napoleon, has been under the care of Chef Antony Assis; it offers traditional French cuisine.

name: Iseo
overview: Not very big, it has a minimarket and a beach. Free Wi-Fi available.

name: Ritz-Carlton, Marina del Rey
overview: Guests enjoy ocean, marina or city skyline views from private balconies featured in every room.

name: Renaissance Malmo
overview: Boutique-style 5-star hotel from Marriott in a charming street right off the Lilla Torg. Uniquely for a Marriott property, the WiFi is free of charge.

name: Sokos Hotel Ilves
overview: Tampere's best known hotel, centrally located next to the riverside park.

name: Portola Inn & Suites Hotel - Buena Park/Disney-Anaheim Area
overview: Offers free wifi, comfortable accommodations, complimentary breakfast and is walking distance to many local restaurants.

name: Hampton Inn Cincinnati Uptown
overview: Hampton Inn which is right next to the University and a number of hospitals. Good option if you don't want to go downtown.

name: Best Western Zimmerhotel
overview: Medium size hotel, for business customers and tourists. Nice and big rooms. Breakfast only. No bar. Prices include use of the fitness center next door.

name: Hotel Friuli
overview: 3 star hotel with restaurant.

name: Courtyard San Francisco Downtown
overview: A Marriot with all the amenities that generally come with it.

name: Amethyst Lodge
overview: Motel with wi-fi; rooms are spacious, although rather dark, with clean bathrooms. Hot tub, conference facilities, lounge and restaurant. Includes buffet breakfast with fruit, cereals, bagels, muffins, croissants, many types of bread, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, sautéed potatoes, French toast and pancakes.

name: Grand Tashkent Hotel
overview: A two star hotel

name: Hotelli Iltatähti
overview: Has moved from central Tampere to Messukylä which is situated four kilometers away from Tampere downtown. It is specialized in long term accommodation but offers rooms on nightly basis also. Only four rooms.

name: ibis Budget
overview: Offers a standardized budget experience by providing the simplest possible ensuite rooms made to the usual ibis Budget standards.

name: Sanno Hotel
overview: In-room Wi-Fi provided at the more expensive rooms. Complimentary shuttle service to airport and shopping mall.

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Albany
overview: Well maintained standard Holiday Inn Express located just off of I-5 and next to the fairgrounds. Free breakfast, free wifi, and all the standard hotel room basics (tv, shower, bathtub, coffee machine). Free newspaper in the morning delivered to your door and suites are offered if you need something bigger. There is an indoor heated pool with a hot tub, a business center for computer and tech needs, a fitness center, and ADA rooms. Be sure to check for AAA, senior, and military discounts.

name: Hotel Metro
overview: A boutique hotel with Deco accents.  They offer a variety of different room types (including luxury spa suites, pet-friendly suites, and meeting suites), as well as amenities such as 24-hr concierge and room service. A very central yet quiet location just blocks from the Milwaukee and Water Street entertainment areas, downtown museums, the theater district, and the RiverWalk. Green certified. Great rooftop garden/bar in summer.

name: Hotel Planai
overview: The hotel opened in December 2012 right next to the Planai-Hochwurzen cable car. It offers a spa area, free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, free garage parking and a supermarket on the ground floor.

name: Crowne Plaza Antwerpen
address: at the intersection of the R1, A1 and A12 highways, on the outskirts of the city
overview: It can be inexpensive for a hotel of its class, but it comes at the expense of the less-than-handy location and rather aged decor in the cheapest rooms. On the flip side, the large pool with artsy decorations and forest vistas is a treat.

name: University Manor Inn
overview: Continental breakfast, fax service. All rooms contain coffee maker; suites with kitchens and microwave available on request. Convenient to University at Buffalo South Campus and multiple public transit lines; shuttle to UB North Campus and airport available on request.

name: Giltar Hotel
overview: Based on the Esplanade overlooking South Beach. A few minutes walk from the walled town of Tenby. 60 rooms (Standard, Premier and Deluxe). Restaurant and 'The Cwtch' Bar. Small car park at rear of the hotel.

name: Xanascat. Alberg Cerverí
overview: It is located in the centre of the city, only a 100 meters away from the Town hall and from the Avenue

name: Grant House Hotel
overview: Boutique hotel, said to be haunted.

name: Dionyssos Bed & Breakfast
overview: There is Internet access available at no extra charge.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Free breakfast, Internet access, exercise room and indoor pool.

name: Gasthof Lindenbad
overview: Supposedly the cheapest way to stay in Memmingen. Less than a 10 minutes walk to the town center.

name: Byblos Resort & Casino
address: Main Road to Manuel Antonio Park
overview: Three star accommodations in jungle style lodgings. Free wifi.

name: Ruissalo Camping
overview: At the Ruissalo Camping area you can stay in the beautiful Ruissalo Island. Camping area is on the outermost tip of the island. This well-equipped camping and caravan area has a beach, sauna, a convenience store, indoor accommodation and various other amenities, including hot showers and laundry facilities. There's also entertainment options such as mini-golf, volleyball, badminton and basketball courts, fitness trail, playgrounds and a cafe-restaurant.

name: Paradiso
overview: Offers both dorm and private rooms, which are clean and comfortable. Staff are generally nice and all seem to live there as well. Breakfast is included in the price (toast, tea/coffee, juice). Shared, but clean facilities. Laundry service available for RM4/kg.

name: Hotel Connor
overview: Operating since 1898.

name: Gasthaus Werneri
overview: Basic guesthouse, 400m from the bus station.  No breakfast, but free use of kitchen facilities.

name: Oslo Fjordcamp
overview: Open 20 Jun–20 Aug. Near the beautiful swimming spot of Hvervenbukta.

name: Palace Hotel
overview: Landmark hotel affiliated with the Scandic chain, immediately next to the City Hall at the west end of Strøget. Standard rooms are available with two beds or a queen-sized bed, and include a kettle, wireless internet, and in some cases a bathtub. Normal rates do not include breakfast, which is an additional 165 kr. Note that musical events are sometimes held in the City Hall square, so light sleepers may prefer a back room.

name: Jocko's Beach Resort and Motel
overview: Motel, cabins, boat rental.

name: Linden Gardens Rainforest Retreat
address: 1383 Mt Dandenong Tourist Rd, Mount Dandenong
overview: Luxury boutique accommodation in the Dandenong Ranges with four luxe design driven suites on 3 acres of rainforest and woodland gardens. Enjoy a cooked breakfast delivered to your door and lots of extras to make your stay a memorable one.

name: Central Youth Hostel
overview: 120 MDL/night for one bed in a six bed room.  50 MDL key deposit.  One bathroom with a shower in it. It is located in the heart of downtown Chişinău. This is the cheapest hostel yet discovered in Chişinău. This is a nice and clean place. Laundry service available at €5.  Hot water may be limited.  Free internet is very good Checkout 11:00, check-in 13:00.

name: Hotel Assen
overview: Convenient location for a visit to the TT, with spacious, well-equipped rooms. It's outside of the city centre, though.

name: Ōe-Honke
address: 466-1, Onneyuonsen, Rubeshibe, 留辺蘂町温根湯温泉466-1
overview: In Onneyu Onsen town.

name: Hotel North Star
overview: One of the better hotels in town, located on the main street. Includes a restaurant and bar. No Wi-Fi, but there is an internet café.

name: Best Western Quiet House & Suites
overview: Indoor/outdoor pool, high speed internet, free breakfast available. Pets allowed.

name: Oakwood Premier Cozomo
address: Jl. Dr. Ide Anak Agung Gde Agung, Blok E4.2 No 1, Mega Kuningan
overview: Serviced apartments available for even a one night rent. Generally perfect for a family. Should you want to eat, cook at home with groceries (or pre-made meals) from Ranch Market downstairs. There are also a few restaurants on ground level and first floor, or its own house restaurant. Separate fee applied for Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Atlantic
overview: A 3 star hotel located in the City Center on walking distance from all major historical sites. It offers 62 spacious, comfortable rooms, of which 3 have access for disabled people. Rooms are fitted with shower, WC, satellite TV, direct-dial (IDD) telephone, wifi and safety deposit box.

name: Au Git'Ann Bed & Breakfast
overview: Private rooms with shared or private bathroom. Royal breakfast included. Kitchen for guests for other meals.

name: Le Pensione Guesthouse Style Bed and Breakfast
overview: A beautifully detailed 1892 Victorian. Huge king room, single room and very large bath. Amenities include gourmet coffee, fluffy robes, private entrance, microwave, mini-fridge, Dr. Hauscka bath products, luxury spa across the street.

name: Jigloft
overview: Restored 150 year old saltbox home offering clean, comfortable, private self-catering, three bedroom accommodation in a relaxed & friendly atmosphere.

name: Radisson Blu
