overview: On the old St. Paul's Eye Hospital site in the business district of the city. A small part of the original building has been retained and incorporated into the hotel.

name: Danielson Multi-Use Area
address: 4.8 Miles from Sycamore Cove, 3.3 miles from Satwiwa on Sycamore Canyon Trail
overview: A small hike-in campground along the Backbone Trail, approximately half-way between the Pacifc Ocean and Newbury Park

name: Hotel Rácz
overview: Is in the Historian City in the neighborhood of the Castlewall. Just a few minutes from the city, along the road #6 and it is also easy to access with public transport.

name: Michelo Suites
overview: virtually bug free super protected villa steps away from the beach from Placencia with 4 elegant hygienic suites with porch for 2 to 4 people to rent with equipped kitchen, AC, TV, Wi-Fi internet

name: Breidenbacher Hof
overview: Perhaps the most famed luxury boutique hotel in Düsseldorf. Located right in the centre, on the Kö. The 5 star property consists of 92 guest rooms and suites and offers retail shops, a fitness center, meeting space, the 1806 Restaurant, and a cigar lounge.

name: Holiday Inn Express
overview: Comfortable, clean and literally right next to the shopping action in Times Square. Breakfast has Western and Chinese options, with the Western options decidedly underwhelming. Internet is fast.

name: Milano Motor Lodge
overview: 5 minutes walk to Hagley Park or Merivale Shopping Mall, 2-3 minutes walk to restaurants

name: Hotel Vladikavkaz
overview: Soviet style intourist hotel. Cheap, on the river, five minute walk from the center and across the street from a very unique mosque. Not very comfortable but generally has rooms at affordable rates. As with many soviet style hotels in other parts of Russia, expect your phone to ring if you are a male traveller.

name: Rushlee House
overview: B&B with three double rooms.

name: Sofitel Victoria Warsaw
overview: Located a short distance from Nowy Świat, the Sofitel Victoria Warsaw Hotel is the prime real estate for visitors who would like to tour the Old Town on a whim. Rooms facing Plac Piłsudskiego have a really nice view.

name: Delfin Hotel
overview: Situated 9 km out of town. Opportunity to play paintball (50 bullets for 10AZN).

name: Hotel Granada Nest Style
overview: Hotel Granada Nest Style.

name: Suites Coyoacan
overview: Standard hotel that offers comfortable sized rooms at an affordable price. The location is the big drawcard though, less than a block from the Coyoacan subway station, which is about a half hour from downtown. It is also within walking distance (30 min) to two parks that have really great restaurants all around.

name: 9th Ave Hostel
overview: Close to Downtown Fairbanks. Dorm beds and tent space available. Free WiFi, computer terminals, coffee, and bicycle rentals.

name: Beau-Rivage Palace
address: pl Port 17-19 (''across from the Chateau d'Ouchy'')
overview: The absolute pinnacle of Lausanne guest accommodations, the Beau-Rivage practically defines luxury. It's a perfect choice for delegations to the IOC, or for anybody whose boss is footing the tab.

name: Hôtel-Résidence du Grand-Saconnex
overview: Cheapest available in Geneva near airport. variety of rooms available, studio or standard rooms. You can drop in for a meal too, they have a cozy restaurant serving Swiss and Serbian food.

name: CityLife Wellington
overview: Four star plus, suite style hotel. Rooms on the Gilmer Terrace side face directly onto the steep hill the hotel sits on and have no view.

name: WE Bangkok
overview: Slowly building up a reputation among laid-back packers. It is a great hostel to relax and meet other travellers. The dorms are comfortable, clean, air-conditioned and each bed is provided with a personal charging point and reading light. There are multiple computers that are free to use and the hostel provides free Wi-Fi. The staff speaks English very well and is always willing to help. The hostel also has a rooftop bar where people can enjoy the skyline and socialise.

name: Alur Hostel
overview: Friendly staff, small kitchen and large common room. Wi-Fi available in all of the rooms.

name: Leela Kamal Guest House,
overview: This place should better be avoided. The location is very remote, far from the railway station. Though the rooms are spacious and the owners provided good food at very reasonable rate, mosquitoes may be very irritating, specially after sunset. Frequent power cuts also are very inconvenient, after the generator is switched off after ten at night. There is some kind of an academic institution at the back of this complex, hence the noise of the students may cause much disturbances at daytime. And long term tenants at the same complex may seem to some as undesirable & ill-mannered.

name: St. Regis Hotel
overview: A historic and very upscale hotel with a spa, butler service, and on-site restaurant.

name: Sea Ranch Lodge
address: P.O. Box 44, The Sea Ranch, CA  95497
overview: The Sea Ranch lodge has 20 rooms.  Some include hot tubs, fireplaces and corner ocean views (with windows that open and bench seats).  Only the Hot Tub room has a TV. Free Wi-Fi.  Made-to-order complimentary breakfast.  Decor leans on the architecture which emphasizes natural materials, local art, a simple aesthetic and the ocean.  A small herd of sheep add to the bucolic setting across the road from the lodge.

name: White Swan Inn
overview: A lovely small hotel with a fireplace in all 26 guestrooms. Dark wood paneling, floral carpets, comfy furniture, and English art and collectibles set the tone. Evening turndown service, breakfast buffet, and evening wine and hors d'oeuvres served fireside.

name: Ranch House Inn at El Rancho Merlita
overview: Historic 1950's Ranch House and estate built by Merle Norman. Opened in March, 2010, it provides luxurious rooms with brick interior walls, great beds, and delicious breakfast. Lots of places to relax inside and outside: pool, BBQ, breezeways, massage and yoga space, ping pong, horseshoes and more.

name: Thon Hotel
overview: Opened in 2010 directly along the waterfront

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Lietuva
overview: 291-room hotel. High-rise building by the river. Popular for conferences. The even-numbered rooms offer great views of old town, also from top-floor 'Skybar'.

name: Aparthotel Paseo La Leona
overview: Free Cable and High Speed WiFi. Security. Parking. Extended Stay rates available.

name: Thamrin ARTOTEL
overview: A boutique hotel with artsy interior and extraordinary paintings at its rooms. There is also the real art gallery at the ground floor. Strategic location to Thamrin.

name: The Peninsula Beijing
address: 8 Jinyu Hutong, Wangfujing (王府井金鱼胡同8号; Wángfǔjǐng Jīnyúhútòng)
overview: Five star hotel with rooms with free internet. The smallest rooms are 31m2. Swimming pool, spa, massage and lots of shops available. Chinese and Western restaurants as well as a bar.

name: Hotel Nemzeti Budapest- MGallery Collection
overview: A member of the upmarket boutique hotel collection by Accor, the Nemzeti is located in a historic building on Lujza Blaha Ter and features an impressive historic staircase and modern rooms. Because of the size of the building, many of the upscale hotel features, like a swimming pool, are missing, but the rooms amenities fully comply with the international standards. Thanks to exceptionally attentive staff, the hotel consistently ranks among the top then in Budapest on travel review sites.

name: Nagasaki Kagamiya
overview: Air conditioning, wifi, laundry available, shared fridge but no kitchen. Photos on the web site provide detail on how to find the location.

name: Malibu Creek Campground
overview: A vehicle-accessible developed campground located near the entrance off of Las Virgenes Road.

name: Four Seasons
overview: Occupying the top four floors of Mandalay Bay's main building, the Four Seasons is one of the most high-end accommodations in Las Vegas.

name: Sahel Hebergement and Annex
address: 3 to 4km walk from the bus station if you don’t have a land cruiser.
overview: Air-conditioning and satellite TV. Turn right at the round point and go until the T, then turn left and go some 300 meters.

name: Greyhound Hotel Cromford
overview: Built in 1778 by Sir Richard Arkwright.

name: Equity Point Girona
overview: Hostel that has clean and cheap rooms. The staff also plan activities for the evening for visitors.

name: Hotel Helle Mitte
overview: modern but affordable middle-class hotel

name: Fenomen
overview: Clean and cozy hostel.

name: Hotel Domir
overview: Small but light,well furnished rooms. Center of town. 5 Min.walk to train station. Walk to most attractions.

name: Helka
overview: A dependable old standby within walking distance of the city center.

name: iness Hotel
overview: A business hotel close to the city center and the Technical University.

name: Corinthia Hotel London
overview: Comfortable hotel with rooms, suites and penthouses.

name: angelo Hotel Katowice
overview: Modern, four-star hotel located in the centre. It features 203 comfortable rooms and apartments and the biggest conference center in the area with 12 conference rooms with total area of 1 350m2.

name: Suburban Extended Stay
overview: Located in a business district near the midtown area of Albuquerque, perfect for business travelers.

name: Ylä-Tenon takkatuvat
overview: Cottages, camping, tours and fishing permits.

name: Hotel De Pauwenhof
overview: ''De Pauwenhof'' is a small hotel with a family run feel. It has recently been refurbished with air conditioning in all 15 rooms. There is no on-site restaurant for evening meals, but with all the eateries in central Maastricht within a few minutes' walk this should not be a problem.

name: 25hours Hotel beim MuseumsQuartier
overview: The Vienesse foothold of the outlandish designer hotel chain spanning the German-speaking countries, with a rooftop terrace bar so popular that even staying guests may find it hard to get in. The location between university campuses and the Museumsquartier helps enhance the artsy/cultural/intellectual setting.

name: Riversdale Bed & Breakfast
overview: Family run modern house on spacious landscaped gardens, quiet location, 8 mins drive from Dublin Airport. 1km from Swords Village with restaurants,pubs,shops. All rooms en-suite.

name: Hotel Rahayu
overview: Double, triple, and quadruple rooms available, both fan and air-conditioned. Wi-fi available.

name: Hotel Kittilä
overview: Free WiFi, sauna.

name: Hotel Sirius
overview: Centrally located and offering a luxurious top-floor restaurant providing unique city views. Rooms are supremely decorated and equipped with air-conditioning, an LCD TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Wake-up service can be arranged. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer. - +phone=377 044 111111

name: Senhime Monogatari
overview: Modern ''ryokan'' with both traditional Japanese and Western Japanese rooms.  Indoor and outdoor hot springs available 24 hours/day.  Impeccable traditional Japanese dinners utilizing a multitude of fresh, local, seasonal ingredients.  Choice of Western or Japanese style breakfast.  Very personal service, English spoken well.  Every room has a beautiful view of the Otani River.  Located about 1000 feet from Tōshōgū Shrine.

name: Dominica Hostel
overview: This restored old house was especially designed to accommodate travelers. Full of common spaces and practically-designed dorm rooms. Located steps away from Cerro San Cristobal.

name: Hotel La Casona
overview: Hotel La Casona is the newest boutique hotel in Sayulita, less than one block from the beach.

name: Matavai Resort
overview: Niue's only resort. Restaurant with fully-licensed bar, and two swimming pools. Great views of the reef. Turtles and dolphins have been seen from here. Free use of golf clubs and bicycles for guests.

name: Ibis Hotel Myeongdong
overview: Very central, free internet access.

name: Hôtel de Provence
overview: Three-star hotel near the train station.

name: Country Inn & Suites - Decatur
overview: 72 guest rooms, indoor pool, fitness center, business center, free internet access, complementary breakfast.

name: Rainbow Guest House
overview: This place is basic, but its priced for it. They have air-conditioned dorm rooms that are good value. Amenities include free Wi-Fi, nice Indian food and beer, and free private security lockers for all guests (you can use your own padlock or borrow one of theirs). The noise can be troublesome though for the private rooms in the front near Gazebo Bar, but the dorms in the back are quieter.

name: SoBe Hostel
overview: The hostel offers shared or private rooms for 4, 6, and 8 people. Security lockers in-dorm, large kitchen and TV area with pool table and internet access. They also have a large bar that is open until 5AM for the party animals with lots of great drink specials. Free transportation to Miami International Airport offered twice a day. If you are traveling on a tight budget, this is a great opportunity to experience South Beach without going overboard.

name: Hotel Arka
overview: 5-star hotel. Arka is modern, luxurious and comfortable five star hotel. Its interior is furnished according to newest trends in the modern interior architecture. It is situated in the historic nucleus of the Old Skopje Town.

name: Kóczián House
overview: Five rooms. Apartments with  kitchenette, Cable TV, and a shower. Free pick up from train station +email: koczianpihenohaz@t-online.hu

name: Hotel Le Faucigny
overview: Hotel Faucigny is situated in the historical center of Chamonix Mont-Blanc, close to shops, ski schools and mountain house, at 100 m from ski buses. Private car park.

name: Pullman Dakar Teranga
overview: Best Accor hotel in town. Offers good views over the Atlantic from the rooftop. Island in the madness. Popular with business travellers

name: B&B IL Vico
overview: A recently refurbished B&B in Central Genoa in the proximity of the main tourist attractions and business venues.

name: Gasthof Goldener Greifen
overview: Former home of mayor (Bürgermeister) Toppler (~1406)

name: Kaunas Archdiocese' Guesthouse
overview: Ideally situated at the heart of the Old Town, the guesthouse offers 21 clean and modern room with Internet access.

name: Tana Jacaranda
overview: This is a lovely place to stay without breaking your budget. The rooms are clean and cozy. The food is excellent. The staff is super friendly. The WiFi is blazingly fast (when working).

name: Eastwood Hall
overview: Hotel and event venue offering 150 bedrooms and 36 meeting/event rooms, all connected to Wi-Fi.

name: Leighton Arches Caravan Site
overview: Campground

name: Crowne Plaza Liverpool Airport
overview: A short drive from Liverpool John Lennon Airport, this makes fabulous use of its Grade II listed art deco building which was the old airport terminal and control tower. If you are looking to eat out of the hotel then Damon's is a restaurant on the same site which you will enjoy if you like American kitsch and microwaved food. Apart from that, there is a retail park with the typical fast food restaurants just a short walk from the hotel.

name: Smok Campsite
overview: Open whole year. Around 4 km from the centre. Rooms are also available.

name: Business Hotel Lake Inn
overview: Has free parking.

name: Hotel de la Paix
overview: Cheap, central, not that great, shared bathrooms.

name: W Hotel
overview: Another major convention center hotel, with lots of amenities and very nice rooms.

name: Crow’s Nest Campground
overview: Beautiful campground with water, electric, a bathhouse, and a swimming pool. Located next to a trout stream. Adults past the first two cost an additional $5. Open between April 1 and Oct 31 each year.

name: Flying Pig Uptown
overview: A bit loud and boisterous for travelers looking to relax but perfect for those looking to meet people from all over the world and get the true "Amsterdam Experience". Lockers require lockpads, which are not available for rent, only sale for €5.

name: Armenia Hotel
overview: Located dead center, this hotel offers international standards with 55 guest rooms. On-site restaurant, pool with sauna and conference hall.

name: The Park Lane Suites
overview: Apartment-like suites with kitchens (stove, refrigerator, coffee-maker, and dishwasher). Rooms also include a living room and comfortable beds. It's a short bus ride on the 15 to downtown. Rates are reasonable.

name: Victoria Guest House
overview: Single ensuite rooms £35. Pleasant but unexciting bed and breakfast on a tree lined avenue 5 minutes from the High Street.

name: NH Logroño Herencia Rioja
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Zvezdnaya Hotel
overview: Pros: good location close to Central bus station, cafe available on the 8th floor. However, not so much friendly staff, rooms are not tide and looks old. Soviet style building.

name: Pemba Magic Lodge
overview: Known in Pemba as "the campsite", Pemba Magic Lodge and Blackfoot Bar is the main meeting spot in Pemba in Namibi Village 3km from Wimbi Beach. Rent a Bungalow with the bathroom ensuite, bring your own tent or rent one.

name: Hotel Santiago de Compostela Nest Style
overview: Hotel Nest Style Santiago.

name: Rancho Sak-Ol
overview: Beachfront B&B about 1 km south of the town square. Rates include a complimentary self-service breakfast buffet, wireless internet, bikes and snorkeling equipment.

name: Super 8 Motel
overview: Complimentary breakfast. Pets allowed. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi internet access.

name: Azimut Hotel Murmansk
overview: Located in the ''Arktika'' building, the tallest above the arctic circle, this former Soviet flagship hotel have finally reopened after years of renovation as the city's premier business hotel. Rooms on the upper floors have some fantastic panoramic views over the city and fjord. Free WiFi and breakfast included.

name: Albergo Olivedo
address: p.za Martiri della Libertà 14 - Loc. Olivedo Varenna
overview: 10 rooms, 20 beds. Hotel liberty on the waterfront path.

name: Rohonc Guesthouse
overview: Rooms three double and an apartment with three bed. All rooms with shower, toilet, television, mini-bar. Also there is a common breakfast room. The apartment has a kitchen / dining room. Closed parking in the yard, bicycle rental, free Wi-Fi. +phone=+36 30 6922363

name: Camping in Dubňany
overview: If from '''Dubňany''' you walk on the road towards '''Milotice''', about 500 m (1640 feet) outside of the town you will come to a small dirt road lined on both sides by trees.  Follow this road and another 500 m (1640 feet) you will find a large well decorated iron gate.  This is the entrance to the '''Dubňany''' campsite.  It is well maintained, not expensive and has good facilities.  Since you have walked all of this way, you are also within a half kilometer of the '''Milotice''' cellars as well as the majority of the local population's vineyards.

name: Sawasdee Guesthouse
overview: An old, colonial style building on a good location offering single rooms with a fan for 180 baht and double rooms with air-con a few hundred baht more. The rooms are good and clean, guesthouse has nice communal area and free Wi-Fi. Friendly and helpful owner who can give you lots of tips for getting around.

name: Prince de Galles
overview: Named after Edward VIII, the erstwhile Prince of Wales and son of George V, this art-deco hotel opened in 1928 and amassed a veritable potpourri of celebrities in its guest book, ranging from Winston Churchill to Elvis Presley. More recently, it underwent thorough renovation and reopened in 2013 as a part of Starwood's Luxury Collection.

name: Eurostars Das Letras
overview: A new, modern hotel situated in the central Rato district. The hotel offers free wireless internet for guests along with two laptops with internet access.

name: Pullman Dresden Newa
overview: The former Mercure was upgraded to a Pullman in name mostly, as there's not much of a difference (you don't even get coffee/tea facilities in rooms). That said, the property itself is in a prime location right at the Prager Strasse and 300 m from the railway station and rooms offer floor-to-ceiling windows with views of either (depending on side), as well as reasonably modern and upmarket fixtures and furniture. The hotel often undercuts its upmarket competition in the Altstadt in room rates, but makes up for it by charging €12.50 a day for Wi-Fi. Bikes for rent at €10 a day, an electric Renault Twizzy starting at €20 per hour.

name: Exclusive Bed and Breakfast
overview: Offers a warm, homely feeling with close access to the Old Bridge, an 8 minute walk. All stays come with a rich continental breakfast in the morning. There is car parking with a secure locked gate and lock-up garage. Open fireplace in the living room. Free WiFi is provided, or use of the hostel's personal computer if you are not travelling with a laptop. Washing and drying for clothes is available upon request.

name: Doubletree San Diego Downtown
overview: Complimentary airport shuttle, extensive amenities and friendly staff.

name: Royale Inn Lake Wales
overview: Complimentary breakfast. Pool. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi internet access.

name: Arpacay Hostel
overview: Facilities include a kitchen, laundry and personal lockers. There's also a roof top terrace overlooking the city. Free breakfast, linens and internet access. There's no curfew.

name: La Tulip Noire
overview: The Tulipe Noire, a new addition to the accommodations at Palmarin, seamlessly blends the style of Italy with the natural beauty of Senegal. This Italian owned and operated lodge rests only a few meters from the shoreline of the Petite Côte, so rest & relaxation or sun & fun are always at your disposal. Aside from the beautiful accommodations, the dining experience is worth noting in its own right. For authenticity most provisions at the lodge are sourced directly from Italy. This is because at La Tulipe Noire, food is not simply a matter of dining but an epicurean delight. Visit Palmarin and see all that Tulipe Noir has to offer.

name: The Colonnade Boston Hotel
overview: This hotel is great for business and leisure travelers who are looking for a unique experience. The hotel offers 13,000 sq. ft. of meeting space and has the city's only rooftop pool.

name: Eudaimon Bed and Breakfast
overview: The property is located on a hill overlooking Kuta’s bay in a large tropical garden with a lot of trees (plenty of birds there) and flowers, close to Kuta’s village. It has a familial atmosphere and cool, professional service. The French owner leaves his family silverware, crystals, porcelain and linens for the comfort of visitors. The Kuta’s public beach is 200 meters down the hill and there is a long swimming pool in the garden. Lumbung are old traditional wood houses from Java. With teak wood walls and floors, they are located on the top of the hill, one in the forest, the other overlooking the garden and the pool. The lumbungs (15 m²) offer outside (but covered) bathroom and toilet (hot and cool water). Fan and mosquito net. Lumbung Hutan is in the forest & Lumbung Gunung is on the hill. Breakfast is included, transfers are not included. Motorbikes can be rented on the property. The driver and the Toyota van of the property are at visitors' disposition. The driver knows the nice spots. For meals, a breakfast is included in the rate (with a choice of fine teas Marriage and Palais des Thés (Paris), crèpes, pancake, fresh fruits and eggs of any kind). The Balinese cook can prepare family fresh meals using items from the day market. She makes perfect traditional Balinese recipes but also knows how to cook good pasta or French "salade niçoise" or "poulet basquaise" only with local products. (Nothing is frozen or imported there). Large choice of wines (France, Chile, Italy, Australia). There is also a professional massage therapist trained at Bisa School (Bali). Organic massage oils (almond from Bali). Eudaimon property also offers a luxurious private villa and a 2- bedroom guest-house (for customer privacy, only 4 houses on 2 ha property).

name: Friends Paying Guest House
address: p-6 , taj nagri phase 1, near shilpgram road, Agra, India 282001
overview: Family-run guest house 15-minute walk East from the Taj. Food, decent Wi-Fi, TV in rooms. Cushion-furnished balcony common area for eating, drinking and lazing about.

name: Camping Côte Surprise
overview: Open mid-May through late Oct. This campsite takes full advantage of its prime location a short distance from Percé town centre, boasting a magnificent unobstructed view of Percé Rock from its 125 campsites along the shoreline near White Head. A variety of experiences are to be had at Côte Surprise: about two-thirds of its sites are serviced with modern amenities like electricity and water (along with publicly accessible hookups), but there are also 45 "wilderness camping" sites in a wooded milieu for those who are looking for a more backwoods-style experience—sadly, a relative term at this fairly crowded venue. There are sites for trailers as well, and laundry facilities are available. Cash only.

name: Nagasaki International Hostel AKARI
overview: A comfortable hostel located in center of the city. Friendly staff are willing to help guests making travel plans. Free wireless Internet in rooms and three computers in the lobby. Has a program called “Short walk with Nagasaki Locals”. Hostel operates a cafe near Nagasaki Station where you can leave luggage after checking out.

name: Lookout Point Lakeside Inn
overview: Nestled in the Ouachita Mountains overlooking a tranquil bay of beautiful Lake Hamilton.

name: Philadelphia West Chester KOA
overview: KOA campground. Pool, shop, full hookups. ca 10 cabins. Tent sites alongside Brandywine Creek.

name: Hotel Chuabo
overview: Breakfast is served at the top floor restaurant which has a beautiful view to the river and old cathedral.

name: H10 Marina Barcelona
overview: A long shot (five blocks) from the actual marina in the Olympic Port, the H10 is a regular midmarket city hotel with a selection of 235 rooms in different sizes and standards. A rooftop terrace with a pool provides a nice overview of Poblenou.

name: Alpok Tava  Guesthouse
overview: +phone=+36 70 7744722. Three apartments with microwave, refrigerator, cable TV, free WIFI access, kitchen, bathroom (shower, toilet), terrace. Parking in the yard. Services: outdoor barbecue (kettle provided) , table tennis, badminton sets, skittles and table football. Pets are welcomed.

name: Malaysia Hotel
overview: The Malaysia Hotel used to be an institution in Bangkok. It was the city's most famous budget accommodation. Those days are long gone, as now it turned into a seedy gay pick-up hostel with massage parlour. Their 119 rooms are a decent value though, as they are fairly large and have air conditioning, hot-water baths, Internet access, and a swimming pool.

name: Rent Room
overview: A cozy Swiss managed bed & breakfast in a nice neighborhood off the main drag. Rooms come including breakfast, with TV sets with satellite channels, tea/coffee free, WiFi. Non-smoking.

name: Hyatt Regency Dushanbe
overview: A five star hotel with 202 rooms and suites. Amenities: floor-to-ceiling windows, sitting area, heated bath floor, iPod docking station, wireless internet and free access to pool and health club. Regency Club Lounge for free continental breakfast and evening cocktails.

name: Stone of a Beach
overview: Big, airy rooms and great common areas, is staffed with very cool young people who know everything that is going on. They have amazing New Year's and Carnaval events, as well as their own cool bar next door where they have live music.

name: Banyan Tree
overview: A five-star spa resort in the middle of the city, worth visiting even if only for the Vertigo and Moon Bar up top. It has a large reputation for being one of the most luxurious hotels in Bangkok.

name: Top Camping Kalajoki
overview: Camping area next to the sand dunes. If you don't have a trailer, RV or tent, they have cottage accommodation too.

name: Sankt Helene centeret
overview: Rooms, cabins and apartments, accredited with Hostelling International, if you are more to share a room, the price will be substantially lower.

name: Hotel Molnar
overview: Three star hotel. Open: 24/7. - Safe renting, Fax services, Exchange money, computer at the reception only for guest’s, Sauna, Car renting and cab services, Luggage room (suitcase, bag etc.), Morning-call service, You can order laundry-and ironing services. Beauty and wellness services (we fix you appointment for hairdresser, manicure, pedicure etc, you can buy bath ticket, or booking massage service), Programs (sight-seeing tours and other programs), You can buy bus, metro and tram tickets, We have free WIFI Internet connection in the whole hotel.

name: Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street
overview: Broad Street. Contemporary 3 star hotel offering 285 stylish rooms, free WiFi and complimentary breakfast.

name: Comfort Inn
overview: Comfort Inn is a brand of non-standardized properties where price often trumps modern comforts, and this hotel is no exception. It also boasts a location right in front of the New Street station.

name: Cardano Hotel Milan Malpensa
overview: A charming 4 star hotel specifically designed to accommodate business and early-flight travelers near Milan's Malpensa airport.

name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
overview: Given the popularity of Spain among British vacationers it is no wonder that Britain's favourite budget lodging chain finally got a pied-a-terre in Barcelona. Just like any other Travelodge, it is as simple as can be, but just as cheap.

name: Puri Kirana
overview: Brand new wooden bungalows with AC and HW all set around a beautiful tropical garden. Large swimming pool and restaurant on site.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel
overview: The main attraction of the hotel is the AquaDom, the world's largest cylindrical aquarium containing one million litres of saltwater.

name: Green Island Hostel
overview: One twelve beds dorm /ensuit, one ten beds dorm/ensuit, one eight beds dorrm/ensuit three four beds private or dorm as u recommend/all ensuit one double ensuit one twin ensuit. Full capacity up to 44-46 people. Bunk beds are in the dorm rooms, single and bunk beds mix in the private rooms. Bike rental. +phone=+36 70 774-6688

name: Camping Harkany
overview: Hotel has seven rooms with two beds, bathroom and toilets, in the main building. The apartments are located in two-storey buildings, in an environment with landscape gardening, separated form the other camping sites. Tent site is located around the caravan and trailer site, on a green area, there are also 92 sites for caravans or trailers. Fridge rental, Laundry service, Kitchen equipments rental available

name: Fecskefészek  Guestrooms
overview: Reserving only by phone! Two apartmans. Both apartment have: equipped kitchen (gas stove and/or microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, electric water boiling) , two bedrooms with double beds + sofa bed, bathroom with shower, terrace, TV. Services:  parking in the yard, bacon frying-stewing pot options in garden, skittles and free Internet access. +phone=English and German: + 36 30 4150984

name: The Westin
overview: Relatively new, modern, clean, great service, and would be at home in any major western city. However, extortionately expensive - over US$10 for a small beer

name: Hotel Borowiecki
overview: About 10 minutes from the centre by public transport. It is very close to Zdrowie Park.

name: Pažaislis park Hotel
overview: Hotel is in the service and entertainment park, Pažaislis Park, consisting of the Svarstyklės European and Chinese restaurant. 10 rooms.

name: Chicken Creek RV Park
overview: Campground beside Chicken Creek, picnic pavilion, BBQ pits, wi-fi, firewood. Store with local gold jewellery, ice cream, t-shirts, fuel station. 3-hole golf course, walking tours thru historical Chicken, goldpanning.

name: StayOkay
overview: Stay Okay is the most popular hostel chain in the Netherlands and has a venue in Valkenswaard. If you can't find anything in Eindhoven, this might be a good alternative. Call ahead as they are booked full regularly.

name: Best Western
overview: Enjoy convenient access to The Wilds, Wolf Run State Park and the Soakum Festival while staying at this Caldwell, Ohio hotel.

name: Old Town Hostel
overview: Comfortable beds, clean, cozy, and friendly hostel. Airport transfer is possible. +phone=+995 71004002

name: Honjo Station Hotel
overview: This hotel is convenient for travelers without a car.

name: Omenahotelli Lahti
overview: A budget chain hotel next to the market square.

name: Apu Tilca Restaurant Turistico
address: Upper right corner of the main square
overview: There is no Hospedache sign, but staying here is a pleasure. Rooms are nicely painted and floors have good tiles. There is still no Wi-Fi and only cold showers, but bathrooms are modern and clean. Lights works fine, but for an unknown reason, electricity sockets at rooms do not, so you have to charge your mobile devices in the dining room. Owners are friendly and can arrange transportation for you to Cusco or Soraypampa (80 soles). Breakfast is not included, but can be arranged for 8 (continental) or 10 soles (American). If knocking on the main door does not work, try the red gate from the right side.

name: Hotel Prishtina
overview: The Hotel Pristina is used by many international workers, including UN workers and members of the international police. It is very clean, has comfortable rooms, offers free internet access (including wifi), and the price of the room includes breakfast.

name: Mei Place
overview: A studio for two persons and four apartments for two to six persons. Wi-Fi and pool. Moreover there are two houses available for short term rental: a larger one for a maximum of 8 adults and 3 children and a smaller for 4 adults and 2 children.

name: La Cigale Hotel
overview: A member of The Leading Hotels of the World, in the heart of the city and only 15 minutes by car from the airport. 225 luxurious rooms and suites; 11 dining and entertainment outlets offering a selection of cuisine including Italian, Japanese, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern and Oriental and evening chill-out options; two ballrooms; a well-equipped gymnasium with certified instructors; an indoor swimming pool and a deluxe spa with hammam facilities.

name: Hotel Yibi
overview: A good budget option. Rooms have air-con, Wi-Fi and TV. Nice cool pool and bar/restaurant.

name: Ibrik Resort by the River
overview: A luxury boutique resort with only three private double rooms. Each room is beautifully decorated in a chic style with modern white walls and wooden floors. Two of the rooms offer a view over the Chao Phraya River. It is a good way to escape the chaos of the city, yet it is only a 15-minute ferry ride to the Grand Palace. Breakfast included.

name: Hilton Shanghai
overview: Walking distance to French concession, with about 10 minutes to get to the nearest metro at Jing'an Temple

name: Hotel Boquier Avignon
overview: A charming hotel in a XVIIIth-century house.

name: Le Presbytère
overview: Open May-Oct. The imposing '''St. Michael's Catholic Church''' which towers next door informs the entire identity of this ''gîte'': the house was constructed a century ago as the home of its priest, and the two common living rooms are decorated with artifacts from the church's history and furnished liberally with period antiques. Le Presbytère is conveniently located to all attractions, yet it's a breath of fresh air for those looking to get away from the hubbub: the pleasant front veranda affords a view of Percé Rock ''sans'' crowds of gawking tourists, and there's also a few computers there for those who want to stay connected. The five guest rooms here include "La Familiale", a suite with a panoramic ocean view that sleeps 3 to 5 (perfect for families, hence the name), and "La Chambre du Curé", decorated in warm pink tones and boasting a luxurious queen size bed. Most of the rooms feature shared baths. Michel, the owner, speaks French, English and Spanish and is well-known for going above and beyond in assuring the comfort of his guests—and he cooks up a hearty yet elegant breakfast in the morning, with eggs prepared a different way each day and meats sometimes including wild game sourced from area forests.

name: Tulip Inn Budapest Millennium
overview: 3-star superior hotel. Wellness services, free WiFi, Air Conditioning, Parking (£ 2,829 / auto / time), has its own restaurant, Pet-friendly hotels, Number of rooms: 122, Capacity: 257 people. Languages ​​spoken: Hungarian, English, German.

name: Gundagai Motel
overview: This motel is conveniently located at the entrance of Gundagai. The rooms are clean, and the owners are very friendly.

name: The Standard
overview: Trendy hotel with designer rooms and a bar and swimming pool on the roof. There is also a West Hollywood location.

name: 4memories Guesthouse
address: No 27Eo, St 506/135, Phsar Doeum Thkov, Chamkarmorn
overview: 4 memories is a boutique guesthouse with 5 uniquely designed guesthouse rooms and a rooftop lounge. Located in a peaceful community, this guesthouse offers the perfect place to relax after experiencing the bustling life of Phnom Penh. The popular Russian Market (Toul Tompong Market) is only 1km away from the guesthouse.

name: Strandlyst Bed&Breakfast
overview: Bed&Breakfast in renovated old building. Rooms with shared bathroom.

name: Upper Hill Campsite and Backpackers
overview: Provides a range of budget accommodation. Bringing your own tent is the cheapest way. If you are two people, try to go for a big hire tent which is the better deal than a dorm.

name: Camping Munich-Thalkirchen
overview: This highly frequented camping ground is at the banks of the Isar, approximately 15 min to the city center by bike. The camping site has all necessary facilities and a very international atmosphere. The site is open 15.03.-31.10.

name: Hótel Björk
overview: A 15 minute walk away from the city centre in an office neighbourhood.

name: Knudsens Gaard
overview: Excellent if by car. Residential area, at major cross roads out of town. 20-30 min.walk to city center. Good restaurant.

name: Villa Dulsinea
overview: Six villas/rooms

name: ibis Rotterdam City Centre
overview: A brand new ibis hotel opening in August 2014. Features a waterfront location on an island in Wijnhaven.

name: Hotel Parq Central
overview: A boutique hotel in the downtown area, in a lovely old building with gardens and a rooftop bar with excellent views. The accommodations themselves are wonderful, with high ceilings, large windows, and nice furnishings.

name: Archipelago Hostel Old Town
overview: <br> Central location. Dorm bed from 275 SEK.

name: Agrotourism Hirsikangas
overview: Two cottages by the Ullava lake.

name: New Merry V Guesthouse
overview: A good low budget option for the budget conscious traveller. Its aging rooms are divided into fan, air-conditioned and "deluxe" rooms, the latter are more expensive, have a TV and don't face the busy street. Don't confuse this one with the other Merry V, which is in the middle of Soi Rambuttri.

name: Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront
overview: The Hilton's name is absolutely correct, as it is the part of Vienna's very waterfront. Do note that Vienna is actually facing away from the Danube, so when staying there you are not really close to anything but the river. You do, however, get a very unusual experience for the densely built-up Vienna of staying in a waterfront hotel with relaxing terraces and even an outdoor pool. The rooms facing the river have a view of the green Donauinsel, which provides for a very non-urban experience.

name: Fairhaven Village Inn
overview: Charming, unique Inn four blocks from the ferry and train stations in Bellingham's historic Fairhaven district.  Restaurants, live music, and boutique shopping, all right out the front door, with Western Washington University just over a mile away. Complimentary breakfast, private parking, and wireless internet.  Bayside rooms have a fireplace and a small balcony overlooking the harbor. Fresh cookies everyday at 3 and tea and coffee in the library. AAA and WWU rates.

name: Tropical Manaus Eco Resort
overview: In the Amazon Forest, on the banks of the Negro River. It has 588 apartments and a large complex of hotel, events, sports, and tourism and leisure services. It is 10 km from the Brigadeiro Eduardo Gomes International Airport and 16 km from downtown Manaus.

name: Stora Hotellet
overview: Mid-range hotel in the very town center. The hotel has a sauna and also (on request) offers beauty treatments and various packages, for example cookery classes and wine tasting. The hotel serves breakfast, lunch and dinner (à la carte) Mon-Sun and lunch at reduced prices Mon-Fri. The hotel has its own function room and can also provide catering.

name: Bron Rhiw Guest House
overview: 9 bedroom guest house. AA 4gold star award and AA Breakfast Award. Very comfortable and welcoming.

name: Gold Coast Hotel & Casino
overview: A full service hotel with a casino, eight restaurants, a 70 lane bowling alley, 711 hotel rooms. Free shuttle to the Strip, free valet parking, fitness center. Views of the Strip.

name: Hotel 'nicolas'
overview: In Horto a small village in South pelion in Greece there is the hotel 'nicolas'. The hotel is placed in a quite bay near the sea with nice sea view of Pagasiticos gulf. Surrounded by the beautiful plants that decorate our garden along with the old-age olive trees.

name: Sokos Hotel Vaakuna
overview: Located near the railway station, at the shore of lake Vanajavesi. Not far from the city center.

name: Sun Beach Resort Complex
overview: Comfortable and elegant rooms, studios and apartments. 4 star hotel ideal for couples and families just a few km away from Rhodes Town.

name: Rafiki Guest House
overview: Looking oddly out of place, like it's been dropped in from the English home counties, this relatively quiet guest house is run by the same people as the Golden Monkey, but you do pay more for a better night's sleep and secure parking. No smoking & free Wi-Fi.

name: River Studios & Apartments
overview: River studios & Apartments for two persons, or group of friends. Rooms equipped with TV, air conditioning, kitchenette, fridge, bathroom. Swimming pool for guests available.

name: HI-Montréal
overview: Friendly and helpful staff. Activities organized every day (pub crawls, bike tours, urban walks, etc.). Dormitories and private rooms.

name: Hotel Indrajit
address: Two minutes walking distance from Murshidabad railway station
overview: AC Non AC Rooms * Bar Cum Restaurant

name: La Chakana
overview: It consists of a couple of bungalows in a quiet setting about 10 min by foot from the village centre. Each has a spacious room with heating and bathroom. The breakfast is unusually rich with different kinds of cereals, marmalade, cheese and sausage plus fruit juice and yoghurt.

name: Matsue New Urban Hotel
overview: Lakeside rooms have views over Lake Shinji. Rooms have LAN internet. Parking is ¥525 per night. English is spoken.

name: Comfort Hotel Sapporo
overview: Midrange western-style rooms with bathroom.  There is a computer with internet for use in the lobby.

name: Hotel Hacienda Guachipelin
address: Rincon de la Vieja, Guanacaste, Costa rica
overview: Nested in a hacienda at the base of the most visited volcano in Guanacaste. Still operating as a traditional cattle ranch. Closest hotel to National Park Rincon de la Viejat. Tours for all ages, from soft to hard adventure. Hiking, horseback rides, canopy tours, canyoning and white water tubing.

name: Elizabeth's Youth Hostel
overview: HI Hostel. Free internet access.

name: Portré Hotel & Bar
overview: A small hotel with six rooms. Four twins, a triple and a two bed room. Transfer to airports Budapest HUF 38000, Vienna HUF25000; Graz HUF25000. (all max 3 pers.) +phone=+36 94 513800. - In the BAR try local Dreher beer on drought and an good selection of bourbons, malts and other local and international liquers. - RESTAURANT: Soups / starters HUF 500-800 / 600-1300; Pastas /veggie dishes HUF1000-1400 / 1000-1100; pork / poultry dishes HUF 1300 / 1300, salads HUF600-1100. - Aperitifs 4cl 600-700, mineralwater (0.33 dl) HUF200-400, soft drinks, juices (2-3.5dl) HUF200, open wines per dl HUF100-160, drought beer (5dl) HUF400-500, bottled beer HUF400-800.

name: Aurum
overview: If you want a more cultural stay than the hotels in Khao San Road, this boutique hotel is an excellent alternative. River view rooms have a very romantic view over the Chao Phraya River and the beautiful Wat Arun temple. The top three sights can all be visited on foot. Unfortunately, the hotel doesn't have a pool.

name: Västerstrand Holiday Cabins
overview: You need a car to get to this place. Bring your own bed linen. Camping is also possible.

name: Park & Sail
overview: Rental Vehicles place next to the ferries. Really basic infrastructure but prices including disposal of waste water and trash. More convenient place to wait for the next ferry than the waiting lines in the harbour.

name: Hotel Plaza
overview: Literally in the centre of Reykjavík, by the oldest street in the city (Aðalstræti) and the Ingólfstorg square. Close to the heart of the nightlife, and so noise is to be expected (at least in rooms facing the square). Free wi-fi. Part of the CenterHotels chain like Hotel Klöpp above.

name: Elite Eden Park Hotel
overview: Sauna, gym and two restaurants in-house.

name: The Reverie Saigon
overview: Features 286 rooms and suites furnished with imported Italian designs, five high-end restaurants, a spa, swimming pool, fitness center and an executive lounge.

name: CDE Backpackers Hostel
overview: Brand new hostel with shared rooms, shared kitchen and awesome terraces with great views of the city. Breakfast included.

name: Seaside Spot
overview: Occupies the old Catholic mission near the water

name: 75 Travellers Lodge
overview: 75 Jl. Muntri, . Right in the middle of Chinatown. Free 1 hr internet included in the room rate with 24 hr WiFi. Dorm beds from RM12. Single from RM18-22, double/twin rooms RM25-35.

name: Hotel Epinal
overview: This four star hotel is the finest and largest in all of Bitola. It is located near Shirok Sokak Street, and is the tallest building in Bitola.

name: Best Western Plus Toronto Airport Hotel
overview: Complimentary airport shuttle & overnight parking, meeting and banquet facilities, indoor heated pool, whirlpool, sauna, suites available.

name: Ocean Apartments
overview: Modern, stylish contemporary serviced apartments 4 miles for Edinburgh's city Centre.

name: Angel Hotel
overview: A 17th Century coaching inn, extensively refurbished with a blend of traditional and contemporary style. 50 en-suite bedrooms, including: 4 four-poster bedrooms, 2 bedrooms equipped for guests with a disability, 32" LCD TV with Freeview and Sky Sports 1 in all rooms, complementary WiFi in all bedrooms and public areas, private dining rooms, brasserie, 2 bars, 4 conference rooms, wedding receptions, heated indoor swimming pool and gymnasium and free parking

name: Super Sauna Roppongi VIVI
overview: Given the name you might well be excused for thinking this is in an entirely different business, but this is in fact quite a decent capsule hotel that caters to women also.

name: Retreat Guesthouse Luxury Suites
overview: Located on a breathtaking hillside of Coral Spring overlooking Falmouth harbor. This is a quite place to reflect and recover. The breezes and sunshine are reviving. Only 20 minutes from the airport. Enjoy. http://www.reconline.com/booknow/resortbookings/hoteldirect.aspx?bs=30098&idhotel=36955

name: Guesthouse Fteri
overview: Family-run guesthouse offers spacious rooms with fireplace. A buffet breakfast enriched with local products is served daily at the lounge area. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

name: Hellisøy Lighthouse
overview: '''Currently closed for renovation.''' Hellisøy Lighthouse is located on an islet 50 meters south of the main island, and is more easily accessible than the lighthouse on Holmengrå.

name: Thornehill Broome Beach Campground
address: 10 Miles north of Sycamore Cove campground on Pacific Coast Highway (California Route 1)
overview: A drive-in primitive campground near the western terminus of the Backbone trail. Accessible from PCH.

name: Hotel Villa Brinkly
overview: Nice hotel with just 8 cozy rooms on the fashionable Strandvej (coast road), with a nice forest directly on the backyard, and a small public beach a stones throw away.

name: Taverna Restaurant and Pansion
overview: Also cozy cellar restaurant. Home-made, inexpensive food, music and dance events

name: Hilton Garden Inn
overview: 134 comfortable rooms near Marina Beach. Walking distance to Venice Beach. Pool, whirlpool, complimentary WiFi, mini-refrigerators in all rooms; restaurant on site.

name: Hotel Elizabeth
overview: Located in the southern, slightly hilly part of Semarang, in the area known as Candi. Close to St. Elizabeth hospital and popular with many guests actually visiting their hospitalized relatives.

name: Hotel Nurotau
overview: The rooms are better than the hotel looks from the outside. Single rooms T4000, doubles T5000-7000, triple T8000. Wi-Fi is available.

name: Holiday Inn Express Willcox
overview: Free breakfast and wifi, pets accepted.

name: Caballero Errante
overview: 3 star hotel with modern features, clean rooms and helpful staff. Just over 1.5km walk from the Bernabeu Stadium.

name: Perla Negra Hostal
overview: 24 hr hot showers, free pool table/ping pong/table football, free breakfast, free internet, WiFi in all rooms and comfortable beds. Feels more like a hotel than a hostel

name: Hotel Delizia
overview: A recently restored 2 star hotel with comfortable access to the tangenziale and the splendid Piazza del Duomo. 14 rooms each with shower, bidet, toilet, free wifi, TV, ADSL, breakfast.

name: Dunagiri Retreat
overview: The retreat overlooks deep rural valleys and the Himalayas. Accommodations are comprised of two lovingly restored guesthouses located within expansive gardens. Dunagiri offers stylish accommodations and delicious local cuisine.

name: Villa Brevik
overview: A hotel inspired by South Africa.

name: one80º Hostel Berlin
overview: 6 minutes away from Alexanderplatz.

name: NgaMoru Wilderness Camp
overview: Private cabanas; full restaurant and bar.

name: Tryp Barcelona Apolo Hotel
overview: This has to be one of the world's oldest Tryps, and it is so old that it is literally falling apart. The reason why it is still in business is the unparalleled location next to MEtro (pardon the pun) Parallel.

name: Expo Congress Hotel
overview: Four star hotel. Rooms: Standard 120, Superior 36, Disabled Access Rooms: 4. All rooms with LCD TV, Laptop Safe, Free Wireless Internet Access, Individual climate control, Minibar, Large shower or bath.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
overview: The Novotel boasts a brilliant location on the Diagonal, with excellent views of the neighbouring Agbar Tower, especially from its rooftop pool and terrace. Regular rooms are of the usual old Novotel standard, the upscale categories have been renovated and feature a more modern, edgy design with the use of dark colours.

name: Gran Melia
address: Jl. HR. Rasuna Said Kav. X-O,
overview: Minimalist design rooms. Plenty of international cuisine options, especially for breakfast. Superlative Japanese restaurant with tatami rooms and special counters for grilled dishes, while the Chinese department offers Sichuan and Cantonese delights.

name: Jumeirah Frankfurt
overview: The Jumeirah occupies a lean sky-high tower rising out of the MyZeil shopping centre, right behind the Thurn und Taxis palace. Elegant decor with extensive use of dark hardwood panelling.

name: The Mill House Inn
overview: A gracious inn with beautiful rooms, spectacular child and dog friendly suites, and arguably the best breakfast in the Hamptons.

name: Hansa Apart Hotel
overview: Near the station and the university.

name: Brennberg Children and Youth Camp
overview: Restaurant here.

name: Charlottetown Backpackers Inn
overview: Only hostel in Charlottetown. Single-sex dorms, co-ed dorms, and private rooms available. Free wifi and internet terminals. Open April to October.

name: Cumulus Rovaniemi
overview: Mid-priced hotel, centrally located.

name: Hotel Spitzweg
overview: 10 rooms in a 16th century hotel. A hearty German breakfast gets you going in the morning. Herr Hocher is a great source of sight-seeing advice and he is always looking for a worthy chess opponent.

name: Aquaspace Shanghai
overview: A stone toss away from the metro and the Renmin tunnel, this serviced apartment series features a view of the Lujiazui financial spectacle while having access to the vibrant Puxi area. There are also world-class facilities and unique Aquaspace benefits to clients.

name: Chalet Motel
overview: Motel.

name: Hotel Elysées Parc Monceau
overview: Three star charm in an outstanding residential district, just around the corner from Parc Monceau.

name: Hotel (10)
overview: A modern hotel with great design. Ideally located near the hot spot boulevard Saint-Laurent.

name: Hillerød Camping
overview: Camping grounds located quite close to the city center, also has small spartan cabins 7 sq m or 14 sq m with room for 2 to 4 people.

name: Hotel de Paris
overview: Spotlessly clean if rather austere hotel near the main entrance to the medina.

name: Carlsbad Inn Beach Resort
overview: Charming beach-side vacation resort.

name: Tonros Apartelle
overview: Or +63 32 410-7069. Budget hotel. All rooms with cable TV, hot water, telephone, air-con and refrigerator. Free wifi in common area.

name: Montevideo Hostel
overview: Does have a few private rooms. Free Wi-Fi and breakfast included. Moreover it has a nice common area and a small pub.

name: Zarya Hotel
overview: Some of the 62 rooms used to be cheapies, but they've all been renovated, so don't count on that any more. On the other hand, the rooms are really nice for the price range. It's a bit away from the centre, but not too far from Dynamo Park and the railway station, and there is a free internet cafe (requires key) for paying guests. The young staff is lovely and unusually helpful, the old staff acts like you're a western spy.

name: Ailakkajärvi open wilderness hut
address: at the north-east shore of Ailakkajärvi, just outside the wilderness area
overview: Open wilderness hut (6 persons). Stove.

name: deBarra Lodge
overview: deBarra Lodge Bed Breakfast Rosscarbery, is a modern, purpose built 4 star approved accommodation.

name: Residence Inn Albuquerque
overview: Located near downtown and Airport. Complimentary breakfast buffet and high-speed internet.

name: Hotel Pension Am Siegestor
overview: Cozy B&B next to the ''Siegestor'' and across the street from the Academie of Fine Arts (''Akademie der Bildenden Künste München'') in Munich's bustling university district.

name: Hotel Shantinivas
overview: Variety of food available. Parking place inside the premises.

name: Pueblo Bonito Mazatlan
overview: Authentic Mexican style unites with modern amenities. Resort features two pools, one of the longest stretches of beach in Latin America, and a number of nearby water activities. Each suite at the Pueblo Bonito Mazatlán comes with an ocean view.

name: Hotel National
overview: A five-star hotel, opened in 1903. In March 1918, the hotel became the home of the first Soviet government. Lenin made his home in room 107 at the Hotel National with his wife for seven days.- The building continued to be used by the Soviet government afterwards as a hostel for official party delegates, and was renamed First House of Soviets in 1919. In 1931 the building was given a complete renovation to house foreign visitors. It was redecorated with museum-quality furniture and antiques from the palaces of the Tsars and Russian nobility, including Tsarskoye Selo and the Anichkov Palace. The pieces remain in the hotel's collection to this day. The huge mosaic on the hotel's upper corner was replaced with a 120-square meter socialist realist artwork focusing on the industrial might of the Soviet economy. - It has 202 bedrooms and 56 suites.

name: CENTRAL HOTEL 21
overview: 16 beds. Mobil: +36 70 668 2808. Rooms with a pay-per-use mini bar, an LCD TV, a direct-dial phone, safe and the uniquely designed bathroom. Apartments contain spacious rooms, bathroom with corner tub and a well-equipped kitchen. Services: WiFi available in all areas. Bar, Restaurant (buffet). Bicycle rental, Shuttle service (surcharge), Airport shuttle (surcharge).24-hour front desk, Safety deposit box, Currency exchange, Tour desk, Ticket service, Luggage storage. Common areas, Garden, Laundry, Ironing service. Fax/photocopying. Non-smoking rooms, Family rooms, Soundproof rooms, Heating, Allergy-free room, Non-smoking throughout, Air conditioning, Designated smoking area.

name: Bay Guesthouse
overview: A relaxed atmosphere where each room has a private bathroom, free wifi and communal patio overlooking the sea with hammocks.

name: Hotel Formule 1
address: Route de Meyrin, 01210 Ferney Voltaire, France
overview: Right behind the airport on the French side. Inexpensive but still a good standard since it belongs to the Accor hotel chain.

name: Villa Latitude Bali
overview: 5 bedroom, cliff-top villa. Sleeps up to 10 people, private beach club, spectacular wedding venue. Fully staffed and serviced with chef, car & driver, maids and security

name: The Delta Ottawa Hotel
overview: Located downtown, a few blocks west of Parliament Hill, near the Supreme Court of Canada. The outside decor is not much to look at but the one and two bedroom rooms are spacious and have kitchenettes, comfortable for a longer stay. Rates for standard hotel rooms start at $159 / night.

name: Weatherford Hotel
overview: Noted novelist Zane Grey wrote ''Call of the Canyon'' while staying here. Widely rumored to be haunted.

name: Morrisey
address: Jalan KH. Wahid Hasyim No. 70, Menteng,
overview: Surprise, this is not an international chain (yet)! Surprise, it is actually apartment style, each room has a kitchen! Downstairs is the Ocha & Bella Italian & Japanese fusion restaurant. The tricycle named ''Ed'' can take you free of charge to a culinary trip at the nearby Sabang(H. Agus Salim) street!

name: Hotel Front Maritim
overview: The hotel is very aptly named, as it faces the sea directly across the Nova Mar Bella beach. As the property has aged quite badly by the beginning of the 21st century, it offers relatively attractive prices.

name: Uzbekistan Hotel
overview: Offers 285 rooms. Services:dry cleaning, laundry, room Service 24 hours, deposit safe, wake up call, ticketing office, porterage, luggage room, barbers shop, exchange ofice, credit card payment, florists services , gift Shop , free WiFi internet in the hotel, car rental, organization of sightseeing tours, sauna, massage, gym

name: Hilton Cape Sierra Hotel
overview: Closed before Christmas 2008 for refurbishment. The original hotel has now been completely demolished. It is planned to reopen as part of the Hilton chain in 2014, but construction work has not started as of June 2014. The hotel is well located next to the Atlantic and will have direct access to Lumley Beach.

name: Idre's Guesthouse
overview: Friendly family-run guesthouse with $4 dorm beds. Rooms are clean, staff are helpful, and tickets and tours can be arranged without hassle.

name: Lohagarh Fort Resort Jaipur
overview: Lohagarh Fort Resort Jaipur is situated in 13 acres of green lush mountain area in Kukas. They have cottages with private pool, tree houses and a Swiss tent. Apart from accommodation they offer spa & massage and their pool is one of the biggest in the city. The in-house restaurant is as big as a normal hotel and it has entertained celebrities like Jonty Rhodes and IPL cheerleaders.

name: Cinema Hotel Tel Aviv
overview: Part of the Atlas hotel chain, the Hotel Cinema is a stylish, non-pretentious conversion of the former Esther Cinema, built in classic Bauhaus style in 1930 as one of the first cinemas in the then young city. Décor includes touches of cinema nostalgia, rooms well-appointed. Conveniently located right on Dizengoff Square in central Tel Aviv. Rates from USD$92 double room per night, breakfast included.

name: Pullman Bangkok King Power
overview: Opened in 2007, this modern luxury hotel may be better value than other similarly priced hotels, though the buffet breakfast is wanting compared to other luxurious hotels. An impressive lobby and the more-than-ample smiling staff will greet you on arrival. The rooms reflect the five-star status of the hotel, with the executive levels offering many extras including drinks and canapés in the evening. Next door is the King Power Duty Free complex, which has a first floor boutique beer garden, plus the usual large range of duty free goods. In the evening you could visit the chic wine bar that is also open to non-guests.

name: Top Camping Vaasa
overview: The camping area is situated on the island of Vaskiluoto just outside the city center. Besides places for tents and caravans,

name: Šarūnas Hotel
overview: 55-room hotel owned by and named after a Vilnius basketball star. Sauna, fitness center, and laundry services.

name: The Sentosa Resort & Spa
overview: Formerly ''Beaufort Sentosa'', this hilltop resort-style hotel on the quieter eastern side of the island is well known for its ''Spa Botanica'' and fancy restaurants. Recently renovated and looking better than ever, with a deep Olympic-sized pool. 300 m to Tanjong Beach.

name: Schlosshotel im Grunewald
overview: May be the luxury hotel with the greenest surroundings in Berlin, a step away from the hectic part of the city. Was home to the German football team during the World Cup 2006.

name: Casa Bonita Bed&Breakfast
overview: Established in a national monument in a protected historical neighborhood, opened at the beginning of 2009. It offers single and double rooms with or without private bathroom and also has rooms for three or four persons. All rooms have central heating, cable TV and Wi-Fi signal. Rates start from US$58 for a single and US$67 for a double. A varied breakfast, internet access and cable TV are included. This B&B is personally run by its owners, a Dutch-Chilean marriage.

name: Angelina Guesthouse
overview: Clean rooms, shared and private baths, pool, complimentary breakfast, wi-fi. Friendly and helpful staff knowledgeable of the city.

name: Hotel De Albertis
overview: 2 star hotel located in the Cinque Giornate area. Run by a very pleasant family.

name: Saru-gawa onsen Hidaka kōgensō
overview: Spa hotel beside ski area.

name: Sakamanga
overview: A good mid-range option located in the center of the downtown area, but secluded from the streets. Rooms have air conditioning, wi-fi works well, there is a very nice pool, and the restaurant/bar serves drinks and light meals. Very popular, so book ahead. 32 rooms, reception open 24 hours.

name: Hotel de la Mer
overview: 36904, Tel Aviv. A boutique hotel, created within an historic Bauhaus building on the famous Hayarkon Street. Overlooking the beach of the Mediterranean Sea and located in the heart of Tel Aviv. The Hotel’s ambience is characterized by the harmony with nature that is the fundamental element of the Chinese art of Feng Shui. From its entrance and public areas to the unique decor of the individual rooms, guests will relax in an atmosphere of carefully balanced color, light and art designed to assure maximum comfort.

name: Envoy Hostel
overview: Winner of 'Best Hostel in Armenia' Award by HW 2010&11&13. This hostel is centrally located, large and comfortable with free internet/wifi access, breakfast and tea/coffee facilities. All the rooms and common areas are air conditioned and spotless. English speaking staff is efficient and knowledgeable about traveling in Armenia and the regions. They also have a hostel in Tbilisi and offer weekly tours from Yerevan to Tbilisi with sightseeing and BBQ-lunch included.

name: Mornington Hotel
overview: A sport-business hotel near Bromma airport, with gym, massage and healthy breakfast. The airport and traffic noise at the front can be disturbing, but the hotel is at walking distance from a waterfront park.

name: Amado Territory Inn
overview: Nine rooms, some with private patios and balconies. No smoking, pets accepted (with restrictions), wi-fi. Evening wine and cheese tasting and breakfast included. Birders are welcome to visit the property without spending the night.

name: Suliko's Homestay
overview: Run by a retired couple, a large room of their house serves as a dorm, two smaller private rooms are available. Theoretically one may stay to sleep only, alas one is very likely to be treated to the excellent fare the lady of the house serves up as well as the homemade wine the husband produces. I.e. if they like you, you are likely to be treated to one of those infamous Georgian welcomes, heavy on your liver ... They will give you as much chacha, Georgian wine and Georgian food as you can handle. The food is all hand-made and freshly prepared. It is amazing, the hospitality is unparalleled and only the modesty of the facilities leaves anything to be desired. The beds are clean and the house is good by local standards, and the new bathroom was completed by summer 2011 in this friendly homestay. Free WiFi Internet is available, and there is a computer available for use. <br /> '''To get there from the main bus station''' (Kutaisi II Railway Station),  take a #1 city bus traveling to the right (from McD walk right the same side of street to find the bus stop). The bus pass the Kutaisi I station and go uphill to 26 Maisi Street. Get off at #72 (there is a cross on sidewalk) and you walk into the alley, which is Tbilisi St. 3rd Lane. From Kutaisi I station, take #1 bus or walk out to the right uphill on Solomon Pirveli St. for th 6-7 min up the hill to Tbilisi St.  Taxis from the bus station is 5 GEL, but they tend to take you to similarly named guesthouse to get commission. Give them the street address rather than ask for "Suliko's."

name: Marina Inn
overview: Comfortable and traditional style inn with a quiet B&B atmosphere. They have 40 guest rooms and offer complimentary continental breakfast and free newspapers.

name: Eagle Home Hostel
overview: Located in the Kettle Moraine State Forest. Open weekends. Reservations required.

name: Hostel Pisa
overview: FA youth hostel with dorm beds and private rooms. Walking distance from Pisa train central station and Pisa international Airport, 24 hr reception. Free WIFI. Laundry, kitchen, street parking (free from eight 8PM-8AM), dining room in-door & out-door, guest lounge, theatre, TV room.

name: Fort Motel
address: 400m from main postal station, next to golf course
overview: Breakfast included, nice gardens and pool.

name: Des Bergues
overview: The oldest of Geneva's super-luxury hotels, this palace like space & faces the old town from a superb right-bank position just above the pedestrian ''Pont des Bergues''. A favorite among European royalty.

name: Hostel Natura
address: Av. das Cataratas, KM 12,5 - Bairro Remanso Grande
overview: The hostel is located close to the Albergue Paudimar Campestre, some way outside the city. It's small, quiet, clean and has two ponds where you can swim (besides the swimming pool). It offers free internet (WiFi), has a small kitchen to use and a small bar with pool, tabletop soccer and TV. The staff is very friendly and helps you planning your visit to the falls.

name: La Jagu Inn and Suites
overview: Free breakfast, high speed internet, guest laundry facilities available.

name: Best Western Hotel Am Papenberg
overview: Near the faculties for phsyics, chemistry, medicine and geology ("Nord-Campus") and the Max Planck Institute for Experimental Medicine.

name: Hotel Agro
overview: Buffet breakfast. Covered swimming pool and sauna. 74 rooms all with bathroom, TV, refrigerator and WiFi. +email hotelagrofured@gmail.com

name: Hostel Bojo, bed & breakfast
overview: Opened in 2013 in the pedestrian zone of Mostar centre, about 500 metres from the Old Town, Hostel Bojo offers air-conditioned rooms with lockers for each bed, free Wi-Fi and free breakfast. Guests can use the shared garden's seating area with free barbecue facilities. The hostel offers a common room with cable TV, and guests are welcome to use a shared fully equipped kitchen with dining area. A shared bathroom with shower and hairdryers are available.

name: Aventura Boutique Hostel
overview: Uniquely designed, intimate, cosy environment. From here most of the sites are within walking distance, otherwise metro and tram are a few minutes walk away. Very enthusiastic and helpful staff, clean and nicely decorated rooms, bathrooms and kitchen. Good breakfast and free internet.

name: JW Marriott
overview: A AAA four diamond hotel with lots of amenities and nice rooms.

name: Coachmans Inn
overview: All of the services of a hotel with the ambiance of an inn located in downtown Carmel.

name: Hotel Ancar
overview: This hotel was renovated in 2009.  Has air conditioning, free breakfast and free wireless Internet (Wi-Fi).

name: Hotel "European"
overview: Clean, comfortable. Good breakfast included. Pleasant staff. Price - quality ratio is quite good.

name: Grand Hotel
overview: Rooms: 33

name: Nagisa Park Campground
overview: Lakeside camping with barbecue grill rental, bicycle rentals and sporting facilities.

name: Hotel Catalonia Reina Victoria
overview: A large hotel on the edge of the cliff, with great views. Free wi-fi, gym, pool, breakfast, restaurant on-site.

name: Hotel Anis
overview: Swimming Pool, Restaurant.

name: Tune Hotel
overview: Add-ons including air-con, towel, toiletries, cable TV, and Wi-Fi have to be purchased separately.

name: Holiday Inn Express Schwabach
overview: Good quality rooms, standard HI Express furnishings. Good free buffet breakfast.

name: Sleep Cheap
overview: Very hard to find (go to number 18, and through the dark tunnel), no internet access '''or''' hot water (for a couple of weeks during the summer).

name: Las Vegas Marriott
overview: The rooftop foyer presents beautiful sweeping views of the landscape.

name: Omena-hotel
overview: A value-for-money accommodation right in the heart of the city.

name: Bottger Mansion of Old Town
overview: This historic house, now a bed-and-breakfast, is shaded by massive 100-yr old trees and is just steps away from the Old Town plaza.

name: Halcyon Villas
overview: 3 bedroom pavilion style villa with large pool and gardens. Airport transfers, housekeeping and cooked breakfasts are included.

name: Grand Hyatt Cairo
overview: A semicircular hotel situated on the North tip of Rhoda Island, linked to the city center by a private bridge, and approximately 14 miles from Cairo International Airport. Has a revolving restaurant, a pool and great views of the city.  An attached shopping mall with food court and a range of restaurants in the hotel with a terrace overlooking the fountain in the Nile make for an incomparable view if you eat outside.  The food is good quality but there is no alcohol served in the restaurants, except for the Hard Rock Cafe.

name: Le Méridien Stuttgart
overview: Park-side hotel of 291 rooms and suites, wellness area with pool, jacuzzi, sauna and fitness centre, a French restaurant, Le Cassoulet, and 13 meeting rooms

name: Hotel Asia Center of Japan
overview: Excellent budget hotel – no amenities like a gym or spa, but friendly staff, small but well-appointed rooms, restaurant.  Free high-speed internet in room, coin internet in lobby.  Laundry available.

name: The Inn at the Round Barn Farm
overview: Bed and breakfast on 245 acres with rooms featuring Tempurpedic beds, fireplaces and luxury baths. Restored round barn weddings and special events center.

name: Hotel Pietari Kylliäinen
overview: City hotel located close to both service and nature.

name: Nybro lågprishotell och vandrarhem
overview: Five minutes from the town center, this hostel offers 100 beds. The hostel is also a cheap hotel, but the hotel prices are of course more expensive than the hostel. Breakfast is included and is served daily 0800-1000. The hostel can provide other meals on request (must be pre-booked). Self-catering is possible (well-equipped kitchens are provided). Bed sheets available for hire if you do not bring your own. Sleeping bags are not allowed.

name: Luxor Hotel Frankfurt
overview: is 10 minutes to the historic downtown area, and 5 minutes to Sachsenhausen restaurants. Rooms are large and clean. There is shampoo in the bathroom, shower is nice. Hair dryer and mini-safe, cosmetic mirror, TV and closet in the room. Breakfast is excellent

name: Walker Creek Retreat
overview: A large, spacious, secluded lodge with four room guest rooms and a fishing pond. Located at the base of MacDonald Pass.

name: Guest House Letizia
overview: Free WiFi, a garden and a shared terrace looking out to Gruž Bay. Bright rooms with wooden floors, some have a private balcony. Stone barbecue on the terrace. Guests can also cook in a shared open-plan kitchen, a dining table for 6 is provided, no extra charge is levied for those services.

name: Ace Hotel DTLA
overview: Opened early 2014 in the historic United Artists building that was built in 1927 for what was then a maverick film studio. Includes free Wi-Fi and air-con. Terrace Suites are 633 square foot and include a private kitchenette, private terrace; some have Ace x Rega RP1 turntables and acoustic Martin Guitars.

name: Hostel 41 below
overview: Central quiet location, Kiwi owned and run, Lake view, comfortable chilled out living, Extensive music selection.  Fun, young atmosphere. Many tour options to book right there for the same prices as in town. Book swap and wi-fi throughout. Homey feel.

name: Ryokan Tochigi
overview: This is an old business ryokan.  It has many single and double rooms.  There are shared baths and bathrooms.  The friendly staff only speak Japanese.

name: Aranyak
overview: It is maintained by Susunia Gram Panchayat. It has four rooms, one AC, one non AC, one with common bath and a dormitory type with three beds.

name: Guesthouse "Terrazzo"
overview: Cosy budget private mini hotel. Although rooms have everything you need, but they are very small for the long term stay. Delicious food at the restaurant on ground floor.

name: Lyngkroen
overview: Also rents out vacation homes

name: Oasis Backpackers' Palace Seville
overview: Dorms in all sizes that came with up to 2 bathrooms per room, free lockers to put your backpack in and free linen. Roof-top terrace with chill-out bar to overlook Seville, guest kitchen, free breakfast and free internet/ wifi.

name: Scout house - former Ristoro
overview: It is a dorm managed by the Scouts and it can be rented or used for specific events. It has 55 beds, 4 bathrooms inside the building, 1 bathroom outside the building. The dorm is a simple and clean accommodation with kitchen, 2 large living rooms and a garden providing also the possibility of camping.

name: Argyle Backpackers
overview: Two good self-catering kitchens, garden, conservatory/seating area, choice of different sized dorms, and private rooms.Definitely not a party hostel.

name: Aspen Square
overview: A full service condominium hotel with sixty-four steps to the Silver Queen Gondola.

name: Banff International Hostel
overview: The Banff International Hostel was fully renovated and reopened in July of 2012. It offers bunks in dorm rooms or private bedrooms all with lockers and with private bathrooms. Located only 2 blocks from downtown on a bus route it connects guests with most sights in town. It offers free WiFi as well as 3 internet work stations. For updates please check the hostel's blog as it keeps adding new services!

name: Haria Hotel
overview: Bright and large rooms with a beautiful roof top bar and restaurant. A popular hotel with volunteers.

name: Crowne Plaza Maastricht
overview: ''Crowne Plaza Maastricht'' is quietly situated in the city center on the river Maas.

name: Pension Villa Basileia
overview: Family run pension. The parking lot is only open until 8PM. The rooms are not very nice. There's a weird atmosphere because the only person that speaks English or German is gone most of the time. They mention spa treatments on their web site suggesting that they are available at the hotel. Forget it. All they have is an exercise machine in the stairwell.

name: CAB INN Copenhagen Express
overview: This budget hotel is pretty well reviewed for what it is, but it could use a makeover. Has both standard rooms and family rooms with bunk beds. Free Wi-Fi in the lobby and in selected rooms.

name: Embassy Suites St. Paul Downtown
overview: Complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast in an open air atrium. Indoor pool, fitness center and whirlpool. Onsite American restaurant: Woolley's & Cork's Pub.

name: The Marine Hotel
overview: 31 room hotel

name: Days Inn - Fisherman's Wharf
overview: Affordable hotel accommodations with comfortable, clean rooms.

name: Hermance Camping
overview: There is a camping site at the beach.

name: Hotel Omm
overview: In Passeig de Gràcia district, featuring elegant rooms with adaptable lighting. Award-winning ''haute cuisine'' restaurant.

name: DCC Spa Camping Park
overview: Spacious pitches - sanitary building with wheelchair disabled facilities. Book out-patient spa treatments or our wellness & vital Park offers and stay in your own caravan. Riding is available on the nearby riding school "Eterna". Package deals for short treatments are available. Open all year round.

name: Buena Vista Motor Inn
overview: Another standard motor inn, this one offers free parking and a complimentary continental breakfast to get you going in the morning.

name: University Hotel
overview: This nice little hotel is situated at a cosy square with bars all around, close to the university and right in the centre. It is in fact part of the university and offers short but also long stay accommodation. Rooms are nicely decorated in a modern fashion, the staff is friendly and there's free tea and coffee in the lounge. Breakfast is a bit limited and there aren't too many facilities beyond what you'd expect from any hotel, but in terms of price and quality - this is a really good deal.

name: Vila Ilinden
overview: Renewed in old Macedonian style from wood and stone with unique interior. There are 3 quite big rooms and one apartment. All rooms have 1 double bed and one single bed. Also there is shared fully equipped kitchen. Nice owners. Which also offer to prepare Macedonian dishes for guests. Poor soundproofing though.

name: Hotel Sirene Blue Resort
overview: Has two swimming pools, private beach with Taverna Restaurant and Beach Bar on wooden deck by the sea and under the pines. The cosmopolitan restaurant Roof Garden at the top of the hotel in Black & White style has live music.

name: Bonito Campground
overview: Open beginning of May to mid-October. This campground with 44 sites is very popular and is close to Wupatki and Sunset Crater National Monuments. Drinking water, flush toilets, no hookups, trailers/RVs under 42'.

name: Hotel Fuerst Metternich
overview: The hotel isconveniently situated near Mariahilferstrasse and offers large breakfast. It hosts the Barfly's Club.

name: Tonquin Inn
