overview: Good quality motel style rooms. Very good restaurant on site.

name: Sheraton Kauai Resort
overview: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, tennis courts, children's center, nightly entertainment at Garden Terrace, restaurants, and  Hawaiian Rainforest Spa.

name: Angie's Guest Cottage
overview: Angie's guest cottage is the only hostel in Virginia Beach, and offers cheap beds and great location.

name: Sheraton Albuquerque Airport Hotel
overview: The closest hotel to the airport, no more than 2 min. away by shuttle, which runs on the half hour. However, a management transfer has left the hotel in shambles. Poor value for the money spent - give it a miss and go with other nearby airport hotels instead.  Reasonable restaurant (Rojo's Grill) on the premises.

name: Mannakoski lean-to shelter
address: 2km downstreams from the mouth of Lätäseno
overview: Lätäseno joins Könkämäeno to form Muoniojoki at the village Markkina by E8, 9km upstream from Kaaresuvanto. Nearby is the Mannakoski lean-to shelter at a nature trail starting point and a bird watching tower with view over the Kirkkovuoma/Hietajänkkä palsa bog.

name: Mercure Grand Hotel Biedermeier Wien
overview: More Biedermeier than grand, this Mercure is a very typical representative of Viennese hotels, with questionable colours and patterns, all wrapped in a vaguely historic setting. That said, the unusually large rooms (esp. Privilege) make it an option worth considering. Do mind that many rooms face the narrow internal courtyard, i.e. another room's windows within a short distance.

name: Omenahotelli Oulu
overview: A hotel of the budget chain Omenahotelli in the city center of Oulu.

name: Melbourne Central YHA
overview: Centrally-located hostel in the backpacker hub of Melbourne.

name: Ty Capel
overview: A former chapel and schoolroom. Sleeps 3.

name: La-Anthurium
overview: This recently opened is an elegant boutique hotel run by a hotel chain. Have some 14 rooms including suites and a cafe located in a residential area. Free Wifi, and complimentary breakfast. The hotel is much like a guest house. Very clean, cosy and trendy.

name: Au Pic de l'Aurore
overview: Open May-Oct. A huge complex just north of the town centre comprised of a motel with standard rooms as well as detached chalets, studios and apartments with more amenities. Standard rooms contain a fridge and coffeemaker, and all of them have balconies with ocean views. Detached units have air-conditioning, private baths, and kitchenettes or full-sized kitchens. Free continental breakfast is available during the shoulder seasons (mid-May through late June and late August through mid-October) for guests in units without kitchens or kitchenettes. Free WiFi. Pets allowed.

name: Litinterp Guesthouse Vilnius
overview: Located inside a historic building on one of Old Town’s prettiest streets. Facilities are basic but more than ample, with options for everybody from single guests to families. There's a choice of en-suite and shared bathroom facilities, plus all rooms have access to small kitchens.

name: Best Western Tin Wis Hotel
overview: Nice comfy hotel, reasonable accommodations for the area. First Nation owned and operated. $199-325 (less in the off-season).

name: Scandic Segevång
overview: This is a suburban hotel situated amidst the meadows of Segevång. Slightly dated, but offers a large outside pool and a smaller one inside. It is also close to a golf course and markets itself as a sports/leisure hotel.

name: Del Fiore
overview: A few nice rooms with private bathrooms. One with a balcony.

name: The Rim Chiang Mai
overview: Luxury hotel in traditional Lanna-style, 36 rooms, outdoor swimming pool, tropical garden, fitness club, and spa, restaurant (Thai & Western cuisine) and very friendly staff.

name: Velog Bed and Breakfast
address: 15 Ralph Street, Borth-y-Gest, Porthmadog LL49 9UA, Gwynedd
overview: Family run bed and breakfast. Sits in pretty harbour village of Borth-y-Gest at the gateway to The Snowdonia National Park. Double bedded rooms fit 6 persons in, sorry no twin beds available. Home cooked food in relaxed surroundings. WIFI throughout via BTWIFI hotspots. Velog is not suitable for physically disabled persons who cannot manage stairs.No pets or children.Free pick up and drop off from Porthmadog train station or Porthmadog town centre if coming in via bus or coach. Close to the New Coastal Path. Just 5min from narrow gauge railways of Welsh Highland and Ffestiniog. 1/2 hr from Mt. Snowdon. Walking in Mountains, Coastal Path or Valleys just minutes away. Beautiful sandy beaches and safe bathing waters just 2 minutes from house. House is in a quiet residential road just off of the main front, so a guaranteed quiet good nights sleep every night.

name: Montana Hotel
overview: Good standard tourist class accommodation in an excellent area.

name: Use Plateau Hotel
overview: This hotel and neighboring youth hostel are located on the foothills of Mt. Chokai.  A sports complex and a horseback riding area are located nearby.  The youth hostel has rooms that sleep 5 people.

name: Hotel Auberge Michel Doyon
overview: Free breakfast and free parking. Friendly and clean. 44 rooms.

name: ibis Styles Birmingham Centre
overview: Located east of the core city centre on Lionel Street, it is a former Holiday Inn Express property that became and ibis Styles after some very light refreshment. As in all ibis Styles, breakfasts and free WiFi are included in the room price, which can be very attractive, compensating for the less central location.

name: Casa Noda
overview: The owner is nice and gives very good tips about the local restaurants and temple area. Good English is spoken. Use the map on their website to find it.

name: Hotel de Groene Weide
overview: A small hotel with a café and billiards downstairs.

name: Hotel Verzaci
overview: The hotel is on a ten minute walk from the Tiranë airport terminal building, very convenient for early departures or late arrivals. While there are hotels even closer to the airport, this hotel provides very good value for its price.

name: Seasons Guesthouse
overview: All rooms are equipped with air-conditioner, hot and cold shower, cable TV, and complimentary wireless internet access. Also offers tour assistance, massage service, vehicle rental, and laundry services. (Prostitutes are not allowed inside the property).

name: Courtyard by Marriott San Diego Downtown
overview: A unique 245-room hotel where timeless charm is blended seamlessly with sophisticated comfort of modern guest accommodations. Ideal location in the Gaslamp Quarter.

name: Mercure Paris Opera Garnier
overview: A conservatively-styled Mercure with no particularly unique characteristics.

name: Hotel Schemmer
overview: Conveniently located just blocks away from the train station, is a clean and very affordable stay. Breakfast included in every room. About a 8 minute walk from the city center.

name: Hospedaje y Restaurant Luz Mila
overview: The only real accommodation at the northern strip of the Punta Gallinas which is spectacularly set surrounded by sea on a small peninsula. The Hospedaje Luz Mila has a block of basic rooms or hammocks and serve good food, of corse mainly fish. Most tours will end up in the accommodation.

name: Yumoto Hotel Sansui
overview: Bath is the hot spring. Located side Lake Abashiri.

name: Finca la Jorara
overview: On the road between Santa Marta and Palomino.

name: The Ritz-Carlton
overview: A very nice hotel in an orderly and modern neighborhood. There are restaurants and bars nearby, a small park across the street and the neighborhood is modern and organized.

name: Shirah's Guest House
overview: Clean and nice with many in-house facilities.

name: Ryan Campground
overview: Easily accessible from West Entrance Station, a primitive campground with 31 sites, no water available.

name: Mini Camping in Pajiesmeniai
overview: A friendly family run mini camping site, the owners communicate in English, Dutch, French, German, Russian, Spanish and Lithuanian. Places for mobile homes and tents. The equipment is rather basic, but includes wifi internet.

name: Klaus K
overview: Helsinki's first boutique hotel, although they prefer the term "personal contemporary hotel".  Rooms range from the small Passion & Mystical types to the aptly named Envy Plus.  Central location, funky styling and reasonable prices make this a winner.

name: Hotel Bürgerreuth
overview: A small hotel with only 8 rooms, located in a quiet area (unless it's festival season).

name: The Millsap-Baker Estate
overview: A Victorian style house with 4 rooms for rent.

name: Bed & Breakfast Ambassagou
overview: Nice, very clean rooms. 15 min to centre, airport and bus station. Restaurants, bars, markets are in walking distance. Nice evening or morning stroll to the river Niger. Transfer to and from airport is possible. Owner Adama can help you with your excursions. 9.000 CFA 1 pers room. 13.500 CFA 2 pers. room.

name: Patricia Lake Bungalows
overview: Rooms, suites and cabins at lakeside at end of private road. Grill and camp-fire facilities as well as small children's playground and canoe hire for the lake. Great location out of town.

name: Hotel ibis Győr
overview: *** 96 new, modern style "Coquelicot" rooms with air-conditioning, soundproofed windows, telephone, radio, flat TV with satellite channels, comfortable bathrooms, hairdryer and Wi-Fi.

name: Coyote Flaco Backpackers
overview: Hostel that has 40 rooms all with private bathrooms. Great place to meet fellow travelers, and the staff and helpful and friendly.

name: Majestic Breckenridge Lodging
overview: A family owned property rental company that specializes in vacation homes and condos. They offer ski-in ski-out lodging.

name: Virgin Gorda Village
address: near Little Dix Bay, but about a mile and a half from the nearest beach
overview: One-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments; two-bedroom town houses.  All condos have at least partial ocean views, but the top floors have the best views.

name: Villa Anna
overview: Luxury hotel in a newly renovated building from 1870. In the heart of the cultural district, next to the Cathedral. Suites with whirlpool and sauna! This is where the Nobel Prize winners sleep during their visit to Uppsala University.

name: iHouse Residence Hotel
overview: A new and modern hotel in the centre. Its rooms are designed for comfort with most all of the conveniences nearby. There are specials and promotions when reserving a room through their website.

name: Pemba Beach Hotel
overview: A large Arabian style open plan hotel with 60 sea-facing rooms including 2 suites and some interconnected rooms suited for families. All rooms have balconies or terraces, en suite bathrooms, air conditioning, mini-bar, satellite TV, direct dial telephone, coffee/tea making facilities, electronic safe, international plug sockets and hair dryer. Also has 8 two-story villas with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms each, and all the above amenities plus fully equipped kitchens and washing machines and dryers and electronic safes. The villas are serviced and accommodate a maximum of 6 guests.

name: Ängby Camping
overview: If you miss the last T-bana take night bus 198 from Sergels Torg/T-Centralen, direction Backlura, stop Ängbyplan (right next to the T-bana)) Rents out cabins, has caravan/camper van lots, and space for free camping (with plenty of shade). Spotless toilets and showers (the latter cost 10 SEK). Laundry facilities, cooking facilities, internet café, mini-market which bakes its own bread and cakes every morning, small children's area. Very friendly staff who are prepared to go the extra mile to help out. A stone's throw from the campsite is Lake Mälaren with beach, bar/restaurant, crazy golf, and the campsite's own water slide. Cost - e.g. one adult, one child, one tent, 225 SEK per night.

name: Intermission Hostel
overview: A Christian hostel 40-bed dormitory with probably the lowest prices in town. Norwegian evenings every Monday and Thursday with traditional cakes and waffles, free of charge. Open from mid-June to mid-August.

name: Hotel Palazzo Zichy
overview: **** 80 rooms, 160 beds. The former Palace of Count Nándor Zichy. There are eighty rooms with buffet breakfast, free wireless Internet, free usage of sauna fitness center, free consumption of coffee, tea and mineral water in the lounge bar daily until 5 pm. Also there is an @-room with free access to public computers and a printer. - Room inquiries: reservation@hpz.hu , +36 1 235 4001, +36 1 235 4002

name: Windsor Hotel
overview: A popular hotel, but some would say overpriced for what you get.

name: Hotel Karelia
overview: A new well-run hotel with several amenities, including gym, spa, restaurant, and a helpful tourism department that runs tours to Kizhi.  Part of the Best Eastern Hotels group.

name: Empress Chiang Mai
overview: Luxury hotel in traditional Lanna-style with 375 rooms and suites, a convention centre, sauna rooms, outdoor swimming pool, business centre and massage parlour. Good breakfast and friendly staff.

name: New Ritz-Carlton
overview: Located in the Theater District directly across the common from the original Riz-Carlton. Relatively new hotel with a very modern design.

name: Motel Fraser
overview: The Fraser is the smaller and less expensive of Chandler's two motels, but don't let that fool you: this place has its own charms, from the comfy rooms newly renovated with a modern decor and eco-friendly materials such as cork flooring and hypoallergenic Milano bedding, to '''Le Sieur de Pabos''', Chandler's most upscale restaurant with a breezy terrace bar looking out over the outdoor pool (open seasonally), to special packages for snowmobilers and ATV enthusiasts during the autumn and winter months. All 31 of the Motel Fraser's rooms contain a fridge, coffeemaker, and flat-screen TV with cable, and WiFi is free and available throughout the property. pets are also accepted, subject to additional fees.

name: Crystal Pier Hotel
overview: The closest that you can get to staying on the beach.  Built on the historic pier, these rooms offer amazing views and soothing ocean sounds to put you to sleep at night.  With a room, you can actually drive out on the pier and park in front of your quarters.

name: Hostel Turku
overview: Hostel Turku is close to Turku city centre providing excellent bus connections to the harbour, bus station and airport. Available are two and four bed private rooms and six bed dorm rooms at budget prices. Facilities include self-service kitchens, laundry room and free wireless internet access. The hostel also sells the TurkuCard. Book ahead, as it gets very busy in summer.

name: Distinction Wellington Century City Hotel
overview: Studio rooms, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments and penthouse suites.

name: Camping Moeslepark
overview: Very friendly young couple running the campground in the Black Forest and close to the city.

name: Boulevard Sarandi Hostel
overview: Opened in July 2009. Clean and spacious. Breakfast, towel, Internet and Wi-Fi included. Free use of the kitchen.

name: Christophers by the Bay Bed & Breakfast
overview: Award winning bed & breakfast close to galleries, shopping, dining and nightlife. Ten guest rooms, both private and shared bath available. An inviting common room, sumptuous continental breakfast and a relaxing sunny back patio.

name: Y Garth 5* Boutique B&B
overview: Luxury accommodation situated near Newport - within a 10minute walk of coast path/100yds from coastal bus pick-up/drop off; Free Wi-Fi; Private Parking. Visit Wales 5 * Gold Award for past 5 years; 2014 AA Breakfast Award.

name: Tigerfish lodge
overview: Snugly situated in the heart of Komatipoort Tigerfish lodge is the perfect getaway accommodation for those that wish to experience the multitude of tourist attractions in this well traversed area.  With the Mozambique and Swaziland borders just minutes away as well as the oldest gate into the world renowned Kruger National Park crocodile river gate, we are the perfect location for affordable accommodation for those that just need a place to stay over night and of course those that seek a safe haven to enjoy the many tourist attractions in the area.  Has comfortable air conditioned accommodation in our 3 star guest apartments. All of which are serviced, on suit and self catering, with the option of enjoying breakfasts, lunch or dinner at the on site restaurant Kitsch-Inn.  Tigerfish Lodge also offers secure parking as well as private braai facilities and has all the necessary contacts for the activities available in the area, from elephant back safaris to day or night drives in the Kruger National Park or tiger fishing on the Inkomati River. There are a host of various day activities to satisfy even the most extreme of adventurers to relaxing at the pool with fresh cocktails in the summer sun.

name: Casa Carioka Rio Hostel
overview: A hostel with breakfast, kitchen, laundry, WiFi, security lockers and hot showers. Tours can also be arranged to the main tourist attractions.

name: Dreamkatchers Lake Powell Bed & Breakfast
address: 1055 S. American Way, Big Water, Utah
overview: Full Breakfast Included, Free Parking, Free Wifi, Three (3) Guest Rooms with private baths priced at

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clearwater - Ulmerton Road
overview: Guest rooms and Suites. Meeting Space in Clearwater. Close to Clearwater/St.Petersburg Airport

name: Desert Rose
overview: Spacious 284 condo-styled suites with the comforts of a vacation resort. Sparkling resort pool and hot tub, surrounded by lush foliage.

name: Hampton Inn Milwaukee
overview: Right on Wisconsin Ave in the heart of Downtown. Free internet, newspaper, breakfast.

name: Apartments Sidro
overview: There are 40 beds in fifteen rooms.

name: Hotel Imperial
overview: directly on the central street of the city. Comfortable, recommended over other options, little bit pricier. Restaurant Bavaria behind the hotel with outside seating and extremely loud karaoke during the summer months. Sauna onsite.

name: St Ermin's Hotel
overview: Small but well appointed rooms in a convenient location near Westminster Abbey.

name: Residence Inn Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf
overview: Has a beautiful view of the Boston Harbor and complimentary services like: a buffet breakfast, the morning newspaper, and a coffee and tea room. Their guest services include: an ATM, grocery shopping service, and room service. On site they offer the Harborwalk Café on Tudor Wharf, which is American cuisine of lunch and dinner. This hotel also includes and indoor pool and a fitness center. The price range of this hotel is $229 to $259 per night.

name: Bhu Nga Thani Resort
overview: 60 rooms. Curiously up-market considering its setting on less obviously impressive Rai Leh East. Restaurant rarely busy, but beautiful design.

name: Mut Mee Guesthouse
overview: Long-established and understandably popular. In a tree-filled garden overlooking the river. It has both simple and higher quality rooms surrounded by hammocks and a variety of seating. It has a boat called the ''Nagarina'' which cruises on the river at sunset. Mut Mee owns the Gaia Bar which floats on the Mekong river below. Bicycles for rent. Yoga & meditation classes are available. Large range of good food and drinks available for all even if you are not staying here. Vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes offered. Free Wi-Fi. Good bookshop with a very wide selection of English language books. Good open-air massage service. Free maps of Nong Khai available with much information of what to do and see in the area and help planning trips.

name: Asa Ransom House
overview: It was on this property that the first white settler of Clarence, Asa Ransom, built his home and grist mill in 1799 (though the present building is not the original one; it was built in the 1850s, some years after Ransom's death, by a subsequent owner). But that's not the only superlative that applies to the Asa Ransom House—today, it is known as almost inarguably the best-known and best-loved lodging in Clarence, as well as the most elegant and charming bed & breakfast in Erie County. Its restaurant is lauded by many locals as their favorite, the most elegant, the most romantic, ad infinitum. The ten rooms at the Asa Ransom House are delightfully appointed with period furniture, distinctive, individualized decor in eclectic styles, and lovely and serene views of the impeccably manicured grounds. All rooms contain private baths, radio and hidden TV with cable, free WiFi, individual climate-control units, hair dryers, and irons and ironing boards; all but one of the rooms also has a fireplace. Some rooms also contain refrigerators and porches or balconies. Additionally, a full country breakfast is provided to guests each morning.

name: Delta Calgary South Hotel
overview: Near Southland Drive and MacLeod Trail, suites. 10 min walk to Southland LRT (tram) Station.

name: Hotel Ibis Bregenz
overview: 24-hour bar, internet, pets accepted.

name: South Coast Backpackers
overview: A backpacker spot with dorms from 1050ksh and privates from 2600ksh. Free wifi.

name: Best Western Premier Art Hotel
overview: Not your average Best Western chain hotel. This trendy and comfortable 4-star hotel is decorated with a mixture of antiques, design and art. On top of that, it's located right in the center and in one of the cities main landmarks: the Light Tower.

name: Hotel Holy City
overview: Rooms : 24, Central air-condition, foreign exchange, travel desk, 24 hours room service, car rental, laundry Service, Doctor on Call,  Wi-Fi in Lobby. - Room types: Deluxe,Super Deluxe, Family Deluxe, Family Super Deluxe

name: Reef Townsite Campground
overview: Located on the site of the old mining town of Reef, with many relics of the old town still visible. Great views, toilets available, no water. Trailers under 12' permitted; longer trailers cannot navigate the steep switchbacks up the mountain. Reservations can be made [http://www.recreation.gov/ online].

name: Hotel SB Icaria Barcelona
overview: Modern hotel close to the beach and Port Olimpic. Amenities include free Wifi, a solarium with a pool and fitness room. Some rooms are suites with either a study (for business) or a jacuzzi.

name: Media Hotel
overview: Near Mangga Dua and Kemayoran area.  Rooms are old. The 17th and 18th floor offer executive rooms in Chinese and Balinese theme, respectively. Chinese, Thai restaurants, many lounges.

name: SPACE riverhouse
overview: A remote hostel, surrounded by nature on the riverside with a ambient chillout lounge overlooking the river. Great Western breakfast.

name: Filomena e Francesca B&B
overview: Bed and Breakfast. Three rooms with private bathrooms and air-con.

name: Harbour Towers Hotel & Suites
overview: Downtown, 196 guestrooms, ocean and mountain views.

name: D'Angleterre
overview: This is easily Copenhagen's most exclusive hotel. Set in a classical building overlooking Kongens Nytorv and the royal theater, it can trace its roots back to 1755. The service is impeccable, and the historic interiors are down right amazing.

name: Oleandry Youth Hostel
overview: Discounts for IYHF card owners.

name: The Colombi Hotel
overview: The most luxurious hotel and only five-star in Freiburg. It is situated on the edge of the town centre and overlooks Colombi Park. It is a short walk from the main railway station and features a renowned restaurant.

name: Rikka Inn
overview: The first boutique hotel right on Khao San Road with good rooms in a modern style. They have air conditioning, private toilet and bathroom, but not much more. The swimming pool on the roof is an attraction, but only open from 10:00. Small and large safe deposit boxes available at 20-40 baht/day. The obligatory 1,000 baht deposit is uncool though.

name: HI-Jasper
overview: Open all year. This large 78-bed hostel was the original ski lodge in Jasper and has a good communal feel that is sorely lacking in many big-city hostels. It is the closest budget accommodation to the Jasper townsite and a great base for hikers. In winter, staff transform the surrounding property into a snowboarding terrain park. The large deck makes a great place for a BBQ in summer and there's an outside bonfire year-round. The hostel has a full kitchen, laundry facilities, tv room, comfortable common room, running water, showers, electricity, and very friendly staff. Be warned though, the dorms are BIG: 48 beds in the co-ed dorm and 30 beds in the female dorm can make for loud night. Bring earplugs.

name: Hotel Alma
overview: On the U of C campus in northwestern Calgary. Offers 81 '''Euro-style''' hotel rooms and 15 one-bedroom suites year round. These rooms were built to be hotel rooms for the university hospitality management program, and have never been student residences. The '''Alma Seasonal Residence''' program also has hundreds of apartments and student dorm rooms from early May to late August. Access to on-campus services like fitness facilities, laundry, parking, cafeterias.

name: Crowne Plaza
overview: For the price it costs, you get an incredible five-star hotel. The rooms are incredibly luxurious with all necessary amenities and the service is better than some of the more expensive hotels. Breakfast is large and varied. Also, there's a gym on the 24th floor.

name: Gaslamp Plaza Suites
overview: Housed in a beautiful historic building, this hotel offers lovely rooms and complimentary breakfast - served on the rooftop terrace (weathering permitting).

name: Scandic Glostrup
overview: Port of the omnipresent Scandinavian hotel chain, this place is probably best suited as a motel for a stop over, as it is located directly adjacent to the highway.  Billiard room, restaurant and a children's playground.

name: NH Deutscher Kaiser
overview: Located at the across the street of the central station, this hotel wins points for location, but is quite a soulless hotel, although the staff is attentive.

name: Central B&B
address: 7th Floor, Lansdowne Court, 5B, Sarat Bose Rd
overview: 10 minute drive from Park Street and 1 minute from Minto Park. It’s on the 7th floor of a residential apartment. 4 bedrooms with attached bathrooms, common kitchen. All rooms are air conditioned. Owners live in the same building. Great location, safe, and 24/7 security. Recommended for backpackers.

name: Park-Lake Motel
overview: A small motel on North Main Street.

name: Hôtel Fleur de Lys
overview: Open all year; Jan-Apr by prior reservation only. A centrally located 34-room hotel that blends modern amenities with traditional decor. All rooms contain coffeemaker, hair dryer, fridge and air conditioning; rooms with kitchenettes available on request. Air-conditioned dining room features a continental breakfast buffet daily 7AM-10AM. Coin laundry, free WiFi, business centre. Access to pool at neighbouring '''Riôtel''' available to guests free of charge. Pets accepted.

name: Hotel Windsor
overview: A central and cheap hotel, '''only''' catering to gays and lesbians. Some rooms with private showers, the rest have shared facilities in the corridors. The staff is very knowledgeable about the local gay scene.

name: The Peninsula
overview: Just across the river from the Oriental hotel, this is a worthy competitor for being one of the world's best hotels. Prices are a little cheaper than the Oriental, but still usually above 13,000 baht. There's a free shuttle service to BTS Saphan Taksin station and River City pier.

name: Albergo Ristorante La Lucciola
overview: An hotel above the village, with a wide view on Esino Lario and the mountains. 13 rooms, 20 beds.

name: Holiday Inn Express Nogales
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, no smoking.

name: Hotel Omni Mont-Royal
overview: This five-star, four-diamond luxury hotel is centered amongst fashionable boutiques, museums, fine dining, and the exciting nightlife of Montreal's chic rue Crescent.

name: Residence Inn Calgary Airport
overview: 100% non-smoking. Free breakfast, long stays.

name: Geitvågen Camping
overview: Camping place around 10 km out of town. Quite big, but the bus routes to the city are very sparse. Buses 10 and 15 go just past it.

name: Jarl Hotel
overview: Hotel Jarl is a modern family-run hotel in the centre of Voss - by the river "Vosso". All rooms have bathroom, TV and mini bar. Swimming hall, sauna and solarium. Light and intimate restaurant, lounge and bar. Large car park. Free transport to the railway station and the alpine centre.

name: Mathew S. Burrows 1890 Inn
overview: Bed and Breakfast.

name: Fairmont Chateau Laurier
overview: The city's [[grand old hotels|grand old hotel]]: its oldest and most famous luxury hotel as well as one of its landmarks. Rooms facing west overlook the Rideau Canal locks and have stellar views of the Parliament buildings.

name: Sheraton Hotel
overview: the most visible and glitzy hotel in Ankara.

name: SPM House
overview: Decent cheap rooms in good location. They also have a street side make shift bar outside. They also rent motorbikes for 200 baht per day and bicycles for 60 baht per day.

name: Auberge de la Jeunesse L'Atlantide
overview: Situated in a quiet residential neighborhood on the north end of the island off the Rue Bouet and Avenue Mermoz, this modest hostel is clean, quiet and comfortable and is sure to be a great place to stay that is easy on the wallet. Some of the rooms even have views of the tree lined Avenue Mermoz and there is a nice courtyard at the center of the hostel with a long table in which to swap stories with other travelers and have a cold soda.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Buffalo Downtown
overview: This gleaming new property opened in October 2014 in the first fourteen floors of the thoroughly rehabilitated '''Tishman Building''' on the north side of Lafayette Square, and the rooms on the upper floors boast impressive views of the downtown skyline and Lake Erie from their huge windows. Guests can avail themselves of modern amenities such as a heated indoor pool, ample fitness center, 24-hour business center, complimentary wireless Internet and an onsite gift shop; 124 guest rooms all contain mini-fridges and microwaves, 39-inch LCD TVs, and MP3 alarm clocks. Kick back and relax in the large second-floor bar or by the fireplace in one of two conservatories, or have a bite to eat at the '''Garden Grille and Bar''' which is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Valet parking is available at a rate of $18/day, or you can try your luck with on-street parking is available, though it's subject to metered rates and availability is quite scarce.

name: Stoun Hotel and Klub
overview: Services: Café "Don Udon", Karaoke restaurant, Bar, Bowling, Two dance floors, Finnish sauna. This hotel can provide invitation letter.

name: Budget Inn
overview: High speed internet available. No smoking.

name: The Swan Hotel
overview: A good central location at the bottom of the High Street on the embankment. The hotel was built in 1794, with more recent extensions increasing its size to 113 rooms. Rooms start around £90.

name: Chokaiso
overview: Hotel and onsen.

name: Ritz-Carlton San Francisco
overview: This hotel has a spacious lounge, fitness center, pool, and 4 star dining room in a Beaux-Arts building. It has 336 guestrooms, including 60 suites.

name: Hotel Union Øye
overview: Classical wooden hotel.

name: Hotel Alley
overview: In the heart of the historic centre, in a calm environment of city parks.

name: Residence Töglhof
overview: Family driven with view to Odle/Geisler mountains. Rooms, Suite and Apartment.

name: The Williams House
overview: The Williams House is a Victorian home from the 1880s. The size is 2750 square Feet.  It sleeps 16 guests in beds, 11 individually. Building a frame house in Breckenridge before the arrival of the railroad was no small task. To erect this c.1881 house and the one next door (301 N. Main),Breckenridge saloonkeeper Joseph F. Reeder had to chop down trees, drag them to the sawmill, have them milled for different uses—siding, flooring, shingles, etc.—and let them dry. Inflating the cost of construction was the need to pack finished building materials—nails, paint, and doors— over a high mountain pass at a cost of forty cents per pound. In 1888, John Williams, a hardrock miner, and his wife, Minta, purchased the house as their home. After John and Minta’s separation in 1890, Minta and their daughter, Ethel, continued to live here until 1906, renting it out from time to time as they pursued an acting career for Ethel. The Williams House is featured in the Historic Walking Tour.

name: Barali Beach Resort
overview: Nice little resort on the beach.

name: Esra Hotel Apartments
overview: In essence two apartment buildings for up to max. 30 people in ca. 16 rooms.

name: Riad Papillon
overview: A riad with five beautiful rooms: Rose, Jasmin, Bougainvillea, Hibiscus and Geranium. located in the heart of the Dar el Basha antique district which is very safe. Cuisine is exceptional, service is warm and attentive but discrete, loan of local phone/ ipad , Iphone charger, bathrobes, complimentary breakfast and wifi internet. Very romantic and wonderful atmosphere with welcoming dipping pool and tent on rooof terrace. Brilliant reviews on trip advisor. Airport pickups available.

name: Sakura Guesthouse
overview: This nice guesthouse, run by a very friendly Kyrgyz-Japanese couple, has two 6 bed dorms (with absolutely no additional furniture) and a collection of single and double rooms. Bathrooms are plentiful and spotless, with Western-style toilets, that are strictly BYO - toilet paper that is. There is also a small pool (2 x 3 m), an outdoor kitchen where you can do some cooking, and an area for hanging out and chatting. Free laundry. Free wifi. Bikes and motorcycles are welcome to park inside. The Japanese half of the owners might join you to the nightlife of the city if his wife is out of town. The alleys around the guesthouse are not lit and can feel a bit scary at night but are safe to go around.

name: Hostelgate
overview: Small hostel. Free wi-fi and internet, free tea and coffee, free parking.

name: Hotel Crystal Palace
address: corner of Al Fairouz St and Al Fayaa St
overview: The hotel offers cozy rooms, all of which have air-conditioner, cable TV, mini-bar, and safe. Some of its amenities are Wi-Fi connectivity, health club, business centre, and laundry service.

name: Sundance Resort
overview: Standard rooms, studios, suites, and 2-4 bedroom homes at Sundance Ski Resort up Provo Canyon.

name: Camping Cabins
overview: Two wooden cabins are available, each with 4 single mattresses. These are fully insulated, with solar lighting.

name: Mindgrep HQ Rural Hackerspace
overview: Shared sleeping spaces available to hackers to work on rural projects and other volunteer work in the village.

name: Super 8
overview: Free wireless internet and free breakfast available. Pets allowed for an extra fee.

name: Barefoot Hostel
overview: A clean, modern hostel located downtown. Included for use is a mini-kitchen, back patio with lounge chairs, common room with a huge HDTV, computer (with internet), free WiFi, plush bed linens, lockers and three shared bathrooms. Rates start at $29/night/per person and you can book online. Make sure to check their website or Twitter page for current promotions.

name: Quality Inn On Fenton Rotorua
overview: Centrally located within easy walking distance of shopping, restaurant and attractions.

name: La Casa de Felipe
overview: Popular hostel. Several apartments some with kitchen, dormitory and hammocks if everything else is full. There is a communal kitchen, internet facilities, free wifi, laundry service, nice terraces and a friendly staff. Always crowded by backpackers. 15 minutes by walking from the beach.

name: Citadella Pansion
overview: Services: wellness center with sauna and Jacuzzi, resting-room, a winter garden, bike storage, wireless internet, camera controlled parking, enclosed garage, Drink-bar, non-smoking roomswinter garden, 24/7 reception,

name: Hostel Mamallena
overview: Hostel Mamallena, Cartagena is the first Colombian hostel opened by the Panamanian Hostel Mamallena. We bring to Cartagena our high levels of service, variety of rooms, orthopedic mattresses, free WiFi, garden courtyard and friendly staff. The majority of our rooms have private bathrooms and can sleep from 1 to 5 people. Dorms are large and airy and have private bathrooms as well. Budget tours to the volcano, Playa Blanca and Islas Rosarios are also available. We were the first hostel to start booking boats between Panama and Colombia and we´ve bought that experience to Cartagena. Even if you choose not to stay with us feel free to drop by for whatever you may need.

name: Kingsmills Hotel
overview: Four star hotel about 1 mile from the centre of Inverness.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Joint Base Andrews
overview: Local hotel.

name: Hotel Santa Rosa
address: Carretera Málaga-Almería 125. Torrox Costa El Morche
overview: Hotel Santa Rosa is a small but welcoming hotel situated on the sea front.

name: New Majestic
overview: By the people who brought you Hotel 1929, this too is a refurbished shophouse, but the 30 rooms comes in four themes: mirror, hanging bed, aquarium and loft. Nice pool (although in shade for much of the day), small gym, free Wi-Fi, good restaurant with views of the pool — from underneath!

name: Art'otel Dresden by Park Plaza
overview: Contemporary art gallery hotel with restaurant and bar as well as a healthclub and free Wi-Fi access.

name: Happy Day Pension
overview: Services:  Internet, TV, fridge, free parking

name: Natsuse Onsen Miyakowasure
address: 84 Natsuse, Sotsuda, Tazawako, 田沢湖卒田字夏瀬84
overview: A onsen inn in the mountains. All guest rooms have a hot spring bath.

name: Hotel Andreola Central
overview: Four-star hotel located 200 metres from the central train station.

name: Mercure Vientiane
overview: The former Novotel in new premises. Friendly staff with surprisingly good English, a peaceful courtyard with spotless pool, fitness centre, and steam bath. Family friendly. Sunday brunch (11:00-15:00) at 130,000 kip including use of pool and fitness centre. Saturday and Sunday poolside BBQ (15:00-18:00). Despite the prices, Wi-Fi costs extra (starting from 20,000 kip per hour).

name: BK Hostel
overview: They do not have dorm rooms. Nice atmosphere, kitchen and laundry.

name: Regina Hotel
overview: Small hotel located in quiet residential district of Vilijampole offers 10 comfortable rooms.

name: Jusenny
address: Jl. Senayan 29, Blok S, Kebayoran Baru,
overview: Basic hotel with minimally adequate facilities in rooms. Rooms and other parts of the interior may look grim to some, if not many.

name: Khemara Battambang Hotel
address: No 224, Old National Rd No 5, Roumcheck 4 Village, Sangkat Rathanak
overview: Very comfortable beds, clean rooms with Internet access (LAN cable, but in some rooms a connection from a nearby Wi-Fi network is available), TV, air-con, fan and a fridge. Car parking possible. Also has great outdoor swimming pool. In room massage available from USD5/hr. Bicycle hire USD4/day.

name: Best Western Hotel Plaza Matamoros
overview: A nice, modern hotel.  Prices are about US$50-75, which includes parking and breakfast.

name: Casa del Mar
overview: One of the only hotels in Santa Monica that is directly on the Beach and has prices that reflect this rare amenity. Share pools, spas, etc. with Shutters.

name: Château Jasper
overview: Hotel, restaurant and conference facilities.

name: Red Wall Hotel
address: 31 Shatan North Street (沙滩北街31号; Shātānběijiē)
overview: Rooms with free internet. Business center, gift shop and beauty salon available. Chinese and Wester restaurant as well as coffee shop.

name: Kempinski Hotel Airport Munich
overview: The only hotel on the airport premises.

name: Ascott Raffles City Beijing
address: 1-2 Dongzhimen South Street; 东直门南大街1-2号)
overview: The residence in Dongzhimen offers apartments, ranging from one to three-bedrooms, with separate living and dining area, a kitchen, Bose DVD Home Entertainment System and Internet access.

name: Crowne Plaza Resort Salalah
overview: A better alternative for luxury accommodation as the property is much larger than the Hilton and more importantly it is close to the city center.

name: Ulaa Patagonia
address: Lago Las Rocas, Lago Puelo 6km away from the town of Segundo Corral
overview: Ulaa Patagonia is a secluded resort located inbetween lakes Las Rocas and Puelo Inferior. It features more than 200 hectares of wilderness covered by forests of millenary alerces and arrayanes. A must if you're in the area!

name: Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten Kempinski
overview: An elegant grand hotel with 150 years of tradition.

name: Sunglow Ranch
overview: In addition to full room and board, this guest ranch also offers photography and yoga workshops.

name: Hotel Zakaria International
overview: Value for money. The rooms are clean and en suite.

name: Old Monterey Inn
overview: A historic bed and breakfast featuring fabulous gardens. Breakfast included. Pet friendly rooms available.

name: Radisson Blu Astorija Hotel
overview: President Bush and Prince Charles have enjoyed the great service offered here. Private saunas are offered in some rooms.

name: Novotel Sydney Hotel on Darling Harbour
overview: great views and the convenience of three modes of public transportation at your doorstep.

name: The Cove Beach Bungalows
overview: Khmer-style wooden bungalows, air-conditioned rooms and apartments with balconies giving ocean views. Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and Western and Khmer foods.

name: Royal Mekong
overview: Fancy hotel slightly outside town. Now in need of renovation. But has a decent swimming pool that non-guests can use for 90 baht.

name: Pension Mayer
overview: This modest bed and breakfast is located directly inside Schladming.

name: Avalon Hotel
overview: Free parking, internet wireless, phone/fax access. Secured access during night, restaurants table reservations and airport transfer.

name: The Lone Star Saloon Bar and Guesthouse
overview: Texas-themed restaurant with 3 apt-sized rooms upstairs available as guesthouse rooms. On a quiet street near the riverside. Air-con, hot water, free fast Wi-Fi, mini fridge stocked with drinks at bar prices. Caters to local expats and provides travel info for those new to Cambodia.

name: Arany Szarvas Inn
overview: 20 double and 7 triple rooms). Each room has a bathroom, partly balcony, TV-set, air-conditioner, phone, Wi-Fi and minibar. The high-standard recreation of the guests is provided by sauna, infra sauna, jacuzzi and massage. conference room (with a capacity of maximum 90 persons) , garden terrace (seats for 120 persons)

name: Hotel Jerez Suites
overview: Off Coahuila on Mutualismo #450. $15-$25 a night.

name: Hotel Brosundet
overview: The Hotel Brosundet is a one hundred years old protected harbour building in Ålesund that has been tastefully restored as a hotel.

name: Fairfield Inn
overview: Free WiFi and coffee maker in all rooms. Indoor pool and free breakfast available.

name: MaxGramper houses
overview: Different guest house style houses for rent at different rates with or without pool. Air-con in every bedroom. Daily housekeeping included.

name: Cubahostel
overview: A nice hostel, with modern and inventive decoration, just off Nevsky Prospekt, near the Church of Our Lady of Kazan. Although it's advertised as a party hostel and situated over an English pub, noise isn't a problem.

name: Bolands Guesthouse
overview: bolands guesthouse accommodation is located in the heart of dingle town.Beautiful views of dingle bay.The kerry accommodation is only 2 mins walk to pubs,restraints,shops etc.

name: Hotel Empire
overview: 34, place de la Gare. Located right across from central station. Small rooms, but cheap and a good location. July 2011 prices were 65€ for single occupancy, 75€ for double. Has indoor storage for bikes as well as an air compressor and tool kit. Breakfast included.

name: Tokyo Prince Hotel
overview: If you insist on staying in a "western" hotel near Roppongi, and have to stay within a budget (under ¥20,000 per night), the Tokyo Prince Hotel is one of your few options. The hotel is almost at the base of the Tokyo Tower and is located in a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood just a 15-minute walk from the action in Roppongi. The hotel staff speak English, and the hotel has the amenities of its modern competitors. But it is a bit of a throwback. The beds are short, the decor is tacky, and everything (except the DSL) feels a little dated.

name: Hotel Centrum
overview: Near the central station, have some good value deals from time to time, , free wired internet and friendly staff, but rooms are a little on the spartan side. Entry to the Swim Centre and the Gym of DGI byen is free for all hotel guest

name: Centric Point Hostel
overview: Opened in 2006. Doubles, twins and family rooms, quads, and 6/8/10 person dorms - all with en-suite bathrooms except the 10 person dorms. Kitchen facilities, common room with bar, free Wi-Fi, and free breakfast. A very busy hostel lots of high school groups.

name: Anis Louise Guest House
overview: 4-star guesthouse with private on-site carpark, free wi-fi, and digital TV. All rooms with en-suite bathrooms.

name: Magnolia House Non-Smoking Bed and Breakfast
overview: Beautiful old Victorian villa set in gardens.

name: The Desmond
overview: is one of the best places to stay in the Albany area (though it is a bit further away than one might like, near Albany International Airport.) The Desmond's charm is in its embracement of the historical group of [[Touring Shaker country|Shaker's]] who once were a big part of the Capital Region. The Desmond often hosts weddings and has two quality restaurants on site, Simpson's and Scrimshaw. Free internet in rooms, free wireless internet in lobby. Entirely non-smoking.

name: Magazine Wood B&B
overview: Bed and breakfast overlooking the North Norfolk coast. Set in 3 acres of park and woodland looking over the coast from the village of Sedgeford.  Villages such as  Burnham Market, Brancaster, Thornham and Holme are a few minutes drive away.

name: Budapest Hostel
overview: There are 81 beds available in double to 8 bedded rooms with private bathroom, toilet and lockers. Some of the rooms are air-conditioned. The price includes sheets and breakfast. +phone=+36 30/686-1653.

name: Ukraina Hotel
overview: ул.Октябрьская, 41а.

name: The Ahwahnee
overview: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|15px|frameless]] 99 luxury hotel rooms and 24 cottages in Yosemite Valley.  The lodge is a national historic landmark and the most upscale lodging in the park, with rooms facing Half Dome, Glacier Point or the West Valley.  There is a small heated outdoor pool.  There are three fully accessible rooms, four partially accessible, and two fully accessible cabins.

name: Che Lagarto Hostel Copacabana
overview: One of the most popular backpackers spots in Copacabana. It is located two blocks away from the beach.

name: EnduRoMania
overview: They also organize enduro events.

name: Lobi Lafu Camp
overview: Lobi Lafu – “love laughing” – is located just north of Atjoni at the Apresina Sula. It has 5 jungle huts with 20 beds and 30 places in hammock camps. The adventure team of Lobi Lafu offers multiple jungle activities like the canopy Zip Line, abseiling, rafting and hiking to the nearby Marron villages.

name: Sport Hotel
overview: Prices incl. Buffet breakfast, Use of closed parking spaces and Internet access

name: Thon Hotel Rosenkrantz
overview: Hotel Rosenkrantz is a comfortable hotel located just behind Bryggen. The hotel serves an evening buffet included in the room price every night except in the summer season. There is a number of nightclubs in the vicinity.

name: Batumi Hostel
overview: Comfortable hostel in a nice house in the middle of the old town. Entrance is camouflaged. Discounts available in and from Friends Hostel in the old town of Tbilisi. Free WIFI. Laundry. Private room also available. Two showers and bathroom, kitchen, view on piazza and sea from balcony. Seasonal property (opened for 2012 season in May).

name: Royal International Leipzig
overview: This hotel is very close to the train station and to downtown. The rooms are big with a built-in kitchen. Free internet.

name: 4 Rivers Floating Lodge
overview: Luxury resort. Meals not included.

name: Tazawako Sports Center Campsite
address: Shimotakano, Obonai, Tazawako 田沢湖生保内字下高野
overview: The place to be ski area in the winter. There are many hot springs near.

name: Ole Mink Farm
overview: Outdoor resort. Rates listed are for two nights with two adults. Cabins have full kitchens, cable TV, wi-fi, fireplace (with firewood), and an outdoor picnic area. There is also a swimming pool and a playground.

name: Gasthof Kolb
overview: Small family-run guest house in the northern part of Bayreuth with restaurant and an attached ''Biergarten''. Located near the ''Bezirkskrankenhaus'' at the edge of the city, the Gasthof Kolb lies within walking distance to the forests around the ''Hohe Warte'' as well as the Festival Theater.

name: Crowne Plaza Birmingham City Centre
overview: As nondescript as a Crowne Plaza gets, this hotel was originally built to serve the ICC next door. Despite having been updated since, it still has a somewhat sombre presence.

name: Lindner Hotel & City Lounge Antwerpen
overview: This hotel belonging to a German upscale chain is hidden in a tower in a modern mixed development behind the Centraal station, and affords nice views of the city from its upper-floor lounges and gym, as well as comfortable rooms outfitted in a subdued, modern fashion.

name: Blackbridge Airport Lodge
overview: En suite bedrooms with television. Conservatory for guest use. Five kilometres from airport. Transport arranged.

name: Pension Vasko
overview: Double and triple rooms with mountain view, own bathroom, wooden furniture and TV LCD. Original dinning/living room. Free parking, billiards and WiFi. Rich breakfasts. Wooden gazebo. Just meters from ski and snowboard slopes. Maps and videos on own website.

name: Hotel Sarina
overview: 5* hotel, all rooms have high speed internet connection along with dedicated port for laptop, mini bar, in-room safe and satellite TV. Has an Italian restaurant on site.

name: Sugbutel Bed & Bath
address: S Osmena St, North Reclamation area
overview: 3-5 min walk from SM City Cebu Mall complex and close to Cebu International Convention Center (CICC). Hostel accommodation with A/C accommodation area free WiFi, 24 hr security with CCTV cameras, 24 hr back-up generator and entertainment area with wide screen LCD TV. Rooms for 2-8. a good place for backpackers to stay.

name: Ihusi Hotel
overview: Popular top-end hotel in the centre.  Has a lovely lake view and a swimming pool.

name: 10 Fitch
overview: Luxurious, romantic, inn.

name: Horton Grand Hotel
overview: A luxurious Victorian era hotel in the Gaslamp Quarter.

name: Villa Sanluca
overview: The Villa Sanluca is a beautiful B&B guesthouse in Nyon with garden, swimming pool and 3 exceptional rooms with evocative names: La Vie en Rose, Rêve d’Eau and Parfum d’Orient. It's located in an old mansion close to the town centre in a quiet and private atmosphere. Hearty Swiss breakfast, wireless Internet access and car parking is included in the price.

name: Hotel Vitkov
overview: Opened after reconstruction at the beginning of January 2007. Spacious, comfortable and luxurious rooms.

name: Backstreet International Youth Hostel
address: 3 Renmin Rd/人民路3号(Across from the Sheraton Hotel)
overview: Most well established hostel. Newly renovated as of 2011 and in the heart of the city center. Bright and fun atmosphere in the main lounge. All essential services are included: Free Wi-Fi, international calling and Skype, Western- style restaurant and fully licensed bar, tour packages(Bamboo raft to Yangshuo along the Li River and 1-day tours to the Longsheng Rice Terraces), bicycle rental, towel rental, heating, transportation services (ticket booking, airport pick-up & drop-off), common area, hot water, clean drinking water, laundry, storage room, and weekly events. Extremely well trained, competent and informative English speaking staff.

name: Pan Pacific Suzhou
overview: Nice western style hotel, pool, gym, old restaurant, but somewhat expensive. The tap water is filtered and drinkable. Good internet connections. There is a large and very nice garden right behind the Sheraton which is nice to visit (Staying at the hotel allows free access to the Pan Men Garden). Previously the "Sheraton Suzhou Hotel and Towers"

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Davenport
overview: Free high-speed Internet, continental breakfast, fitness center and indoor pool.

name: JK Hankok
overview: Web page available only in Korean, reservations by phone.

name: Hotel Abacus
overview: Four-star hotel with a parking area, 5 meeting rooms, restaurant, wellness and fitness center.

name: Hostería Tierra de Leyendas
overview: Cozy lodge with five rooms and a small restaurant with large windows facing the Beagle Channel.

name: FWD House Hostel
overview: A 10-minute walk to the temples and Loi Kroh Rd, and a minute walk to the Sunday night market. Owner and staff are welcoming, friendly, can cater to your personal needs, and also make you feel at home.

name: Fairlawn Hotel
overview: a relic of the British Raj and oozing with charm and character. - phoneextra=+91 33 2252 8767

name: Fetzers Landhotel
overview: Small hotel with attached restaurant, a little expensive but acceptable quality.

name: Azalai Hotel Salam
overview: Most luxurious of the three Azalai hotels in Bamako, and one of the best in town. Very nice pool. Expensive but nice restaurant. Central air, big beds, colour tv, immaculate bathrooms. Hotel bar popular with "professional" women.

name: Gasthof Goldener Stern
overview: A family-run hotel, in a 15th-century house.

name: Stilts Backpackers
overview: There are nice Tree Houses Single/Double/Triple Ksh 1,800/ 1,400/1,000 with shared bathrooms, or cottages Single/Double/Triple/Four 3,000/1,800/1,400/1,000 with attached bathrooms per person per night. Wifi available at the bar for 300 per room for your whole stay.

name: Hotel Mohan International
overview: Four Star Hotel

name: Vagabond Inn Bishop
overview: Large pool, jacuzzi, barbeque areas, free Continental breakfast, free Wi-Fi, guest laundry.

name: Le Westin Montreal
overview: Montreal's newest hotel offers 454 large and well-appointed guestrooms at the gateway to Old Montreal. Each room features the ten-layer Heavenly Bed, and the hotel also offers a unique glass-bottom pool.

name: Alison House Hotel
overview: Small country house-style hotel in quiet setting, own grounds and rural views. Convenient for industrial heritage Arkwright's Cromford Mill and historic village of [[Cromford]]. Family rooms available.

name: Hotel Mühlviertlerhof
overview: Graben 24-26.

name: Ibis Slipi
overview: A (nearly) budget hotel near the CBD. Good old Ibis style interior with basic rooms and its 2 restaurants.

name: Poipu Kai Resort
overview: Between Shipwreck beach and Poipu beach this condo complex has a wide range of sizes and price ranges.  The condos are well maintained and walking distance from the beaches.  If you are travelling with the kids this is a great way to go because you get more space than you do in a hotel, for less money.  Because each condo is fully equipped with kitchens and laundry facilities, you don't necessarily need to eat out for every meal.

name: Wolcott Hotel and Motor Inn
overview: The word that keeps recurring in online reviews of this hotel is "sketchy".  If you can put up with questionable neighbors, dated decor, and a downstairs bar that's a bit of a dive, you'll at least enjoy a cheap rate and a location right in the middle of the village.

name: Mountain View Resort & spa
address: Jalan Kali-Kinilow, Lingkungan VI, Tomohon Utara 95362
overview: This resort features 12 traditional bungalows: double and twin bed, bathroom with western toilet, hot water shower and terrace. It's a but isolated, but it has some lovely outdoor areas and great views. The restaurant serves specialities from the Minahasa Highlands as well as standard Indonesian, Chinese and western dishes. Try the home made Mountain View Grog. The resort is run by German management and offers a wide range of tours into the area as well as rafting and kayaking trips, caving, volcano trekking, waterfall trips, birding, cooking classes etc.

name: Hotel Ülemiste
overview: With a location close to the shore of Lake Ulemiste within walking distance to the airport, this hotel counts as Tallinn's airport hotel. Do note however that, apart from the airport and the Ulemiste shopping centre, it is not quite close to anything. Everything about the hotel is reasonably modern, though let down by small niggles.

name: Beach Villas at Kahaluu
overview: The Beach Villas at Kahaluu represent the first new beach front condos constructed on Alii Drive in the last 20 years. These villas are large, designer decorated,  with the following amenities: infinity pool, spa, gas barbecue, central air conditioning, with plasma TVs.

name: Airport Hotel Bonus Inn
overview: Friendly family-owned hotel with basic but very clean and comfortable rooms. Restaurant, sauna (evening only), free shuttle service to airport (5-7 min).

name: Grand Hyatt Melbourne
overview: Acknowledged as one of Melbourne's finest hotels, it features Art Deco set against Veronese marble, highlighted by art commissioned from around the world. All rooms receive access to the Regency Health Club, open daily from 6AM.

name: Hotel Bel-Air
overview: This picturesque, five-star hotel is a popular destination for weddings, as well as a playground to the affluent.

name: Parfum de Mer
overview: Parfum de Mer is an odd mixed bag: the proprietor, Madeleine, is bilingual, supremely friendly, knowledgeable about things to do in the area, and really gets down to the nitty-gritty in providing guests with a pleasant, peaceful getaway from the workaday world, yet she is also by some accounts a stickler for the rules, especially when it comes to noise. It's located on busy Route 132, but in a quiet location on the outskirts of Pabos, with a peaceful terraced garden in back with sweeping views over Chaleur Bay, and a private beach and kayak launch to boot. Breakfasts are artfully prepared in-house, and Madeleine's homemade jams are legendary—but the preparation happens the night before and the food is refrigerated overnight in the kitchen, with guests left to make their own plates in the morning. The guest lounge and kitchen are spacious and inviting, but tucked away in the basement and, in the case of the kitchen, only open during breakfast time—another of those house rules Madeleine enforces strictly. If you can take the good with the bad, Parfum de Mer might be for you. There's three guest rooms, with decor that's pleasant if a bit dated: two boast a full size bed and come with en suite bathroom and kitchenette, hair dryers, iron and ironing board, and free WiFi; the third room is somewhat larger, with a queen bed and all of the above-listed amenities plus cable TV and soundproof walls. No children under 5 are admitted. Open year-round.

name: Pension Hegyi
overview: free WiFi, Free parking, six rooms

name: Exhibition Court Hotel 4
overview: Neat and tidy 2-star hotel less than 5 minutes walk from Earls Court tube station. They have a 24-hour front desk. Double rooms with bathroom from around £60 (summer pricing) with basic breakfast included. The rooms are nicer than many of the double rooms in the hostels along Earls Court Rd, for much the same price, although there is no wi-fi internet.

name: YMCA
overview: Cheapest option in town. No mosquito net. Book well in advance

name: Legendale Hotel Beijing
overview: Five-star hotel located close to Wangfujing. Rooms of 38-71sqm with free Internet. Business center, beauty salon, karaoke, fitness, swimming pool, massage and sauna available. Chinese and Western restaurants as well as coffee shop and bar.

name: First Hotel Jörgen Kock
overview: Advertised as ‘the hotel with the big rooms’, and they are indeed unusually large by the standards of Scandinavian hotels. The decor is simple but comfortable, in a modern building within an easy walk of the central area. Includes breakfast (with tea and coffee remaining available later in the day) and fast wireless internet. Superior and deluxe rooms have tea/coffee maker.

name: Aria
overview: Two hotel towers, nine bars, 17 restaurants, 1,840-seat theater, gift shop, 800,000 square foot spa, pool and 300,000 square feet of meeting space.

name: JM Residences 3
overview: It's been called the best accommodation in town. Clean and air conditioned rooms, hot water was available at all times. WiFi internet available with OK speeds. Electricity was more or less constant. There's a restaurant with fair prices, ~CFA 6000 for a meal and a drink, 5000 for a full breakfast.

name: Scandic Star Sollentuna
overview: Right by Sollentuna Centrum and the railstation.

name: Holiday Inn
overview: Their soft, white sheets and helpful, English-speaking staff make this hotel one of the best places for English language visitors to Harbin.

name: The Boston Park Plaza Hotel & Towers
overview: A member of the Historic Hotels of America, The Boston Park Plaza has welcomed numerous U.S. presidents and foreign dignitaries. The hotel is located in Boston’s Back Bay neighborhood adjacent to the Boston Public Gardens. The hotel features 941 guest rooms and 38 meeting and conference rooms totaling 14,000 square feet of meeting space.

name: Olympia Beach
overview: On Kokkari's main beach in a two storey building, Twelve double rooms which all feature en-suite bathrooms, satellite TV and controllable air-conditioning, All the rooms have balconies offering an unobstructed view of the Aegean Sea. Cleaning and change of linen is daily.

name: Paragon
overview: Simple hotel near Jalan Sabang. Cheap rooms and a café.

name: Apple Hostel
overview: 5 min on foot to Old Town Square or Wenceslas Square. Kitchen, internet, lockers and a TV/music room. Free breakfast and no curfew..

name: Mulia
overview: The local luxury hotel chain. At the strip that leads to the sports stadium and Senayan shopping complexes. Rooms are many but old (on its way for refurbishment). Premium and wide options of dining experience. Wi-Fi is free in public area, paid at your room. Restaurants can be crowded deeper into meal time.

name: Hostel Sofia
overview: Hostel located next to Tampere Cathedral.

name: Avissa Suites
overview: Situated behind the Ambassador Mall. Boutique style hotel with modern style rooms. You can iron two of your items per day for free! Decent, if not small, breakfast options.

name: Leda Hotel
overview: A 44 room hotel on a sidestreet to Frederikssundsvej, close to Nørrebro station, run by 3 very dedicated girls. Decorated as a traditional Danish Inn.

name: Quest Rotorua Central
overview: Self-contained accommodation in the heart of the Rotorua CBD, close proximity to many bars and restaurants and only 500 meters to the Polynesian Spa.

name: The Levante Parliament
overview: The centrally-located boutique hotel has a beautiful atrium and the Nemtoi Restaurant-Bar. Has free Wi-Fi, as well as fitness and spa rooms.

name: Smokebluff Vacation Rental
overview: 3 bedrooms house and/or 1 bedroom suite located in the heart of Smokebluff Climbing Park, overlooking Squamish with ocean & mountain views (NA)

name: Seal Rock Inn
overview: Nestled at the westernmost edge of the city overlooking The Cliff House and The Sutro Baths' ruins, this hotel has a small pool, volleyball court, and restaurant. You're a bit out of the way from downtown (about a 30 minute drive/bus), but a great location for someone who enjoys San Francisco's nature, or who will be heading to Marin or down to the peninsula, as you are on the other side of most of the clogged commuting routes.

name: Rönneberga
overview: <br>A conference hotel, close view of the archipelago, open as a hostel during summer.

name: Roma Termini Suites
overview: Stylish single, double and triple bedrooms, all with en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, etc.

name: Pierre Coulon Guest House
overview: Comfortable small apartment very convenient to the Marigny bars and restaurants and an easy walk to the French Quarter. A great location from which to explore the many different attractions of New Orleans!

name: Altai Expedition Ger Camp
address: 8 km from Ölgii, 5 km west of airport
overview: It has 10 gers with 2 or 3 beds each. There is a restaurant located in a large ger serving international and Kazakh cuisine. The camp has modern indoor restrooms, clean showers, and WiFi in the restaurant. There is live entertainment and Kazakh art available also. Price of the stay and meals are included in tours.

name: The Westin Melbourne
overview: Modern, chic and elegantly understated.

name: Campanile
overview: If you are travelling by car and on a budget, Campanile is your friend wherever you go - the rooms could not be more simple, but the locations are usually very convenient at motorway junctions. In Birmingham, it is north of town, where the A4540 ringroad meets the A38, which goes straight into the city, and has the added benefit of being located over the Birmingham and Fazeley Canal lock.

name: Asheten Hotel
address: take the easterly fork off Adebabay St just south of the Ethiopian Airlines office and then keep right at subsequent junctions - it's a long uphill hike from the bus station
overview: Nice, quiet place with hot showers.

name: Hotel La Quinta Posada Real
overview: Located near the intersection of Francisco I. Madero & Venustiano Carranza Boulevards.

name: MainStay Suites
overview: At the southern edge of the city, near the airport.

name: Yokam
overview: Popular with everyone from day tripping backpackers to those fortunate few on extended-stay vacations, Yokam has nearly a dozen rooms of varying styles. You’re sure to find one that is to your liking and fits easily into your budget.

name: Travellers' Lodge
overview: Large, friendly hostel in a convenient location near several attractions. Rooms are clean with fan or air-con and en suite bathrooms available. Kitchen, laundry, roof terrace and cafe with internet access. Movies are shown every night. Good value.

name: Indra Regent Hotel
overview: Decent four-star hotel with spacious rooms and a nice view. The staff are friendly, but you don't get a lot for breakfast. Wi-Fi is available for an additional charge. Most people stay here for its close location to the garment markets.

name: DoubleTree Club by Hilton Hotel Buffalo Downtown
overview: Located in the heart of the Medical Corridor and also convenient to Allentown. Business center, fitness center, valet parking, restaurant ("The Carlton Grill"). Connected to '''Roswell Park Cancer Institute''' and '''Buffalo General Hospital''' via covered walkways. Airport shuttle available.

name: Riverside Prague
overview: , A luxurious hotel on the banks of the Vltava. Rates vary by season and room type and there are many package deals available but expect to pay from 5250Kč for a double room per night.

name: Belvedere
overview: By the lake, it has got an out-door swimming pool.

name: Hotel Bandolero
overview: Eight-room rural hotel and restaurant, wi-fi, breakfast dining room, lounge, bar, outdoor pool and terrace

name: Aranya Sundari
overview: Its a beautiful Village cottage Resort with pure taste of peaceful village living. Cottages are very spacious with big size attached toilets with WC, Showers etc. Each cottage has a separate small lobby and natural beauty is great. Tribal dance, Chow dance, campfire, jungle trekking, fishing, tribal village visits etc. lots of ways to spend a few nights with peace and tranquility. You can recharge yourself with garden fresh vegetables and pollution free air.

name: Hotel Ali
overview: Basic but clean, shared bathrooms, squat toilets, Sat TV.

name: Keysan Yunus Hotel
overview: This delightful, intimate boutique hotel is set right on the riverside, with beautiful views to the forest and a backdrop of dramatic mountains. The hotel has well-kept gardens with a variety of roses and other flowers, surrounding the patio area. You can relax on a hammock in the gardens or sunbathe around the pool with a refreshing drink from the bar. The 23 air-conditioned rooms are bungalow style, built in a horse-shoe shape. Each ground floor room has a terrace balcony either looking towards the pool and river, or towards the gardens and mountains.

name: B Arts Boutique Hotel
overview: B Arts Boutique Hotel, arts-boutique hotel opened in 2013, features 17 suites and a signature restaurant by Oscar Velarde.

name: Coblentz Country Cabins
overview: Cabins with jacuzzi tubs, fireplaces, flat screen TVs with DVD, living rooms & kitchenettes.

name: Kis Vakond Children - and Youth Camp
overview: Located: in peaceful environment, near to the forest, at the lake. Suggested for entertainment and sport, Services: suitable for disabled people, garden, children's playground, children's supervision, board games, conference facilities, Table Tennis, Games, BBQ Facilities. - Two quadruple rooms, nine multiple bed rooms. +phones= +36 42 440179, +3642/784075. Mobils: +3630/3228638 and +36 30 3228638.

name: La Quinta Inn Davenport
overview: Free Wi-Fi, meeting space, fitness center and pool.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Park Hotel
overview: In Hagaparken, Solna.

name: &lang=eng
overview: Capacity: 131 people (study period 8). Rooms (34): two double, one triple, thirty one 2+2 bed. Breakfast is served between 7:00 and 9:30. Wellness and other services see at Botanikuskert Hostel. 24-Hour Front Desk. Elevator. Free closed parking inside. Kitchen. Internet and cable television access in rooms. Wheelchair access rooms. Locked bicycle storage. Meeting room, laundry, a smoking room per each level, taxi ordering, bus parking.

name: Hilton Vienna
overview: Home to Vienna’s premier conference centre. Features meeting space for 2-1,800 and provides a business service centre.

name: Deminka Palace Hotel
overview: Located in Prague city center, near the National Museum.

name: Royal Sarovar Portico
overview: 3rd Mile, Sevoke Road. A smart hotel located on the outskirts of town. Convenient for Orbit and Cosmos Shopping Malls. Good views over the Darjeeling Hills.

name: Hotel Dvina
overview: A Soviet-time 12-floor building was renovated recently and is the best location right in the center but still lack in service and comfort. 3 stars.

name: Hotel Sumski Feneri
overview: Upscale family run hotel with excellent reviews. Good value for the money. Spacious rooms. Although it might take a while for them to prepare food and food is not always perfect.

name: Downtown Grand Las Vegas
overview: Stylish hotel rooms with modern amenities and comfortable furnishings. The industrial chic casino features brand new slot machines and table games in a high-energy and intimate environment.

name: Gästehaus Bartsch
overview: The guest house provides parking and garage space. Rooms with balconies are available. A direct-dial telephone is located in each room.  Close to the town and the countryside.  Cyclists welcome.

name: Treehotel
overview: Away from any major city this hotel offers uniquely designed cabins located among the treetops. The hotel offers plentiful of excursions, a restaurant focused on wild game, a large sauna and of course endless views of majestic forests and the Lule river.

name: Petro Palace
overview: A clean, very efficient, and ideally located hotel. It has a spa, swimming pool and gym (but only free for guests before 11AM) and the rooms maids are very efficient - appearing to clean rooms several times a day. It is within a few seconds of several excellent restaurants, coffee bars and a small shop.

name: Rifugio Bogani (Capanna Monza)
overview: Managed mountain shelter with beds and restaurant. Around 50 bunk beds.

name: TOP Hotel Erzgiesserei Europe
overview: Luxurious six-story hotel centrally located close to Stiglmaierplatz (home of Löwenbräu). This four star hotel offers quality standards of furnishing and amenities with a modern flair. During the summertime, you can dine in the garden in the courtyard in a quiet and beautiful surrounding. A private underground car park is available for guests arriving by car.

name: Thon Hotel Wergeland
overview: Situated in the heart of Kristiansand, with the Wergeland Park, the cathedral and the market as its nearest neighbours. The hotel is only one block away from Markens, the most popular shopping street in Kristiansand.

name: Sokos Hotel Seurahuone
overview: Situated three blocks towards the harbor from the Marker Square, is Hotel Seurahuone. Its cosy, personal business and leisure hotel right that is perhaps bit more business oriented than the other Sokos Hotel's in the city. The Hansa and Forum shopping centres are located by the same street, only a few blocks from the hotel. Seurahuone also houses a Spanish style Sevilla restaurant

name: Treberfedd Farm Holiday Cottages
overview: Self catering holiday cottages (including grade II listed thatched farmhouse) on a working organic farm near Lampeter.

name: Landhaus Fuhrgassl-Huber
overview: The hotel is surrounded by wine taverns, hills and wineries. A breakfast buffet is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the courtyard during summer. Free Wi-Fi.

name: The College Club of Boston
overview: The oldest women's college club in the nation is also a reasonably priced B&B next to the Boston Public Garden. Small historic brownstone overlooking Commonwealth Avenue Mall. Eleven newly renovated and individually decorated rooms furnished with antiques.

name: Ole-Sereni Hotel
overview: Wildlife resort overlooking the Nairobi National Game Park.

name: Hotel Villa Emilia
overview: A modern boutique hotel, built in 2006. The hotel is also home to the popular Zinc bar.

name: Summer Hotel Rauma
overview: Open only in summer 1.6. - 31.8. A nice hostel near the center.

name: Nosy Komba Lodge
overview: This lodge offers two bungalows overlooking the ocean that are straight out of a tropical island fantasy.  The owners are an extraordinarily pleasant French family who provide everything you need for an enjoyable trip - boat transfers are easily arranged, snorkel equipment is available for loan, and food and drinks are prepared exquisitely and whenever desired.  The lodge works to support the local village, and one of the two co-owners is a doctor who works closely with the locals when he returns from his main job on Reunion Island.

name: Rancho de la Osa Guest Ranch
overview: A historic guest ranch on the Mexican border which offers guided horseback riding excursions, hikes, mountain biking, and plentiful bird watching opportunities.

name: Marco Polo Hotel
overview: This hotel is located on Yundang Lake, and offers a very good international buffet and a great atmosphere.

name: USA Hostels San Diego
overview: Small hostel in the Gaslamp Quarter. The hostel offers free breakfasts, wireless access, lockers, a laundry room, and bike rentals. They run a tour to Tijuana on Saturdays.

name: Hotel Dnister
overview: Sovietish. Quite big and dark rooms but nice staff with no English, a lift. Several rooms with bathroom en-suite, others with shared. Water supply unreliable. -31 rooms

name: Hotel Hans Egede
overview: Nuuk's largest hotel.

name: Samudra Inn
overview: The hotel is on the second level, you have to use the staircase to go up to the locked gate of the hotel; you have to leave your shoes at the staircase after you enter the gate. Lounge with TV and refrigerator. Laundry service available, rate around RM1.50 per shirt; guests will be given a key to the locked gate. Room rates are posted clearly on a white board at the reception.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
overview: This is New England's only AAA Five Diamond and Mobil Five Star hotel and it is located right across from the Public Garden. The Four Seasons Hotel provides unbeatable views and close proximity to all major attractions. The lobby lounge (Bristol Lounge) has an excellent post-theatre dessert buffet during weekends.

name: West Gate Manor Bed & Breakfast
overview: Enjoy the beauty of the country life in the heart of the city.

name: Bloom Star Hotel
overview: Clean Hotel with two gardens where you can pitch a tent. Also has a parking area.

name: Bury Bach
overview: Five star self catering holiday cottage, sleeping four.

name: Hotel Bellevue
overview: Friendly hotel with wifi in the common areas. Some English is spoken.

name: Florian Hostel
overview: community accommodation 22 rooms, 50 beds. - Pets Allowed, Free Parking, Free Wi-Fi Internet connection. Accapted cards: Visa, Euro / Mastercard.

name: Hotel Louis
overview: Stylish design hotel with amazing view and is home for the best japanese restaurant (Emikoin town. All 72 rooms have a French touch

name: Hotel Diva
overview: Sleek, modern boutique hotel just off Union Square. This place is pretty hip! It's also a non-smoking hotel.

name: Ark Hotel
overview: inside Ark alley. Very impolite staff. May not relay messages left by your local contacts for you, by phone or orally. Especially if you are a female and message was left by male local or vice versa.

name: Elevation Vacations, LLC
overview: Vacation rental managers that provide private home and condominium rentals in Telluride and Mountain Village.

name: Hostel Inn
overview: Price depends on the season, see their website. There's a laundry service with same day pickup.

name: Hotel Shator
overview: Good quality hotel. Relaxed atmosphere.

name: Station Hostel
overview: Basic rooms and facilities and the breakfast is extra but good value nonetheless. They also have storage lockers (deposit) if you want to keep your valuables somewhere safe.

name: Barcelo Atenea Mar
overview: Right at the Nova Mar Bella beach

name: Tourist hotel
overview: is the largest hotel, with a 3-star rating. It is ideal for backpackers, and features "cottages" with attached garages. Camping. Spa. Restaurant.

name: MG Apartments
overview: Nice views over the city, towel changes must be asked. The apartments have complete kitchens with microwave, oven and hob but no meals or breakfast are provided, although there are many restaurants and cafes like starbucks nearby. Internet access (wi-fi) is included in the price. Furniture are modern and well conserved as are the bed and pillows. There are cable TV and LCD monitors. A good deal and location in the city.

name: Camping Krakowianka
overview: It's close to a shopping centre and a tram line, so getting to the centre is easy.

name: Hotel Danmark
overview: A medium-priced, very friendly and cosy hotel in the middle of Copenhagen. Very good location, close to Tivoli. Free wireless and a great breakfast.

name: Symphony Chalet
overview: Well-worn wooden beach front huts (few more would see the beach if it weren't for a canopy they built) and larger stone huts for quite cheap. Wooden hut costs RM40 with bathroom shared by about 10 others, which could use some attention from the staff. Electricity is available from 19:00 to 07:00 with outlet, fan, light in all types of accommodation. Mosquito nets are usually provided. As with all the beach accommodation, security is an issue so bring your own padlock.

name: Toyosato Mumin-mura Youth Hostel
overview: The hostel is surrounded by ranch horses.

name: The Hôtel de l'Institut
