overview: Located between the Latin Quarter and Plateau Mont-Royal, facing one of Montréal’s most charming green spaces, Square Saint-Louis. Free breakfast.

name: Adventure Hostel
address: No.174. Rua Vinícius de Moraes - Ipanema
overview: Dorm-style hostel, a member of Hostelling International.

name: Wigwam Motel
overview: Sleep in a giant tepee (as the natives did, although they did it without air conditioning or cable TV). Various historic vehicles on-site. 15 units, non-smoking, listed US National Register of Historic Places. In the film, the 'wigwams' are traffic cones - a theme depicted as repeated in every detail of the restored property right down to the planters, lamps and alarm clocks.

name: Cab Inn City
overview: Efficient budget hotel, but the rooms are small, and more akin to a hostel than a hotel, save the privacy of having your own room and a private - if small - bathroom, but with the bunk beads. Has free Open wireless network.

name: Golden Crown Plaza Hotel
overview: The standard rooms are very nice and comfortable.

name: 463 Beacon Street Guest House
overview: Budget accommodations near Newbury, Hynes Convention Center, etc. Just a few blocks from the MBTA Hynes stop. Not fancy, not especially clean, but it is worth considering.

name: Hotel Cibeles Resort
overview: Between the city and the mountains of San Rafael.

name: RedMedved Hostel
overview: Party style hostel. Located only 5 min from the main train station. Free towels and bedlinen. Light and spacious rooms.

name: Hotel Longchamp Elysées
overview: 3-star boutique hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London—Westminster
overview: A central london boutique hotel in Westminster. Offers a restaurant, bar, meeting venue and event offers.

name: Riviera Royal Hotel
overview: A low key hotel with a decent half Olympic size pool and good gym.

name: Hotel Brian
overview: Very basic hotel, but breakfast and internet included.

name: Kikuchi Ryokan
overview: This ryokan has rooms for sleeping and a restaurant for meals.  It's on the highway and by the train station, which may be convenient for people on the move.

name: Monkey Island
overview: Budget accommodation situated right on the beach. Bar with sea view, great food from a Thai chef (mains $3-$5) and cheap cocktails ($3, happy hour 2for1). Power until midnight, phones/cameras can be charged in the restaurant. Has wifi.

name: Radisson Blu Sky Hotel
overview: 280 rooms, all equipped with television, telephone, minibar, air conditioning, trouser press, minisafe, refrigerator, internet connection, bathrobes (in superior rooms and suites), hair dryer and coffee and tea making facilities. The rooms are decorated in Scandinavian, Italian, Maritime and Oriental styles. Free broadband.

name: Beijing Qianyuan International Business Hotel
overview: Offers 202 air-conditioned and well-decorated accommodations.

name: Red Carpet Hostel
overview: Free WiFi, hostel bar, free welcome drink, shower/toilet in every room, backyard, free luggage storage. 1 Jul-14 Sep.

name: Arthouse Hotel
overview: Also a live music venue so it may be rather noisy at night.

name: Hotel Ultonia
overview: a modern four star hotel open to the public recently

name: Dzhuzeppe
overview: This old building is currently owned by an Italian, who developed an original renovation project and now runs a nice centrally located hotel. Each room is named after an Italian city and boasts remarkable design. Free wireless connection.

name: Paragon Hotel
overview: Despite the imposing Victorian presence, this hotel in the southeastern corner of Birmingham offers very attractive rates. This comes not only at the expense of a relatively remote location, but also standards of the worn rooms, which fall deeply behind the expectations one might have experiencing the common areas.

name: Venice Breeze Suites
overview: Ocean front fully furnished vacation suites on Venice Boardwalk. Beautiful brick building has been recently remodeled retaining classic Venice Beach charm but with chic design and a variety of amenities. Full kitchens, bathrooms with rain showers, walnut floors, free WiFi, cable TV, parking and spectacular roof deck with BBQ and panoramic views across Los Angeles. Nightly, weekly, monthly rates available.

name: Dali Pansion
overview: Double rooms with panoramic garden views, television, radio and refrigerator in all rooms also shower cabin bathroom. - Friendly atmosphere and hotel standard rooms.

name: Sin City Hostel
overview: Hostel located near the north end of the Strip. Simple, clean, efficient. $15 per night in a 6-bed dorm includes continental breakfast.

name: Hostel Premium
overview: Rooms for 1-4 and dorms for up to 8 people. All with ensuite facilities, all with TV, SAT, and internet connection (cable or wi-fi).

name: Hotel Belle-Vue
overview: (has wifi in the lobby)

name: Hotel Sax
overview: 4 star vintage design hotel. Hotel Sax is the ideal place for tourists as well as business travelers. Every room or suite has an original appearance: design of the 1970s, furniture of the 1950s or 1960s.

name: Sokos Hotel Tapiola Garden
overview: A largish, modern hotel located in a pleasant neighborhood of Tapiola.  Total 154 (all non-smoking) rooms rooms, sauna, exercise facilities, wireless Internet access, restaurant and bar.  Convenient transport to Helsinki center by bus. Rooms in the northern part of the hotel have a scenic view facing a large pool.

name: Gimmond Hotel
overview: A foreigner-friendly hotel, neat and tidy and located downtown near City Hall. Discount for Internet booking. For breakfast one has the choice between American or Japanese.

name: New Kenya Lodge
overview: This cheap place in the city centre attracts backpackers. The onsite office is a good place to arrange budget safaris, and they often offer a few nights of free accommodation if you book one. Beware of the noise from late night bars and early morning buses.

name: Hilton Garden Inn
overview: In downtown Auburn.

name: Villa Hijau in Ciburial2, Batulayang Cisarua
overview: Villa Hijau is a wonderful place to stay and taking picture during sun set. It is clean, cheap and beautiful hut. Take motorcycle to go there from Taman Safari Hotel 2 km distance , cost about Rp. 10.000  Mr. Jejen is the gentleman taking care of villa hijau. His phone is : 0817 6910954 . English speaking for help pls call mobile phone : 08161995075.

name: First Hotel Linné
overview: Skolgatan 45. Very centrally located. WiFi. Excellent breakfasts. The downside is that, this hotel does not have air conditioning. In summers especially, it can become very uncomfortable at times. The rooms are very small.

name: Eastern & Oriental Hotel Penang
overview: Founded in 1884 by the Sarkies brothers, legendary hoteliers who also founded Singapore's famous Raffles Hotel, the E&O is Penang's grand old colonial hotel.

name: Connect Hotel City
overview: The cheapest rooms are very small and windowless.

name: Gordon Inn
overview: A 31-room guest house with private, family and dormitory rooms, basically but comfortably furnished. Close to the beach and with its own great little bar, open late, with cold Guinness on tap.

name: Mandarin Pension
overview: Not recommended, next to 2 railway lines, a busy road and a night club. Rooms with SAT TV, hairdryer, little refrigerator and in-suite bathroom, internet access. Services: 24h front desk, cribs and highchairs, safe, credit cards accepted, wake-up calls, massage, bike renting, playground, table football, free parking.

name: NEO Tendean
overview: Eco friendly hotel meets modern style. For the price, the room is comparably small. Room only, no restaurants.

name: Casa La Kola
address: Niko Doaga (ул. Нико Доага бр.) St, 70
overview: Twin studios ((2 +1), equipped with TV, bathroom, hairdryer, mini safe and a kitchen), Triple rooms (equipped with TV, bathroom, hairdryer, mini safe, mini bar), free Wi-Fi , Common room, 24/7 available service and video surveillance.

name: Kokuminshukusha Mori-no-Yado
overview: Provides Japanese and Western style rooms with private toilets and shared baths. More western style feel overall, a restaurant is on site providing Japanese food, a public bath, gift shop, and conference center. It's run by the government and hence a little more affordable than the competition.

name: Catalonia Sagrada Familia
overview: A sister property to the Catalonia Albeniz, it is a simple and slightly aged hotel squeezed into a block a very short distance from the Clot train station. The Sagrada Familia itself is six blocks away towards the southwest.

name: Auberge les Trois Soeurs
overview: Open mid-May through late October. Three-star waterfront property boasts a fine-dining restaurant ('''La Maison Mathilde''') as well as a private terrace and beach with an outdoor lobster-baking pit and views over Percé Rock and the harbour (ocean views are also available from some, but not all, guest rooms). Standard rooms come with one king or two double beds and boast a coffeemaker, workstation, and private bath; rooms with mini-fridge, air conditioning, hair dryer, and iron and ironing board are available by request. Suites are also available (with kitchenette in some cases), as well as a few detached apartments and cottages. High-speed wireless Internet available throughout the property. Guest laundry and babysitting services are also available. Pets accepted.

name: Hotel Tfeila
overview: The former Novotel hotel, which is still is referred to sometimes.

name: Lerwick Youth Hostel
address: Islesburgh House, King Harald Street, ZE1 0EQ
overview: Great 64 bed hostel run by the local council, but part of the SYHA network.

name: AC Hotel Irla
overview: A very small AC with very small 36 rooms and not much in terms of amenities - but comes handy if you have business in the area.

name: AllYouNeed Hotel Vienna2***
overview: The 3-star seasonal hotel is open from 1 July to 30 September and has 122 non-smoking rooms en-suite with hairdryer, flat TV with satellite access and free internet, 2 handicapped-accessible rooms, garden, lift, lobby with seating, garage (extra charge), drinks and snacks machine, breakfast buffet, luggage storage, concierge service.

name: Ōgoya Family Land
overview: This facility has a lodge, some sporting equipment, and a campground.

name: Surf Ranch Hotel & Resort
overview: This is one of Nicaragua's newest resorts. It offers a choice between standard, villa, deluxe condos or deluxe penthouse condos.  Hot water and air conditioning available.  Breakfast, WiFi and shuttles to and from town are included in the rate. The resort features include Nicaragua`s largest skateboard park, jungle paintball course, tower drop into a huge inflatable airbag, volleyball court, rock climbing wall, world class restaurant & bar, swimming pool & swim up bar, and poolside cabanas. The resort also offers a range of activities such as surfing, skateboarding, sailing, fishing, yoga, scuba diving, paintball and rock climbing.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast; pets accepted.

name: Riga Old Town Hostel & Backpackers Pub
overview: Ensuite rooms, groundfloor bar, sauna and 24h reception. Dorms from 6Ls, doubles from 25Ls

name: Park Hotel Artsakh
overview: A newly renovated state of the art hotel in downtown, offers all the conveniences of an high-end hotel. Has a restaurant, lobby bar, summer café, souvenir shop, business centre, library and conference hall. Change point, ATM and international telephone line are also available.

name: Comfort Suites Downtown
overview: An all-suite property located in the Theater District and also near the Chippewa Street entertainment district. Business center and fitness club. T.G.I. Friday's is located on site.

name: Le Petit Hotel
overview: Newest boutique hotel in Montreal, Le Petit Hotel is charming, chic and hip. Located right in the middle of fashionable Old Montreal, it combines 19th century architecture with 21st century delights such as wifi, iPod docking station, LCDs, Nintendo Wii and multi-jet showers.

name: Hotel Hotetur Lagomonte
overview: All inclusive.

name: Pachamama hostel
overview: Run by a Peruvian with great English, that has 6 years experience as a tour guide in the canyon. Rooms are basic and cheap, but the restaurant at night is a lively place with a great fire-oven pizza and a rich alcohol bar. The website includes some possible itineraries in the canyon, more tips available when you will ask.

name: Toyoko Inn
overview: Set back behind the Paradise Hotel, but only a couple of minutes walk to the sea front.

name: Eliza’s Manor Boutique Hotel
overview: Luxury B&B with 8 ensuite rooms, smoke-free.

name: Aamod
address: B-14 Uppal Farms, Bilaspur Village, Near Manesar, Gurgaon
overview: ‘Aamod at Manesar':

name: Warm Sands Villas
overview: Intimate gay men resort, close to down town Palm Springs.

name: Kecharis Hotel and Resort
overview: Entertainment: Disco club (Friday, Saturday, Sunday), Sauna, Bowling and Billiard, sport equipment rental. Facilities: Conference hall (60-100 pax), business center, Internet, taxi service

name: Tinney Flat
address: take I-15 exit 244 in Santaquin; go east and turn south onto Forest Road 14 into Santaquin Canyon; continue for about 6.5 miles
overview: Access to the campground is a paved but steep and narrow road. Camp has potable water and vault toilets but no other services.

name: Alberta House B&B
overview: Pleasant, great value family-run B&B with comfortable rooms and ample private parking.

name: Lamington Serviced Apartments
overview: Luxury short term serviced apartments for business and leisure guests. Spacious and modern apartments in a quiet residential area, with local restaurants, delicatessens, and amenities, and in walking distance of major transport links.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Hamburg
overview: Business center, small fitness center, indoor pool, WorldNews global newspaper service, laundry and dry cleaning service. Continental breakfast.

name: Hotel Garden Palace
overview: Elegant boutique 4* hotel in the heart of historic centre with 65 comfortable guest rooms.

name: Oasis Guesthouse
address: Southeastern UB, near the Catholic Church
overview: A modern styled and lovingly furnished guesthouse with a public cafe and a big garden with gers to stay in. Run by a friendly German-Austrian couple who speak German, English, and Mongolian. Serve very good western food and home made cakes. Laundry service and hairdresser at the back of the building. It's THE meeting point for 'overlanders' in Mongolia (travellers by car, motorcycle, bicycle, etc.).

name: Austrian Haven B&B
overview: Owned by a friendly and welcoming Austrian lady. Two rooms, big comfortable beds, excellent views of the mountains around Jasper.

name: Stadscamping Bolsward
overview: Next to a swimming hall, where you can also register and pay for your stay. Beware: on weekends the swimming hall is closed after lunchtime, in that case you have to ask another guest for a key to the campsite and pay when it's open.

name: Radisson
overview: Located in the heart of Montevideo's financial and commercial district. Features include a pool, gym, high-speed Internet, and views of the city from the Restaurant Arcadia, located on the 25th floor.

name: Kyoto Cheapest Inn
overview: Credit cards accepted, English available, sheets included. Free wifi, computer use. Long stay discount. Additional charges for various services - use of printer or fax, changing sheets more frequently, etc. Bike rental (¥500/day)

name: Coral Gardens Motel
overview: Run by the kooky New Zealander Stafford and his Niuean wife Salome. Five fales overlook the ocean, with occasional dolphin and whale sightings from the balcony (in season). A steep rocky track takes you to a private swimming cave at the base of the property. Sails Bar is also in the motel, serving drinks and a sausage sizzle/pub quiz on Wednesday night. Wi-Fi access is available at the bar and in fales 1-3.

name: La Galiniere Guest Cottages
overview: Comfortable and affordable self-catering accommodation in three charming cottages on a boutique wine farm close to the centre of the village.

name: Grand Intercontinental
overview: Attached directly to the COEX mall

name: Mainport Design Hotel
overview: The Mainport is a luxury offshot of Inntel Hotels, located along the same waterfront, Guests can enjoy rich interior decorations, a spa, sauna, hamam, spa, a restaurant and a bar, all with views of Leuvehafen.

name: Evergreen Motel
overview: Has 20 rooms, some with full kitchen. Outdoor pool, Wifi and free breakfast.

name: Kichijoji Tokyu Inn
overview: An upscale branch of a national hotel chain.

name: Hotel Berlin Berlin
overview: A huge hotel occupying and entire block at the Lützowplatz, with many conference rooms and discounts for large parties and conventions.

name: Mwenge Hotel
address: From Mwenge head south-east towards Ubungo until the ''Mliwani city mall'', shortly thereafter there's a small sign for the hotel on the south-side of the road.
overview: A no-name hotel, with simple but clean rooms in a good condition with A/C. Located near the Mwenge bus stop, this is convenient if you plan to continue to [[Bagamoyo]].

name: Bayerischer Hof
overview: The hotel is located in an historic town building in the center and has 70 room.

name: Tarka Hostel
overview: Summer Hostel. Capacity: 300 persons. - Open Jul.10.-Aug.24.: 0-24h. All rooms has WiFi mostly also cabel connection.

name: Golden Oasis Hotel
overview: In the centre of Ruwi and close to the main commercial area. A popular choice for tourists.

name: Sheraton Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel with swimming pool, gym and open air bar on 28th floor with great views across Nha Trang beachfront.

name: Hotelli Emilia
overview: Small hotel right in the centre at the Reska promenade street.

name: Inn on Ferry Street
overview: A collection of luxurious Victorian bed & breakfasts lining Ferry St. in a historic district downtown. Adjacent to the world renowned Detroit Institute of Arts.

name: Polar Star
overview: The city's premiere hotel, right in the downtown center near the sights, with a cafe, bar, restaurant, business center, bowling (!), and a travel agency. Breakfast included.

name: Gundagai Cabins & Tourist Park
overview: Gundagai Cabins & Tourist Park has fully self contained, air conditioned cabins and on-site vans, each with individual ensuite. There are 40 drive through undercover powered ensuite sites, all with sullage disposal. There are powered and unpowered camp sites.

name: Au Fil des Saisons
overview: Open May-Oct. Au Fil des Saisons falls somewhere between a ''gîte'' and a small hotel—unlike most ''gîtes'', breakfast is not served, but these six rooms have far more downhome charm than your average hotel. What you have here is a Victorian-style country inn whose guest rooms are all newly renovated, uniquely decorated in period style, and come with private bath, double bed (plus an additional queen-size bed in two of the six), and WiFi internet—not to mention great views of Percé Rock from its prime location just outside the town centre.

name: Minneapolis Marriott Southwest
overview: Heated indoor pool, pond-side sunbathing deck, and health club.

name: Park Place Motel
overview: 32" flatscreen TV, fridge and microwave in-room, wi-fi.

name: Saladin Hotel and Hostel
overview: Double and triple bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. All rooms include an air-con, TV/digital receiver and Wi.Fi (from Mid May 2011, inshallah :) ). Dorm beds available.

name: Frankfurt Marriott Hotel
overview: A typical early 1990s Marriott in a highrise tower, complete with a Champions bar. Splendid views from upper floors as most other towers are some distance away.

name: Doma Hostel
overview: Clean, small, safe, cheap, and in a great location. Not the best place to hang out though. They seem to run a nail salon out of the common room during the day, and the kitchen is the size of a closet. They do have free coffee and tea though.

name: Delmon Hotel Apartments
overview: Includes breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

name: Accommodations by the Sea
overview: Bed and breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton
overview: An all suite hotel equipped with full kitchens and free high-speed Internet. Complimentary hot breakfast, a light dinner with beverages (Monday-Thursday), and a grocery shopping service.

name: Hampton Inn
overview: A good value at a standard chain hotel.

name: Residencia Tabita
overview: Cosy, friendly and quiet, but right in the middle of town. CLP$2.000 for unlimited internet access during your stay using Tabita's computer or Wi-Fi.

name: Guesthouse Kronan
overview: Inexpensive, especially for singles. Very close to the main ferry port. Open all year.

name: Hotel Suman's
overview: A very homely accommodation at New Digha, close to sea beach. Tariff from ₹200. Walking distance from Railway Station and Bus Stand.

name: &lang=eng
overview: Capacity: 398 people (study period 40) , Rooms (117): 35 Double (apartment-like rooms with bath); 82 2+2-bed (apartment-like rooms a bath for two rooms), Wi-Fi, microwave oven, refrigerator. Wellness and other services see at Botanikuskert Hostel. Family-friendly accommodation! There is a grocery store, a Bowling PUB. Lounge to 60 people. Garden benches, grill and fire ring site. Sun terrace, sun beds and chairs. Locked bicycle storage. 24-Hour Front Desk. Elevator. Free closed parking inside. Cookware Kitchen Internet and cable television access in rooms. Wheelchair access rooms. Meeting room. Telephone in your room, laundry, a smoking room per each level, taxi ordering, bus parking. +phone=+36 30 829 3074.

name: Grand Hotel
overview: The largest, certainly the tallest hotel in Iceland. A variety of rooms are offered, from a "budget" room to a presidential suite. Essentially better the room quality, the higher up it is in the hotel, giving you an outstanding view of Reykjavik. Some of the higher quality hotel rooms have free Wi-Fi, the username and password being your room number. The internet speed is good, it may stop working during long stays, however a quick call to the reception will reconnect you. Rooms are furnished in traditional Scandinavian fashion. The hotel staff speak good English (yet again, who doesn't in Iceland?) and are very polite. Free parking is available, over and underground, often very unoccupied. Excellent food is served during breakfast. A Spa is available at an additional fee, and a gym is also available. It is close to the center of Reykjavik, it stands by the Hilton Hotel and towers above it.

name: Grand Hotel Royal and SPA
overview: A symbol of history, culture, architecture and the tradition of hospitality opens its doors in all its original splendour as Corinthia Grand Hotel Royal. First opened in 1886, the Royal Spa has been beautifully restored to its original splendour and now offers the latest state-of-the-art spa facilities and treatments. More at '''[https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Budapest/Pest#Do 'do' chapter]'''

name: Hotel Manjusha
overview: On the bank of Bhagirathi and very close to Hazarduary.

name: Hotel El Pórtico
overview: With Italian restaurant "Las Tres Marías" and private hiking trails with access to a stream near by.

name: Nikko Royal Lake
overview: A 10-storey hotel with 310 rooms. Opposite the hotel is Kandawgyi Lake.

name: Okayama Kooraku Hotel
overview: Rather nice business hotel with English speakers on staff, and non-smoking rooms by request.

name: Dome Rock Mountain Camping Area
overview: This site is managed by the Bureau of Land Management. There are no designated campsites, no water, 14-day limit.

name: Hotel Sindone
overview: On the south end of the Island on the Quai Henri Jay right along the river, which many of the rooms face, this hotel retains its colonial architecture and also has a restaurant situated right on the river so bring your appetite because their restaurant serves a delicious steak. Hotel does not have A/C or fans, has a generator, hot water, electricity, mosquito nets. Reception speaks French and English. WiFi is available.

name: Albergo Rosa
overview: If you want to eat at the hotel's restaurant and are not staying in this hotel, make sure to get reservations.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites at Savannah Airport
overview: The Comfort Inn & Suites® Savannah Airport hotel is located at the Savannah / Hilton Head International Airport, off of I-95, I-16 & HWY 80; only 10 miles from Savannah's Historic District.

name: NH Constanza
overview: C/ Deu i Mata, 69-99, +34.93.2811500. A recently built hotel, designed by the world-renown architect Rafael Moneo. Located at the Avenida Diagonal/Numancia axies, Barcelona's commercial and financial centre.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
overview: Formerly known as the Don Manolo Hotel, the HSM Atlantic Park Hotel is located next to Punta Ballena and a short walk from the beach. Renovated on 2007, bookings can be done either half board or all inclusive.

name: Forest Inn Nikko Teddy Bear House
overview: A place to rest your head for the night, and a private collection of teddy bears to peruse!

name: Avari Towers
overview: This 20 story hotel is the tallest hotel in Pakistan. Hotel has 236 rooms in addition to suites and presidential suites. Complimentary mini bar. Hotel provides international standard facilities. Tennis courts, swimming pool, fitness centre with Jacuzzi, sauna etc. are located on the premises along with four restaurants offering specialist cuisine, named "Fujiyama" for Japanese, the Karachi famed restaurant "Dynasty" for Chinese cuisine, "Asia Live" for Pakistani and continental food and a Pakistani/Continental barbecue restaurant "Sky BBQ" located on the rooftop that gives the best views of the Karachi city. There is also a 24 hours casual dining place inside the hotel offering coffee with desserts and snacks.

name: Courtyard Boston Lowell/Chelmsford
overview: East.

name: Arion Swiss Belhotel Kemang
overview: One of the best hotels at the Kemang Avenue. Large rooms facing either Kemang or the skylines. Decent breakfast at the cafés, but do not forget to have lunch or dinner at the friendly Kemang's restaurants. End the night with a live bar at the basement.

name: Loma Sea Views
address: Ban Ko Jum. Call for free pickup from ferry, or take taxi from pier
overview: Fan bungalows with a great view of the Andaman Sea, just a few stairs from Ao Se Beach in Ting Rai village. Fan bungalows with balcony and bathroom. New, quiet resort without restaurant, but there are plenty quality restaurants within walking distance of this resort.

name: Hatters Birmingham
overview: Jewellery Quarter. Less than a 10 minute walk to the centre, Hatters Birmingham have upped the norm in hostel accommodation boasting all ensuite rooms and, finally, after eight long months of waiting (yet advertising that it was there) they've got a common room. Beds start from £14.50 and includes bed linen & a free light breakfast which is served all day

name: Blue Sky Hotel and Tower
overview: The tallest building and probably the most expensive hotel in the country. The 200 room hotel has several nice restaurants and bars including a lounge on the 23rd floor with views of the whole city.

name: Sandybanks
overview: Sandybanks is a self-catering holiday home built in the style of a contemporary boathouse on the edge of the Knysna Lagoon. Views and bird watching. Swimming pool. Kayaks and bicycles available.

name: Berghotel Rheinblick
overview: Good privately run hotel with reasonably spacious rooms and good breakfast. Above the town in quite residential area providing an impressive view of the Rhine valley and the Eiffel beyond

name: Indian Bread Rocks Picnic Area
address: from Bowie travel south on Apache Pass Rd then west on the dirt road leading to Happy Camp Canyon
overview: Named for the prehistoric Native American grinding holes found in the granite bedrock, this scenic area marks the access point to the [http://www.blm.gov/az/st/en/prog/blm_special_areas/wildareas/doscabezas.html ''Dos Cabezas Mountains Wilderness Area'']. The campground has picnic tables, fire rings, vault toilets, but no water. Open year-round and managed by the BLM (Bureau of Land Management).

name: Hotel Okura
overview: One of the Tokyo's grandest hotels.

name: The Roosevelt Inn
overview: Relax in historic elegance in this turn of the century re-brick school house converted into a luxury Coeur d’Alene bed and breakfast. Easily walking distance to downtown and the lake.

name: Honey Inn
overview: Basic fan or air-con rooms, free Wi-Fi or use of a computer (20 baht/hour), laundry service, and breakfast served in the morning. Motorbikes are available for hire (300-400 baht), making the temples accessible without requiring scheduled transport or a driver.

name: Temple House
address: nr Ballinacarrow, Ballymote, Co. Sligo, Ireland
overview: Temple House, in Sligo, is a classical Georgian mansion set in a private estate of over 1,000 acres, overlooking a 13th century lakeside castle of the Knights Templar. The Perceval family home since 1665, the present manor was redesigned in 1864 and enjoys the authentic and unpretentious country house atmosphere.

name: Hotel Regina
overview: Desk open until 22:00. This cute little hotel is in a great location for exploring the old town and the Flon gallery and nightclub district. The staff is super nice, and they offer free wireless internet service to their guests!

name: Fourcroft Hotel
overview: This place offers well-equipped rooms, many with lovely views over the old fishing harbour and across Carmarthen Bay. It's part of a Listed Georgian terrace, built over 175 years ago as individual summer houses. A lift runs from the first half landing and there are footpaths directly to the beach.

name: Summit Parkview Hotel
overview: Just west of Shwedagon Pagoda and with excellent views of that pagoda. Good restaurant and bar.

name: Rangemoor Park Hotel
overview: Macklin Street. Standard and En-suite rooms available. rates inc Breakfast and parking.

name: Hotel Yolaina
address: From semaforos de enitel Villa Fontana 200 meters west, 50 meters north, 50 meters east
overview: 24 rooms, each equipped with air conditioning, hot water, wireless Internet, and cable TV. Hotel has 24 hour security, a pool and breakfast is included. 5 minutes from Galeria Santo Domingo and Metro Centro, 3 minutes from Pharaohs, Chinese Embassy, and Zona Hippos. Manager speaks English. Airport pickup/dropoff is available. Rooms are $35-$50 per night with discounted rates for long term stays.

name: Papa Nero
overview: by the Papa Nero beach

name: Hotel Bleu France
overview: A very comfortable room with TV, sat, Free WIFI.

name: Guesthouse Chlumova
overview: Mid-priced guesthouse located 1 block from the Lipanska (tram 9) tram stop. Private rooms, some with a private bathroom and kitchenette. Staff speaks Czech, English, Spanish and Russian.

name: The Barn at Ivy House Farm
overview: Luxury Peak District cottage sleeping 6 in three bedrooms with three bathrooms. Contemporary style open plan barn on a quiet no-through road with walks from the door.

name: Jericho Resort Village
overview: Built in the late 1990s the Jericho Resort Village is a 4 star hotel boasting multiple swimming pools, fine dining, poolside bungalows and a rooftop spa. The hotel also has a small conference centers and a poolside bar.

name: Acorn Estate Motel
overview: 11 ''Smoke free'' self contained suites with full cooking facilities & Sky TV. Access units available. Guest laundry, BBQ, swimming pool, private spa, playground, trampoline, wireless internet. Continental & cooked breakfasts available. A member of the Host Accommodation group. Qualmark 3 star plus self contained and serviced.

name: Parador de Ronda
overview: In a location with direct views over the gorge and the Puente Nuevo. Has swimming pool and onsite restaurant. Free wi-fi.

name: Sov Dejligt
overview: Bed and breakfast.

name: Hotel Novotel Ghi Conakry
overview: A typical mid-range hotel with swimming pool, dining room, bar, etc. and has good rooms.

name: Cottage Bed & Breakfast & Bakery
overview: Nonsmoking, weekly rates available.

name: Apia Hotel
overview: 12-room hotel.

name: Khachik B&B
overview: A B&B that's been a fixture for visitors for many years. Friendly owners that brew wine in their own home. You can have pre-ordered meals as well; dinner per person is 4000 AMD. Trying the wine is also extra. The hosts can arrange a taxi to go to the cable car to Tatev and wait at Devil's Bridge while you walk down from the monastery, 8000 AMD round trip (10,000 AMD if you want the cab to go all the way to the monastery).

name: Ibis Den Haag Centre
overview: A fairly standard ibis hotel with a central location, with some rooms overlooking the busy Jan Hendrikstraat with trams, while others the peaceful courtyard garden (''Nutstuin'')

name: Hotel Mar Bella*
overview: 100 meters from the Playa Gran de Tossa beach. The hotel has 33 comfortable rooms, 24 hour reception, internet corner, wi-fi connection and safe.

name: Scandic Park Helsinki
overview: A large, modern hotel catering to families, leisure travelers, and business travelers. Over 500 rooms, sauna, exercise facilities, wireless Internet access, restaurant and bar. Excellent breakfast included with all rooms. Good location near Tram 4, 7, and 10 for convenient transport to city center (3 min by tram, or a 10 min walk). Finnair buses from the airport stop close to the hotel (about 2 blocks past on the way from the airport, and directly opposite the hotel on the way to the airport), providing convenient transport to/from airport.

name: Tower Hotel
overview: Modern Four star hotel, centrally located inside the city walls, 200 metres from Guildhall. Underground parking provided.

name: Crown Hotel
overview: A friendly, family run place that is handy for paraglider pilots/students as it is very near some of the paragliding schools. The rooms are fine and the atmosphere mellow. Be aware that there have been reports of a fake website for this hotel, that shows real pictures of the hotel but is rumoured to lead to fraudulent bookings.

name: Mutiara Beach Guesthouse & Aroma River Spa
overview: A friendly home-stay guesthouse staffed by the local villagers. Located in a well kept 8-ha coconut plantation, with a wide private beach facing a sandy bay. Aroma River Spa, right next to the guesthouse, offers traditional massages in a mangrove setting (spa 10AM-6PM daily). Delicious coconut crepes for breakfast.   The guesthouse has currently 4 Pondok pavilions which can take from 2 to 4 persons, and 3 Longhouse rooms at 1 to 2 persons per room. Rooms are basic and clean, with bedsheets, bath towels and mosquito nets provided. Booking is best done in advance, via the website, as the place is small and can get quite busy on weekends. The electricity only works between 18.00 and 23.00 (the other resorts at Trikora have electricity 24h). There are no electrical outputs in the rooms so to charge devices and use the free wi-fi one must sit in the "lobby". The guesthouses does not include a bathroom, one must use a shared toilet Asian-style (doing it standing - all other resorts have Western toilets).

name: Hotel Emaus Bogota
overview: Boutique rooms, all equipped with 29-inch LCD TV with cable channels, Wi-Fi Internet access and Mini-bar. Facilities and services are Jardin de Emaus restaurant, 24-hour front desk, Laundry service and Ironing service.

name: The Lord Jim Hotel
overview: One of the best hotels on Penywern Road, they have 45 rooms ranging from singles to quads. Breakfast is included, some rooms en suite. There is a TV lounge, a 24-hour concierge, and the staff is friendly and helpful. It is clean and the shared bathrooms are not bad at all.

name: Safir Konak Safranbolu
address: Baglarbasi Mahallesi, Koyici Meydani Arslanlar Cd., No. 2, Baglar
overview: Nine rooms, all of which have DSL internet connection, cable TV, telephone, and complimentary breakfast.

name: Le Meridien Chambers Hotel
overview: Luxury hotel with modern art furnishings. Guests get free access to the Walker Art Center. The hotel also houses the Burnet Art Gallery.

name: Days Inn Calgary Northwest
overview: Pet friendly, 100% non-smoking. Breakfast, parking, laundromat.

name: Hotel Best Western Premier Victoria
overview: Classified as the most ecological hotel in the world. Their electricity is generated from solar panels and from wind turbines, while their heat is from sustainable woodchips furnace. It is a pleasant family-run hotel a stone throw away from the train station.

name: Rodeway Inn at Route 66
overview: Free wi-fi and breakfast.

name: Mixok Guest House / Mixok Inn
overview: Mixok Guest House and Mixok Inn are next to each other in city centre. All rooms are equipped with cable TV, private bath with hot shower, free Wi-Fi in the room and free breakfast. Can also help you to book transfer to airport or bus station, as well as bus and train tickets.

name: Tourist Lodge of West Bengal Tourism
address: West Bengal Tourism, 3/2 BBD Bagh (East), Kolkata - 700001

name: Maritime Hotel
overview: This no-nonsense 3 star has an excellent location directly on the riverquay in the interesting Scheepvaartkwartier neighbourhood.

name: Selkirk Lighthouse
overview: Only three lighthouses in the country still have an original "birdcage" lantern, and this is one of them. The light was reactivated in 1989 and is still in use today, but the living space is available for overnight rentals (up to seven people).

name: Super 8 Henderson-Evansville
overview: The Super 8 Henderson-Evansville offers a superior array of affordable luxury amenities and services. Enjoy the huge outdoor pool, relax in a Jacuzzi Suite and get down to business anytime with free wireless Internet and meeting room for up to 100 people.

name: Mango Bay Resort
address: closer to North Sound Road than Nail Bay
overview: Offering suites and villas with a wide price range. Private villas, up to five bedrooms, available by the week.

name: Battery Carriage House Inn
overview: A historic bed and breakfast mansion on the Battery Park overlooking Charleston Harbor.

name: Borneo Backpackers
overview: Clean bathroom, toilets, pantry area, internet, laundry, cosy lounge area, roof garden deck, 24-hr security, and a tour information counter. Friendly, helpful and knowledgeable local staff. A/C or fan rooms. Large dormitory with 10 beds, medium dormitory 4-6 beds and private rooms. Each room has small storage compartment for personal items.

name: The Hans Hotel
overview: The Hans Hotel is a modern business class property that offers convenient access to all the important commercial and business centers of the city, as well as to the popular educational and shopping centers. With its range of modern conveniences and personalized services, the hotel caters to the requirements of business travelers who are looking for a comfortable place to stay & discuss business

name: Kinloch Hostel
overview: The hostel used to be inside Kinloch Castle, but due to the deteriorating condition, it has moved into an adjacent temporary building. It has 8 dorm rooms, each with 4 beds. All accommodation is self-catering, with a kitchen and lounge provided.

name: NH Santo Stefano
overview: Located in the heart of the historical Torino, this hotel has also a beautiful spa. Few steps away from the nightlife of Quadrilatero Romano.

name: Flakk Camping
overview: Close to the ferry terminal for the car ferry to Fosen.

name: Hiway House Motel
overview: What it lacks in appearance and amenities it makes up for with location. Right in the middle of the Nob Hill area, next door to Kelly's Brewery, in walking distance to restaurants, pubs, shops, and UNM.

name: La Croix du Sud
overview: An upscale hotel with 32 rooms.  This hotel is probably the nicest in town, although it does not have its own restaurant - the restaurant at the Dauphin Hotel is the suggested option and located less than a block away.  There is a cafe available in the hotel for coffee and snacks.

name: Ambra hotel
overview: Quite old hotel in a beautiful location.

name: Sincere Guest House & Restaurant
overview: This little cute wooden house near the sea is in the middle of Saladan community. It is designed in chic Chinese-style and is divided into 3 zones. The first zone is the guesthouse room. The 2nd zone is the front coffee bar area that has a tall table and dark brown chairs which look comfortable and relaxing. And if you want an atmosphere of the seaside, behind the coffee shop, you will find a seaside restaurant. There is a wooden terrace which makes it look wide and spacious and it is decorated with oil paintings, adding to the atmosphere of ease and relaxation.

name: Elephant Backpackers
overview: Offers amenable facilities.

name: Sun N Sand Beach Club
overview: All inclusive resort providing accommodations for 298 guest rooms, Health Club, Pool, nightlife, and various activities. Rooms are equipped with A/C, bath, safe, fridge, satellite tv, and some have a private balcony with sea view. This resort is also children friendly.

name: Hotel San Régis
overview: Five-star boutique hotel with 44 individually decorated rooms and suites.

name: Gariba Lodge
overview: Is a hotel considered to be two stars by the government.

name: Novotel Paris 17 Porte d'Asnières
overview: A typical Novotel in a faraway corner of the 17th, not really close to anything nor particularly conveniently located.

name: The Golden Retreat
overview: Set on 10 acres of tranquil land, amidst lush green surroundings, is a retreat with centrally air-conditioned superior deluxe rooms and suites. The Victorian architecture, spacious interiors, enchanting artifacts and tasteful furnishings spell discreet elegance, creating an atmosphere so relaxing that you can sink into it.

name: TIU Kreschatik
overview: Fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi access, friendly English speaking staff, common rooms with big-screen TVs and DVD libraries, private rooms, frequent pub crawls, security lockers and digital coded front door locks.

name: Wodonga Caravan and Cabin Park
overview: Wodonga Caravan and Cabin Park is easily accessible from the Hume Freeway when travelling north from Melbourne or south from Sydney.

name: Hótel Borg
overview: By the same square as the parliament and the cathedral. Built in the 1930s but newly renovated, Hótel Borg is a Reykjavík landmark in its own right famed among other things for its World War II history.

name: Kelayang Beach Cottages
overview: Run by a Western-Indonesian couple and family. 8 bungalows with air-con and fan only. Very basic: a bed with mosquito net, a bathroom with an Asian-style squat toilet, a mandi (water tank) shower. Can be noisy due to traffic from the nearby road and the small fishermen’s harbor by the cottages. The Mama Mia's restaurant can arrange island hopping tours or water sports. They serve alcohol!

name: Tsukuba Hotel Ueno
overview: Old but functional business hotel offering small but cheap rooms. Free wireless, free PCs, coin laundry, used to dealing with foreigners.

name: Hotel Golden View
overview: One of the first and most famous hotels to be built on Poros. The hotel has starred in many Greek films. Recently underwent a complete renovation and now offers even more modern comforts.

name: Drive club
address: Street Tarnovskoho (ул. Тарногродского), 42a - next to Rhytm Hotel
overview: 5 rooms / 10 beds. Three star. Restaurant, Bar, Free Parking, Air Conditioning

name: Le Méridien Heliopolis
overview: Somewhat dated but comfortable hotel within striking distance to the airport, with a free shuttle service.  Little of interest in the vicinity, but near the Cairo Conference Center.

name: Wyndham Berlin Excelsior Hotel
overview: The ageing Hotel Excelsior became a Wyndham and was afforded a renovation of its common areas and the deluxe rooms. Others remain tired, however, and not always meet guest's expectations. The limited Internet access also does not help the hotel score highly. The hotel faces the green wide Hardenbergstrasse, northwest of the Zoologischer Garten train station, its courtyard side is also overlooking a nice, green area.

name: Harjugården
overview: Situated 35 km north of Haparanda. Comfortable rooms for 2-4 people, cottages, saunas.

name: Hotel CJ International
overview: A newer hotel and with views of the Golden Temple. They have beautiful splurge higher end rooms beautifully designed & created. Wifi enabled lobby & restaurant.

name: Birds of a Feather
overview: Bed and Breakfast Waterfront Accommodation with free parking.

name: Hotel MyLord
overview: This family run hotel is situated next to the River Bohme and Soltau Therme and is just a 5 minute walk to the centre of Soltau town.  The hotel is located next to the Buffalo steakhouse where you can enjoy the meat comes from the hotels own farm.

name: Basra International Hotel
overview: One of few high-end hotels in town, has a swimming pool, tennis court and five restaurants. Service, however, is not on par with the quite hefty price.

name: San Francisco International Hostel
overview: Can't beat the convenience right in the main hotel district, a block from Powell Station and Union Square.

name: Avenues Guesthouse
overview: Situated on top of Mossel Bay, this is a place of tranquility with personal touch and attentive care. They offer comfortable en-suite bedrooms (partly with DSTV) and a family unit, solar-heated saltwater pool, secure parking and internet access. Close to golf courses, beaches, hiking trails, restaurants and sightseeing spots. German and English spoken.

name: On8 Sukhumvit
overview: The staff are really friendly, almost like a small family. Decent breakfast and the menu whilst small is varied. Plenty to keep you busy around the hotel with a night market, spas, local restaurants and pubs. Free internet.

name: Hotel Boheme
overview: Hotel Boheme is located in a popular Italian neighborhood with decorations that pay tribute to San Francisco's Beat Generation.  The building may be hard to find, with only a single innocuous doorway covered by a small awning.  You have to buzz at the door to enter but you get a key for this door on check in. Past the door is a steep and narrow staircase leading up to the next floor. On the second floor to the right of the landing is the hotel office. A bottle of Sherry surrounded by cordial glasses is set out for guests on the landing sideboard each night. Hotel staff are always friendly, helpful and knowledgeable about everything San Francisco.

name: Quality Hotel Konserthuset
overview: A relatively large, modern-style hotel glued to the Konserthuset, with an anonymous atmosphere and an uninspired, tired decor.

name: Mandarin Oriental
address: Jl Pinang, Kuala Lumpur City Centre
overview: Located within KLCC, this hotel is primarily for business travellers, but tourists will be well accommodated for. The restaurants within the hotel are among the best (and most expensive) in Kuala Lumpur. There is also an infinity pool looking over KLCC park.

name: Manderley
overview: On the Westside next to Downtown in the Bed and Breakfast district.

name: Maple Lodge
overview: Mountain view.

name: Garden Hotel
overview: Also wellness and conference venue.

name: Reid's Palace
overview: Has been the standard bearer for luxury hotel excellence on Madeira for over a century. Offering superb views of Madeira and the ocean, a luxury hotel spa, and gourmet restaurants. Famous for its afternoon tea. Including a Kids and Teens Club. Lovely hotel where Winston Churchill was a guest.

name: Baranti Wildlife & Nature Study Hut
overview: 10 rooms, three bed each,

name: Mallabhum Lodge
overview: Run by Bishnupur. provides budget accommodation in its standard double rooms and comfortable accommodation in its standard rooms, 4-bedded rooms and dorms.

name: Hotel Maestranza
overview: Has on-site restaurant.

name: Hyatt Regency Paris-Madeleine
overview: Close to the shopping centres on Boulevard Haussmann-Printemps and Galeries Lafayette. 86 hotel rooms and suites, High-speed Wi-Fi available. Views of Boulevard Malesherbe. Business services available.

name: Upland Hotel
overview: Spacious and well maintained with beautiful surroundings, definitely the upmarket option in Wa. Popular with expats and volunteers from the region. It's however a bit inconvenient located, a 30 min walk to town centre. Staff will insist on ordering a taxi. On-site restaurant serves local, Chinese and western dishes.

name: Novotel Budapest Congress
overview: A conference hotel close to the city centre with good transportation facilities to the spectacular places. 319 rooms

name: The Towers Hotel and Spa
overview: Located next to the Jersey Marine Tower which is the tall octagonal tower visible from the Fabian Way.  The tower itself is the hotel's premier suite and the top floor bedroom offers views of Swansea Bay.

name: Hallmark Hotel Derby
overview: Part of the Best Western chain of hotels. Sits opposite the Derby Mainline station.

name: INNSIDE by Melia Dresden
overview: The newest upmarket hotel in Dresden, all about modern design, with views onto the surrounding historic buildings.

name: The Jupiter Hotel
overview: Crisp, modern guest rooms, cutting edge entertainment, food 21/7, and spa style rub-downs make up this unique boutique hotel. While there, The Doug Fir is not to be missed. All day eats and drinks. Often has loaner bicycles.

name: Hotel "Ukraine"
overview: Probably the best 4 star hotel in the city. Recently renovated. Interior decoration reminds a palace. The hotel is not without flaws, sometimes unfriendly staff. Lovely Breakfast. Restaurant with good although expensive food, huge menu.

name: Southwark Rose Hotel
overview: A boutique hotel less than 200 metres from the Thames. Air conditioned rooms with en suites, meeting room facilities.

name: Golden Palace
overview: A 5 star luxury hotel with charming rooms and impressive halls. Close to Via Roma and Piazza Castello.

name: Carriage House Inn
overview: Large desk, TV, mini-refrigerator. Pet-friendly.

name: Clarion Hotel
overview: Offers guests free Wi-Fi and a fitness center.

name: Fairmont Pittsburgh
overview: "Habitat" restaurant on the second floor.

name: Pousada 14 Bis
overview: This place has nice quiet rooms and is close to the bus station.

name: Sari Segara Resort
overview: A slightly bizarre looking hotel with a tower block that looks all wrong in Jimbaran. It does though offer good service and value for money given the beach-side location. Huge pools and 24 hr room service/restaurant. Sari Segara is also used as a "dorm" for the about 500 Norwegian students that study in the Norwegian University in Jimbaran in the periods Aug-Nov and Jan-May.

name: Desert Trails Bed & Breakfast
overview: Come enjoy the beauty and tranquility of the Sonoran desert from the comfort of a unique adobe hacienda situated on acreage bordering Saguaro National Park East. Ideal for hiking, birding, and wildlife viewing; horseback riding available; dining and shopping close by.

name: Campanile Hotel & Restaurant Amersfoort
overview: Located some 7km away from the city centre, and about 1,5km from the rail station. A convenient place if you have a car, as the high way is close and parking is free.

name: Keraton at The Plaza
overview: Posh big hotel but has only 2 restaurants(Mexican and a tea lounge). A hidden gem behind the glory of chain brands around the Hotel Indonesia roundabout.

name: Comfort Hotel herzen-hotel
overview: Small expensive hotel (18 rooms) with attentive service. Rate includes breakfast buffet and internet. English-speaking staff, above-average security and credit cards are accepted.

name: Ottawa Backpackers Inn
overview: Part of Backpackers Hostels Canada, includes kitchen, free wireless internet and free coffee/tea. In a converted house into hostel, in the market block. The staff and the atmosphere are very friendly. Allergy warning: they have a cat

name: Aliante Casino + Hotel
overview: Casino, hotel, and spa along the northern beltway. Located about 15 minutes from the Las Vegas Motor Speedway and about 30 minutes from the downtown area. Welcoming to locals and tourists alike.

name: La Sirena Eco Hotel & Yoga
overview: A little further along the beach the famous yoga hotel offers decent rooms.

name: Auld Sweet Olive Bed and Breakfast
overview: Historic home with six rooms, each with private bath. Hand painted wall treatments, attractive gardens.

name: Hostel Imam Bonjol
overview: 400 m from Tugu Muda, a 10-minute walk to Paragon Mall, 12 minutes to Dp Mall, 20 minutes from Ahmad Yani Airport, 5 minutes from Tawang train station, 2 minutes from the Joglosemar Shuttle bus station. Free WiFi, hot water, free map. They rent bicycles, and can assist with car rental.

name: Park Plaza Victoria Amsterdam
overview: A 4-star immediately opposite Centraal Station. Free Wi-Fi in public spaces.

name: The Blackwell
overview: Located directly on Ohio State's campus, the Blackwell offers top amenities. The top floors over a nice view over the campus or the Olentangy river. Very clean and friendly staff. The rooms generally have a big working desk. The free Wi-Fi uses "The Ohio State University" connection.

name: Kristal
overview: Serviced apartment style hotel near Pondok Indah. Many facilities including a dive course and equipment shop, coin operated laundry, a salon, gift shop and physiotherapy. Enticing live acoustic at the bar every night.

name: Nemoto Marine Camping Ground
overview: Vast dune area that acts as a paying camping ground.

name: Mammoth Cave Hotel
overview: Is located within the park. It features 42 standard motel-style rooms, 20 more rooms in the "Sunset Lodge" near the main hotel facility, and two groups of cottages with limited facilities (open only during summer). Nightly rates range from $38 for cottages to $92 for motel rooms during the summer. A restaurant, snack bar and gift ship are on the premises. The hotel is just across a small ravine from the Visitor Center, from which all cave tours depart. A paved trail adjacent to the hotel leads directly to the Historic Entrance of Mammoth Cave.

name: Serenity Hill Bed and Breakfast
overview: Is located on KY 70 (Mammoth Cave Road), situated on a hill top just a mile out of Mammoth Cave National Park. The decor can only be described as casually elegant. The 3 guest rooms are comfortably decorated and have full private baths. Sit, back, relax and enjoy the views from on the large covered porch. Serenity Hill is located just minutes from the Turn Hole Bend and Cedar Sink hiking trails. This rural Edmonson County bed and breakfast is just 4 miles from Brownsville.

name: Mövenpick
overview: The Swiss Ice-Cream and hospitality giant's Lausanne location is a very good value for the price, if you're going to spend that much anyway.  There are three very good value (splurge quality, mid-range prices) restaurants downstairs to choose from.  The main one offers fusion dishes and — a rarity for Europe — a good choice of California wines.

name: Hotel de Rome
overview: Mostly a business hotel, but this Kolonna hotel also has rooms for splurging tourists. Amenities include safe, minibar, and satellite television in every room. The hotel also has a guarded parking lot (which requires a surcharge) and a fancy restaurant at the top. Small pets are allowed.

name: Stjärnegården bed & Breakfast
overview: Peace and quiet, yet close to ameneties. Newly renovated typical Scania farm with 7 light and airy rooms-all en suite.Exposed beams, parquet flooring etc.. Garden, BBQ, pool, boule and extensive grounds bordering a small beechforest. Also selfcontained former henhouse with all mod-cons.Sleeps 2-4. Close to mile-long beaches, Glimmingehus, Ystad, golf and other activities. www.stjarnegarden.se

name: Pension Paquita
overview: Family-run.

name: La Posada Hotel
overview: One of the legendary Fred Harvey stations, designed by architect Mary Colter, is in the process of a multi-year restoration. An architectural gem and must-stop for Route 66 tourists, rail buffs and fans of Old Hollywood. Very-high-quality gift shop, excellent bar and quality high-end restaurant in The Turquoise Room. Pets welcomed for a slight additional charge. Pretentious and prissy staff can ruin the experience. Complete disconnect from the surrounding native populace.

name: Hotel Bella Pescara b&b
overview: Bella Pescara hotel b&b a newly refurbished boutique Bed and Breakfast located in the heart of Pescara’s city’s commercial and tourist centre,the rooms offer the most modern facilities & comforts combined with a homely feel and a personal touch

name: Marina del Rey Marriott
overview: 370 guest rooms offering both water and mountain view.

name: Kobe Kitano hotel
overview: Its owner was a chef at Le Relais Bernard Loiseau (a restaurant in France, Michelin 3 stars restaurant). This hotel's plan includes dinner and breakfast.

name: Hotel Tossa Center
overview: 4 star hotel 150 metres from the beach and 200 meters from the town centre. 76 rooms and runs only all inclusive basis.

name: Hanalei Bay Resort
overview: Princeville, Overlooking Hanalei Bay, 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom condos and hotel rooms that can be rented directly from the individual owners. Resort includes 2 swimming pools, waterfalls, and hotub, bell service, beach access and two restaurants.

name: Centre International BVJ Paris-Louvre
overview: This is just about as cheap as it's going to get in the 1st. If you are here to study at the Louvre, and want to stay focused it has a location which can't be beat, just across rue Rivoli.

name: Shelburne Inn
overview: A 17-room boutique hotel/bed and breakfast on the Long Beach Peninsula, on the Pacific Ocean coast.

name: Hotel Las Hayas Resort
overview: Surrounded by a natural forest with a view of the town and Beagle Channel Bay.

name: The Corner House Hotel
overview: With 18 en-suite rooms, it provides accommodation with a warm welcome for visitors to the town: free wifi available in the coffee, lounge bar. On-site car parking, with CCTV system

name: Villa Bali Jegeg
overview: Spacious rooms and hospitable Balinese atmosphere.

name: Courtyard Mexico City Airport
overview: Direct walkway access to Benito Juárez International Airport Terminal 1, also has a complimentary airport shuttle to Terminal 2. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel Silver Home
overview: Friendly and helpful staff. Pretty rooms with private bathrooms with 24/7 running hot and cold shower system. Restaurant, travel desk, 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi in room and lobby. Free airport pick up. +Mobile:+977 985 107 1593 (Yogesh lama)

name: The Westin Copley Place
overview: The Westin Copley Place is located in Boston’s Back Bay neighborhood at Copley Square. The hotel is also connected to the Copley Place and Prudential Center Malls. This AAA Four Diamond-rated hotel features the Westin Heavenly Bed and Heavenly Bath products, a WestinWORKOUT gym, and high-speed internet access.

name: Hotel Arnhem Centraal
overview: Located near the city centre. Also houses a Greek Buffet restaurant (€19).

name: JW Marriott Seoul
overview: Rooms are stylish and fully-equipped. Spa, gym, sauna, indoor running track complex covers 2 floors in the basement. Olympic-size pool, climbing wall and golf driving range and Maska's cigar shop selling Cubans.

name: Meadow View Bed and Breakfast
overview: Three guest bedrooms with ''en suite'' facilities. 3* rating via the Welsh Tourist Board.

name: Jameson Inn
overview: This hotel has a huge atrium surrounding the indoor pool.

name: Le Lupin
overview: Le Lupin B&B Inn is located just 1 km from Tremblant resort with shops, restaurants, ski and golf facilities. A bike path, hiking and cross country trails are at the door step.

name: Dan's Creek Hotel
overview: The best known hotel in the area is outside town, with its own private beach, pool, restaurant. All rooms in the wild pagoda-like building have oceanview balconies and A/C, but the standard rooms are a little small. Breakfast and dinner are included in rates.

name: Boone Tavern Hotel
overview: Constructed in 1909, this hotel is operated by Berea College. The rooms feature handcrafted wooden furniture. A restaurant is attached to the hotel.

name: Marriott Residence Inn Montreal Downtown
overview: In the heart of downtown Montreal with fully equipped kitchens and complimentary daily hot and cold buffet breakfast, Free WiFi access, rooftop terrace, laundry facility, friendly multi-lingual staff,

name: Hotel Arapey
overview: Rambling art deco relic with large rooms and linens as old as the building. Private bath, fans, TVs, elevator.

name: HarbourView Inn
overview: Overlooks the harbor and offers complimentary cookies and milk to guests every evening, a wine and cheese reception, and accommodations with historical interiors.

name: Quality Inn
overview: Free wired high speed internet, refrigerator and coffee maker in all rooms. Indoor heated pool, free continental breakfast available.

name: Fairholme Manor B&B
overview: A Victorian mansion.

name: Super 8 Las Vegas Strip Area
overview: World's Largest Super 8 located only 1 block away from the Strip.

name: Luoyang Jujia Hostel
address: Qiaonan D Section, Longlin Road, Jianxi District
overview: Not a hostel per se but more a homestay in a clean, well organised private apartment. The neighbourhood is a real, non-touristy and friendly area with a lot of atmosphere to explore in the day and in the evening (local restaurants abound, including franchises such as Mr. Lee 10mins walk north on Xiyuan Rd). Rooms with shared facilities (hot water shower) and free Internet/WiFi.  Guest kitchen, washing machine, safety box and café available. The owner is a very nice person with generous coffee but his English is very basic. It is located somewhat from the train station (40min by bus ¥1, 15mins by taxi ¥19) but do not try to find it alone, the owner or his son will kindly pick you up. If visiting during the winter be prepare for the cold night because there is not an ambient heater. However the owner will provide you with a comfortable heated blanket which will be more than enough for a nice evening sleep.

name: Novotel Hotel
overview: Four star.

name: ibis Styles Madrid Prado
overview: The small and inconspicious ibis Styles gets great reviews thanks to a combination of nice rooms, good staff and ideal location, all that at a reasonable price including breakfast.

name: Hawes Inn
overview: Historic Inn, where the 19th Century novelist Robert Louis Stevenson is said to have stayed whenever he was journeying to and from the north of the country. The inn is mentioned in his celebrated novel ''Kidnapped''.

name: The Robins
overview: The rustic style of the renovation - stones and exposed beams - and the vintage countryside decoration give these several-hundred-year-old cute little houses a Bohemian charm. In the summer you will have breakfast in the garden under the canopy of the bread oven. Dogs admitted. Open all year round.

name: Royal Inn
overview: Free WiFi, microwave and mini-fridge in all rooms.

name: Hotel Krone
overview: Also offers long-stay apartments and has a restaurant.

name: Expo Hotel Barcelona
overview: 425 wifi-equipped rooms, near Sants Central Station and Fira (Expo). €58-180.

name: Grand Mercure Harmoni Jakarta
overview: One of the premium hotels by Accor in Jakarta. Good hotel with spacious rooms. Only has 1 restaurant but offers 2 bars.

name: Hotel Praktik
overview: restaurant's dining room for max. 32 persons. Mobil: +38 (050) 9091115. Rooms: Standard (13 units)- aircondition, wc, shover, cabel TV, free Wi-Fi, - Semi-lux (12 units)- above the standard these rooms have more space for the convenience, also hall and minibar, extra chairs and table in the equipment; Lux (1 suite)- here are 2 rooms with large hall with all the conveniences

name: Hotel Continental
overview: Decent rooms popular with tour groups.

name: Westin Bonaventure
overview: Recognizable from various movies it has appeared in.

name: Paradice Palace / Paradys Paleis
address: 342 Skadu Ave, Paradise Beach, Jeffrey’s Bay, South Africa
overview: Self- catering house on the beach, Sleeps 16 guests.

name: Welcome Hotel
overview: It's  in Metropolitan Area of Milan , the newest and elegant, featuring exquisite design , and above all excellent and comfortable services , considered that among the hotels in Legnano are among the few that can boast spa , gym , meeting rooms and free covered parking.

name: Scandic Neptun
overview: Central hotel recently incorporated into the Scandic chain. Good-sized standard rooms with two beds, bathtub, and tea/coffee maker. Breakfast buffet, serviceable wireless internet, and Norwegian newspapers are supplied. Several restaurants on-site.

name: Hôtel Ritz
overview: If there is any one hotel in the world which is not merely "putting on" the Ritz it would be this one, whose very name has entered the English language as a generic word for luxury (or the appearance thereof). The Ritz may not in fact be the fanciest hotel in Paris anymore, but it's always in the running. It's 350x the price of a budget room in the neighborhood, but heck, maybe it's your honeymoon.

name: Lake Iwaonai Shirakaba Campsite
overview: Campsite is located on the shore of the dan lake "Lake Iwaonai". Open period May - Oct.

name: La Salle Bed & Breakfast
overview: The La Salle Bed & Breakfast offers traditional B&B accommodations at an affordable price. Located one block from the Allen County Genealogical Library and just two blocks from the Grand Wayne Centre and Embassy Theatre. Amenities include homemade French Breakfast, Hot Tub, Expansive decks with city view, cable TV, telephone with voicemail, wireless Internet access, bathrobes, and private baths. Four suites are available with full kitchens and separate living area and bedroom.

name: Innside by Meliá München Parkstadt Schwabing
overview: Upscale hotel with minimalist modern design, within the Parkstadt Schwabing business area. Not easily accessible without a car.

name: Lisbon Old Town Hostel
overview: A hostel, opened in 2007, catering to the young hip crowd with event listings on their website, free computer and internet access in the lobby and WiFi through out the hostel.

name: Quality Inn Payson
overview: Located in northern Payson, about 7 miles (10 minutes) north of Santaquin on I-15. Free wireless and indoor pool. Pets allowed with fee.

name: San Silvestre Hotel
address: Rua Coronel Chicuta, 371 Centro, Passo Fundo
overview: A great location in the center of the city right by the Shopping Bella Città. Try the green fruit and vegetable juice at the free breakfast buffet.

name: Hotel Quelitales
overview: With "Casa José" restaurant.

name: Sokos Hotel Aleksanteri
overview: Situated in the heart of the city in the trendy Punavuori neighbourhood, next to the historical Alexander Theatre.

name: Bahari Beach hotel
overview: Pool, tennis, beach volley, free Internet cafe, restaurant.

name: The Captain Lord Mansion
overview: Inn with an on-site spa. Rooms and suites featuring jacuzzi tubs, fireplaces, and a complimentary full country breakfast.

name: Rausu Onsen Campground
overview: Nearby Kumanoyu.

name: Avalon House
overview: Nice ensuite rooms with small TV, Wi-Fi, nice roof terrace. Solar powered batteries for some lights and Wi-Fi during power outages. B'fast included.

name: Park Hyatt Vienna
overview: In June 2014 opens this Hotel in the more than 100 years old bank headquarter building in the very center of Vienna. It has 143 guestrooms including 35 suites. It hosts an extensive  fitness centre and guests can swim in the 15m pool located in the former vault of the bank.

name: Humphrey's Half Moon Inn
overview: Located on Shelter Island, this resort offers many activities including [http://www.humphreysconcerts.com/ live concerts].

name: Bahamas
address: Jl. Pattimura No.1, Air Saga ,Tanjung Pandan
overview: Comfortable open-air hotel with 78 rooms overlooking a nice beach. Very easy to coordinate trips from the hotel to locations around the island. Highly recommended.

name: Seierstad Pensionat
overview: An inexpensive guesthouse in the residential area, but within easy walking distance of the city center. Family rooms available, lots of parking. Breakfast included. Simple but clean & friendly.

name: Hotel Lohmühle
overview: This self-proclaimed "Franconian" hotel sits a short walk from the city center. | image=Lohmühle Bayreuth (01).jpg

name: Sonoma's Best Guest Cottages
overview: Four quaint cottages owned by the folks who own Sonoma's Best, a local general store. About a 30-minute walk from downtown Sonoma, this is a great launching point to check out Sonoma Valley and visit Napa. Romantic with private patios. Free internet.

name: W Hotel Istanbul
overview: WiFi, Fitness center and business center onsite as well as a fine dining restaurant that tempts patrons with its decadent offerings.

name: Valis Resort
overview: A new luxurious hotel with three restaurants at the sea front, two bars and spa. Modern, comfortable rooms, half of which have a sea view, the other half facing Pelion. Parking.

name: Víkingur Guesthouse
overview: Just outside the city centre. In addition to accommodations, they also offer car rental services.

name: Lonsdale Quay Hotel
overview: A mix of standard rooms and suites with a fitness facility on site. A number of suites have harbour views but expect to pay more.

name: Sanahin Bridge
overview: Proper hotel with lounge bar recently opened in 2014. Modern design. Only 4 rooms so far. Charming lobby. Extremely nice personnel. WiFi.

name: Honjo Grand Hotel
overview: Upscale hotel in central Honjo.

name: Albergo Ristorante Rosa delle Alpi
overview: 3 stars hotel. The highest level of hotel in Esino Lario in an historical villa and with services for people with disabilities. 15 rooms, 25 beds.

name: Hotel Chrysantheme
overview: Western-style rooms with shower and bath shared between every two rooms. Also oriented towards the longer-stay market, with discounts starting at 5 days and increasing through 30.

name: Rosewood Little Dix Bay
overview: A boutique resort including luxury suites and villas.

name: Casa Patio Bonita
overview: Newly opened in 2013 from a Canadian expat and his Colombian wife. Like the name already says the different rooms are all located around a nice courtyard, where the breakfast is being served. The owners help you with organizing tours to La Guajira.

name: Park Hyatt Busan
overview: A luxury hotel located in the Haeundae marine city, overlooking the ocean and Gwangan Bridge. This hotel offers a variety of dining and entertainment options, a fitness center, seven spa treatment rooms, and an indoor pool as well as 269 guestrooms including 69 suites.

name: Scandic Antwerpen
overview: If you are looking for minimalistic Scandinavian design, this is not the place - the Scandic Antwerpen looks every bit like a 1990s Hilton inside, a bunch of which the chain once operated. It is located in Borgerhout, right outside Antwerp's motorway ringroad, which is convenient for those arriving by car and not for others.

name: Bed & Breakfast Huys aan de Haven
overview: This monumental building has 2 apartments and is directly located at the port.

name: Melody Hotel
overview: In the same building as the ABBA museum, opened in 2013. This hotel should not be confused with "the other ABBA Hotel": Hotel Rival in [[Stockholm/Södermalm|Södermalm]].

name: Hotel Kurpark garni (Bed & Breakfast)
overview: A small hotel ideally located by the Spa Park, with guest rooms and apartments available. Free wi-fi, indoor pool, sauna and garden pool.

name: Sansuien
overview: A nice hotel complete with its own onsen. The onsen costs ¥900 to use. Those who are not staying at the hotel may still come to enjoy the onsen. Just outside the hotel is the historic Yamauchi Residence, which is free.

name: Festive Hotel
overview: Family-oriented hotel where most rooms feature a special loft bed for the kids.  More upmarket than you'd think.

name: Hotel Mets Musashisakai
overview: A nice hotel for families or people traveling on business.

name: Youth Hostel Geneva
overview: A clean well maintained place. Well placed for access to the bars and restaurants of the Paquis, and only a 15-minute walk from the central station. Floors, lockers, and doors, unfortunately, are all fairly loud, and if staying in a shared room, you must bring ear plugs.

name: MKB Aréna
overview: 28 places. 2,3,4 bed rooms with TV, shower

name: Bella Opera Apartment
overview: Excellent location, top floor from the window you can admire the beautiful view on the Opera House, quiet and elegant, in the VI district, available from short and long rental.

name: Jugendherberge
overview: On Habichtsweg, a twenty minute walk from the centre of the city, is somewhat austere and suffers from enforcing a midnight curfew; it is, however, the only place you'll find in town where you can get a bed for the night for about €24. Take bus 6 (from nov. 14, then bus 80) from train station.

name: Hotel Ilveslinna
overview: The hotel Ilveslinna is situated in the middle of the wide Lappish wilderness with only an hour away from [[Rovaniemi]], the capital of [[Finnish Lapland|Lapland]]. The arctic nature offers you excellent opportunities for hiking, fishing, hunting or even bird watching.

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia
overview: 542 rooms, most with a view over Copenhagen. The Dining Room restaurant is on the 25. floor.

name: Hampton Inn
overview: Indoor pool, free wireless internet.

name: Mimpi Manis Homestay
address: Jalan Raya Mong, Desa Mong, Kuta
overview: A small, friendly, family run homestay (British/Balinese). All rooms have a safety box and DVD player and an impressive DVD selection to choose from. Free WIFI and free internet. For stays of 3 nights or more there is a free orientation tour to some of the local beaches. They have a generator to deal with the frequent power cuts. Food is served to in-house guests from 07:00-20:00. Can also arrange motorbike rental and transfers. They are good at arranging tours and guided fishing trips.

name: The Square
overview: Stylish minimalist design hotel, smack in the busiest part of the city center, with a view over Rådhuspladsen. Both wireless internet and a terminal available in the lobby.

name: New Apsara Guest House
overview: Family-owned and managed guest house with large balcony rooms. Clean comfortable beds, complimentary bottled water, mini-fridge, air-con or fan, 70 channel cable TV, en suite baths have hot water showers, free Wi-Fi, 24 hour security, free pickup from airport or bus station. Well stocked market with imported food, cold drinks, beer, wine, ATM, and restaurant on premises.

name: Best Western Mirador
overview: Very nice business class hotel. As good or better than any Best Western in the USA.

name: Symons Valley RV Park and Storage
overview: Next to Symon's Valley Farmers Market. Open year-round.

name: Imatran Kylpylä Spa Hotel
overview: The old Spa Hotel and the new Promenade Hotel. Promenade Hotel offers good rooms for families. The spa department named ''Taikametsä'' (literally Magical Forest) has large swimming pools, saunas, whirlpools etc., from time to time with an artificial thunderstorm.

name: Club Mykonos
overview: A family friendly Greek themed holiday resort located on the shores of the magnificent Langebaan Lagoon.  With a host of onsite activities and facilities to ensure that not a moment of your West Coast holiday is wasted.  The resort also offers conference facilities and often hosts music shows.  A full events calendar is available on the website.

name: Forest Villas Hotel Prescott
overview: 62 resort lodging accommodations some with panoramic views.

name: The Beaufort Hotel
overview: A privately owned small boutique hotel close to Harrods and Harvey Nichols offering first class service and contemporary style.

name: Hotel Park Eckersbach
overview: This hotel is in the east of Zwickau, a considerable distance from the city centre.

name: The Clarion Hotel
overview: Easily accessible. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, power showers, and Egyptian cotton sheets.

name: Pondok Putri Duyung
overview: This place to stay in Ancol that has cottages, bungalow and a secluded beautiful beach.

name: Hotel U Tri Bubnu
overview: Well located small 3 star hotel with unique rooms.

name: Bilderberg Parkhotel Rotterdam
overview: The somewhat stately Parkhotel has a reputation of offering real value. It's location is very practical too, just off the lively Witte de Withstraat and close to the major museums.

name: Novotel Budapest Danube Hotel ****
overview: - 175 rooms

name: Tig Congaile
overview: Bed and breakfast and restaurant with scenic views looking out to the cliffs of Moher and Inis Oirr. Cuisine by the renowned chef Vilma a Guatemalan lady whose food is not to be missed.

name: White Horse House
address: Down a quiet street off the main Echoland strip
overview: A recently renovated 2 bedroom residence with one double and one twin room (an extra fold-out bed is also available).  Features a computer with high speed internet, big-screen satellite TV, CD/DVD player and iPod dock, spacious lounge/dining area and a well-appointed modern kitchen.

name: Hotel Pousada Gogó da Ema
address: Rua Francisco Laranjeiras, 56-122 - Ponta Verde, AL, 57035-090
overview: 1 block to the beach, in Ponta Verde neighbourhood. Air conditioning, refrigerator, Wi-Fi, breakfast included (all you can eat).

name: Four Seasons
overview: Bombay's newest, swankiest hotel. - This is a five-star hotel and part of the Toronto-based Four Seasons luxury hotels and resorts. The hotel currently houses 202 guest rooms, and also offers India's highest rooftop bar. - The 37-storey building was completed in 2008, and designed by John Arzarian of Lohan Associates, a Hong Kong based company. The hotel's interior was designed by Bilkey-Linas. The Civil Construction of the building was completed in one and a half year with a Slab cycle of 8 days. The 37 storey Tower was completed in less than a year- making it one of the fastest construction of such buildings in India. - Restaurants at the hotel:café PRATO & Bar, Pool Deck, San-Qi.

name: Hotel Campanile
overview: A good and central hotel.

name: Zaliki Boutique Hotel
overview: Boutique Hotel in Thessaloniki city center in a neo-classical building offering free wi-fi, free parking and free pick-up from airport.

name: Robert's-at-the-Beach-Motel
overview: A dive motel, but if you're desperate for a cheap place to stay, it's across the street from the zoo and right next to the MUNI Metro line.

name: Villa Florence
overview: Has the feel of an Italian-inspired hotel. Amenities include an onsite bar, Kuleto’s Italian Restaurant, a fitness center and a sundry area.

name: The Lowry Hotel
overview: Five star hotel - the best in Manchester.

name: Mercure Antwerpen Centrum Opera
overview: The Mercure is a in side street a reasonable distance from the central train station. It may not be easy to find, so look for the huge sign atop the corner building.

name: Jungle Beach Resort
address: 64 km N of Nha Trang, 15 km S of Doc Let Beach
overview: Run by a Canadian-Vietnamese couple, all meals are included. If you are looking for a beautiful beach in a very remote and quiet location then this could be your paradise. Keep in mind that they don't have hot water here. This resort also charges USD20 for transportation each way. Extra drinks will cost from 15,000-20,000 dong.

name: Dorint Kongresshotel Mannheim
