overview: Located in one of the most elegant neighborhoods of Guanajuato. Walking distance to el Centro Historico. Wifi included, down comforters and bathrobes, fresh flowers on arrival. Gas space heaters available (gas at cost).

name: Albergo Ristorante Rifugio Cainallo
overview: 23 rooms, 39 beds.

name: Jerome Grand Hotel
overview: A historic hotel, built in 1926 as a hospital. The building is situated above the rest of Jerome with great views, and is allegedly haunted.

name: Citadines on Bourke Melbourne
overview: Apartments available range from studios to two-bedroom executives, and have separate living and dining areas. It also offers a flexible service menu.

name: Luquillo Sunrise Beach Inn
overview: Located along a wavy stretch of beach Luquillo Sunrise Beach Inn is a very pleasant hotel with a friendly staff, spacious rooms, most with a balcony and a few extra amenities such as free use of beach chairs and towels.  The beach out front is very nice, especially as the hotel does its best to keep it trash-free.  It is frequented by surfers since there isn't a reef to break the waves.  Walk west a very short distance and you will find a nice, quiet beach with reef protection.

name: Best Western Blue Sea Lodge
overview: A beachfront Pacific Beach hotel with oceanview rooms.

name: Hana-Touro Stay Miyagawa-cho Residence
overview: A modern apartment building in a convenient location between Gion and the center of the city, with quiet spacious (for Japan) en-suite rooms, including kitchenettes with utensils, perfect for self-catering. In a bit of a compromise, you get actual beds and linens, but they are really low off the floor. English spoken. There's no key; just punch in code (the last 4 digits of your phone number, if you gave it at reservation - and you should) into the pad by your door. The rooms facing the river come with a beautiful view but also with the (muted) traffic noise from the street. Please note that the proprietors close the front desk and go home at 6; if you are planning on a late arrival, e-mail them and they'll send you your room number and the access code to enter the building.

name: Millennium Hotel Durham
overview: Accommodations, meeting space, and dining venues about a mile from Duke University.

name: My Friend Cafe and Guest House
overview: One of the cheapest solutions around, if the only thing you need is a bed. Has an internet cafe and free Wi-Fi.

name: Westin Warsaw Hotel
overview: Another centrally located hotel, a few minutes from the Warszawa Centalna station.

name: Hotel Du Palais
overview: In a great location, opposite the Palais de Justice and close to the governance and an easy walk to the restaurants and bars in the area, this hotel is sure to make you feel right at home. The rooms are decorated simply but are clean and comfortable.  There is also a bar that opens up into the street as well as a patisserie that serves delicious pastries and tasty coffee.

name: Pesti szálló
overview: Only for shoestringers. It can be noisy. Look like a worker hostel. Twenty one rooms. +phones=+36 70 5141102, 36 1 2571483

name: Super 8
overview: Free WiFi, indoor heated pool and hot tub.

name: Case Vacanza Borgo Lago Suites
overview: Quite expensive apartments in the town centre.

name: Rodadero Apartments
overview: Apartments for rent for anything from a day to a season. They offer 2 rooms with air conditioning, 2 bathrooms, LED cable TV, beach view terrace, free Wi-Fi, pool, and private parking.

name: Hotel Chalet Tirol
overview: Swiss like chalets in the mountains and the international restaurant "Los Tiroleses".

name: Two Bears Cottage
overview: Award winning charming old fisherman's cottage. Excellent sea views from all windows. En suite master bedroom. Visit Scotland 4 star accredited.

name: Quality Inn
overview: Free breakfast and wi-fi, laundry facilities, pet-friendly.

name: Ponderosa Group Campground
address: along State Route 4, just south of the intersection with State Route 501, about 6 miles (10 km) west of the Bandelier entrance station
overview: Open mid-spring to mid-autumn. For use of groups of 10 or more only. Reservations required, and sites can also be reserved for day use. Two sites, capacity 50 people each; fee is $35/night/site. Parking is limited, and any group may have only 1 RV among its vehicles. Central water taps, pit toilets, fire grills, picnic tables; no hook-ups. No showers in the park, but showers are available at the public pool and the YMCA in Los Alamos (5 miles) for a small fee. Firewood gathering not permitted. Sites can also be reserved for day use.  Picnic tables at this campground are available to non-campers when no group is using the campground.

name: Wolterdinger Hof
overview: This 3 star hotel is located in Lüneburger Heide, there is a chance to relax next to the swimming pool or sauna.  There is an onsite restaurant where you can enjoy typical German food.

name: Hilton
overview: The Hilton is part of the CNIT convention centre.

name: Burnside Croft
overview: Offers 1 family room (with private bath), 1 double, 1 twin.  Lunch baskets available. Also has a small cottage (The Smiddy) to let.

name: Schneider Gössl
overview: The hotel also rents apartments.

name: Miran International Hotel
overview: A five star luxury hotel

name: L'Espace Bed and Breakfast
overview: A charming bed and breakfast just across the road from the beach.

name: Le Campement
overview: The rooms here are decent enough and well-priced at 10000CFA.

name: Albuquerque Marriott Pyramid North
overview: Large hotel in "Aztec pyramid" shaped building.

name: Discovery Cafe & Guesthouse
overview: 3 min walk from the central historic area. Nice bar. Rooms are dirty, noisy and small, with choice of with and without air-con. Free secure Wi-Fi and computer desktops. The owner is very friendly and helpful. Will arrange taxis and bus transport. Downstairs cafe is a piece of museum. The terrace turns into a fairly lively nightspot after dark, with live music every night and cheap beers.

name: Colonel's Inn
overview: B&B guest house in 1830's stone manor near Fort Wellington.

name: Saharan Motor Hotel
overview: The Saharan Motor Hotel features deluxe rooms and suites, luxury amenities and excellent service.

name: Tangloppen Camping
overview: Located on a small islet, this camping ground is only 500 meters from the beach. Facilities include hot showers, laundry room and other sanitary facilities, a communal room with television sets and a small shop. There are also bungalows available to let, with room for 4-8 people, most of them with a nice view over the sea.

name: Amori Villa
overview: A boutique retreat 3 km from Ubud overlooking Petanu River Valley. Opened in June 2009. Butler service, good food and wine. 5 private suites/villas, all with indoor/outdoor bathrooms, satelliteTV, king beds, free broadband internet access. Shared facilities include a 14 m infinity pool, bale and jacuzzi.

name: Roha Hotel
overview: 63 small, cramped rooms with a tiny TV and DDI phone currently receiving 2 channels: Ethiopian TV and BBC World News. Well stocked bar. All bedrooms have a wash handbasin in one corner and a separate ablutions with WC and a hip bath with a shower above, desk and chairs. Hot water is provided from a centralised boiler. Wi-Fi in both the bedrooms and the common areas and attractive restaurant seating 73. Large car park for more than 20 vehicles is guarded 24 hours. 80 kW standby generator.

name: The Westin Calgary
overview: Modern 4-star hotel tower with 27 sqm rooms, in one of the more pleasant sections of central Calgary. Wireless internet free in lobby, available in-room for $13/daily.

name: Hotel Minenoyu
overview: Bath is hot spring with outdoor bath.

name: Hotel Fregat
overview: A small but clean hotel close to the ferry dock.  Good for early risers who want to catch the first boat to Kizhi in the morning. It is a little hard to find; the door faces the lake, not the street, and one must ring the bell to be admitted, then the reception desk is up the stairs.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites
overview: Probably Germantown's most popular hotel, which, along with the Homestead Suites, is right by a movie theater. Indoor pool, free WiFi, free hot breakfast.

name: citizenM Rotterdam
overview: One of the first hotels of this new chain with an innovative concept - offering ample, four-star level amenities, including designerish common spaces, combined with ultra-small cabin-sized rooms, all at a reasonable price vs. regular upscale hotels.

name: Sandmoen Bed & Breakfast
overview: This is a Bed and Breakfast that also has a space for camping. South of the city and frequently served by slo-o-ow bus. Shop, huts and all amenities.

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
overview: Wake up to the sunrise over the harbor. Big swimming pool, fitness centre.

name: Hotel Le Regina Warsaw
overview: Very comfortable hotel, that wants to go out of its way to make its guests comfortable. The hotel is located in the Old Town, but can be a little confusing to find, so be sure to take a cab or have the front desk to arrange for you to be picked up.

name: Stalheim Hotel
overview: A 124-room family run hotel with long traditions. Standard double room kr. 1500 per night.

name: Andrew Jackson Hotel
overview: Enjoy and relax in one of the rooms and suites overlooking the tropical courtyard. Is also one of the oldest hotels in the French Quarter.

name: Takaobay Hostel
overview: Newly furnished with a very friendly and helpful proprietor. Close to the Pier-2 Art Center.

name: Motel One München Sendlinger Tor
overview: With a standardized decor, its simple rooms and common spaces are of modern, simple design in shades of blue and brown.

name: Weaver's Rest Cottage
overview: A fully furnished cottage that was the home of the first mayor of Berea.  The cottage sleeps up to 4 people and is located within walking distance of Berea College and downtown.

name: Intercontinental Düsseldorf
overview: New First-Class Hotel located at Königsallee of Düsseldorf. Awesome Atrium, top-restaurants and concierge-service

name: Homewood Suites Holyoke-Springfield/North
overview: The Homewood Suites by Hilton® Holyoke/Springfield North is located just north of Springfield, Massachusetts, off I-91, with convenient access to the Massachusetts turnpike and local attractions and restaurants.  This summer, enjoy the comforts of home at the best Six Flags New England hotel.  Also, we’re right near The Big E and all the fun it brings!  Hotel features full kitchens, suites, complimentary breakfast, dinner and drinks (Monday - Thursday), fitness center, whirlpool, indoor swimming pool, basketball courts and outdoor patio with barbecues.

name: Hotel la Canne a Sucre
overview: reportedly for parental visits and rich guests. They have “stunning” bungalows, set in a garden with a lovely pool for 60.000cfa a night (sleeps 6 to 7 people). There are other rooms with and w/o AC for 10.000 – 57.000. Bungalows highly recommended if you can splurge. They also have several "authentic" mud huts—complete with plumbing, lights and fans!

name: Piero Rotta Youth Hostel
overview: Follow the signs from QT8 stop on the red line to Molino Dorino. Very relaxed curfew compared to most in Italy. Look out for the night walkers you pass on the way to the hostel.. 5 km from Duomo.

name: Bastoncu Pansiyon & Kafeterya
overview: One of the cheaper options in Safranbolu. It is clean and homely, with excellent meals.  The owner speaks Japanese and English, and can help you plan your onward trip. Call them for a free pickup from the bus station.

name: Cosmopolitan Hotel
overview: The city hotel is centrally located in the heart of Schwabing at Leopoldstraße, with only a 5 minute walk to the English Garden. The breakfast will be served as a buffet and guests can use the wireless Internet for free.

name: Express by Holiday Inn Munich Messe
overview: Usual good quality HI-Express. Stuck out in an industrial area but convenient car access to eastern parts of Munich.

name: Hotel Vere Inn
overview: 5 rooms. Very comfortable hotel in Vere, safe location with very friendly multilingual staff. Free WiFi.

name: Above the Tickle
overview: Merchant home (Canada Select: 4 1/2 star) with ocean view, close to the harbour, Tickle Bridge and "downtown". Three bedrooms (Q, Q, D) and 1 1/2 bathroom, renovated interior, accommodates four to six people.  Cable, high speed wireless Internet, living and dining rooms, full kitchen (including dishwasher), laundry, large garden.

name: Kádárta Café Pension
overview: The inn is located above the restaurant. 6 double rooms and two apartments for four persons. Each room has a private bath, cable TV and Internet connection. Smoking is not permitted in the rooms.

name: Hotel Zelengora
overview: 11 single, 19 double, 2 apartments, 1 lux apartment

name: Four Seasons Hotel George V
overview: Steps from the Champs-Elysées, with private terraces that command all Paris.

name: Oz Vama Veche
overview: Free Wifi. Camping. Bungalows.

name: Rabaul Hotel
overview: The Rabaul Hotel is situated 45 minutes from the Tokua Airport. Featuring 34 hotel rooms and catering for all budgets, the hotel's atmosphere reflects a blend of Rabaul culture (the Tolai people), and its more recent Chinese and Australian influences. The Hotel is within walking distance to the markets, historical sites, and is just 20 metres from the bus stop providing direct access to the surrounding attractions. It caters to business travellers or visitors with a special interest in war history, volcanoes, indigenous culture, the islands, diving, fishing, trekking or golf.

name: Auberge de Paris Youth Hostel
overview: Mixed, male, and female dorms available. Private rooms also available. Female dorm rooms have private bathrooms for exclusive use. Note that the reception desk is at 901 rue Sherbrooke est, inside the Hotel de Paris (see below).

name: Musis Sacrum
overview: This simple B&B is part of a party center and offers adequate rooms at a 15 minute walk from the city center. It's a bit worn with age and the rooms can get cold in winter, but the service is friendly. There's no reception, so make arrangements for the hosts to receive you on arrival.

name: City Central Motel Apartments
overview: 5 minutes walk to Litchfield St restaurants and 7 minutes walk to Cathedral Square.

name: Cow Hollow Motor Inn & Suites
overview: Centrally located in the Cow Hollow neighborhood, this motel offers 112 standard and reasonably priced rooms.  The decor is definitely dated and will not suit everyone — they have floral wallpaper that might just keep you up at night!  However, the rooms are comfortable and they do offer free parking.

name: Hotel Beursstraat
overview: Simple and clean hotel, mostly visited by (young) people who are looking for an inexpensive accommodation.

name: Hôtel Tiama
overview: The best hotel by far in Abidjan, located in Plateau district next to Standard Chartered Bank.

name: Casa Lázaro (20-25$)
address: Villegas #427 between Teniente Rey and Muralla
overview: Old construction, very well preserved. Offers breakfast, dinner, taxi, and laundry services among others.

name: Park Hostel
overview: Shared bathroom, large screen TV in the lounge, kitchen. Free parking and Wi-Fi. +36 20 558 4410

name: Turist Motel
overview: Ask about details in Miskolc at the Tourinform office

name: Rizzo Conference Center
overview: A conference center hotel owned by UNC's business school that offers 120 guestrooms and expansive meeting facilities, totaling 20,000 sq ft of space.

name: Città di Milano
overview: It is located way on the outskirts of the city. If you arrive by car, take the tangenziale Ovest and exit at San Siro/ Fiera. If by public transport, take the subway (the M1 line to De Angeli) and then a bus (bus no 72). However keep an eye out for signs pointing to the campsite. Don't be afraid to ask locals on the bus where it is. Be aware that it's next to a rather smelly farm. However, the campsite itself has a bar, a restaurant and very good shower facilities. This is definitely an option for students or people who would rather spend money in Milan, instead of accommodation.

name: Masirah Beach Camp
overview: Has rooms and tents, breakfast buffet and onsite restaurant, free wi-fi.

name: Hotel Royal
overview: Located on the finest shopping street in the French Quarter, this hotel has a European feeling complemented by authentic laced iron balconies, high ceilings with fans, and enclosed courtyards with fountains.

name: The Hotel Monaco
overview: A fun and hip boutique hotel. This is part of Kimpton Hotels, a San Francisco based hotel and restaurant company.

name: Thorndike
overview: (Closed in winter).  Thorndike is located at 7,400 feet in the Panamint Mountains and is accessible to high clearance vehicles only. Depending on road conditions, 4-wheel drive may be necessary. Thorndike has 6 sites, tables, fireplaces, and pit toilets. Thorndike is free. ATTN: Due to extreme fire danger, campfires are prohibited at Thorndike Campground until further notice!

name: Capsule Inn Kawagoe
overview: If you are looking quickly for a place to spend the night, there is a capsule hotel located near the Kawagoe Train Station that offers rooms for around 3,000 yen per night. The hotel can be easily spotted from the train station by the giant red cap on the top of its building, reading CAPSULE HOTEL in large white letters. The hotel has a sauna, showers, locker rooms, laundry machines, and a lounge. It is staffed 24/7 by Japanese employees and has procedures on hand for English-speaking customers.

name: Odense Danhostel Kragsbjerggaard
overview: Denmark's only Manor-House hostel. Quiet residential area,2 km from the city center.

name: AC Hotel La Rioja
overview: 4-star hotel.

name: Motel Pension Rosenhof
overview: It's a Lovely Hotel with Good Rooms and a Nice View, and There is Also a Bus Stop about 100 meters, it's Between St. Isidor and Hart

name: Hotel Pierre Milano
overview: Close to La Scala and the Duomo. Each of the 52 rooms has WiFi access and satellite television.

name: Levi Jackson Wilderness Road State Park
overview: A campground with 136 sites featuring electric hook ups, shower houses, a grocery, and laundry facilities. Open year round. Reservations can be made up to one year in advance. There is a 2 night minimum stay on the weekends.

name: Tykkimäki Camping
overview: The amusement park has a campground too.

name: Howmore Youth Hostel
overview: Simple hostel with no advance booking (and no phone)

name: El Rancho
overview: El Rancho is a large family home in Ilumàn, a village 6km outside Otavalo, which takes 15mins on a bus, and buses run every 15 mins. The family are indigenous Otavaleños who have lived here for generations and sold jewelery and weaving on the market for 15 years. Esthela is a great cook of traditional dishes, and usually prepares fresh food picked from the gardens of her nearby family. The views of volcano Cotacachi (4961m) from the huge roof terasse are amazing [http://www.elrancho.edicypages.com/gallery], and volcano Imbabura (4610m) is directly behind the house. It´s a great place for hikers, birdwatchers, or language students.

name: St. Petersburg Hotel
overview: The St. Petersburg is a sister hotel of the Schloessle, operated by M.C Hotels, and as such a member of Summit Hotels and the Preferred Hotels Group. The boutique property is housed in a historic building at a corner of pedestrianized streets in the Old City. The interior is filled with exquisite appointments and designer or vintage furniture and fixtures. Service and price levels match this standard.

name: Jimbaran Bay Beach Residence
overview: 3 private villas 50 m from the beach. 2 villas with sea views and one pool villa.

name: Hotel Sapphire
overview: Hotel having view of Golden Temple

name: Coed y Berclas Holiday Cottage & Luxury Apartment
overview: Breathtaking views over Menai Strait. Strictly non smoking site. No pets.

name: Apple Guesthouse
overview: Clean and quiet rooms, close to the centre. 2 minutes from the beach, private garden, 15 nice rooms, cable TV & free high speed Wi-Fi, motorbike rental, laundry, Internet, international calls and a very useful 24/7 convenience store.

name: Dewa Bharata Candidasa
overview: Two-storey buildings with the cheaper rooms downstairs. Nice pool and decent restaurant, direct beach frontage. Good location on the beach just to the east of the lotus lagoon.

name: ibis Budget Luxembourg Airport
overview: This is an older ibis Budget (blue rooms) located next to the Findel Airport, which provides the most basic standards for some of the lowest rates in Luxembourg.

name: Metropolis Hotel
overview: The location of the oldest city's hotel is in the very heart of the downtown. Buffet breakfast is served. 74 rooms.

name: Hotel de Rome
overview: Located at Bebelplatz next to Unter Den Linden and the Museumsinsel. Comfort and style on a whole new level and also a very good bar and Italian restaurant.

name: Hotel Gran Sabana
address: Carretera Nacional vía Brasil, Santa Elena de Uairén, Estado Bolívar, Venezuela
overview: By far the largest and best hotel in Santa Elena de Uairén, the Hotel Gran Sabana is located outside the city center on the National Highway towards the Brazilian border. The brightly-colored hotel has air conditioning and hot water, two features that are not universal in other lodging offerings in the area. It also has an outdoor pool, in-room televisions and refrigerators, and a bar.

name: Days Inn Sedona
overview: Swimming pool and jacuzzi. Free continental breakfast and wi-fi.

name: Dusit Thani Hotel
overview: One of Bangkok's grand old hotels with an excellent location in Silom. The 21-storey tower with a distinctive golden spike was Bangkok's tallest when opened in 1968, and has aged gracefully with frequent restorations.

name: Apex City Quay Hotel & Spa
address: 1 West Victoria Dock Road Dundee DD1 3JP
overview: The 4 Star Apex City Quay hotel is a stylish contemporary hotel, located in the heart of the new City Quay development. The hotel has views of the river and Quay.

name: Hotel Tisza
overview: Is an older, but renovated hotel in an excellent. - 45 rooms and 5 suites, some air-conditioned, with colonial style furniture, in-room high-speed internet access, mini-fridge, bathroom amenities, cable TV channels and Cardo mattress. +phone=+36 30 201-5586. Room prices inc. buffet breakfast, WiFi Internet access in the room. - Half or full pension can be provided in the neighbouring restaurant, Port Royal Restaurant, according to previous accordances.

name: Hársfavirág Restaurant and Guesthouse
overview: Capacity (persons): 24. Six  rooms. - Services: bus parking, thermal water, medical facilities, fishing facilities, Sat TV, money exchange, WIFI/WLAN, playground.

name: Shangri-La
overview: Shangri-La is an older style hotel building on lush green grounds. Has bikes available to rent at ¥25 per hour.

name: Candlelight Inn
overview: Victorian bed and breakfast offering elegant accommodations, culinary delights and peaceful surroundings that set the stage for a relaxing getaway.

name: ibis Stuttgart City
overview: As with other Accor hotels in Stuttgart, this hotel's name can be deceiving, as it is decisively out of the city, in the Nordbahnhof area. Otherwise, it is a typical old-style ibis hotel.

name: Korolivska Bochka hotel
overview: Extraphones=+380 (097) 558-2727, (093) 629-39-39. - There is a disco, a bar, a restaurant, Russian wood bathhouse, Finnish sauna;

name: Surya Garden Guesthouse
overview: Is a charming, small resort right on the unspotted and uncrowded sandy Tangalle beach with an Italian-Sri-Lankan management. The three bungalows, open-air restaurant, as well as other facilities are hidden in the large and carefully maintained tropical garden.

name: Sierra Lighthouse Inn
overview: Man of War bay, Aberdeen. Also has a fine restaurant offering Lebanese and local cuisine. The grilled fish is highly recommended.

name: Hellsten Hotel Apartment
overview: Clean and simple. Located in a quiet neighbourhood but close enough to shopping centre Sello in Leppävaara.

name: The Roosevelt Hotel
overview: A boutique hotel right in the center of the action offering spacious, well-appointed rooms and suites with luxury bed and bath linens, bath products and state-of-the-art in-room technologies. It is a Hollywood legend, and was the location of the first Academy Awards ceremony.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Hanoi
address: 83A Ly Thuong Kiet, Hoan Kiem District
overview: 154 rooms and suites, 93 of which are non-smoking rooms and 20 connecting rooms. All rooms are equipped with LCD flat screen, wide selection of international cable TV channels. Minibar, IDD telephone, personal safe, tea and coffee making provided. Broadband cable and Wi-Fi is accessible in all rooms and throughout the public areas of the hotel.

name: Botel Racek
overview: A hotel boat on the Vltava river offering rooms and suites, all with private bathroom, TV and phone. There's a Czech restaurant on board and you can enjoy drinks on the deck or in the bar. Botel Racek is ten minutes away from the city centre by tram and has private parking available. Singles/Doubles/Triples/Quads prices vary depending on season, there are last minute offers.

name: Fireside Inn & Conference Centre (Best Western)
overview: In-room fireplaces, meeting facilities for 6-70 people, whirlpool suites at C$250-350/night, 37" flatscreen TV, outdoor pool and patio. Bistro and restaurant on-site.

name: Strand Self Catering
overview: Sea Breeze is three semi-detached houses, 400 meter from the beach

name: Embassy Hotel Balatonas
overview: 28-room Hungarian-owned hotel near the embassies. Popular among eastern European businessmen.

name: Kinabalu Backpackers
overview: Centrally located in Australian Place. All rooms have A/C. Free breakfast, free coffee or tea all day and free Wi-Fi, airport pickup service.

name: Villa Annchen
address: At Mtwapa Creek, on Mombasa's north coast.
overview: Villa Annchen consists of a guesthouse and an upscale holiday home and offers a private atmosphere. 4 guest room with king size beds and en suite bathrooms. It has a huge stone natural pool. Also weekly rates.

name: Hotel Ordabasy
overview: This mid-range hotel is conveniently located at Ordabasy plaza, in front of the large MiG monument. As of May 2010, a double-room goes for 6400KZT with a private bath, satellite tv, and balcony (if facing the street). No late check-out is available.

name: The Oxford Hotel
overview: The historic hotel provides a romantic retreat located in the midst of Denver’s lively LoDo district.

name: Les Armures
overview: Lovely 17th Century building in the old town has hosted recent democratic presidents of the U.S.

name: MGallery Hotel Savigny Fankfurt
overview: The former Sofitel started to age badly and rather than update it, Accor downgraded it to an MGallery. A taste of erstwhile luxury can be had at really reasonable rates outside of trade fair dates. You will, however, have to contend with worn furniture and fixtures and partially indifferent staff. The Savigny is at the border of a quiet residential lowrise district and the highrise quarter, so you can enjoy the best of both worlds - but not much in terms of views from your room.

name: Las Chullpas Eco Lodge
overview: Great place to enjoy in quietness all the great surroundings in the Sacred Valley

name: Hotel Galileo Milan
overview: A four star hotel with a choice of 89 single, double, triple and VIP rooms, all with private bath. Among the public areas are a bar, restaurant, lounge and reception with free internet connection.

name: Apple Hostels of Philadelphia
overview: Located less than 3 blocks from the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall, this HI-affiliated hostel has free wireless internet and high-speed internet kiosks, free bed linens, no curfews, no lockouts. Affordable, clean hostel with loads of free activities, friendly & knowledgeable staff and plenty of outside tours you can book at the reception desk that's open 24 hours. All international travellers welcome; guests from the United States will need to provide either a college ID or a HI membership card along with government-issued ID with an address outside of a 100 mile radius from Philadelphia.

name: Mandarin Oriental
overview: A 150 room hotel located on the top eleven floors of the First Interstate Center, the third tallest building in the city of San Francisco. The view from the rooms are exceptional, with floor to ceiling windows and great views.

name: Olde Judge Mansion
overview: Bed & Breakfast

name: Le Logis
overview: Résidence Hôtel. new

name: Hotel Casa Mia
overview: 15 minutes' walk to the Duomo and 10 minutes to Via Montenapoleone, small and attentive.

name: Suite Novotel Luxembourg
overview: The Suite Novotel is offering facilities appropriate for long-term stays of guests working for the many institutions located in Kirchberg. Each room has a living space and a kitchenette, and there are facilities for long-term guests to help them make their home away from home. This is one of the new generation of Suite Novotels, appointed in white, beige, gray and black, with touches of purple and violet, which provides more a modern, clean feel.

name: Six Degrees Hostel
overview: European-style hostel opened Nov 2011, efficiently run with superb amenities/extras. A welcoming respite if Jaksa does not appeal. Do not miss the top floor, where the fun is at!

name: Kobe Meriken Park Oriental Hotel
overview: The hotel resembling a giant cruiseship is a very conspicious part of Kobe Harbour's waterfront. Inside you will find spacious rooms, the more expensive of which feature balconies with views over the harbour. All Western-style comforts are to be found, and hotel's restaurants and bars add a touch of luxury to the land-cruiseship experience.

name: Wicked Hostels
overview: 63 bed independently-owned boutique backpacker/international youth hostel. Free amenities include breakfast, wifi, long-distance calling, parking, golf clubs, and bicycles. Rooms are quite small and crowded; a party atmosphere is prevalent (even encouraged) on weekends. Located across from the Calgary Stampede grounds and the Victoria Park/Stampede LRT (tram) station. It is also near the 17th Ave entertainment district.

name: Hotel Argenti
overview: Modern hotel in Velipoja area with comfortable rooms furnished with A/C, TV, bathroom and showers. Restaurant with traditional Albanian and European cuisine.

name: Fleuve Congo Hotel
overview: Renovated in 2012, Fleuve is now one of the most luxurious hotels in town.

name: Lou Cigaloun
overview: Three-star hotel.

name: Fenix Beach Resort Samui
address: 26/1-3, Moo 3, Maret District (Lamai Beach), Koh Samui, Suratthani 84310 Thailand
overview: Right on the beach with nice ocean views and complimentary shuttle trips to the centre of Lamai.

name: Novotel Wien City
overview: The Novotel is in a historic building with a modern, glazed extension on top, so it is hard to miss. Inside you will find typical Novotel rooms in the chain's older standard. Do note that a number of those face the inner courtyard without much view at all. Otherwise there isn't much to be said about this hotel that would not apply to other Novotels.

name: Flamingo Hostel
overview: Opposite to a small park.

name: Super 8
overview: Fitness center, hot tub, outdoor pool, free breakfast, and free wireless internet available. No pets.

name: Hyatt Place Tempe/Phoenix Airport
overview: 2 miles from the Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport and 1.5 miles from downtown Tempe and Arizona State University.
